text: the film , a follow-up to `` jack the dog `` , is described as a black comedy about a reformed womanizer ( nestor carbonell ) who struggles to keep his family together .
translation: Filem tersebut, sebuah susulan kepada "Jack the Dog", digambarkan sebagai sebuah komedi hitam mengenai seorang lelaki penakluk wanita yang telah berubah (Nestor Carbonell) yang berjuang untuk menyatukan keluarganya.
back_translation: The film, a sequel to "Jack the Dog", is portrayed as a dark comedy about a reformed womanizer (Nestor Carbonell) struggling to reunite his family.

text: will he become a grandfather , surrounded by the love and support of a family or will he retreat into his world of memories and lost opportunities ?
translation: Adakah beliau akan menjadi seorang datuk, dikelilingi oleh kasih sayang dan sokongan keluarga atau akan dia berundur ke dalam dunianya yang dipenuhi kenangan dan peluang yang hilang?
back_translation: Will he become a datuk, surrounded by love and support from family, or will he retreat into his world filled with memories and lost opportunities?

text: paco , a rapper and performer , indifferent to all except her career , dreams of hitting the top ten chart .
translation: Paco, seorang rapper dan artis pentas, acuh tak acuh terhadap segala hal kecuali kariernya, bermimpi untuk mencapai carta sepuluh teratas.
back_translation: Paco, a rapper and stage artist, is indifferent towards everything except his career, dreaming of reaching the top ten chart.

text: canada 's arctic light shines bright on this frozen tundra soap opera that breathes extraordinary life into the private existence of the inuit people .
translation: Cahaya Arktik Kanada bersinar terang pada opera sabun tundra beku ini yang menghidupkan kehidupan luar biasa ke dalam kehidupan pribadi masyarakat Inuit.
back_translation: The bright Arctic light of Canada shines on this frozen tundra opera soap, breathing extraordinary life into the personal lives of Inuit communities.

text: first-time writer-director serry shows a remarkable gift for storytelling with this moving , effective little film .
translation: Penulis-pengarah baru pertama kali, Serry, menunjukkan bakat yang luar biasa dalam bercerita dengan filem kecil yang berkesan ini.
back_translation: First-time writer-director, Serry, demonstrates remarkable talent in storytelling with this impactful short film.

text: down and out rock star dewey finn ( black ) gets fired from his band , and he faces a mountain of debts and depression .
translation: Bintang rock yang terpinggir, Dewey Finn (berkulit hitam), dipecat dari bandnya, dan dia menghadapi hutang yang banyak dan kemurungan.
back_translation: The marginalized rock star, Dewey Finn (black-skinned), is fired from his band, and he faces a lot of debt and depression.

text: despite the sympathetic overtures , rachel is convinced things are n't what they seem and suspects her baby has been abducted .
translation: Walaupun tawaran simpati itu, Rachel yakin bahawa perkara bukanlah seperti yang kelihatan dan mencurigai bahawa bayinya telah diculik.
back_translation: Despite the sympathy offer, Rachel is convinced that things are not as they seem and suspects that her baby has been kidnapped.

text: hoffman spends a good deal of screen time alone and without much dialogue , using only his considerable physical skill and screen presence to pull off the role .
translation: Hoffman menghabiskan banyak masa skrin sendirian tanpa banyak dialog, hanya menggunakan kebolehan fizikal yang besar dan kehadiran skrin untuk memainkan watak.
back_translation: Hoffman spends a lot of time on screen alone without much dialogue, relying solely on his great physical abilities and screen presence to play the character.

text: michell , after some sleuthing around , narrows down the suspects to a woman not his wife , another well known victorian poet .
translation: Michell, setelah menyelidik, menyempitkan senarai orang yang disyaki kepada seorang wanita bukan isterinya, seorang penyair Victoria terkenal yang lain.
back_translation: Michell, after investigating, narrowed down the list of suspects to another famous Victorian poet who is not his wife.

text: la cinta comienza intentando ser un drama , rM-apidamente se transforma en una comedia y termina por ser una parodia absolutamente predecible
translation: Cinta ini bermula dengan cuba menjadi sebuah drama, namun dengan cepat berubah menjadi komedi dan akhirnya menjadi sebuah parodi yang sangat mudah diteka.
back_translation: This love started off as an attempt to be a drama, but quickly turned into a comedy, and eventually became a parody that is easily predictable.

text: it may not be `` last tango in paris `` but . . .
translation: Mungkin bukan "tango terakhir di paris" tetapi...
back_translation: Perhaps not "the last tango in Paris" but...

text: it may not be history M-^V but then again , what if it is ? M-^V but it makes for one of the most purely enjoyable and satisfying evenings at the movies i 've had in a while .
translation: Ia mungkin bukan sejarah sejati, tetapi bagaimana jika ia adalah? Walaupun begitu, ia memberikan satu dari malam paling menyeronokkan dan memuaskan di pawagam yang pernah saya alami.
back_translation: It may not be real history, but what if it is? Nevertheless, it provides one of the most enjoyable and satisfying nights at the cinema that I have ever had.

text: director nolan shows here he can handle clever material with a flair .
translation: Pengarah Nolan menunjukkan di sini beliau boleh mengendalikan bahan yang pintar dengan gaya yang hebat.
back_translation: Director Nolan shows here that he can handle clever materials with great style.

text: he discovers that his daughter 's life , unknown to him from an affair with a brazilian woman 15 years earlier , is in danger and must return to rio ; having only five days to finish the deal and find his daughter .
translation: Dia mengetahui bahawa kehidupan anak perempuannya, yang tidak diketahuinya dari hubungan sulit dengan seorang wanita Brazil 15 tahun yang lalu, dalam bahaya dan harus kembali ke Rio; hanya mempunyai lima hari untuk menyelesaikan urusan dan mencari anak perempuannya.
back_translation: He knows that his daughter's life, which he did not know of from his difficult relationship with a woman from Brazil 15 years ago, is in danger and he must return to Rio; he has only five days to settle matters and find his daughter.

text: not everything in the film works , including its somewhat convenient ending .
translation: Tidak semua yang ada dalam filem berfungsi, termasuk pengakhiran yang agak mudah.
back_translation: Not everything in a film works, including the somewhat easy ending.

text: only those most addicted to film violence in all its forms will find anything here to appreciate .
translation: Hanya mereka yang paling ketagih dengan keganasan filem dalam semua bentuknya yang akan menemui sesuatu untuk dihargai di sini.
back_translation: Only those most addicted to violence in films in all its forms will find something to appreciate here.

text: when detective ben simm 's wife is killed , he has to learn to be both father and mother to his little girl while searching for a vigilante that has his own sense of justice .
translation: Apabila isteri detektif Ben Simm dibunuh, beliau terpaksa belajar menjadi bapa dan ibu kepada gadis kecilnya sambil mencari vigilan yang mempunyai pandangan keadilan sendiri.
back_translation: When Detective Ben Simm's wife is murdered, he has to learn to become a father and mother to his young daughter while searching for a vigilante with their own sense of justice.

text: marco and melanie , a young married couple , are living a life of passion , with chaotic situations , and all the little frustrations of daily life .
translation: Marco dan Melanie, seorang pasangan suami isteri muda, menjalani kehidupan penuh gairah, dengan situasi yang kacau, dan segala kekecewaan kecil kehidupan harian.
back_translation: Marco and Melanie, a young married couple, lead a passionate life, with chaotic situations and all the little frustrations of daily life.

text: what really surprises about wisegirls is its low-key quality and genuine tenderness .
translation: Apa yang benar-benar mengejutkan tentang Wisegirls adalah kualiti yang rendah dan kelembutan yang tulen.
back_translation: What is truly surprising about Wisegirls is the low quality and genuine softness.

text: the husband meets a man who knows what to do with his sexuality .
translation: Suami bertemu dengan seorang lelaki yang tahu apa yang perlu dilakukan dengan seksualitinya.
back_translation: The husband met a man who knew what needed to be done with his sexuality.

text: ira member bobby sands is imprisoned in northern ireland .
translation: Ira member Bobby Sands dipenjarakan di Ireland Utara.
back_translation: Ira member Bobby Sands was imprisoned in Northern Ireland.

text: in a season of strenuously ambitious art , the laid-back modesty and accessible charm of evelyn is a welcome relief .
translation: Dalam satu musim seni yang memerlukan ketekunan yang tinggi, keperibadian bersederhana dan daya tarik mudah diakses Evelyn adalah suatu kelegaan yang dialu-alukan.
back_translation: In an art season that requires high diligence, modest personality and easily accessible charm, Evelyn is a welcomed relief.

text: does anyone much think the central story of brendan behan is that he was a bisexual sweetheart before he took to drink ?
translation: Adakah sesiapa berpendapat kisah utama Brendan Behan adalah bahawa beliau merupakan seorang kekasih bukan heteroseksual sebelum terjebak dalam minuman keras?
back_translation: Does anyone believe that the main story of Brendan Behan is that he was a non-heterosexual lover before getting caught up in alcohol?

text: it is zuckerman who stumbles upon silk 's secret and sets out to reconstruct the unknown biography of this eminent , upright man , esteemed as an educator for nearly all his life , and to understand how this ingeniously contrived life came unraveled .
translation: Ia adalah Zuckerman yang terserempak dengan rahsia Silk dan berusaha untuk membina semula biografi yang tidak diketahui tentang lelaki ulung dan teguh ini, dihormati sebagai pendidik hampir sepanjang hayatnya, dan untuk memahami bagaimana kehidupan yang dirancang dengan bijak ini menjadi berantakan.
back_translation: It was Zuckerman who stumbled upon Silk's secret and tried to reconstruct an unknown biography of this outstanding and steadfast man, respected as an educator almost all his life, and to understand how this carefully planned life became a mess.

text: the animation is competent , and some of the gags are quite funny , but jonah . . . never shakes the oppressive , morally superior good-for-you quality that almost automatically accompanies didactic entertainment .
translation: Animasi itu kompeten, dan beberapa lelucon sangat lucu, tetapi Jonah... tidak pernah menyingkirkan kualitas menjengkelkan yang terasa lebih baik dan moral yang hampir secara otomatis menyertai hiburan didaktis.
back_translation: The animation is competent, and some jokes are very funny, but Jonah... never gets rid of the annoying quality that feels better and the moral that almost automatically accompanies didactic entertainment.

text: discouraged , and on the point of giving up writing , yun fei meets a young girl who ca n't see colours , who encourages him to persevere .
translation: Terluka dan hampir menyerah dalam menulis, Yun Fei bertemu dengan seorang gadis muda yang tidak dapat melihat warna, yang mendorongnya untuk terus gigih.
back_translation: Injured and almost giving up on writing, Yun Fei meets a young girl who cannot see color, which inspires him to persevere.

text: while in jail they usually have fights with the security guard , a overweight lunatic .
translation: Semasa dalam penjara, mereka biasanya bergaduh dengan pengawal keselamatan, seorang gila gemuk.
back_translation: While in jail, they usually fight with the security guard, a crazy fat man.

text: tommy , who is now a well known activist , has his credibility destroyed by the book which causes their breakup .
translation: Tommy, yang kini merupakan seorang aktivis yang terkenal, melihat kredibilitinya hancur oleh buku tersebut yang menyebabkan putus cinta mereka.
back_translation: Tommy, who is now a well-known activist, saw his credibility shattered by the book that caused their breakup.

text: a composition of gestures stripped of romance and presented in their barest forms .
translation: satu komposisi gerakan yang dipisahkan dari roman dan disajikan dalam bentuk yang paling sederhana.
back_translation: a composition of movements separated from romance and presented in the simplest form.

text: rowan plays the eponymous lead character in a spoof spy thriller .
translation: Rowan bermain watak utama yang bernama eponymous dalam satu peniruan filem aksi pengintip.
back_translation: Rowan played the main character named eponymous in a spy action movie spoof.

text: it all comes down to whether you can tolerate leon barlow . i ca n't .
translation: Semuanya bergantung pada samada anda boleh bertolak ansur dengan leon barlow. Saya tidak boleh.
back_translation: It all depends on whether you can compromise with Leon Barlow. I can't.

text: now , in present day , washed-up child actor julian ( luke eberl ) , the free-spirited hannah ( colombe jacobsen ) , and former teacher grace ( jenny mollen ) , along with a documentary film crew , go on a search for this man , who may be the embodiment of all evil .
translation: Pada zaman sekarang, bekas pelakon kanak-kanak yang sudah tidak dikenali, Julian (Luke Eberl), wanita bebas roh Hannah (Colombe Jacobsen), dan bekas guru Grace (Jenny Mollen), bersama kru filem dokumentari, pergi mencari lelaki ini, yang mungkin merupakan perwujudan segala kejahatan.
back_translation: In today's era, former child actor Julian (Luke Eberl), free-spirited woman Hannah (Colombe Jacobsen), and former teacher Grace (Jenny Mollen), along with a documentary film crew, set out to find this man, who might embody all evil.

text: the filmmakers expose this delightfully deranged cult by capturing the daily lives of its members .
translation: Pengarah filem mendedahkan kultus yang gila ini dengan merakam kehidupan harian para ahlinya.
back_translation: The film director exposed this crazy cult by recording the daily lives of its members.

text: it 's like a vintage automobile that sometimes runs smoothly , and sometimes lurches and sputters . but it never quite stalls .
translation: Ia seperti kereta lama yang kadang-kadang berjalan lancar, dan kadang-kadang berhenti serta berhembus. Tetapi ia tidak pernah terhenti sepenuhnya.
back_translation: It's like an old car that sometimes runs smoothly, and sometimes stops and sputters. But it never completely stops.

text: it is a story about love , passion , addiction , brillance and the ignorance of greed .
translation: Ini adalah kisah tentang cinta, kegilaan, kecanduan, kegemilangan, dan ketidakpedulian terhadap keghairahan.
back_translation: This is a story about love, madness, addiction, glory, and indifference to desires.

text: sunshine state is a fine example of a carefully written film . but you should n't be too aware that a movie is well-written .
translation: Negara matahari adalah contoh baik filem yang ditulis dengan teliti. Tetapi anda sebaiknya tidak terlalu sedar bahawa sebuah filem ditulis dengan baik.
back_translation: The country of the sun is a good example of a film that is written carefully. But you should not be too aware that a film is written well.

text: moved in his heart with the urgency to reach out for christ , he gets an idea to try and reach the masses in his city for jesus .
translation: Tergerak di dalam hatinya dengan keinginan yang mendesak untuk menghubungi Kristus, dia mendapat idea untuk mencuba dan menjangkau ramai orang di bandarannya untuk Yesus.
back_translation: Moved in her heart with a pressing desire to connect with Christ, she got the idea to try and reach out to many people in her town for Jesus.

text: testing his theories with a time machine of his own invention , hartdegen is hurtled 800 , 000 years into the future , where he discovers that mankind has divided into the hunter - and the hunted .
translation: Menguji teorinya dengan mesin waktu ciptaannya sendiri, Hartdegen terhumban 800,000 tahun ke masa depan, di mana dia mendapati bahawa umat manusia telah berpecah kepada pemburu dan yang diburu.
back_translation: Testing his theory with his own time machine, Hartdegen is thrown 800,000 years into the future, where he finds that mankind has split into hunters and the hunted.

text: a compelling , moving film that respects its audience and its source material .
translation: Filem yang mendayakan dan menggerakkan yang menghormati penonton dan bahan sumbernya.
back_translation: A film that empowers and inspires while respecting the audience and its source material.

text: we 're all out there looking for true love-a very elusive thing indeed , and chance is no exception .
translation: Kita semua sedang mencari cinta sejati - sesuatu yang sangat sukar didapati, dan nasib tidak terkecuali.
back_translation: We are all searching for true love - something that is very difficult to find, and fate is no exception.

text: they go over less well with tom donnerel , a young farmer and carrie 's fianc & # 233 ; .
translation: Mereka tidak begitu disukai oleh Tom Donnerel, seorang petani muda dan tunangan Carrie.
back_translation: They are not particularly liked by Tom Donnerel, a young farmer and Carrie's fiancé.

text: postponing his desire to play basketball on the school team , steve finds an after-school job to support himself and pursues a relationship with the affluent but unhappy sally ( arielle paul ) .
translation: Semasa menangguhkan hasratnya untuk bermain bola keranjang di pasukan sekolah, Steve mencari pekerjaan selepas sekolah untuk menyokong dirinya sendiri dan menjalinkan hubungan dengan Sally yang kaya tetapi tidak berbahagia (Arielle Paul).
back_translation: While postponing his desire to play basketball in the school team, Steve looked for a job after school to support himself and build a relationship with Sally, who was wealthy but unhappy (Arielle Paul).

text: before his very eyes on the store tv monitor , he sees his pick come up as the winning numbers for $ 50-million !
translation: Di depan matanya di monitor tv kedai, dia melihat pilihannya keluar sebagai nombor yang menang untuk $50 juta!
back_translation: In front of his eyes on the shop's TV monitor, he saw his chosen numbers come out as the winning number for $50 million!

text: like shrek , spirit 's visual imagination reminds you of why animation is such a perfect medium for children , because of the way it allows the mind to enter and accept another world .
translation: Seperti Shrek, imaginasi visual Spirit membuat anda teringat mengapa animasi adalah medium yang sempurna untuk kanak-kanak, kerana ia membolehkan minda merasai dan menerima dunia lain.
back_translation: Like Shrek, the visual imagination of Spirit reminds you why animation is the perfect medium for children, as it allows the mind to feel and accept other worlds.

text: got a david lynch jones ? then you 'd do well to check this one out because it 's straight up twin peaks action . . .
translation: Jika anda mempunyai cita-cita untuk David Lynch, anda patut melihat ini kerana ia menampilkan aksi Twin Peaks yang mantap...
back_translation: If you have a dream for David Lynch, you should see this because it features the solid Twin Peaks action...

text: this was also a time , in the midst of a chaotic , decaying environment , when a man tried to cope with the loss of his former lover .
translation: Ini juga merupakan satu zaman, di tengah-tengah persekitaran yang kacau dan rosak, di mana seorang lelaki cuba untuk mengatasi kehilangan bekas kekasihnya.
back_translation: This is also an era, in the midst of a chaotic and broken environment, where a man tries to overcome the loss of his former lover.

text: outside a storm rages and when the power goes out , darkness envelops the house .
translation: Di luar, ribut melanda dan apabila bekalan elektrik terputus, kegelapan menyelubungi rumah.
back_translation: Outside, a storm strikes and when the electricity supply is cut off, darkness envelops the house.

text: his father and brother are dead for so many years .
translation: Ayah dan abangnya telah meninggal dunia sejak bertahun-tahun yang lalu.
back_translation: The father and his older brother have passed away many years ago.

text: that same day , gunmen take over the high school - using it to hide $ 300 million worth of cocaine they 've hijacked .
translation: Pada hari yang sama, penembak mengambil alih sekolah menengah tersebut - menggunakannya untuk menyembunyikan $300 juta nilai dadah kokain yang mereka curi.
back_translation: On the same day, the shooters took over the high school - using it to hide $300 million worth of stolen cocaine drugs.

text: it 's always disappointing when a documentary fails to live up to -- or offer any new insight into -- its chosen topic . unfortunately , that 's precisely what arthur dong 's family fundamentals does .
translation: Sentiasa mengecewakan apabila sebuah dokumentari gagal memenuhi atau menawarkan pandangan baru tentang topik yang dipilih. Malangnya, itulah yang terjadi dengan filem Family Fundamentals arthur dong.
back_translation: It is always disappointing when a documentary fails to fulfill or offer new perspectives on the chosen topic. Unfortunately, that is what happened with the film Family Fundamentals by Arthur Dong.

text: no wonder they 're talking about `` talk to her . `` it 's astonishing .
translation: Tidak hairanlah mereka sedang bercakap tentang "bercakap dengannya." Ia mengagumkan.
back_translation: No wonder they are discussing "talking to her." It's amazing.

text: jason loses an important story assignment entitled 'big fat liar ' in movie producer marty wolf 's ( paul giamatti ) limo , which wolf then turns into a film .
translation: Jason kehilangan tugasan cerita penting yang bertajuk 'Big Fat Liar' dalam limo pengeluar filem Marty Wolf (Paul Giamatti), yang kemudian dijadikan filem oleh Wolf.
back_translation: Jason loses an important story assignment titled 'Big Fat Liar' in the limo of film producer Marty Wolf (Paul Giamatti), who later turns it into a movie.

text: her young son dies , her marriage to max is ruined , and her lover is in fact dangerous in his jealousy and mad rage , but no matter what the consequences - his subversive spirit lives inside her , forms her , obsesses her .
translation: Anak lelakinya yang muda meninggal, perkahwinannya dengan Max hancur, dan kekasihnya sebenarnya berbahaya dengan cemburunya dan kemarahan gilanya, tetapi tidak kira apa pun akibatnya - semangat subversifnya hidup di dalam dirinya, membentuknya, mengasakannya.
back_translation: His young son passed away, his marriage with Max shattered, and his true lover turned out to be dangerous with his jealousy and wild anger, but no matter the consequences - his subversive spirit lives within him, shaping him, sharpening him.

text: a marvellous journey from childhood idealism to adolescent self-absorption .
translation: perjalanan yang mengagumkan dari idealisme kanak-kanak hingga penyerapan kendiri remaja.
back_translation: The amazing journey from childhood idealism to teenage self-absorption.

text: the future is on it 's way to atlantic city on a bus .
translation: Masa depan sedang dalam perjalanan ke bandar Atlantic dalam bas.
back_translation: The future is on its way to Atlantic City by bus.

text: impostor has a handful of thrilling moments and a couple of good performances , but the movie does n't quite fly . for starters , the story is just too slim .
translation: Imbostor mempunyai beberapa saat mendebarkan dan beberapa perlakuan yang baik, tetapi filem ini tidak benar-benar hebat. Untuk permulaan, ceritanya terlalu ringkas.
back_translation: Impostor has some thrilling moments and some good performances, but this film is not truly great. For starters, the story is too condensed.

text: the campy results make mel brooks ' borscht belt schtick look sophisticated .
translation: Hasil yang sering direka itu membuat kelakar mel Brooks ' borscht belt schtick kelihatan berkelas.
back_translation: The often designed output makes Mel Brooks' borscht belt schtick appear classy.

text: the quality of schwentke 's visuals . . . provides ample compensation .
translation: kualiti visual Schwentke memberi pampasan yang mencukupi.
back_translation: Schwentke's visual quality offers sufficient compensation.

text: the scorpion king is more fun than conan the barbarian .
translation: Raja Kala Jengking lebih menyeronokkan daripada Conan si Barbar.
back_translation: The Scorpion King is more entertaining than Conan the Barbarian.

text: the best part about `` gangs `` was daniel day-lewis .
translation: Bahagian terbaik mengenai "gangs" adalah Daniel Day-Lewis.
back_translation: The best part about "Gangs" is Daniel Day-Lewis.

text: a witty screen adaptation of this classic comedy of manners with its generous supply of snappy one-liners .
translation: satu adaptasi skrin yang cerdik untuk komedi klasik ini berkaitan dengan etika dengan penuh permainan kata-kata yang cekap.
back_translation: a clever screen adaptation of this classic comedy that deals with ethics with skillful wordplay.

text: it is a study of dark forces lurking in the lives of teenagers today .
translation: Ia merupakan kajian mengenai kekuatan gelap yang mengintai kehidupan remaja pada masa kini.
back_translation: It is a study on the dark forces that lurk in the lives of teenagers today.

text: some actors have so much charisma that you 'd be happy to listen to them reading the phone book . hugh grant and sandra bullock are two such likeable actors .
translation: Beberapa pelakon mempunyai karisma yang begitu besar sehingga anda akan gembira untuk mendengar mereka membaca buku telefon. Hugh Grant dan Sandra Bullock adalah dua pelakon yang begitu disenangi seperti itu.
back_translation: Some actors have such great charisma that you would be delighted to hear them read the telephone book. Hugh Grant and Sandra Bullock are two actors who are so well-loved in that way.

text: think 'glengarry glen ross ' without the mamet dialogue , and that 's kinda what you 'll get here .
translation: Bayangkan 'Glengarry Glen Ross' tanpa dialog Mamet, dan itu lebih kurang seperti apa yang anda akan dapatkan di sini.
back_translation: Imagine 'Glengarry Glen Ross' without Mamet's dialogues, and that's more or less what you would get here.

text: even accepting this in the right frame of mind can only provide it with so much leniency .
translation: Menerima ini dengan cara berfikir yang betul hanya boleh memberikan sedikit kelonggaran padanya.
back_translation: Accepting this with the right mindset can provide only a small amount of flexibility to it.

text: gives you the steady pulse of life in a beautiful city viewed through the eyes of a character who , in spite of tragic loss and increasing decrepitude , knows in his bones that he is one of the luckiest men alive .
translation: memberikan nadi kehidupan yang mantap di sebuah bandar yang indah dilihat melalui mata seorang watak yang, walaupun mengalami kehilangan tragis dan penurunan diri yang semakin meningkat, tahu dalam tulang belulangnya bahawa dia adalah salah seorang lelaki yang paling bertuah di dunia.
back_translation: providing a solid pulse of life in a beautiful city as seen through the eyes of a character who, despite experiencing tragic loss and increasing self-decline, knows in his bones that he is one of the luckiest men in the world.

text: no one knows this better than 35-year-old vince , back in his hometown of van wert , ohio , after a 13-year absence .
translation: Tidak ada yang tahu ini lebih baik daripada Vince berusia 35 tahun, kembali ke kampung halamannya di Van Wert, Ohio, setelah absen selama 13 tahun.
back_translation: No one knows this better than 35-year-old Vince, returning to his hometown in Van Wert, Ohio, after being absent for 13 years.

text: increasing evidence about one man 's role in a long history of human rights abuses leads to a critical examination of american diplomacy through the lens of international standards of justice .
translation: Bukti yang semakin meningkat tentang peranan seorang lelaki dalam sejarah panjang penyalahgunaan hak asasi manusia mengakibatkan pemeriksaan kritis terhadap diplomasi Amerika melalui lensa standard keadilan antarabangsa.
back_translation: The increasing evidence of the role of a man in the long history of human rights abuse has led to a critical examination of American diplomacy through the lens of international justice standards.

text: what saves it . . . and makes it one of the better video-game-based flicks , is that the film acknowledges upfront that the plot makes no sense , such that the lack of linearity is the point of emotional and moral departure for protagonist alice .
translation: Apa yang menyelamatkannya... dan membuatnya menjadi salah satu filem yang terbaik berdasarkan permainan video, ialah filem tersebut mengakui dengan jelas bahawa plotnya tidak masuk akal, dengan itu kekurangan lineariti menjadi titik perpisahan emosi dan moral bagi watak utama, Alice.
back_translation: What saved it... and made it one of the best movies based on a video game, is that the film clearly acknowledges that its plot is nonsensical, thus the lack of linearity becomes the emotional and moral turning point for the main character, Alice.

text: the camera soars above the globe in dazzling panoramic shots that make the most of the large-screen format , before swooping down on a string of exotic locales , scooping the whole world up in a joyous communal festival of rhythm .
translation: Kamera melayang di atas bumi dalam adegan panorama yang memukau yang memaksimumkan format layar besar, sebelum melayang turun ke sejumlah lokasi eksotis, menyapu seluruh dunia dalam festival komunal yang penuh dengan irama yang ceria.
back_translation: The camera hovers above the earth in a stunning panoramic scene that maximizes the large screen format, before descending to a number of exotic locations, sweeping across the world in a communal festival filled with cheerful rhythms.

text: this masterfully calibrated psychological thriller thrives on its taut performances and creepy atmosphere even if the screenplay falls somewhat short .
translation: Filem seram psikologi yang dijalankan dengan sempurna ini berjaya berdasarkan lakonan yang mendebarkan dan atmosfera yang seram walaupun skripnya agak kurang memuaskan.
back_translation: This perfectly executed psychological horror film succeeds based on its thrilling performances and eerie atmosphere, despite the somewhat unsatisfying script.

text: unlike most reunion stories that climax with a clich & # 233 ; happy ending , daughter from danang is a real-life drama .
translation: Berbeza dengan kebanyakan cerita reuni yang mencapai puncaknya dengan akhir bahagia yang klise, Daughter from Danang adalah drama kehidupan sebenar.
back_translation: Unlike most reunion stories that reach their climax with a cliche happy ending, Daughter from Danang is a real-life drama.

text: the military team must shut down the computer and get out , fighting their way past zombies , mutants , and the computer itself , before the virus escapes and infects the rest of the world .
translation: Pasukan tentera mesti mematikan komputer dan keluar, bertarung melawan zombi, mutan, dan komputer itu sendiri, sebelum virus terlepas dan menjangkiti seluruh dunia.
back_translation: The military team must shut down the computer and evacuate, fight against zombies, mutants, and the computer itself, before the virus escapes and infects the whole world.

text: gondry 's direction is adequate . . . but what gives human nature its unique feel is kaufman 's script .
translation: Pengarah Gondry adalah mencukupi...tetapi apa yang memberikan perasaan unik kepada sifat manusia adalah skrip Kaufman.
back_translation: Director Gondry is adequate...but what gives a unique feeling to human nature is Kaufman's script.

text: in fact , sean has made the mistake of lending eddie $ 25 , 000 to cover his profligate spending .
translation: Sebenarnya, Sean telah membuat kesilapan dengan meminjamkan Eddie $25,000 untuk menampung perbelanjaan borosnya.
back_translation: Actually, Sean made a mistake by lending Eddie $25,000 to cover his extravagant expenses.

text: she 's willing to put him through just about anything to `` cure `` him of t . s . , with pills , counseling , electro-shock therapy , etc . mom 's also concerned about finn 's future - who will care for him ?
translation: Dia sanggup untuk melalui apa saja untuk "menyembuhkan" dia dari t.s., dengan pil, kaunseling, terapi elektrik kejutan, dan lain-lain. Ibu juga bimbang tentang masa depan Finn - siapa yang akan menjaga dia?
back_translation: He is willing to go through anything to "cure" her of t.s., with pills, counseling, electroshock therapy, and others. Mother is also worried about Finn's future - who will take care of her?

text: a superb southern gothic slice of horror that is easily the sickest movie to arrive in theaters in a very long time . and i mean that in the nicest way possible .
translation: filem seram yang hebat dengan unsur Southern Gothic yang sangat teruk, dan ia adalah filem yang paling menjijikkan yang tiba di pawagam dalam masa yang sangat lama. Dan saya maksudkan itu dengan cara yang paling baik mungkin.
back_translation: A great horror movie with a very strong Southern Gothic element, and it's the most disgusting film to arrive in the cinemas in a very long time. And I mean that in the best way possible.

text: when your leading ladies are a couple of screen-eating dominatrixes like goldie hawn and susan sarandon at their raunchy best , even hokum goes down easily .
translation: Apabila watak utama anda adalah sepasang dominatrix yang menguasai skrin seperti Goldie Hawn dan Susan Sarandon dalam keadaan paling kotor mereka, malah hokum pun menjadi mudah diterima.
back_translation: When your main characters are a pair of dominatrixes who dominate the screen like Goldie Hawn and Susan Sarandon in their dirtiest states, even absurdity becomes easily acceptable.

text: while enders is initially frustrated with his assignment , his respect grows as the codetalkers prove their worth in the brutal battle to take saipan .
translation: Walaupun Awalnya Ender frustrasi dengan tugasan beliau, rasa hormatnya meningkat apabila penutur kod membuktikan nilai mereka dalam pertempuran ganas untuk mengambil Saipan.
back_translation: Although initially Ender was frustrated with his assignment, his respect grew when the speaker of the code proved their worth in the fierce battle to capture Saipan.

text: cathy ( julianne moore ) is the perfect 50s housewife , living the perfect 50s life : healthy kids , successful husband , social prominence .
translation: Cathy (Julianne Moore) adalah suri rumah 50-an yang sempurna, menjalani kehidupan 50-an yang sempurna: anak-anak sihat, suami yang berjaya, kemasyhuran sosial.
back_translation: Cathy (Julianne Moore) is the perfect 50s housewife, living the perfect 50s life: healthy kids, successful husband, social fame.

text: . . . another example of how sandler is losing his touch .
translation: . . . satu contoh lagi bagaimana sandler kehilangan sentuhannya .
back_translation: ...another example of how Sandler lost his touch.

text: i 'm sure if you 're a hartley fan , you might enjoy yourself . . . me , i did n't care for it .
translation: Saya yakin jika anda penggemar Hartley, anda mungkin akan menikmatinya...tetapi saya tidak suka.
back_translation: I am sure if you are a fan of Hartley, you might enjoy it...but I don't like it.

text: his mission : to gather information on an organization that may just be planning the destruction of the world , led by the nihilistic yorgi .
translation: Misi beliau: mengumpul maklumat mengenai sebuah organisasi yang mungkin merancang untuk memusnahkan dunia, dipimpin oleh Yorgi yang nihilistik.
back_translation: His mission: to gather information about an organization that may be planning to destroy the world, led by the nihilistic Yorgi.

text: suggests puns about ingredients and soup and somebody being off their noodle , but let 's just say the ingredients do n't quite add up to a meal .
translation: Cadangkan gurauan berkaitan bahan makanan dan sup serta seseorang kelam kabut, tetapi mari kita katakan bahan-bahan tersebut tidak cukup menjadi hidangan.
back_translation: Propose jokes related to food ingredients and soup and someone in a rush, but let's say those ingredients are not enough to make a dish.

text: `` secondhand lions `` follows the comedic adventures of an introverted boy ( osment ) left on the doorstep of a pair of reluctant , eccentric great-uncles ( caine and duvall ) , whose exotic remembrances stir the boy 's spirit and re-ignite the men 's lives .
translation: "Secondhand Lions" mengikuti pengembaraan komedi seorang kanak-kanak pendiam (Osment) yang ditinggalkan di depan pintu seorang sepasang bapa saudara yang enggan, eksentrik (Caine dan Duvall), di mana kenangan eksotik mereka menggerakkan semangat kanak-kanak itu dan menghidupkan semula kehidupan kedua-dua lelaki tersebut.
back_translation: "Secondhand Lions" follows the comedic adventures of a quiet child (Osment) abandoned at the door of a reluctant, eccentric pair of stepbrothers (Caine and Duvall), where their exotic memories ignite the child's spirit and bring the lives of both men back to life.

text: charlie is man who wakes up to find that no one can see him , by chance he meets carol on a lonely highway .
translation: Charlie adalah seorang lelaki yang terbangun dan mendapati bahawa tiada sesiapa yang boleh melihatnya, secara kebetulan dia bertemu dengan Carol di sebuah lebuh raya yang sunyi.
back_translation: Charlie is a man who woke up and found that no one could see him, by chance he met Carol on a quiet highway.

text: the rich woman seeks the help of her lawyers to find her lost grandson cary and eventually finds him living in a deprived area with cass .
translation: Wanita kaya mencari bantuan peguamnya untuk mencari cucunya yang hilang, Cary, dan akhirnya mendapati dia tinggal di kawasan miskin bersama Cass.
back_translation: A wealthy woman seeks her lawyer's help to search for her missing grandson, Cary, and eventually finds him living in a poor area with Cass.

text: sad and alone , caroline wanders the exotic city in search of ansers , finality , and peace of mind .
translation: Sedih dan sendirian, Caroline berjalan-jalan di bandar eksotik mencari jawapan, penyelesaian, dan ketenangan batin.
back_translation: Feeling sad and lonely, Caroline walked around the exotic town searching for answers, solutions, and inner peace.

text: for one week , eduardo coutinho and his team talked to 27 residents in an enormous building in copacabana .
translation: Selama satu minggu, Eduardo Coutinho dan pasukannya berbincang dengan 27 penghuni di sebuah bangunan besar di Copacabana.
back_translation: For a week, Eduardo Coutinho and his team conversed with 27 residents in a large building in Copacabana.

text: along the way , they discover a sinister conspiracy that reaches to the police department and even the highest level of government .
translation: Di sepanjang perjalanan, mereka menemui konspirasi jahat yang melibatkan jabatan polis dan malah peringkat tertinggi kerajaan.
back_translation: Throughout the journey, they encountered a malicious conspiracy involving the police force and even the highest levels of government.

text: several degrees shy of the gross-out contests one expects from current teen fare .
translation: Beberapa darjah kurang daripada pertandingan yang menjijikkan yang dijangkakan daripada kandungan remaja semasa.
back_translation: A few degrees lower than the expected disgusting contests from adolescent content.

text: plot strands involve a trio of lost transvestites , two girls who never leave the toilets , a pair of innocent under-age drinkers and a guy who is determined to pierce his genitalia , but the central story follows ali as she sets out to humilate her former lover , mike , who slept with another woman .
translation: Plot melibatkan sebuah trio transvestit yang tersesat, dua gadis yang tidak pernah meninggalkan tandas, sepasang minum di bawah umur yang tidak berdosa, dan seorang lelaki yang bertekad untuk melubangi alat sulitnya, tetapi cerita utamanya mengikuti Ali ketika dia berusaha untuk mempermalukan bekas kekasihnya, Mike, yang tidur dengan wanita lain.
back_translation: The plot involves a trio of lost transvestites, two girls who never leave the bathroom, an innocent underage drinking couple, and a man determined to pierce his private parts, but the main story follows Ali as he tries to embarrass his ex-girlfriend, Mike, who slept with another woman.

text: boromir ( sean bean ) is dead , frodo baggins ( elijah wood ) and samwise gamgee ( sean astin ) have gone to mordor alone to destroy the one ring , merry ( dominic monaghan ) and pippin ( billy boyd ) have been captured by the uruk-hai , and aragorn ( viggo mortensen ) , legolas ( orlando bloom ) , and gimli ( john rhys-davies ) have made friends of the rohan , a race of humans that are in the path of the upcoming war , led by its aging king , th & # 233 ; oden ( bernard hill ) .
translation: Boromir (Sean Bean) telah meninggal, Frodo Baggins (Elijah Wood) dan Samwise Gamgee (Sean Astin) telah pergi ke Mordor sendirian untuk memusnahkan cincin satu, Merry (Dominic Monaghan) dan Pippin (Billy Boyd) telah ditawan oleh uruk-hai, dan Aragorn (Viggo Mortensen), Legolas (Orlando Bloom), dan Gimli (John Rhys-Davies) telah menjadikan sekutu bangsa Rohan, sebuah bangsa manusia yang berada di laluan perang yang akan datang, dipimpin oleh Raja tua mereka, Théoden (Bernard Hill).
back_translation: Boromir (Sean Bean) has died, Frodo Baggins (Elijah Wood) and Samwise Gamgee (Sean Astin) have gone to Mordor alone to destroy the One Ring, Merry (Dominic Monaghan) and Pippin (Billy Boyd) have been captured by the Uruk-hai, and Aragorn (Viggo Mortensen), Legolas (Orlando Bloom), and Gimli (John Rhys-Davies) have allied with the Rohan people, a human nation on the path of the upcoming war, led by their old King, Théoden (Bernard Hill).

text: unbeknownst to the elders , the widows daughter has come to settle the estate , evict them and have an estate sale all in one day .
translation: Tanpa disedari oleh orang tua, anak perempuan balu telah datang untuk menyelesaikan harta pusaka, mengusir mereka, dan mengadakan jualan harta pusaka dalam satu hari.
back_translation: Without the knowledge of the parents, the widowed daughter has come to settle the inheritance, drive them out, and hold an estate sale all in one day.

text: the story and the friendship proceeds in such a way that you 're watching a soap opera rather than a chronicle of the ups and downs that accompany lifelong friendships .
translation: Cerita dan persahabatan berjalan dengan cara yang membuat anda rasa seperti sedang menonton drama bersiri daripada kronik kisah suka dan duka yang menyertai persahabatan sepanjang hayat.
back_translation: Stories and friendships unfold in a way that makes you feel like you're watching a series drama of the chronicles of joys and sorrows that accompany lifelong friendships.

text: steve 's best friend , sean , on the other hand , has n't been so lucky .
translation: Rakan baik Steve, Sean, pula tidak begitu bernasib baik.
back_translation: Good friend Steve, Sean, on the other hand, is not so lucky.

text: loonies is a film with light-hearted and cheeky humour that , in a moving way , takes us into the pleasantly disturbed world of five somewhat romanticised psychiatric patients .
translation: "Loonies adalah filem dengan humor ringan dan cerdik yang, dengan cara yang menggerakkan, membawa kita ke dalam dunia yang agak romantis dan terganggu secara menyenangkan lima pesakit psikiatrik."
back_translation: "Loonies is a film with light and clever humor that, in a moving way, takes us into a somewhat romantic and amusingly disturbed world of five psychiatric patients."

text: was i scared ? only at the prospect of beck 's next project . let 's see , a haunted house , a haunted ship , what 's next . . . ghost blimp ?
translation: Adakah saya takut? Hanya takut dengan prospek projek seterusnya Beck. Mari kita lihat, sebuah rumah berhantu, sebuah kapal berhantu, apakah seterusnya... kapal udara hantu?
back_translation: Am I scared? Only scared of the prospects of Beck's next project. Let's see, a haunted house, a haunted ship, what's next... a haunted airship?

text: now & # 38 ; forever is a dramatic contemporary love story combining elements of spirituality , heart and integrity .
translation: Sekarang & selamanya adalah sebuah cerita cinta kontemporari yang dramatik yang menggabungkan elemen-elemen spiritualiti, kasih dan integriti.
back_translation: "Now & forever is a dramatic contemporary love story that combines elements of spirituality, love, and integrity."

text: it 's the kind of movie you ca n't quite recommend because it is all windup and not much of a pitch , yet you ca n't bring yourself to dislike it .
translation: Ini adalah jenis filem yang tidak dapat anda sarankan sepenuhnya kerana ia hanyalah hujah dan tidak banyak pitch, tetapi anda tidak boleh membenci filem tersebut.
back_translation: This is the kind of movie that you can't fully recommend because it's just arguments and not much pitch, but you can't hate the movie either.

text: a fine , rousing , g-rated family film , aimed mainly at little kids but with plenty of entertainment value to keep grown-ups from squirming in their seats .
translation: Filem keluarga yang baik, membangkitkan semangat, bertaraf G, yang utamanya ditujukan kepada kanak-kanak kecil tetapi mempunyai nilai hiburan yang mencukupi untuk mengekalkan minat dewasa tanpa berkerut di tempat duduk mereka.
back_translation: A good family film, uplifting, rated G, primarily aimed at young children but has enough entertainment value to keep adults interested without squirming in their seats.

text: regardless , it is through grace 's visions involving him that she learns of her parent 's demonic pastimes , which include abduction , murder , and possibly worse .
translation: Bagaimanapun, adalah melalui penglihatan-penglihatan Grace yang melibatkan dirinya bahawa dia mengetahui mengenai masa lalu ibu bapanya yang terlibat dengan kegiatan-kegiatan demonic, termasuk penculikan, pembunuhan, dan mungkin lagi teruk.
back_translation: However, it is through Grace's visions involving her that she comes to know about her parents' past involvement in demonic activities, including kidnapping, murder, and possibly worse.

text: she must look beyond her history with men into a childhood that stopped short because of a shocking event that she has buried deep inside herself .
translation: Dia harus melihat jauh ke belakang sejarahnya dengan lelaki ke dalam masa kanak-kanaknya yang terhenti secara tiba-tiba kerana peristiwa mengejutkan yang telah dia kuburkan di dalam dirinya.
back_translation: He must look far back into his history with the man into his childhood that stopped abruptly because of the shocking event that he has buried within himself.

text: this version does justice both to stevenson and to the sci-fi genre .
translation: Versi ini membawa keadilan kepada Stevenson dan genre sains-fiksyen.
back_translation: This version brings justice to Stevenson and the science fiction genre.

text: mother turns out to be his crazy accomplice in mass murder and his quest for immortality .
translation: Ibu berubah menjadi sekutunya yang gila dalam pembunuhan berkumpulan dan pencariannya untuk keabadian.
back_translation: The mother turned into his crazy accomplice in mass murder and search for immortality.

text: the boy falls in love with a rich girl ( deeksha ) .
translation: budak lelaki jatuh cinta dengan seorang gadis kaya (Deeksha).
back_translation: A boy falls in love with a rich girl (Deeksha).

text: i love the opening scenes of a wintry new york city in 1899 . cinematic poetry showcases the city 's old-world charm before machines change nearly everything .
translation: Saya suka adegan pembukaan sebuah New York City yang sejuk pada tahun 1899. Puisi sinematik memperlihatkan daya tarik lama bandar tersebut sebelum mesin mengubah hampir segalanya.
back_translation: I like the opening scene of a cool New York City in 1899. The cinematic poetry displays the old charm of the city before machines changed almost everything.

text: sure , there are flaws , but the moments that do things properly see the screen burst with confidence , rhythm , heat and pizzazz .
translation: Tentu, terdapat kelemahan, tetapi pada saat-saat yang melakukan perkara dengan betul, layar dipenuhi dengan keyakinan, rentak, kehangatan, dan kehebatan.
back_translation: Of course, there are weaknesses, but in moments of doing things correctly, the screen is filled with confidence, rhythm, warmth, and greatness.

text: the sheer dumbness of the plot ( other than its one good idea ) and the movie 's inescapable air of sleaziness get you down .
translation: kebodohan plot yang nyata (selain daripada satu idea baik) dan udara kotor filem yang tak terelakkan membuatkan anda kecewa.
back_translation: The evident storyline stupidity (aside from one good idea) and inevitable film's dirty atmosphere will make you disappointed.

text: it 's never a good sign when a film 's star spends the entirety of the film in a coma . it 's a worse sign when you begin to envy her condition .
translation: Ini bukanlah tanda baik apabila bintang filem berada dalam koma sepanjang filem. Ini adalah tanda yang lebih teruk apabila anda mula mendendam keadaannya.
back_translation: It is not a good sign when a movie star is in a coma throughout the movie. It is an even worse sign when you start resenting their condition.

text: it will be an act of violence that thrusts the girl into womanhood and leads her to a new life where , not without pain , everything is possible .
translation: Itu akan menjadi tindakan keganasan yang mendorong gadis itu ke alam wanita dan membawanya ke kehidupan baru di mana, tanpa terlepas dari kesakitan, segalanya adalah mungkin.
back_translation: It will be an act of violence that propels the girl into womanhood and takes her to a new life where, without escaping pain, everything is possible.

text: voyeurism is the order all around , as those who watch for pleasure and those paid to watch get more than bargained for when the operation & # 237 ; s delicate balance of power is skewed by rebellion .
translation: Voyeurisme adalah perintah di sekeliling, kerana mereka yang menonton untuk keseronokan dan mereka yang dibayar untuk menonton mendapat lebih daripada yang dipersetujui apabila imbangan kuasa operasi digoyahkan oleh pemberontakan.
back_translation: Voyeurism is a command all around, as those who watch for pleasure and those who are paid to watch get more than agreed upon when the balance of power in operations is destabilized by rebellion.

text: it 's sex and the city meets the wedding banquet for young san franciscan daniel chang , living at home with his clueless , traditional mother .
translation: Ini seperti 'Sex and the City' bertemu 'The Wedding Banquet' untuk Daniel Chang, seorang pemuda San Francisco yang tinggal di rumah dengan ibunya yang kurang arif dan tradisional.
back_translation: This is like 'Sex and the City' meeting 'The Wedding Banquet' for Daniel Chang, a young man from San Francisco who lives at home with his less savvy and traditional mother.

text: from that moment on nothing is as it was before . . .
translation: Sejak saat itu, tiada apa yang sama seperti sebelum ini. . .
back_translation: Since that time, nothing has been the same as before. . .

text: stone seems to have a knack for wrapping the theater in a cold blanket of urban desperation .
translation: Stone nampaknya mempunyai bakat untuk melilitkan teater dengan selimut sejuk keputusasaan bandar.
back_translation: Stone seems to have a talent for wrapping the theater with a cold blanket of urban despair.

text: a chronicle , which goes behind the scenes on a stormy collaboration between the iconoclastic dance company , pilobolus , and legendary author-illustrator maurice sendak .
translation: sebuah kronik, yang menyorot kolaborasi yang bergelora antara syarikat tari ikonoklastik, Pilobolus, dan penulis-illustator legenda Maurice Sendak.
back_translation: a chronicle, highlighting the fervent collaboration between the iconoclastic dance company, Pilobolus, and the legendary writer-illustrator Maurice Sendak.

text: the piquant story needs more dramatic meat on its bones .
translation: Kisah yang pedas itu memerlukan lebih banyak elemen dramatik yang berkesan.
back_translation: The spicy story requires more impactful dramatic elements.

text: a subtle variation on i spit on your grave in which our purported heroine pathologically avenges a hatred for men .
translation: Sebuah variasi halus mengenai "I Spit On Your Grave" di mana pahlawan wanita kita secara patologinya membalas dendam terhadap kebencian terhadap lelaki.
back_translation: A subtle variation on "I Spit On Your Grave" where our female heroine pathologically seeks revenge against hatred towards men.

text: a densely constructed , highly referential film , and an audacious return to form that can comfortably sit among jean-luc godard 's finest work .
translation: filem yang dibina secara padat, merujuk dengan banyak perkara, dan merupakan satu pencapaian kembali yang berani yang boleh duduk dengan selesa di kalangan karya terbaik Jean-Luc Godard.
back_translation: A tightly constructed film that references many things and is a bold achievement that can comfortably sit among Jean-Luc Godard's best works.

text: to protect her relationship with john , she `` ditches `` her son , having him arrested and locked in a correctional `` mental `` facility , before coercing her older brother burt , who lives in hollywood , to take him .
translation: Untuk melindungi hubungannya dengan John, dia 'membuang' anak lelakinya, membuatnya ditangkap dan dipenjarakan di fasiliti pembetulan 'mental', sebelum memaksa abangnya yang lebih tua, Burt, yang tinggal di Hollywood, untuk membawanya.
back_translation: To protect her relationship with John, she 'disposed of' her son, having him arrested and imprisoned in a 'mental' correctional facility, before forcing her older brother, Burt, who lived in Hollywood, to take him in.

text: it 's something of the ultimate scorsese film , with all the stomach-turning violence , colorful new york gang lore and other hallmarks of his personal cinema painted on their largest-ever historical canvas .
translation: Ini adalah sesuatu daripada filem ultimate Scorsese, dengan segala kekejaman yang membuak-buak, warisan geng-geng New York yang berwarna-warni dan tanda pengenal lain dari sinema peribadinya dilukis di atas kanvas sejarah terbesar yang pernah ada.
back_translation: This is something from Scorsese's ultimate film, with all its rampant cruelty, the colorful legacy of New York gangs, and other distinctive hallmarks of his cinema painted on the greatest canvas of history ever existed.

text: the moviegoing equivalent of going to a dinner party and being forced to watch the host and hostess 's home video of their baby 's birth .
translation: aktiviti menonton filem sama seperti pergi ke majlis makan malam dan terpaksa menonton rakaman video kelahiran bayi tuan rumah.
back_translation: Watching movies is just like going to a dinner party and being forced to watch the host's baby birth video recording.

text: it 's a loathsome movie , it really is and it makes absolutely no sense .
translation: Ini satu filem yang menjijikkan, sungguh begitu dan ia benar-benar tidak masuk akal.
back_translation: This is a disgusting film, really and it is absolutely nonsensical.

text: the movie is well crafted , and well executed . if you 're paying attention , the `` big twists `` are pretty easy to guess - but that does n't make the movie any less entertaining .
translation: Filem ini dihasilkan dengan baik dan dilaksanakan dengan baik juga. Jika anda memberi perhatian, "putaran besar" agak mudah diteka - tetapi itu tidak mengurangkan hiburan filem ini.
back_translation: This film is well-produced and executed well too. If you pay attention, the "big twist" is quite easy to predict - but that doesn't diminish the entertainment of this film.

text: a feel-good picture in the best sense of the term .
translation: gambar yang menimbulkan perasaan baik dalam erti kata yang terbaik.
back_translation: Images that evoke good feelings in the best sense of the word.

text: it 's pithy without being saccharine ; it 's funny without ever not taking itself seriously ; it 's full of beautiful characters and great performances .
translation: Ia padat tanpa menjadi terlalu manis; ia lucu tanpa pernah tidak mengambil dirinya sendiri dengan serius; ia penuh dengan watak-watak yang indah dan persembahan-persembahan yang hebat.
back_translation: It is dense without being too sweet; it is cute without ever not taking itself seriously; it is full of beautiful characters and great performances.

text: the problem is that the movie has no idea of it is serious or not .
translation: Masalahnya ialah filem tersebut tidak mempunyai idea sama ada ia serius atau tidak.
back_translation: The problem is that the film lacks the idea of whether it is serious or not.

text: besides him , the other residents are `` baggers , `` human-like creatures that are infected by the tall man 's blood , the dwarves , and , of course , the silver spheres , all trying to break out of the barrier that contains them and into the real world .
translation: Selain daripada itu, penduduk lain adalah "peminta sedekah," makhluk mirip manusia yang dijangkiti oleh darah lelaki tinggi, orang kerdil, dan, tentu saja, bulatan perak, semua cuba untuk keluar dari halangan yang menyekat mereka dan masuk ke dunia sebenar.
back_translation: Furthermore, other inhabitants are "beggars," humanoid creatures infected with high male blood, dwarves, and, of course, silver circles, all trying to break free from the barriers that block them and enter the real world.

text: katie is a young girl who loves to climb .

text: this movie seems to have been written using mad-libs . there can be no other explanation . hilariously inept and ridiculous .

text: nete 's husband seeks comfort outside of their home , her daughter begins to rebel , and as the relationship between nete and her father has not been too good for years , things are bound to explode .

text: mile zero is a story about a father with a remarkable capacity to love , but who lets fear and desperation rule his actions .
translation: Mile Zero adalah sebuah cerita tentang seorang bapa yang mempunyai keupayaan yang luar biasa untuk mencintai, tetapi membenarkan ketakutan dan keputusasaan mengawal tindakannya.

text: now , akshay must battle those that he has to overcome to get what he needs to help his mother and survive the wilderness .

text: but for one celebrant this holy week is different .

text: the two black men ( anthony and michael ) are successful in the high tech world of silicon valley , and have known each other since childhood .

text: if you 're willing to have fun with it , you wo n't feel cheated by the high infidelity of unfaithful .

text: its heart is in the right place and the lack of cynicism comes as a pleasant surprise .

text: has enough gun battles and throwaway humor to cover up the yawning chasm where the plot should be .

text: forced to think fast , the producer decides to digitally create an actress `` simone `` to sub for the star -- the first totally believable synthetic actress .

text: it questions whether we really live in a world that can be divided neatly into black hats and white hats . and anyway , it wonders , is the guy in the black hat always wrong ?

text: it 's no surprise that as a director washington demands and receives excellent performances , from himself and from newcomer derek luke .

text: medem packs it with so much stunning , wildly colorful imagery -- and so much sex -- that it transfixes you even when you 're not quite sure what 's going on .

text: the acting is just fine , but there 's not enough substance here to sustain interest for the full 90 minutes , especially with the weak payoff .
translation: Lakonan itu cukup baik, tetapi tidak ada cukup isi di sini untuk mengekalkan minat selama 90 minit penuh, terutamanya dengan ganjaran yang lemah.

text: an uneven film dealing with too many problems to be taken seriously .
translation: Filem yang tidak sekata yang membincangkan terlalu banyak masalah untuk diambil secara serius.

text: the most ill-conceived animated comedy since the 1991 dog rover dangerfield .

text: bernal . . . gives an ambiguous performance ; he 's a lightweight actor , but that 's a positive quality when portraying a man on whom nothing leaves a permanent mark .
translation: bernal memberikan persembahan yang ambigu; dia seorang pelakon yang ringan, tetapi itu adalah sifat positif apabila memegang watak seorang lelaki yang tidak terkesan oleh apa-apa.

text: to the outside , he is a faithful servant and a fierce protector of the organization , but inside he is full of doubt .
translation: Di luar, dia adalah hamba yang setia dan pelindung yang kuat bagi organisasi, namun di dalam dirinya dipenuhi dengan keraguan.

text: after finishing the open examination for form 5 students and applying for an adult identity card , yoyo , eighteen , departs for london to meet a guy introduced by her well-meaning parents in britain .

back_translation: After completing the open examination for Form 5 students and applying for an adult identification card, Yoyo, who is eighteen years old, flew to London to meet a man introduced to her by her parents in Britain.

text: what soured me on the santa clause 2 was that santa bumps up against 21st century reality so hard , it 's icky .
translation: Apa yang membuat saya tidak suka dengan "The Santa Clause 2" adalah apabila watak Santa berhadapan dengan realiti abad ke-21 dengan begitu kuat, ia agak menjijikkan.

text: 'the journey ' is the story of a young icelandic girl named kaja .

text: the only entertainment you 'll derive from this choppy and sloppy affair will be from unintentional giggles M-^V several of them .

text: although trying to balance self-referential humor and a normal ol ' slasher plot seemed like a decent endeavor , the result does n't fully satisfy either the die-hard jason fans or those who can take a good joke .
translation: Walaupun cuba untuk menyeimbangkan humor self-referential dan plot slasher yang biasa, nampaknya satu usaha yang baik, hasilnya tidak memuaskan peminat jason yang tegar atau mereka yang boleh menerima jenaka yang baik.
back_translation: Despite trying to balance self-referential humor and the usual slasher plot, it seems that the effort, while commendable, did not satisfy die-hard Jason fans or those who can appreciate good jokes.

text: an extraordinary swedish film about the soul adventure of marriage -- the kind of intimate and character-driven film that bille august does best .
translation: Filem Sweden yang luar biasa mengenai pengembaraan jiwa perkahwinan - filem yang intim dan berpusat kepada watak yang Bille August terbaik lakonkan.

text: they are soon off going from one strange adventure to another .

text: [ aniston is ] so good , she manages to overcome the occasional nuggets of preciousness and self-consciousness in the story .
