back_translation: Majandra Delfino plays the role of Iris, the sheriff's younger sister, and becomes the love interest of David, causing her to worry.

text: nothing is what it seems , and no one will be the same again , as the truth begins to surface in very dangerous circumstances .
translation: Tiada apa yang nampak seperti yang sepatutnya, dan tiada seorang pun akan kekal sama lagi, ketika kebenaran mula terbongkar dalam keadaan yang sangat berbahaya.
back_translation: Nothing is as it should be seen, and no one will remain the same again, when the truth starts to unravel in a very dangerous situation.

text: at the age of 34 , with no producing credits to his name , he landed a job as chief of production at paramount pictures .
translation: Pada usia 34 tahun, tanpa sebarang kredit pengeluaran pada namanya, beliau berjaya mendapatkan jawatan sebagai ketua pengeluaran di Paramount Pictures.
back_translation: At the age of 34, with no prior production credit in his name, he successfully landed a job as a production head at Paramount Pictures.

text: along the way he picks up a pastor who desires to learn the deeper things of god .
translation: Di sepanjang perjalanan, dia menjemput seorang pendeta yang ingin mempelajari perkara-perkara yang lebih mendalam mengenai Tuhan.
back_translation: Throughout the journey, he picked up a pastor who wanted to learn deeper things about God.

text: ramsay and morton fill this character study with poetic force and buoyant feeling .
translation: ramsay dan morton mengisi kajian watak ini dengan kekuatan puisi dan perasaan yang ceria.
back_translation: ramsay and morton filled this character study with the power of poetry and cheerful emotions.

text: she finds out that the truth about both her parents is very revealing , shocking at times , but comes to terms with her past .
translation: Dia mendapati bahawa kebenaran mengenai kedua ibu bapanya sangat mendedahkan, kadang-kadang menggegarkan, tetapi akhirnya menerima latar belakangnya.
back_translation: He found that the truth about both of his parents was very revealing, sometimes shocking, but ultimately accepted their background.

text: all the performances are top notch and , once you get through the accents , all or nothing becomes an emotional , though still positive , wrench of a sit .
translation: Semua persembahan adalah yang terbaik, dan setelah anda membiasakan diri dengan aksen-aksen tersebut, segalanya atau tidak apa-apa menjadi suatu pengalaman yang penuh emosi, meskipun tetap positif.
back_translation: All performances are the best, and once you get used to those accents, everything becomes an emotional experience, whether positive or not.

text: as an exercise in stripped-down filmmaking , interview is grimly effective .
translation: Sebagai latihan dalam pembikinan filem yang ringkas, temu bual ini berkesan dengan penuh keganasan.
back_translation: As an exercise in making short films, this interview is impactful with full intensity.

text: john klein ( richard gere ) , a washington newspaper reporter leaves his job after his wife ( debra messing ) dies to investigate strange reports , including psychic visions ( `` prophecies `` ) and sightings of winged creatures ( `` mothmen `` ) , in a small west virginia town , that may be the signs of an alien invasion of earth . . .
translation: John Klein (Richard Gere), seorang wartawan akhbar di Washington meninggalkan pekerjaannya selepas isterinya (Debra Messing) meninggal untuk menyiasat laporan aneh, termasuk penglihatan psikik ("nubuat") dan pencerapan makhluk bersayap ("Mothmen") di sebuah bandar kecil di Virginia Barat, yang mungkin adalah tanda-tanda serangan makhluk asing ke bumi...
back_translation: John Klein (Richard Gere), a newspaper journalist in Washington, leaves his job after his wife (Debra Messing) dies to investigate strange reports, including psychic visions ("prophecies") and sightings of winged creatures ("Mothmen") in a small town in West Virginia, which may be signs of an alien attack on Earth...

text: fame hungry roxie hart dreams of a life on the vaudville stage , and spends her nights jazzing it up in the bright lights of chicago , continually hoping that she 'll find her lucky break , and be shot into 1920 's stardom , so able to flee her boring husband amos .
translation: Roxie Hart yang tamak akan kemasyhuran bermimpi untuk menjalani kehidupan di pentas vaudville, dan menghabiskan malamnya mengasyikkan diri di dalam cahaya terang Chicago, sentiasa berharap bahawa dia akan menemui peruntungannya, dan dilemparkan ke dalam kemasyhuran tahun 1920, supaya dapat melarikan diri dari suaminya yang membosankan, Amos.
back_translation: The greedy Roxie Hart dreamt of living a life on the vaudeville stage, spending her nights indulging in the bright lights of Chicago, always hoping to find her fortune and be thrust into 1920s stardom, in order to escape her boring husband, Amos.

text: the principals in this cast are all fine , but bishop and stevenson are standouts .
translation: Ketua-ketua dalam barisan ini semuanya bagus, tetapi bishop dan stevenson adalah yang paling menonjol.
back_translation: The leaders in this lineup are all good, but bishop and stevenson are the most prominent.

text: immediately , john q . rushes michael to the hospital 's emergency room for a transplant .
translation: Segera, John Q. membawa Michael ke bilik kecemasan hospital untuk pembedahan transplant.
back_translation: Immediately, John Q. brought Michael to the hospital's emergency room for a transplant surgery.

text: but even greater dangers lie ahead when jim discovers that his trusted friend silver is actually a scheming pirate with mutiny on his mind .
translation: Tetapi bahaya yang lebih besar menanti apabila Jim mengetahui bahawa rakan baiknya, Silver sebenarnya adalah seorang lanun yang licik dengan hasrat menghasut pemberontakan.
back_translation: But a greater danger awaits when Jim finds out that his good friend, Silver, is actually a cunning pirate with intentions to incite rebellion.

text: ' . . . a great , participatory spectator sport . '
translation: '... satu sukan penonton yang hebat dan berpartisipasi.'
back_translation: "... a great and participative spectator sport."

text: now grown up , caitlin ( emma caulfield ) calls kyle ( chaney kley ) because her little brother michael ( lee cormie ) is going through the same things he did as a boy , and wants his help .
translation: Sekarang sudah dewasa, Caitlin (Emma Caulfield) menelefon Kyle (Chaney Kley) kerana adik lelakinya, Michael (Lee Cormie) sedang mengalami perkara yang sama seperti yang dialami oleh Kyle semasa kecil, dan mahu mendapatkan bantuan daripadanya.
back_translation: Now an adult, Caitlin (Emma Caulfield) calls Kyle (Chaney Kley) because her little brother, Michael (Lee Cormie), is experiencing the same thing Kyle went through as a child, and she seeks his help.

text: behan himself knew how to spin a tale and one ca n't help but think he 'd appreciate this attempt to turn his life into art .
translation: Behan sendiri tahu bagaimana untuk menceritakan sebuah kisah dan seseorang tidak dapat tidak berfikir bahawa beliau akan menghargai cubaan ini untuk mengubah hidupnya menjadi seni.
back_translation: Siblings themselves know how to tell a story and one cannot help but think that she would appreciate this attempt to turn her life into art.

text: unfortunately the third seems out of reach - the beautiful , seductive anne elise .
translation: Sayangnya yang ketiga nampaknya jauh dari jangkauan - Anne Elise yang cantik dan memikat.
back_translation: Unfortunately, the third one seems to be out of reach - the beautiful and captivating Anne Elise.

text: frank 's newest transport seems no different from the countless ones he 's done in the past .
translation: Pengangkutan terbaru Frank nampaknya tidak berbeza dengan yang tak terhitung jumlahnya yang pernah dilakukannya di masa lalu.
back_translation: Frank's latest transportation seems to be no different from the countless ones he has done in the past.

text: a surreal fairy tale that coils in on itself like a slow-motion whirlpool and achieves an atmosphere of sublime creepiness without ever precisely making sense .
translation: sebuah dongeng ajaib yang melilit pada dirinya sendiri seperti pusaran gerakan lambat dan mencapai suasana mencekam yang agung tanpa pernah membuat jelas.
back_translation: A magical tale that coils around itself like a slow whirlpool, reaching a grand and eerie atmosphere without ever becoming clear.

text: a raw comedy that is intermittently hilarious as it attacks pretty much every taboo around .
translation: Sebuah komedi kasar yang kadang-kala lucu sambil menyerang hampir setiap tabu.
back_translation: A crude comedy that is sometimes funny while attacking almost every taboo.

text: the californian desert , somewhere between death valley and los angeles .
translation: gurun California, di suatu tempat di antara Lembah Kematian dan Los Angeles.
back_translation: California desert, somewhere between Death Valley and Los Angeles.

text: a living testament to the power of the eccentric and the strange . the fact that it is n't very good is almost beside the point .
translation: suatu saksi hidup kepada kuasa yang aneh dan aneh. Hakikatnya bahawa ia tidak begitu baik hampir tidak menjadi masalah.
back_translation: A living witness to strange and peculiar power. The fact that it's not so good hardly seems to matter.

text: a dark , dull thriller with a parting shot that misfires .
translation: Filem seram yang gelap dan membosankan dengan tembakan perpisahan yang gagal.
back_translation: A dark and boring horror movie with a failed farewell shot.

text: oscar james takes ryan on a rollercoaster ride of mayhem and madness , but everything has a price and oscar wo n't let ryan easily escape this carnage-strewn nightmare 'til the final showdown when he reveals his real purpose .
translation: Oscar James membawa Ryan dalam pemandangan rollercoaster kekacauan dan kegilaan, tetapi segala sesuatu memiliki harganya dan Oscar tidak akan membiarkan Ryan lepas begitu sahaja dari mimpi buruk yang penuh keganasan ini sehingga perlawanan terakhir apabila dia mendedahkan tujuannya yang sebenar.
back_translation: Oscar James takes Ryan on a rollercoaster ride of chaos and madness, but everything has its price, and Oscar will not let Ryan escape so easily from this violent nightmare until the final showdown when he reveals his true motives.

text: [ soderbergh ] tends to place most of the psychological and philosophical material in italics rather than trust an audience 's intelligence , and he creates an overall sense of brusqueness .
translation: Soderbergh cenderung meletakkan sebahagian besar bahan psikologi dan falsafah dalam italik daripada mempercayai kecerdasan penonton, dan beliau mencipta rasa kasar secara keseluruhan.
back_translation: Soderbergh tends to place most of the psychological and philosophical material in italics rather than trusting the audience's intelligence, creating a rough overall feel.

text: after narrow escapes from the germans and a stray mine in the channel , the two men are picked up at sea and interrogated as spies .
translation: Selepas mengelak daripada ke German dan ranjau yang tersasar di selat, kedua-dua lelaki itu diselamatkan di laut dan diinterogasikan sebagai pengintip.
back_translation: After dodging German patrols and straying mines in the strait, the two men were rescued at sea and interrogated as spies.

text: alex enlists the aid of his old comrade father thomas ( addy ) and of a troubled artist ( sossamon ) upon whom he once performed an exorcism .
translation: Alex meminta bantuan dari rakan lamanya, bapa Thomas (Addy), dan seorang seniman yang bermasalah (Sossamon) yang pernah dia lakukan eksorsisme.
back_translation: Alex seeks help from his old friend, Father Thomas (Addy), and a troubled artist (Sossamon) whom he had performed an exorcism on before.

text: [ screenwriter ] pimental took the farrelly brothers comedy and feminized it , but it is a rather poor imitation .
translation: Pimental mengambil komedi Farrelly Brothers dan memfemininkannya, tetapi ia adalah tiruan yang agak lemah.
back_translation: Pimental takes the Farrelly Brothers' comedy and feminizes it, but it's a rather weak imitation.

text: no doubt the star and everyone else involved had their hearts in the right place . where their heads were is anyone 's guess .
translation: Tiada keraguan bahawa bintang dan semua yang terlibat mempunyai niat yang betul. Di mana kepala mereka berada, hanya Tuhan yang tahu.
back_translation: There is no doubt that the stars and all involved have the right intentions. Where their minds are, only God knows.

text: rife with the rueful , wry humor springing out of yiddish culture and language .
translation: penuh dengan humor yiddish yang penuh penyesalan dan sindiran.
back_translation: Full of Yiddish humor filled with regret and sarcasm.

text: the story and characters are nowhere near gripping enough .
translation: Cerita dan wataknya jauh dari cukup merentap.
back_translation: The story and characters are far from compelling enough.

text: the more dreams max has , the closer the fbi are in tracking down the kidnapper , but also as the case continues max discoveres the lies , corruption , and deceit of the government .
translation: Semakin banyak impian yang dimiliki Max, semakin dekat FBI menjejaki penculik, tetapi seiring kes berlanjut, Max menemui kebohongan, rasuah, dan penipuan kerajaan.
back_translation: The more dreams Max has, the closer the FBI tracks the kidnapper, but as the case progresses, Max encounters lies, corruption, and government deception.

text: the film is predictable in the reassuring manner of a beautifully sung holiday carol .
translation: Filem itu boleh diramalkan dengan cara yang memastikan seperti nyanyian lagu perayaan yang indah.
back_translation: The film can be foreseen in a way that ensures predictability like a beautiful celebration song.

text: let 's issue a moratorium , effective immediately , on treacly films about inspirational prep-school professors and the children they so heartwarmingly motivate .
translation: Mari kita mengenakan moratorium, berkuat kuasa dengan serta-merta, terhadap filem-filem yang terlalu manis tentang profesor sekolah persediaan yang penuh inspirasi dan kanak-kanak yang mereka dorong dengan penuh kehangatan hati.
back_translation: Let us impose a moratorium, immediately effective, on overly sweet films about inspirational prep school teachers and the children they lovingly nurture.

text: 'blue crush ' swims away with the sleeper movie of the summer award .
translation: 'Blue Crush' mengatasi dengan filem tidur musim panas yang mendapat anugerah.
back_translation: 'Blue Crush' surpasses as an award-winning summer sleepover film.

text: if you love motown music , you 'll love this documentary .
translation: Jika anda suka muzik Motown, anda akan suka dokumentari ini.
back_translation: If you like Motown music, you will like this documentary.

text: this is a beautifully sensitive portrait of a unique school and , a very special teacher .
translation: Ini adalah potret yang sangat sensitif mengenai sebuah sekolah yang unik dan seorang guru yang sangat istimewa.
back_translation: This is a highly sensitive portrait of a unique school and a very special teacher.

text: while on a ski trip , one of them finds passion with a beautiful girl after a random accident on the icy slopes .
translation: Semasa dalam perjalanan ski, salah seorang dari mereka menemui keghairahan dengan seorang gadis cantik selepas satu kemalangan secara rawak di lereng berlecak.
back_translation: While on a skiing trip, one of them found excitement with a beautiful girl after a random accident on a slippery slope.

text: chris forces mitchell to deliver guns and drugs while he hangs out on a rooftop and freaks out all day .
translation: Chris memaksa Mitchell untuk menghantar senjata dan dadah sementara dia berada di atas bumbung dan bimbang sepanjang hari.
back_translation: Chris forced Mitchell to deliver weapons and drugs while he was on the rooftop and anxious all day.

text: evergon is an affectionate tragicomedy that follows francis evergon in his last days among the unemployed .
translation: Evergon adalah satu tragikomedi yang penuh kasih yang mengisahkan tentang Francis Evergon dalam hari-harinya terakhir di kalangan yang menganggur.
back_translation: Evergon is a tragicomedy full of love that tells the story of Francis Evergon in his final days among the unemployed.

text: john j . is a seasoned hit man sent on a job to argentina .
translation: John J. adalah seorang pembunuh berpengalaman yang dihantar untuk menjalankan tugas di Argentina.
back_translation: John J. is an experienced killer who was sent to carry out a mission in Argentina.

text: a thoroughly awful movie -- dumb , narratively chaotic , visually sloppy . . . a weird amalgam of 'the thing ' and a geriatric 'scream . '
translation: Filem yang sangat teruk - bodoh, berterabur secara naratif, dan kelihatan tidak kemas. Satu gabungan aneh antara 'the thing' dan 'scream' versi warga emas.
back_translation: A very bad movie - foolish, narratively messy, and appears unpolished. An odd combination of 'the thing' and 'scream' for senior citizens' version.

text: ensemble movies , like soap operas , depend on empathy . if there ai n't none , you have a problem .
translation: Filem ensemble, seperti opera sabun, bergantung pada rasa empati. Jika tiada, anda akan menghadapi masalah.
back_translation: Ensemble films, like soap operas, rely on empathy. Without it, you will face problems.

text: offers a persuasive look at a defeated but defiant nation in flux .
translation: menawarkan pandangan yang membujuk terhadap sebuah negara yang kalah tetapi tetap mempertahankan kedudukan.
back_translation: offers a persuasive view of a country that lost but still maintains its position.

text: katherine releases all her other clients in order to manage exclusively only her most promising talent .
translation: Katherine melepaskan semua pelanggannya yang lain untuk mengurus secara eksklusif hanya bakat yang paling menjanjikan.
back_translation: Katherine releases all her other clients to exclusively manage only the most promising talent.

text: by the end of their phenomenal run , this unheralded group of musicians had played on more number ones hits than the beach boys , the rolling stones , elvis and the beatles combined - which makes them the greatest hit machine in the history of popular music .
translation: Pada akhir zaman gemilang mereka, kumpulan pemuzik yang tidak begitu terkenal ini telah bermain dalam lebih banyak lagu hit nombor satu berbanding dengan Beach Boys, Rolling Stones, Elvis, dan Beatles digabungkan - yang menjadikan mereka jentera hit yang terhebat dalam sejarah muzik popular.
back_translation: In their heyday, this relatively unknown group of musicians has played on more number one hits than the Beach Boys, Rolling Stones, Elvis, and the Beatles combined - making them the greatest hit machine in popular music history.

text: coarse , cliched and clunky , this trifling romantic comedy in which opposites attract for no better reason than that the screenplay demands it squanders the charms of stars hugh grant and sandra bullock .
translation: Kasar, klise, dan kaku, komedi romantis yang remeh ini di mana lawan tarik menarik untuk tiada sebab yang lebih baik selain tuntutan skrip merosakkan daya tarik bintang-bintang Hugh Grant dan Sandra Bullock.
back_translation: Rough, cliché, and stiff, this slight romantic comedy where the lack of better reason to sparks the stars' charm is disrupted by the demands of the script.

text: he works as an illustrator at a news paper and his life is pretty okay .
translation: Dia bekerja sebagai seorang ilustrator di sebuah akhbar dan kehidupannya agak baik.
back_translation: He works as an illustrator at a newspaper and his life is quite good.

text: how good this film might be , depends if you believe that the shocking conclusion is too much of a plunge or not .
translation: Seberapa bagus filem ini mungkin bergantung kepada jika anda percaya bahawa kesimpulan yang mengejutkan itu terlalu mendalam atau tidak.
back_translation: How good this film is may depend on whether you believe that the shocking conclusion is too deep or not.

text: but with betts systematically eliminating anyone in his way , a further web of conspiracy unfolds and rachel and daniel are led to her old family doctor , robert barrum ( frank finlay ) .
translation: Tetapi dengan Betts secara sistematik menyingkirkan sesiapa sahaja yang menghalangnya, satu lagi web konspirasi terbongkar dan Rachel serta Daniel dibawa kepada doktor keluarga lamanya, Robert Barrum (Frank Finlay).
back_translation: But with Betts systematically eliminating anyone who stood in his way, another web of conspiracy unraveled and Rachel and Daniel were taken to their former family doctor, Robert Barrum (Frank Finlay).

text: there are moments it can be heart-rending in an honest and unaffected ( and gentle ) way .
translation: Terdapat saat-saat yang boleh menyayat hati dengan cara yang jujur dan tanpa dipengaruhi (dan lembut).
back_translation: There are moments that can be heart-wrenching in an honest and uninfluenced (and gentle) way.

text: lazy filmmaking , with the director taking a hands-off approach when he should have shaped the story to show us why it 's compelling .
translation: Pengarah membuat filem secara malas, dengan mengambil pendekatan tidak terlibat ketika sepatutnya dia membentuk cerita untuk menunjukkan kepada kita mengapa ia menarik.
back_translation: The director made the film lazily, taking an uninvolved approach when he should have crafted the story to show us why it is compelling.

text: no good deed , based on a short story entitled 'the house on turk street ' by dashiell hammett , is about a police detective ( jack ) who , while doing a friend a favor and searching for a runaway teenager on turk street , stumbles upon a bizarre band of criminals about to pull off a bank robbery .
translation: "Tiada amal yang baik", berdasarkan sebuah cerita pendek yang berjudul 'rumah di jalan turk' oleh dashiell hammett, merupakan kisah tentang seorang detektif polis (jack) yang, semasa membantu seorang kawan dan mencari seorang remaja yang melarikan diri di jalan turk, secara tidak sengaja menemui kumpulan penjenayah yang aneh yang sedang merancang untuk melakukan rompakan bank.
back_translation: "No good deed goes unpunished", based on a short story titled 'House on Turk Street' by Dashiell Hammett, is a tale about a police detective (Jack) who, while assisting a friend in searching for a runaway teenager on Turk Street, accidentally stumbles upon a strange group of criminals planning a bank heist.

text: meet the razor eaters : five motivated , pissed-off young men who 've launched an anarchistic crime spree against melbourne , capturing all their deeds on home video .
translation: Jumpa Razor Eaters: lima lelaki muda yang bermotivasi dan marah yang telah memulakan rentetan jenayah anarkis terhadap Melbourne, merakam semua perbuatan mereka dalam video rumah.
back_translation: Meet the Razor Eaters: five motivated and angry young men who have initiated a series of anarchic crimes against Melbourne, documenting all their actions in home videos.

text: but the day he does , he pulls one last detention duty with the toughest kids in the school .
translation: tetapi pada hari itu, beliau melakukan satu kewajipan denda terakhir dengan kanak-kanak paling sukar di sekolah.
back_translation: However, on that day, she carried out one final disciplinary task with the most difficult child at school.

text: soon she grows increasingly wary about the motives of every man with whom she has contact -- and about her own .
translation: Segera dia menjadi semakin waspada terhadap motif setiap lelaki yang dia berhubungan - dan terhadap dirinya sendiri.
back_translation: Soon, she became increasingly vigilant towards the motives of every man she interacts with - and towards herself.

text: this journey awakens in ben an erotic passion that dares to destroy his tidy world as he pursues an illicit love affair , not with the administrator 's daughter , but with his wife , dori .
translation: Perjalanan ini membangkitkan dalam Ben nafsu erotis yang berani menghancurkan dunianya yang teratur ketika dia mengejar hubungan cinta terlarang, bukan dengan anak perempuan administrator, tetapi dengan istrinya, Dori.
back_translation: This journey awakens in Ben a bold erotic desire that threatens to destroy his orderly world as he pursues a forbidden love affair, not with the administrator's daughter, but with his wife, Dori.

text: there 's a delightfully quirky movie to be made from curling , but brooms is n't it .
translation: Terdapat filem yang menarik yang boleh dibuat dari sukan gelung, tetapi penyapu bukanlah elemen utamanya.
back_translation: There is an interesting movie that can be made from the sport of curling, but the broom is not the main element.

text: 'grasp ' is a darkly humorous mystery peppered with some truly surreal visuals .
translation: 'grasp' adalah sebuah misteri yang gelap dengan sentuhan humor dan visual yang benar-benar surreal.
back_translation: 'Grasp' is a dark mystery with a touch of humor and truly surreal visuals.

text: but sometimes what we teach our children can be as deadly as not teaching them .
translation: Tetapi kadang-kadang apa yang kita ajarkan kepada anak-anak kita boleh menjadi sama berbahayanya seperti tidak mengajar mereka.
back_translation: But sometimes what we teach our children can be just as dangerous as not teaching them at all.

text: sayles . . . once again strands his superb performers in the same old story .
translation: Sayles . . . sekali lagi membiarkan pelakon hebatnya terperangkap dalam cerita yang sama.
back_translation: Sayles . . . once again let his great actors be trapped in the same story.

text: and in wicker park ( chicago 's answer to greenwich village ) , rachel is about to meet her cosmic match .
translation: dan di Wicker Park (versi Chicago untuk Greenwich Village), Rachel akan bertemu dengan pasangannya yang sejati.
back_translation: and in Wicker Park (Chicago's version of Greenwich Village), Rachel will meet her true partner.

text: this particular weekend strays from the usual when adam meets a girl at a party ( a simple incident which drives his best friend to the brink of a jealous rage ) .
translation: Pada hujung minggu yang tertentu ini, sesuatu yang berbeza berlaku apabila Adam bertemu dengan seorang gadis di sebuah parti (kejadian yang mudah ini memunculkan rasa cemburu terhadap kawannya yang terbaik).
back_translation: On a particular weekend, something different happened when Adam met a girl at a party (this simple event caused jealousy towards his best friend).

text: there he encounters dawn 's family who tie him down and put him on trail for the murder of the girl years before .
translation: Di situlah dia berjumpa dengan keluarga Dawn yang mengikatnya dan membawanya ke perbicaraan kerana pembunuhan gadis tersebut beberapa tahun sebelumnya.
back_translation: There he met the Dawn family who accused him and brought him to trial for the murder of the girl several years earlier.

text: on an out of control train holding hostages and high-tech bio-weapons agent kristoff ( van damme ) becomes a one man army to derail the terrorists and save the lives of everyone on board !
translation: Pada sebuah kereta tanpa kawalan yang memegang tebusan dan senjata biologi berteknologi tinggi, ejen Kristoff (Van Damme) menjadi tentera seorang diri untuk mengalihkan pengganas dan menyelamatkan nyawa semua penumpang di atas papan!
back_translation: On an unmanned train holding ransom and high-tech biological weapons, agent Kristoff (Van Damme) becomes a one-man army to divert the terrorists and save the lives of all passengers on board!

text: the movie has very little to offer besides unintentional laughs .
translation: Filem ini hampir tiada yang ditawarkan selain gelak ketawa tidak disengajakan.
back_translation: This movie offers almost nothing except unintentional laughter.

text: davis ' candid , archly funny and deeply authentic take on intimate relationships comes to fruition in her sophomore effort .
translation: Pendapat jujur, santai dan lucu Davis tentang hubungan intim menjadi nyata dalam usahanya yang kedua.
back_translation: Davis's honest, relaxed, and humorous take on intimate relationships shines through in his second effort.

text: a self-narrated , blatantly lop-sided , cocky , nonchalant , fascinating and juicily entertaining documentary .
translation: Sebuah dokumentari yang diceritakan sendiri, secara terang-terangan berat sebelah, sombong, acuh tak acuh, memikat dan menghibur dengan sangat mendalam.
back_translation: A self-narrated documentary, openly biased, arrogant, indifferent, captivating, and very deeply entertaining.

text: a heroic tale of persistence that is sure to win viewers ' hearts .
translation: sebuah kisah heroik tentang ketabahan yang pasti akan memenangkan hati para penonton.
back_translation: A heroic story of resilience that will surely win the hearts of the audience.

text: whe he misses a dose of prozium , a mind-altering drug that hinders emotion , preston , who has been trained to enforce the strict laws of the new regime , suddenly becomes the only person capable of overthrowing it .

text: an overly familiar scenario is made fresh by an intelligent screenplay and gripping performances in this low-budget , video-shot , debut indie effort .

text: living in a beach shack with three roommates including her rebellious younger sister , she is up before dawn every morning to conquer the waves and count the days until the pipe masters surf competition .

text: lacking gravitas , macdowell is a placeholder for grief , and ergo this sloppy drama is an empty vessel . leave these flowers unpicked -- they 're dead on the vine .
translation: Kurangnya kewibawaan, MacDowell hanyalah satu ganti rasa duka, dan oleh itu drama yang kurang teratur ini adalah sebuah bekas kosong. Biarkan bunga-bunga ini tidak dipetik - mereka mati di atas pokok.
back_translation: Lacking credibility, MacDowell is just a replacement for sorrow, and therefore this disorganized drama is an empty shell. Let these flowers not be picked - they die on the tree.

text: now that the tong and their drug cartel know who he is they will stop at nothing to kill robert to protect their own corrupt interests .

text: writer-director stephen gaghan has made the near-fatal mistake of being what the english call 'too clever by half . '

text: there is the mother and the father , who do n't seem to have a normal marriage anymore , there 's the daughter , lena , who has a disease and will soon leave the house for medical treatment in switzerland , and her husband harry , who has a mysterious past .

text: lawrence should stick to his day job . he 's a better actor than a standup comedian .

text: dildo diaries takes a lighthearted but 'probing ' approach to exploring the development of sections of the texas penal code and its effects on the adult sex toy industry .

text: slowly but surely devolves into a fascinating , cringe-inducing portrait of cultural solipsism , climaxing in an emotional meltdown that would n't look out of place in mid-period cassavetes .

text: the first shocking thing about sorority boys is that it 's actually watchable . even more baffling is that it 's funny .

text: undercover fbi agent and former marine frank castle ( jane ) is devastated when his wife and children are killed when they accidentally witness a mafia hit , and with nothing left to lose , decides to dedicate himself fully to the eradication of crime ( organized and otherwise ) from america , as an army , assassin , judge and jury all rolled up into one man ( and a whole lot of guns ) : the punisher .
translation: Ejen fbi bertopeng dan bekas marin frank castle (jane) hancur apabila isteri dan anak-anaknya dibunuh kerana menyaksikan secara tidak sengaja seorang pengganas mafia, dan tanpa apa-apa lagi yang tinggal, dia memutuskan untuk mengabdikan dirinya sepenuhnya kepada memusnahkan jenayah (teratur dan tidak teratur) dari Amerika, sebagai seorang tentera, pembunuh, hakim dan juri yang digabungkan dalam satu lelaki (dan banyak senjata): the punisher.
back_translation: The masked FBI agent and former marine Frank Castle (Jane) was destroyed when his wife and children were killed for inadvertently witnessing a mafia terrorist, and with nothing left, he decides to dedicate himself entirely to eradicating crime (organized and disorganized) in America, as a soldier, killer, judge, and jury combined in one man (and many weapons): the punisher.

text: it 's thoroughly entertaining and nonpatronizing , and occasionally even insightful .

text: the corrupt wizard saruman ( christopher lee ) , under the power of the dark lord sauron , and his slimy assistant , gr & # 237 ; ma wormtongue ( brad dourif ) , have created a grand uruk-hai army bent on the destruction of man and middle-earth .

text: delia , greta , and paula rank as three of the most multilayered and sympathetic female characters of the year . as each of them searches for their place in the world , miller digs into their very minds to find an unblinking , flawed humanity .
translation: Delia, Greta, dan Paula merangkumi tiga watak wanita yang paling kompleks dan simpatik dalam tahun ini. Sementara setiap dari mereka mencari tempat mereka dalam dunia, Miller menggali ke dalam minda mereka untuk mencari manusia yang jujur dan tidak sempurna.
back_translation: Delia, Greta, and Paula embody the three most complex and sympathetic female characters this year. While each of them searches for their place in the world, Miller delves into their minds to find honest and imperfect humans.

text: the orchestra player gets known to his neighbour , a gay man having also relationship troubles , and together they are trying hard to find a way how to go on with their lifes .

back_translation: The orchestra player is known by his neighbor, a gay man who is also facing relationship problems, and together they try to find a way to move forward in life.

text: roger swanson is a hopelessly cynical advertising copywriter with a razor-sharp wit who believes he has mastered the art of manipulating women .

text: if divine secrets of the ya-ya sisterhood suffers from a ploddingly melodramatic structure , it comes to life in the performances .

text: an overblown clunker full of bad jokes , howling cliches and by-the-numbers action sequences .
translation: Kereta usang yang dibesar-besarkan penuh dengan jenaka buruk, stereotaip menderu dan jujukan aksi yang diikut-ikut.

text: she meets ian miller , a high school english teacher , wasp , and dreamboat she had made a fool of herself over at the restaurant ; they date secretly for a while before her family finds out .

back_translation: She met Ian Miller, an English teacher at a high school, a Wasp, and a dream man who made her feel embarrassed in a restaurant; they dated secretly for a while before her family found out.

text: a very slow , uneventful ride around a pretty tattered old carousel .
translation: Suatu perjalanan yang sangat perlahan, tanpa peristiwa sekeliling sebuah kuda mainan tua yang cantik namun koyak.
back_translation: A very slow journey, devoid of any surrounding events, with a beautiful yet torn old toy horse.

text: his first challenge is from the chinese workers , technicians , and officers , who have been trained to work under the old system and unable to function sufficiently in the new era of international competition .

text: the film 's apocalyptic urban setting and unrelentingly icy zeitgeist is message enough without a triumphant parting shot
translation: Pengaturan bandar apokaliptik dan zeitgeist yang tidak kenal lelah adalah pesanan yang cukup tanpa kejayaan penembakan perpisahan
back_translation: The relentless urban setting of apocalyptic and zeitgeist themes is compelling enough without the success of farewell shots.

text: with the support of her best friend wilma watson and their draft-dodging companion will bacon , emily is able to stand by her convictions in a household dominated by the standards of a salt-of-the-earth father and an unconditionally loving mother .
translation: Dengan sokongan rakan baiknya Wilma Watson dan rakan sepejuangnya yang mengelak wajib tentera, Will Bacon, Emily dapat berpegang teguh pada keyakinannya dalam sebuah rumah tangga yang dikuasai oleh standard bapa yang tulus dan ibu yang mencintai tanpa syarat.
back_translation: With the support of her good friend Wilma Watson and her comrade-in-arms who dodged the military draft, Will Bacon, Emily was able to hold fast to her beliefs in a household dominated by a sincere father figure and an unconditionally loving mother.

text: well as a hero in the guise of prince charmont , whom ella falls in love with .
translation: sebagai seorang hero berpura-pura sebagai Putera Charmont, yang mana Ella jatuh cinta padanya.

text: after spending a year in a mental instituton , molly peters finally returns home to her mother .

text: content merely to lionize its title character and exploit his anger - all for easy sanctimony , formulaic thrills and a ham-fisted sermon on the need for national health insurance .

text: undercover brother does n't go far enough . it 's just a silly black genre spoof .
translation: Undercover Brother tidak cukup jauh. Ini hanyalah satu spoof genre hitam yang bodoh.

text: the footage of the rappers at play and the prison interview with suge knight are just two of the elements that will grab you .

text: takes one character we do n't like and another we do n't believe , and puts them into a battle of wills that is impossible to care about and is n't very funny .
translation: Mengambil satu watak yang kita tidak suka dan yang lain yang kita tidak percayai, dan meletakkan mereka dalam pertempuran kehendak yang mustahil untuk dihiraukan dan tidak lucu.

text: an entertaining , grimy view of the traps of machismo tucked inside a cop thriller .
translation: pandangan yang menghiburkan, kotor tentang perangkap machismo yang tersembunyi di dalam sebuah cerita seram polis.

text: the subject of swinging still seems ripe for a documentary -- just not this one .

text: how does it play a significant role in japanese culture , and why does it fascinate american youth ?

text: even the hastily and amateurishly drawn animation can not engage .

text: on balance , i recommend the movie both for nicholson 's performance and for the opportunity to spend some time with the kind of man that we often meet in real life , but rarely see on screen .
translation: Secara keseluruhan, saya mengesyorkan filem ini kerana persembahan Nicholson dan peluang untuk menghabiskan masa dengan jenis lelaki yang sering kita jumpai dalam kehidupan nyata, tetapi jarang kita lihat di atas skrin.
back_translation: Overall, I recommend this movie because of Nicholson's performance and the opportunity to spend time with the kind of man we often encounter in real life but rarely see on screen.

text: but for the shell-shocked crew , trapped together in the sub 's narrow corridors and constricted spaces , this is about to become a journey into the sensory delusions , mental deceptions and runaway fear that lurk just below the surface of the ocean and deep inside the human psyche .
translation: Bagi kru yang terkejut dan terperangkap bersama di lorong-lorong dan ruang yang sempit dalam kapal selam, ini akan menjadi perjalanan ke dalam ilusi sensori, tipuan mental, dan ketakutan yang melarikan diri yang tersembunyi tepat di bawah permukaan lautan dan di dalam jiwa manusia.
back_translation: For the shocked and trapped crew members in the narrow corridors and tight spaces of the submarine, this will be a journey into sensory illusions, mental deceptions, and hidden escape fears right beneath the ocean's surface and within the human soul.

text: through time travel wells and twain team up with sir arthur conan doyle and a young jules verne and wind up in the year 2001 seeing results of their writings that help in their attempts to find dr . noah and save the world from destruction .
translation: Melalui perjalanan masa, Wells dan Twain berpasukan dengan Sir Arthur Conan Doyle dan seorang Jules Verne yang muda dan berakhir di tahun 2001, melihat hasil tulisan mereka yang membantu dalam usaha mereka untuk mencari Dr. Noah dan menyelamatkan dunia dari kehancuran.
back_translation: Throughout the journey of time, Wells and Twain teamed up with Sir Arthur Conan Doyle and a young Jules Verne, ending up in the year 2001, witnessing the outcomes of their writings that aided in their efforts to search for Dr. Noah and save the world from destruction.

text: arrested and imprisoned in a juvenile detention facility , leland comes in contact with an aspiring writer and prison teacher , pearl madison ( cheadle ) .

text: ranks with such films as in the bedroom , ordinary people , and terms of endearment in the sensitivity with which it observes the effect a child 's death on the remaining members of the family .

text: gooding is the energetic frontman , and it 's hard to resist his enthusiasm , even if the filmmakers come up with nothing original in the way of slapstick sequences .

text: he becomes the man he always should have ( and could have ) been .

text: unlike most teen flicks , swimming takes its time to tell its story , casts mostly little-known performers in key roles , and introduces some intriguing ambiguity .

text: can be classified as one of those 'alternate reality ' movies . . . except that it would have worked so much better dealing in only one reality .

text: it 's all about love is the story of two lovers and their attempts to save their relationship in a near-future world on the brink of cosmic collapse .
translation: Ini adalah kisah dua kekasih dan usaha mereka untuk menyelamatkan hubungan mereka dalam dunia masa depan yang hampir roboh akibat keruntuhan kosmik.

text: as it spreads among the friends , their true feelings and personalities emerge as they struggle to survive the virus and each other .
translation: Apabila virus tersebar di kalangan rakan-rakan, perasaan dan personaliti sebenar mereka muncul ketika mereka berjuang untuk bertahan hidup daripada virus dan antara satu sama lain.

text: like a tarantino movie with heart , alias betty is richly detailed , deftly executed and utterly absorbing .
translation: Seperti filem Tarantino yang penuh dengan emosi, "Alias Betty" adalah kaya dengan perincian, dilaksanakan dengan mahir dan benar-benar mendalam.
back_translation: Like a Tarantino film full of emotions, "Alias Betty" is rich in detail, executed skillfully and truly profound.

text: self-congratulatory , misguided , and ill-informed , if nonetheless compulsively watchable .
translation: Tersendiri, tertipu, dan tidak berpengetahuan, tetapi tetap boleh ditonton dengan ketagihan.

text: the members manage to pronounce kok exactly as you think they might , thus giving the cast ample opportunity to use that term as often as possible . it 's very beavis and butthead , yet always seems to elicit a chuckle .
translation: Ahli-ahli berjaya melafazkan "kok" dengan betul seperti yang anda fikir, memberi peluang yang mencukupi kepada pelakon untuk menggunakan istilah tersebut sebanyak mungkin. Ia sangat seperti Beavis and Butthead, namun sentiasa mengundang ketawa.

text: it 's steps , a film that draws its inspiration from the marx brother to monty python and it was done on such a shoe-string budget , it would make a studio executive blush .
translation: "Langkah-Langkahnya, sebuah filem yang mengambil inspirasi daripada Marx Brothers hingga Monty Python dan dilakukan dengan bajet yang sangat terhad, sehingga membuat eksekutif studio memerah."
back_translation: "The Steps, a film inspired by Marx Brothers to Monty Python and made on a very tight budget, causing studio executives to sweat."

text: bruce is a down on his luck tv news reporter .
translation: Bruce adalah seorang wartawan berita televisyen yang sedang malang.

text: ultimately , the message of trouble every day seems to be that all sexual desire disrupts life 's stasis .

text: academy award nominee diane lane stars as frances mayes , a 35-year-old san francisco writer whose perfect life has just taken an unexpected detour .
translation: Calon Anugerah Akademi, Diane Lane, memegang watak Frances Mayes, seorang penulis berusia 35 tahun dari San Francisco yang kehidupan sempurnanya tiba-tiba mengambil pusingan yang tidak dijangkakan.
back_translation: Academy Award nominee, Diane Lane, portrays the character of Frances Mayes, a 35-year-old writer from San Francisco whose perfect life suddenly takes an unexpected turn.

text: the film 's strength is n't in its details , but in the larger picture it paints - of a culture in conflict with itself , with the thin veneer of nationalism that covers our deepest , media-soaked fears .
translation: Kekuatan filem ini bukan terletak pada butir-butirnya, tetapi pada gambaran besar yang dilukisnya - tentang budaya yang berkonflik dengan dirinya sendiri, dengan lapisan nipis nasionalisme yang menutupi ketakutan terdalam yang direndam media.
back_translation: The strength of this film does not lie in its details, but in the overarching portrayal it paints - about a culture conflicted within itself, with a thin layer of nationalism covering the deepest fears submerged by the media.

text: although their characters and temperaments could n't be less alike , 19-year olds wei and jie are best friends .
translation: Walaupun personaliti dan sifat mereka sangat berbeza, Wei dan Jie yang berusia 19 tahun adalah sahabat baik.
back_translation: Despite their very different personalities and traits, Wei and Jie, both aged 19, are close friends.

text: confessions is without a doubt a memorable directorial debut from king hunk .
translation: Confessions adalah satu pengarah yang memori dari king hunk tanpa keraguan.

text: it 's like rocky and bullwinkle on speed , but that 's neither completely enlightening , nor does it catch the intensity of the movie 's strangeness .

back_translation: It's like Rocky and Bullwinkle in speed, but it doesn't completely provide insight or capture the intensity of the film's strangeness.

text: so earnest and well-meaning , and so stocked with talent , that you almost forget the sheer , ponderous awfulness of its script .
translation: Begitu bersungguh-sungguh dan baik hati, serta dipenuhi dengan bakat, sehingga anda hampir lupa dengan betapa buruknya skripnya yang sungguh berat dan membosankan.

text: it is late at night in a foreign land .
translation: Saat malam larut di tanah asing.

text: when joe , a us navy seal , and katsuragi , a japanese detective , join forces to stop the circulation of blood heat , they are taken to an underground martial arts tournament in the muscle dome held by the yakuza and triads , where the fighters are blood heat users .
translation: Apabila Joe, seorang anggota US Navy SEAL, dan Katsuragi, seorang detektif Jepun, bergabung untuk menghentikan penyebaran darah panas, mereka dibawa ke sebuah kejohanan seni bela diri bawah tanah di Dome Otot yang diadakan oleh geng Yakuza dan Triad, di mana para pejuang adalah pengguna darah panas.

text: a sloppy , amusing comedy that proceeds from a stunningly unoriginal premise .
translation: sebuah komedi yang ceroboh, menghiburkan yang berasal dari premis yang sangat tidak original.
back_translation: A sloppy comedy, entertaining, originating from a very unoriginal premise.

text: instead of trying to bust some blondes , [ diggs ] should be probing why a guy with his talent ended up in a movie this bad .

text: a wonderful , low-key coming-of-age saga with none of that after-school special hysteria .
translation: saga membangkitkan semangat merantau yang menakjubkan dengan tiada kehebohan khas program selepas sekolah.

text: mostly , [ goldbacher ] just lets her complicated characters be unruly , confusing and , through it all , human .
translation: Kebanyakan, [goldbacher] hanya membiarkan watak-wataknya yang rumit menjadi liar, membingungkan dan, melalui segalanya, manusiawi.

text: she befriends with one of the regulars , the well known las vegas-playboy jack hiller ( eddie albert sr . ) .
translation: Dia bersahabat dengan salah seorang daripada pelanggan tetap, playboy terkenal Las Vegas Jack Hiller (Eddie Albert Sr.).

text: when a dozen graves are desecrated in rural texas , five young people in their 20 's investigate , eventually ending up being chased by a family of cannibals , led by a towering and insane brute , dressed in human skins , called leatherface .
translation: Apabila sebelas kubur di kawasan pedalaman Texas dirosakkan, lima orang muda dalam lingkungan usia 20-an menyiasat, akhirnya berakhir dikejar oleh sebuah keluarga kanibal yang dipimpin oleh seorang yang gila dan tegap, berpakaian dengan kulit manusia, yang dipanggil Leatherface.

text: whaley 's performance is earnest and often riveting , but he should have taken a few lessons from his peers at amateur night .

translation: Terdapat perbezaan antara filem-filem yang berani melampaui batas dan filem-filem yang tidak mengambil peduli untuk menjadi bodoh.

text: while not quite `` shrek `` or monsters , inc . `` , it 's not too bad . it 's worth taking the kids to .

text: his strengths are fish frying and stamp collecting , and he thinks magnum 45s are a type of ice cream .

text: eventually , he builds a successful career as a us attorney .

translation: Semua elemen berada di tempat untuk filem noir yang hebat, tetapi pendekatan pengarah George Hickenlooper terhadap bahan itu terlalu positif.

text: adaptation is probably the ultimate writers ' film , but it 's also a brash , daring , and dynamic film -- as delicate as an orchid but as durable and malleable as the species .
translation: Adaptasi mungkin merupakan filem penulis yang utama, tetapi juga sebagai filem yang berani, berani, dan dinamik - sehalus orkid tetapi sekuat dan boleh dibentuk seperti spesies.
back_translation: Adaptation may be the writer's primary film, but it's also a bold, daring, and dynamic film - as delicate as an orchid but as strong and malleable as a species.

text: jordan is a mom & # 38 ; an activist who is on a life long search for true faith as she tries to protect her only child from what she believes is injustice .
translation: Jordan adalah seorang ibu dan aktivis yang sedang dalam pencarian sepanjang hidup untuk keyakinan sejati sambil cuba melindungi anak tunggalnya daripada apa yang beliau percaya sebagai ketidakadilan.

text: barbara novak ( renee zellweger ) has just come down from maine to new york after writing a book called down with love .
translation: Barbara Novak (Renee Zellweger) baru saja turun dari Maine ke New York selepas menulis buku yang dipanggil Down with Love.

text: griffin & co . manage to be spectacularly outrageous .
translation: griffin & co. berjaya menjadi luar biasa yang mencolok.

text: it 's sobering , particularly if anyone still thinks this conflict can be resolved easily , or soon .

text: an incoherent jumble of a film that 's rarely as entertaining as it could have been .
translation: Filem yang tidak teratur dan sukar difahami yang jarang menghibur seperti sepatutnya.

text: paramount to her world is gene , a wealthy disturbed businessman who has slowly become her benefactor over the years .

text: without blowing the jokes we can say that , if you have found that your sense of humor fit well with christopher guest 's screen outings , you 'll find yourself in the flow with shearer as well .
translation: Tanpa mendedahkan jenaka, kita boleh katakan bahawa jika anda dapati sense of humor anda selari dengan penglibatan Christopher Guest di layar, anda juga akan selesa dengan gaya Shearer.
back_translation: Without revealing jokes, we can say that if you find your sense of humor aligning with Christopher Guest's involvement on screen, you'll also be comfortable with Shearer's style.

text: a gracious , eloquent film that by its end offers a ray of hope to the refugees able to look ahead and resist living in a past forever lost .
translation: Filem yang anggun dan berwibawa yang pada akhirnya memberikan sinar harapan kepada pelarian yang mampu melihat ke depan dan menolak untuk terus hidup dalam masa lalu yang telah hilang selamanya.
back_translation: An elegant and dignified film that ultimately offers a ray of hope to refugees who are capable of looking forward and rejecting the idea of continuing to live in a past that is lost forever.

text: highlights include detailed instructions on how to perform an icepick lobotomy with household utensils ; a cacophony of robotic voices ; and haunting stills that date back to the turn of the twentieth century .
translation: Sorotan termasuk arahan terperinci tentang bagaimana melakukan lobotomi icepick dengan peralatan dapur; suara robotik yang kacau; dan gambar diam yang menghantui yang datang dari penghujung abad kedua puluh.
back_translation: Highlights include detailed instructions on how to perform an icepick lobotomy with kitchen utensils; erratic robotic voice; and haunting still images that come from the end of the twentieth century.

text: 19-year old free spirit daphne reynolds ( amanda bynes ) , raised by her equally free-spirited mother , goes to england to meet her father , who turns out to be a wealthy aristocrat ( colin firth ) .
translation: Daphne Reynolds, seorang jiwa bebas berusia 19 tahun (diperankan oleh Amanda Bynes), yang dibesarkan oleh ibunya yang juga bebas, pergi ke England untuk bertemu ayahnya, yang ternyata adalah seorang bangsawan kaya (diperankan oleh Colin Firth).
back_translation: Daphne Reynolds, a 19-year-old free spirit (played by Amanda Bynes), raised by her also free-spirited mother, goes to England to meet her father, who turns out to be a wealthy nobleman (played by Colin Firth).

text: ted ca n't turn the ladies heads like he used to - none of the scams work .
translation: Ted tidak lagi dapat menarik perhatian wanita seperti dahulu - tidak ada penipuan yang berkesan.
back_translation: Ted can no longer attract women's attention like before - no successful tricks.

translation: Dia terpikat pada gadis pirang muda yang seksi, Billy, yang dia jumpai semasa pesta seks yang lain malam itu.

text: a thoroughly unoriginal , but fast-paced and entertaining genre b-flick
translation: Sebuah filem genre B yang sangat tak orisinal, tetapi cepat dan menghiburkan.

text: there are some movies that hit you from the first scene and you know it 's going to be a trip . igby goes down is one of those movies .

text: the results of the gene therapy are passed on to his son bruce .

text: only one person can eventually solve the crisis : stefan balsiger himself .
translation: Hanya satu orang yang akhirnya dapat menyelesaikan krisis tersebut: Stefan Balsiger sendiri.

text: in a place soon to be known as the valley of death , in a small clearing called landing zone x-ray , lt . colonel hal moore ( mel gibson ) and 400 young fathers , husbands , brothers , and sons , all troopers from an elite american combat division , were surrounded by 2 , 000 north vietnamese soldiers .
translation: Di satu tempat yang akan dikenali sebagai lembah kematian, di sebuah tempat terbuka kecil yang dipanggil kawasan mendarat X-Ray, Leftenan Kolonel Hal Moore (Mel Gibson) dan 400 bapa muda, suami, abang, dan anak, kesemua pasukan dari sebuah bahagian pertempuran elit Amerika, dikelilingi oleh 2,000 tentera Vietnam Utara.
back_translation: In a place soon to be known as the Valley of Death, in a small clearing called Landing Zone X-Ray, Lieutenant Colonel Hal Moore (Mel Gibson) and 400 young fathers, husbands, brothers, and sons, all troopers from an elite American combat division, were surrounded by 2,000 North Vietnamese soldiers.

text: while peterson and her ageless alter ego keep an ironic detachment from the melodramatics , there 's no irony in the end-title dedication to price -- it obviously comes straight from the heart .
translation: Sementara Peterson dan alter ego yang tidak menua terus mempertahankan sikap jauh ironis dari kesan melodrama, tidak ada ironi dalam dedikasi judul akhir kepada Price - jelas terpancar dari hati.
back_translation: While Peterson and his ageless alter ego continue to maintain a distant and ironic attitude towards melodrama, there is no irony in the final dedication to Price - clearly emanating from the heart.

text: moments of compassion and kindness circulate within a mounting concern for individual survival .
translation: Momen kebaikan dan belas kasihan beredar di sekitar kekhawatiran yang meningkat terhadap kelangsungan hidup individu.
