text: likeable thanks to its cast , its cuisine and its quirky tunes .
translation: Menarik kerana pelakonnya, masakannya dan lagu-lagu uniknya.
back_translation: Interesting because of its actors, cuisine, and unique songs.

text: but paul 's dream job turns into a nightmare of sex for hire , drugs and violence .
translation: Tetapi pekerjaan impian Paul berubah menjadi mimpi ngeri yang melibatkan seks untuk disewa, dadah, dan keganasan.
back_translation: But Paul's dream job turned into a nightmare involving sex for hire, drugs, and violence.

text: instead of a hyperbolic beat-charged urban western , it 's an unpretentious , sociologically pointed slice of life .
translation: Daripada sebuah kisah barat bandar yang diisi dengan hiperbolik, ini adalah sekeping kehidupan yang tidak berlagak dan memberi petunjuk secara sosiologis.
back_translation: From a Western urban fable filled with hyperbole, this is a slice of life that is unassuming and provides sociological insights.

text: clayton is then given a special assignment , to root out a suspected mole that has infiltrated the agency .
translation: Clayton kemudian diberikan tugas istimewa, untuk mencari dan menyingkirkan tikus yang disyaki telah meresap ke dalam agensi.
back_translation: Clayton was then given a special task, to find and eliminate suspected rats that had infiltrated the agency.

text: it is fascinating to see how much work and preparation goes into stand-up comedy .
translation: Sungguh menarik melihat seberapa banyak kerja dan persediaan yang diperlukan untuk komedi berdiri.
back_translation: It is fascinating to see how much work and preparation is required for stand-up comedy.

text: how does one ask his wife to try something that breaks so many taboos ?
translation: Bagaimana seseorang meminta isterinya untuk mencuba sesuatu yang melanggar begitu banyak tabu?
back_translation: How can someone ask their wife to try something that violates so many taboos?

text: this comedy , based on steve martin 's successful stage play concerns a fictional meeting between a young pablo picasso and a young albert einstein at a paris cafe at the turn of the 20th century .
translation: Komedi ini, berdasarkan pada lakon panggung yang berjaya oleh Steve Martin, mengisahkan pertemuan khayalan antara seorang Pablo Picasso muda dan seorang Albert Einstein muda di sebuah kafe di Paris pada pertengahan abad ke-20.
back_translation: This comedy, based on a successful stage play by Steve Martin, tells the imaginary meeting between a young Pablo Picasso and a young Albert Einstein at a cafe in Paris in the mid-20th century.

text: it 's like going to a house party and watching the host defend himself against a frothing ex-girlfriend . you do n't want to call the cops . you want to call domino 's .
translation: Ia seperti pergi ke majlis rumah dan menyaksikan hos mempertahankan dirinya daripada bekas kekasih yang marah. Anda tidak mahu memanggil polis. Anda mahu panggil domino's.
back_translation: It's like going to a house party and watching the host defending themselves from an angry ex. You don't want to call the police. You want to call Domino's.

text: beautifully crafted and brutally honest , promises offers an unexpected window into the complexities of the middle east struggle and into the humanity of its people .
translation: Dicipta dengan indah dan jujur, janji menawarkan satu sudut pandang yang mengejutkan ke dalam kompleksiti perjuangan Timur Tengah dan ke dalam kemanusiaan penduduknya.
back_translation: Created beautifully and honestly, Janji offers a surprising perspective into the complexity of the struggles in the Middle East and the humanity of its people.

text: like the best 60 minutes exposM-i , the film ( at 80 minutes ) is actually quite entertaining .
translation: Seperti dalam ekspos 60 minit yang terbaik, filem (berdurasi 80 minit) sebenarnya sangat menghiburkan.
back_translation: Like in the best 60-minute exposition, the movie (which runs for 80 minutes) is actually very entertaining.

text: a culture clash comedy only half as clever as it thinks it is .
translation: Komedi bentrok budaya hanya separuh sebijak yang dipikirkan.
back_translation: Comedy clashes of cultures are only half as wise as perceived.

text: however after his son is witness to a killing he has done mike sullivan finds him self on the run trying to save the life of his son and at the same time looking for revenge on those who wronged him .
translation: Bagaimanapun, selepas anak lelakinya menjadi saksi kepada pembunuhan yang dilakukannya, Mike Sullivan mendapati dirinya dalam pelarian cuba menyelamatkan nyawa anak lelakinya dan pada masa yang sama mencari balas dendam kepada mereka yang menganiayanya.
back_translation: However, after his son witnessed a murder he committed, Mike Sullivan found himself on the run trying to save his son's life and at the same time seeking revenge against those who wronged him.

text: an unsentimental albeit heartfelt eulogy to the firefighters who paid the ultimate price while saving new yorkers .
translation: suatu ucapan tak beremosi namun tulus kepada pasukan bomba yang membayar harga mahal semasa menyelamatkan penduduk New York.
back_translation: an unemotional yet sincere tribute to the firefighters who paid a heavy price while saving the residents of New York.

text: improv comedy masters the upright citizens brigade star in this absurdist comedy about an evil chinese food company and their plan to turn little girls into `` saucy `` spare ribs .
translation: Masters komedi improvisasi, Upright Citizens Brigade, muncul dalam komedi absurd ini mengenai sebuah syarikat makanan Cina jahat dan rancangan mereka untuk mengubah kanak-kanak perempuan menjadi "spareribs" yang penuh dengan sos.
back_translation: The masters of improvisational comedy, Upright Citizens Brigade, appear in this absurd comedy about an evil Chinese food company and their plan to turn young girls into "spareribs" filled with sauce.

text: however , when a search sets in , the people of dogville demand a better deal in exchange for the risk of harbouring poor grace and she learns the hard way that in this town , goodness is relative .
translation: Walau bagaimanapun, apabila satu siasatan dimulakan, penduduk Dogville menuntut perjanjian yang lebih baik sebagai ganti risiko menampung Grace yang miskin dan dia belajar dengan cara yang sukar bahawa di bandar ini, kebaikan adalah relatif.
back_translation: However, when an investigation was initiated, the residents of Dogville demanded a better deal in exchange for the risk of supporting the poor Grace, and she learned the hard way that in this town, goodness is relative.

text: it treats us to beautiful insights and tragic struggles that swell the heart and make us feel genuine empathy for two people embracing the truth amidst a pack of lies .
translation: Ia memberi kita wawasan yang indah dan perjuangan tragis yang menggoncangkan hati serta membuat kita merasai simpati yang sebenar terhadap dua individu yang merangkul kebenaran di tengah-tengah sekumpulan dusta.
back_translation: It gives us a beautiful insight and a tragic struggle that shakes the heart and makes us feel genuine sympathy for two individuals who embrace the truth in the midst of a pack of lies.

text: rachel is torn by her aversion to harper and her duty as an agent .
translation: Rachel tercabar oleh rasa tidak suka terhadap Harper dan tugasnya sebagai ejen.
back_translation: Rachel is challenged by her dislike towards Harper and her duty as an agent.

text: three stories delicately intertwined by the beauty of sadness .
translation: tiga cerita yang terselit dengan indahnya kesedihan.
back_translation: three stories intertwined beautifully with sadness.

text: the best movie in many a moon about the passions that sometimes fuel our best achievements and other times leave us stranded with nothing more than our lesser appetites .
translation: Filem terbaik dalam banyak bulan tentang passion yang kadang-kadang memacu pencapaian terbaik kita dan kadang-kadang meninggalkan kita terdampar hanya dengan nafsu yang kurang.
back_translation: The best movie in many months about passion that sometimes drives us to our best achievements and sometimes leaves us stranded with only unfulfilled desires.

text: i stopped thinking about how good it all was , and started doing nothing but reacting to it - feeling a part of its grand locations , thinking urgently as the protagonists struggled , feeling at the mercy of its inventiveness , gasping at its visual delights .
translation: Saya berhenti memikirkan betapa baiknya semuanya, dan mulai tidak melakukan apa-apa selain bereaksi padanya - merasa bagian dari lokasi-lokasi megahnya, memikirkan dengan mendesak saat protagonis berjuang, merasa terpaut pada kejeniusannya, terpesona dengan keindahan visualnya.
back_translation: I stopped thinking about how good everything was, and started doing nothing but reacting to it - feeling part of its magnificent locations, urgently thinking as the protagonist struggles, feeling connected to its genius, fascinated by its visual beauty.

text: it ca n't be easy starting a movie in the middle , staying in the middle , and then ending it in the middle . . .
translation: Ia tidak mudah memulakan filem di pertengahan, kekal di pertengahan, dan kemudian mengakhiri di pertengahan...
back_translation: It is not easy to start a film in the middle, stay in the middle, and then end in the middle...

text: everything has taken a turn for the worse and kilo ca n't seem to stop it .
translation: Segalanya telah menjadi lebih teruk dan Kilo tidak dapat menghentikannya.
back_translation: Everything has gotten worse and Kilo can't stop it.

text: rebecca falls in love with lukas and soon feels more comfortable in the commune than she does at home .
translation: Rebecca jatuh cinta dengan Lukas dan segera merasa lebih selesa di komune daripada di rumah.
back_translation: Rebecca falls in love with Lukas and immediately feels more comfortable in the commune than at home.

text: one of the most important and exhilarating forms of animated filmmaking since old walt doodled steamboat willie .
translation: satu daripada bentuk filem animasi yang paling penting dan membangkitkan semangat sejak walt lama mewarna steamboat willie.
back_translation: One of the most important and inspiring forms of animation films since Walt painted Steamboat Willie.

text: the day takes some twists and turns as elder jones and elder smith ride their bikes to pick up a birthday package for elder smith .
translation: Hari itu berliku-liku ketika Elder Jones dan Elder Smith menunggang basikal untuk mengambil bungkusan ulang tahun untuk Elder Smith.
back_translation: That day was winding when Elder Jones and Elder Smith rode their bicycles to pick up the birthday present for Elder Smith.

text: the war of the ring has now begun . . .
translation: Perang cincin kini telah bermula...
back_translation: The ring war has now begun...

text: the grandfather teaches the boy a small lesson about growing up , while the boy helps the grandfather , a holocaust survivor , open up and tell his story , for the first time .
translation: Tetua mengajar budak lelaki satu pelajaran kecil tentang membesar, sementara budak lelaki membantu tetua, seorang mangsa holokaus, untuk membuka diri dan menceritakan kisahnya, untuk kali pertama.
back_translation: The elder taught the young boy a small lesson on growing up, while the boy helped the elder, a Holocaust survivor, to open up and tell his story, for the first time.

text: so young , so smart , such talent , such a wise * * * .
translation: Begitu muda, begitu cerdas, begitu berbakat, begitu bijak.
back_translation: So young, so smart, so talented, so wise.

text: as she tries to clear her name , she uncovers information that leads to more murders and more unanswered questions .
translation: Sementara dia cuba membersihkan namanya, dia mendedahkan maklumat yang membawa kepada lebih banyak pembunuhan dan lebih banyak soalan yang tidak terjawab.
back_translation: While trying to clear his name, he exposed information that led to more killings and unanswered questions.

text: handled correctly , wilde 's play is a masterpiece of elegant wit and artifice . here , alas , it collapses like an overcooked soufflM-i .
translation: Apabila diuruskan dengan betul, lakonan Wilde adalah sebuah arca elegan dan khayalan seni yang indah. Di sini, sayangnya, ia runtuh seperti soufflé yang terlebih masak.
back_translation: When managed properly, Wilde's performance is an elegant masterpiece and a beautiful artistic fantasy. Unfortunately, here it collapses like an overcooked soufflé.

text: the roadworkers are mates from way back , and each weekend they go out to an old goldmining site hoping to strike it rich .
translation: Pekerja jalan raya adalah kawan rapat sejak lama, dan setiap hujung minggu mereka pergi ke tapak lombong emas lama dengan harapan untuk mendapat keberuntungan.
back_translation: Highway workers have been close friends for a long time, and every weekend they go to an old gold mine site in hopes of getting lucky.

text: once again , the intelligence of gay audiences has been grossly underestimated , and a meaty plot and well-developed characters have been sacrificed for skin and flash that barely fizzle .
translation: Sekali lagi, kecerdasan penonton gay telah dianggap rendah, dan plot yang padat dengan karakter yang baik telah dikorbankan demi kulit dan kilauan yang hampir tidak berkesan.
back_translation: Once again, the intelligence of gay audiences has been considered low, and a tightly woven plot with good characters has been sacrificed for superficiality and glitter that are almost ineffective.

text: you 'll have more fun setting fire to yourself in the parking lot . you 'll be more entertained getting hit by a bus .
translation: Anda akan lebih berseronok menyalakan diri sendiri di tempat letak kereta. Anda akan lebih terhibur jika dilanggar bas.
back_translation: You will have more fun if you hit yourself in the parking lot. You will be more entertained if you get hit by a bus.

text: often self-consciously surreal , this award-winner scores high for originality .
translation: Sering kali secara sedar surreal, pemenang anugerah ini mendapat markah tinggi untuk keaslian.
back_translation: Often consciously surreal, this award winner scores high for authenticity.

text: moore 's complex and important film is also , believe it or not , immensely entertaining , a david and goliath story that 's still very much playing itself out .
translation: Filem kompleks dan penting Moore juga, percayalah atau tidak, sangat menghiburkan, sebuah kisah David dan Goliath yang masih berlaku hingga kini.
back_translation: The complex and important film by Moore is also, believe it or not, very entertaining, a David and Goliath story that is still relevant to this day.

text: whether it 's the fbi swooping in to rescue us in mississippi burning or a fearless teacher storming a `` ghetto `` school to prove our youth can learn as in dangerous minds , we are often offended by such cinematic myths that are more interested in appeasing white liberal sensibilities than raising complex questions about what whites must truly sacrifice if they are sincere about ending racial injustice .
translation: Sama ada FBI turun tangan untuk menyelamatkan kita dalam filem Mississippi Burning atau seorang guru yang penuh keberanian menyerbu sekolah "kawasan terpinggir" untuk membuktikan bahawa belia kita boleh belajar seperti dalam Dangerous Minds, kita sering terasa tercabar oleh mitos sinematik sedemikian yang lebih berminat untuk menegaskan sensitiviti liberal putih daripada mengemukakan soalan yang kompleks tentang apa yang golongan putih sebenarnya perlu korbankan jika mereka ikhlas dalam mengakhiri ketidaksamaan rasial.
back_translation: Whether it's the FBI stepping in to save us in the movie Mississippi Burning or a courageous teacher storming a "rough area" school to prove that our youth can learn as in Dangerous Minds, we are often challenged by such cinematic myths more interested in asserting white liberal sensitivities than posing complex questions about what white people really need to sacrifice to genuinely end racial inequality.

text: sebastien cortez is an up and coming film maker who has just gotten his big break in `` the biz . ``
translation: Sebastien Cortez adalah pembuat filem yang semakin popular yang baru sahaja mendapat peluang besar dalam "dunia filem".
back_translation: Sebastien Cortez is a rising filmmaker who has just received a big opportunity in the "film world".

text: tends to pile too many `` serious issues `` on its plate at times , yet remains fairly light , always entertaining , and smartly written .
translation: cenderung mengumpulkan terlalu banyak "isu serius" pada masa tertentu, namun kekal agak ringan, sentiasa menghibur, dan ditulis dengan bijak.
back_translation: tend to collect too many "serious issues" at times, but remains quite light, always entertaining, and written with wisdom.

text: the way coppola professes his love for movies -- both colorful pop junk and the classics that unequivocally qualify as art -- is giddily entertaining .
translation: Cara Coppola menyatakan cintanya terhadap filem -- baik filem pop berwarna-warni mahupun klasik yang jelas diiktiraf sebagai seni -- sangat menghiburkan.
back_translation: Cara Coppola's declaration of love for movies - both colorful pop films and classic ones recognized as art - is very entertaining.

text: ben has a way of making trouble for julie .
translation: Ben mempunyai cara untuk membuat masalah bagi Julie.
back_translation: Ben has a way of causing trouble for Julie.

text: a spellbinding african film about the modern condition of rootlessness , a state experienced by millions around the globe .
translation: Filem Afrika yang memukau tentang keadaan moden ketiadaan akar, satu keadaan yang dialami oleh jutaan orang di seluruh dunia.
back_translation: A mesmerizing African film about the modern condition of rootlessness, a situation experienced by millions of people worldwide.

text: this gently retro story of a young morman missionary in the pacific islands of tonga loses some wholesomeness points due to some smug insularity .
translation: Kisah yang agak retro ini mengenai seorang misionaris muda mormon di kepulauan Pasifik Tonga kehilangan sedikit kebaikan kerana keangkuhan yang sombong.
back_translation: This somewhat retro story is about a young Mormon missionary in the Pacific islands of Tonga losing a bit of his goodness due to his arrogant pride.

text: meanwhile , assistant chief holland , the only man in the department willing to stand up to the sis , threatens to end perry 's brand of singlehanded `` justice `` on the los angeles streets .
translation: Sementara itu, pembantu ketua Holland, satu-satunya lelaki dalam jabatan yang bersedia untuk menentang SIS, mengancam untuk mengakhiri gaya "keadilan" sendirian milik Perry di jalan-jalan Los Angeles.
back_translation: Meanwhile, the assistant chief of Holland, the only man in the position willing to challenge SIS, threatened to end Perry's "justice" style alone on the streets of Los Angeles.

text: tired , bruised and out of breath , they finally free the professor and arrive at the temple of faramundi scant minutes before gallo and his men .
translation: Letih, lebam dan sesak nafas, mereka akhirnya membebaskan profesor dan tiba di kuil Faramundi hanya beberapa minit sebelum Gallo dan orang-orangnya.
back_translation: Tired, bruised, and out of breath, they finally freed the professor and arrived at the Faramundi temple just a few minutes before Gallo and his people.

text: fbi agent will graham has been called out of early retirement to catch a serial killer , known by authorities as `` the tooth fairy `` .
translation: Agen FBI Will Graham telah dipanggil daripada persaraan awal untuk menangkap seorang pembunuh berantai, yang dikenali oleh pihak berkuasa sebagai "si Pemburu Gigi".
back_translation: FBI Agent Will Graham has been called out of early retirement to capture a serial killer known to authorities as "the Tooth Fairy."

text: the story revolves around lucy kelson ( bullock ) , a brilliant but neurotic attorney , and her client ( grant ) , who is `` charming , irresponsible and fabulously wealthy . ``
translation: Kisah ini berkisar mengenai Lucy Kelson (Bullock), seorang peguam yang brilian tetapi neurotik, dan pelanggannya (Grant), yang "memikat, tidak bertanggungjawab, dan sangat kaya".
back_translation: This story revolves around Lucy Kelson (Bullock), a brilliant but neurotic lawyer, and her client (Grant), who is "charming, irresponsible, and very wealthy".

text: zak quickly learns how to manipulate the device , and he and his quick-witted , beautiful new friend , francesca , have some real fun .
translation: Zak dengan cepat belajar cara memanipulasi alat tersebut, dan dia serta teman baru yang cerdas dan cantik, Francesca, bersenang-senang dengan sebenarnya.
back_translation: Zak quickly learns how to manipulate the tool, and he and his new smart and beautiful friend, Francesca, have a lot of fun indeed.

text: meanwhile , puteri megawati , who is very thankful to the mysterious guy that saved her , meets siti shahirah , a member of the paparazzi that as usual , is looking for sensational news .
translation: Sementara itu, Puteri Megawati, yang sangat berterima kasih kepada lelaki misteri yang menyelamatkannya, bertemu dengan Siti Shahirah, seorang ahli paparazi yang seperti biasa, sedang mencari berita sensasi.
back_translation: Meanwhile, Princess Megawati, who is very grateful to the mysterious man who saved her, meets Siti Shahirah, a paparazzi expert who, as usual, is looking for sensational news.

text: nete is a tough woman of 35 who runs her job , husband , and teenage daughter with a firm and efficient hand .
translation: Nete adalah seorang wanita tegar berusia 35 tahun yang mengurus pekerjaan, suami, dan anak perempuannya remaja dengan tegas dan efisien.
back_translation: Neta is a 35-year-old tough woman who manages her job, husband, and teenage daughter firmly and efficiently.

text: high drama , disney-style - a wing and a prayer and a hunky has-been pursuing his castle in the sky .
translation: drama tinggi, gaya Disney - seorang lelaki yang gagah sedang berusaha untuk mencapai impian tingginya.
back_translation: High drama, Disney style - a brave man is striving to achieve his lofty dreams.

text: nothing but an episode of smackdown ! in period costume and with a bigger budget .
translation: Tiada apa-apa kecuali satu episod Smackdown! dalam pakaian zaman dulu dan dengan bajet yang lebih besar.
back_translation: Nothing except one episode of Smackdown! in old-fashioned attire and with a bigger budget.

text: since the shoe is his , kumin is then declared the `` mr .
translation: Sekiranya kasut itu miliknya, kumin kemudiannya diisytiharkan sebagai "tuan".
back_translation: If the shoes belong to him, I will then be declared as the "master".

text: a movie that ca n't get sufficient distance from leroy 's delusions to escape their maudlin influence .
translation: sebuah filem yang tidak dapat mendapatkan jarak yang mencukupi dari khayalan Leroy untuk melepaskan diri daripada pengaruh mereka yang melodramatik.
back_translation: A film that fails to achieve the necessary distance from Leroy's fantasies to break free from their melodramatic influence.

text: making matters worse , vince is having trouble discerning reality from memory .
translation: Membuat keadaan menjadi lebih teruk, Vince mengalami masalah untuk membezakan realiti daripada ingatan.
back_translation: Making matters worse, Vince is having trouble differentiating between reality and memory.

text: when every one suspects that it is him , the trio then set out to find the culprit and find out more than they bargained for : the diary of tom riddle , why hagrid was expelled and what the chamber of secrets is and why is it so feared in hogwarts .
translation: Apabila semua orang mengesyaki bahawa dia, trio itu kemudian melangkah untuk mencari si pelaku dan mendapat lebih daripada yang mereka harapkan: buku harian Tom Riddle, mengapa Hagrid dikeluarkan dan apa itu bilik rahsia dan mengapa ia sangat ditakuti di Hogwarts.
back_translation: When everyone suspected him, the trio then set out to find the culprit and found more than they had hoped for: Tom Riddle's diary, why was Hagrid expelled and what is the Chamber of Secrets and why is it so feared in Hogwarts.

text: anyone who professes to love movies should see alexander sokurov 's russian ark .
translation: Sesiapa yang mendakwa mencintai filem patut menonton Russian Ark oleh Alexander Sokurov.
back_translation: Anyone who claims to love films should watch Russian Ark by Alexander Sokurov.

text: director robert rodriguez has once again caught lightning in a bottle .
translation: Pengarah Robert Rodriguez sekali lagi telah berjaya menangkap petir dalam botol.
back_translation: Director Robert Rodriguez has once again successfully captured lightning in a bottle.

text: dazzling in its complexity , disturbing for its extraordinary themes , the piano teacher is a film that defies categorisation . it haunts , horrifies , startles and fascinates ; it is impossible to look away . ah yes , and then there 's the music . . .
translation: Hebat dalam kompleksiti nya, mengganggu dengan tema-tema luar biasa, The Piano Teacher adalah filem yang menolak pengkelasan. Ia menghantui, menakutkan, mengejutkan dan mempesonakan; mustahil untuk tidak memandang. Ah ya, dan kemudian ada muziknya...
back_translation: Great in its complexity, disturbing with its exceptional themes, The Piano Teacher is a film that defies classification. It's haunting, terrifying, surprising, and enchanting; impossible not to look at. Oh yes, and then there's the music...

text: this has to be one of the most bizarre love stories ever to be filmed , not since nine M-= weeks has anybody done this much pampering for his 'girlfriend ' .
translation: Ini harus menjadi salah satu kisah cinta paling aneh yang pernah difilmkan, tidak sejak sembilan minggu telah ada orang yang melakukan begitu banyak perawatan untuk 'kekasih'nya.
back_translation: This must be one of the weirdest love stories ever filmed, not since Nine Weeks has anyone gone to such great lengths for their 'lover'.

text: a compelling , gut-clutching piece of advocacy cinema that carries you along in a torrent of emotion as it explores the awful complications of one terrifying day .
translation: Filem advokasi yang menarik, menggetarkan jiwa yang membawa anda melalui ribut emosi semasa meneroka komplikasi mengerikan suatu hari yang menakutkan.
back_translation: An intriguing advocacy film that stirs the soul, taking you through a whirlwind of emotions while exploring the harrowing complications of a terrifying day.

text: an affable but undernourished romantic comedy that fails to match the freshness of the actress-producer and writer 's previous collaboration , miss congeniality .
translation: filem komedi romantis yang mesra tetapi kurang bermaya yang gagal menyamai kewajaran yang dimiliki oleh pelakon-penerbit dan penulis dalam kerjasama terdahulu, Miss Congeniality.
back_translation: A romantic comedy film that is intimate but lacks vitality, failing to match the chemistry exhibited by the actors-producer and writer in their previous collaboration, Miss Congeniality.

text: like carlos and mickey , sean and eddie are best friends .
translation: Seperti Carlos dan Mickey, Sean dan Eddie adalah sahabat baik.
back_translation: Like Carlos and Mickey, Sean and Eddie are good friends.

text: context is provided by those who protested against segregation and the limited franchise earlier in bermuda by authoring a `` secret document `` that analysed the social problems of the island .
translation: Konteks diberikan oleh pihak yang memberontak menentang pengasingan dan hak mengundi yang terhad sebelum ini di Bermuda dengan menulis sebuah "dokumen rahsia" yang menganalisis masalah-masalah sosial di pulau tersebut.
back_translation: The context is provided by parties who rebel against the previous restrictions on exile and voting rights in Bermuda by writing a "secret document" that analyzes social issues on the island.

text: the entire movie is in need of a scented bath .
translation: Seluruh filem memerlukan mandi beraroma.
back_translation: All movies need scented baths.

text: this is a movie that made me smile for two hours straight .
translation: Ini adalah filem yang membuat saya tersenyum selama dua jam berturut-turut.
back_translation: This is a movie that made me smile for two consecutive hours.

text: the film centres around three female supermodels who live and work together .
translation: Filem ini berkisar mengenai tiga model wanita super yang tinggal dan bekerja bersama.
back_translation: This movie revolves around three supermodel women who live and work together.

text: as they become jaded by watching these brutal fights , and betting becomes boring , the bosses realize that they need to take the fights to a new limit .
translation: Apabila mereka mula bosan menonton pertarungan brutal ini, dan berjudi menjadi membosankan, bos-bos sedar bahawa mereka perlu mengambil pertarungan ke had yang baru.
back_translation: When they start getting bored watching this brutal fight, and gambling becomes boring, the bosses realize that they need to take the fight to a new level.

text: now i can see why people thought i was too hard on `` the mothman prophecies `` .
translation: Sekarang saya dapat melihat mengapa orang berpikir saya terlalu keras terhadap "the mothman prophecies".
back_translation: Now I can see why people think I'm too hard on "the mothman prophecies".

text: audrey tatou has a knack for picking roles that magnify her outrageous charm , and in this literate french comedy , she 's as morning-glory exuberant as she was in amM-ilie .
translation: Audrey Tatou mempunyai bakat untuk memilih watak-watak yang memperjelaskan daya tariknya yang luar biasa, dan dalam komedi Perancis yang berilmu ini, dia sama ceria seperti apa yang dia persembahkan dalam AmM-ilie.
back_translation: Audrey Tautou has a talent for selecting characters that showcase her extraordinary charm, and in this witty French comedy, she is just as cheerful as she is in AmM-ilie.

text: one of the best cat-and-mouse movies to come along in a while , leo has great fun in the role .
translation: Salah satu filem kucing dan tikus terbaik yang muncul dalam beberapa waktu, Leo sangat seronok dalam peran ini.
back_translation: One of the best cat-and-mouse movies that has emerged in recent times, Leo truly enjoyed his role in this.

text: provides a satisfactory overview of the bizarre world of extreme athletes as several daredevils express their own views .
translation: Memberikan gambaran yang memuaskan mengenai dunia aneh atlit-atlit ekstrim ketika beberapa penantang batas menyatakan pandangan mereka sendiri.
back_translation: Providing a satisfying portrayal of the strange world of extreme athletes as some boundary challengers express their own views.

text: skin deep is a psychological thriller about love , sex , race , and betrayal involving an interracial couple , a black couple , and a mistress .
translation: "Skin Deep" adalah sebuah cerita thriller psikologi mengenai cinta, seks, bangsa, dan pengkhianatan yang melibatkan pasangan interracial, pasangan hitam, dan seorang wanita simpanan.
back_translation: "Skin Deep" is a psychological thriller story about love, sex, race, and betrayal involving an interracial couple, a black couple, and a mistress.

text: big yard operates a child smuggling ring and 'superbob ' must save dante or lose his son forever .
translation: Big Yard menjalankan sebuah rangkaian penyeludupan kanak-kanak dan 'Superbob' harus menyelamatkan Dante atau akan kehilangan anak lelakinya selamanya.
back_translation: Big Yard is running a child smuggling operation, and 'Superbob' has to save Dante or he will lose his son forever.

text: like coming into a long-running , well-written television series where you 've missed the first half-dozen episodes and probably wo n't see the next six .
translation: Sama seperti masuk ke dalam siri televisyen yang berjalan lama dan ditulis dengan baik di mana anda telah terlepas setengah lusin episod pertama dan mungkin tidak akan melihat enam episod seterusnya.
back_translation: Just like stepping into a long-running, well-written TV series where you've missed the first half-dozen episodes and might not watch the following six episodes.

text: they discover that the one sho stole them is a rival of the criminal , while they go to every single one of his associates to find who has them .
translation: Mereka menemui bahawa pencuri mereka adalah rival penjenayah, sementara mereka pergi kepada setiap satu rakan kongsi beliau untuk mencari siapa yang memilikinya.
back_translation: They found out that their thief was a rival criminal, so they went to each of his accomplices to find out who had it.

text: both an admirable reconstruction of terrible events , and a fitting memorial to the dead of that day , and of the thousands thereafter .
translation: kedua-duanya adalah satu usaha pemulihan yang sangat baik terhadap peristiwa-peristiwa mengerikan itu, dan juga merupakan peringatan yang sesuai untuk yang telah meninggal dalam tragedi pada hari itu, dan juga ribuan lainnya.
back_translation: Both are excellent efforts at recovery from those terrible events, and also serve as a fitting tribute to those who perished in the tragedy that day, as well as thousands of others.

text: intent on exacting bloody revenge on the reunited english friends murray possesses the body of a guest and turns him into a murderer .
translation: Bertekad untuk membalas dendam dengan darah kepada rakan-rakan Inggeris yang bersatu, Murray menguasai tubuh seorang tetamu dan mengubahnya menjadi seorang pembunuh.
back_translation: Determined to avenge with blood against his united English comrades, Murray possessed a guest's body and transformed him into a killer.

text: this story centers around a divorced woman in her 30 's and her daughter , who are caught up in a cat-and-mouse game inside their new new york brownstone when three burglars come looking for a hidden cache of cash .
translation: Cerita ini berpusat pada seorang wanita bercerai dalam lingkungan usia 30-an dan anak perempuannya, yang terperangkap dalam permainan kucing-kucingan di dalam rumah batu bata baru mereka di New York apabila tiga pencuri datang mencari simpanan wang tunai yang tersembunyi.
back_translation: This story revolves around a woman in her thirties going through a divorce and her daughter, who are trapped in a cat-and-mouse game in their new brick house in New York when three thieves come looking for hidden cash reserves.

text: detective mi yun ( played by yum jung-ah ) , and her newly appointed partner , detective kang ( played by ji jin-hee ) , are assigned to the case .
translation: Detektif Mi Yun (diperlakukannya oleh Yum Jung-ah), dan rakan sekerja yang baru dilantik, Detektif Kang (diperlakukannya oleh Ji Jin-hee), diberi tugasan untuk kes ini.
back_translation: Detective Mi Yun (played by Yum Jung-ah), and her newly appointed colleague, Detective Kang (played by Ji Jin-hee), are assigned to this case.

text: nete forces a doctor to tell her how much time he has left .
translation: Nete memaksa seorang doktor memberitahunya berapa lama masanya yang tinggal.

text: the next morning , their friday gets freaky when tess and anna find themselves inside the wrong bodies .

back_translation: The next morning, Friday, they find it strange when Tess and Anna realize that they are in the wrong bodies.

text: a lowly thug , gigli ( ben affleck ) , is assigned to kidnap the psychologically challenged younger brother of a powerful federal prosecutor to save his mobster boss from incarceration .
translation: Seorang kaki tangan rendah, Gigli (Ben Affleck), diberi tugas untuk menculik adik lelaki yang menghadapi cabaran psikologi dari seorang peguam persekutuan yang berpengaruh untuk menyelamatkan bos gangsternya dari penjara.
back_translation: A dim-witted enforcer, Gigli (Ben Affleck), is tasked with kidnapping the psychologically challenged younger brother of a powerful federal prosecutor to save his gangster boss from prison.

text: cinephiles will appreciate the fine camerawork and overall mise-en-scene , but people just heading out for a popcorn pleaser will likely be disappointed .
translation: Peminat filem akan menghargai kerja kamera yang baik dan keseluruhan mise-en-scene, tetapi orang yang hanya pergi untuk menonton filem ringan mungkin akan kecewa.
back_translation: Film enthusiasts will appreciate good camera work and overall mise-en-scene, but those who just go to watch a light film may be disappointed.

text: former world-rallye-champion walter and his daughter natascha are kidnapped by arab terrorists and brought to berlin .
translation: Mantan juara rally dunia Walter dan anak perempuannya, Natascha, diculik oleh pengganas Arab dan dibawa ke Berlin.
back_translation: Former world rally champion Walter and his daughter, Natascha, were kidnapped by Arab terrorists and taken to Berlin.

text: it wants to be thought of as a subversive little indie film , but it has all the qualities of a modern situation comedy .

back_translation: This small indie film wants to be seen as something subversive, but it actually has all the characteristics of modern sitcom comedy.

text: in their new environment , the men relinquish their frat mentality and realize how hurtful they have been to women over the years .

back_translation: In their new environment, men shed their brotherhood mentality and realize how hurtful they have been towards women for years.

text: brian knows that tonight the evil has finally come to claim him .

text: in 1946 , tests began using nazi v-1 `` buzz bombs `` launched from the decks of american diesel submarines .
translation: Pada tahun 1946, ujian telah bermula menggunakan bom "buzz" nazi V-1 yang dilancarkan dari dek kapal selam diesel Amerika.

text: in adobo , ethnicity is not just the spice , but at the heart of more universal concerns .

text: die another day is only intermittently entertaining but it 's hard not to be a sucker for its charms , or perhaps it 's just impossible not to feel nostalgia for movies you grew up with .
translation: "Die Another Day" hanya sesekali menghibur tetapi sukar untuk tidak terpesona dengan daya tariknya, atau mungkin tidak mungkin untuk tidak merasai nostalgik untuk filem-filem yang anda dibesarkan dengan.
back_translation: "Die Another Day" only occasionally entertains but it's hard not to be fascinated by its allure, or perhaps impossible not to feel nostalgic for the films you grew up with.

text: when one of them tells the other a rumor that he might be a homicidal maniac they are all scared of him .
translation: apabila salah seorang dari mereka memberitahu yang lain tentang desas-desus bahawa dia mungkin pembunuh bersiri, mereka semua takut kepadanya.
back_translation: When one of them told the others about the rumors that he might be a serial killer, they all became afraid of him.

text: faced with a $ 10 million lawsuit , the department agrees to let producer chase renzi film mitch 's investigation for a new reality tv show , and constantly tries to make everything more `` viewer friendly `` by changing everything about mitch 's life to fit the stereotypical view of police officers -- and partners him with trey .
translation: Di hadapan tuntutan mahkamah sebanyak $10 juta, jabatan bersetuju untuk membenarkan pengeluar Chase Renzi membuat filem siasatan Mitch sebagai rancangan realiti TV baru, dan sentiasa cuba menjadikan segalanya lebih "mesra penonton" dengan menukar segala-galanya tentang kehidupan Mitch untuk memenuhi pandangan stereotaip tentang pegawai polis - dan memasangkan beliau dengan Trey.
back_translation: Facing a $10 million court claim, the department agreed to allow the release of Chase Renzi to produce an investigation film series featuring Mitch as a new reality TV show, and continuously trying to make everything more "viewer-friendly" by changing everything about Mitch's life to fit the stereotypical view of police officers - and pairing him with Trey.

text: it might be the first sci-fi comedy that could benefit from a three 's company-style laugh track .
translation: Ini mungkin filem komedi sains fiksyen pertama yang boleh mendapat manfaat daripada trek gelak gaya Three's Company.

text: so , he and a few friends , try to cover up his disability , without the studio executives or the producers knowing that he is directing the film blind .

text: this romantic comedy , described as an african-american when harry met sally . . . , centers on a romance between an a & # 38 ; r exec , dre ( diggs ) , at a hip-hop label and a magazine editor , sidney ( lathan ) , who have known each other since childhood .
translation: Komedi romantis ini, yang digambarkan sebagai "when harry met sally" versi Afrika-Amerika, berpusat pada percintaan antara seorang eksekutif A&R, Dre (Diggs), di label musik hip-hop dan seorang penyunting majalah, Sidney (Lathan), yang saling mengenal sejak kecil.

text: the film actually gets to tackle some larger questions than one normally finds in the average fireball drama .

text: harnessing the explosive momentum of the internet , anime heralds a revolution in 21st century youth culture .

text: but as she comes home , she opens a mysterious door that leads her to an artificial world : the holo-deck .
translation: Tetapi apabila dia pulang ke rumah, dia membuka pintu misteri yang membawanya ke dunia tiruan: holo-deck.
back_translation: But when he returned home, he opened the mysterious door that led him to a simulated world: the holo-deck.

text: although she came back to the house in order to sell it , things begin to take a different direction : the house itself , the furniture and other equipment in it seem to become alive for anna , recalling images of her past , her beloved parents and her friend max , who once gave her shelter from the raging policemen when she took part as a photo journalist in a political demonstration in berlin .
translation: Walaupun dia kembali ke rumah untuk menjualnya, perkara-perkara mula mengambil arah yang berbeza: rumah itu sendiri, perabot dan peralatan lain di dalamnya kelihatan hidup bagi Anna, membangkitkan imej-imej dari masa lalunya, ibu bapanya yang tercinta dan kawannya Max, yang pernah memberikannya perlindungan dari polis bergaduh ketika dia menyertai demonstrasi politik sebagai seorang wartawan foto di Berlin.
back_translation: Even though she returned home to sell it, things began to take a different direction: the house itself, the furniture, and other equipment inside seemed alive to Anna, evoking images from her past, her beloved parents, and her friend Max, who once protected her from the fighting police during a political demonstration when she was working as a photojournalist in Berlin.

text: scared of death , winnie must choose between being immortal and being with jesse or following the circle of life and dying someday .
translation: Takut akan kematian, Winnie harus memilih antara menjadi abadi dan bersama Jesse atau mengikuti lingkaran kehidupan dan mati suatu hari nanti.
back_translation: Afraid of death, Winnie must choose between becoming immortal and being with Jesse or following the circle of life and eventually die one day.

text: the writers , director wally wolodarsky , and all the actors should start their own coeducational fraternity : kappa rho alpha phi .

text: it is quickly agreed however , that selling chocolates door to door , or fire powered potato guns to children , may be too complicated .

text: a garden-fresh morality tale for the kids , with monty python-inspired humor .
translation: sebuah cerita moral yang segar untuk kanak-kanak, dengan humor yang diinspirasikan oleh Monty Python.

text: smart , sassy interpretation of the oscar wilde play .
translation: Interpretasi yang bijak dan berani dari lakon Oscar Wilde.

text: lan yu seems altogether too slight to be called any kind of masterpiece . it is , however , a completely honest , open-hearted film that should appeal to anyone willing to succumb to it .
translation: lan yu nampaknya agak ringan untuk dipanggil sebarang jenis arahan agung. Walaubagaimanapun, ia adalah filem yang benar-benar jujur dan terbuka yang sepatutnya menarik kepada sesiapa sahaja yang bersedia untuk terpengaruh dengannya.
back_translation: The film seems quite light to be considered for any kind of grand directive. However, it is a truly honest and open film that should appeal to anyone willing to be influenced by it.

text: this spider-woman , secretly connected to the mob , has jealously controlled patricia 's life as well as the one of her husband , casino owner francis hiller ( timothy bottoms ) .

back_translation: This spider woman, secretly involved with a syndicate, has been controlling Patricia's life with her jealousy and her husband’s life, the casino owner Francis Hiller (Timothy Bottoms).

text: but then the crew detects a break-in on their computer systems , and picard is captured by the romulans because shinzon needs him as his only matching supplier of genetic material .
translation: Tetapi kemudian krew mendeteksi pencerobohan dalam sistem komputer mereka, dan Picard ditawan oleh Romulan kerana Shinzon memerlukannya sebagai pembekal bahan genetik yang sepadan.
back_translation: However, the crew later detected an intrusion in their computer system, and Picard was captured by the Romulans because Shinzon needed him as a genetic material supplier.

text: a romantic comedy that operates by the rules of its own self-contained universe .
translation: sebuah komedi romantis yang beroperasi mengikut peraturan alam semestanya yang tertutup sendiri.

text: this 72-minute film does have some exciting scenes , but it 's a tad slow .

text: john was one of the first porn stars to push for aids testing in the porn industry .

text: the driver finds himself in a dangerous , yet highly political situation ; this time being pursued by a helicopter gunship while carrying a passenger with a suitcase . . .

back_translation: The driver found himself in a dangerous but highly politicized situation; this time being chased by a bomber helicopter while carrying passengers with a bag.

text: she entranced the founder of the museum of art ( masp ) where the fashion parade was being held , and her career was hence launched .

text: about schmidt is undoubtedly one of the finest films of the year . if you 're not deeply touched by this movie , check your pulse .
translation: About Schmidt adalah salah satu filem terbaik tahun ini. Jika anda tidak tersentuh dengan filem ini, periksa denyut nadi anda.

text: mostly centered on indianapolis , this film puts this problem ( which many assume to be an urban phenomenon ) firmly in the heartland of the usa .
translation: Kebanyakan tertumpu pada Indianapolis, filem ini menjadikan masalah ini (yang ramai anggap sebagai fenomena bandar) bersemayam di tengah-tengah wilayah tengah Amerika Syarikat.
back_translation: Mostly focused on Indianapolis, this film places this issue (which many see as an urban phenomenon) in the midst of the central region of the United States.

text: slackers ' jokey approach to college education is disappointingly simplistic -- the film 's biggest problem -- and there are no unforgettably stupid stunts or uproariously rude lines of dialogue to remember it by .
translation: Pendekatan santai "slackers" terhadap pendidikan perguruan tinggi adalah terlalu ringkas - masalah terbesar filem ini - dan tiada stunts bodoh yang tak terlupakan atau barisan dialog kasar yang menggelikan untuk dikenanginya.
back_translation: The laid-back "slackers" approach to higher education is too simplistic - the biggest issue of this film - and there are no unforgettable stupid stunts or hilarious lines of dialogue to remember.

text: what should have been a cutting hollywood satire is instead about as fresh as last week 's issue of variety .
translation: Apa yang sepatutnya menjadi satu satira Hollywood yang tajam malah tidak se segar isu minggu lepas dalam majalah Variety.
back_translation: What was supposed to be a sharp satire of Hollywood ended up not as fresh as last week's issue in Variety magazine.

text: when an international criminal ( dacascos ) kidnaps the daughter of a gang leader ( dmx ) as part of a diamond heist , it causes a city 's police to engage in an intensive search ( led by a government agent played by li ) , aided by the father 's gangsters .
translation: Apabila seorang penjenayah antarabangsa (Dacascos) menyebabkan anak perempuan ketua geng (DMX) diculik sebagai sebahagian daripada rompakan berlian, ia membawa kepada polis bandar untuk meneruskan siasatan intensif (dipimpin oleh seorang wakil kerajaan yang dilakonkan oleh Li), dibantu oleh penjahat geng bapa tersebut.
back_translation: When an international criminal (Dacascos) causes the daughter of a gang leader (DMX) to be kidnapped as part of a diamond heist, it leads to the city police to carry out an intensive investigation (led by a government representative portrayed by Li), assisted by the father's gangster.

text: for those who like quirky , slightly strange french films , this is a must !

text: a good-natured ensemble comedy that tries hard to make the most of a bumper cast , but never quite gets off the ground .

translation: Tambah kepada situasi ini adalah ribut topan yang mematikan menuju ke pulau itu.
back_translation: Adding to this situation is a deadly typhoon heading towards the island.

text: `` the best disney movie since the lion king ``
translation: "filem Disney terbaik sejak The Lion King"
back_translation: "The best Disney film since The Lion King"

text: this is mild-mannered , been-there material given a pedestrian spin by a director who needed a touch of the flamboyant , the outrageous .
translation: Ini merupakan bahan yang biasa-biasa saja, tidak ada yang istimewa bila diolah dengan gaya klasik oleh seorang pengarah yang memerlukan sentuhan yang mencolok, bahkan dramatis.
back_translation: This is just an ordinary material, nothing special when processed in a classic style by a director who requires striking, even dramatic touches.

text: andrew is infatuated with sannah and fantazises about her but believes there 's no chance she will like him if she gets to know him , so he decides it 's better they never meet for real . . .
translation: Andrew terpesona dengan Sannah dan memikirkan tentangnya tetapi percaya bahawa tidak ada peluang dia akan menyukainya jika dia mengenali dirinya, jadi dia memutuskan lebih baik mereka tidak pernah bertemu secara nyata...
back_translation: Andrew is fascinated by Sannah and thinks about her but believes that there is no chance he will like her if he gets to know her, so he decided it's better if they never meet in person...

text: it is the first time ever that he leaves the desolate village in the balkan mountains .
translation: Ini adalah kali pertama dia meninggalkan desa terpencil di kawasan pergunungan Balkan.
back_translation: This is the first time he leaves the remote village in the Balkan mountain area.

text: truth is stranger than fiction , so the old saying goes . in 'catch me if you can , ' it 's also more entertaining .
translation: Benar lebih aneh daripada fiksyen, begitu kata pepatah lama. Dalam 'Catch Me If You Can,' ia juga lebih menghiburkan.
back_translation: True is stranger than fiction, so the old saying goes. In 'Catch Me If You Can,' it is also more entertaining.

text: large budget notwithstanding , the movie is such a blip on the year 's radar screen that it 's tempting just to go with it for the ride . but this time , the old mib label stands for milder is n't better .
translation: Anggaran besar tidak mengira, filem ini hanya suatu capaian minima dalam senarai filem tahunan sehingga terasa ingin sahaja memberi peluang pada filem ini. Tetapi kali ini, label MIB lama membuktikan bahawa lebih lembut bukanlah lebih baik.
back_translation: Regardless of the big budget, this film is only a minimal achievement in the annual film list until it feels like just wanting to give a chance to this film. But this time, the old MIB label proves that gentler is not necessarily better.

text: while the topic has grown heavier here , [ moretti 's ] touch has not , and that disparity is precisely what gives the film its sustained poignancy .
translation: walaupun topik ini menjadi lebih berat di sini , sentuhan [moretti] tidak, dan perbezaan itu adalah yang memberi filem itu keharuan yang berterusan.
back_translation: Although the topic becomes heavier here, the touch of [moretti] does not, and that difference is what gives the film its continuous charm.

text: a murder in the camp gives him the chance to set a risky plan in motion .
translation: Pembunuhan di perkhemahan memberinya peluang untuk melaksanakan rancangan berisiko.
back_translation: The murder at the camp gave him the opportunity to carry out a risky plan.

text: hot on the trail of the principle villains , bond travels to iceland where he experiences at first hand the power of an amazing new weapon before a dramatic confrontation with his main adversary back in korea where it all started . . .
translation: Mendekati penjahat utama , Bond pergi ke Iceland di mana dia mengalami sendiri kuasa senjata baru yang menakjubkan sebelum berhadapan secara dramatis dengan musuh utamanya kembali di Korea di mana semuanya bermula . . .
back_translation: Approaching the main villain, Bond goes to Iceland where he encounters firsthand the incredible power of a new weapon before confronting his main enemy again in Korea where everything began...

text: partly because of the severe regime of a dreadful nurse , the five decide to escape from their new home and go back to the old one under their own steam .
translation: Sebahagian kerana rezim ketat seorang jururawat yang mengerikan, kelima beritahu untuk melarikan diri dari rumah baru mereka dan pulang ke rumah lama mereka atas usaha sendiri.
back_translation: Partly because of the strict regime of a terrible nurse, the five were told to escape from their new home and return to their old home on their own efforts.

text: a profoundly stupid affair , populating its hackneyed and meanspirited storyline with cardboard characters and performers who value cash above credibility .
translation: Sebuah urusan yang sungguh bodoh, mengisi jalan ceritanya yang biasa dan jahat dengan watak-watak kertas dan pelakon yang mengutamakan wang daripada kredibiliti.
back_translation: Such a foolish affair, filling its ordinary and evil storyline with paper characters and actors who prioritize money over credibility.

text: de niro looks bored , murphy recycles murphy , and you mentally add showtime to the pile of hollywood dreck that represents nothing more than the art of the deal .
translation: De Niro kelihatan bosan, Murphy mengulangi dirinya sendiri, dan anda secara mental menambahkan masa tayangan ke tumpukan hibuan Hollywood yang hanya mewakili seni perjanjian semata-mata.
back_translation: De Niro looks bored, Murphy repeats himself, and you mentally add viewing time to the stack of Hollywood distractions that only represent commercial art agreements.

text: this fairy tale beginning freefalls from happy to disastrous as the newlyweds are besieged by emotionally challenged children , a savagily jealous ex-wife and a drunken dad .
translation: Cerita dongeng ini bermula dengan gembira tetapi merosot ke dalam bencana apabila pasangan pengantin baru diserang oleh anak-anak yang cabul emosi, bekas isteri yang cemburu dengan ganas, dan bapa yang mabuk.
back_translation: This fairy tale begins joyfully but descends into disaster when the newlyweds are attacked by emotionally disturbed children, a jealous and fierce ex-wife, and a drunken father.

text: fresh out of prison , dara is on a mission to scatter her mother 's ashes in lake superior .
translation: Baru sahaja dibebaskan dari penjara, Dara sedang dalam misi untuk menyebarkan abu ibunya di Tasik Superior.
back_translation: Just released from prison, Dara is on a mission to spread her mother's ashes in Lake Superior.

text: after discovering a passenger ship missing since 1962 floating adrift on the bering sea , salvagers claim the vessel as their own .
translation: Selepas menemui sebuah kapal penumpang yang hilang sejak 1962 terapung terbiar di Laut Bering, penebus hak mendakwa kapal tersebut sebagai milik mereka.
back_translation: After discovering a lost passenger ship adrift in the Bering Sea since 1962, the salvors claimed the ship as their own.

text: it also touches on the encroachment of christianity brought by the missionaries , which is at odds with mepe 's tribal and traditional roots .
translation: Ia juga mengulas tentang pencerobohan agama Kristian yang dibawa oleh para misionaris, yang bertentangan dengan akar tradisional dan tribal mepe.
back_translation: It also discusses the incursion of Christian religion brought by missionaries, which contradicts the traditional and tribal roots.

text: the mushy finale turns john q into a movie-of-the-week tearjerker .
translation: Akhir yang lemah lembut menjadikan John Q seperti filem sedih yang dipaparkan di televisyen.
back_translation: The gentle and gentle ending makes John Q like a sad movie displayed on television.

text: the story is familiar from its many predecessors ; like them , it eventually culminates in the not-exactly -stunning insight that crime does n't pay .
translation: Cerita ini sudah dikenali dari banyak cerita sebelumnya; seperti cerita-cerita tersebut, ia akhirnya berakhir dengan pengetahuan yang tidak begitu mengejutkan bahawa jenayah tidak membayar.
back_translation: This story is already familiar from many previous stories; like those stories, it eventually ends with the unsurprising knowledge that crime doesn't pay.

text: graM-gas M-`s interaM-gM-ues entre seus personagens , o filme torna-se nM-co apenas uma histM-sria divertida sobre uma curiosa perseguiM-gM-co , mas tambM-im um belo estudo de personagens .
translation: Dengan interaksi yang hebat antara watak-wataknya, filem ini bukan sahaja menjadi kisah yang menghiburkan tentang pengejaran yang menarik, tetapi juga sebuah kajian watak yang indah.
back_translation: With great interaction among its characters, this film is not only an entertaining story of an intriguing pursuit, but also a beautiful character study.

text: hawn lets it all hang out in this film and i have to admire her guts . sarandon is equally bold and daring in her portrayal of a woman who has lost her way in a closet full of beige suits .
translation: Hawn memperlihatkan segalanya dalam filem ini dan saya terpaksa mengagumi keberaniannya. Sarandon juga berani dan berani dalam penampilannya sebagai seorang wanita yang telah tersesat di dalam lemari penuh dengan baju sutera beige.
back_translation: Hawn displays everything in this film, and I have to admire her courage. Sarandon is also brave and daring in her performance as a woman who is lost in a closet full of beige silk clothes.

text: even if it is generally amusing from time to time , i spy has all the same problems the majority of action comedies have .
translation: Walaupun kadang-kadang menyeronokkan, seperti kebanyakan filem aksi komedi, i Spy juga menghadapi masalah yang sama.
back_translation: Although sometimes enjoyable, like most action comedy films, i Spy also faces the same problems.

text: it teaches the importance and understanding of life and death . it
translation: Ia mengajar tentang kepentingan dan pemahaman tentang kehidupan dan kematian.
back_translation: It teaches about the importance and understanding of life and death.

text: sure to stir up some controversy , callous sentiment is a true depiction of how violence can affect ones psyche .
translation: Pasti akan menimbulkan kontroversi, sentimen yang kejam adalah gambaran yang sebenar tentang bagaimana keganasan boleh memberi kesan kepada psikologi seseorang.
back_translation: Surely will spark controversy, cruel sentiments are a true reflection of how violence can affect a person's psychology.

text: reign of fire may be little more than another platter of reheated aliens , but it 's still pretty tasty .
translation: Reign of Fire mungkin hanyalah hidangan alien yang dipanaskan semula, tetapi masih enak.
back_translation: "Reign of Fire" might just be a reheated alien dish, but it's still delicious.

text: now the inmates are retaliating , with seagal and ja rule leading them .
translation: Sekarang banduan sedang membalas, dengan Seagal dan Ja Rule memimpin mereka.
back_translation: Now the inmates are retaliating, with Seagal and Ja Rule leading them.

text: concerned that his son is going to embarrass him during his campaign to become the governor of california , brad 's wealthy father and his campaign manager ( underwood ) , hire two juilliard-trained actors ( diggs and anderson ) to disguise themselves as `` real life gangstaz `` , and kidnap his son , dropping him off in the `` real hood `` in compton , in an effort to scare the ghettofied attitude and behavior out of him .
translation: Bimbang bahawa anak lelakinya akan memalukannya semasa kempen untuk menjadi gabenor California, bapa kaya Brad dan pengurus kempennya (Underwood), mengupah dua pelakon yang dilatih di Juilliard (Diggs dan Anderson) untuk menyamar sebagai "penjahat sebenar", dan menculik anak lelakinya, menjatuhkannya di "kapcai sebenar" di Compton, dalam usaha untuk menakut-nakutkan sikap ghetto yang ada padanya.
back_translation: Worried that his son will embarrass him during the campaign to become the governor of California, wealthy father Brad and his campaign manager (Underwood) hired two actors trained at Juilliard (Diggs and Anderson) to pretend to be the "real villains", and kidnapped his son, dropping him in a "real motorcycle" in Compton, in an effort to scare the ghetto attitude out of him.

text: after being handcuffed to new york city 's 'a ' train by his prep school friends ( keith , perabo , hayward ) , young karim ( mehta ) is forced to ride all the way to the last stop , far rockaway .
translation: Setelah diikat dengan rantai ke kereta 'A' New York City oleh rakan-rakan sekolah persediaannya (Keith, Perabo, Hayward), Karim muda (Mehta) terpaksa menaiki kereta tersebut sehingga hentian terakhir, Far Rockaway.
back_translation: After being tied with a chain to the New York City train 'A' by his schoolmates prepping for him (Keith, Perabo, Hayward), young Karim (Mehta) was forced to ride the train all the way to the final stop, Far Rockaway.

text: the chateau cleverly probes the cross-cultural differences between gauls and yanks .
translation: Chateau dengan bijak menyiasat perbezaan lintas budaya antara orang Gaul dan orang Amerika.
back_translation: Chateau cleverly investigates the cross-cultural differences between the Gauls and the Americans.

text: an eager young englishman is dispatched to sarawak to become part of the british colonial government , encounters some unorthodox local traditions , and finds himself faced with tough decisions of the heart involving the beautiful young selima , the unwitting object of his affections .
translation: Seorang lelaki muda Inggeris yang bersemangat dihantar ke Sarawak untuk menjadi sebahagian daripada kerajaan penjajahan British, berhadapan dengan tradisi tempatan yang tidak konvensional, dan mendapati dirinya menghadapi keputusan sulit hati yang melibatkan Selima muda yang cantik, objek tak disengajanya.
back_translation: A young English man full of enthusiasm was sent to Sarawak to be a part of the British colonial government, facing unconventional local traditions and finding himself caught in a difficult heart-wrenching decision involving a young beautiful Selima, an unintended object.

text: is anyone else out there getting tired of the whole slo-mo , double-pistoled , ballistic-pyrotechnic hong kong action aesthetic ?
translation: Adakah sesiapa lagi di luar sana sudah muak dengan estetika aksi Hong Kong yang lambat, berganda-pistol, dan pirotenik ballistik?
back_translation: Is anyone else out there already tired of the slow, dual-pistol, and ballistic pyrotechnic aesthetics of Hong Kong action?

text: it does n't do a lot of deep thinking , but unlike many futuristic combos of sf and f/x , it does make a statement : freedom of opinion is a threat to totalitarian systems .
translation: Ini tidak melibatkan banyak pemikiran mendalam, tetapi berbeza daripada banyak gabungan futuristik sains fiksyen dan kesan khas, ia membuat suatu kenyataan: kebebasan pendapat adalah ancaman kepada sistem totaliter.
back_translation: This does not involve much deep thinking, but unlike many combinations of futuristic science fiction and special effects, it makes a statement: freedom of expression is a threat to the totalitarian system.

text: it 's impossible to duplicate the shock of the 11-year-old lambs , but the new film succeeds at creating nerve-tightening moments of suspense .
translation: Adalah mustahil untuk meniru kejutan di kalangan anak domba berusia 11 tahun, tetapi filem baru berjaya dalam mencipta momen-momen ketegangan saraf yang menarik.
back_translation: It is impossible to imitate the excitement among 11-year-old lambs, but the new movie succeeds in creating thrilling nerve-wracking moments.

text: holland lets things peter out midway , but it 's notably better acted -- and far less crass - than some other recent efforts in the burgeoning genre of films about black urban professionals .
translation: Holland membiarkan sesuatu berkurang separuh jalan, tetapi ia diperhatikan sebagai lakon yang lebih baik - dan jauh kurang kasar - daripada beberapa usaha terkini dalam genre yang berkembang pesat mengenai filem mengenai profesional bandar hitam.
back_translation: Holland allows something to fall halfway, but it is regarded as a better - and far less coarse - act than some recent efforts in the rapidly growing genre of films about urban black professionals.

text: it 's supposed to be post-feminist breezy but ends up as tedious as the chatter of parrots raised on oprah .
translation: Ia sepatutnya bersifat santai selepas feminisme tetapi berakhir membosankan seperti perbualan burung beo yang dibesarkan di atas Oprah.
back_translation: It should be relaxing after feminism but ends up being boring like a conversation of a parrot raised on Oprah.

text: only one person has the power to save the princess , a priestess .
translation: Hanya satu orang yang mempunyai kuasa untuk menyelamatkan puteri, seorang pendeta.
back_translation: Only one person has the power to save the princess, a priest.

text: the kind of women that own every room they walk into , and who think of all men as 'boys ' .
translation: Jenis wanita yang memiliki setiap ruangan yang mereka masuki, dan yang menganggap semua lelaki sebagai 'budak'.
back_translation: The kind of women who own every room they enter, and who see all men as 'slaves'.

text: so saccharine , i 'm not sure i 'd be able to take it under normal conditions .
translation: Terlalu manis, saya tidak pasti saya boleh terima di bawah keadaan normal.
back_translation: Too sweet, I'm not sure I can handle it under normal circumstances.

text: young police officer filipo ( giovanni ribisi ) descends into philippa 's life , changing her bleak outlook on existence into one in search of tranquility among corruption , as they become unlikely soul mates and lovers .
translation: Pegawai polis muda Filipo (Giovanni Ribisi) turun ke dalam kehidupan Philippa, mengubah pandangannya yang suram terhadap keberadaan kepada satu pencarian ketenangan di tengah-tengah rasuah, ketika mereka menjadi pasangan jiwa dan kekasih yang tidak mungkin.
back_translation: Young police officer Filipo (Giovanni Ribisi) descends into Philippa's life, transforming her bleak outlook on existence into a quest for peace amidst corruption, as they become unlikely soulmates and lovers.

text: besides the fact that he is still disliked by professor snape ( alan rickman ) and hated by draco malfoy ( tom felton ) , harry gets off to a great start with his two best friends , ron weasly ( rupert grint ) and hermione granger ( emma watson ) , and famous writer gilderoy lockhart ( kenneth branagh ) has joined the hogwarts staff and is the new defense against the dark arts teacher .
translation: Selain kenyataan bahawa dia masih tidak disenangi oleh Profesor Snape (Alan Rickman) dan dibenci oleh Draco Malfoy (Tom Felton), Harry bermula dengan baik bersama dua sahabat baiknya, Ron Weasley (Rupert Grint) dan Hermione Granger (Emma Watson), dan penulis terkenal Gilderoy Lockhart (Kenneth Branagh) telah menyertai kakitangan Hogwarts dan menjadi guru Pertahanan terhadap Seni Gelap yang baharu.
back_translation: In addition to the fact that he is still disliked by Professor Snape (Alan Rickman) and hated by Draco Malfoy (Tom Felton), Harry starts off well with his two good friends, Ron Weasley (Rupert Grint) and Hermione Granger (Emma Watson), and renowned author Gilderoy Lockhart (Kenneth Branagh) has joined the staff at Hogwarts and become the new Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher.

text: claude miller airs out a tight plot with an easy pace and a focus on character drama over crime-film complications .
translation: Claude Miller mengembangkan plot yang ketat dengan irama yang mudah dan memberikan tumpuan kepada drama karakter berbanding dengan perkara rumit filem jenayah.
back_translation: Claude Miller develops a tight plot with an easy rhythm and focuses on character drama rather than complex crime film matters.

text: just teetering south of puberty , young thomas harris has discovered that instead of looking at stars , he can use his new telescope to study the beautiful woman next door .
translation: Baru berada di kawasan selatan puber, Thomas Harris yang muda telah menemui bahawa bukannya melihat bintang, dia boleh menggunakan teleskop baru miliknya untuk mengkaji wanita cantik di sebelah rumah.
back_translation: Just located in the southern region of puberty, young Thomas Harris found that instead of looking at stars, he could use his new telescope to observe a beautiful woman next to his house.

text: they call themselves d . e . b . s .
translation: Mereka memanggil diri mereka d.e.b.s.
back_translation: They call themselves d.e.b.s.

text: it 's another stale , kill-by-numbers flick , complete with blade-thin characters and terrible , pun-laden dialogue .
translation: Ini adalah satu lagi filem membosankan yang mengikut kaedah biasa, lengkap dengan watak-watak yang cetek dan dialog yang teruk serta penuh dengan permainan kata.
back_translation: This is another boring film that follows the usual formula, complete with shallow characters and terrible dialogues filled with wordplay.

text: a light-hearted and high-spirited story , full of spice , sensuality and romance , viva zapato tells the tale of dolores , a beautiful cuban dancer who decides to leave her failing marriage and open a restaurant by the beach with her aunt from brazil .
translation: Sebuah cerita yang ringan dan penuh semangat, penuh dengan kehangatan, sensualiti dan roman, Viva Zapato mengisahkan kisah Dolores, seorang penari cantik dari Cuba yang memutuskan untuk meninggalkan perkahwinan yang gagal dan membuka restoran di tepi pantai bersama bidadarinya dari Brazil.
back_translation: A light-hearted and spirited story, full of warmth, sensuality, and romance, Viva Zapato tells the tale of Dolores, a beautiful dancer from Cuba who decides to leave her failed marriage and open a restaurant by the beach with her Brazilian beauty.

text: there 's a story that goes around the town of darkness falls about her , and she 's called the tooth fairy .
translation: Ada sebuah cerita yang beredar di bandar Darkness Falls tentangnya, dan dia dipanggil peri gigi.
back_translation: There is a story circulating in the town of Darkness Falls about her, and she is called the tooth fairy.

text: if myers decides to make another austin powers movie , maybe he should just stick with austin and dr evil .
translation: Jika Myers memutuskan untuk membuat filem Austin Powers yang lain, mungkin dia sepatutnya menumpukan kepada watak Austin dan Dr. Evil sahaja.
back_translation: If Myers decides to make another Austin Powers movie, he might want to focus only on the characters of Austin and Dr. Evil.

text: after tracking down the assassin , she is killed before any information can be driven out of her .
translation: Selepas menjejaki pembunuh itu, dia dibunuh sebelum sebarang maklumat boleh diperolehi daripadanya.
back_translation: After tracking down the killer, he was killed before any information could be obtained from him.

text: beautiful , angry and sad , with a curious sick poetry , as if the marquis de sade had gone in for pastel landscapes .
translation: indah, marah dan sedih, dengan puisi yang aneh dan merangsang rasa ingin tahu, seolah-olah Marquis de Sade terlibat dalam pemandangan pastel.
back_translation: beautiful, angry, and sad, with strange and intriguing poetry, as if Marquis de Sade is involved in a pastel scene.

text: this is lightweight filmmaking , to be sure , but it 's pleasant enough -- and oozing with attractive men .
translation: Ini adalah penghasilan filem yang ringan, tetapi sudah pasti menyeronokkan - dan penuh dengan lelaki yang menarik.
back_translation: This is a light-hearted film production, but it is sure to be entertaining - and full of intriguing men.

text: the result is just enough pixie dust to get this franchise filler off the ground , provided viewers have enough faith and trust in one of the studio 's most fondly remembered titles .
translation: Keputusannya adalah secukupnya debu peri untuk menghidupkan siri ini, asalkan penonton mempunyai cukup keyakinan dan kepercayaan dalam salah satu tajuk studio yang paling diingati dengan penuh kasih sayang.
back_translation: The decision is just enough fairy dust to bring this series to life, as long as the audience has enough faith and belief in one of the most beloved studio titles with full of love.

text: the protagonist , sally amonte , is still mourning the loss of her deceased husband and though she is young and beautiful , has resigned herself to working in the textile mill , caring for her elderly mother , and worrying about her rebellious teenage daughter .
translation: Watak utama, Sally Amonte, masih bersedih atas kehilangan suaminya yang telah meninggal dan walaupun beliau muda dan cantik, beliau telah menerima takdirnya bekerja di kilang tekstil, menjaga ibunya yang sudah tua, dan bimbang tentang anak perempuannya yang degil.
back_translation: The main character, Sally Amonte, is still saddened by the loss of her late husband and although she is young and beautiful, she has accepted her fate of working in a textile factory, taking care of her elderly mother, and worrying about her stubborn daughter.

text: and may bring claire face to face with her past .
translation: dan mungkin membawa Claire berhadapan dengan masa lalunya.
back_translation: and might bring Claire face to face with her past.

text: the film does n't show enough of the creative process or even of what was created for the non-fan to figure out what makes wilco a big deal .
translation: Filem itu tidak menunjukkan proses kreatif yang mencukupi atau bahkan apa yang dicipta untuk peminat bukan boleh mengetahui apa yang menjadikan wilco begitu penting.
back_translation: The film does not show sufficient creative process or even what is created for non-fans to understand what makes Wilco so important.

text: no aspirations to social import inform the movie version . this is a shameless sham , calculated to cash in on the popularity of its stars .
translation: Tiada aspirasi untuk memberi makna sosial dalam versi filem ini. Ini adalah penipuan yang tak malu, diatur untuk mengaut keuntungan dari populariti bintang-bintangnya.
back_translation: There is no aspiration to provide social meaning in this film version. It is a shameless scam, set up to profit from the popularity of its stars.

text: as he navigates this decadent new world , he meets a host of characters , including david , an older gay man who desires him , and benjamin , a young hustler from texas who has also managed to find a place among the aristocracy .
translation: Semasa beliau menavigasi dunia baru yang dekadent ini, beliau berjumpa dengan pelbagai watak, termasuk David, seorang lelaki gay tua yang meminati beliau, dan Benjamin, seorang pengumpat muda dari Texas yang juga berjaya mendapat tempat di kalangan aristokrasi.
back_translation: As he navigates this decadent new world, he encounters various characters, including David, an elderly gay man who is interested in him, and Benjamin, a young gossiper from Texas who also manages to find a place among the aristocracy.

text: despite its title , punch-drunk love is never heavy-handed . the jabs it employs are short , carefully placed and dead-center .
translation: Walaupun judulnya, Punch-Drunk Love tidak pernah terlalu keras. Pukulan yang digunakan pendek, diletakkan dengan teliti dan tepat sasaran.
back_translation: Despite its title, Punch-Drunk Love is never too harsh. The punches used are short, placed carefully and hit the mark accurately.

text: quite simply , a joy to watch and -- especially -- to listen to .
translation: Sungguh mudah, satu kegembiraan untuk ditonton dan - terutamanya - didengari.
back_translation: Truly easy, a joy to watch and - especially - to be heard.

text: there are a few chuckles , but not a single gag sequence that really scores , and the stars seem to be in two different movies .
translation: Terdapat beberapa tawa kecil, tetapi tidak ada urutan gurauan yang benar-benar menarik, dan bintang-bintang kelihatan seolah-olah berada dalam dua filem yang berbeza.
back_translation: There are some small laughs, but there is no sequence of jokes that are truly engaging, and the stars seem to be in two different movies.

text: it wo n't hold up over the long haul , but in the moment , finch 's tale provides the forgettable pleasures of a saturday matinee .
translation: Ia tidak akan bertahan dalam jangka masa panjang, tetapi pada ketika ini, cerita Finch memberikan keseronokan yang boleh dilupakan seperti pada matine Sabtu.
back_translation: It will not last long term, but at this moment, Finch's story provides a fleeting joy akin to a Saturday matinee.

text: just like hearst 's enormous yacht , it 's slow and unwieldy and takes a long time to reach its destination .
translation: Sama seperti yacht besar Hearst, ia lambat dan sukar dikendalikan serta mengambil masa yang lama untuk sampai ke destinasi.

text: as now-senator padm & # 233 ; amidala returns to coruscant to vote on an important senatorial matter , an assassination attempt on her life prompts the jedi council to send jedi knight obi-wan kenobi and his padawan anakin skywalker to protect her and find out who the assassin is .
