back_translation: When Senator Padmé Amidala now returns to Coruscant to vote on a crucial issue in the Senate, an assassination attempt on her life prompts the Jedi Council to send Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi and his padawan Anakin Skywalker to protect her and find out who the assassin is.

text: the cynicism is colossal , the casting superb : norton may be the only actor alive who could pull off a character like sherman , without making him either an idiot or a parody .

back_translation: His cynical attitude is significant, the choice of actor is great: Norton may be the only living actor who can portray a character like Sherman without making him seem stupid or a parody.

text: at the same time , mickey steals money from an apartment to help himself and carlos to fulfill their ambitions - with tragic consequences .

text: the film . . . presents classic moral-condundrum drama : what would you have done to survive ? the problem with the film is whether these ambitions , laudable in themselves , justify a theatrical simulation of the death camp of auschwitz ii-birkenau .
translation: filem tersebut mengemukakan drama situasi moral klasik: apakah yang akan anda lakukan untuk bertahan hidup? Masalah dengan filem ini adalah sama ada hasrat tersebut, walaupun mulia pada asasnya, boleh membenarkan simulasi pentas kem kematian auschwitz ii-birkenau.
back_translation: The movie presents a classic moral dilemma: what would you do to survive? The problem with this movie is whether that desire, though noble in principle, can justify the staging simulation of the Auschwitz II-Birkenau death camp.

text: as literary desecrations go , this makes for perfectly acceptable , occasionally very enjoyable children 's entertainment . you 'll forget about it by monday , though , and if they 're old enough to have developed some taste , so will your kids .

text: shows that you should not fear death , but to fear an unlived life .

text: the film runs on a little longer than it needs to -- muccino either does n't notice when his story ends or just ca n't tear himself away from the characters -- but it 's smooth and professional .

text: both the film and nachtwey 's photos hammer home the grim reality of the world 's gutters and battlefields , and will make you question what 'news ' really is .
translation: Filem dan foto-foto Nachtwey menggambarkan dengan nyata realiti bersimbah darah dunia, dan akan membuat anda mempertanyakan apakah sebenarnya 'berita'.

translation: Cho, yang filem konsert pertamanya lebih seperti sesi terapi berkumpulan daripada komedi, menjadi jauh lebih ceria untuk konsert keduanya.
back_translation: Cho, whose first concert film was more like a group therapy session than a comedy, becomes much livelier for his second concert.

text: in a small fishing village an established fishmonger , davis , starts to have his supply bought from under him by new boy alan leech .
translation: Di sebuah kampung nelayan kecil, seorang penjual ikan yang sudah lama beroperasi, Davis, mula kehilangan bekalan ikan beliau kepada pemuda baru bernama Alan Leech.
back_translation: In a small fishing village, a fish seller who has been operating for a long time, Davis, starts losing his fish supply to a new young man named Alan Leech.

text: a guilty pleasure at best , and not worth seeing unless you want to laugh at it .
translation: Satu keseronokan bersalah yang terbaik, dan tidak berbaloi dilihat kecuali jika anda mahu ketawa pada itu.
back_translation: The best guilty pleasure, and not worth seeing unless you want to laugh at it.

text: tiger shark prowls on what should be a routine rescue mission .
translation: Paus harimau mengintai dalam misi penyelamatan yang sepatutnya berjalan lancar.
back_translation: The tiger shark lurks in a rescue mission that should proceed smoothly.

text: not only must they overcome an enemy adept at technological witchery , they must overcome the curse that marks their destiny .
translation: Mereka tidak hanya harus mengatasi musuh yang mahir dalam ilmu sihir teknologi, tetapi juga harus mengatasi kutukan yang menandai takdir mereka.
back_translation: They not only have to overcome enemies skilled in the technology of magic, but also must overcome curses that mark their destinies.

text: what he does n't know yet is that these traits are part of the disguisey family secret legacy .
translation: Apa yang dia masih tidak tahu ialah bahawa ciri-ciri ini adalah sebahagian daripada warisan rahsia keluarga Disguisey.
back_translation: What he still doesn't know is that these traits are part of the Disguisey family's secret heritage.

text: these devices immediately became an essential household appliance , and were advertised in nearly every women 's magazine and sewing notions catalog of the time .
translation: Peranti ini dengan serta-merta menjadi barangan elektrik penting di rumah, dan diiklankan dalam hampir setiap majalah wanita dan katalog peralatan jahitan pada waktu itu.
back_translation: This device quickly became an essential electrical item in households, and was advertised in almost every women's magazine and sewing equipment catalog at that time.

text: minority report is exactly what the title indicates , a report .
translation: "Minority Report adalah tepat seperti yang dinyatakan oleh judulnya, satu laporan."
back_translation: "Minority Report is exactly as stated by its title, a report."

text: young marrieds lori and tom relocate from chicago to the country where they end up living next to carl , a right-wing radical who beats his wife , helen .
translation: Pasangan yang baru berkahwin, Lori dan Tom berpindah dari Chicago ke desa di mana mereka berakhir tinggal bersebelahan dengan Carl, seorang radikal sayap kanan yang memukul isterinya, Helen.
back_translation: Newlyweds, Lori and Tom, moved from Chicago to a village where they ended up living next to Carl, a right-wing radical who beats his wife, Helen.

text: an utterly compelling 'who wrote it ' in which the reputation of the most famous author who ever lived comes into question .
translation: Satu siasatan yang sangat memikat 'siapakah yang menulisnya' di mana reputasi penulis yang paling terkenal yang pernah hidup dipertikaikan.
back_translation: An intriguing investigation 'who wrote it' where the reputation of the most famous living writer is called into question.

text: this movie praise the right to be different and unique .
translation: Filem ini memuji hak untuk menjadi berbeza dan unik.
back_translation: This film celebrates the right to be different and unique.

text: bullock stars as lucy kelson , chief counsel for the wade corporation , one of new york city 's top commercial real estate developers .
translation: Bullock membintangi sebagai Lucy Kelson, peguam ketua bagi perbadanan Wade, salah satu pembangun hartanah komersial terkemuka di bandar raya New York.
back_translation: Bullock stars as Lucy Kelson, the chief attorney for Wade Corporation, one of the leading commercial real estate developers in the city of New York.

text: all right , so it 's not a brilliant piece of filmmaking , but it is a funny ( sometimes hilarious ) comedy with a deft sense of humor about itself , a playful spirit and a game cast .
translation: Baiklah, jadi bukanlah satu karya sinematografi yang cemerlang, tetapi ini adalah sebuah filem komedi yang lucu (kadang-kadang menggelikan) dengan satu rasa humor yang licin tentang dirinya sendiri, semangat yang bermain-main, dan barisan pelakon yang baik.
back_translation: Alright, so it's not a brilliant piece of cinematography, but it is a funny (sometimes hilarious) comedy film with a slick sense of humor about itself, playful spirit, and a good cast of actors.

text: the film is an enjoyable family film -- pretty much aimed at any youngster who loves horses .
translation: Filem ini adalah filem keluarga yang menyeronokkan - lebih kurang ditujukan kepada semua anak muda yang menyukai kuda.
back_translation: This movie is a fun family film - aimed at young people who love horses.

text: set against the majestic landscape of canada 's bay of fundy and the highest tides in the world , black swan is a dark comedy that weaves the innocent world of childhood , against the adult world of love , betrayal and murder .
translation: Ditentang oleh landskap megah Teluk Fundy di Kanada dan air pasang tertinggi di dunia, Black Swan adalah sebuah komedi gelap yang menyatukan dunia polos kanak-kanak dengan dunia dewasa cinta, pengkhianatan, dan pembunuhan.
back_translation: Set against the majestic landscape of the Bay of Fundy in Canada and the world's highest tides, Black Swan is a dark comedy that merges the innocent world of childhood with the adult world of love, betrayal, and murder.

text: the new guy does have a heart . now , if it only had a brain .
translation: Orang baru ini memang mempunyai hati. Sekarang, jika hanya ada otak.
back_translation: This person indeed has a heart. Now, if only there was a brain.

text: the chaotic lead characters are not the sorts one will usually see in a disney film and that makes for a certain amount of unpredictability before it all returns to business as usual .
translation: Watak utama yang berterabur itu bukan jenis yang biasa dilihat dalam filem Disney dan ini mencipta sedikit keadaan yang tidak dijangka sebelum segalanya kembali seperti biasa.
back_translation: The main character who is scattered is not the usual type seen in Disney movies and this creates a little unexpected situation before everything returns to normal.

text: after running circles , dave , trudy , and jolynn find with the light of a new day the lives they been meaning to live .
translation: Selepas berputar-putar, Dave, Trudy, dan Jolynn dapati dengan sinar mentari pagi kehidupan yang mereka telah bermaksud untuk hidup.
back_translation: After wandering around, Dave, Trudy, and Jolynn discovered with the morning sun rays the life they intended to live.

text: ronnie schwann , a young man regarded as `` slow , `` has affections for sarah , a young woman who stays at hope house , a facility for the mentally ill .
translation: Ronnie Schwann, seorang lelaki muda yang dianggap sebagai "perlahan," mempunyai perasaan untuk Sarah, seorang wanita muda yang tinggal di rumah Harapan, sebuah kemudahan untuk orang sakit mental.
back_translation: Ronnie Schwann, a young man considered "slow," has feelings for Sarah, a young woman living in House of Hope, a facility for the mentally ill.

text: it is 1492 , and spain has decreed that all jews must either convert to catholicism , go into exile or face trial and execution .
translation: Pada tahun 1492, Sepanyol telah memutuskan bahawa semua orang Yahudi harus either memeluk agama Katolik, mengasingkan diri atau menghadapi perbicaraan dan hukuman mati.
back_translation: In 1492, Spain had decided that all Jews must either convert to Catholicism, exile themselves, or face trial and execution.

text: calvin 's barbershop is filled with an eclectic and hilarious cast of characters that share their stories , jokes , trials and tribulations .
translation: Kedai gunting rambut Calvin penuh dengan pelbagai watak yang lucu dan menarik yang berkongsi cerita, jenaka, ujian, dan dugaan mereka.
back_translation: Calvin's barbershop is filled with various funny and interesting characters who share their stories, jokes, challenges, and trials.

text: it may only be the third date , but tony knows it 's time to pop the question and make the beautiful , shy katrina his wife .
translation: Mungkin baru tarikh ketiga, tetapi Tony tahu sudah tiba masanya untuk melamar Katrina yang cantik dan pemalu menjadi isterinya.
back_translation: It may only be the third date, but Tony already knows it's time to propose to the beautiful and shy Katrina to be his wife.

text: his unemployment and the fact that there is no woman in the house to care for the children , evelyn , noel and brendan , make it clear to the authorities that his is an untenable situation .
translation: Ketidakupayaannya untuk mendapatkan pekerjaan dan fakta bahawa tiada wanita di rumah untuk menjaga anak-anak, Evelyn, Noel dan Brendan, menjadikan ia jelas kepada pihak berkuasa bahawa situasinya tidak dapat diterima.
back_translation: His inability to secure a job and the fact that there are no women at home to take care of the children, Evelyn, Noel, and Brendan, make it clear to the authorities that the situation is unacceptable.

text: they think that if they rebuild it to work like it did in their youth , they might be able to communicate with their sister who died mysteriously on that beach 20 years ago .
translation: Mereka berfikir bahawa jika mereka membangunkannya agar berfungsi seperti dulu ketika mereka masih muda, mereka mungkin dapat berkomunikasi dengan adik perempuan mereka yang meninggal secara misterius di pantai itu 20 tahun yang lalu.
back_translation: They think that if they can wake it up to function like it did when they were young, they might be able to communicate with their younger sister who died mysteriously on that beach 20 years ago.

text: a poignant and gently humorous parable that loves its characters and communicates something rather beautiful about human nature .
translation: sebuah perumpamaan yang menyentuh dan sedikit lucu yang mencintai watak-wataknya dan menyampaikan sesuatu yang agak indah tentang sifat manusia.
back_translation: A touching and slightly funny metaphor that loves its characters and conveys something quite beautiful about human nature.

text: his family decides to go back on a holiday to india for 2 weeks , when tina discovers the truth about pooja 's e-mails , they decide together that tina will play along with the charade .
translation: Keluarganya memutuskan untuk pergi bercuti ke India selama 2 minggu, ketika Tina mengetahui kebenaran tentang e-mel Pooja, mereka memutuskan bersama bahawa Tina akan berpura-pura seolah-olah turut serta.
back_translation: Her family decided to go on vacation to India for 2 weeks, and when Tina found out the truth about Pooja's email, they decided together that Tina would pretend to join in.

text: the film jolts the laughs from the audience -- as if by cattle prod .
translation: Filem tersebut membuat penonton ketawa dengan kuat - seakan-akan dengan setrum lembu.
back_translation: The movie made the audience laugh out loud - as if with a shock from a cow.

text: kung pow : enter the fist is a movie within a movie , created to spoof the martial arts genre .
translation: "Kung Pow: Enter the Fist" adalah sebuah filem dalam filem, dicipta untuk memperlekehkan genre seni bela diri.
back_translation: "Kung Pow: Enter the Fist" is a movie within a movie, created to parody the martial arts genre.

text: none of these characters resembles anyone you 've ever met in real life , unless you happen to know annoyingly self-involved people who speak in glib sentences that could have only come from the pen of a screenwriter .
translation: Tiada satu pun daripada watak-watak ini menyerupai sesiapa yang pernah anda jumpai dalam kehidupan sebenar, kecuali jika anda mengenali individu yang suka memikirkan diri sendiri dengan memberikan ucapan yang lancar seperti hasil tulisan penulis skrin.
back_translation: None of these characters resemble anyone you've ever encountered in real life, unless you know someone who is self-centered and speaks in smooth words like a screenwriter's script.

text: an operatic , sprawling picture that 's entertainingly acted , magnificently shot and gripping enough to sustain most of its 170-minute length .
translation: Sebuah gambar berpura-pura operatik, yang dilakonkan dengan menyeronokkan, ditembak dengan megah dan cukup menarik untuk mengekalkan sebahagian besar daripada tempoh 170 minitnya.
back_translation: A mock-operatic image, performed entertainingly, shot grandly and captivating enough to sustain most of its 170-minute duration.

text: a young french journalist , marina , is writing a report on 'the next film starred by melina : the story of lilly ' .
translation: Seorang wartawan muda Perancis, Marina, sedang menulis laporan tentang 'filem terbaru yang dibintangi oleh Melina: kisah Lilly'.
back_translation: A young French journalist, Marina, is currently writing a report about 'the latest movie starring Melina: Lilly's story'.

text: despite the long running time , the pace never feels slack -- there 's no scene that screams `` bathroom break ! ``
translation: Walaupun berjalan dengan jangka masa yang panjang, kelajuan tidak pernah terasa lembam - tiada satu pun adegan yang memerlukan "cuti tandas!"
back_translation: Even walking for a long period of time, the speed never feels slow - there is not a single scene that requires a "bathroom break!"

text: but starla soon learns that this french girl is not only smart , attractive , and naive , but quite conniving when geneviere , with no social life of her own , beings to take over starla 's , starting with stealing the affections her parents , her friends and starla 's boyfriend .
translation: Tetapi Starla segera menyedari bahawa gadis Perancis ini tidak hanya bijak, menarik, dan naive, tetapi agak licik apabila Geneviere, yang tidak mempunyai kehidupan sosial sendiri, mula mengambil alih milik Starla, bermula dengan mencuri kasih sayang ibu bapanya, rakan-rakannya, dan teman lelaki Starla.
back_translation: But Starla soon realized that this French girl was not only intelligent, interesting, and naive, but rather cunning when Genevieve, who did not have a social life of her own, began to take over Starla's possessions, starting with stealing the love of her parents, friends, and Starla's boyfriend.

text: robinson 's web of suspense matches the page-turning frenzy that clancy creates .
translation: Web kejutan Robinson sepadan dengan keghairahan penuh aksi yang dicipta oleh Clancy.
back_translation: Robinson's surprise website matches the full excitement of action created by Clancy.

text: dr . siddharth sinha ( amitabh bachchan ) , a philanthropist and a dedicated surgeon who has devoted his life to build a state-of-the-art hospital to treat the underprivileged patients .
translation: Dr. Siddharth Sinha (Amitabh Bachchan), seorang ahli bedah yang dermawan dan bersungguh-sungguh yang telah mengabdikan hidupnya untuk membina sebuah hospital bertaraf dunia untuk merawat pesakit yang kurang bernasib baik.
back_translation: Dr. Siddharth Sinha (Amitabh Bachchan), a generous and dedicated surgeon who has devoted his life to building a world-class hospital to treat less fortunate patients.

text: a banker , husband , and father , mr . smith ( larry pine ) must leave it behind him .
translation: Seorang bankir, suami, dan ayah, Bapak Smith (Larry Pine) harus meninggalkannya di belakang.
back_translation: A banker, husband, and father, Mr. Smith (Larry Pine) had to leave them behind.

text: technically , the film is about as interesting as an insurance commercial .
translation: Secara teknikal , filem ini sebosan iklan insurans.

text: with all this going on , gerry 's estranged wife margaret is worried for her daughter 's safety and finds herself another target in the race to find the code .
translation: Dengan segala hal yang sedang berlangsung ini, isteri terasing Gerry, Margaret, bimbang atas keselamatan anak perempuannya dan mendapati dirinya sebagai sasaran lain dalam perlumbaan untuk mencari kod.
back_translation: With all that is going on, Gerry's estranged wife, Margaret, is worried about the safety of their daughter and finds herself a target in the race to find the code.

text: a moving story of determination and the human spirit .
translation: sebuah kisah yang menggerakkan tentang tekad dan semangat manusia.
back_translation: A moving story about human determination and spirit.

text: ice cube , as usual , is an appealing presence , but the rest of the cast shines as well .
translation: Ice Cube, seperti biasa, adalah kehadiran yang menarik, tetapi seluruh barisan pelakon juga bersinar.
back_translation: Ice Cube, as usual, is a captivating presence, but the entire cast also shines.

text: a shrewd and splendidly volatile b movie structured around a highly original gambit of suspense .
translation: Filem B yang licik dan luar biasa yang tersusun mengikut permainan ketegangan yang sangat asli.
back_translation: Film B is a slick and exceptional film that is structured around a very genuine tension-filled game.

text: to the vast majority of more casual filmgoers , it will probably be a talky bore .
translation: Kepada majoriti penonton filem yang lebih santai, mungkin filem itu akan dianggap membosankan.
back_translation: For the majority of casual moviegoers, the film may be considered boring.

text: it 's the type of film about growing up that we do n't see often enough these days : realistic , urgent , and not sugarcoated in the least .
translation: Ini adalah jenis filem tentang proses membesar yang jarang kita lihat pada hari ini: realistik, mendesak, dan tidak dicantum gula sama sekali.
back_translation: This is the type of film about the growing-up process that we seldom see today: realistic, compelling, and not sugar-coated at all.

text: sid , a sloth who never stops talking is left behind sleeping while everyone else begins the journey to the south .
translation: Sid, seekor sloth yang tidak pernah berhenti bercakap, ditinggalkan tertidur ketika semua orang lain memulai perjalanan ke selatan.
back_translation: Sid, a sloth who never stopped talking, was left asleep when everyone else started the journey to the south.

text: like any good romance , son of the bride , proves it 's never too late to learn .
translation: Seperti dalam setiap cerita romantis yang baik, "Son of the Bride" membuktikan bahawa tidak pernah terlambat untuk belajar.
back_translation: Like in every good romantic story, "Son of the Bride" proves that it is never too late to learn.

text: mr . jacobi 's recitation is illustrated with a rush of sensuous nature imagery , beautifully photographed by mr . cox and hans sonneveld and underscored with a lush soundtrack by paul grabowsky .
translation: Pembacaan Mr. Jacobi diilustrasikan dengan banjir imej semula jadi yang sensual, indah difoto oleh Mr. Cox dan Hans Sonneveld dan diperkuatkan dengan trek bunyi yang subur oleh Paul Grabowsky.
back_translation: Mr. Jacobi's reading is illustrated with a flood of sensual, natural images beautifully captured by Mr. Cox and Hans Sonneveld and enhanced by a lush sound track by Paul Grabowsky.

text: no ill effects are immediately apparent to lena 's relatives in their spacious house on the prosperous side of town .
translation: Tiada kesan buruk yang terlihat dengan serta-merta kepada saudara-mara Lena di rumah lapang mereka di bahagian bandar yang makmur.
back_translation: There were no immediate negative effects visible to Lena's relatives in their spacious home in the prosperous urban area.

text: it plods along methodically , somehow under the assumption that its `` dead wife communicating from beyond the grave `` framework is even remotely new or interesting .
translation: Ia berjalan perlahan secara metodikal, entah bagaimana di bawah anggapan bahawa rangka kerjanya "isteri yang mati berkomunikasi dari alam sana" adalah baru atau menarik secara langsung.
back_translation: It moves slowly methodically, somehow under the assumption that its framework of "dead wife communicating from the other realm" is either new or directly appealing.

text: the tucks try to teach her how she should n't fear death , how they would give anything to die .
translation: Tucks cuba mengajarinya agar dia tidak takut akan kematian, bagaimana mereka rela untuk mati.
back_translation: Tucks try to teach him so that he is not afraid of death, how they are willing to die.

text: their stories of desire , talent , conviction , obsession and addiction are woven together and build up to a climactic series of events that bring them to opening night .
translation: Kisah-kisah mereka tentang keinginan, bakat, keyakinan, obsesi, dan kecanduan dikaitkan bersama dan membentuk serangkaian peristiwa klimaks yang membawa mereka ke malam pembukaan.
back_translation: Their stories of desire, talent, beliefs, obsessions, and addictions are intertwined and form a series of climax events that lead them to the opening night.

text: although mother and son are initially at odds , their relationship begins to change when he discovers that his bride-to-be likes his mother 's rock-n-roll lifestyle too .
translation: Walaupun ibu dan anak pada mulanya berbeza pendapat, hubungan mereka mulai berubah apabila dia mendapati bakal isterinya juga suka gaya hidup rock-n-roll ibunya.
back_translation: Although initially having differing opinions, the relationship between the mother and son began to change when he discovered that his future wife also liked his mother's rock-n-roll lifestyle.

text: jack , a lonely driver on a desert highway , runs out of gas .
translation: Jack, seorang pemandu yang seorangan di sebuah lebuh raya padang pasir, kehabisan minyak.
back_translation: Jack, a lone driver on a desert highway, ran out of gas.

text: and then , did you ever let fear get in your way and keep you from having the person you 've always wanted to be with ?
translation: Pernahkah anda biarkan rasa takut menghalang dan menghalang anda daripada menjadi bersama orang yang selama ini anda impikan?
back_translation: Have you ever let fear get in the way and stop you from being with the person you have always dreamed of?

text: a gob of drivel so sickly sweet , even the eager consumers of moore 's pasteurized ditties will retch it up like rancid crM-hme brM- { lM-ie .
translation: sejumlah omong kosong yang sangat manis, bahkan para konsumen yang antusias dengan lagu-lagu Moore yang dipasteurisasi akan muntah seperti krim asam yang basi.
back_translation: A lot of sweet nonsense, even enthusiastic consumers of Moore's pasteurized songs will vomit like spoiled sour cream.

text: alone in a cell , she undergoes a spiritual experience similar to that of the great mystics .
translation: Sendirian dalam sel, dia mengalami pengalaman spiritual yang serupa dengan para ahli spiritual yang hebat.
back_translation: Alone in the cell, he experienced a spiritual experience similar to great spiritual masters.

text: if somebody was bored and . . . decided to make a dull , pretentious version of jesus ' son , they 'd come up with something like bart freundlich 's world traveler .
translation: Jika seseorang bosan dan... memutuskan untuk membuat versi yang membosankan dan berlagak dari kisah Jesus' Son, mereka akan menciptakan sesuatu seperti dalam filem World Traveler karya Bart Freundlich.
back_translation: If someone were bored and... decided to create a dull and pretentious version of Jesus' Son's story, they would come up with something like in Bart Freundlich's film, World Traveler.

text: jeffs has created a breathtakingly assured and stylish work of spare dialogue and acute expressiveness .
translation: Jeffs telah mencipta sebuah karya yang menakjubkan dan bergaya dengan dialog yang ringkas dan ekspresi yang tajam.
back_translation: Jeffs has created an amazing and stylish work with concise dialogues and sharp expressions.

text: an effective portrait of a life in stasis -- of the power of inertia to arrest development in a dead-end existence .
translation: suatu potret yang berkesan tentang kehidupan dalam stasis -- tentang kuasa inersia untuk menghalang perkembangan dalam kehidupan yang tiada harapan.
back_translation: A striking portrait of life in stasis - about the power of inertia to hinder progress in a hopeless life.

text: takes us on a journey toward self-awareness that is both deadpan hilarious and profoundly moving .
translation: Membawa kita dalam perjalanan menuju kesedaran diri yang sama-sama lucu dan menyentuh hati.
back_translation: Taking us on a journey towards self-awareness that is both funny and touching.

text: including finding the anti-christ , who is now a 11-year-old boy .
translation: Termasuk mencari anti-kristus, yang kini merupakan seorang kanak-kanak lelaki berumur 11 tahun.
back_translation: Including searching for the anti-Christ, who is now an 11-year-old boy.

text: a senior at an elite college ( katie holmes ) , already under severe pressure to complete her thesis and land a prestigious job , must confront the sudden reappearance of her old boyfriend ( charlie hunnam ) , after his two year , unexplained absence . . .
translation: Seorang pelajar senior di sebuah kolej elit (Katie Holmes), yang sudah dalam tekanan yang sangat besar untuk menyiapkan tesisnya dan mendapatkan pekerjaan bergengsi, terpaksa berhadapan dengan kebangkitan tiba-tiba bekas kekasihnya (Charlie Hunnam), setelah menghilang selama dua tahun tanpa sebab yang jelas...
back_translation: A senior student at an elite college (Katie Holmes), who is under immense pressure to complete her thesis and land a prestigious job, is forced to confront the sudden reappearance of her ex-boyfriend (Charlie Hunnam), after disappearing for two years without a clear reason.

text: he can talk and drive around all by himself .
translation: Dia boleh bercakap dan memandu sendiri.
back_translation: He can speak and drive on his own.

text: it 's sweet , funny , charming , and completely delightful .
translation: Ia manis, lucu, memikat, dan benar-benar menyeronokkan.
back_translation: It is sweet, cute, charming, and truly enjoyable.

text: it is said that only salazar slytherin 's true descendent will be able to open it .
translation: Dikatakan bahawa hanya keturunan sebenar Salazar Slytherin yang dapat membukanya.
back_translation: It is said that only the true descendants of Salazar Slytherin can open it.

text: 'brass tacks ' is a 35mm feature length , narrative drama .
translation: 'brass tacks' adalah sebuah filem naratif drama berdurasi 35mm.
back_translation: 'brass tacks' is a 35mm narrative drama film.

text: it challenges , this nervy oddity , like modern art should .
translation: cabaran ini, keanehan yang berani, sebagaimana karya seni moden sepatutnya.

text: sam mendes has become valedictorian at the school for soft landings and easy ways out .
translation: Sam Mendes telah menjadi wakil rektor di sekolah untuk pendaratan yang lembut dan jalan keluar yang mudah.
back_translation: Sam Mendes has become the deputy principal at the school for soft landings and easy exits.

text: written , flatly , by david kendall and directed , barely , by there 's something about mary co-writer ed decter .
translation: Ditulis oleh David Kendall dengan arahan dari Ed Decter, penulis bersama dalam filem There's Something About Mary.
back_translation: Written by David Kendall with direction from Ed Decter, co-writer in the film There's Something About Mary.

text: a uniquely sensual metaphorical dramatization of sexual obsession that spends a bit too much time on its fairly ludicrous plot .
translation: suatu metafora dramatik yang unik dan sensual mengenai obsesi seksual yang menghabiskan terlalu banyak masa pada plot yang agak keterlaluan.
back_translation: a unique and sensual dramatic metaphor about sexual obsession that spends too much time on a somewhat excessive plot.

text: dripping with cliche and bypassing no opportunity to trivialize the material .
translation: Penuh dengan kliše dan tidak melepaskan sebarang peluang untuk merendahkan bahan tersebut.
back_translation: Full of clichés and not letting go of any opportunity to belittle the material.

text: rife with nutty cliches and far too much dialogue .

text: a brilliant pianist , a polish jew , witnesses the restrictions nazis place on jews in the polish capital , from restricted access to the building of the warsaw ghetto .
translation: Seorang pemain piano yang cemerlang, seorang orang Yahudi Poland, menyaksikan sekatan yang dikenakan oleh tentera Nazi ke atas orang Yahudi di ibu negara Poland, dari akses terhad ke bangunan ghetto Warsaw.
back_translation: A brilliant piano player, a Polish Jew, witnessed the restrictions imposed by the Nazi army on Jews in the capital of Poland, from limited access to the Warsaw ghetto buildings.

text: gran historia sobre el amor , la familia , la lealtad y la traiciM-sn que seguramente se convertirM-a en un nuevo clM-asico del gM-inero .
translation: Sebuah cerita besar mengenai cinta, keluarga, kesetiaan, dan pengkhianatan yang pastinya akan menjadi klasik baru dalam genre tersebut.
back_translation: A great story about love, family, loyalty, and betrayal that will surely become a new classic in the genre.

text: one of the most successful , provocative and intensely contemporary of israeli films , so much so that to watch it is to feel the country having a passionate argument with itself .
translation: Salah satu filem Israel yang paling berjaya, provokatif dan sangat kontemporari, sehingga menontonnya membuat anda berasa negara itu sedang mengadakan perbincangan yang penuh semangat dengan diri sendiri.
back_translation: One of the most successful, provocative, and very contemporary Israeli films, watching it makes you feel like the country is having a spirited conversation with itself.

text: in their brief meeting , johnny will get the chance to face his truth , but the truth is never what it seems .
translation: Dalam pertemuan singkat mereka, Johnny akan mendapat peluang untuk menghadapi kebenarannya, tetapi kebenaran tidak pernah seperti yang kelihatan.
back_translation: In their brief meeting, Johnny will have the opportunity to confront his truth, but truth is never as it seems.

text: those who score well are recruited into a secret paramilitary academy .
translation: Mereka yang mendapat markah baik akan diserap ke dalam akademi paramiliter rahsia.
back_translation: Those who receive good scores will be absorbed into the secret paramilitary academy.

text: well , robert 's not a suitable chinese girl - but is he gay ?
translation: Robert tidak sesuai dengan gadis Cina - tetapi adakah dia gay?
back_translation: Robert is not compatible with Chinese girls - but is he gay?

text: a lyrical if sluggish excursion set in war-torn iranian kurdistan .
translation: sebuah perjalanan liris yang perlahan diatur di Kurdistan Irak yang dilanda perang.
back_translation: A slow-paced lyrical journey set in war-torn Kurdistan, Iraq.

text: the mystery inc . gang have gone their separate ways and have been apart for two years , until they each receive an invitation to spooky island .
translation: Kumpulan Misteri Inc. telah berpisah dan telah berjauhan selama dua tahun, sehingga setiap satu menerima jemputan ke Pulau Seram.
back_translation: Mystery Inc. group has been separated and apart for two years, so each one received an invitation to Seram Island.

text: befriended by the ship 's charismatic cyborg cook , john silver , jim blossoms under his guidance and shows the makings of a fine shipmate as he and the alien crew battle a supernova , a black hole , and a ferocious space storm .
translation: Dirakan oleh juru masak cyborg yang karismatik kapal, John Silver, Jim berkembang di bawah bimbingannya dan menunjukkan sifat-sifat baik seorang kawan kapal yang baik ketika dia dan anak kapal asing melawan supernova, liang hitam, dan ribut ruang yang ganas.
back_translation: Mentored by the charismatic cyborg chef aboard the ship, John Silver, Jim thrived under his guidance and displayed the qualities of a good shipmate as he and a foreign crew's child battled supernovas, black holes, and fierce space storms.

text: this is cruel , misanthropic stuff with only weak claims to surrealism and black comedy .
translation: Ini adalah bahan yang kejam, misantropik, dengan tuntutan surrealisme dan komedi hitam yang lemah.
back_translation: This is a brutal, misanthropic material, with demands of surrealism and weak black comedy.

text: an ancient tablet found by famous british archaeologist professor hyde-white is believed to be a roadmap to the legendary lost temple of faramundi and its hidden treasures .
translation: Sebuah loh kuno yang ditemui oleh ahli arkeologi terkenal dari Britain, Professor Hyde-White, dipercayai sebagai peta jalan ke kuil hilang legenda Faramundi serta harta terpendam di dalamnya.
back_translation: An ancient tablet discovered by the renowned archaeologist from Britain, Professor Hyde-White, is believed to be a roadmap to the lost temple of the legendary Faramundi and the treasures hidden within it.

text: . . . while each moment of this broken character study is rich in emotional texture , the journey does n't really go anywhere .
translation: . . . sementara setiap saat dari kajian watak yang rosak ini kaya dengan tekstur emosi, perjalanan sebenarnya tidak membawa ke mana-mana.
back_translation: ... while every moment of studying this flawed character is rich with emotional texture, the actual journey does not lead anywhere.

text: those who savor well-drawn characters and exotic locales will find the touch of the mystic masseur to be most pleasurable indeed .
translation: Mereka yang menikmati watak yang dilukis dengan baik dan tempat-tempat eksoti akan mendapati sentuhan juru urut misteri sangat memuaskan.
back_translation: Those who enjoy well-painted characters and exotic locations will find the touch of a mystery masseur very satisfying.

text: the art direction and costumes are gorgeous and finely detailed , and kurys ' direction is clever and insightful .
translation: Pengarah seni dan kostum adalah sangat cantik dan terperinci, dan arahan Kurys adalah cerdik dan berwawasan.
back_translation: The art director and costumes are very beautiful and detailed, and Kurys' direction is smart and insightful.

text: durval and his mother carmita live at the back of `` durval discos `` , a record store they own in s & # 227 ; o paulo , specializing in vinyl records .
translation: Durval dan ibunya, Carmita tinggal di belakang "Durval Discos", sebuah kedai rekod yang mereka miliki di São Paulo, yang mengkhususkan diri dalam rekod vinil.
back_translation: Durval and his mother, Carmita, live behind "Durval Discos," a record store they own in São Paulo, specializing in vinyl records.

text: he checks into a rehab clinic that specializes in treating law enforcement officials .
translation: Dia mendaftar masuk ke klinik pemulihan yang mengkhususkan diri dalam merawat pegawai penguatkuasaan.
back_translation: He registered at a recovery clinic specializing in treating law enforcement officers.

text: de niro may enjoy the same free ride from critics afforded to clint eastwood in the lazy bloodwork . but like bruce springsteen 's gone-to-pot asbury park , new jersey , this sad-sack waste of a movie is a city of ruins .
translation: De Niro mungkin menikmati perlakuan yang sama dari para kritikus seperti yang diberikan kepada Clint Eastwood dalam filem malas Bloodwork. Tetapi seperti Asbury Park, New Jersey yang telah terabai milik Bruce Springsteen, filem yang menyedihkan ini adalah sebuah bandar yang telah hancur.
back_translation: De Niro may be getting the same treatment from critics as Clint Eastwood did in the lazy film Bloodwork. But like Asbury Park, New Jersey, forgotten by Bruce Springsteen, this depressing film is a city that has been destroyed.

text: now , after having an encounter with a hollywood producer who got lost in virgil grove , is asked if he would like to come back to hollywood to direct a feature movie .
translation: Sekarang, selepas berjumpa dengan seorang pengeluar filem Hollywood yang sesat di Virgil Grove, dia ditanya sama ada dia ingin kembali ke Hollywood untuk mengarahkan filem cetera.
back_translation: Now, after meeting a lost Hollywood filmmaker in Virgil Grove, he was asked whether he wanted to return to Hollywood to direct a movie, etc.

text: . . . a fascinating curiosity piece -- fascinating , that is , for about ten minutes . after that it becomes long and tedious like a classroom play in a college history course .
translation: . . . sebuah barang yang menarik untuk diperhatikan – menarik, ya, untuk lebih kurang sepuluh minit. selepas itu, ia menjadi panjang dan membosankan seperti persembahan dalam kelas dalam kursus sejarah kolej.
back_translation: . . . an item that is interesting to observe - interesting, yes, for about ten minutes. after that, it becomes long and boring like a presentation in a history course class in college.

text: thomas ' wish comes true and he stays up all night watching her .
translation: Hajat Thomas menjadi kenyataan dan dia terus berjaga sepanjang malam menontonnya.
back_translation: Thomas's wish came true and he stayed up all night watching it.

text: as a fire chief , quinn ( christian bales ) is responsable for warding off the beasts and keeping a community alive as they eke out a meager existence .
translation: Sebagai ketua bomba, Quinn (Christian Bale) bertanggungjawab untuk menghalau binatang buas dan menjaga komuniti tetap hidup ketika mereka berusaha untuk mencari kehidupan yang sederhana.
back_translation: As the fire chief, Quinn (Christian Bale) is responsible for chasing wild animals and keeping the community alive as they strive to pursue a simple life.

text: the director seems to take an unseemly pleasure in [ the characters ' ] misery and at the same time to congratulate himself for having the guts to confront it .
translation: Pengarah kelihatan menikmati kesedihan watak-watak itu dengan tidak senonoh dan pada masa yang sama mengucapkan syabas kepada dirinya sendiri kerana berani menghadapinya.
back_translation: The director seemed to be enjoying the characters' misfortunes in an indecent manner while at the same time congratulating himself for bravely facing them.

text: all the more disquieting for its relatively gore-free allusions to the serial murders , but it falls down in its attempts to humanize its subject .
translation: Semakin meresahkan kerana alus-sentuhan yang relatif bebas darah kepada pembunuhan berantai, tetapi gagal dalam percubaannya untuk menghumanisasikan subjek itu.
back_translation: Increasingly disturbing due to the relatively blood-free soft touch of serial murder, yet failing in its attempt to humanize the subject.

text: this is a finely written , superbly acted offbeat thriller .
translation: Ini adalah filem seram yang tersendiri yang ditulis dengan baik dan dilakonkan dengan cemerlang.
back_translation: This is a unique horror film that is well-written and brilliantly acted.

text: a film full of vivid characters , quiet beauty and gentle grace .
translation: Filem yang penuh dengan watak yang hidup, kecantikan yang tenang, dan kelembutan yang lembut.
back_translation: A film filled with vivid characters, serene beauty, and gentle tenderness.

text: may be the most undeserving victim of critical overkill since town and country .
translation: Mungkin mangsa yang paling tidak berhak untuk kritikan berlebihan sejak bandar dan desa.
back_translation: Perhaps the most undeserving victims of excessive criticism are those from both urban and rural areas.

text: pipe dream does have its charms . the leads are natural and lovely , the pace is serene , the humor wry and sprightly .
translation: Impian yang tidak akan kesampaian mempunyai daya tarikan tersendiri. Pelakon utamanya natural dan menawan, kelajuan cerita tenang, humor kering dan bersemangat.
back_translation: Unattainable dreams have their own allure. The main actor is natural and charming, the pace of the story is calm, the humor is dry and lively.

text: moore provides an invaluable service by sparking debate and encouraging thought . better still , he does all of this , and more , while remaining one of the most savagely hilarious social critics this side of jonathan swift .
translation: Moore menyediakan perkhidmatan yang tidak ternilai dengan memulakan perdebatan dan menggalakkan pemikiran. Lebih baik lagi, beliau melakukan semua ini, dan lebih, sambil kekal sebagai salah satu pengkritik sosial yang paling kejam dan lucu di sebelah Jonathan Swift.
back_translation: Moore provides invaluable services by initiating debates and encouraging thinking. Even better, he does all this, and more, while remaining one of the most ruthless and witty social critics next to Jonathan Swift.

text: lejos del paraM-mso es al mismo tiempo una fiesta para los ojos y oM-mdos y un movilizador cuadro de personajes enfrentados a sus propios deseos , miedos y prejuicios .
translation: Jauh daripada param-mso adalah pada masa yang sama merupakan sebuah pesta untuk mata dan minda serta sebuah lukisan yang menggerakkan watak-watak yang berhadapan dengan keinginan, ketakutan, dan prasangka mereka sendiri.
back_translation: Far from the param-mso, it is at the same time a feast for the eyes and mind and a painting that moves characters facing their desires, fears, and prejudices.

text: the noble tradition of men in drag hits an all-time low in sorority boys , whose makers apparently believe that women 's clothing can cover up any deficiency in acting , writing or direction .
translation: Tradisi mulia lelaki berpakaian seperti wanita merudum dalam filem Sorority Boys, di mana pembuatnya nampaknya percaya bahawa pakaian wanita boleh menyembunyikan sebarang kekurangan dalam lakonan, penulisan atau arahan.
back_translation: The noble tradition of men dressing as women is evident in the film Sorority Boys, where the creators seem to believe that women's clothing can conceal any shortcomings in acting, writing, or direction.

text: travels a fascinating arc from hope and euphoria to reality and disillusionment .
translation: melalui lengkung yang menarik dari harapan dan euforia ke realiti dan kekecewaan.
back_translation: through the intriguing curve from hope and euphoria to reality and disappointment.

text: he retires from his dangerous job after his best pal kamandag was killed by a mysterious kidnapping syndicate leader .
translation: Dia bersara dari pekerjaan berisiko selepas rakan baiknya, Kamandag, dibunuh oleh ketua sindiket penculikan misteri.
back_translation: He retired from his risky job after his good friend, Kamandag, was killed by the leader of a mysterious kidnapping syndicate.

text: oliveira trusts the intelligence of his audience . . . in the life of the city he suggests the ongoing life of humanity , the context in which individual mortality must be contemplated .
translation: Oliveira mempercayai kecerdasan audiensnya . . . dalam kehidupan bandar, dia mencadangkan kehidupan berterusan manusia, konteks di mana kematian individu perlu dipertimbangkan.
back_translation: Oliveira trusts the intelligence of his audience... in urban life, he advocates for a continuous human life, a context in which the death of individuals needs to be considered.

text: but then roxie comes along and velma is old news .
translation: Tetapi kemudian Roxie muncul dan Velma menjadi berita lama.
back_translation: But then Roxie appeared and Velma became old news.

text: this sort of cute and cloying material is far from zhang 's forte and it shows .
translation: Jenis bahan yang comel dan manis seperti ini jauh dari kebolehan zhang dan ini jelas terlihat.
back_translation: Cute and sweet materials like this are far from Zhang's capability and this is clearly visible.

text: it 's bright , pristine style and bold colors make it as much fun as reading an oversized picture book before bedtime .
translation: Gaya yang cerah, bersih, dan warna-warna yang mencolok membuatnya sama menyeronokkan seperti membaca sebuah buku bergambar besar sebelum tidur.
back_translation: Bright, clean style, and striking colors make it as enjoyable as reading a large picture book before bedtime.

text: it puts washington , as honest working man john q . archibald , on a pedestal , then keeps lifting the pedestal higher .
translation: Ia mengagungkan Washington, sebagai lelaki bekerja jujur John Q. Archibald, di atas takhta, kemudian terus meninggikan takhta tersebut.
back_translation: He exalts Washington, as John Q. Archibald, an honest working man, upon the throne, then continues to raise the throne.

text: bolstered by an astonishing voice cast ( excepting love hewitt ) , an interesting racial tension , and a storyline that i have n't encountered since at least pete 's dragon .
translation: Disokong oleh pemeran suara yang mengagumkan (kecuali love hewitt), ketegangan rasial yang menarik, dan sebuah jalan cerita yang saya belum pernah temui sejak setidaknya filem Pete 's Dragon.
back_translation: Supported by amazing voice actors (except Love Hewitt), intriguing racial tensions, and a storyline I have not encountered since at least the movie Pete's Dragon.

text: the feeling of each vision changes drastically as does the way the son looks and acts .
translation: Perasaan setiap penglihatan berubah secara drastik begitu juga dengan cara anak itu kelihatan dan bertindak.
back_translation: The feelings of every sight change drastically as well as the way the child looks and behaves.

text: white has n't developed characters so much as caricatures , one-dimensional buffoons that get him a few laughs but nothing else .
translation: Putih tidak telah membangunkan watak-watak sebagaimana sepatutnya tetapi sebaliknya karikatur, watak-watak satu dimensi yang hanya mendapat beberapa gelak ketawa tetapi tiada nilai lain.
back_translation: White has not developed characters as it should, but rather caricatures, one-dimensional characters that only receive a few laughs but no other value.

text: she arrives with every intent of selling it all off and going back to her busy career , but in going through her grandmother 's belongings , she discovers much about her family 's past which ultimately makes her re-evaluate her life and values .
translation: Dia tiba dengan niat untuk menjual segalanya dan kembali kepada kerjaya sibuknya, tetapi apabila dia mengkaji harta pusaka neneknya, dia menemui banyak perkara tentang masa lalu keluarganya yang pada akhirnya membuat dia menilai semula hidup dan nilai-nilainya.
back_translation: He arrived with the intention to sell everything and return to his busy career, but when he examined his grandmother's heritage, he discovered many things about his family's past that ultimately made him reassess his life and values.

text: disturbing for its unabashed honesty , our cast of characters both love and despise each other , their very actions acknowledging the pressures inherent in a tightly bonded peer group .
translation: Mengganggu kerana kejujuran yang terang-terangan, watak-watak kami sama-sama mencintai dan membenci satu sama lain, tindakan mereka sendiri mengakui tekanan yang melekat dalam kumpulan rakan sebaya yang rapat.
back_translation: Disruptive because of the blatant honesty, our characters both love and hate each other, their actions themselves acknowledging the pressure embedded within the close-knit group of peers.

text: while mitchell gets ready for school , his mother and her friend ( lisa ) plan a murder , business as usual .
translation: Semasa Mitchell bersiap untuk sekolah, ibunya dan kawannya (Lisa) merancang pembunuhan, seperti biasa.
back_translation: When Mitchell was getting ready for school, his mother and friend (Lisa) were planning a murder, as usual.

text: the plot revolves around a young married woman whose mundane life takes a turn for the worse when she strikes up a passionate and illicit affair with an oddball discount-store stock boy who thinks he 's holden caulfield .
translation: Plot tersebut berkisar tentang seorang wanita berkahwin muda yang kehidupan biasanya menjadi teruk apabila dia terlibat dalam hubungan yang penuh gairah dan haram dengan seorang lelaki pembekal di kedai serba murah yang aneh, yang merasakan dirinya seperti Holden Caulfield.
back_translation: The plot revolves around a young married woman whose life usually takes a turn for the worse when she becomes involved in a passionate and forbidden relationship with a strange male supplier at a discount store, who sees himself as Holden Caulfield.

text: but , things go frightfully wrong and the game turns into a struggle to make it out of the house alive .
translation: Namun, perkara-perkara menjadi sangat salah dan permainan berubah menjadi satu perjuangan untuk keluar dari rumah dengan selamat.
back_translation: However, things went very wrong and the game turned into a struggle to safely escape from the house.

text: walter hill 's pulpy , stylized boxing melodrama undisputed nearly overcomes its questionable in-the-ring match-up with solid fight choreography and gritty prison authenticity .
translation: Drama melodrama bergaya dan berunsur boksbuki 'Undisputed' karya Walter Hill hampir berhasil mengatasi pemadanan dalam gelanggang yang meragukan dengan koreografi pertarungan yang mantap dan keaslian penjara yang kasar.
back_translation: Stylish and boxing-themed melodrama 'Undisputed' by Walter Hill almost manages to overcome the questionable match-ups in the ring with solid fight choreography and gritty prison authenticity.

text: the problem is the needlessly poor quality of its archival prints and film footage . the images lack contrast , are murky and are frequently too dark to be decipherable .
translation: Masalahnya adalah kualitas cetakan arsip dan rekaman film yang buruk secara tidak perlu. Gambar-gambar tersebut kurang kontras, kabur, dan seringkali terlalu gelap untuk dibaca dengan jelas.
back_translation: The problem is the unnecessary poor quality of the printouts of archive and film recordings. The images are lacking in contrast, blurred, and often too dark to be read clearly.

text: recently ordained a priest , 24-year-old father amaro is sent to a small parish church in los reyes , mexico to assist the aging father benito in his daily work .
translation: Baru-baru ini dinaikkan menjadi paderi, bapa Amaro berumur 24 tahun dihantar ke sebuah gereja paroki kecil di Los Reyes, Mexico untuk membantu bapa Benito yang sudah tua dalam kerja harian beliau.
back_translation: Recently ordained as a priest, 24-year-old Father Amaro was sent to a small parish church in Los Reyes, Mexico to assist the elderly Father Benito in his daily work.

text: with an unflappable air of decadent urbanity , everett remains a perfect wildean actor , and a relaxed firth displays impeccable comic skill .
translation: Dengan gaya kota yang menjemukan, Everett tetap menjadi seorang pelakon Wildean yang sempurna, sementara Firth yang bersantai menunjukkan kemahiran komedi yang tidak bertanding.
back_translation: With a boring city style, Everett remains a perfect Wildean actor, while the relaxed Firth displays unmatched comedic skills.

text: one just waits grimly for the next shock without developing much attachment to the characters .
translation: Seseorang hanya menunggu dengan penuh keseriusan untuk kejutan seterusnya tanpa membentuk banyak keterikatan kepada watak-watak.
back_translation: Someone is just waiting with earnestness for the next surprise without forming many attachments to the characters.

text: now , in the twilight of his life , emile shapes the final chapters of his mental autobiography .
translation: Sekarang, di senja hari kehidupannya, Emile membentuk bab akhir autobiografinya yang mental.
back_translation: Now, in the twilight of his life, Emile is forming the final chapter of his autobiography that is mental.

text: it just goes to show , an intelligent person is n't necessarily an admirable storyteller .
translation: Hanya menunjukkan, seseorang yang bijak tidak semestinya seorang pencerita yang dikagumi.
back_translation: Just to show, a wise person is not necessarily an admired storyteller.

text: she survives and after being in a coma for five years , she wakes to seek revenge on her co-workers and boss who had attacked her .
translation: Dia selamat dan selepas berada dalam koma selama lima tahun, dia terjaga untuk membalas dendam kepada rakan sekerja dan bos yang menyerangnya.
back_translation: He is safe and after being in a coma for five years, he woke up to seek revenge on his colleagues and boss who attacked him.

text: one of the threads follows the brand new ( unmarried ) prime minister ( grant ) of the united kingdom , who on his first day in 10 downing street falls in love with the girl ( mccutcheon ) who brings him his tea ( thompson plays his sister ; rickman plays her husband ) .
translation: Salah satu benang cerita mengikuti perdana menteri baharu (belum berkahwin) (Grant) dari United Kingdom, yang pada hari pertamanya di 10 Downing Street jatuh cinta kepada gadis (McCutcheon) yang membawa tehnya (Thompson berperanan sebagai kakak perempuan beliau; Rickman berperanan sebagai suaminya).
back_translation: One of the storylines follows the new (unmarried) Prime Minister (Grant) from the United Kingdom, who on his first day at 10 Downing Street falls in love with the girl (McCutcheon) who brings his tea (Thompson plays the role of her sister; Rickman plays her husband).

text: firefighter gordon brewer is plunged into the complex and dangerous world of international terrorism after he loses his wife and child in a bombing credited to claudio `` the wolf `` perrini .
translation: Bomba api gordon brewer terperangkap dalam dunia kompleks dan berbahaya teroris antarabangsa setelah dia kehilangan isteri dan anaknya dalam serangan bom yang disebabkan oleh claudio " si serigala " perrini.
back_translation: Firefighter Gordon Brewer is trapped in the complex and dangerous world of international terrorists after he loses his wife and child in a bombing attack caused by Claudio "the wolf" Perrini.

text: sparkles in its deft portrait of tinseltown 's seasoned veterans of gossip , wealth , paranoia , and celebrityhood .
translation: bersinar dalam potret cekap veteran-veteran berpengalaman dunia hiburan yang penuh dengan desas-desus, kekayaan, paranoia, dan kemasyhuran.
back_translation: shining in the portrait efficient experienced veterans of the entertainment world full of rumors, wealth, paranoia, and fame.

text: a good music documentary , probably one of the best since the last waltz .
translation: Sebuah dokumentari muzik yang baik, mungkin salah satu yang terbaik sejak The Last Waltz.
back_translation: A good music documentary, perhaps one of the best since The Last Waltz.

text: two american mafiosi , gino and settimo , take refuge in the glasgow cafe owned by their scottish/italian cousin .
translation: Dua mafiosi Amerika, Gino dan Settimo, berlindung di kafe Glasgow yang dimiliki oleh sepupu mereka yang bersuku Scottish/Itali.
back_translation: Two American mafiosi, Gino and Settimo, seek refuge in a Glasgow cafe owned by their cousin of Scottish/Italian descent.

text: plans go awry when the kingpin offers $ 100 million to anyone who can free him .
translation: Rancangan menjadi kacau apabila bos besar menawarkan $100 juta kepada sesiapa yang boleh membebaskannya.
back_translation: The plan became chaotic when the big boss offered $100 million to anyone who could free him.

text: although barbershop boasts some of today 's hottest and hippest acts from the world of television , music and stand-up comedy , this movie strangely enough has the outdated swagger of a shameless M-^Q70s blaxploitation shuck-and-jive sitcom .
translation: Walaupun kedai gunting rambut ini menampilkan beberapa watak terkini dan paling hip dari dunia televisyen, muzik, dan komedi berdiri hari ini, filem ini agaknya mempunyai sikap usang yang mencolok dari situasi komedi blaxploitation zaman M-^Q70s yang tanpa rasa malu.
back_translation: Although this hair salon features some of the latest and hippest characters from today's television, music, and comedy world, the film apparently has a glaringly outdated attitude reminiscent of the shameless blaxploitation comedy situations of the M-70s era.

text: later , otte distributes the donations he 's collected throughout the year .
translation: Kemudian, Otte mengagihkan sumbangan yang dikumpulkannya sepanjang tahun.
back_translation: Then, Otte distributes the donations he collected throughout the year.

text: once while beating up one of his foes , he sees komal ( aishwarya rai ) and is so smitten by her beauty that he starts visualizing her wherever he goes and in whatever he does .
translation: Ketika sedang mengalahkan salah seorang musuhnya, dia melihat Komal (Aishwarya Rai) dan terpesona oleh kecantikannya sehingga dia mula membayangkan dia di mana-mana tempat dan dalam apa jua yang dilakukannya.
back_translation: While in the midst of defeating one of his enemies, he saw Komal (Aishwarya Rai) and was captivated by her beauty, so he started imagining her everywhere and in everything he did.

text: they plan it the way laurel and hardy might plan a bank robbery , or perhaps the marx brothers .
translation: Mereka merancangnya seperti bagaimana Laurel dan Hardy mungkin merancang perampokan bank, atau mungkin saudara Marx.
back_translation: They planned it like how Laurel and Hardy might plan a bank robbery, or perhaps the Marx brothers.

text: he is a cop , and chances are he 's going to make some trouble for vince too .

text: swept into the final moments of the ceremony , jenny must decide ; should she hurt all the people who love her by running away , or simply say `` i do `` ?
translation: Terpedaya dalam saat-saat akhir upacara, Jenny harus memutuskan; adakah dia harus menyakiti semua orang yang mencintainya dengan melarikan diri, atau sekadar berkata "saya bersedia"?
back_translation: Caught up in the final moments of the ceremony, Jenny must decide; should she hurt everyone who loves her by running away, or simply say "I do"?

text: a comedy-drama of nearly epic proportions rooted in a sincere performance by the title character undergoing midlife crisis .
translation: Satu komedi-drama hampir berskala epik yang berakar dalam persembahan tulus oleh watak utama yang sedang mengalami krisis pertengahan hidup.

text: an entertaining mix of period drama and flat-out farce that should please history fans .
translation: campuran drama zaman dan komedi yang lucu yang sepatutnya memuaskan peminat sejarah.

text: watching possession is a movie experience not much deeper than you 'd get on your couch watching masterpiece theater or mystery ! -- pleasant enough , but oh so soft .
translation: Menonton filem ‘possession’ adalah pengalaman filem yang tidak jauh berbeza daripada menonton teater mahakarya atau misteri di sofa anda! – cukup menyenangkan, tetapi begitu lembut.
back_translation: Watching the movie 'possession' is a cinematic experience not far off from watching a theater masterpiece or mystery in your own sofa! - quite enjoyable, but ever so subtle.

text: arroz con mango is a light romantic comedy about people and their drives .
translation: "Arroz con mango" adalah sebuah komedi romantis ringan tentang manusia dan keinginan mereka.
back_translation: "Arroz con mango" is a light romantic comedy about humans and their desires.

text: based on brett easton ellis 's novel , the story deals with a drug dealer at a vermont school , who becomes entangled in a love triangle with a girl whom he likes , but he sleeps with her roommate , and a guy who has a crush on him .
translation: Berdasarkan novel Brett Easton Ellis, ceritanya mengisahkan seorang pengedar dadah di sebuah sekolah di Vermont, yang terjerat dalam segitiga cinta dengan seorang gadis yang disukainya, tetapi dia tidur dengan rakan bilik gadis itu, dan seorang lelaki yang mempunyai perasaan suka kepadanya.
back_translation: Based on Brett Easton Ellis' novel, it tells the story of a drug dealer in a school in Vermont, who is caught in a love triangle with a girl he likes, but he sleeps with the girl's roommate, and a man who has feelings for him.

text: the new version is n't just endless . it heightens the deeply conservative spirit of giuseppe tornatore 's fable in a surprising new way .
translation: Versi baru ini bukan sahaja tanpa henti. Ia meningkatkan semangat yang sangat konservatif dalam dongeng Giuseppe Tornatore dengan cara baru yang mengejutkan.
back_translation: This new version is not only relentless. It revitalizes the very conservative spirit in Giuseppe Tornatore's fairy tale in a surprising new way.

text: the filming began in april 1999 , when peace was still at the top of the agenda , and finished march 2001 , in month seven of the bloody al aqsa intifada .

text: it 's a frightful vanity film that , no doubt , pays off what debt miramax felt they owed to benigni .
translation: Ini adalah filem yang penuh keangkuhan yang menakutkan, tanpa ragu, membayar hutang yang Miramax rasa mereka berhutang kepada Benigni.

text: when simone agrees to a blind date with oliver at the hottest restaurant in town , she does n't have high expectations of the evening .

text: terminally bland , painfully slow and needlessly confusing . . . the movie , shot on digital videotape rather than film , is frequently indecipherable .

text: on the train home from chauncey academy for the thanksgiving weekend , oscar confides in his best friend that he has plans for this vacation -- he will win the heart of his true love .
translation: Di dalam kereta pulang dari Akademi Chauncey untuk hujung minggu Thanksgiving, Oscar menceritakan rahsia kepada sahabat baiknya bahawa dia mempunyai rancangan untuk cuti ini - dia akan menakluki hati cinta sejatinya.

text: as an entertainment , the movie keeps you diverted and best of all , it lightens your wallet without leaving a sting .
translation: Sebagai hiburan, filem ini dapat mengalihkan perhatian anda dan yang terbaik, ia menjadikan dompet anda lebih ringan tanpa meninggalkan kesan yang pedih.

text: the stripped-down dramatic constructs , austere imagery and abstract characters are equal parts poetry and politics , obvious at times but evocative and heartfelt .

text: one of the more irritating cartoons you will see this , or any , year .

text: along the way , he helps unite the once legendary country bear band for a benefit show to save the country bear concert hall .

text: the story encompasses social degradation , unemployment , racism , casual violence , excessive drink and bad sex - and how they fall into a political context .
translation: Kisah tersebut melibatkan penurunan sosial, pengangguran, perkauman, keganasan secara santai, penyalahgunaan minuman beralkohol yang berlebihan, dan hubungan seks yang tidak menyenangkan - serta bagaimana semua itu berlaku dalam konteks politik.

back_translation: What should have been an interesting short story about believing in oneself has been overshadowed by heavy melodrama.

text: `` on the afternoon of july 1 , 1981 , los angeles police responded to a distress call at 8763 wonderland avenue and soon discovered a grisly quadruple homicide , later compared to the gruesome slaughter at the tate household at the hands of the charles manson family 10 years earlier .
translation: Pada petang 1 Julai 1981, polis Los Angeles bertindak balas terhadap panggilan kecemasan di 8763 Wonderland Avenue dan tidak lama kemudian menemui pembunuhan beramai-ramai yang kejam, kemudian dibandingkan dengan pembunuhan kejam di rumah keluarga Tate oleh keluarga Charles Manson 10 tahun sebelumnya.
back_translation: On the evening of 1 July 1981, the Los Angeles police responded to an emergency call at 8763 Wonderland Avenue and shortly after discovered a gruesome mass murder, which was then compared to the brutal murders at the Tate family home by the Charles Manson family 10 years earlier.

text: daphne , a seventeen-year-old girl from new york goes to england in search of her father , who does not know he had a child with an american girlfriend he met while working in morocco , and whose aristocratic family did not approve of the woman .
translation: Daphne, seorang gadis berumur tujuh belas tahun dari New York pergi ke England untuk mencari ayahnya, yang tidak tahu bahawa beliau mempunyai seorang anak dengan teman wanita Amerika yang ditemuinya semasa bekerja di Morocco, dan keluarga aristokratnya tidak meluluskan hubungan tersebut.
back_translation: Daphne, a seventeen-year-old girl from New York, went to England to find her father, who was unaware that he had a child with an American female friend he met while working in Morocco, and his aristocratic family did not approve of the relationship.

text: peckerhead try to brainwash all the gays into being heterosexuals . . .
translation: Peckerhead cuba mempengaruhi semua golongan gay untuk menjadi heteroseksual...

text: television made him famous , but his biggest hits happened off screen .
translation: Televisyen menjadikan dia terkenal, tetapi kejayaan terbesarnya berlaku di luar skrin.

text: to be influenced chiefly by humanity 's greatest shame , reality shows -- reality shows for god 's sake ! -- is a crime that should be punishable by chainsaw .

text: at the same time touching , funny and breathtaking .
translation: Pada masa yang sama menyentuh, lucu, dan mengasyikkan.

text: elvis teams up with jack ( ossie davis ) , a fellow nursing home resident who thinks that he is actually president john f . kennedy , and the two valiant old codgers sally forth to battle an evil egyptian entity who has chosen their long-term care facility as his happy hunting grounds .
translation: Elvis bergabung dengan Jack (Ossie Davis), seorang penghuni rumah peliharaan yang percaya bahawa dia sebenarnya adalah Presiden John F. Kennedy, dan kedua-dua warga emas berani itu maju untuk melawan entiti Mesir jahat yang telah memilih fasiliti jagaan jangka panjang mereka sebagai medan perburuan gembira.
back_translation: Elvis joins Jack (Ossie Davis), a resident of a nursing home who believes he is actually President John F. Kennedy, and the two brave elderly citizens step up to battle an evil Egyptian entity that has chosen their long-term care facility as a hunting ground.

text: the filmmaker journeys from her birthplace , brooklyn 's hasidic community , to its origins in hungary and back .
translation: Pengarah filem tersebut melakukan perjalanan dari tempat kelahirannya, komuniti Hasidic di Brooklyn, ke asal usulnya di Hungary dan kembali.

text: the material could n't possibly be more engaging , the implications of a `` by marlowe `` verdict positively earth-shattering .

text: it deals with fascistic pseudo-darwinism and artificial corruptability , with the makers of kulturfilm who put their avant-garde narrative , filmic and editing techniques to the service of fascism .

text: writer/director burr steers knows how to show irony , the trouble with kids , and new yorkers taking casual sex for granted .

text: almost as offensive as `` freddy got fingered . ``
translation: Hampir sama menyakitkan seperti "freddy got fingered."

text: a charming , quirky and leisurely paced scottish comedy -- except with an outrageous central gimmick that could have been a reject from monty python 's meaning of life .
translation: Sebuah komedi Scotland menawan, aneh, dan berkelajuan perlahan - kecuali dengan gimmick pusat yang melampau yang boleh jadi ditolak dari Monty Python's Meaning of Life.

text: if it takes too many familiar steps , it is still never less than compelling as it walks the well-trod line .

text: it 's refreshing to see a movie that embraces its old-fashioned themes and in the process comes out looking like something wholly original .

text: unable to resist the sexual lure of the maenads ' holy eroticism , pentheus attempts to join in only to be torn , literally limb from limb , by the frenzied bacchae .

text: labute 's careful handling makes the material seem genuine rather than pandering .

text: but jesse & # 180 ; isn & # 180 ; s alone , because he & # 180 ; s accompanied by tulip , his assassin girldfriend and cassidy a drunk irish vampire .

text: embarrassed myself about laughing out loud multiple times , i found myself enjoying the movie much more than i ever enjoyed the tv show . . . and these pseudo-homo-erotic stunts .

text: all three actresses are simply dazzling , particularly balk , who 's finally been given a part worthy of her considerable talents .
translation: Ketiga aktris tersebut benar-benar memukau, terutama Balk, yang akhirnya diberikan peran yang sepadan dengan bakatnya yang besar.

text: pero alargando la mano ya no consiguen dinero suficiente y salva decide aprovechar el ambiente general y hacerse pasar por un nuevo mes & # 237 ; as .

text: forging a connection with the creature is easier for mac than getting his father 's attention until both man and beast need all the help they can get .

text: as the man descends in to the afterworld , he slowly discovers the answer to the ultimate question of mankind .
translation: Apabila lelaki itu turun ke alam akhirat, dia perlahan-lahan menemui jawapan kepada soalan utama manusia.

text: the humor is forced and heavy-handed , and occasionally simply unpleasant .
translation: Humor ini dipaksa dan kasar, dan kadang-kadang hanya tidak menyenangkan.

text: director alex halpern 's feature-length documentary , nine good teeth , unfolds through the stories and recollections of his 102-year-old grandmother mary mirabito , an outspoken and fiercely independent woman .
translation: Filem dokumentari berdurasi penuh pengarah Alex Halpern, "Nine Good Teeth", terungkap melalui cerita dan kisah neneknya yang berusia 102 tahun, Mary Mirabito, seorang wanita yang bersuara lantang dan sangat bebas.
back_translation: The full-length documentary film directed by Alex Halpern, "Nine Good Teeth", unfolds through the story of his 102-year-old grandmother, Mary Mirabito, a strong-willed and fiercely independent woman.

text: no matter how you slice it , mark wahlberg and thandie newton are not hepburn and grant , two cinematic icons with chemistry galore .
translation: Tidak kira bagaimana anda melihatnya, Mark Wahlberg dan Thandie Newton bukanlah Hepburn dan Grant, dua ikon filem yang mempunyai keharmonian chemistry yang melimpah.
back_translation: No matter how you look at it, Mark Wahlberg and Thandie Newton are not Hepburn and Grant, two film icons known for their abundant on-screen chemistry.

text: M-I uma pena que , mais tarde , o prM-sprio filme abandone o tom de parM-sdia e passe a utilizar os mesmos clichM-js que havia satirizado .
translation: Saya rasa sedih bahawa kemudian filem itu meninggalkan nada parodi dan menggunakan cliché yang sama yang telah disindir sebelum ini.

text: straight into the hands of a man they call the lord of the wolves .
translation: Terus ke tangan seorang lelaki yang mereka panggil tuan serigala.

translation: Seagal, yang kelihatan lebih seperti Danny Aiello pada hari ini, mengomelinya sepanjang filem.

text: sixteen years later , germany , in the ruhrpott , to be exact : orphan t & # 252 ; rlich and his friend josch are working their civil service , yet cause so much chaos that they decide to flee instead of being forced into the army .
translation: Enam belas tahun kemudian, di Jerman, di Ruhrpott, untuk lebih tepatnya: yatim piatu Türrlich dan kawannya Josch sedang menjalankan perkhidmatan awam mereka, tetapi menyebabkan begitu banyak kekacauan sehingga mereka memutuskan untuk melarikan diri daripada dipaksa masuk tentera.

text: several of steven soderbergh 's earlier films were hailed as the works of an artist . sadly , full frontal plays like the work of a dilettante .
translation: Beberapa filem awal Steven Soderbergh dipuji sebagai karya seorang seniman. Malangnya, Full Frontal bermain seperti karya seorang dilettante.
back_translation: Some of Steven Soderbergh's early films were praised as the work of an artist. Unfortunately, Full Frontal plays like the work of a dilettante.

text: matches neorealism 's impact by showing the humanity of a war-torn land filled with people who just want to live their lives .

text: a once powerful , but now ailing and remorseful father desperately seeks out his estranged son .
translation: Seorang bapa yang dulunya berkuasa, tetapi kini sedang sakit dan penuh penyesalan dengan tekun mencari anaknya yang terasing.
