text: the council reluctantly admits that they are in a dire situation and they require blade 's assistance .
translation: Dewan dengan enggan mengakui bahawa mereka berada dalam situasi yang terdesak dan mereka memerlukan bantuan Blade.
back_translation: The council reluctantly admits that they are in a desperate situation and they need Blade's help.

text: none of his actors stand out , but that 's less of a problem here than it would be in another film : characterization matters less than atmosphere .
translation: Tiada pelakonnya yang menonjol, tetapi itu bukanlah masalah di sini seperti yang akan berlaku dalam filem lain: personaliti watak kurang penting daripada atmosfera.
back_translation: There are no standout actors, but that's not a problem here as it is in other films: the character personalities are less important than the atmosphere.

text: the filmmaker 's heart is in the right place . . .
translation: Hati pereka filem berada di tempat yang betul . . .
back_translation: The heart of the filmmaker is in the right place . . .

text: trailer park magnolia : too long , too cutesy , too sure of its own importance , and possessed of that peculiar tension of being too dense & about nothing at all .
translation: trailer park magnolia: terlalu panjang, terlalu comel, terlalu yakin dengan kepentingannya sendiri, dan dimiliki oleh ketegangan yang aneh kerana terlalu padat & tentang apa-apa.
back_translation: trailer park magnolia: too long, too cute, too confident in its own importance, and owned by strange tension due to being too dense & about anything.

text: the action switches between past and present , but the material link is too tenuous to anchor the emotional connections that purport to span a 125-year divide .
translation: Tindakan berpindah di antara masa lampau dan masa kini, tetapi hubungan material terlalu lemah untuk mengikat hubungan emosi yang dianggap merentang divisi 125 tahun.
back_translation: Moving between the past and the present, but the material connection is too weak to bind the emotional ties that are considered to span divisions of 125 years.

text: along the way to finding out how she ended up like that ( and how to get back into her own body ) , she discovers how shallow and cruel she 's always been . . .
translation: Sepanjang perjalanan untuk mencari bagaimana dia berakhir seperti itu (dan bagaimana untuk kembali ke dalam tubuhnya sendiri), dia menemui betapa dangkal dan kejamnya dirinya selama ini...
back_translation: Throughout the journey to find out how she ended up like that (and how to get back into her own body), she discovered how shallow and cruel she had been all along...

text: an aging yakuza returns to the park where he used to meet his long-lost girlfriend .
translation: Seorang yakuza yang semakin tua kembali ke taman di mana dia dulu bertemu dengan kekasih yang hilang.
back_translation: An aging yakuza returns to the park where he once met his lost lover.

text: a sly dissection of the inanities of the contemporary music business and a rather sad story of the difficulties of artistic collaboration .
translation: sebuah analisis licik mengenai kebodohan dalam perniagaan muzik kontemporari dan sebuah kisah sedih mengenai kesukaran kolaborasi artistik.
back_translation: A cunning analysis of ignorance in contemporary music business and a sad tale of the difficulties of artistic collaboration.

text: leave it to the french to truly capture the terrifying angst of the modern working man without turning the film into a cheap thriller , a dumb comedy or a sappy melodrama .
translation: Biarkan orang Perancis yang benar-benar menangkap kegelisahan menakutkan pekerja moden tanpa mengubah filem tersebut menjadi cerita seram murah, komedi bodoh atau melodrama yang terlalu melampau.
back_translation: Let the French capture the frightening anxieties of modern workers without turning the film into a cheap horror story, silly comedy, or overly melodramatic.

text: other strange events soon start happening as well , such as the appearance of old acquaintances of the crew , including some who are dead .
translation: Peristiwa aneh lain mula berlaku juga, seperti munculnya kenalan lama kru, termasuk yang sudah meninggal.
back_translation: Another strange event began to occur as old crew members, including those who had passed away, reappeared.

text: it 's a square , sentimental drama that satisfies , as comfort food often can .
translation: Ini adalah satu drama kotak, sentimental yang memuaskan, seperti makanan selesa yang sering kali boleh memberikan kepuasan.
back_translation: This is a square drama, sentimental and satisfying, like comfort food that often provides satisfaction.

text: reminiscent of david mamet 's elaborate screen bluffs -- only livelier , more playful .
translation: Mengingatkan kepada pemikiran skrin yang rumit oleh David Mamet - hanya lebih hidup, lebih bermain-main.
back_translation: Reminiscent of David Mamet's intricate screenplays - just livelier, more playful.

text: this in-depth study of important developments of the computer industry should make it required viewing in university computer science departments for years to come .
translation: Kajian mendalam mengenai perkembangan penting dalam industri komputer ini seharusnya menjadi tontonan wajib di jabatan sains komputer universiti untuk tempoh yang akan datang.
back_translation: In-depth study on key developments in the computer industry should be a mandatory viewing in the university's computer science department for the foreseeable future.

text: they go through three days of hell , friendship , madness and hope .
translation: Mereka melalui tiga hari neraka, persahabatan, kegilaan, dan harapan.
back_translation: They went through three days of hell, friendship, madness, and hope.

text: luster is a refreshingly funny and sexy look at unrequited love .
translation: 'Luster' adalah pengamatan yang menyegarkan, lucu dan seksi mengenai cinta bertepuk sebelah tangan.
back_translation: 'Luster' is a refreshing, funny, and sexy observation of unrequited love.

text: she ultimately decides to pursue her lifelong dream of opening her own dance studio for inner-city youths .
translation: Akhirnya, dia memutuskan untuk mengejar impian seumur hidupnya untuk membuka studio tari sendiri untuk remaja bandar.
back_translation: Finally, he decided to pursue his lifelong dream of opening his own dance studio for urban teenagers.

text: uplifting as only a document of the worst possibilities of mankind can be , and among the best films of the year .
translation: Membangkitkan semangat seperti hanya sebuah dokumen tentang kemungkinan terburuk manusia boleh, dan antara filem terbaik tahun ini.
back_translation: Inspiring like only a document about the worst of human possibilities can, and among the best films of the year.

text: . . . surprisingly inert for a movie in which the main character travels back and forth between epochs .
translation: . . . agak tidak aktif untuk sebuah filem di mana watak utama melakukan perjalanan ke belakang dan ke depan antara zaman.
back_translation: ... somewhat inactive for a movie where the main character travels back and forth between eras.

text: now the lives of these alberta everymen are brought to the big screen by documentarian ferral mitchener in an exploration of the depths of friendship , the fragility of life , growing up gracefully and the art and science of drinking beer like a man .
translation: Kini kehidupan individu-individu biasa dari Alberta ini dipaparkan di layar besar oleh pereka dokumentari ferral mitchener dalam eksplorasi tentang kedalaman persahabatan, kerapuhan kehidupan, membesar dengan anggun, dan seni serta sains minum bir seperti seorang lelaki.
back_translation: Now the lives of these ordinary individuals from Alberta are portrayed on the big screen by documentary filmmaker Ferral Mitchener in an exploration of the depths of friendship, the fragility of life, growing old gracefully, and the art and science of drinking beer like a man.

text: although occasionally static to the point of resembling a stage play , the film delivers a solid mixture of sweetness and laughs .
translation: Walaupun kadang-kadang statik sehingga menyerupai lakonan pentas, filem ini memberikan campuran manis dan gelak yang kukuh.
back_translation: Although at times static to the point of resembling stage acting, this film offers a strong mix of sweetness and laughter.

text: you would n't call the good girl a date movie ( an anti-date movie is more like it ) , but when it 's good , it 's good and horrid .
translation: Anda tidak akan memanggil filem Good Girl sebagai filem untuk kencan (lebih cenderung sebagai filem anti-kencan), tetapi apabila ia baik, ia benar-benar baik dan mengerikan.
back_translation: You wouldn't call the movie Good Girl a date movie (more inclined as an anti-date movie), but when it's good, it's really good and terrifying.

text: is this challenge too much for even the amazing spider-man to handle ?
translation: Adakah cabaran ini terlampau sukar untuk Spider-Man yang maha hebat sekalipun?
back_translation: Is this challenge too difficult even for the mighty Spider-Man?

text: human resources was a good , straightforward tale , but time out is better . it 's haunting . it 's like a poem .
translation: Sumber manusia adalah sebuah cerita yang bagus dan langsung, tetapi Time Out lebih baik. Ia menghantui. Ia seperti sebuah puisi.
back_translation: Human resource is a good and direct story, but Time Out is better. It is haunting. It's like a poem.

text: after steve 's job opportunity in san francisco falls through , he comes up with a plan .
translation: Selepas peluang pekerjaan Steve di San Francisco tidak berjaya, dia datang dengan satu rancangan.
back_translation: After Steve's job opportunity in San Francisco failed, he came up with a plan.

text: extremes of intimacy and spectacle , tragedy and hope fuse in a tidal wave of visuals and music , giving rise to a unique , artistic experience that reflects the vision of a brave new globalized world .
translation: Puncak keintiman dan spektakel, tragedi dan harapan bergabung dalam gelombang visual dan muzik, melahirkan pengalaman seni yang unik yang mencerminkan visi dunia global yang baru dan berani.
back_translation: The peak of intimacy and spectacle, tragedy, and hope come together in a wave of visuals and music, giving birth to a unique art experience that reflects a new and bold global worldview.

text: not a long time ago she was a successful popstar whose life consisted in hosting tv shows and signing autographs .
translation: Tidak lama dulu, dia seorang bintang pop yang berjaya yang hidupnya terdiri daripada menjadi hos rancangan televisyen dan menandatangani autograf.
back_translation: Not long ago, he was a successful pop star whose life consisted of being a TV show host and signing autographs.

text: because the film deliberately lacks irony , it has a genuine dramatic impact ; it plays like a powerful 1957 drama we 've somehow never seen before .
translation: Kerana filem tersebut sengaja tidak mempunyai ironi, ia memberikan kesan dramatik yang sebenar; ia bermain seperti drama 1957 yang kuat yang kita entah bagaimana tidak pernah melihat sebelum ini.
back_translation: Because the film purposely lacks irony, it conveys a real dramatic impact; it plays out like a powerful 1957 drama that we somehow have never seen before.

text: downright transparent is the script 's endless assault of embarrassingly ham-fisted sex jokes that reek of a script rewrite designed to garner the film a `` cooler `` pg-13 rating .
translation: Skrip yang jelas sekali adalah serangan tak berkesudahan jenaka seks yang amat kasar yang berbau penyelarasan semula skrip yang direka untuk memperoleh filem itu rating 'cool' pg-13.
back_translation: The very clear script is a relentless, extremely crude sexual humor attack that smells of script revisions designed to earn the film a 'cool' PG-13 rating.

text: your night horrors start to bleed into your day job .
translation: Ketakutan malam anda mula mempengaruhi kerja siang anda.
back_translation: Your nighttime fears are starting to affect your daytime work.

text: alice must also come to terms with her slowly-returning memories .
translation: Alice juga perlu menerima kembali ingatannya yang perlahan-lahan kembali.
back_translation: Alice also needs to regain her slowly returning memories.

text: boasting the best sword-fighting sequences to hit the screen in many years , it is so enjoyably old-fashioned it even looks as if it were made in the '70s .
translation: Memamerkan urutan pertarungan pedang terbaik yang pernah ada dalam beberapa tahun terakhir, filem ini begitu menyenangkan dengan gaya klasiknya sehingga seolah-olah filem ini dibuat pada tahun '70-an.
back_translation: Displaying the best sword fighting sequences in recent years, this film is so enjoyable with its classic style that it feels like it was made in the '70s.

text: murbah swamp beer is a documentary about an event that could only happen in australia .
translation: Murbah Swamp Beer merupakan sebuah dokumentari mengenai satu peristiwa yang hanya boleh berlaku di Australia.
back_translation: Murbah Swamp Beer is a documentary about an event that can only happen in Australia.

text: ronnie must then deal with his new life , while having to deal with missing his ex-wife that he left back home .
translation: Ronnie kemudian perlu menghadapi kehidupan barunya, sambil terpaksa merindui bekas isterinya yang ditinggalkannya di rumah.
back_translation: Ronnie then has to face his new life, while having to miss his ex-wife whom he left at home.

text: photographed with melancholy richness and eloquently performed yet also decidedly uncinematic .
translation: difotograf dengan kekayaan melankoli dan dilakonkan dengan indah namun juga dengan ketegasan yang tidak sinematik.
back_translation: Photographed with melancholic richness and performed beautifully yet with a non-cinematic firmness.

text: it 's just hard to believe that a life like this can sound so dull .
translation: Sukar untuk dipercayai bahawa kehidupan seperti ini boleh kedengaran begitu membosankan.
back_translation: It is hard to believe that life can sound so boring like this.

text: a charming , vibrant , if under-edited adaptation of v . s . naipaul 's genially cynical novel .
translation: suatu adaptasi yang menarik, bersemangat, jika di bawah suntingan sedikit dari novel genial yang sinis oleh v. s. naipaul.
back_translation: an interesting, enthusiastic adaptation, if slightly edited from the brilliant and sardonic novel by v. s. naipaul.

text: and what better place for romance than coney island ?
translation: dan tempat yang lebih baik untuk romantika selain dari Coney Island?
back_translation: and where is a better place for romance than Coney Island?

text: inspector mo eventually discovers through a tabloid magazine that a self-proclaimed psychic named shana had phoned a radio program on the day of the kidnapping to warn of the incident .
translation: Pada akhirnya, inspektor Mo mengetahui melalui sebuah majalah tabloid bahawa seorang peramal yang bernama Shana telah menelefon program radio pada hari penculikan untuk memperingatkan mengenai kejadian tersebut.
back_translation: In the end, Inspector Mo found out through a tabloid magazine that a fortune teller named Shana had called a radio program on the day of the abduction to warn about the incident.

text: stuffy , full of itself , morally ambiguous and nothing to shout about .
translation: Terlalu sombong, penuh dengan diri sendiri, ambigu secara moral, dan tidak ada yang patut disoraki.
back_translation: Too arrogant, full of oneself, morally ambiguous, and nothing to be cheered about.

text: sheridan . . . smoothes over sources of conflict that could have lent the film a bit more depth .
translation: Sheridan menutupi sumber konflik yang seharusnya dapat memberikan filem sedikit lagi kedalaman.
back_translation: Sheridan covered up the source of conflict that should have given the film a little more depth.

text: not only are the film 's sopranos gags incredibly dated and unfunny , they also demonstrate how desperate the makers of this 'we 're -doing-it-for -the-cash ' sequel were .
translation: Bukan sahaja gurauan sopranos dalam filem sangat ketinggalan zaman dan tidak lucu, tetapi juga menunjukkan betapa desparatnya pembuat filem ini demi sekuel 'kami melakukannya demi wang'.
back_translation: Not only are the soprano jokes in the movie outdated and not funny, but they also show how desperate the filmmakers are for the sequel 'we're doing it for the money'.

text: she knows that kanna is back but now she does not want to go back to him .
translation: Dia tahu bahawa Kanna telah kembali tetapi sekarang dia tidak mahu kembali kepada beliau.
back_translation: He knows that Kanna has returned but now he does not want to go back to her.

text: the mystery guests soon unleash a stiff sentence of their own , without parole , teaching the judge the consequence of doing unto others as you would have done unto you .
translation: Para tetamu misteri segera menjatuhkan hukuman yang keras sendiri, tanpa pembebasan bersyarat, mengajar hakim tentang akibat melakukan kepada orang lain seperti yang anda ingin orang lain lakukan kepada anda.
back_translation: Mystery guests will soon deliver their own harsh punishment, without parole, teaching judges about the consequences of treating others as you would like to be treated.

text: with a romantic comedy plotline straight from the ages , this cinderella story does n't have a single surprise up its sleeve . but it does somehow manage to get you under its spell .
translation: Dengan plot romantik komedi yang sudah lama wujud, kisah Cinderella ini tidak mengandungi sebarang kejutan. Tetapi ia dengan cara tertentu berjaya memikat anda di bawah dayanya.
back_translation: With a long-existing romantic comedy plot, this Cinderella story does not contain any surprises. But in a way, it successfully captivates you with its charm.

text: hoffman is understandably concerned about typecasting , but he is indeed the man for the job , recalling the intensity that nicholas cage brought to an oscar-winning performance in leaving las vegas .
translation: Hoffman jelas bimbang tentang terjenis, tetapi dia memang orang yang sesuai untuk tugas itu, mengingat intensiti yang Nicholas Cage bawa kepada persembahan yang memenangi Oscar dalam Leaving Las Vegas.
back_translation: Hoffman is clearly concerned about being typecast, but he is well-suited for the role, given the intensity that Nicholas Cage brought to his Oscar-winning performance in Leaving Las Vegas.

text: a young novelist , tormented by his family 's history and haunted by the specter of his long-dead , more famous ancestor , falls in love with a woman , a distant relative of his ancestor , whose friends and family begin to disappear mysteriously .
translation: Seorang novelis muda, disiksa oleh sejarah keluarganya dan dihantui oleh bayangan leluhurnya yang lebih terkenal yang sudah lama meninggal, jatuh cinta dengan seorang wanita, seorang saudara jauh dari leluhurnya, di mana teman-teman dan keluarganya mulai menghilang secara misterius.
back_translation: A young novelist, tortured by his family history and haunted by the shadow of his more famous late ancestors, falls in love with a woman, a distant relative of his, where his friends and family begin to mysteriously disappear.

text: montias . . . pumps a lot of energy into his nicely nuanced narrative and surrounds himself with a cast of quirky -- but not stereotyped -- street characters .
translation: montias . . . memasukkan banyak tenaga ke dalam naratifnya yang halus dan dikelilingi oleh pelbagai watak jalanan yang aneh - tetapi tidak digambarkan secara stereotaip.
back_translation: montias... injects a lot of energy into its subtle narrative and is surrounded by various strange street characters - but not depicted stereotypically.

text: kudos to this first-time feature director for braiding his insider experience into something quite singular .
translation: Tabik kepada pengarah ciri yang baru ini kerana telah mengaitkan pengalaman dalaman beliau ke dalam sesuatu yang agak unik.
back_translation: Kudos to the new feature director for incorporating his internal experience into something quite unique.

text: she files for divorce , and marco makes a decision that will change all their lives .
translation: Dia memfailkan perceraian, dan Marco membuat keputusan yang akan mengubah seluruh kehidupan mereka.
back_translation: She filed for divorce, and Marco made a decision that would change their entire lives.

text: what can one say about a balding 50-year-old actor playing an innocent boy carved from a log ?
translation: Apa yang boleh dikatakan tentang seorang pelakon berumur 50 tahun yang botak bermain watak budak yang tidak berdosa yang diukir daripada kayu?
back_translation: What can be said about a 50-year-old bald actor playing the role of an innocent child carved out of wood?

text: because of being deeply moved from the sunflowers ' beautiness , he takes one of them as a sign for his love back to the city .
translation: Kerana tergerak oleh kecantikan bunga matahari, dia mengambil salah satunya sebagai tanda cintanya kembali ke bandar.
back_translation: Moved by the beauty of the sunflower, she picked one as a sign of her love and brought it back to the city.

text: bret packard is rich , famous , good-looking , and set to win his fourth championship ring .
translation: Bret Packard kaya, terkenal, kacak, dan bersiap untuk memenangi cincin kejuaraannya yang keempat.
back_translation: Bret Packard is rich, famous, handsome, and ready to win his fourth championship ring.

text: the movie has no respect for laws , political correctness or common decency , but it displays something more important : respect for its flawed , crazy people .
translation: Filem ini tidak memperlihatkan sebarang hormat terhadap undang-undang, kewajaran politik, atau kesopanan umum, tetapi ia memaparkan sesuatu yang lebih penting: penghormatan terhadap orang-orang yang cacat, gila.
back_translation: This film does not show any respect for the law, political correctness, or public decency, but it highlights something more important: respect for the disabled, crazy people.

text: it does what good films do best ; that is to provoke us , push our buttons , make us think and maybe even entertain us in the process .
translation: Ia melakukan apa yang filem-filem yang baik lakukan dengan terbaik; iaitu merangsang kita, mendorong emosi kita, membuat kita berfikir dan mungkin juga menghiburkan kita dalam proses tersebut.
back_translation: It does what good films do best; stimulating us, evoking our emotions, making us think, and perhaps entertaining us in the process.

text: it 's hard to imagine that even very small children will be impressed by this tired retread .
translation: Sukar untuk membayangkan bahawa kanak-kanak kecil sekalipun akan terkesan dengan pengulangan yang sudah lama ini.
back_translation: It is hard to imagine that even young children would be impressed by this long-standing repetition.

text: he led a bleak life , stuck in a boring routinity created by his ambition to become a sucessfull producer in one jakarta 's leading tv station .
translation: Dia menjalani kehidupan yang suram, terperangkap dalam rutinitas yang membosankan yang diciptakan oleh ambisinya untuk menjadi seorang pengelola yang berjaya di salah satu stesen tv terkemuka di Jakarta.
back_translation: He leads a bleak life, trapped in the monotonous routine created by his ambition to become a successful manager at one of the leading TV stations in Jakarta.

text: a nightmare date with a half-formed wit done a great disservice by a lack of critical distance and a sad trust in liberal arts college bumper sticker platitudes .
translation: Satu tarikh mimpi buruk dengan seorang yang separuh bijak yang dilakukan dengan tidak adil oleh kekurangan jarak kritis dan kepercayaan sedih terhadap platitude bumper-kolej seni liberal.
back_translation: A bad dream date with a half-wit done unfairly by a lack of critical distance and melancholy trust in liberal arts bumper-sticker platitudes.

text: the group of best friends from their days back at east great falls high reunite for the next great sexual adventure in their lives . . .
translation: Kumpulan rakan terbaik dari zaman persekolahan mereka di East Great Falls High berkumpul semula untuk pengembaraan seksual yang hebat dalam hidup mereka yang seterusnya.
back_translation: The best group of friends from their high school days at East Great Falls High reunite for a great sexual adventure in their upcoming lives.

text: earnest , unsubtle and hollywood-predictable , green dragon is still a deeply moving effort to put a human face on the travail of thousands of vietnamese .
translation: Green Dragon masih merupakan satu usaha yang sangat menyentuh hati untuk memberikan wajah manusia kepada penderitaan ribuan orang Vietnam, walaupun ia bersungguh-sungguh, tidak halus, dan mudah diterka seperti filem Hollywood.
back_translation: Green Dragon remains a very touching effort to give human faces to the suffering of thousands of Vietnamese people, even though it is sincere, not subtle, and easily predictable like a Hollywood film.

text: 20 , 000 years before , our planet is entering an ice age .
translation: 20,000 tahun yang lalu, planet kita memasuki zaman es.
back_translation: 20,000 years ago, our planet entered the Ice Age.

text: a poignant lyricism runs through balzac and the little chinese seamstress that transforms this story about love and culture into a cinematic poem .
translation: Sebuah keindahan puisi yang menyentuh hati mengalir melalui kisah Balzac dan Si Tukang Jahit Cina kecil yang mengubah kisah ini tentang cinta dan budaya menjadi sebuah puisi sinematik.
back_translation: A beautiful poetry that touches the heart flows through the story of Balzac and the Little Chinese Seamstress, transforming this tale about love and culture into a cinematic poetry.

text: soderbergh seems capable only of delivering artfully lighted , earnest inquiries that lack the kind of genuine depth that would make them redeemable .
translation: Soderbergh nampaknya hanya mampu menghasilkan pertanyaan yang diterangi cahaya secara seni, tetapi kekurangan jenis kedalaman yang sejati yang akan menjadikan mereka dapat ditebus.
back_translation: Soderbergh seems to only be able to produce questions illuminated by light artistically, but lacking the kind of true depth that would make them redeemable.

text: kamel , a young man from the french ghetto , near paris , is coming back to france .
translation: Kamel, seorang pemuda dari getto Perancis, berdekatan dengan Paris, kini kembali ke Perancis.
back_translation: Kamel, a youth from a ghetto in France, near Paris, has now returned to France.

text: becomes a bit of a mishmash : a tearjerker that does n't and a thriller that wo n't .
translation: Menjadi sedikit kekacauan: sebuah cerita yang membuat menangis tetapi sebenarnya tidak, dan sebuah cerita seram yang sebenarnya tidak akan seram.
back_translation: A little chaos: a story that makes you cry but actually not, and a horror story that actually won't be scary.

text: a publication that documents their culture and demonstrates how the real world can both destroy and enhance their idealistic one .
translation: suatu penerbitan yang mendokumentasikan budaya mereka dan menunjukkan bagaimana dunia sebenar boleh sama-sama memusnahkan dan meningkatkan dunia idealistik mereka.
back_translation: A publication that documents their culture and shows how the real world can both destroy and enhance their idealistic world.

text: the film narrates in a richly detailed , associative montage the boundless possibilities of manipulating images and using images to seduce .
translation: Filem tersebut menceritakan dalam satu montaj yang kaya dengan perincian, kemungkinan tanpa batasan untuk memanipulasi imej dan menggunakan imej untuk memikat.
back_translation: The film tells a richly detailed montage with possibilities without limits for manipulating images and using images to captivate.

text: `` what 's more important your experiences or your memories of them ? ``
translation: Pengalaman atau kenangan mengenainya, yang mana lebih penting?
back_translation: Experience or memories of it, which one is more important?

text: a group of hard core female inmates are trained by the military .
translation: Sebuah kumpulan banduan wanita yang tegar dilatih oleh tentera.
back_translation: A group of female prisoners who are trained rigorously by the military.

text: keeping her mind diligently focused on dance proves harder than she expected as she finds herself falling in love with david schrader , a dark and mysterious new york musician .
translation: Mempertahankan fokus dengan tekun pada tarian lebih sukar daripada yang dijangkakan ketika dia mendapati dirinya jatuh cinta dengan David Schrader, seorang pemuzik gelap dan misteri dari New York.
back_translation: Maintaining focus diligently on dance is more challenging than expected when she finds herself falling in love with David Schrader, a dark and mysterious musician from New York.

text: . . . just a big mess of a movie , full of images and events , but no tension or surprise .
translation: ...hanya filem yang kacau balau, penuh dengan imej dan peristiwa, tetapi tiada ketegangan atau kejutan.
back_translation: ...only a messy film, full of images and events, but lacking tension or surprises.

text: reign of fire is hardly the most original fantasy film ever made -- beyond road warrior , it owes enormous debts to aliens and every previous dragon drama -- but that barely makes it any less entertaining .
translation: Reign of Fire hampir tidak filem fantasi asal yang pernah dibuat - di luar Road Warrior, ia berhutang besar kepada Aliens dan setiap drama naga sebelum ini - tetapi itu hampir tidak menjadikannya kurang menghiburkan.
back_translation: Reign of Fire is almost not an original fantasy film ever made - outside of Road Warrior, it owes a lot to Aliens and every dragon drama before this - but that almost didn't make it any less entertaining.

text: he hired angel . com to kill lui because lui opposed nunn 's business plans , and also because nunn is carrying on a secret affair with lui 's wife .
translation: Dia menyewa angel . com untuk membunuh Lui kerana Lui menentang rancangan perniagaan Nunn, dan juga kerana Nunn menjalin hubungan gelap dengan isteri Lui.
back_translation: He hired angel.com to kill Lui because Lui opposed Nunn's business plan, and also because Nunn was having an affair with Lui's wife.

text: the homespun musician could n't have done it without the support of his family , friends , lovers and the neighborhood kids he called 'starchildren ' , all of whom paint the big picture of bruce 's life legacy and 'dimension of imagination ' .
translation: Muzikus yang bersahaja itu tidak akan dapat melakukannya tanpa sokongan dari keluarganya, rakan-rakan, kekasih, dan kanak-kanak jiran yang dipanggilnya 'starchildren', yang semuanya melukis gambaran besar tentang warisan hidup Bruce dan 'dimensi imaginasi'.
back_translation: The humble musician will not be able to do it without the support of his family, friends, partner, and neighborhood children whom he calls 'starchildren', all of whom paint a grand picture of Bruce's life legacy and 'dimensions of imagination'.

text: jack has a history with charlie , a transient who portrays a typical image of the homeless : rough , unshaven and always looking for the next drink .
translation: Jack mempunyai sejarah dengan Charlie, seorang gelandangan yang melukiskan imej tipikal gelandangan: kasar, tidak bercukur, dan sentiasa mencari minuman seterusnya.
back_translation: Jack has a history with Charlie, a homeless man who painted the typical image of a homeless person: rough, unshaven, and always looking for the next drink.

text: it 's predictable , but it jumps through the expected hoops with style and even some depth .
translation: Ia boleh diteka, tetapi ia melompat melalui rintangan yang dijangkakan dengan gaya dan malah sedikit mendalami.
back_translation: It can be guessed, but it leaps through the expected obstacles stylishly and even delves a little deeper.

text: back in france , werner recovers a taste for life and adrien returns to his solitary lifestyle .
translation: Kembali di Perancis, Werner mendapatkan kembali selera hidupnya dan Adrien kembali kepada gaya hidupnya yang soliter.
back_translation: Back in France, Werner regained his zest for life and Adrien returned to his solitary lifestyle.

text: together , they develop a criminal energy that knows no boundaries and leads them to cold-blooded murder . . .
translation: Bersama-sama, mereka mengembangkan satu energi jenayah yang tidak mempunyai batasan dan membawa mereka kepada pembunuhan kejam...
back_translation: Together, they developed a crime energy without limits that led them to brutal murders...

text: built in 1926 , the mansion resides on an indian burial ground and was the site of countless hangings at the hands of north georgia law enforcement , the kkk , and anyone else col . samuel tate wanted out of the way .
translation: Dibina pada tahun 1926, rumah besar ini terletak di atas tapak kuburan orang Indian dan merupakan tempat bagi berpuluh-puluh hukuman gantung yang dilakukan oleh pihak berkuasa undang-undang Georgia Utara, kkk, dan sesiapa sahaja yang ingin dijauhkan oleh kolonel Samuel Tate.
back_translation: Built in 1926, this large house is located on the site of an Indian burial ground and is the site of dozens of hangings carried out by the authorities of Northern Georgia, kkk, and anyone Colonel Samuel Tate wanted away.

text: as debby tries to parlay what was essentially a casual fling into possible marriage with an indifferent rick , her mother virginia wonders if her affair with widower nick is the real thing .
translation: Ketika Debby cuba untuk mengubah apa yang pada dasarnya adalah hubungan santai menjadi perkahwinan yang mungkin dengan Rick yang acuh tak acuh, ibunya Virginia merenung apakah hubungannya dengan duda Nick adalah benar-benar serius.
back_translation: When Debby tries to turn what is basically a casual relationship into a possible marriage with the indifferent Rick, her mother, Virginia, ponders whether her relationship with widower Nick is truly serious.

text: ivan , a captain of the soviet army , arrested by the front secret police 'smersh ' , has a narrow escape .
translation: Ivan, seorang kapten dalam tentera Soviet, ditahan oleh polis rahsia hadapan 'SMERSH', berjaya melarikan diri dengan jalan yang sempit.
back_translation: Ivan, a captain in the Soviet army, was arrested by the secret police 'SMERSH,' successfully escaped through a narrow path.

text: if you value your time and money , find an escape clause and avoid seeing this trite , predictable rehash .
translation: Jika anda menghargai masa dan wang anda, carilah klausa pelarian dan elakkan untuk menonton ulangan yang membosankan dan mudah dijangka ini.
back_translation: If you value your time and money, search for escape clauses and avoid watching these boring and easily predictable reruns.

text: overall , the film misses the brilliance of jelinek 's novel by some way . it settles for being merely grim .
translation: Secara keseluruhan, filem tersebut gagal menampilkan kegemilangan novel jelinek dengan jauh sekali. Ia berpuas hati dengan hanya menjadi kelam sahaja.
back_translation: Overall, the film failed to capture the brilliance of Jelinek's novel by far. It is content with just being bleak.

text: hale bopp is the story of just such a woman ; her name is rachel .
translation: Hale Bopp adalah kisah mengenai seorang wanita seperti itu; namanya ialah Rachel.
back_translation: Hale Bopp is a story about a woman like that; her name is Rachel.

text: 'a fresh-faced , big-hearted and frequently funny thrill ride for the kiddies , with enough eye candy and cheeky wit to keep parents away from the concession stand . '
translation: 'Tontonan yang segar, penuh semangat, dan sering kali lucu untuk kanak-kanak, dengan cukup ranjau mata dan kecerdikan nakal untuk menghalang ibu bapa dari gerai konsesi.'
back_translation: 'Fresh, energizing, and often funny entertainment for children, with enough eye-catching elements and mischievous cleverness to distract parents from the concession stand.'

text: it 's halloween season , and while ghost ship ca n't hold a candle to the ring for true primal scares , it 'll probably stay respectably afloat until at least most of the candy is gone .
translation: Ini musim halloween, dan walaupun kapal hantu tidak dapat bersaing dengan filem The Ring untuk ketakutan yang sebenar, ia mungkin akan terus layak berada di atas air sehingga sebahagian besar gula-gula habis.
back_translation: It's Halloween season, and while haunted houses may not compete with The Ring for genuine scares, they may still be afloat until most candies are gone.

text: ethan , a confident young architect and seeming 'perfect guy ' has invested himself , and his heart , in women like rachel before - and he is sure he has learned his lesson .
translation: Ethan, seorang arkitek muda yang yakin dan kelihatan sebagai 'lelaki sempurna' telah melaburkan dirinya, dan hatinya, kepada wanita-wanita seperti Rachel sebelum ini - dan dia pasti bahawa dia telah belajar dari pengalaman tersebut.
back_translation: Ethan, a confident young architect who appears to be the 'perfect man', has invested himself, and his heart, in women like Rachel before - and he is certain that he has learned from those experiences.

text: frank ( played by sal mazzotta ) , family under-bossman vito lupo ( played by leo rossi ) , and consigliori danny defino ( played by johnny williams ) try to find out who is responsible for usurping the family 's power before they implode from their own internal strife .
translation: Frank (dimainkan oleh Sal Mazzotta), family under-bossman Vito Lupo (dimainkan oleh Leo Rossi), dan consigliori Danny Defino (dimainkan oleh Johnny Williams) cuba mencari siapakah yang bertanggungjawab atas merebut kuasa keluarga sebelum mereka hancur akibat konflik dalaman sendiri.
back_translation: Frank (played by Sal Mazzotta), family under-boss Vito Lupo (played by Leo Rossi), and consigliori Danny Defino (played by Johnny Williams) try to find out who is responsible for seizing control of the family before they are destroyed by their own internal conflicts.

text: a series of surprise events further obstructs their relationship , but tobias perseveres .
translation: Siri peristiwa mengejutkan yang menghalang hubungan mereka, tetapi Tobias tetap bersungguh-sungguh.
back_translation: A series of shocking events that hindered their relationship, but Tobias remained steadfast.

text: he soon realizes that he is being hunted and takes off with marie on a search to find out who he is and why he is being hunted .
translation: Dia segera sedar bahawa dia sedang dikejar dan pergi bersama Marie untuk mencari tahu siapa dia sebenarnya dan mengapa dia sedang dikejar.
back_translation: He quickly realized that he was being chased and went with Marie to find out who he really was and why he was being pursued.

text: his father , aglanar , was happy at his birth that he would have a strong and honorable son to carry on the traditions of the valley .
translation: Bapanya, Aglanar, gembira dengan kelahirannya kerana dia akan mempunyai seorang anak lelaki yang kuat dan mulia untuk meneruskan tradisi lembah itu.
back_translation: His father, Aglanar, is delighted with his birth because he will have a strong and noble son to continue the tradition of the valley.

text: nobody chooses to come here , this where they end up .
translation: Tiada sesiapa memilih untuk datang ke sini, inilah tempat di mana mereka berakhir.
back_translation: No one chose to come here, this is the place where they end up.

text: however , on her second day , celia goes away leaving a 5-year-old child behind , kiki , and a note promising to be back in a couple of days .
translation: Bagaimanapun, pada hari kedua, Celia pergi meninggalkan seorang kanak-kanak berusia 5 tahun, Kiki, dan sebuah nota berjanji akan kembali dalam beberapa hari.
back_translation: However, on the second day, Celia left a 5-year-old child, Kiki, and a note promising to return in a few days.

text: the second coming of harry potter is a film far superior to its predecessor . a movie that successfully crushes a best selling novel into a timeframe that mandates that you avoid the godzilla sized soda .
translation: Kedatangan kembali Harry Potter adalah filem yang jauh lebih baik daripada pendahulunya. Filem yang berjaya menyatukan sebuah novel terlaris ke dalam jangka masa yang memerlukan anda mengelakkan minuman soda saiz Godzilla.
back_translation: The return of Harry Potter is a film that is far better than its predecessors. The successful film managed to adapt a bestselling novel into a timeframe that requires you to avoid Godzilla-sized soda drinks.

text: then she buys a bar of chocolate from the neighborhood store . . .
translation: Kemudian dia membeli sebatang coklat dari kedai serbaneka di kawasan itu . . .
back_translation: Then he bought a bar of chocolate from the convenience store in that area . . .

text: at the same time , william has become the object of wrath by a popular but pompous and pridefilled christian radio commentator who brands william as a false prophet and seeks to destroy him .
translation: Pada masa yang sama, William telah menjadi objek kemarahan oleh seorang penceramah radio kristian yang popular tetapi sombong dan penuh dengan rasa bangga, yang menggelari William sebagai nabi palsu dan berhasrat untuk memusnahkannya.
back_translation: At the same time, William has become the target of anger by a popular but arrogant and proud Christian radio preacher, who refers to William as a false prophet and desires to destroy him.

text: anyone who welcomes a dash of the avant-garde fused with their humor should take pleasure in this crazed , joyous romp of a film .
translation: Sesiapa yang menyukai sentuhan avant-garde yang dicampur dengan humor harus menikmati filem gila dan riang ini.
back_translation: Anyone who enjoys avant-garde touches mixed with humor should enjoy this crazy and cheerful film.

text: while philippa does not want to elude the justice she deserves for the four innocent deaths , filippo discovers he fell in love with the beautiful woman .
translation: Sementara Philippa tidak mahu mengelakkan keadilan yang sepatutnya dia terima atas kematian empat orang yang tidak bersalah, Filippo mendapati dia jatuh cinta dengan wanita cantik itu.
back_translation: While Philippa did not wish to evade the justice she rightfully deserved for the deaths of four innocent people, Filippo found himself falling in love with that beautiful woman.

text: the one obstacle he is n't expecting is the screenwriter 's assistant , screenwriter 4 . 0 's animated helper who 's annoyed bob left her to sit around so long .
translation: Halangan yang tidak dijangkakan adalah pembantu penulis skrin, pembantu animasi penulis skrin 4.0 yang kesal kerana Bob meninggalkannya begitu lama.
back_translation: The unexpected obstacle is the screenwriter's assistant, the screenwriter's animation assistant 4.0 who is upset because Bob left her for so long.

text: he dies alone at the hospital , and apparently everything nete planned went wrong .
translation: Dia meninggal seorang diri di hospital, dan nampaknya segala yang dirancang olehnya tidak berjalan lancar.
back_translation: He passed away alone in the hospital, and it seems that everything he planned did not go smoothly.

text: the casting of von sydow . . . is itself intacto 's luckiest stroke .
translation: Penggilan von Sydow . . . adalah langkah nasib yang paling mujur bagi Intacto.
back_translation: The call from von Sydow... is the luckiest twist of fate for Intacto.

text: an engaging and specific portrait of a culture in transition , even as it evokes humanity 's most universal and timeless values .
translation: potret yang menarik dan khusus tentang sebuah budaya dalam perubahan, sambil membangkitkan nilai-nilai yang paling universal dan abadi manusia.
back_translation: An interesting and special portrayal of a culture in transition, while evoking the most universal and timeless values of humanity.

text: he has become an inconvenient obstacle to his work-a-holic son , and lost all remaining freedoms , except the valued time he spends with his grandson .
translation: Dia telah menjadi halangan yang menyusahkan bagi anak lelaki yang bekerja keras dan telah kehilangan semua kebebasan yang tinggal, kecuali masa yang dihargai bersama cucunya.
back_translation: He has become a hindrance that troubles his hardworking son and has lost all freedom left, except for the cherished time spent with his grandchild.

text: a young father amaro arrives at his new church post on the orders of the bishop .
translation: Seorang bapa muda bernama Amaro tiba di kawasan gereja baru beliau atas perintah biskop.
back_translation: A young father named Amaro arrived at his new church area on the bishop's order.

text: the far future may be awesome to consider , but from period detail to matters of the heart , this film is most transporting when it stays put in the past .
translation: Masa depan jauh mungkin menarik untuk dipertimbangkan, tetapi dari segi detail masa hingga persoalan hati, filem ini paling memikat apabila ia tetap berada di dalam masa lampau.
back_translation: The future may be far and intriguing to consider, but in terms of the intricate details of time up to matters of the heart, this film is most captivating when it remains within the past.

text: a drug lord who pretends to overthrow the mexican government .
translation: seorang ketua sindiket dadah yang berpura-pura untuk menggulingkan kerajaan Mexico.
back_translation: a drug syndicate leader pretending to overthrow the Mexican government.

text: jim must make it back to his wedding in time , and finch must find the location of stifler 's mom 's wedding ( ending in 'the graduate ' style ) .
translation: Jim mesti sempat ke majlis perkahwinannya, dan Finch mesti mencari lokasi majlis perkahwinan ibu Stifler ('The Graduate' style).
back_translation: Jim must make it to his wedding ceremony, and Finch must find a location for Stifler's mother's wedding ('The Graduate' style).

text: he has returned as a ghost , but he can do nothing but passively observe as the police stand clueless to the murder .
translation: Dia telah kembali sebagai hantu, tetapi dia tidak dapat melakukan apa-apa selain mengamati secara pasif ketika polis tidak tahu apa-apa tentang pembunuhan itu.
back_translation: He has returned as a ghost, but he can do nothing except observe passively when the police are clueless about the murder.

text: unfortunately , heartbreak hospital wants to convey the same kind of haughtiness in its own sketchy material but this territory has already been explored previously with better aplomb and sardonic wit .
translation: Malangnya, Hospital Patah Hati ingin menyampaikan jenis keangkuhan yang sama dalam bahan sketsanya sendiri tetapi tempat ini sudah diterokai sebelum ini dengan lebih cemerlang dan kejahatan sarkastik.
back_translation: Unfortunately, Heartbreak Hospital wants to convey the same type of arrogance in its material, but this place has been explored before with more brilliance and sarcastic wickedness.

text: this little film is so slovenly done , so primitive in technique , that it ca n't really be called animation .
translation: Filem kecil ini begitu tidak teratur dilakukan, begitu primitif dalam tekniknya, sehingga ia tidak benar-benar boleh dipanggil sebagai animasi.
back_translation: This small film is so poorly executed, so primitive in its techniques, that it can't really be called an animation.

text: try as he might , the roguishly handsome cliff starkey , just ca n't keep out of trouble .
translation: Walau bagaimanapun dia cuba, Cliff Starkey yang tampan tapi nakal tidak dapat menjauhi masalah.
back_translation: No matter how he tries, handsome but mischievous Cliff Starkey cannot stay away from trouble.

text: when he was a young boy , kyle ( chaney kley ) claimed that while he was sleeping , he accidentally woke up and saw the tooth fairy , who tried to kill him .
translation: Apabila dia masih kanak-kanak, Kyle (Chaney Kley) mendakwa bahawa semasa dia sedang tidur, dia secara tidak sengaja terjaga dan melihat peri gigi, yang cuba membunuhnya.
back_translation: When he was still a child, Kyle (Chaney Kley) claimed that while he was sleeping, he accidentally woke up and saw the tooth fairy, who tried to kill him.

text: the movie 's biggest offense is its complete and utter lack of tension .
translation: Kesalahan terbesar filem ini adalah ketiadaan ketegangan yang lengkap dan mutlak.
back_translation: The biggest flaw of this movie is the complete lack of full and absolute tension.

text: the latter part of the film examines the forces both political and religious , that led to otte 's unusual appointment .
translation: Bahagian akhir filem itu menyiasat daya politik dan agama, yang menyebabkan pelantikan Otte yang tidak biasa.
back_translation: The final part of the film investigates the power of politics and religion, which leads to the unusual appointment of Otte.

text: to the horror of her friends and pumpkin 's overprotective mother , carolyn falls in love , becoming an outcast in the process .
translation: Buah hati yang suka jaga keselamatan labu dan kawan-kawannya terkejut apabila Carolyn jatuh cinta, menjadikan dirinya terasing dalam proses tersebut.
back_translation: The darling who enjoys taking care of the safety of pumpkins and friends is shocked when Carolyn falls in love, making herself isolated in the process.

text: jaglom . . . put [ s ] the audience in the privileged position of eavesdropping on his characters
translation: jaglom menempatkan penonton dalam posisi istimewa untuk mengintip karakter-karakternya.
back_translation: jaglom places the audience in a privileged position to peek at his characters.

text: lati , however , wants to return to school and finish her studies .
translation: Lati, bagaimanapun, ingin kembali ke sekolah dan menamatkan pelajarannya.
back_translation: However, Lati wants to return to school and complete her studies.

text: hill looks to be going through the motions , beginning with the pale script .
translation: Bukit kelihatan seolah-olah sedang bergerak, bermula dengan skrip pucat.
back_translation: The hill appears to be moving, starting with a pale script.

text: the chM-bteau would have been benefited from a sharper , cleaner script before it went in front of the camera . not to mention a sharper , cleaner camera lens .
translation: Kereta istana itu akan mendapat faedah daripada skrip yang lebih tajam dan bersih sebelum ia diterbitkan di hadapan kamera. Belum lagi lensa kamera yang lebih tajam dan bersih.
back_translation: The royal car will benefit from a sharper and cleaner script before it is published in front of the camera. Not to mention a sharper and cleaner camera lens.

text: the stunt work is top-notch ; the dialogue and drama often food-spittingly funny .
translation: Kerja aksi laga sangat hebat; dialog dan drama sering kali lucu hingga membuat kita terpingkal-pingkal.
back_translation: Action-packed work is very impressive; the dialogues and drama are often funny, making us chuckle.

text: all the actors are good in pauline & paulette but van der groen , described as 'belgium 's national treasure , ' is especially terrific as pauline .
translation: Semua pelakon hebat dalam Pauline & Paulette tetapi Van Der Groen, yang digambarkan sebagai 'harta kebangsaan Belgium,' sangat hebat sebagai Pauline.
back_translation: All the actors are great in Pauline & Paulette but Van Der Groen, portrayed as the 'national treasure of Belgium,' is outstanding as Pauline.

text: in the ensuing chaos , inez discovers the thorny side of true love and that finding one 's soul mate is never quite what you 'd expect .
translation: Dalam kekacauan yang berlaku, Inez menemui sisi berduri cinta sejati dan bahawa mencari jodoh sejati tidak pernah seperti yang anda jangkakan.
back_translation: In the midst of chaos, Inez finds the thorny side of true love and realizes that finding true soulmate is never as expected.

text: a bad day becomes worse by the hour and to top it off , the toilet wo n't flush .
translation: Sebuah hari yang buruk menjadi lebih teruk dengan setiap jam dan untuk memburukkan keadaan, tandas tidak boleh 'flush'.
back_translation: A bad day gets worse with every passing hour, and to top it off, the toilet won't flush.

text: their race against the clock to find the precious stones ultimately unravels a plot to distribute a deadly new weapon of war .
translation: Perlumbaan mereka melawan masa untuk mencari batu-batu berharga akhirnya membuka plot untuk mengedarkan senjata baru yang mematikan.
back_translation: Their race against time to find valuable stones has eventually led to a plot to distribute new deadly weapons.

text: chon then travels to new york for roy o'bannon ( owen wilson ) .
translation: Chon kemudian melancong ke New York untuk Roy O'Bannon (Owen Wilson).
back_translation: Chon then travels to New York with Roy O'Bannon (Owen Wilson).

text: r xmas offers a poetic and profane ambiguity that 's vintage ferrara .
translation: r xmas menawarkan keambiguan puisi dan yang jahat yang merupakan khas Ferrara.
back_translation: r xmas offers the ambiguity of poetry and the evil that is typical of Ferrara.

text: peter parker must now juggle three things in his life ; his new job at the local newspaper under a perpetually on-edge employer , his battle against the evil green goblin , and his fight to win the affections of beautiful classmate mary jane watson , against none other than his best friend harry osborn , son of norman osborn !
translation: Peter Parker kini perlu menyeimbangkan tiga perkara dalam hidupnya; pekerjaan baru di suratkhabar tempatan di bawah majikannya yang sentiasa tegang, pertempurannya dengan goblin hijau jahat, dan usahanya untuk memenangi hati rakan sekelas yang cantik, Mary Jane Watson, berlawan dengan sahabat baiknya Harry Osborn, anak Norman Osborn!
back_translation: Peter Parker now has to balance three things in his life; a new job at the local newspaper under his always tense boss, his battle with the evil Green Goblin, and his efforts to win the heart of the beautiful classmate, Mary Jane Watson, competing against his best friend, Harry Osborn, son of Norman Osborn!

text: salma goes native and she 's never been better in this colorful bio-pic of a mexican icon .
translation: Salma beralih kepada suasana tempatan dan dia tidak pernah lebih baik dalam filem biografi berwarna mengenai ikon Mexico ini.
back_translation: Salma embraced the local vibes and she has never been better in this colorful biographical film about this Mexican icon.

text: seldom has a movie so closely matched the spirit of a man and his work .
translation: Jarang sekali filem begitu tepat dengan semangat seseorang dan hasil kerjanya.
back_translation: Rarely does a film capture someone's spirit and work so accurately.

text: lapd detective sergeant mitch preston cares only about doing his job and nailing crooks .
translation: Sersan penyiasat detektif LAPD, Mitch Preston, hanya peduli tentang menjalankan tugasnya dan menangkap penjahat.
back_translation: LAPD detective sergeant, Mitch Preston, only cares about carrying out his duties and catching criminals.

text: a cautionary tale about the folly of superficiality that is itself endlessly superficial .
translation: sebuah cerita peringatan tentang kebodohan keserampangan yang pada hakikatnya adalah secara berterusan serampangan.
back_translation: A cautionary tale about the recklessness of foolishness that fundamentally continues to be reckless.

text: as a singular character study , it 's perfect . it 's also the year 's sweetest movie .
translation: Sebagai satu kajian watak tunggal, ia sempurna. Ini juga filem paling manis tahun ini.
back_translation: As a single character study, it is perfect. It is also the sweetest film of the year.

text: the trappings of i spy are so familiar you might as well be watching a rerun .
translation: Barangan-barangan dalam permainan i spy begitu dikenali sehingga anda seolah-olah sedang menonton ulangan.
back_translation: The items in the game i spy are so well-known that you feel like you're watching a rerun.

text: . . . a good film that must have baffled the folks in the marketing department .
translation: Filem yang bagus yang pasti membuatkan orang-orang di jabatan pemasaran terkejut.
back_translation: A great movie that will surely surprise people in the marketing department.

text: . . . a poignant and powerful narrative that reveals that reading writing and arithmetic are not the only subjects to learn in life .
translation: ... sebuah naratif yang menyentuh dan berkuasa yang mendedahkan bahawa membaca, menulis, dan berhitung bukanlah satu-satunya subjek yang perlu dipelajari dalam kehidupan.
back_translation: ... a touching and empowering narrative that reveals that reading, writing, and arithmetic are not the only subjects that need to be learned in life.

text: this will cause tremendous natural disasters , wiping out life as we know it .
translation: Ini akan menyebabkan bencana alam yang besar, memusnahkan kehidupan sebagaimana yang kita kenali.
back_translation: This will cause a major natural disaster, destroying life as we know it.

text: told from the point of view from archie ( qualls ) , a comic book collector , this is the story of a rivalry between two comic book shop owners .
translation: Diceritakan dari sudut pandang Archie (Qualls), seorang pengumpul buku komik, ini adalah kisah persaingan antara dua pemilik kedai buku komik.
back_translation: Narrated from the point of view of Archie (Qualls), a comic book collector, this is a tale of competition between two comic book store owners.

text: she meets a mysterious man ( mark wahlberg ) , who tells her that the money was really his , and he wants it back , seemingly convinced that she 's hiding the cash .

text: the film `` mnemosyne `` is based on the ancient poem `` thunder , perfect mind `` , a visual journey of the human race , exploring where we have been and what we can become .

text: lucky break is perfectly inoffensive and harmless , but it 's also drab and inert .

text: the action-packed caper revolves around a 12-year old girl who , with the help of two friends , robs the state-of-the-art bank where her mother works to acquire the cash needed for a costly operation to save her dying father .
translation: Kisah seru tersebut berkisar mengenai seorang gadis berusia 12 tahun yang, dengan bantuan dua orang temannya, merampok bank berteknologi tinggi di mana ibunya bekerja untuk mendapatkan wang yang diperlukan bagi operasi yang mahal untuk menyelamatkan bapanya yang sedang sekarat.

text: it 's a rosy coming-of-age romp that refuses to see the horror even in the severed heads from the guillotine .

text: offers a pleasant , challenging and quirky puzzle well worth working out .

text: three friends get together and bury a box making a pact to open it at midnight at their high school graduation .

text: after spending the night in the wilderness , sarah runs into peter , a survivalist type dressed in full combat gear , who promises to lead her out of the woods .

text: given the circumstances , kyle might have been acquitted on the grounds of temporary insanity or perhaps even convicted of the lesser charge of manslaughter , but the fact that a federal policeman was also killed in the shooting , albeit accidentally , sent kyle to marquezas .
translation: Diberi keadaan itu, kemungkinan Kyle telah dibebaskan atas alasan gila sementara atau mungkin malah disabitkan dengan tuduhan pembunuhan tidak sengaja, tetapi hakikat bahawa seorang pegawai polis persekutuan juga terbunuh dalam insiden tembak-menembak itu, walaupun secara tidak sengaja, menghantar Kyle ke Marquezas.
back_translation: Given that situation, it is possible that Kyle has been acquitted on grounds of temporary insanity or maybe even convicted of involuntary manslaughter, but the fact that a federal police officer was also killed in the shooting incident, albeit accidentally, sent Kyle to Marquezas.

Walau bagaimanapun, mereka masih

text: adolescents will be adequately served by the movie 's sophomoric blend of shenanigans and slapstick , although the more lascivious-minded might be disappointed in the relative modesty of a movie that sports a 'topless tutorial service . '
translation: Remaja akan dilayan dengan baik oleh filem yang menggabungkan kelucuan dan slapstick ini, walaupun yang lebih berfikiran lucah mungkin akan kecewa dengan kesederhanaan filem yang menampilkan 'perkhidmatan tutorial tanpa baju'.

text: still , as the camp 's highest-ranking american officer , he commands his fellow inmates , keeping a sense of honor alive in a place where honor is easy to destroy , all under the dangerous , ever-watchful eye of ss major wilhelm visser .
