translation: Tetapi dengan kehidupan dan kerjaya mereka hampir hancur, rakan sepasukan dan keluarga Bret sedar bahawa mereka perlu mengambil semula baseball - dan kehidupan - dari Bret Packard, sekali untuk selamanya.
back_translation: But with their lives and careers almost in ruins, Bret's teammates and family realize that they need to take back baseball - and life - from Bret Packard, once and for all.

text: if h . g . wells had a time machine and could take a look at his kin 's reworked version , what would he say ? 'it looks good , sonny , but you missed the point . '
translation: "Jika H.G. Wells mempunyai mesin waktu dan boleh melihat versi ulang keluarganya, apa yang akan beliau katakan? 'Nampak baik, nak, tetapi engkau tersilap faham tujuan.'"
back_translation: "If H.G. Wells had a time machine and could see a revised version of his family, what would he say? 'Looks good, dear, but you misunderstood the purpose.'"

text: the soundtrack alone -- the literal pulse of the thing -- will rock you in your seat .
translation: Soundtrack itu sendiri - denyut sebenar filem itu - akan menggoncangkan anda di tempat duduk anda.
back_translation: The soundtrack itself - the true pulse of the movie - will shake you in your seat.

text: twohy is not only skilled at building and maintaining suspense , he 's also aware that a cast chock full of experienced character actors is the right fit for a haunted sub flick .
translation: Twohy tidak hanya mahir dalam membina dan mengekalkan rasa janggal, tetapi dia juga sedar bahawa pelakon berwatak berpengalaman adalah pilihan yang tepat untuk filem misteri yang dipenuhi dengan ketegangan.
back_translation: Twohy is not only skilled in creating and maintaining suspense, but he also understands that experienced character actors are the right choice for a tension-filled mystery film.

text: this undercover documentary takes you deep into the controversial arena of backyard wrestling where the limits are constantly being tested . . . and
translation: dokumentari sulit ini membawa anda ke dalam arena kontroversi gulat belakang rumah di mana batas sentiasa diuji. . . dan
back_translation: This challenging documentary takes you into the backyard wrestling arena where boundaries are always being tested. . . and

text: as underwater ghost stories go , below casts its spooky net out into the atlantic ocean and spits it back , grizzled and charred , somewhere northwest of the bermuda triangle .
translation: Apabila bercerita tentang kisah hantu di bawah air, di bawah ini menghulurkan jaring seramnya ke lautan Atlantik dan memuntahkannya kembali, berusia dan hangus, di suatu tempat di barat laut segitiga Bermuda.
back_translation: When telling tales of ghosts underwater, below extends its horrifying tendrils into the Atlantic Ocean and regurgitates it back, aged and charred, somewhere in the northwest of the Bermuda Triangle.

text: chilling in its objective portrait of dreary , lost twenty-first century america .
translation: Mengagumkan dengan lukisan objektifnya tentang Amerika abad ke-21 yang suram dan hilang.
back_translation: Amazing with its objective paintings of a bleak and lost 21st century America.

text: the girls are treated like outcasts because they have inadvertently wrecked townsville in a superpowered game of tag .
translation: Gadis-gadis itu diperlakukan sebagai golongan terpinggir kerana mereka secara tidak sengaja telah merosakkan Townsville dalam permainan game tag yang superkuasa.
back_translation: The girls were treated as outcasts because they inadvertently damaged Townsville in the superhero game of tag.

text: clever and unflinching in its comic barbs , slap her is a small but rewarding comedy that takes aim at contemporary southern adolescence and never lets up .
translation: Pandai dan tidak goyah dalam penekanan komiknya, Slap Her adalah sebuah komedi kecil namun memuaskan yang membidik remaja selatan kontemporari dan tidak pernah mengendur.
back_translation: Smart and unwavering in its comic delivery, Slap Her is a small yet satisfying comedy that targets contemporary southern teenagers and never slackens.

text: the story is set against a relationship that forms between the american hustler boy and a brazilian teenage girl who must help each other survive the drug gang-controlled slums of rio de janeiro .
translation: Cerita ini berlatar belakang hubungan yang terbentuk antara seorang remaja lelaki penipu Amerika dan seorang gadis remaja Brasil yang harus membantu satu sama lain untuk bertahan hidup di kawasan kumuh Rio de Janeiro yang dikuasai geng narkoba.
back_translation: This story revolves around the relationship that forms between a deceitful American teenage boy and a Brazilian teenage girl who must help each other to survive in the drug gang-infested slums of Rio de Janeiro.

text: too ordinary to restore [ harmon ] to prominence , despite some creepy scenes that evoke childish night terrors , and a praiseworthy attempt to generate suspense rather than gross out the audience .
translation: Terlalu biasa untuk mengembalikan [ harmon ] kepada kemasyhuran, walaupun terdapat beberapa adegan yang menakutkan yang mengingatkan pada ketakutan malam kanak-kanak, dan usaha yang patut dipuji untuk menghasilkan ketegangan daripada membuat penonton terkejut.
back_translation: Too common to return harmony to fame, even though there are some frightening scenes that recall the fears of children at night, and commendable efforts to create tension instead of just shocking the audience.

text: something akin to a japanese alice through the looking glass , except that it seems to take itself far more seriously .
translation: Sesuatu yang serupa dengan kisah Alice di dalam cermin ajaib gaya Jepun, hanya bahawa ceritanya kelihatan mengambil segalanya dengan lebih serius.
back_translation: Something like Alice's story in a Japanese-style magical mirror, except that the story seems to take everything more seriously.

text: her mother 's friends , who formed a secret society , the ya-ya sisterhood , as children , kidnap siddalee from her new york apartment and take her home to louisiana , where they explain why her mother mistreated her with help from the secret ya-ya scrapbook ( and copious flashbacks ) .
translation: Rakan-rakan ibunya, yang membentuk sebuah masyarakat rahsia, Persaudaraan Ya-Ya, semasa kanak-kanak, menculik Siddalee dari apartmennya di New York dan membawanya pulang ke Louisiana, di mana mereka menjelaskan mengapa ibunya memperlakukannya dengan tidak adil dengan bantuan scrapbook rahsia Ya-Ya (dan pelbagai kilasan balik).
back_translation: Her mother's friends, who formed a secret society, the Ya-Ya Sisterhood, during her childhood, kidnapped Siddalee from her apartment in New York and brought her home to Louisiana, where they explained why her mother treated her unfairly with the help of the secret Ya-Ya scrapbook (and various flashbacks).

text: a bit of whimsically warped history elevated by the central performance of ian holm .
translation: Sejarah yang sedikit keliru dengan sentuhan keunikan yang ditingkatkan oleh persembahan utama oleh Ian Holm.
back_translation: A slightly confusing history with a touch of uniqueness enhanced by the outstanding performance by Ian Holm.

text: aka is the story of a disaffected youth 's search for love , status , and identity in late 1970s britain .
translation: AKA adalah kisah pencarian cinta, status, dan identiti remaja yang tidak bersemangat pada akhir tahun 1970-an di Britain.
back_translation: AKA is a tale of teenage search for love, status, and identity in Britain at the end of the 1970s.

text: due to a botched robbery attempt , a ruthless romanian barbarian is somehow resurrected in modern day new york and begins wreaking havok on a small manhattan art-house .
translation: Akibat percubaan perompakan yang gagal, seorang bararian Romania yang kejam bangkit semula di New York moden dan mula memberi kemusnahan di sebuah art-house kecil di Manhattan.
back_translation: As a result of a failed robbery attempt, a cruel Romanian barbarian rises again in modern New York and begins wreaking havoc in a small art-house in Manhattan.

text: fans of the tv series will be disappointed , and everyone else will be slightly bored .
translation: Peminat siri TV akan kecewa, dan yang lain akan sedikit bosan.
back_translation: TV series fans will be disappointed, while others may get a bit bored.

text: investors from around the world are intrigued to bring money to the project heavily backed by patricia .
translation: Pelabur dari seluruh dunia tertarik untuk membawa wang ke projek yang sangat disokong oleh Patricia.
back_translation: Investors from around the world are interested in bringing money into projects strongly supported by Patricia.

text: they have one request - their bosses head on a plate .
translation: Mereka mempunyai satu permintaan - kepala bos mereka di atas pinggan.
back_translation: They have one request - their boss's head on a plate.

text: will give many ministers and bible-study groups hours of material to discuss . but mainstream audiences will find little of interest in this film , which is often preachy and poorly acted .
translation: Filem ini akan memberi banyak menteri dan kumpulan kajian Bible banyak bahan untuk dibincangkan. Tetapi penonton mainstream akan mendapati sedikit perkara menarik dalam filem ini, yang sering kali bersifat menyampaikan ajaran agama dan lakonan yang kurang baik.
back_translation: This movie will provide many ministers and Bible study groups with a lot of material to discuss. However, mainstream audiences will find little of interest in this film, which often comes across as being preachy and featuring subpar acting.

text: it 's also curious to note that this film , like the similarly ill-timed antitrust , is easily as bad at a fraction the budget .
translation: Juga menarik untuk diperhatikan bahawa filem ini, seperti antitrust yang juga tidak disukai pada masanya, begitu teruk walaupun dibuat dengan bajet yang jauh lebih rendah.
back_translation: It is also interesting to note that this film, like Antitrust which also was not well-liked at its time, did so poorly even though it was made with a much lower budget.

text: tambor and clayburgh make an appealing couple M-^W he 's understated and sardonic , she 's appealingly manic and energetic . both deserve better .
translation: Tambor dan Clayburgh merupakan pasangan yang menarik. Dia bersifat sederhana dan sinis, sementara dia menarik secara manic dan energetik. Keduanya layak mendapat yang lebih baik.
back_translation: Tambor and Clayburgh are an interesting pair. He is simple and cynical, while she is attractive in a manic and energetic way. Both deserve better.

text: it uses some of the figures from the real-life story to portray themselves in the film . the result is a powerful , naturally dramatic piece of low-budget filmmaking .
translation: Filem ini menggunakan beberapa watak daripada kisah benar untuk menggambarkan diri mereka dalam filem. Hasilnya ialah sebuah karya sinematografi beranggaran rendah yang kuat dan dramatik secara semulajadi.
back_translation: This film uses several characters from real-life stories to portray themselves in the film. The result is a low-budget cinematic work that is powerful and naturally dramatic.

text: what could have been a pointed little chiller about the frightening seductiveness of new technology loses faith in its own viability and succumbs to joyless special-effects excess .
translation: Apa yang sepatutnya menjadi sebuah cerita seram yang mengasyikkan tentang daya tarik menakutkan teknologi baharu kehilangan keyakinan terhadap kebolehpercayaannya sendiri dan tunduk kepada kelebihan visual kering.
back_translation: What should have been an exciting horror story about the scary allure of new technology losing faith in its own reliability and succumbing to dry visual advantages.

text: `` maid in manhattan `` is a charmer , a pc `` pretty woman `` that ditches the odious prostitution theme for class commentary
translation: "Maid in Manhattan" adalah sebuah filem yang menawan, sebuah versi "Pretty Woman" yang meninggalkan tema pelacuran yang menjijikkan untuk memberikan komen mengenai kelas.
back_translation: "Maid in Manhattan" is a charming film, a version of "Pretty Woman" that moves away from the distasteful theme of prostitution to provide commentary on class.

text: when algren is injuried and captured by the samurai , learns about their warrior honor code from katsumoto , the samurai & # 180 ; s leader and decide which side of the conflict he wants to be on . . .
translation: Apabila Algren cedera dan ditawan oleh samurai, dia belajar mengenai kod kehormatan pejuang mereka dari Katsumoto, pemimpin samurai, dan memutuskan pihak mana dalam konflik yang ingin dia sokong...
back_translation: When Algren is injured and taken captive by the samurai, he learns about their warriors' code of honor from Katsumoto, the samurai leader, and decides which side of the conflict he wants to support...

text: a band of college students go to a rave on a mysterious island and get more than they bargained for when they find themselves stalked by killer zombies and terrifying creatures intent on feasting on the flesh of the living .
translation: Sebuah kumpulan pelajar kolej pergi ke parti rave di sebuah pulau misteri dan mendapat lebih daripada yang mereka jangka apabila mereka didatangi oleh zombi pembunuh dan makhluk-menakutkan yang berniat untuk merayap ke atas daging manusia.
back_translation: A group of college students went to a rave party on a mysterious island and got more than they bargained for when they were attacked by killer zombies and terrifying creatures intent on feasting on human flesh.

text: while shooting an engagement party , he attempts to make a connection with jen , the beautiful sister of the bride .
translation: Semasa merakam majlis pertunangan, dia cuba untuk berhubung dengan Jen, adik cantik pengantin perempuan.
back_translation: While recording the engagement ceremony, he tried to connect with Jen, the beautiful sister of the bride.

text: an unintentionally surreal kid 's picture . . . in which actors in bad bear suits enact a sort of inter-species parody of a vh1 behind the music episode .
translation: sebuah gambar kanak-kanak secara tidak sengaja menjadi surreal... di mana pelakon dalam kostum beruang yang buruk beraksi seperti parodi antara spesies mengenai episod "behind the music" VH1.
back_translation: An image of a child inadvertently becomes surreal... where an actor in a shoddy bear costume acts like a parody of animal species in a VH1 "behind the music" episode.

text: goes on and on to the point of nausea .
translation: Berterusan tanpa henti sehingga menimbulkan rasa mual.
back_translation: Continuously without stopping until it causes nauseousness.

text: neither as scary-funny as tremors nor demented-funny as starship troopers , the movie is n't tough to take as long as you 've paid a matinee price .
translation: Tidak begitu menakutkan-lucu seperti Tremors atau gila-lucu seperti Starship Troopers, filem ini tidak terlalu sukar diterima selagi anda membayar harga tiket matine.
back_translation: Not as scary-funny as Tremors or crazy-funny as Starship Troopers, this film is not too difficult to digest as long as you pay the matinee ticket price.

text: i ca n't say that i liked homeboy ; it 'd be more accurate to say that i found it intriguing , bizarre , dogma-like in spots - and quite truthful , in its way .
translation: Saya tidak boleh kata bahawa saya suka Homeboy; lebih tepat untuk mengatakan bahawa saya mendapati ia menarik, aneh, seperti dogma di beberapa tempat - dan cukup jujur, dalam caranya.
back_translation: I cannot say that I like Homeboy; it is more accurate to say that I find it interesting, strange, like a dogma in some places - and quite honest, in its own way.

text: until then , he spends most of his time watching sloppy tearjerkers on video .
translation: Sehingga pada masa itu, dia menghabiskan sebahagian besar waktunya menonton filem sedih yang melampau di video.
back_translation: By that time, she spent most of her time watching overly sad movies on video.

text: with a rare gift for melding subjectivity with biographical facts , m & # 225 ; rton brings sabina spielrein back to life , body and soul .
translation: Dengan bakat yang jarang untuk menggabungkan subjektiviti dengan fakta biografi, Márton menghidupkan semula Sabina Spielrein, jiwa dan raga.
back_translation: With a rare talent to combine subjectivity with biographical facts, Márton brings to life Sabina Spielrein, mind and body.

text: while it does n't expose any new truths about the problems posed by reaching middle age , it reflects wisely on the truths that already exist .
translation: Walaupun ia tidak mendedahkan sebarang kebenaran baru tentang masalah yang timbul semasa mencapai pertengahan umur, ia menggambarkan dengan bijaksana mengenai kebenaran yang sudah wujud.
back_translation: Although it does not reveal any new truths about the issues that arise during midlife, it cleverly describes the existing truths.

text: if borstal boy is n't especially realistic , it is an engaging nostalgia piece .
translation: Jika Borstal Boy tidak terlalu realistik, ia adalah sebuah karya nostalgia yang menarik.
back_translation: If Borstal Boy is not too realistic, it is an interesting work of nostalgia.

text: all of this changes when he finds a large mysterious package left on his doorstep .
translation: Semuanya berubah apabila dia menemui sebuah bungkusan besar misteri ditinggalkan di hadapan pintu rumahnya.
back_translation: Everything changed when he found a large mysterious package left in front of his house.

text: the feature-length stretch . . . strains the show 's concept .
translation: Jalur yang panjang itu menekan konsep pertunjukan.
back_translation: The long route suppresses the concept of the show.

text: unambitious writing emerges in the movie , using a plot that could have come from an animated-movie screenwriting textbook .
translation: Penulisan tanpa hasrat muncul dalam filem ini, menggunakan plot yang seolah-olah diambil daripada buku teks penulisan skrin filem animasi.
back_translation: Writing without passion appears in this movie, using a plot that seems to be taken from a textbook on writing screenplays for animated movies.

text: so fiendishly cunning that even the most jaded cinema audiences will leave the auditorium feeling dizzy , confused , and totally disorientated . not to mention absolutely refreshed .
translation: Sangat cerdik sehingga penonton filem yang paling jemu pun akan meninggalkan dewan panggung berasa pening, keliru, dan benar-benar tidak teratur. Belum lagi betul-betul berasa segar semula.
back_translation: So clever that even the most bored moviegoers will leave the theater feeling dizzy, confused, and completely disorganized. Not to mention feeling completely refreshed again.

text: feels like the grittiest movie that was ever made for the lifetime cable television network .
translation: Seolah-olah filem paling kasar yang pernah dihasilkan untuk rangkaian televisyen kabel seumur hidup.
back_translation: Like the roughest film ever produced for a lifetime cable television network.

text: an entertaining quasi-critique of modern manners whose comedy arises out of its gravity -- and a winning performance by ricardo darin .
translation: satire yang menghiburkan tentang adat moden yang komedinya timbul dari keseriusannya - dan lakonan menarik oleh ricardo darin.
back_translation: entertaining satire about modern customs where the comedy arises from its seriousness - and an intriguing performance by Ricardo Darin.

text: it ai n't art , by a long shot , but unlike last year 's lame musketeer , this dumas adaptation entertains .
translation: Bukanlah seni yang hebat, tetapi berbeza jauh dari filem musketeer yang membosankan tahun lalu, adaptasi Dumas ini menghiburkan.
back_translation: It's not a great piece of art, but far from the boring musketeer film of last year, this adaptation of Dumas is entertaining.

text: devastated by her husband 's death from a drug overdose , philippa ( played by cate blanchett ) , a british teacher living in turin , italy , tries to bring justice to the biggest drug dealer in turin when the local police ignore her information about him .
translation: Terkesima dengan kematian suaminya akibat overdosis dadah, Philippa (dipersembahkan oleh Cate Blanchett), seorang guru British yang tinggal di Turin, Itali, cuba untuk membawa keadilan kepada peniaga dadah terbesar di Turin apabila pihak polis tempatan mengabaikan maklumatnya tentang lelaki tersebut.
back_translation: Stunned by her husband's death due to a drug overdose, Philippa (portrayed by Cate Blanchett), a British teacher living in Turin, Italy, tries to seek justice against Turin's biggest drug dealer when the local police ignore her information about the man.

text: once they begin towing the ghost ship towards harbor , a series of bizarre ocurrences happen and the group becomes trapped inside the ship , which they soon learn is inhabited by a demonic creature .
translation: Apabila mereka mula menunda kapal hantu ke pelabuhan, satu siri kejadian aneh berlaku dan kumpulan tersebut terperangkap di dalam kapal, yang kemudian mereka dapati dihuni oleh makhluk berkepala syaitan.
back_translation: When they start to tow the ghost ship to the port, a series of strange incidents occur and the group becomes trapped inside the ship, which they later discover is inhabited by demon-headed creatures.

text: the young man find herbert down in his jail cell and learns for himself just what the re-agent is capable of .
translation: Remaja itu menemui Herbert di dalam sel buinya dan belajar sendiri kemampuan yang dimiliki oleh re-agent itu.
back_translation: The teenager met Herbert in his cell and independently learned about the abilities possessed by the re-agent.

text: we just do n't really care too much about this love story . in that setting , their struggle is simply too ludicrous and borderline insulting .
translation: Kami tidak begitu peduli dengan kisah cinta ini. Dalam suasana itu, perjuangan mereka terlalu melampau dan hampir menghina.
back_translation: We don't really care about this love story. In that situation, their struggles were too excessive and almost insulting.

text: a stone building , newly restored , stands in the clear light of the autumnal equinox .
translation: Bangunan batu yang baru dipulihara berdiri di dalam cahaya terang ekuinoks musim luruh.
back_translation: The newly restored stone building stands in the bright light of the autumn equinox.

text: struggling to fit in , jonathan decides to stop going to church only to be pursued by the members of the local singles ward who want to reactivate him .
translation: Merungut kerana tidak selesa, Jonathan memutuskan untuk berhenti pergi ke gereja hanya untuk dikejar oleh ahli-ahli dari kumpulan dewasa muda tempatan yang ingin mengaktifkannya semula.
back_translation: Grumbling about feeling uncomfortable, Jonathan decided to stop going to church only to be chased by members of the local young adult group who wanted to reactivate him.

text: may take its sweet time to get wherever it 's going , but if you have the patience for it , you wo n't feel like it 's wasted yours .
translation: Mungkin mengambil masa yang lama untuk sampai ke destinasi, tetapi jika anda mempunyai kesabaran, anda tidak akan berasa seperti masa anda telah terbuang.
back_translation: It may take a long time to reach the destination, but if you have patience, you won't feel like your time has been wasted.

text: it 's more enjoyable than i expected , though , and that 's because the laughs come from fairly basic comedic constructs . cinematic pratfalls given a working over . the cast is spot on and the mood is laid back .
translation: Ia lebih menyeronokkan daripada yang saya jangka, walaupun, dan itu kerana gelak berasal dari konstruk komedi yang agak asas. Insiden panggung yang diberikan sentuhan kemas. Pelakonnya tepat dan suasana yang santai.
back_translation: It was more enjoyable than I expected, though, and that's because the humor comes from rather basic comedic constructs. The stage incidents were neatly executed. The actors were precise and the atmosphere was relaxed.

text: even if the naipaul original remains the real masterpiece , the movie possesses its own languorous charm .
translation: Walaupun karya asal Naipaul tetap merupakan arca master sejati, filem ini mempunyai daya tarikan yang unik.
back_translation: Although Naipaul's original work remains a true masterpiece, this film has a unique appeal.

text: the young man looks for comfort in his father , but he 's to occupied with winning the eurovision song contest .
translation: Pemuda itu mencari keselesaan dalam bapanya, tetapi bapanya terlalu sibuk dengan memenangi pertandingan lagu Eurovision.
back_translation: The youth sought comfort in his father, but his father was too busy winning the Eurovision song contest.

text: everything goes wrong when they try to rob a bank , though they meet mille , who puts them onto a new trail , and peter and martin also make a contribution .
translation: Segala-galanya menjadi huru-hara apabila mereka cuba merompak sebuah bank, walaupun mereka bertemu dengan Mille, yang membawa mereka kepada jejak baru, dan Peter serta Martin juga memberikan sumbangan.
back_translation: Everything becomes chaotic when they attempt to rob a bank, even though they encounter Mille, who leads them to a new trail, and Peter and Martin also contribute.

text: . . . watching this film nearly provoked me to take my own life . and if the hours wins 'best picture ' i just might .
translation: Menonton filem ini hampir memprovokasi saya untuk mengambil nyawa sendiri. Jika filem itu memenangi 'gambar terbaik', saya mungkin akan melakukannya.
back_translation: Watching this movie almost provoked me to take my own life. If the movie wins 'Best Picture', I might just do it.

text: the results are as giddy , painful , sad and loving as real life tends to be .
translation: Keputusannya sebagaimana kehidupan sebenar, penuh dengan kegembiraan, kesakitan, kesedihan, dan kasih sayang.
back_translation: The decision is like real life, full of joy, pain, sadness, and love.

text: talk to her manages to be female-centric even as it explores the lives of men .
translation: Perbualannya berjaya memberi fokus kepada wanita walaupun meneroka kehidupan lelaki.
back_translation: His journey successfully brings focus to women even though exploring the lives of men.

text: she ca n't get in there because te door is locked .
translation: Dia tidak boleh masuk kerana pintu itu berkunci.
back_translation: He cannot enter because the door is locked.

text: the four girls are teased and discriminated against by their other colleagues and are finally fired by their beautiful , evil boss christine .
translation: Keempat gadis itu digoda dan didiskriminasi oleh rakan sekerja lain dan akhirnya dipecat oleh bos cantik dan jahat mereka, Christine.
back_translation: The four girls were teased and discriminated against by their other colleagues and ultimately fired by their beautiful and wicked boss, Christine.

text: in a botched attempt to organize a protest against their `` slave labor `` , the women take over the prison - a rare glimpse of the effects of the prison industrial complex on female inmates .
translation: Dalam percubaan gagal untuk menganjurkan protes menentang 'buruh hamba' mereka, wanita-wanita mengambil alih penjara - satu pandangan jarang mengenai kesan kompleks industri penjara terhadap banduan wanita.
back_translation: In a failed attempt to organize protests against their 'slave labor', women took over the prison - a rare insight into the complex effects of the prison industry on female inmates.

text: he trades his grandmother 's only treasure for a video game ; he throws his food and he throws tantrums .
translation: Dia menukar harta pusaka neneknya dengan permainan video; dia membuang makanannya dan melenting dengan marah.
back_translation: He exchanged his grandmother's inheritance for a video game; he threw away his food and stormed off angrily.

text: kids surely will like it . and for adults , it 's perfectly watchable in a rugrats-y sort of way .
translation: Kanak-kanak pasti akan suka. Dan untuk orang dewasa, ia sesuai ditonton dengan gaya Rugrats-y.
back_translation: Children will surely love it. And for adults, it is suitable to watch with a Rugrats-like style.

text: will these four be able to move on with their lives and accept the fact that it 's time to start acting their age ?
translation: Adakah empat ini akan dapat meneruskan kehidupan mereka dan menerima hakikat bahawa sudah tiba masanya untuk bertindak menurut umur mereka?
back_translation: Will these four be able to continue their lives and accept the fact that it is time to act according to their age?

text: later he is catering at a party featuring a wise old guru , who gets drunk and passes out .
translation: Kemudian dia menyediakan makanan di sebuah majlis yang menampilkan seorang guru tua yang bijak, yang mabuk dan pengsan.
back_translation: Then he provided food at an event featuring an old, wise teacher who was drunk and unconscious.

text: the inhospitability of the land emphasizes the spare precision of the narratives and helps to give them an atavistic power , as if they were tales that had been handed down since the beginning of time .
translation: Ketidakramahan tanah menekankan ketepatan naratif yang ringkas dan membantu memberikan kuasa atavistik padanya, seolah-olah mereka adalah cerita yang telah diwariskan sejak zaman purba.
back_translation: The inhospitality of the land emphasizes the accuracy of a concise narrative and helps to give it an atavistic power, as if they are stories that have been passed down since ancient times.

text: a committed , intelligent and fascinating piece of work with no irony about it .
translation: Sebuah karya yang komited, bijak, dan menarik tanpa sindiran di dalamnya.
back_translation: A committed, clever, and interesting work without any sarcasm in it.

text: in an era when the country 's first line of defense , intelligence , is more important than ever , comes an explosive thriller starring al pacino and colin farrell that for the first time opens the cia 's infamous closed doors and gives an insider 's view into the agency : how trainees are recruited , how they are prepared for the spy game , and what they learn to survive .
translation: Dalam era di mana pertahanan pertama negara, iaitu perisikan, lebih penting daripada sebelum ini, datanglah sebuah thriller yang memukau yang dibintangi oleh Al Pacino dan Colin Farrell yang bagi pertama kalinya membongkar pintu-pintu tertutup CIA yang terkenal dan memberi pandangan dari dalam tentang agensi itu: bagaimana calon-calon direkrut, bagaimana mereka dipersiapkan untuk permainan spion, dan apa yang mereka pelajari untuk bertahan.
back_translation: In an era where a nation's first line of defense, namely intelligence, is more crucial than ever, comes a captivating thriller starring Al Pacino and Colin Farrell that for the first time unlocks the closed doors of the renowned CIA and provides an insider's view of the agency: how recruits are chosen, how they are prepared for the spy game, and what they learn to survive.

text: dori is 50 years old , actually the exact age of ben 's mother .
translation: Dori berumur 50 tahun, sebenarnya usia tepat ibu Ben.
back_translation: Dori is 50 years old, which is actually Ben's mother's exact age.

text: a brutally honest documentary about a much anticipated family reunion that goes wrong thanks to culture shock and a refusal to empathize with others .
translation: Sebuah dokumentari yang jujur tentang reuni keluarga yang dinanti-nantikan yang menjadi huru-hara disebabkan oleh kejutan budaya dan penolakan untuk empati dengan orang lain.
back_translation: An honest documentary about a long-awaited family reunion that turns into chaos due to cultural shocks and a refusal to empathize with others.

text: [ cuarM-sn has ] created a substantive movie out of several cliched movie structures : the road movie , the coming-of-age movie , and the teenage sex comedy .
translation: cuarM-sn telah mencipta filem yang mendalam daripada beberapa struktur filem klise: filem tentang perjalanan, filem tentang peringkat pertumbuhan, dan filem komedi dewasa remaja.
back_translation: CuarkM has created a profound film from several cliché film structures: a film about journeys, a film about stages of growth, and a teen adult comedy film.

text: add yet another hat to a talented head , clooney 's a good director .
translation: Tambah lagi sebuah topi kepada kepala yang berbakat, Clooney adalah seorang pengarah yang baik.
back_translation: Add another hat to the talented head, Clooney is a good director.

text: scooby doo is surely everything its fans are hoping it will be , and in that sense is a movie that deserves recommendation .
translation: Scooby Doo pastinya adalah segala-galanya yang peminatnya harapkan, dan dalam konteks itu, filem ini layak mendapat rekomen.
back_translation: Scooby Doo is definitely everything that fans hope for, and in that context, this movie deserves a recommendation.

text: set in the rugged mountains and lush , untamed forests of the pacific northwest , tribe of joseph is an engrossing tale of troubled youths plucked from the familiarity of their urban lives and transported into the alien isolation and life or death danger of a survivalist existence .
translation: Terletak di kawasan gunung yang berbatu dan hutan lebat yang belum dijinakkan di sebelah barat laut Pasifik, Tribe of Joseph adalah kisah yang menarik tentang pemuda yang bermasalah yang dicabut dari kehidupan bandar mereka yang biasa dan dihantar ke keadaan isolasi asing dan bahaya hidup atau mati dalam kehidupan pemiutang.
back_translation: Located in a rocky mountainous area and untamed dense forest in the northwest Pacific, Tribe of Joseph is an intriguing story of troubled youths plucked from their usual urban lives and sent into a foreign and dangerous isolated state of living or dying in a debt life.

text: people are becoming petrified , and no-one knows what is doing it .
translation: Orang ramai semakin menjadi batu, dan tiada sesiapa yang tahu apa yang menyebabkannya.
back_translation: The public is increasingly becoming stone, and no one knows what is causing it.

text: despite the opulent lushness of every scene , the characters never seem to match the power of their surroundings .
translation: Walaupun setiap adegan dipenuhi dengan kemewahan yang melimpah, watak-watak tidak pernah kelihatan sepadan dengan kehebatan persekitaran mereka.
back_translation: Although every scene is filled with overflowing luxury, the characters never seem to match the grandeur of their surroundings.

text: along the way , his vendetta quest leads to the son of howard saint ( travolta ) , a former underworld boss who had gone straight , but the death of his son leads him to get back into crime , and he 's gunning for the punisher .
translation: Seiring perjalanannya, misinya membalas dendam membawanya kepada anak Howard Saint (Travolta), bekas bos dunia bawah yang telah bertaubat, tetapi kematian anaknya membawanya kembali kepada jenayah, dan dia mengejar si Penjagal.
back_translation: As he journeys on, his mission of revenge leads him to the son of Howard Saint (Travolta), a former underworld boss who has repented, but the death of his son brings him back to a life of crime, and he pursues the Punisher.

text: less worrying about covering all the drama in frida 's life and more time spent exploring her process of turning pain into art would have made this a superior movie .
translation: Kurang bimbang tentang menampilkan semua drama dalam hidup Frida dan lebih banyak masa yang dihabiskan untuk meneroka prosesnya dalam menukar kesakitan menjadi seni akan menjadikan filem ini lebih unggul.
back_translation: Less worrying about showcasing all the drama in Frida's life and more time spent exploring her process of turning pain into art will make this film more outstanding.

text: when mcconaughey 's girlfriend ( played by kate beckinsale ) becomes pregnant , the pair are fearful that the baby will inherit the oldman gene .
translation: Apabila kekasih McConaughey (dimainkan oleh Kate Beckinsale) hamil, pasangan tersebut takut bahawa bayi itu akan mewarisi gen "oldman".
back_translation: When McConaughey's girlfriend (played by Kate Beckinsale) gets pregnant, the couple is afraid that the baby will inherit the "oldman" gene.

text: the doctor realizes it' 's a love virus so he advises him to woo the girl somehow , not realizing that munnabhai has fallen for none other than his own younger sister komal .
translation: Doktor menyedari bahawa itu adalah virus cinta jadi dia menasihati dia untuk memikat gadis tersebut dengan cara tertentu, tanpa menyedari bahawa Munnabhai telah jatuh cinta kepada adik perempuannya sendiri, Komal.
back_translation: The doctor realized that it was a love virus, so he advised him to woo the girl in a certain way, without realizing that Munnabhai had fallen in love with his own younger sister, Komal.

text: nelson 's intentions are good , but the end result does no justice to the story itself . it 's horribly depressing and not very well done .
translation: Niat Nelson baik, tetapi hasil akhirnya tidak mempersembahkan keadilan kepada cerita itu sendiri. Ia sangat menyedihkan dan tidak dilakukan dengan baik.
back_translation: Nelson's intentions were good, but the end result did not do justice to the story itself. It was very disappointing and not well executed.

text: comes off like a rejected abc afterschool special , freshened up by the dunce of a screenwriting 101 class . . . . designed to provide a mix of smiles and tears , `` crossroads `` instead provokes a handful of unintentional howlers and numerous yawns .
translation: Terkesan seperti acara ABC Afterschool yang ditolak, diperbarui oleh kelas penulisan skrin 101 yang bodoh . . . . direka untuk memberikan gabungan senyuman dan air mata, "crossroads" sebaliknya membangkitkan beberapa gelak tawa tak disengajakan dan banyak menguap.
back_translation: Resembling a rejected ABC Afterschool special, revised by a dumb screenwriting 101 class . . . . designed to evoke a mix of smiles and tears, "crossroads" instead elicits some unintended chuckles and a lot of yawns.

text: a violent initiation rite for the audience , as much as it is for angelique , the [ opening ] dance guarantees karmen 's enthronement among the cinema 's memorable women .
translation: Satu upacara inisiasi yang ganas untuk penonton, sebagaimana juga untuk angelique, tarian [ pembukaan ] menjamin persemayaman karmen di kalangan wanita-wanita berkesan dalam dunia filem.
back_translation: A brutal initiation ceremony for the audience, as well as for Angelique, the opening dance ensures Carmen's iconic status among impressive women in the film world.

text: these diverse motivations come together creating a big problemo .
translation: Pelbagai motivasi ini bersatu mencipta masalah besar.
back_translation: Various motivations are combined to create a big problem.

text: based on frances mayes ' memoir of the same name .
translation: berdasarkan memoir oleh Frances Mayes dengan judul yang sama.
back_translation: based on the memoir by Frances Mayes with the same title.

text: a mythic motorcycle tale of father and son `` , this is the story of manuel galloway ( fishburne ) , also known as `` the king of cali `` , the president of a motorcycle club whose members are all african-american men , mostly white-collar workers who exchange their suits and ties at night and on weekends for leather outfits and motorcycle helmets .
translation: sebuah kisah mitos tentang sepeda motor ayah dan anak", ini adalah kisah dari manuel galloway (fishburne), juga dikenal sebagai "raja cali", presiden kumpulan sepeda motor yang ahli mereka kesemuanya lelaki Afrika-Amerika, kebanyakannya pekerja berseragam putih yang menukar jubah dan tali leher pada malam dan hujung minggu untuk pakaian kulit dan topeng sepeda motor.
back_translation: "A myth about a father and son's motorcycle story," this is the tale of Manuel Galloway (Fishburne), also known as "king cali", the president of a motorcycle group who are all African-American men, mostly white-collar workers who switch suits and ties at night and weekends for leather clothing and motorcycle masks.

text: the only life he 's known is as a gigolo , working for his mother , but he wants to leave that behind .
translation: Hidup yang dia kenali hanyalah sebagai seorang gigolo, bekerja untuk ibunya, tetapi dia ingin meninggalkan semua itu.
back_translation: The life he knew was just as a gigolo, working for his mother, but he wants to leave it all behind.

text: having an affair with his girlfriend 's professor forces him to make difficult decisions about love , friendship , career , and the direction his life should take .
translation: Terlibat dalam hubungan sulit dengan profesor kekasihnya memaksa dia untuk membuat keputusan yang sukar mengenai cinta, persahabatan, kerjaya, dan arah hidupnya harus diambil.
back_translation: Being involved in a complicated relationship with her professor lover forces her to make difficult decisions about love, friendship, career, and the direction of her life.

text: beth 's style is further cramped by the responsibilities of single motherhood .
translation: Gaya Beth semakin terkekang oleh tanggungjawab sebagai ibu tunggal.
back_translation: Beth's style is increasingly constrained by the responsibilities of being a single mother.

text: but will 's hope of a continued bachelorhood is interrupted when he meets 12-year old marcus , in many ways his complete opposite .
translation: Namun harapan 's untuk kehidupan bujang yang berterusan terganggu apabila dia berjumpa dengan Marcus, yang berumur 12 tahun, yang dalam banyak hal merupakan lawan sepenuhnya baginya.
back_translation: However, his hope for a continuous bachelor life is disrupted when he meets Marcus, a 12-year-old who is in many ways his complete opposite.

text: mel cobb leads a lonely existence in an apartment filled with clutter , his only contact with the outside world being as a weekend tele-marketer for a start-up newspaper which features stories on city road , bridge and tunnel construction workers in order to alleviate road rage among motorists who are stuck in traffic .
translation: Mel Cobb menjalani kehidupan yang sepi di sebuah apartmen yang dipenuhi dengan kekacauan, satu-satunya hubungannya dengan dunia luar hanya sebagai seorang pemasar telefon hujung minggu untuk akhbar baharu yang menampilkan cerita tentang pekerja pembinaan jalan bandar, jambatan, dan terowong untuk mengurangkan kemarahan pengguna jalan yang terjebak dalam kesesakan lalu lintas.
back_translation: Mel Cobb leads a solitary life in an apartment filled with chaos, his only connection to the outside world as a weekend phone marketer for a new newspaper that features stories about city road construction workers, bridges, and tunnels to reduce the anger of road users trapped in traffic jams.

text: the characters are never more than sketches . . . which leaves any true emotional connection or identification frustratingly out of reach .
translation: Watak-watak hanya menjadi lakaran . . . yang tidak membolehkan sebarang hubungan emosi sejati atau pengenalan tercapai dengan memuaskan.
back_translation: Characters only exist as sketches . . . that do not allow any true emotional connection or satisfying recognition to be achieved.

text: the best laid plans of hung-over boys meet a florist with a cricket bat in this morning after adventure resulting in an unexpected outcome for all .
translation: Rancangan terbaik lelaki yang mabuk bertemu dengan seorang tukang bunga yang membawa pemukul kriket dalam pengembaraan pagi selepas yang menghasilkan satu hasil yang tidak dijangka untuk semua.
back_translation: The best plan was when a drunk man met a florist carrying a cricket bat during a morning adventure that resulted in an unexpected outcome for everyone.

text: brookdale has another , more lucrative facet ; a safe harbour for the chronically drug-addicted rich and famous , especially the sons and daughters of the above , whose families have tried everything .
translation: Brookdale mempunyai aspek lain yang lebih menguntungkan; iaitu tempat perlindungan yang selamat bagi golongan kaya dan terkenal yang kroniknya ketagih dadah, terutamanya anak-anak lelaki dan perempuan dari golongan tersebut, yang keluarga mereka telah mencuba segala-galanya.
back_translation: Brookdale has another more beneficial aspect; that is a safe haven for the rich and famous chronic drug addicts, especially boys and girls from that group, whose families have tried everything.

text: the cast has a high time , but de broca has little enthusiasm for such antique pulp .
translation: Pelakon-pelakon itu sangat bersemangat, tetapi De Broca tidak begitu berminat pada pulpa antik sedemikian.
back_translation: The actors were very enthusiastic, but De Broca was not so interested in such antique pulps.

text: may reawaken discussion of the kennedy assassination but this fictional film looks made for cable rather than for the big screen .
translation: Filem rekaan ini mungkin membangkitkan semula perbualan mengenai pembunuhan Kennedy tetapi ia kelihatan sesuai untuk siaran kabel berbanding untuk pawagam besar.

text: only two words will tell you what you know when deciding to see it : anthony . hopkins .
translation: hanya dua perkataan akan memberitahu anda apa yang anda tahu apabila memutuskan untuk melihatnya: anthony. hopkins.

text: if much of me without you strikes a familiar chord , it also intelligently captures the difficulties that can disrupt even a close friendship .
translation: Jika kehilanganmu memukul satu not yang dikenali, ia turut cerdas merakamkan kesukaran yang boleh mengganggu persahabatan rapat.
back_translation: If losing you strikes a known note, it also cleverly records the difficulties that can disrupt close friendships.

text: their plan is to take jason back home to crystal lake and have both freddy and jason destroy each other .
translation: Rancangan mereka adalah untuk membawa Jason pulang ke Crystal Lake dan membiarkan kedua-dua Freddy dan Jason memusnahkan satu sama lain.
back_translation: Their plan is to bring Jason back to Crystal Lake and let both Freddy and Jason destroy each other.

text: rarely do films come along that are as intelligent , exuberant , and moving as monsoon wedding .
translation: Jarang sekali filem-filem yang begitu bijak, penuh semangat, dan menggerakkan hati seperti perkahwinan musim hujan.
back_translation: Films that are as intelligent, full of passion, and touching as 'Perkahwinan Musim Hujan' are rarely seen.

text: we also catch a glimpse of the band 's ideas about performance from the blend of footage from concerts , television , music videos , and other media .
translation: Kita juga dapat melihat pandangan band tentang persembahan dari campuran rakaman dari konsert, televisyen, video muzik, dan media lain.
back_translation: We can also see the band's perspective on performances from a mix of recordings from concerts, television, music videos, and other media.

text: the jew ( shylock ) has a long memory of oppression , but revenge is not so sweet .
translation: Orang Yahudi (Shylock) mempunyai ingatan panjang tentang penindasan, tetapi balas dendam tidak semanis itu.
back_translation: The Jew (Shylock) has a long memory of oppression, but revenge is not as sweet.

text: thirty years ago , it would have been groundbreaking . now it 's just tired .
translation: Tiga puluh tahun yang lalu, ini akan menjadi sesuatu yang revolusioner. Sekarang ini hanya terasa membosankan.
back_translation: Thirty years ago, this would have been something revolutionary. Now it just feels boring.

text: although tender and touching , the movie would have benefited from a little more dramatic tension and some more editing .
translation: Walaupun lembut dan menyentuh, filem itu akan mendapat manfaat daripada sedikit lagi ketegangan dramatik dan beberapa penyuntingan yang lebih.
back_translation: Although gentle and touching, the film would benefit from a bit more dramatic tension and some additional editing.

text: is this dead visitor all in keith 's head or is she truly a mother ghost ?
translation: Adakah pengunjung yang mati ini semuanya di dalam kepala Keith atau adakah dia benar-benar hantu ibu?
back_translation: Are these deceased visitors all in Keith's head or is his mother really a spirit?

text: disappointing in comparison to other recent war moviesM-^Eor any other john woo flick for that matter .
translation: mengecewakan jika dibandingkan dengan filem perang terkini lainM-^Eatau filem John Woo yang lain untuk perkara itu.
back_translation: disappointing when compared to other recent war films or other films by John Woo for that matter.

text: easily stands alongside such throat-clutching classics of cinematic political action as z and the battle of algiers .
translation: Mudah berdiri seiring dengan klasik tindakan politik sinematik seperti z dan pertempuran algiers.
back_translation: Easily stands alongside cinematic political classics like Z and The Battle of Algiers.

text: the film is like sitting in a downtown cafM-i , overhearing a bunch of typical late-twenty-somethings natter on about nothing , and desperately wishing you could change tables .
translation: Filem ini seperti duduk di kafe bandar, mengintip sekelompok orang dua puluhan akhir yang berkata-kata tentang hal-hal tidak penting, dan sangat berharap anda boleh menukar meja.
back_translation: This movie feels like sitting in a city cafe, observing a group of late twenty-somethings chatting about trivial matters, and really hoping you could switch tables.

text: a young aboriginal man max stuart , was convicted of murder in the light of questionable evidence presented , of nine year old mary hattam near ceduna , on the south coast of australia .
translation: Seorang lelaki pribumi muda, Max Stuart, telah disabit bersalah atas pembunuhan dengan mengambil kira bukti yang meragukan yang dikemukakan, terhadap Mary Hattam yang berusia sembilan tahun di dekat Ceduna, di pantai selatan Australia.
back_translation: A young Indigenous man, Max Stuart, has been found guilty of murder based on questionable evidence presented, against nine-year-old Mary Hattam near Ceduna, on the south coast of Australia.

text: ultimately feels empty and unsatisfying , like swallowing a communion wafer without the wine .
translation: Pada akhirnya, terasa kosong dan tidak memuaskan, seperti menelan hosti tanpa wain.
back_translation: In the end, it feels empty and unsatisfying, like swallowing a host without wine.

text: a dedicated scientist , aided by his clueless wife , rolls up his shirt sleeves and tries to save the world from a radioactive monster , curious space aliens , an evil scientist and a crabby skeleton in this send-up of the best of the b movies of the 1950 's .
translation: Seorang saintis yang berdedikasi, dibantu oleh isterinya yang tidak tahu menahu, menggulung lengan kemejanya dan mencuba menyelamatkan dunia daripada monster radioaktif, makhluk ruang yang ingin tahu, seorang saintis jahat, dan tengkorak yang garang dalam filem yang mengolok-olokkan filem terbaik tahun 1950an.
back_translation: A dedicated scientist, assisted by his clueless wife, rolled up his shirt sleeves and tried to save the world from radioactive monsters, inquisitive space creatures, an evil scientist, and a fierce skull in a mockingly best film of the 1950s.

text: naipaul fans may be disappointed . those who are not acquainted with the author 's work , on the other hand , may fall fast asleep .
translation: Peminat-peminat Naipaul mungkin akan kecewa. Bagi mereka yang tidak kenal dengan karya penulis tersebut, sebaliknya, mungkin akan terlelap dengan cepat.
back_translation: Naipaul fans may be disappointed. On the other hand, those who are not familiar with the author's work may quickly doze off.

text: inspired and motivated , the kids save the day , showing bravery and nobility .
translation: Terinspirasi dan termotivasi, kanak-kanak menyelamatkan hari itu, menunjukkan keberanian dan kemurnian hati.
back_translation: Inspired and motivated, the child saved the day, showing courage and purity of heart.

text: one thing led to another until she ended up giving her virginity not knowing that he made a bet with his friends .
translation: Satu perkara membawa kepada perkara lain sehingga dia akhirnya kehilangan keperawanannya tanpa mengetahui bahawa lelaki itu membuat pertaruhan dengan kawannya.
back_translation: One thing leads to another until she eventually lost her virginity without knowing that the man made a bet with his friend.

text: yan tells lynn he loves her and wants to marry her .
translation: Yan memberitahu Lynn bahawa dia mencintainya dan ingin berkahwin dengannya.
back_translation: Yan told Lynn that he loves her and wants to marry her.

text: `` the institute `` is also for the once-famous , who , having bottomed out , also have no where else to turn but brookdale .
translation: "Institut" juga adalah untuk yang dulunya terkenal, yang, setelah mencapai titik terendah, tidak mempunyai pilihan lain selain ke Brookdale.
back_translation: The "institute" is also for those who were once famous, who, after reaching rock bottom, have no choice but to go to Brookdale.

text: for all its technical virtuosity , the film is so mired in juvenile and near-xenophobic pedagogy that it 's enough to make one pine for the day when godard can no longer handle the rigors of filmmaking .
translation: Walaupun mengagumkan dari segi teknikal, filem ini begitu terperangkap dalam pendidikan yang juvenil dan hampir xenofobik sehingga mencetuskan rasa rindu kepada hari di mana Godard tidak lagi mampu mengendalikan cabaran pembikinan filem.
back_translation: Despite being impressive technically, this film is so trapped in juvenile and almost xenophobic education that it evokes a longing for the day when Godard can no longer handle the challenges of filmmaking.

text: a sweet-natured reconsideration of one of san francisco 's most vital , if least widely recognized , creative fountainheads .
translation: satu pertimbangan yang bersifat manis terhadap salah satu sumber pemikiran kreatif yang paling penting di San Francisco, walaupun kurang dikenali secara meluas.
back_translation: A sweet consideration towards one of the most important sources of creative thinking in San Francisco, although less widely known.

text: many can not hold a job , or choose not to .
translation: Banyak yang tidak dapat mengekalkan pekerjaan, atau memilih untuk tidak berkerja.
back_translation: Many cannot maintain their jobs or choose not to work.

text: do n't wait to see this terrific film with your kids -- if you do n't have kids borrow some .
translation: Jangan tunggu untuk menonton filem hebat ini dengan anak-anak anda - jika anda tidak mempunyai anak, pinjamlah beberapa.
back_translation: Don't wait to watch this great movie with your children - if you don't have any, borrow some.

text: well , he wakes up on the night when the tooth fairy is supposed to come and get his last tooth and sees her .
translation: Dia terjaga pada malam di mana peri gigi sepatutnya datang dan mengambil gigi terakhirnya, dan melihatnya.
back_translation: He woke up on the night when the tooth fairy was supposed to come and take his last tooth, and saw her.

text: this tenth feature is a big deal , indeed -- at least the third-best , and maybe even a notch above the previous runner-up , nicholas meyer 's star trek vi : the undiscovered country .
translation: fitur yang kesepuluh ini memang hebat - setidaknya yang ketiga terbaik, dan mungkin bahkan lebih unggul daripada yang sebelumnya, yaitu star trek VI karya nicholas meyer: the undiscovered country.
back_translation: This tenth feature is truly amazing - at least the third best, and maybe even superior to the previous one, namely Star Trek VI by Nicholas Meyer: The Undiscovered Country.

text: the country was at the start of a rapid process of industrialization and social change .
translation: Negara itu berada di permulaan proses industrialisasi dan perubahan sosial yang pesat.
back_translation: The country is at the beginning stages of rapid industrialization and social change.

text: for all of the contemporary post-colonialist consciousness that kapur tries to bring to the four feathers , the oddest thing about the movie is how it winds up affirming the same damn moldy values the material has always held dear .
translation: Bagi kesedaran pasca-kolonialis kontemporari yang cuba dibawa oleh Kapur ke dalam "The Four Feathers", perkara paling aneh tentang filem itu adalah bagaimana ia akhirnya mengesahkan nilai-nilai usang yang sama yang bahan asalnya sentiasa pegang teguh.
back_translation: In the contemporary post-colonial awareness that Kapur tries to bring into "The Four Feathers," the strangest thing about the movie is how it ultimately reaffirms the same outdated values that its original material consistently holds on to.

text: a memorable experience that , like many of his works , presents weighty issues colorfully wrapped up in his own idiosyncratic strain of kitschy goodwill .
translation: sebuah pengalaman berkesan yang, seperti banyak karya beliau, menyajikan isu-isu penting yang dibalut dengan ceria dalam gaya tersendiri yang khas.
back_translation: A memorable experience that, like many of his works, presents important issues wrapped in a cheerful manner in his own distinctive style.

text: m & # 225 ; rton 's deft re-enactments and the actors ' dramatic readings of spielrein 's own words tell a chilling story , bringing to light both the work of this pioneer and the dark side of psychoanalysis .
translation: Pementasan semula yang mahir oleh m & # 225; rton dan bacaan dramatik oleh pelakon-pelakon atas perkataan Spielrein sendiri menceritakan sebuah cerita yang mengerikan, membawa kepada fahaman terhadap hasil kerja peneroka ini dan sisi gelap psikoanalisis.
back_translation: The skilful reenactment by Márton and dramatic readings by actors on Spielrein's own words tell a horrifying story, leading to an understanding of the work of this pioneering figure and the dark side of psychoanalysis.

text: a mind-bender in the best sense of the word : the spell it casts follows you all the way home .
translation: Satu perbendaharaan minda yang memberangsangkan: pesona yang dilemparkannya mengikut anda sepanjang perjalanan pulang.
back_translation: An amazing treasure trove of the mind: the charm it throws follows you throughout the journey home.

text: but when she escapes a horrific car accident , she finds herself in death 's path of destruction .
translation: Tetapi apabila dia terlepas dari kemalangan kereta yang mengerikan, dia mendapati dirinya berada dalam jalan kehancuran kematian.
back_translation: But when he escaped from the horrific car accident, he found himself on the path to the brink of death.

text: a powerful and telling story that examines forbidden love , racial tension , and other issues that are as valid today as they were in the 1950s .
translation: sebuah cerita yang kuat dan bermakna yang mengkaji cinta terlarang, ketegangan rasial, dan isu-isu lain yang sama relevannya seperti yang dahulunya pada tahun 1950-an.
back_translation: A powerful and meaningful story that examines forbidden love, racial tension, and other equally relevant issues as those of the 1950s.

text: it is so refreshing to see robin williams turn 180 degrees from the string of insultingly innocuous and sappy fiascoes he 's been making for the last several years .
translation: Sungguh menyegarkan melihat Robin Williams berubah 180 darjah daripada rentetan kecelaan yang membosankan dan manis yang dia cipta sepanjang beberapa tahun yang lepas.
back_translation: It is truly refreshing to see Robin Williams make a 180-degree turn from the series of boring and sweet clichés he created over the past few years.

text: an amusing , breezily apolitical documentary about life on the campaign trail .
translation: Sebuah dokumentari yang menghiburkan, secara santai tanpa politik tentang kehidupan di kempen pilihan raya.
back_translation: An entertaining documentary, casually without politics about life on the election campaign.

text: the tone errs on the shrill side , tempered by a soft southern gentility that speaks of beauty , grace and a closet full of skeletons .
translation: Tone tersebut cenderung agak tajam, dilunakkan oleh kelembutan selatan yang menggambarkan kecantikan, kemuliaan, dan sebuah lemari penuh dengan rahsia.

text: ms . bennett is worth watching , and her story is weirdly detailed enough to prove once more that truth is too strange for good fiction .
translation: Nyonya Bennett berbaloi ditonton, dan ceritanya begitu terperinci sehingga membuktikan sekali lagi bahawa kebenaran terlalu aneh untuk fiksyen yang baik.

text: a sluggish pace and lack of genuine narrative hem the movie in every bit as much as life hems in the spirits of these young women .

text: rugged contractor rick eyes beth but ends up going home with the more assertive debby .
translation: Kontraktor yang garang, Rick, memperhatikan Beth tetapi akhirnya pulang dengan Debby yang lebih tegas.

text: moving to the big city , deeds finds himself besieged by opportunists all gunning for their piece of the pie .

text: as beacons of individuality in a sea of government conformity they represent freedom for those who own them .

text: the girls want to do a girly pop song , and the entire jury panel consist of muslim boys !

text: 'butterfingered ' is the word for the big-fisted direction of jez butterworth , who manages to blast even the smallest sensitivities from the romance with his clamorous approach .

text: steven soderbergh 's digital video experiment is a clever and cutting , quick and dirty look at modern living and movie life .

text: a respectable venture on its own terms , lacking the broader vision that has seen certain trek films . . . cross over to a more mainstream audience .

text: . . . feels as if ( there 's ) a choke leash around your neck so director nick cassavetes can give it a good , hard yank whenever he wants you to feel something .

text: but with the help of a superhero and a mysterious deep-voiced stranger , arnold and gerald will need to recover a crucial document in order to save their beloved neighborhood .
translation: Tetapi dengan bantuan seorang superhero dan seorang orang asing bersuara dalam yang misterius, Arnold dan Gerald perlu mendapatkan semula dokumen penting untuk menyelamatkan kawasan kejiranan tercinta mereka.

text: what 's at stake in this film is nothing more than an obsolete , if irritating , notion of class .
translation: Apa yang dipertaruhkan dalam filem ini tidak lebih dari sekadar konsep kelas yang ketinggalan zaman, walaupun mengganggu.

text: . . . a rousing fantasy of bloodless revolution against capricious colonial rulers .

text: what makes the film special is the refreshingly unhibited enthusiasm that the people , in spite of clearly evident poverty and hardship , bring to their music .

text: like other almodM-svar films , it delights in its scandals . but its sensitivities are extravagant , which means it 's one of the most beautiful black comedies ever made .

text: after his friend , a hot young artist , is killed , a resourceful american man living in london covers up the crime and tries to keep the friend 's name alive in order to exploit his legacy and reap millions in the process .
translation: Selepas rakan baiknya, seorang seniman muda yang popular, terbunuh, seorang lelaki Amerika yang bijak tinggal di London cuba menutup kes bunuh itu dan berusaha untuk mengekalkan nama rakan tersebut hidup untuk memanfaatkan warisannya dan mendapat berjuta-juta dalam proses tersebut.

text: though each with their distinctive story , all three are interwoven with the other .
translation: Walaupun setiap satu memiliki kisah yang unik, ketiga-tiganya saling berkait antara satu sama lain.

back_translation: When everything seems hopeless, Ted received guidance from his good friend, Meg, who changed the situation: "Don't deceive him, listen to him, be sincere."

text: while the frequent allusions to gurus and doshas will strike some westerners as verging on mumbo-jumbo . . . broad streaks of common sense emerge with unimpeachable clarity .

text: it 's fitting that a movie as artificial and soulless as the country bears owes its genesis to an animatronic display at disneyland .
translation: Pantaslah filem seartificial dan tanpa jiwa seperti the country bears bermula dari pameran animatronik di Disneyland.

text: standard story of a biker gang taking over a town is not saved by the presence of lou diamond phillips as the head biker or sean patrcik flanery as the avenging townsperson who takes on the gangs with the help of an old codger ( robert forster ) .

text: now their quickly expanding population threatens the existence of vampires , and soon there wo n't be enough humans in the world to satisfy their bloodlust .

text: lee 's achievement extends to his supple understanding of the role that brown played in american culture as an athlete , a movie star , and an image of black indomitability .

text: . . . liotta is put in an impossible spot because his character 's deceptions ultimately undo him and the believability of the entire scenario . too bad .
translation: Liotta diletakkan dalam situasi yang tidak mungkin kerana penipuan wataknya pada akhirnya merosakkan dirinya dan kebolehpercayaan keseluruhan skenario. Sayang sekali.

text: to pull him out of his now dangerous financial predicament will turns to his wealthy in-laws , spinning a myriad of desperate lies , half-truths and deceptions .
translation: Untuk menolongnya keluar dari situasi kewangan yang sekarang berbahaya, Will berpaling kepada keluarga mertuanya yang kaya, dengan menceritakan berbagai jenis tipu daya, separuh benar, dan penipuan yang penuh keputusasaan.

text: john roper , ( bruce mathews ) a disillusioned vietnam vet and ex-drug dealer travels through the orient to get spiritual .
translation: John Roper, seorang veteran Vietnam yang kecewa dan bekas penjual dadah, melancong melalui rantau Oriental untuk mendapatkan keinsafan.

text: he dreams of shedding all material worth and going on a spiritual awakening .
translation: Dia bermimpi untuk menyingkirkan segala kekayaan material dan mengalami pencerahan spiritual.

text: they came to pray , but instead they end up in the middle of an unpleasant religious argument as they suddenly get interrupted by a mystical appearance : is it god ?
translation: Mereka datang untuk berdoa, tetapi sebaliknya mereka terlibat dalam pertengkaran agama yang tidak menyenangkan ketika tiba-tiba mereka diganggu oleh penampakan mistik: adakah itu Tuhan?
back_translation: They came to pray, but instead they got involved in an unpleasant religious dispute when suddenly they were disturbed by a mystic apparition: is that God?

text: it 's the unsettling images of a war-ravaged land that prove more potent and riveting than the unlikely story of sarah and harrison .

text: rock solid family fun out of the gates , extremely imaginative through out , but wanes in the middle
translation: Keluarga yang kukuh seronok bermula, sangat berimaginasi sepanjang perjalanan, tetapi agak merosot di tengah-tengah.

text: a bigger holiday downer than your end-of-year 401 ( k ) statement .

text: the sequel is everything the original was not : contrived , overblown and tie-in ready .

text: when 19 year old tommy , a gay rights activist and 24 year old alan first meet in 1973 , they find themselves on the opposite sides of the political coin .
translation: Apabila Tommy berumur 19 tahun, seorang aktivis hak LGBT dan Alan berumur 24 tahun bertemu pertama kali pada tahun 1973, mereka mendapati diri mereka berada di pihak yang bertentangan dalam politik.

text: the story of ray , a personal injury attorney facing a moral and spiritual crisis .

text: the film has a laundry list of minor shortcomings , but the numerous scenes of gory mayhem are worth the price of admission . . . if `` gory mayhem `` is your idea of a good time .

text: one regards reign of fire with awe . what a vast enterprise has been marshaled in the service of such a minute idea .
translation: Seseorang memandang pemerintahan api dengan kagum. Betapa besarnya usaha yang telah dikumpulkan dalam perkhidmatan idea yang begitu kecil.

text: this thing works on no level whatsoever for me .
translation: Benda ini tidak berfungsi sama sekali untuk saya.

text: while not all transitions to adulthood are so fraught , there 's much truth and no small amount of poetry in girls ca n't swim .
translation: Walaupun tidak semua peralihan ke alam dewasa adalah begitu tegang, terdapat banyak kebenaran dan ada sedikit puisi dalam pernyataan bahawa gadis-gadis tidak boleh berenang.

text: ben cronin has it all : the admiration of his many friends , a terrific girlfriend , and he 's on the fast-track to an athletic scholarship .
