back_translation: Ben Cronin has everything: admiration from his many friends, a great girlfriend, and he is on the fast track to getting a sports scholarship.

text: sitting in front of a computer , drinking excessive amounts of coffee and smoking cigarettes are the different tasks that keep dana awake and ready for the next message .
translation: Duduk di hadapan komputer, minum kopi berlebihan dan merokok adalah tugas-tugas yang berbeza yang membuat Dana tetap terjaga dan bersedia untuk mesej seterusnya.
back_translation: Sitting in front of the computer, drinking excessive coffee, and smoking are different tasks that keep Dana alert and ready for the next message.

text: a baffling misfire , and possibly the weakest movie [ woody allen ] has made in the last twenty years .
translation: kegagalan yang membingungkan, dan mungkin filem yang paling lemah yang dibuat oleh Woody Allen dalam dua puluh tahun terakhir.
back_translation: Confusing failure, and perhaps the weakest film made by Woody Allen in the past twenty years.

text: tuck everlasting is the story of a girl named winnie and a family who she meets , the tucks .
translation: Tuck Everlasting adalah kisah seorang gadis bernama Winnie dan sebuah keluarga yang dia jumpai, keluarga Tuck.
back_translation: "Tuck Everlasting is the story of a girl named Winnie and a family she encounters, the Tuck family."

text: three stories are created by three artists who happen to meet together on the same subway .
translation: Tiga kisah dicipta oleh tiga seniman yang bertemu secara kebetulan di stesen kereta bawah tanah yang sama.
back_translation: Three stories were created by three artists who met by chance at the same subway station.

text: color , musical bounce and warm seas lapping on island shores . and just enough science to send you home thinking .
translation: Warna, irama muzik yang menggembirakan, dan lautan hangat yang mengurut pantai-pantai pulau. Dan secukupnya ilmu sains untuk menghantar anda pulang sambil berfikir.
back_translation: Colors, joyful music rhythms, and warm seas that lap the shores of the islands. And just enough scientific knowledge to send you home while contemplating.

text: donde cae el sol tells a little story between a 65 years ol man and a woman who is thirty years younger that him .
translation: "Di mana matahari terbenam" menceritakan kisah kecil antara seorang lelaki berusia 65 tahun dan seorang wanita yang lebih muda tiga puluh tahun daripadanya.
back_translation: "Where the sun sets" tells the small story between a 65-year-old man and a woman who is thirty years younger than him.

text: vicious , the future descendant of james and jessie of team rocket , travels back in time to wreak havoc , and it 's up to young ash , pikachu and friends to stop him .
translation: Vicious, keturunan masa depan James dan Jessie dari pasukan Rocket, melakukan perjalanan kembali ke masa lalu untuk menciptakan kekacauan, dan tugas Ash muda, Pikachu, dan rakan-rakannya untuk menghentikannya.
back_translation: Vicious, the future descendants of Team Rocket's James and Jessie, travel back in time to create chaos, and it is the young Ash, Pikachu, and their friends' task to stop them.

text: as social exposM-i , skins has its heart in the right place , but that 's not much to hang a soap opera on .
translation: Sebagai satu ekspos sosial, Skins mempunyai niat yang betul, tetapi itu tidak mencukupi untuk menjadikannya asas drama bersiri.
back_translation: As a social exposé, Skins has the right intention, but that is not enough to make it the foundation of a drama series.

text: oedekerk mugs mercilessly , and the genuinely funny jokes are few and far between .
translation: Oedekerk mengejek dengan kejam, dan jenaka yang benar-benar lucu sedikit dan jarang.
back_translation: Oedekerk mocks cruelly, and genuinely funny jokes are few and far between.

text: responsM-avel direto pelo fracasso 'artM-mstico ' de doce lar , o roteirista c . jay cox nM-co consegue sequer aproveitar os pouquM-mssimos momentos em que escapa da mediocridade .
translation: Bergerak terus-menerus karena kegagalan artistik dari "Sweet Home Alabama", penulis skrip C. Jay Cox tidak dapat memanfaatkan sedikit pun momen-momen ketika film tersebut keluar dari mediokritas.
back_translation: Continuously moving due to the artistic failure of "Sweet Home Alabama", scriptwriter C. Jay Cox could not capitalize on any moments when the film exceeded mediocrity.

text: it 's too self-important and plodding to be funny , and too clipped and abbreviated to be an epic .
translation: Ia terlalu pentingkan diri dan membosankan untuk lucu, dan terlalu dipotong dan singkat untuk menjadi epik.
back_translation: It is too self-important and boring to be funny, and too cut and short to be epic.

text: but who is the one doing it , malfoy , gamekeeper hagrid ( robbie coltrane ) , or , even , harry ?
translation: Tetapi siapa yang melakukannya, Malfoy, penjaga permainan Hagrid (Robbie Coltrane), atau bahkan Harry?
back_translation: But who did it, Malfoy, Hagrid's gamekeeper (Robbie Coltrane), or even Harry?

text: this big screen caper has a good bark , far from being a bow-wow .
translation: Filem besar ini memiliki kesan yang kuat, jauh dari menjadi biasa.
back_translation: This big movie has a strong impact, far from being ordinary.

text: this is unusual , food-for-thought cinema that 's as entertaining as it is instructive .
translation: Ini adalah filem yang luar biasa, memberi pemikiran yang menarik yang juga menghiburkan dan mendidik.
back_translation: This is an amazing movie, providing interesting thoughts that are both entertaining and educational.

text: as an adult , bruce has repressed all memories of his parents do to some horrible event that occured when he was 4 . bruce krensler ( as he uses his adoptive parent 's name ) is working in the same field as his father when a freak lab accident triggers the dormant dna in his body .
translation: Sebagai seorang dewasa, Bruce telah merahsiakan semua kenangan mengenai ibu bapa beliau disebabkan oleh peristiwa mengerikan yang berlaku ketika beliau berumur 4 tahun. Bruce Krensler (sebagaimana dia menggunakan nama ibu bapanya yang diangkat) sedang bekerja dalam bidang yang sama seperti bapanya apabila satu kemalangan lab yang aneh membangkitkan DNA tidak aktif dalam tubuhnya.
back_translation: As an adult, Bruce has concealed all memories of his parents due to a horrifying event that occurred when he was 4 years old. Bruce Krensler (as he uses his adopted parents' names) was working in the same field as his father when a strange lab accident activated dormant DNA in his body.

text: they do n't see eye-to-eye on clothes , hair , music , and certainly not in each other 's taste in men .
translation: Mereka tidak sehaluan dalam hal pakaian, rambut, muzik, dan sudah pasti bukan dalam selera pasangan masing-masing.
back_translation: They are not in agreement when it comes to clothing, hair, music, and certainly not in the taste of their respective partners.

text: parker can not sustain the buoyant energy level of the film 's city beginnings into its country conclusion
translation: Parker tidak dapat mengekalkan tahap tenaga yang bertenaga dari permulaan bandar filem hingga kesimpulannya di kawasan desa.
back_translation: Parker could not maintain the high energy level from the beginning of the urban film area to its conclusion in the rural area.

text: they continue with all the same characteristics trademarks of the shin-hyun serial killings .
translation: Mereka meneruskan dengan semua ciri-ciri jenayah berantai shin-hyun yang sama.
back_translation: They continue with all the same characteristics of the serial crime shin-hyun.

text: diego , one of the tigers that attacked the humans , comes also claiming the baby .
translation: Diego, salah satu daripada harimau yang menyerang manusia, juga datang menuntut bayi tersebut.
back_translation: Diego, one of the tigers that attack humans, also came to claim the baby.

text: it 's a drawling , slobbering , lovable run-on sentence of a film , a southern gothic with the emotional arc of its raw blues soundtrack .
translation: Ini adalah sebuah filem yang mengalir, berliterak, dan menarik hati, sebuah kisah gotik selatan dengan lengkokan emosional dari trek lagu blues asalnya.
back_translation: This is a flowing, literary, and captivating film, a Southern Gothic story with emotional twists from its original blues soundtrack.

text: while the two are falling for each other , the syndicate boss coincidentally sees sienna and hires her as his personal dancer .
translation: Sementara kedua-duanya saling jatuh cinta, bos sindiket secara kebetulan melihat Sienna dan mengupahnya sebagai penari peribadinya.
back_translation: While both of them fell in love with each other, the syndicate boss coincidentally saw Sienna and hired her as his personal dancer.

text: when john klein , a washington post journalist , and his wife mary finally find the house of their dreams , they just ca n't believe their luck .
translation: Apabila John Klein, seorang wartawan Washington Post, dan isterinya Mary akhirnya menemui rumah impian mereka, mereka hanya tidak boleh percaya nasib baik mereka.
back_translation: When John Klein, a journalist from the Washington Post, and his wife Mary finally found their dream home, they just couldn't believe their good fortune.

text: conflict enters their relationship when anthony expresses to victoria that their sex life is practically non-existent .
translation: Konflik memasuki hubungan mereka apabila Anthony menyatakan kepada Victoria bahawa kehidupan seks mereka hampir tidak wujud.
back_translation: The conflict entered their relationship when Anthony told Victoria that their sex life was almost non-existent.

text: starting off small , dealing to the high school and college market , kilo discovers the drug business to be very profitable .
translation: Bermula dengan kecil, berurusan dengan pasaran sekolah menengah dan kolej, kilo mendapati perniagaan dadah sangat menguntungkan.
back_translation: Starting small, dealing with the high school and college market, Kilo found the drug business very profitable.

text: julie davis is the kathie lee gifford of film directors , sadly proving once again ego does n't always go hand in hand with talent .
translation: Julie Davis adalah Kathie Lee Gifford dalam bidang pengarah filem, menyedihkan sekali bukti bahawa ego tidak selalu bersama bakat.
back_translation: Julie Davis is the Kathie Lee Gifford in the field of film directing, a sad proof that ego is not always accompanied by talent.

text: what might have emerged as hilarious lunacy in the hands of woody allen or mel brooks ( at least during their '70s heyday ) comes across as lame and sophomoric in this debut indie feature .
translation: Apa yang mungkin muncul sebagai kegilaan lucu dalam tangan Woody Allen atau Mel Brooks (sekurang-kurangnya semasa zaman kegemilangan mereka pada tahun 70-an) terasa hambar dan kekanak-kanakan dalam filem indie pertama ini.
back_translation: What may come off as funny madness in the hands of Woody Allen or Mel Brooks (at least during their heyday in the 70s) feels bland and childish in this first indie film.

text: two brothers along with an ensemble of fresh talent made all this possible and were brought into the light .
translation: Dua beradik bersama dengan ansambel bakat baru telah menjadikan semua ini menjadi mungkin dan dibawa ke dalam cahaya.
back_translation: Two siblings alongside a new talent ensemble have made all this possible and brought it into the light.

text: light , silly , photographed with colour and depth , and rather a good time .
translation: Ringan, lucu, difoto dengan warna dan kedalaman, dan agak menyenangkan.
back_translation: Light, funny, photographed with color and depth, and somewhat enjoyable.

text: [ reno ] may have a few grating gaps in logic and feels as if a good chunk of its story ended up on the cutting room floor , but there is just enough charm and humor peppered throughout to make it feel as if it was n't a complete waste of time to sit through .
translation: Reno mungkin mempunyai beberapa kesenjangan logik yang mengganggu dan terasa seperti sebahagian besar ceritanya terputus begitu sahaja, tetapi terdapat daya tarik dan humor yang cukup tersebar di sepanjang cerita untuk membuatnya terasa seperti tidak langsung membuang masa untuk menontonnya sepenuhnya.
back_translation: Reno may have some disruptive logic gaps and feel like some parts of the story are abruptly cut off, but there is enough attraction and humor scattered throughout the story to make it feel like not a total waste of time to watch it fully.

text: purports to be a hollywood satire but winds up as the kind of film that should be the target of something deeper and more engaging . oh , and more entertaining , too .
translation: Pretending to be a Hollywood satire, the film ends up being the type of movie that should be the focus of something more profound and engaging. Oh, and more entertaining as well.
back_translation: The film, despite pretending to be a Hollywood satire, ultimately becomes the kind of movie that should delve into something more profound and engaging. Oh, and also be more entertaining.

text: worth seeing once , but its charm quickly fades .
translation: Berbaloi dilihat sekali, tetapi daya tariknya cepat hilang.
back_translation: Worth seeing once, but its attraction quickly fades.

text: this is the story of honey ( alba ) , a tough sexy dancer from the inner city , who becomes a successful music video choreographer , a career which is threatened when her mentor makes him either sleep with him . . .
translation: Ini adalah kisah tentang Honey (alba), seorang penari seksi yang tangguh dari bandar raya, yang menjadi seorang pengarah koreografi video muzik yang berjaya, satu kerjaya yang terancam apabila mentornya memaksa dia untuk tidur dengannya...
back_translation: This is a story about Honey (alba), a tough and sexy dancer from the city who becomes a successful music video choreographer, a career jeopardized when her mentor forces her to sleep with him...

text: involving at times , but lapses quite casually into the absurd .
translation: Terlibat pada masa-masa tertentu, tetapi kadangkala lalai dengan secara santai ke dalam yang menggelikan.
back_translation: Involved at certain times, but sometimes casually slipping into the ridiculous.

text: however , this task is going to be more difficult than he could ever have imagined .
translation: Walau bagaimanapun, tugasan ini akan menjadi lebih sukar daripada yang pernah dibayangkan olehnya.
back_translation: However, this task will be more difficult than he ever imagined.

text: john `` eagle eye `` pennell travels the country collecting his former b-17 crewmen in order to fulfill a pact made many years ago in the heat of battle .
translation: John "Eagle Eye" Pennell melancong ke seluruh negara mengumpulkan bekas anggota krew b-17nya untuk memenuhi satu pakatan yang dibuat bertahun-tahun dulu di medan perang.
back_translation: John "Eagle Eye" Pennell traveled across the country to gather his former B-17 crew members to fulfil a pact made years ago on the battlefield.

text: a grimly competent and stolid and earnest military courtroom drama .
translation: drama mahkamah tentera yang berkesan dan serius serta penuh dengan keyakinan.
back_translation: an impactful and serious military court drama that is filled with conviction.

text: after many years of sleeping in his coffin , the vampire lestat awakens only to find that the world has changed and he wants to be a part of it .
translation: Selepas bertahun-tahun tidur dalam petinya, vampir Lestat terjaga hanya untuk mendapati bahawa dunia telah berubah dan dia mahu menjadi sebahagian daripadanya.
back_translation: After years of sleeping in his coffin, vampire Lestat awakens only to find that the world has changed and he wants to be a part of it.

text: it 's a hoot watching the rock chomp on jumbo ants , pull an arrow out of his back , and leap unscathed through raging fire !
translation: Sungguh seronok melihat batu itu menyambar semut gergasi, mencabut anak panah dari belakangnya, dan melompat melalui api yang bergelora tanpa sebarang cela!
back_translation: It is really enjoyable to see the rock striking the giant ant, pulling out the arrow from behind it, and jumping through the blazing fire without any flaw!

text: in the tradition of storytelling , the filmmaker creates a visual parable about the hasidic community that she left as a teenager .
translation: Dalam tradisi penceritaan, pengarah filem mencipta suatu perumpamaan visual mengenai komuniti Hasidik yang ditinggalkannya semasa remaja.
back_translation: In storytelling tradition, filmmakers create a visual metaphor about the Hasidic community they left behind in their youth.

text: tavernier shows us , in more ways than one , that le cinM-i ma de qualitM-i lives on .
translation: Tavernier menunjukkan kepada kita, dalam pelbagai cara, bahawa filem berkualiti masih wujud.
back_translation: Tavernier shows us, in various ways, that quality films still exist.

text: there 's a heavy stench of 'been there , done that ' hanging over the film . it 's everything you 'd expect -- but nothing more .
translation: Ada bau yang kuat 'sudah pernah, sudah dilakukan' menguncang filem itu. Ia adalah segala yang anda jangka - tetapi tiada lebih.
back_translation: There is a strong scent of 'been there, done that' that permeates the film. It is everything you expect - but nothing more.

text: unfortunately , her plan goes wrong , and she actually kills herself .
translation: Malangnya, rancangannya menjadi terbalik, dan dia sebenarnya membunuh dirinya sendiri.
back_translation: Unfortunately, his plan backfired, and he actually ended up killing himself.

text: born in eastern europe , tobias grew up in poverty , the son of a thief , beggar and prostitute .
translation: Lahir di Timur Eropah, Tobias dibesarkan dalam kemiskinan, anak lelaki seorang pencuri, pengemis, dan pelacur.
back_translation: Born in Eastern Europe, Tobias was raised in poverty, the son of a thief, beggar, and prostitute.

text: uzumaki 's interesting social parallel and defiant aesthetic seems a prostituted muse . . .
translation: Paralel sosial yang menarik dan estetika yang menentang uzumaki kelihatan seperti mus prostitusi.
back_translation: The intriguing social parallel and defiant aesthetics of Uzumaki resemble the appearance of a brothel.

text: emma agrees to bret 's plan and the thefts are go smoothly , resulting in enough money for the lovers to go away , but emma wants more .
translation: Emma bersetuju dengan rancangan Bret dan pencurian berjalan lancar, menghasilkan wang yang mencukupi bagi kedua kekasih untuk pergi, tetapi Emma mahu lebih.
back_translation: Emma agrees with Bret's plan and the theft goes smoothly, making enough money for the two lovers to leave, but Emma wants more.

text: a morose little soap opera about three vapid , insensitive people who take turns hurting each other . it 's a feature-length adaptation of one of those `` can this marriage be saved ? `` columns from ladies home journal . . .
translation: sebuah opera sabun yang muram mengenai tiga orang yang dangkal dan tidak peka yang bergilir-gilir menyakiti satu sama lain. Ini adalah adaptasi berdurasi penuh dari salah satu kolom "bisakah pernikahan ini diselamatkan?" dari Ladies Home Journal...
back_translation: A bleak soap opera about three shallow and insensitive individuals taking turns hurting each other. This is a full-length adaptation of one of the columns "Can this marriage be saved?" from Ladies Home Journal...

text: it is really quite ironic then that the one guy putting out consistently good comedy is hollywood 's most serious actor .
translation: Sangat ironik sebenarnya bahawa lelaki yang selalu menghasilkan komedi yang baik adalah pelakon paling serius Hollywood.
back_translation: It is actually very ironic that the man who consistently produces good comedy is the most serious actor in Hollywood.

text: heavily pregnant , and wanting to terminate her pregnancy , she 's on the run from the future parents , searching for sophie 's old flame , ken .
translation: Dalam keadaan hamil besar dan ingin menggugurkan kandungannya, dia sedang melarikan diri dari ibu bapa angkat masa depan, mencari teman lama Sophie, Ken.
back_translation: Heavily pregnant and wanting to terminate her pregnancy, she is running away from her future adoptive parents, looking for her old friend Sophie, Ken.

text: this is a film version of the play they wrote based on more than 200 interviews they conducted in laramie .
translation: Ini adalah versi filem dari lakonan yang mereka tulis berdasarkan lebih daripada 200 temu bual yang mereka lakukan di Laramie.
back_translation: This is the film version of the play they wrote based on over 200 interviews they conducted in Laramie.

text: club le monde follows an evening out at a seedy nightspot .
translation: club le monde mengikuti malam di lokasi hiburan yang kurang baik.
back_translation: club le monde follows the night at an inadequate entertainment location.

text: this is more a case of 'sacre bleu ! ' than 'magnifique ' .
translation: Ini lebih kepada 'sacre bleu!' daripada 'magnifique!'.
back_translation: This is more of a 'sacre bleu!' than a 'magnificent!'.

text: a great ending does n't make up for a weak movie , and crazy as hell does n't even have a great ending .
translation: Satu penamat yang hebat tidak dapat menggantikan filem yang lemah, dan gila seperti neraka pun tidak mempunyai penamat yang hebat.
back_translation: A great ending cannot replace a weak movie, and even craziness like hell does not have a great ending.

text: this is a movie where the most notable observation is how long you 've been sitting still .
translation: Ini adalah filem di mana pemerhatian yang paling ketara adalah berapa lama anda duduk diam.
back_translation: This is a movie where the most noticeable observation is how long you sit quietly.

text: on the way there , he sees a sports car that just hit a tree .
translation: Di sepanjang perjalanan, dia melihat sebuah kereta sukan yang baru saja bertembung dengan pokok.
back_translation: Along the journey, he saw a sports car that had just collided with a tree.

text: apparently designed as a reverie about memory and regret , but the only thing you 'll regret is remembering the experience of sitting through it .
translation: Dipercayai direka sebagai lamunan tentang ingatan dan penyesalan, tetapi satu-satunya perkara yang anda akan menyesal ialah mengingati pengalaman duduk melaluinya.
back_translation: Believed to be designed as a reverie about memories and regrets, but the only thing you'll regret is recalling the experience of going through it.

text: trying to avoid jail time from credit card fraud , price ( patrick mcknight ) , at the advice of his cousin , hides out at a college fraternity .
translation: Cuba mengelak daripada dipenjara atas penipuan kad kredit, Price (Patrick McKnight), atas nasihat sepupunya, bersembunyi di sebuah persaudaraan kolej.
back_translation: Trying to avoid being jailed for credit card fraud, Price (Patrick McKnight), on his cousin's advice, hides in a college fraternity.

text: we are taken on this journey through the voice and body of mnemosyne , mother of memory .
translation: Kita dibawa dalam perjalanan ini melalui suara dan tubuh Mnemosyne, ibu ingatan.
back_translation: We are taken on this journey through the voice and body of Mnemosyne, the mother of memory.

text: the soundtrack alone is worth the price of admission .
translation: Soundtrack sahaja sudah cukup bernilai untuk harga tiket masuk.
back_translation: The soundtrack alone is already worth the price of admission.

text: michael rooker plays a guard , fisher stevens , john seda , and master p co star .
translation: Michael Rooker berperanan sebagai pengawal, Fisher Stevens, John Seda, dan Master P menjadi pelakon pembantu.
back_translation: Michael Rooker plays the role of a guard, Fisher Stevens, John Seda, and Master P act as supporting actors.

text: horace and colt , a fifty-something married couple , are divided - they have lost the key , to their room and to each other .
translation: Horace dan Colt, sepasang suami isteri berumur lima puluhan, terpisah - mereka telah hilang kunci, untuk bilik mereka dan satu sama lain.
back_translation: Horace and Colt, a middle-aged married couple, are separated - they have lost the keys to their room and to each other.

text: conveniently numbed and estranged from her surroundings , lillian sleepwalks through life .
translation: Dengan mudahnya tumpul dan asing dari sekelilingnya, Lillian berjalan-jalan dalam kehidupan.
back_translation: Easily blunt and estranged from her surroundings, Lillian strolls through life.

text: although some viewers will not be able to stomach so much tongue-in-cheek weirdness , those who do will have found a cult favorite to enjoy for a lifetime .
translation: Walaupun beberapa penonton mungkin tidak dapat menerima penuh kelucuan aneh tersebut, mereka yang boleh akan mendapat penemuan peminat setia untuk dinikmati sepanjang hayat.
back_translation: Although some viewers may not fully accept the strange humor, those who can will find a loyal fan discovery to enjoy for a lifetime.

text: blake now starts to sink into the scary , twisted world of the master where sharing , sacrifice and loyalty take on bizarre and dangerous new meanings .
translation: Blake kini mula terbenam ke dalam dunia menakutkan dan berbelit-belit sang tuan di mana perkongsian, pengorbanan, dan kesetiaan mengambil erti yang aneh dan berbahaya.
back_translation: Blake is now beginning to sink into the scary and convoluted world of his master, where partnership, sacrifice, and loyalty take on a strange and dangerous meaning.

text: it goes on for too long and bogs down in a surfeit of characters and unnecessary subplots .
translation: Ia terlalu panjang dan terlalu banyak watak serta subplot yang tidak perlu.
back_translation: It is too long and has too many characters and unnecessary subplots.

text: it 's somewhat clumsy and too lethargically paced -- but its story about a mysterious creature with psychic abilities offers a solid build-up , a terrific climax , and some nice chills along the way .
translation: Ceritanya agak canggung dan terlalu berjalannya tanpa semangat - tetapi ceritanya tentang makhluk misteri dengan keupayaan psikik menawarkan pengenalan yang kukuh, klimaks yang hebat, dan beberapa rasa ketakutan yang menyenangkan sepanjang jalan.
back_translation: The story is somewhat awkward and lacking in momentum - but the story of mysterious creatures with psychic abilities offers a strong introduction, great climax, and some enjoyable scares along the way.

text: his comedy premises are often hackneyed or just plain crude , calculated to provoke shocked laughter , without following up on a deeper level .
translation: Premis komedi beliau sering klise atau terlampau kasar, dikira untuk mencetuskan gelak ketawa terkejut, tanpa mengikutinya dengan tahap yang lebih mendalam.
back_translation: His comedy premises are often cliched or overly crude, aimed at eliciting immediate laughs without delving deeper.

text: the weakest of the four harry potter books has been transformed into the stronger of the two films by the thinnest of margins .
translation: Buku Harry Potter yang paling lemah telah diubah menjadi filem yang lebih kuat daripada dua melalui sempadan yang sangat tipis.
back_translation: The weakest Harry Potter book has been transformed into a movie that is stronger than the two through a very thin boundary.

text: the result of an old cia mind-control experiment gone bad , felice quick is on the loose and headed for junior-high school teacher sam blacker .
translation: Hasil daripada eksperimen kawalan minda CIA yang lama yang tidak berjalan lancar, Felice Quick sedang bebas dan menuju ke guru sekolah menengah pertama Sam Blacker.
back_translation: As a result of the long-standing CIA mind control experiment that did not go smoothly, Felice Quick is now free and heading towards middle school teacher Sam Blacker.

text: love , politics and intrigue intermingle in this taut retelling of graham greene 's classic tale of a disillusioned british journalist , an idealistic young american and the beautiful vietnamese woman that comes between them in 1950s saigon .
translation: Cinta, politik, dan intrik berbaur dalam kisah yang menggigit ini yang menceritakan kembali cerita klasik Graham Greene tentang seorang wartawan Inggris yang kecewa, seorang pemuda Amerika yang idealis, dan seorang wanita Vietnam cantik yang menjadi batu sandungan diantara mereka di Saigon tahun 1950-an.
back_translation: Love, politics, and intrigue are mixed in this gripping story retelling Graham Greene's classic tale of a disillusioned British journalist, an idealistic American youth, and a beautiful Vietnamese woman who becomes a stumbling block between them in 1950s Saigon.

text: the water game is a teen action drama following a group of graduating high school students as they embark on playing a spy vs . spy type game three weeks prior to graduation .
translation: Permainan air ini adalah sebuah drama aksi remaja yang mengikuti kisah sekelompok siswa SMA yang akan lulus saat mereka terlibat dalam permainan mirip mata-mata selama tiga minggu sebelum kelulusan.
back_translation: This water game is a teenage action drama that follows the story of a group of high school students about to graduate as they get involved in a spy-like game for three weeks before graduation.

text: a documentary seven years in the making about women in the film business and how they balance , children , love lives and career -- or how they do n't .
translation: Sebuah dokumentari yang mengambil masa tujuh tahun tentang wanita dalam industri filem dan bagaimana mereka menyeimbangkan, anak-anak, kehidupan cinta, dan kerjaya - atau bagaimana mereka tidak.
back_translation: A seven-year documentary about women in the film industry and how they balance, children, love life, and career - or how they don't.

text: in spite of his incarceration , west has been continuing his re-animation research , using rats and mice for subjects , and electrocuting them with a special jerry-rigged apparatus .
translation: Walaupun dipenjarakan, West terus melakukan penyelidikan re-animasi beliau, menggunakan tikus dan mencungkil mereka sebagai subjek, dan mereka diberikan hentaman elektrik dengan alat khusus yang telah dipasang dengan baik.
back_translation: Even though imprisoned, West continued his research on his re-animation experiments, using rats and using them as subjects, giving them electric shocks with a specially rigged apparatus.

text: i do n't know if frailty will turn bill paxton into an a-list director , but he can rest contentedly with the knowledge that he 's made at least one damn fine horror movie .
translation: Saya tidak tahu samada kelemahan ini akan menjadikan Bill Paxton pengarah yang terkenal, tetapi dia boleh berehat dengan aman mengetahui bahawa dia telah membuat sekurang-kurangnya satu filem seram yang sangat baik.
back_translation: I don't know if this weakness will make Bill Paxton a famous director, but he can rest assured that he has at least made one very good horror film.

text: playwright siddalee walker , on the verge of opening a new play , gives a magazine interview in which she discusses her unhappy childhood .
translation: Pelakon lakonan Siddalee Walker, yang hampir membuka lakonan baru, memberikan wawancara majalah di mana dia membincangkan tentang masa kanak-kanaknya yang tidak bahagia.
back_translation: Actress Siddalee Walker, who is on the verge of starting a new acting job, gave a magazine interview where she discussed her unhappy childhood.

text: children may not understand everything that happens -- i 'm not sure even miyazaki himself does -- but they will almost certainly be fascinated , and undoubtedly delighted .
translation: kanak-kanak mungkin tidak memahami segala yang berlaku - saya tidak pasti bahkan Miyazaki sendiri faham sepenuhnya - tetapi mereka pasti akan terpesona, dan tanpa ragu gembira.
back_translation: Children may not understand everything that is happening - I'm not even sure if Miyazaki himself fully understands - but they will definitely be enchanted, and undoubtedly happy.

text: set against the picturesque landscape of the mississippi delta in the 1940 's , `` the rising place `` follows the close friendship of two young women , each of a different race , and their struggle to find purpose in their lives during this time of social injustice and world war .
translation: Ditentang dengan lanskap yang indah di delta Mississippi pada tahun 1940, "The Rising Place" mengikuti persahabatan rapat dua wanita muda, masing-masing dari ras yang berbeza, dan perjuangan mereka untuk mencari tujuan dalam hidup mereka pada masa ketidakadilan sosial dan perang dunia.
back_translation: Set against the beautiful landscape of the Mississippi Delta in 1940, "The Rising Place" follows the close friendship of two young women, each from different races, and their struggle to find purpose in their lives during a time of social injustice and world war.

text: ram dass fierce grace moulds itself as an example to up-and-coming documentarians , of the overlooked pitfalls of such an endeavour .
translation: Fierce Grace oleh Ram Dass membentuk dirinya sebagai contoh kepada pembuat dokumentari yang baru, mengenai rintangan yang sering diabaikan dalam usaha tersebut.
back_translation: "Fierce Grace" by Ram Dass serves as an example to new documentary makers, addressing challenges that are often overlooked in such endeavors.

text: that such a horrible movie could have sprung from such a great one is one of the year 's worst cinematic tragedies .
translation: Filem yang begitu menakutkan boleh timbul daripada yang begitu hebat merupakan salah satu tragedi sinematik terburuk tahun ini.
back_translation: A film that is so frightening can arise from something so great is one of the worst cinematic tragedies of this year.

text: this documentary of cameroon 's repressive political realities begins with the 1990 publication of an open letter to president biya calling for a national conference and the immediate arrest of the letter 's author and publisher .
translation: Dokumentari mengenai realiti politik repressif di Cameroon bermula dengan penerbitan surat terbuka kepada presiden Biya pada tahun 1990 yang menyeru untuk diadakan persidangan kebangsaan dan penahanan segera penulis surat dan penerbitnya.
back_translation: A documentary on the reality of repressive politics in Cameroon began with the publication of an open letter to President Biya in 1990 calling for a national conference and the immediate detention of the letter writer and its publisher.

text: the film covers the life of young patricia ( jolie jackunas ) who longs for a career as a singer and songwriter .
translation: filem itu menceritakan tentang kehidupan Patricia muda (Jolie Jackunas) yang mengidamkan kerjaya sebagai penyanyi dan pencipta lagu.
back_translation: The film tells the story of young Patricia's life, who aspires to a career as a singer and songwriter.

text: an entertaining , surprisingly well-written and often rowdily amusing picture .
translation: Sebuah gambar yang menghiburkan, mengejutkan ditulis dengan baik, dan seringkali lucu dengan riuh rendah.
back_translation: An entertaining, well-written, and often humorously captivating picture.

text: after having christmas present and rent money stolen by someone posing as santa , they get jobs working as unarmed security guards in the local mall , they get threatened with eviction , pick up girls , get drunk , take drugs and need quick cash .
translation: Selepas hadiah Krismas dan wang sewa dicuri oleh seseorang yang menyamar sebagai Santa, mereka mendapat pekerjaan sebagai pengawal keselamatan tanpa senjata di pusat membeli-belah tempatan, mereka diancam dengan penggusuran, mengambil minat pada gadis-gadis, mabuk, mengambil dadah dan memerlukan wang tunai dengan cepat.
back_translation: After their Christmas gifts and rent money were stolen by someone posing as Santa, they found employment as unarmed security guards at a local shopping center, faced eviction, developed an interest in girls, got drunk, used drugs, and needed cash quickly.

text: a well-made but emotionally scattered film whose hero gives his heart only to the dog .
translation: filem yang berkualiti tetapi emosinya tersebar yang junjungannya hanya memberikan hatinya kepada anjing.
back_translation: a quality film but its emotions are scattered with its focus only giving its heart to a dog.

text: madison , the `` new girl in town , `` quickly sets her sights on the impressionable ben .
translation: Madison, "gadis baru di bandar," dengan cepat memfokuskan perhatiannya pada Ben yang mudah dipengaruhi.
back_translation: Madison, the "new girl in town," quickly focused her attention on the easily influenced Ben.

text: believing his parent 's dead , bruce is raised by adoptive parents .
translation: Percaya bahawa ibu bapanya telah meninggal, Bruce dibesarkan oleh ibu bapa angkat.
back_translation: Believing that his parents had passed away, Bruce was raised by foster parents.

text: `` the ballad of bering strait `` is a cinema-verite film following seven russian teenagers who have come to america to become country music stars .
translation: ``The Ballad of Bering Strait`` adalah filem cinema-verite yang mengikuti tujuh remaja Russia yang datang ke Amerika untuk menjadi bintang muzik country.
back_translation: "The Ballad of Bering Strait" is a cinema-verite film that follows seven Russian teenagers who come to America to become country music stars.

text: cold and scattered , minority report commands interest almost solely as an exercise in gorgeous visuals . that 's not vintage spielberg and that , finally , is minimally satisfying .
translation: Sejuk dan tersebar, Minority Report hanya menarik minat hampir secara eksklusif sebagai latihan dalam visual yang menakjubkan. Itu bukanlah karya klasik Spielberg dan itu, akhirnya, hanya sedikit memuaskan.
back_translation: Cold and scattered, Minority Report only piqued interest almost exclusively as an exercise in stunning visuals. It is not a Spielberg classic and, in the end, is only mildly satisfying.

text: so the hunt begins as ted delivers a first round of come-ons and invitations for his object of desire to become entangled , but nothing works .
translation: Jadi, perburuan bermula apabila Ted memberikan serangkaian rayuan dan jemputan pertama kepada objek keinginannya untuk terlibat, tetapi tidak berjaya.
back_translation: So, the hunt begins when Ted gives a series of appeals and first invitations to his desired object to get involved, but fails.

text: in his role of observer of the scene , lawrence sounds whiny and defensive , as if his life-altering experiences made him bitter and less mature .
translation: Dalam peran sebagai pemerhati situasi, Lawerence kedengaran mengeluh dan defensif, seolah-olah pengalaman yang mengubah hidupnya telah membuatnya pahit dan kurang matang.
back_translation: In the role of an observer of the situation, Lawerence sounds complaining and defensive, as if the life-changing experiences have made him bitter and immature.

text: culled from nearly two years of filming , the documentary 's candid interviews , lyric moments of grim beauty , and powerful verite footage takes us beyond the usual stereotypes of the rap world and into the life of tislam milliner , a struggling rapper who 's ambitious to make it out of the `` hood `` .
translation: Terambil dari hampir dua tahun penggambaran, wawancara jujur dalam dokumentari ini, momen lirik kecantikan yang gelap, dan rakaman kuat verite membawa kita melepasi stereotaip biasa dunia rap dan ke dalam kehidupan Tislam Milliner, seorang rapper yang berjuang yang berhasrat untuk keluar dari "hood".
back_translation: Taken from nearly two years of filming, honest interviews in this documentary, lyrical moments of dark beauty, and powerful verite recordings take us beyond the usual stereotypes of the rap world and into the life of Tislam Milliner, a struggling rapper who aspires to get out of the "hood."

text: however , jane , wendy 's 12-year-old daughter , sees it all as make believe and refuses to believe in the tales .
translation: Walau bagaimanapun, Jane, anak perempuan berusia 12 tahun Wendy, melihat semua itu sebagai khayalan dan enggan percaya akan cerita-cerita tersebut.
back_translation: However, Jane, Wendy's 12-year-old daughter, viewed it all as fantasy and was reluctant to believe those stories.

text: ( king plays a `` russian mob princess `` ; roden plays an evil kung fu master who is seeking the scroll ) based on the very underground comic book , an immortal tibetan monk ( chow ) finds a mentor in a young street kid ( scott ) whom he can teach to protect the ancient scroll he 's been guarding for the last sixty years .
translation: Berdasarkan komik bawah tanah yang sangat, seorang biksu Tibet abadi (Chow) menemukan seorang mentor dalam seorang anak jalanan muda (Scott) yang dapat diajarkannya untuk melindungi gulungan kuno yang telah dia jaga selama enam puluh tahun.
back_translation: Based on a very popular underground comic, an immortal Tibetan monk (Chow) finds a mentor in a young street kid (Scott) whom he can teach to protect the ancient scrolls that he has guarded for sixty years.

text: the controversial bad-boy of comedy delivers a piercing look at his life , lifting the metaphorical smokescreen that he feels has clouded the public view , commenting on everything from the dangers of smoking to the trials of relationships , and unleashing a nonstop litany of raucous anecdotes , stinging social commentary and very personal reflections about life .
translation: Bad boy kontroversi dalam dunia komedi memberikan pandangan tajam tentang hidupnya, mengangkat tirai metafora yang dirasanya telah mengaburkan pandangan publik, memberikan komen tentang segala hal mulai dari bahaya merokok hingga cobaan dalam hubungan, dan menceritakan berbagai anekdot lucu tanpa henti, komentar sosial yang menusuk, dan refleksi personal tentang kehidupan.
back_translation: The controversial bad boy in the world of comedy provides a sharp perspective on his life, lifting the metaphorical curtain that he feels has blurred the public's view, offering comments on everything from the dangers of smoking to the trials in relationships, and telling endless funny anecdotes, piercing social commentary, and personal reflections on life.

text: bow 's best moments are when he 's getting busy on the basketball court because that 's when he really scores .
translation: Momen terbaik Bow adalah ketika dia sibuk di padang bola keranjang kerana itulah dia benar-benar menjaringkan gol.
back_translation: Bow's best moment was when he was busy on the basketball court because that was when he truly scored a goal.

text: a colorful , joyous celebration of life ; a tapestry woven of romance , dancing , singing , and unforgettable characters .
translation: sebuah perayaan yang penuh warna-warni dan ceria tentang kehidupan; sebuah kain tenun yang diisi dengan percintaan, tarian, nyanyian, dan watak-watak yang tak terlupakan.
back_translation: A colorful and cheerful celebration of life; a woven fabric filled with love, dance, singing, and unforgettable characters.

text: if you are curious to see the darker side of what 's going on with young tv actors ( dawson leery did what ? ! ? ) , or see some interesting storytelling devices , you might want to check it out , but there 's nothing very attractive about this movie .
translation: Jika anda ingin melihat sisi gelap tentang apa yang terjadi dengan pelakon tv muda (dawson leery buat apa?!?), atau melihat beberapa peranti penceritaan yang menarik, anda mungkin ingin memeriksanya, tetapi tidak ada yang sangat menarik tentang filem ini.
back_translation: If you want to see the dark side of what's going on with young TV actors (what is Dawson Leery doing?!?), or see some interesting storytelling devices, you might want to check it out, but there's nothing very captivating about this movie.

text: but hamilton high is about to become an all too real battleground when a well-organized group of killers armed with automatic weapons and explosives invade the supposedly deserted school after hours to use it as an operating base for meticulously planned armored car robbery .
translation: Tetapi Hamilton High akan menjadi medan pertempuran yang terlalu nyata apabila kumpulan pembunuh yang teratur bewsenjatakan senjata automatik dan bahan letupan menyerang sekolah yang dikatakan kosong selepas waktu sekolah untuk digunakan sebagai pangkalan operasi bagi rompakan kereta berpemindahan yang dirancang dengan teliti.
back_translation: But Hamilton High will become a battlefield too real when a group of organized killers armed with automatic weapons and explosives attack the school which is said to be empty after school hours, to be used as an operation base for meticulously planned train robbery.

text: undecided about his future , yun fei , an unknown young poet , goes to visit an old university friend in the suburbs of beijing to seek his advice .
translation: Berpertanyaan tentang masa depannya, Yun Fei, seorang penyair muda yang tidak dikenali, pergi melawat seorang rakan lama di pinggir bandar Beijing untuk mencari nasihatnya.
back_translation: Questioning his future, Yun Fei, a young unrecognized poet, visited an old friend on the outskirts of Beijing to seek his advice.

text: in this bittersweet slice of working class single new jersey life , best friends debby and beth ( both pushing thirty ) go looking for love in the wrong place - namely their favorite bar , oliver 's .
translation: Dalam potongan kehidupan bekerja kelas pekerja di New Jersey, sahabat baik Debby dan Beth (keduanya hampir 30 tahun) mencari cinta di tempat yang salah - iaitu bar kegemaran mereka, Oliver's.
back_translation: In a snippet of working-class life in New Jersey, best friends Debby and Beth (both nearly 30 years old) are seeking love in the wrong place - their favorite bar, Oliver's.

text: when a chinese rebel murders chon 's estranged father and escapes to england , chon and roy make their way to london with revenge on their minds .
translation: Apabila seorang pemberontak Cina membunuh bapa jauh Chon dan melarikan diri ke England, Chon dan Roy membuat perjalanan ke London dengan dendam di fikiran mereka.
back_translation: When a Chinese rebel kills Chon's distant father and flees to England, Chon and Roy make the journey to London with vengeance on their minds.

text: this does n't go down well with his superiors and they decide that rajput is now a liability to the bank and they sack him .
translation: Ini tidak menjadi baik dengan ketua-ketua beliau dan mereka memutuskan bahawa rajput kini merupakan liabiliti bagi bank dan mereka memecatnya.
back_translation: It did not go well with his leaders and they decided that the employee is now a liability to the bank and they fired him.

text: armed with $ 20 dollars and a backpack pastor william sets off on an adventure across the united states in an adventure that would change the lives of millions and test him beyond measure .
translation: Bersenjata dengan $20 dolar dan sebuah beg ransel, pendeta William memulai petualangan melintasi Amerika Serikat dalam sebuah petualangan yang akan mengubah kehidupan jutaan orang dan menguji kemampuannya secara luar biasa.
back_translation: Armed with $20 and a backpack, Pastor William embarked on an adventure across the United States in a journey that would change the lives of millions and test his extraordinary abilities.

text: M-^Ethe story is far-flung , illogical , and plain stupid .
translation: Ceritanya jauh panggang dari api, tidak masuk akal, dan bodoh.
back_translation: The story is far-fetched, irrational, and foolish.

text: most of them realize it is counterfeit , but too late to take action .
translation: Kebanyakan daripada mereka sedar bahawa itu adalah palsu, tetapi terlambat untuk mengambil tindakan.
back_translation: Most of them are aware that it is fake, but it is too late to take action.

text: the work of an exhausted , desiccated talent who ca n't get out of his own way .
translation: karya dari bakat yang letih dan kering yang tidak dapat keluar dari jalannya sendiri.
back_translation: Works of tired and dry talents that cannot find their way out on their own.

text: if you like blood , guts and crazy beasts stalking men with guns though . . . you will likely enjoy this monster .
translation: Jika anda gemar dengan darah, usus, serta haiwan gila menjelajah menyerang manusia dengan senjata. . . anda kemungkinan akan menikmati monster ini.
back_translation: If you enjoy blood, guts, and crazy creatures roaming around attacking humans with weapons... you will likely enjoy this monster.

text: enigma is anything but enigmatic about affairs of the heart , and is well worth seeing for its elective affinities alone .
translation: Enigma sama sekali tidak misterius tentang urusan hati, dan sangat layak untuk ditonton hanya untuk afinitasnya yang elektif.
back_translation: Enigma is not mysterious at all about matters of the heart, and is definitely worth watching purely for its elective affinities.

text: a full world has been presented onscreen , not some series of carefully structured plot points building to a pat resolution .
translation: Satu dunia penuh telah ditampilkan di layar, bukan sekadar siri titik plot yang dirangka dengan teliti untuk membina jawapan yang mudah.
back_translation: A whole world has been displayed on the screen, not just a meticulously crafted series of plot points to build straightforward answers.

text: upon his arrival he hears talk about monroe hutchen ( snipes ) who is the top ranked prison boxing champ 10 years running .
translation: Sesampainya di situ, dia terdengar berita mengenai Monroe Hutchen (Snipes) yang merupakan juara tinju penjara yang paling teratas selama 10 tahun berturut-turut.
back_translation: Upon arrival there, he heard news about Monroe Hutchen (Snipes) who was the top prison boxing champion for 10 consecutive years.

text: an offbeat horror tale about a group of five college friends on vacation at a remote mountain cabin when one contracts a flesh-eating virus .
translation: sebuah kisah seram yang berbeza mengenai sekumpulan lima rakan kolej yang bercuti di sebuah pondok gunung terpencil apabila salah seorang di antara mereka dijangkiti virus pemakan daging.
back_translation: A different horror story about a group of five college friends on vacation at a remote mountain cabin when one of them is infected by a flesh-eating virus.

text: for those in search of something different , wendigo is a genuinely bone-chilling tale .
translation: bagi mereka yang mencari sesuatu yang berbeza, wendigo adalah cerita yang benar-benar menakutkan.
back_translation: For those seeking something different, the wendigo is a truly terrifying story.

text: part of the film 's cheeky charm comes from its vintage schmaltz .
translation: Sebahagian dari daya tarik filem ini datang dari kebertampalan vinatge schmaltz-nya.
back_translation: Part of the movie's charm comes from its vintage schmaltz appeal.

text: though he tried to maintain a life of solitude , he is soon entangled with an artist who is struggling with a personal tragedy and an overly-friendly cuban hot dog vendor .
translation: Walaupun dia cuba untuk menjalani kehidupan bersendirian, dia segera terjerat dengan seorang seniman yang berjuang dengan tragedi peribadi dan seorang penjual hot dog Cuba yang terlalu peramah.
back_translation: Although he tried to live a life of solitude, he soon became entangled with an artist struggling with personal tragedy and an overly friendly Cuban hot dog vendor.

text: a powerful , compelling and intelligent if imperfect work . . . a film of enormous ambition which realizes its aims more often than not .
translation: sebuah karya yang kuat, memukau, dan cerdas walaupun tidak sempurna. . . sebuah filem yang penuh dengan ambisi yang besar dan sering kali mencapai matlamatnya.
back_translation: A strong, captivating, and intelligent work even though not perfect... a film filled with great ambition and often achieves its goals.

text: this is not a retread of `` dead poets ' society . ``
translation: Ini bukanlah pengulangan dari "Society Dead Poets".
back_translation: This is not a repetition of "Society Dead Poets".

text: ritchie may not have a novel thought in his head , but he knows how to pose madonna .
translation: Ritchie mungkin tidak mempunyai pemikiran novel dalam kepalanya, tetapi dia tahu cara untuk mengatur Madonna.
back_translation: Ritchie may not have novel ideas in his head, but he knows how to handle Madonna.

text: when carlitos is released after doing 2 years of `` hard time `` , he attempts to redeem himself and sets an example for his 5 year-old son .
translation: Apabila Carlitos dibebaskan selepas menjalani 2 tahun hukuman "bersusah payah", dia cuba menebus dirinya dan memberi contoh yang baik untuk anak lelakinya yang berusia 5 tahun.
back_translation: When Carlitos was released after serving a 2-year "difficult" sentence, he tried to redeem himself and set a good example for his 5-year-old son.

text: ritchie 's film is easier to swallow than wertmuller 's polemical allegory , but it 's self-defeatingly decorous .
translation: Filem Richie lebih mudah diterima daripada alegori polemik Wertmüller, tetapi ia terlalu sopan yang pada akhirnya memalukan diri sendiri.
back_translation: Richie's film is more easily accepted than Wertmüller's polemic allegory, but it is too polite that it ends up embarrassing itself.

text: viewed on its own terms , treasure planet is better-than-average family entertainment , but true fans of the stevenson 's novel will likely prefer disney 's more faithful 1950 live-action swashbuckling classic .
translation: Dipandang dari sudut pandangnya sendiri, Treasure Planet adalah hiburan keluarga yang lebih baik dari purata, tetapi peminat sejati novel Stevenson kemungkinan akan lebih suka klasik awal 1950 Disney yang lebih setia.
back_translation: Viewed from its own perspective, Treasure Planet is a better family entertainment than average, but true fans of Stevenson's novel are likely to prefer the earlier Disney classic from the early 1950s that is more faithful.

text: it has been a year since johnny and wayne created the ultimate bra for samantha 's company .
translation: Sudah setahun sejak Johnny dan Wayne mencipta bra terbaik untuk syarikat Samantha.
back_translation: It has been a year since Johnny and Wayne created the best bra for Samantha's company.

text: however , when novak 's book is a complete success , catcher finds himself being blown off by her !
translation: Namun, apabila buku Novak mencapai kejayaan penuh, Catcher mendapati dirinya diabaikan olehnya!
back_translation: However, when Novak's book obtained full success, Catcher found himself ignored by him!

text: been there , done that , liked it much better the first time around - when it was called the professional .
translation: Pernah berada di situ, sudah melakukannya, lebih suka waktu pertama kali - ketika ia dipanggil sebagai profesional.
back_translation: Have been there, done it, prefer the first time - when called as a professional.

text: characterisation has been sacrificed for the sake of spectacle .
translation: Pencirian telah dikorbankan demi kehebatan pemandangan.
back_translation: The description has been sacrificed for the splendor of the view.

text: just as steven spielberg directed stanley kubrick 's 'a . i . ' ,
translation: Sama seperti Steven Spielberg mengarahkan filem 'A.I.' oleh Stanley Kubrick,
back_translation: Just like Steven Spielberg directed the film 'A.I.' by Stanley Kubrick,

text: a sexy , peculiar and always entertaining costume drama set in renaissance spain , and the fact that it 's based on true events somehow makes it all the more compelling .
translation: Filem kostum yang menarik, pelik dan sentiasa menghiburkan yang berlatarbelakangkan Sepanyol zaman renaissance, dan hakikat bahawa ia berdasarkan peristiwa sebenar membuatkan ia lebih menarik.
back_translation: An interesting, unique, and always entertaining costume film set in the Spanish Renaissance era, and the fact that it is based on real events makes it even more intriguing.

text: these two facts cause a chain of events that changes not only her life , but also that of her friends in a brutal way . . .
translation: Dua fakta ini menyebabkan rentetan peristiwa yang mengubah tidak hanya hidupnya, tetapi juga hidup rakan-rakannya dengan cara yang kejam...
back_translation: These two facts resulted in a series of events that changed not only his life, but also the lives of his friends in a cruel way...

text: while the subject 's appeal is limited and the film 's 106-minute running time excessive , viewers who do respond to the pic will find it raw , real and cathartic .
translation: Walaupun daya tarik subjek terhad dan masa tayangan filem 106 minit yang berlebihan, penonton yang memberikan respons kepada filem ini akan mendapatkannya kasar, nyata, dan katarsis.
back_translation: Although the limited subject appeal and excessive 106-minute movie runtime, viewers who respond to this film will find it raw, real, and cathartic.

text: speaks eloquently about the symbiotic relationship between art and life .
translation: bercakap dengan lancar tentang hubungan simbiotik antara seni dan kehidupan.
back_translation: speak fluently about the symbiotic relationship between art and life.

text: it picked me up , swung me around , and dropped me back in my seat with more emotional force than any other recent film .
translation: Ia mengangkat saya, memeluk saya, dan menjatuhkan saya kembali ke tempat duduk saya dengan daya emosi yang lebih besar daripada filem-filem terkini lain.
back_translation: It lifts me, embraces me, and throws me back onto my seat with emotions more powerful than other recent movies.

text: if you 're able to go , relax and lower your expectations , you might be carried away by it .
translation: Jika anda boleh pergi, bersantailah dan kurangkan jangkaan anda, anda mungkin terbawa-bawa dengannya.
back_translation: If you can go, relax and lower your expectations, you might get carried away with it.

text: land , people and narrative flow together in a stark portrait of motherhood deferred and desire explored .

text: his intricate paintings of the devil and his elaborate journal entries depicting encounters with him led sigmund freud to diagnose him as one of the first known schizophrenics .

text: enter stella ( theron ) , a beautiful nerves-of-steel safecracker , who joins charlie and his former gang when they follow the backstabber to california , where they plan to re-steal the gold by tapping into los angeles ' traffic control system , manipulating signals and creating one of the biggest traffic jams in la history .
