back_translation: Munnabhai began to plead with Komal but Komal had fallen in love with Raja (Ajay Devgan), a local wanderer who only works as a doorkeeper at a bowling alley.

text: i complain all the time about seeing the same ideas repeated in films over and over again , but the bourne identity proves that a fresh take is always possible .
translation: Saya selalu mengadu tentang melihat idea yang sama diulang dalam filem berulang kali, tetapi identiti Bourne membuktikan bahawa pendekatan yang segar sentiasa boleh berlaku.
back_translation: I always complain about seeing the same idea repeated in movies over and over again, but the Bourne identity proves that a fresh approach can always happen.

text: after being arrested , a young street-racing addict attempts to avoid the pitfalls of his illegal pastime .
translation: Selepas ditangkap, seorang peminat perlumbaan jalanan muda cuba mengelak daripada jatuh ke dalam ranjau hobinya yang haram.
back_translation: After being caught, a young street racing enthusiast tries to avoid falling into the trap of his forbidden hobby.

text: upon sighting a small , previously not there , diner , he pulls in to find help .
translation: Setelah melihat sebuah diner kecil yang sebelumnya tidak ada, dia masuk untuk mencari pertolongan.
back_translation: After seeing a small diner that was not there before, he entered to seek help.

text: underachieves only in not taking the shakespeare parallels quite far enough .
translation: Kurang berjaya hanya kerana tidak membawa perumpamaan Shakespeare ke had yang mencukupi.
back_translation: Less successful just because not bringing Shakespeare's analogies to a sufficient extent.

text: with his signature sense of angry humour , activist filmmaker michael moore sets out to explore the roots of this bloodshed .
translation: Dengan rasa humor yang sinis, penerbit filem aktivis Michael Moore mula menyelidiki punca-punca pembunuhan ini.
back_translation: With a sardonic sense of humor, filmmaker and activist Michael Moore began investigating the causes of these murders.

text: the kind of history lesson that you would n't mind seeing again and again , no matter the format .
translation: Jenis pelajaran sejarah yang tidak mengapa untuk dilihat berulang kali, tidak kira formatnya.
back_translation: The type of history lesson that is fine to be viewed repeatedly, regardless of its format.

text: a well-crafted film that is all the more remarkable because it achieves its emotional power and moments of revelation with restraint and a delicate ambiguity .
translation: Filem yang diproduksi dengan baik yang semakin luar biasa kerana ia mencapai kekuatan emosional dan momen pendedahan dengan penuh kawalan dan ambiguiti yang halus.
back_translation: A well-produced film that becomes increasingly exceptional as it achieves emotional power and moments of revelation with full control and subtle ambiguity.

text: smart and fun , but far more witty than it is wise .
translation: Cerdas dan menyeronokan, tetapi jauh lebih pandai daripada bijak.
back_translation: Smart and enjoyable, but far more clever than wise.

text: it 's as if a bored cage spent the duration of the film 's shooting schedule waiting to scream : `` got aids yet ? ``
translation: Seperti sangkakala yang bosan menuggu sepanjang jadual penggambaran filem untuk berseru, "sudah dapat AIDS?"
back_translation: Like a bored trumpet awaiting throughout the filming schedule to sound out, "have you received AIDS yet?"

text: feels a little too carefully crafted to be absolutely truthful , but nonetheless yields rich food for thought about the pains of the creative process and the insecurities of the artistic temperament .
translation: Terasa agak terlalu direka dengan teliti untuk benar-benar jujur, tetapi masih memberikan makanan yang kaya untuk dipikirkan tentang kesakitan proses kreatif dan ketidakpastian dalam keupayaan artistik.
back_translation: It feels somewhat carefully designed to be truly honest, but still provides a rich food for thought about the pain of the creative process and uncertainty in artistic ability.

text: she falls in love with a successful magician , whose life she has destroyed just by doing her job .
translation: Dia jatuh cinta dengan seorang ahli sihir berjaya, yang kehidupannya telah dimusnahkan oleh tindakannya semata-mata menjalankan tugasnya.
back_translation: She fell in love with a successful sorcerer, whose life had been destroyed by his actions of solely performing his duties.

text: with so many movies out there trying and failing to produce a single honest thrill , it 's so nice to see one come along that 's packed from start to finish with 'em .
translation: Dengan begitu banyak filem di luar sana yang cuba dan gagal menghasilkan satu ketegangan yang jujur, sungguh baik untuk melihat satu filem datang yang penuh dari mula hingga akhir dengan ketegangan yang sebenar.
back_translation: With so many films out there trying and failing to deliver genuine tension, it's really good to see a film come along that is full of real tension from start to finish.

text: cho 's latest comic set is n't as sharp or as fresh as i 'm the one that i want . . . but it 's still damn funny stuff .
translation: Set komik terbaru Cho tidak sekeras atau segar seperti "I'm the one that I want"... tetapi tetap merupakan bahan lawak yang sangat lucu.
back_translation: Cho's latest comic set is not as intense or fresh as "I'm the one that I want"... but still is a very funny material.

text: along the way , he encounters some strange characters , one of which is a cow trained in the martial arts .
translation: Sepanjang perjalanan, dia bertemu dengan beberapa watak aneh, salah satunya adalah lembu yang dilatih dalam seni bela diri.
back_translation: Throughout the journey, he encountered some strange characters, one of them being a cow trained in the martial arts.

text: mindless yet impressively lean spinoff of last summer 's bloated effects fest the mummy returns .
translation: spinoff tanpa fikiran namun sangat ringan dari festival kesan gedebak musim panas yang lalu, the mummy returns.
back_translation: A mindless but light spinoff from the massive impact festival of last summer's The Mummy Returns.

text: another useless recycling of a brutal mid-'70s american sports movie .
translation: satu lagi usaha kitar semula yang tidak berguna atas sebuah filem sukan Amerika ketika pertengahan tahun 70-an yang brutal.
back_translation: Another futile recycling effort on an American sports film from the mid-70s that was brutal.

text: to ease their roommate ( selma blair ) through a relationship-induced depression , cameron diaz and christina applegate take her out on the town .
translation: Untuk membantu rakan sebilik mereka (Selma Blair) mengatasi kemurungan disebabkan hubungan, Cameron Diaz dan Christina Applegate membawanya keluar ke bandar.
back_translation: To help their roommate (Selma Blair) overcome depression caused by a relationship, Cameron Diaz and Christina Applegate took her out to the city.

text: she must stand trial to seek freedom from a life of imprisonment .
translation: Dia perlu menghadapi perbicaraan untuk mencari kebebasan daripada kehidupan dalam penjara.
back_translation: He needs to face trial to seek freedom from life in prison.

text: with a shower like this , what could go wrong with the wedding ?
translation: Dengan mandian seperti ini, apakah yang boleh menjadi masalah pada majlis perkahwinan?
back_translation: With a bath like this, what could possibly go wrong at the wedding ceremony?

text: shainberg weaves a carefully balanced scenario that is controlled by neither character , is weirdly sympathetic to both and manages to be tender and darkly comic .
translation: shainberg menyusun skenario yang seimbang dengan teliti yang tidak dikawal oleh mana-mana watak, tetapi dengan anehnya bersimpati kepada kedua-dua pihak dan berjaya menjadi lembut dan gelap dengan nada komedi.
back_translation: shainberg carefully crafts a balanced script that is not controlled by any character, but strangely sympathizes with both sides and successfully becomes both gentle and dark in a comedic tone.

text: by abstracting and showing extreme details and connecting routines with themes and emotions , liesbeth worm gives a whole new perspective on day to day life .
translation: Dengan mengabstrakkan dan menunjukkan rincian ekstrem serta menghubungkan rutinitas dengan tema dan emosi, Liesbeth Worm memberikan pandangan baru sepenuhnya tentang kehidupan sehari-hari.
back_translation: By abstracting and highlighting extreme details and connecting routines with themes and emotions, Liesbeth Worm provides an entirely new perspective on daily life.

text: an invaluable historical document thanks to the filmmaker 's extraordinary access to massoud , whose charm , cultivation and devotion to his people are readily apparent .
translation: Sebuah dokumen bersejarah yang sangat berharga berkat akses luar biasa pereka filem kepada Massoud, yang daya tariknya, kebudayaan, dan pengabdian kepada rakyatnya dengan jelas terlihat.
back_translation: A highly valuable historic document thanks to the filmmaker's extraordinary access to Massoud, highlighting his charisma, culture, and dedication to his people.

text: even if you have no interest in the gang-infested , east-vs . -west coast rap wars , this modern mob music drama never fails to fascinate .
translation: Walaupun anda tidak berminat dengan pergolakan geng, persaingan rap pantai timur dan pantai barat, drama muzik moden ini sentiasa menarik perhatian.
back_translation: Even if you are not interested in gang turmoil, the rap competition between the East Coast and West Coast, this modern music drama always captures attention.

text: arliss howard 's ambitious , moving , and adventurous directorial debut , big bad love , meets so many of the challenges it poses for itself that one can forgive the film its flaws .
translation: Debut pengarah yang bernama Arliss Howard, filem Big Bad Love, yang penuh dengan ambisi, menggerakkan, dan penuh cabaran, berjaya mengatasi pelbagai cabaran yang dikenangkannya sehingga penonton boleh memaafkan kelemahan filem itu.
back_translation: Directed by Arliss Howard, the film Big Bad Love, full of ambition, moving, and challenging, successfully overcomes various hurdles remembered to the extent that the audience can forgive the film's weaknesses.

text: [ seagal 's ] strenuous attempt at a change in expression could very well clinch him this year 's razzie .
translation: Percubaan seagal yang bersungguh-sungguh untuk menukar ungkapan boleh jadi akan memberikan beliau anugerah razzie tahun ini.
back_translation: Seagal's earnest attempt to change his image may earn him a Razzie award this year.

text: much like its easily dismissive take on the upscale lifestyle , there is n't much there here .
translation: Seperti sikapnya yang mudah meremehkan gaya hidup mewah, di sini tidak ada banyak yang menarik.
back_translation: Just like his attitude of easily disregarding a lavish lifestyle, there isn't much here that is appealing.

text: a great cast and a wonderful but sometimes confusing flashback movie about growing up in a dysfunctional family .
translation: Pilihan pelakon yang hebat dan filem kilas balik yang menarik tetapi kadang-kadang membingungkan tentang membesar dalam keluarga yang tidak berfungsi.
back_translation: Great cast choices and intriguing flashback scenes, but sometimes confusing about growing up in a dysfunctional family.

text: a true story set in modern times to bring people closer to the knowledge that there is a better way .
translation: sebuah kisah nyata yang berlatar belakang zaman moden untuk mendekatkan manusia kepada pengetahuan bahawa terdapat cara yang lebih baik.
back_translation: A true story set in modern times to bring humans closer to the understanding that there is a better way.

text: watch as the archetypal stories of life and death , love and renewal , and battles between good and evil cross lines of culture and class to speak in the language of raw human emotion .
translation: Saksikan cerita-cerita arketype tentang kehidupan dan kematian, cinta dan pembaruan, serta pertempuran antara kebaikan dan kejahatan merentasi batas budaya dan kelas untuk berbicara dalam bahasa emosi manusia yang murni.
back_translation: Witness archetypal stories about life and death, love and renewal, and the battle between good and evil transcending cultural and class boundaries to speak in the pure language of human emotion.

text: cube 's charisma and chemistry compensate for corniness and cliche .
translation: Kehandalan dan daya tarikan Cube menggantikan rasa kelakar dan klise.
back_translation: Cube's reliability and appeal replace the sense of humor and cliché.

text: it 's not that waiting for happiness is a bad film , because it is n't . it 's just incredibly dull .
translation: Menunggu kebahagiaan bukan filem yang buruk, kerana sebenarnya tidak. Ia hanya sangat membosankan.
back_translation: Waiting for happiness is not a bad movie, because it's actually not. It's just very boring.

text: though tom shadyac 's film kicks off spookily enough , around the halfway mark it takes an abrupt turn into glucose sentimentality and laughable contrivance .
translation: Walaupun filem Tom Shadyac bermula dengan cukup menakutkan, sekitar pertengahan ia mengambil pusingan tiba-tiba ke dalam sentimen gula dan kontraksi yang boleh diketawakan.
back_translation: Although Tom Shadyac's film starts off quite frightening, around the middle it takes a sudden turn into sugary sentiment and laughable contrivances.

text: there seems to be no clear path as to where the story 's going , or how long it 's going to take to get there .
translation: Nampaknya tiada laluan yang jelas ke mana cerita ini akan berjalan, atau berapa lama akan mengambil masa untuk sampai ke sana.
back_translation: It seems there is no clear path to where this story will lead, or how long it will take to get there.

text: while other kids buy into countless hours of studying just so they can get a mark in some teacher 's report book , handsome davis sees it as nothing more than a system of control over your mind .
translation: Sementara kanak-kanak lain menghabiskan berjam-jam untuk belajar agar mereka boleh mendapat markah di buku laporan guru, Handsome Davis melihatnya sebagai tidak lebih dari sistem kawalan terhadap minda anda.
back_translation: While other children spend hours studying to get marks in the teacher's report book, Handsome Davis sees it as nothing more than a control system over your mind.

text: he naively muddles through an underworld of illegal immigrants , immigration lawyers and the ins , and the love of an american girl of indian origin .
translation: Dia dengan naifnya melalui dunia bawah tanah imigran haram, peguam imigresen dan cinta seorang gadis Amerika berketurunan India.
back_translation: With his naivety, he navigates through the underground world of illegal immigrants, immigration lawyers, and the love of an American girl of Indian descent.

text: a chicago north side brothel is the setting for double-dealing and blackmail when a new madam arrives .
translation: Sebuah rumah pelacuran di bahagian utara Chicago menjadi tempat untuk penipuan dan pemerasan ketika seorang madam baru tiba.
back_translation: A brothel in the northern part of Chicago became a site for scams and extortion when a new madam arrived.

text: for all its plot twists , and some of them verge on the bizarre as the film winds down , blood work is a strong , character-oriented piece .
translation: Walaupun terdapat banyak plot twist, dan beberapa di antaranya mendekati yang aneh ketika filem berakhir, Blood Work adalah sebuah karya yang kuat, berorientasikan kepada watak.
back_translation: Despite having many plot twists, and some of them leaning towards the bizarre when the film ends, Blood Work is a strong character-driven work.

text: what the director can & # 8217 ; t do is make either of val kilmer & # 8217 ; s two personas interesting or worth caring about .
translation: Apa yang pengarah tidak dapat lakukan adalah membuat mana-mana daripada dua watak Val Kilmer menarik atau berharga untuk disayangi.
back_translation: What the director cannot do is make either of the two Val Kilmer characters engaging or lovable.

text: the large-frame imax camera lends itself beautifully to filming the teeming life on the reefs , making this gorgeous film a must for everyone from junior scientists to grown-up fish lovers .
translation: Kamera IMAX bingkai besar sangat sesuai untuk merakam kehidupan yang ramai di terumbu karang, menjadikan filem yang cantik ini satu keharusan bagi semua orang mulai dari saintis muda hingga pencinta ikan dewasa.
back_translation: IMAX cameras with large frames are highly suitable for capturing the bustling life on the coral reef, making this beautiful film a must-see for everyone from young scientists to adult fish enthusiasts.

text: it 's tommy 's job to clean the peep booths surrounding her , and after viewing this one , you 'll feel like mopping up , too .
translation: Tugas Tommy adalah membersihkan gerai mata-mata di sekelilingnya, dan setelah melihat yang ini, anda juga akan berasa ingin membersihkannya.
back_translation: Tommy's task is to clean up the spy booths around him, and after seeing this, you will also feel like cleaning it.

text: well , there is a boy named kyle who gets a warning from his friend caitlin to not peek .
translation: Sekiranya, terdapat seorang pemuda bernama Kyle yang diberi amaran oleh kawannya, Caitlin, agar tidak melihat.
back_translation: If there is a young man named Kyle who was warned by his friend, Caitlin, not to look.

text: although the film boils down to a lightweight story about matchmaking , the characters make italian for beginners worth the journey
translation: Walaupun filem ini merupakan kisah yang ringan tentang perjodohan, watak-watak dalam Italian for Beginners menjadikan perjalanan ini berbaloi.
back_translation: Although this film is a light story about arranged marriage, the characters in Italian for Beginners make the journey worthwhile.

text: claire has a great job , great friends , and a great marriage .
translation: Claire mempunyai pekerjaan hebat, rakan-rakan hebat, dan perkahwinan yang hebat.
back_translation: Claire has a great job, great friends, and a great marriage.

text: the charm of the first movie is still there , and the story feels like the logical , unforced continuation of the careers of a pair of spy kids .
translation: Daya tarikan filem pertama masih ada, dan ceritanya terasa seperti kelangsungan kerjaya sepasang kanak-kanak spai yang logik dan tidak dipaksa.
back_translation: The first film's charm still remains, and its story feels like a logical and unforced continuation of the career of a pair of child spies.

text: we 've seen the hippie-turned-yuppie plot before , but there 's an enthusiastic charm in < i ? fire that makes the formula fresh again .
translation: Kita pernah melihat plot yang mengisahkan hippie yang berubah menjadi yuppie sebelum ini, tetapi ada pesona yang bersemangat dalam Fire yang membuat formula ini kelihatan segar sekali lagi.
back_translation: We have seen a plot before that tells the story of a hippie turning into a yuppie, but there is an enthusiastic charm in Fire that makes this formula look fresh once again.

text: tunney , brimming with coltish , neurotic energy , holds the screen like a true star .
translation: Tunney, penuh dengan tenaga muda yang sarat dengan neurosis, memegang layar seperti seorang bintang sejati.
back_translation: Tunney, full of youthful energy brimming with neurosis, held the screen like a true star.

text: genuine movie magic . . . it transports you to a place somewhere between eavesdropping voyeur and silent referee .
translation: Sihir filem sejati... ia membawa anda ke satu tempat di antara 'voyeur' yang bertugas mendengar dan 'referee' yang berdiam diri.
back_translation: Magic of true cinema... It takes you to a place between a 'voyeur' listening and a silent 'referee'.

text: it 's not that their lives are not turning out as expected - it 's that they 're turning out exactly as expected .
translation: Mereka bukan tidak hidup seperti yang dijangkakan - mereka hidup seperti yang dijangkakan.
back_translation: They do not live as expected - they live as expected.

text: it almost plays like solaris , but with guns and jokes .
translation: Ia hampir seperti Solaris, tetapi dengan senjata dan jenaka.
back_translation: It's almost like Solaris, but with weapons and humor.

text: there 's not a single jump-in-your-seat moment and believe it or not , jason actually takes a backseat in his own film to special effects .
translation: Tiada sebarang saat yang membuat anda terkejut dan percayalah atau tidak, Jason sebenarnya mengambil peranan kedua dalam filemnya sendiri berbanding kesan khas.
back_translation: No moment surprised you, and believe it or not, Jason actually took a secondary role in his own film rather than a special effect.

text: though perry and hurley make inspiring efforts to breathe life into the disjointed , haphazard script by jay scherick and david ronn , neither the actors nor director reginald hudlin can make it more than fitfully entertaining .
translation: Walaupun Perry dan Hurley berusaha memberikan inspirasi untuk menghidupkan skrip yang berterabur dan tidak teratur oleh Jay Scherick dan David Ronn, baik pelakon-pelakon mahupun pengarah Reginald Hudlin tidak dapat menjadikannya lebih menarik selain daripada hiburan yang kadang-kadang sahaja.
back_translation: Although Perry and Hurley tried to provide inspiration to revive the messy and disorderly script by Jay Scherick and David Ronn, both the actors and director Reginald Hudlin failed to make it more interesting other than just occasional entertainment.

text: dr . david banner , while working on a military project to create a super-soldier of sorts , purposefully modifies his own dna .
translation: Dr. David Banner, semasa bekerja pada projek ketenteraan untuk mencipta sejenis askar super, dengan sengaja memodifikasi dna sendiri.
back_translation: Dr. David Banner, while working on a military project to create a type of super soldier, deliberately modified his own DNA.

text: once upon a time , in a tiny french village , little reinalda had dreams of a bright future on the stage - being one half of a singing , dancing musical troupe with her father .
translation: Suatu ketika, di sebuah kampung kecil di Perancis, gadis kecil bernama Reinalda bermimpi untuk memiliki masa depan yang cerah di pentas - menjadi separuh daripada kumpulan muzik menyanyi dan menari bersama ayahnya.
back_translation: Once upon a time, in a small village in France, a little girl named Reinalda dreamt of having a bright future on stage - being part of a music group singing and dancing with her father.

text: murder , cannibalism and satanic rituals are just a few of the 1000+ horrors that await .
translation: Pembunuhan, kanibalisme, dan ritual keagamaan syaitan hanyalah beberapa dari lebih 1000 kengerian yang menunggu.
back_translation: Murder, cannibalism, and satanic religious rituals are just some of over 1000 horrors that await.

text: the rabbi refuses , but gives goldman peculiar advice on how to do away with her , setting into motion a series of unexpected events .
translation: Rabi menolak, tetapi memberi Goldman nasihat yang aneh tentang bagaimana untuk menghapuskan wanita itu, memulakan siri peristiwa yang tidak dijangka.
back_translation: Rabi refused, but gave Goldman strange advice on how to eliminate the woman, initiating a series of unexpected events.

text: since bursting onto the music scene last year with her double platinum first album 'pie on my face ' , tildy st .
translation: sejak muncul di pentas muzik tahun lalu dengan album pertamanya yang bertajuk 'pie on my face' yang mencapai platinum berganda, Tildy St.
back_translation: since appearing on the music scene last year with her debut album titled 'pie on my face' that achieved multiple platinum, Tildy St.

text: when crystal 's infidelities become overwhelming , kali kicks her out .
translation: Apabila ketidaksetiaan Crystal menjadi terlalu banyak, Kali mengusirnya.
back_translation: When Crystal's infidelity became too much, Kali drove her away.

text: lotte goes to live with her upper middle class dutch aunt in holland , anna to work as a farm hand on her german uncle 's rural farm .
translation: Lotte pergi tinggal dengan bibinya yang kelas menengah atas di Belanda, Anna untuk bekerja sebagai buruh ladang di ladang luar bandar bapanya di Jerman.
back_translation: Lotte went to live with her wealthy aunt in the Netherlands, Anna, to work as a farm laborer in her father's rural farm in Germany.

text: . . . there are enough moments of heartbreaking honesty to keep one glued to the screen .
translation: . . . terdapat momen-momen kejujuran yang mengharukan yang cukup untuk membuat seseorang terpaku pada skrin.
back_translation: . . . there are touching moments of honesty that are enough to make someone glued to the screen.

text: stuart rescues a canary , margalo , from a falcon ; she moves in with the littles .
translation: Stuart menyelamatkan seekor kenari, Margalo, dari seekor falcon; dia kemudian tinggal bersama keluarga Little.
back_translation: Stuart saved a canary named Margalo from a falcon; he then lived with the Little family.

text: a dark psychological drama , i love your work explores the pressures of fame and the difference between getting what you want and wanting what you get .
translation: suatu drama psikologi gelap, saya suka karya anda meneroka tekanan kemasyhuran dan perbezaan antara mendapatkan apa yang anda mahukan dan menghendaki apa yang anda dapat.
back_translation: A dark psychological drama, I appreciate your work exploring the pressures of fame and the difference between getting what you want and wanting what you can.

text: carlos ramirez , 28 , lives in the dominican neighborhood of washington heights in new york city , where his father eddie runs a local bodega .
translation: Carlos Ramirez, 28 tahun, tinggal di kawasan Dominican di Washington Heights, New York City, di mana bapanya, Eddie, mengurus sebuah bodega tempatan.
back_translation: Carlos Ramirez, 28 years old, lives in the Dominican area in Washington Heights, New York City, where his father, Eddie, manages a local bodega.

text: defies logic , the laws of physics and almost anyone 's willingness to believe in it . but darned if it does n't also keep us riveted to our seats .
translation: Menantang logik, hukum fizik, dan hampir semua orang yang bersedia untuk percaya padanya. Tapi sungguh menarik jika ia juga membuat kita terpaku pada tempat duduk kita.
back_translation: Challenging logic, the laws of physics, and almost everyone willing to believe in it. But it is truly fascinating if it also keeps us glued to our seats.

text: the new code has the ability to mutate and adapt to any computer environment just like organisms can adapt .
translation: Kod baru mempunyai keupayaan untuk berubah dan menyesuaikan diri dengan persekitaran komputer sebagaimana organisma boleh menyesuaikan diri.
back_translation: The new code has the ability to change and adapt to the computer environment just as organisms can adapt.

text: a sexy urban comedy about how a guy who is addicted to watching pornography discovers love is stronger than fantasy when he meets and falls in love with the girl of his dreams .
translation: Filem komedi bandar yang seksi tentang seorang lelaki yang ketagih menonton filem lucah menemui bahawa cinta lebih kuat daripada fantasi apabila dia bertemu dan jatuh cinta dengan gadis impiannya.
back_translation: A sexy urban comedy movie about a man addicted to watching porn films discovers that love is stronger than fantasy when he meets and falls in love with his dream girl.

text: a fake street drama that keeps telling you things instead of showing them .
translation: drama jalanan palsu yang terus memberitahu anda sesuatu daripada memaparkannya.
back_translation: Fake street drama that keeps telling you something instead of showing it.

text: once the viewer accepts the huge leaps of faith required in the film 's premise , it 's a lot of fun to strap oneself in and enjoy this goofy ride .
translation: Apabila penonton menerima loncatan besar kepercayaan yang diperlukan dalam premis filem ini, ianya menjadi sangat menyeronokkan untuk terselit dan menikmati perjalanan lucu ini.
back_translation: When the audience accepts the big leap of faith required in the premise of this movie, it becomes very enjoyable to jump in and enjoy this funny journey.

text: his love changes vesa , who till then has been fraught with malice to everybody .
translation: Cinta itu mengubah Vesa, yang sebelum itu penuh dengan kejahatan kepada semua orang.
back_translation: Love transforms Vesa, who was previously full of malice towards everyone.

text: these blow up another ship with jews , deports and jails the atlantic 's refugees in palestine , and then deports them to far-off mauritius islands for 5 years in jail : until the end of the war .
translation: Mereka meletupkan kapal lain dengan kaum Yahudi, mengusir dan menjatuhkan hukuman penjara kepada pelarian dari Atlantik di Palestin, dan kemudian mengusir mereka ke pulau Mauritius yang jauh untuk dipenjarakan selama 5 tahun: sehingga berakhirnya peperangan.
back_translation: They blew up another ship with Jews, expelled and imprisoned refugees from the Atlantic in Palestine, and then deported them to the distant island of Mauritius for imprisonment for five years until the end of the war.

text: as exciting as all this exoticism might sound to the typical pax viewer , the rest of us will be lulled into a coma .

text: hypnotically dull , relentlessly downbeat , laughably predictable wail pitched to the cadence of a depressed fifteen-year-old 's suicidal poetry .

text: if reno is to the left of liberal on the political spectrum , her tough , funny , rather chaotic show is n't subversive so much as it is nit-picky about the hypocrisies of our time .

text: well-intentioned though it may be , its soap-opera morality tales have the antiseptic , preprogrammed feel of an after-school special .

text: then he meets syd , a 12 year-old girl with bright clothes and green hair .

text: while the new film is much more eye-catching than its blood-drenched stephen norrington-directed predecessor , the new script by the returning david s . goyer is much sillier .

back_translation: Despite the new film being much more interesting than its blood-directed predecessor by Stephen Norrington, the new script by David S. Goyer who returned to duty is far more foolish.

text: the director , mark pellington , does a terrific job conjuring up a sinister , menacing atmosphere though unfortunately all the story gives us is flashing red lights , a rattling noise , and a bump on the head .
translation: Pengarah, Mark Pellington, melakukan kerja yang hebat dalam mencipta suasana yang jahat dan mengancam, walaupun malangnya cerita hanya memberi kita lampu merah berkelip, bunyi gemeretak, dan tamparan pada kepala.
back_translation: Director, Mark Pellington, did a great job in creating a sinister and menacing atmosphere, although unfortunately the story only gives us blinking red lights, creaking sounds, and slaps to the head.

text: the lion king was a roaring success when it was released eight years ago , but on imax it seems better , not just bigger .

text: he spends each night lying awake in torment , waiting and watching as the evil in the darkness grows stronger , feeding off his fear .

text: in bucks county , pennsylvania , a five-hundred-foot crop circle is found on the farm of graham hess ( gibson ) , the town 's reverend .

text: their love for each other is like a beacon in the storm .

text: a creepy , intermittently powerful study of a self-destructive man . . . about as unsettling to watch as an exploratory medical procedure or an autopsy .

text: they have 3 weeks until the next full moon to find the madman , but an innocent blind woman has found him first . . .

text: rajput blackmails neha ( sushmita sen ) to use her professional skills to help his plan , to train three blind men to rob the bank for him .

text: as lo-fi as the special effects are , the folks who cobbled nemesis together indulge the force of humanity over hardware in a way that george lucas has long forgotten .
translation: Walaupun kesan khas lo-fi, para individu yang menggabungkan 'nemesis' itu memberi tumpuan kepada kuasa kemanusiaan berbanding perkakasan dengan cara yang George Lucas telah lama lupakan.
back_translation: Despite the special low-fi effects, individuals who incorporate that 'nemesis' focus more on the power of humanity rather than on hardware in a way that George Lucas has long forgotten.

text: she struggles as a barmaid with occasional singing acts in a dubious bar in chicago .

text: he arrives in the small welsh town , unsettling the life of his ex-lover ( redgrave ) while inspiring his newfound daughter to follow in his footsteps with a musical career of her own , against the wishes of her mother .

text: for all its bile and incoherence , in praise of love is filled with haunting images and insights . godard may be a lion in winter , but the lion still roars .
translation: Walaupun penuh dengan kebencian dan tidak konsisten, dalam puji-pujian terhadap cinta penuh dengan imej yang menghantui dan wawasan. Godard mungkin seperti singa yang sudah tua, tetapi singa itu masih berdering.

text: little incidents pile up , and eventually what was strange becomes terrifying .

text: this is one of the most visually stunning and thematically moving epics in recent memory , and in spite of numerous minor flaws , scorsese 's best in more than a decade .

text: viewed as a travelogue of the little-known indian community that prospers on a little-known island , trinidad , the mystic masseur is successful .
translation: Dilihat sebagai sebuah perjalanan komuniti India yang kurang dikenali yang berkembang maju di sebuah pulau yang kurang diketahui, Trinidad, filem "The Mystic Masseur" berjaya.

text: a rock-solid gangster movie with a fair amount of suspense , intriguing characters and bizarre bank robberies , plus a heavy dose of father-and-son dynamics .
translation: Filem gangster yang kukuh dengan jumlah ketegangan yang wajar, watak-watak yang memikat dan rompakan bank yang aneh, ditambah dengan dos berat dinamika bapa dan anak.

text: down and out in l . a . 's valley , two longtime married , politically correct pornographers - played by annette o'toole and lyn vaus - are forced to confront the changes in their new age values and marriage when they discover in their archives extremely salacious old footage of tv 's currently # 1 sitcom star .
translation: Terpinggir dan terdesak di Lembah LA, dua pengeluar filem lucah yang berkahwin lama dan berpegang kepada nilai-nilai politik yang betul - dilakonkan oleh Annette O'Toole dan Lyn Vaus - terpaksa berhadapan dengan perubahan dalam nilai-nilai era baru dan perkahwinan mereka apabila mereka menemui dalam arkib mereka rakaman lama yang sangat cabul dari bintang sitkom #1 di TV pada masa itu.
back_translation: Marginalized and pressured in the LA Valley, two long-married porn film producers who adhere to the correct political values - played by Annette O'Toole and Lyn Vaus - must confront changes in the values of the new era and their marriage when they stumble upon in their archives a highly obscene old recording of the #1 TV sitcom star at that time.

text: solaris `` is a shapeless inconsequential move relying on the viewer to do most of the work .

text: they follow him to las vegas , where he is ostensibly doing `` research `` for the next season , but is actually pursuing a dream to become a dancer in a vegas show .
translation: Mereka mengikutinya ke Las Vegas, di mana dia seolah-olah sedang melakukan "penyelidikan" untuk musim seterusnya, tetapi sebenarnya mengejar impian untuk menjadi penari dalam pertunjukan Vegas.

text: it 's mildly entertaining , especially if you find comfort in familiarity . but it 's hardly a necessary enterprise .

text: in 2000 , with berlin as germany 's new capital , an event happens forcing the group out of existential reason to reunite and , ultimately , come to grips with the reason they separated 12 years ago .
translation: Pada tahun 2000, dengan Berlin sebagai ibu negara baru Jerman, satu peristiwa berlaku yang memaksa kumpulan tersebut untuk bersatu semula atas alasan wujud dan akhirnya menerima sebab mereka berpisah 12 tahun yang lalu.
back_translation: In the year 2000, with Berlin as the new capital of Germany, an event occurred that forced the group to reunite out of necessity and ultimately come to terms with why they separated 12 years earlier.

text: a stunning and informative nonfiction drama that looks at the arab-israel conflict from the mouths of babes .
translation: drama bukan rekaan yang menakjubkan dan informatif yang melihat konflik Arab-Israel melalui sudut pandangan kanak-kanak.
back_translation: The drama is not just a captivating and informative creation that looks at the Arab-Israeli conflict from a child's perspective.

text: functions as both a revealing look at the collaborative process and a timely , tongue-in-cheek profile of the corporate circus that is the recording industry in the current climate of mergers and downsizing .
translation: berfungsi sebagai pandangan yang mendedahkan proses kerjasama dan juga profil yang tepat pada masanya tentang sirkus korporat yang menjadi industri rakaman dalam iklim semasa penggabungan dan pengecutan pekerja.
back_translation: It serves as an insight that exposes the collaboration process and the fitting profiles at the time regarding the corporate circus that has become a recording industry in the current climate of mergers and staff reductions.

text: it 's a smart , solid , kinetically-charged spy flick worthy of a couple hours of summertime and a bucket of popcorn . nothing overly original , mind you , but solidly entertaining .
translation: Ini adalah filem spy yang bijak, mantap, dan penuh dengan tenaga kinetik yang layak ditonton selama beberapa jam pada musim panas sambil menikmati baldi popcorn. Tidak terlalu asli, tetapi tetap menghibur.

text: as different as salt lake city and new york city , sam and charly are thrown together by circumstance and repelled by differences .
translation: Seperti garam dan bandar New York, Sam dan Charly digabungkan oleh keadaan dan ditolak oleh perbezaan.

text: to imagine the life of harry potter as a martial arts adventure told by a lobotomized woody allen is to have some idea of the fate that lies in store for moviegoers lured to the mediocrity that is kung pow : enter the fist .
translation: Untuk membayangkan kehidupan Harry Potter sebagai petualangan seni bela diri yang diceritakan oleh seorang Woody Allen yang lobotomi adalah untuk memiliki sedikit gambaran mengenai nasib yang menanti penonton yang tertarik pada mediokritas yang merupakan Kung Pow: Enter the Fist.
back_translation: Imagining Harry Potter's life as a martial arts adventure narrated by a lobotomized Woody Allen is to have a slight idea of the fate that awaits viewers interested in the mediocrity that is Kung Pow: Enter the Fist.

text: based on real events then fictionalized the film is set in los angeles circa 1977 and chronicles the rise of two fast-talking hustlers charlie rainone and jack brenner from the streets of south philly to the executive towers of the music business .
translation: Berdasarkan peristiwa sebenar lalu dijadikan fiksyen, filem ini berlatar waktu di Los Angeles sekitar tahun 1977 dan mengisahkan kenaikan dua penipu bercakap cepat, Charlie Rainone dan Jack Brenner, dari jalanan South Philly hingga ke menara eksekutif industri muzik.
back_translation: Based on real events and turned into fiction, this film is set in Los Angeles around 1977 and tells the story of the rise of two fast-talking con artists, Charlie Rainone and Jack Brenner, from the streets of South Philly to the executive tower of the music industry.

text: as the sexual revolution blossomed , and porn sub culture flourished john was the man .

translation: Peminat luar angkasa mungkin menyukai filem ini, tetapi yang lain mungkin mendapati keseronokannya terputus-putus.
back_translation: Space enthusiasts may enjoy this movie, but others may find its enjoyment to be intermittent.

text: after this unusual , tragic experience , paul begins to realize that he has just lost his mom .

back_translation: After this unusual experience, the tragedy, Paul began to realize that he had just lost his mother.

text: frodo and sam take gollum prisoner and continue on to mordor on the mission to destroy the one ring .
translation: Frodo dan Sam menawan Gollum dan meneruskan perjalanan ke Mordor dalam misi untuk memusnahkan Cincin Sauron.
back_translation: Frodo and Sam capture Gollum and continue their journey to Mordor on a mission to destroy Sauron's Ring.

text: when carolyn 's assigned to coach pumpkin she 's terrified at first , but soon sees in him something she 's never seen before : a gentle humanity and honest clarity that touches her soul .
translation: Apabila Carolyn ditugaskan untuk menjadi pelatih kepada Pumpkin, dia ketakutan pada mulanya, tetapi tidak lama kemudian melihat sesuatu dalam dirinya yang belum pernah dilihat sebelum ini: sifat kemanusiaan lembut dan kejelasan yang jujur yang menyentuh jiwanya.
back_translation: When Carolyn was assigned to be the coach for Pumpkin, she was scared at first, but not long after, she saw something in herself that she had never seen before: a gentle humanity and honest clarity that touched her soul.

text: so infectious , so colorful , so exhilarating , that you almost forget that at its core , it 's merely a curry-inflected remake of father of the bride , with snippets of other films thrown in .
translation: Sangat menular, sangat berwarna, sangat menggembirakan, sehingga anda hampir lupa bahawa pada intinya, ia hanyalah sebuah semulaan dari "father of the bride" yang dipengaruhi oleh kari, dengan potongan-potongan dari filem lain yang dicampurkan.
back_translation: Highly infectious, highly colorful, highly delightful, to the point where you almost forget that essentially, it is just a reimagining of "father of the bride" influenced by curry, with bits and pieces from other movies mixed in.

text: after baptizing their amnesiac boy-toy chris , the infamous pair takes him on a grand tour of their wild nightlife frolic , their spontaneous media extravaganza and their dazzling diva lifestyle in order to help him find his identity and his way home .
translation: Selepas mempersembahkan baptisan kepada budak lelaki yang mengalami amnesia, Chris, pasangan terkenal itu membawanya dalam lawatan besar ke dalam kehidupan malam yang liar, kemarau hiburan media secara tiba-tiba dan gaya hidup diva yang mempesonakan mereka untuk membantu Chris mencari identiti dan mencari jalan pulang.
back_translation: After baptizing the boy who suffered from amnesia, Chris, the famous couple took him on a grand tour into the wild nightlife, sudden media entertainment drought, and mesmerizing diva lifestyle to help Chris find his identity and find his way home.

text: before they carry this out , they want to truly experience life on the edge and they devise a plan by which their suicides will make them legends .
translation: Sebelum mereka melaksanakan itu, mereka ingin benar-benar merasai kehidupan di tepi dan mereka merangka satu rancangan di mana bunuh diri mereka akan menjadikan mereka legenda.
back_translation: Before they carry it out, they want to truly experience life on the edge and they devise a plan where their suicide will make them a legend.

text: charged with as much psychological depth as gun-slinging violence , johnny to and wai ka fai 's slick thriller brought a welcome jolt of adrenaline to the moribund hong kong action genre .
translation: Ditaja dengan kedalaman psikologi sebanyak keganasan penembak, filem thriller yang licin oleh Johnny To dan Wai Ka Fai memberikan sentuhan adrenalin yang menyegarkan kepada genre aksi Hong Kong yang lesu.
back_translation: Funded with the depth of psychology as much as the ruthlessness of the shooter, the slick thriller film by Johnny To and Wai Ka Fai injects a refreshing adrenaline touch to the languid Hong Kong action genre.

text: told in flashback as danny reviews the razor eaters ' videos , we see the spiralling rampage through two perspectives ( and two formats ) as danny and the razor eaters eventually collide in a thrilling , suspenseful climax .
translation: Diceritakan dalam kilas balik ketika Danny menonton video-video Razor Eaters, kita dapat melihat penjarahan yang berbelit-belit melalui dua sudut pandang (dan dua format) ketika akhirnya Danny dan Razor Eaters bertemu dalam klimaks yang mendebarkan dan penuh ketegangan.
back_translation: Told in a flashback as Danny watches Razor Eaters videos, we can see the convoluted looting through two perspectives (and two formats) when ultimately Danny and Razor Eaters meet in a thrilling and tense climax.

text: full frontal had no effect and elicited no sympathies for any of the characters . by that measure , it is a failure .
translation: Pendedahan penuh tidak memberi kesan dan tidak menimbulkan simpati untuk mana-mana watak. Mengikut kriteria itu, ia adalah kegagalan.
back_translation: Full disclosure does not have any impact and does not evoke sympathy for any character. According to that criteria, it is a failure.

text: the film 's sense of imagery gives it a terrible strength , but it 's propelled by the acting .
translation: Rasa imej filem memberikan kekuatan yang mengerikan padanya, tetapi ia didorong oleh lakonan.
back_translation: The film's visual imagery gives it a strong impact, but it is driven by the acting.

text: he journeys to the mecca of bodybuilding , los angeles , on a quest to attain specific answers in the field of physiological research as it relates to anatomy and the structuring of the ultimate training regimen .
translation: Beliau melakukan perjalanan ke mekah kecergasan badan, Los Angeles, dalam usaha untuk mencapai jawapan yang khusus dalam bidang penyelidikan fisiologi yang berkaitan dengan anatomi dan penciptaan regimen latihan yang terbaik.
back_translation: He traveled to Los Angeles for physical fitness, in an effort to achieve specific answers in the field of physiology research related to anatomy and creating the best exercise regimen.

text: it 's unnerving to see recoing 's bizzarre reaction to his unemployment . good film , but very glum .
translation: Menyebabkan kegelisahan melihat reaksi aneh Recoing terhadap pengangguranannya. Filem yang bagus, tetapi sangat muram.
back_translation: Causing anxiety watching Recoing's strange reactions to his unemployment. Good film, but very gloomy.

text: they succeed in blowing up what they believe to be the main operations room , but are soon forced to make their escape as the entire compound unexpectedly erupts with gunfire and explosions .
translation: Mereka berjaya meletupkan apa yang mereka percayai sebagai bilik operasi utama, tetapi segera terpaksa melarikan diri apabila seluruh kawasan tiba-tiba dipenuhi tembakan dan letupan.
back_translation: They successfully detonated what they believed to be the main operation room, but soon had to flee as the entire area was suddenly filled with gunshots and explosions.

text: there 's an excellent 90-minute film here ; unfortunately , it runs for 170 .
translation: Terdapat filem hebat selama 90 minit di sini; malangnya, ia berjalan selama 170 minit.

text: does a good job of establishing a time and place , and of telling a fascinating character 's story .
translation: Melakukan tugas yang baik dalam menetapkan masa dan tempat, serta menceritakan kisah watak yang memikat.
back_translation: Doing a good job in setting the time and place, as well as telling a captivating character's story.

text: by taking entertainment tonight subject matter and giving it humor and poignancy , auto focus becomes both gut-bustingly funny and crushingly depressing .
translation: Dengan mengambil subjek hiburan malam ini dan memberikannya sentuhan humor dan keinsafan, Auto Focus menjadi sangat lucu dan menghancurkan hati.
back_translation: By taking tonight's entertainment subject and infusing it with humor and insight, Auto Focus becomes incredibly funny and heart-wrenching.

text: stands paralyzed , and she is only saved by the intervention of the experienced climber , lasse .
translation: Dia berdiri paralisis, dan dia hanya diselamatkan dengan campur tangan pendaki berpengalaman, Lasse.
back_translation: He stood paralyzed, and he was only saved with the intervention of an experienced climber, Lasse.

text: three friends trace their relationships with each other and learn about themselves in the process .
translation: Tiga rakan mengenalpasti hubungan mereka dengan satu sama lain dan pada masa yang sama memahami diri sendiri dalam proses tersebut.
back_translation: Three friends identify their relationship with each other and at the same time understand themselves in the process.

text: it downplays the initial assault , referring to it only in fragmented flashbacks , while offering a cogent critique of ongoing attitudes about rape and its victims , particularly in japan .
translation: Ia merendahkan serangan awal itu, merujuk hanya kepada ingatan kilauan yang terputus-putus, sambil menawarkan kritik yang kukuh terhadap sikap-sikap yang berterusan mengenai rogol dan mangsanya, terutamanya di Jepun.
back_translation: It belittles the initial attack, referring only to fragmented memories of glitter, while offering strong criticism of persistent attitudes towards rape and its victims, especially in Japan.

text: the emotional overload of female angst irreparably drags the film down .
translation: Muat turun emosi kegelisahan wanita secara tidak dapat dibaiki menjatuhkan filem itu.
back_translation: Downloading women's irreparable anxiety emotions is what brought the film down.

text: soon she finds herself in the most bizarre situations like doing `` harry & # 38 ; sally `` 's famous faked orgasm scene , judging everyone , starting fights and visiting the theatre to find out her boyfriend is `` doing `` other girls on stage .
translation: Segera dia mendapati dirinya berada dalam situasi yang paling aneh seperti melakukan adegan orgasme palsu yang terkenal dari "Harry & Sally", menghakimi semua orang, memulai pertengkaran, dan mengunjungi teater untuk mendapati kekasihnya "melakukan" perempuan lain di atas pentas.
back_translation: Soon he found himself in the most bizarre situation, like reenacting the famous fake orgasm scene from "Harry & Sally", judging everyone, starting arguments, and visiting a theater only to find his girlfriend "performing" as another woman on stage.

text: while the plot follows a predictable connect-the-dots course . . . director john schultz colors the picture in some evocative shades .
translation: walaupun plot mengikuti alur cerita yang boleh diramal . . . pengarah john schultz mewarnai gambar itu dengan beberapa warna yang evokatif .
back_translation: although the plot follows a predictable storyline . . . director john schultz colors the picture with some evocative hues.

text: me without you has a bracing truth that 's refreshing after the phoniness of female-bonding pictures like divine secrets of the ya-ya sisterhood .
translation: Saya tanpa awak mempunyai kebenaran yang menyegarkan selepas kepura-puraan dalam filem berkaitan perempuan seperti rahsia ilahi ya-ya persaudaraan.
back_translation: I without you have the refreshing truth after the pretense in films about women like the divine secret of sisterhood ya-ya.

text: the search takes the family to strife-torn sri lanka , where amudha comes face-to-face with reality , and reconciles herself to it .
translation: Pencarian membawa keluarga ke Sri Lanka yang dilanda kekacauan, di mana Amudha berhadapan dengan realiti, dan merelakan dirinya dengan itu.
back_translation: The search brought the family to a chaotic Sri Lanka, where Amudha faced reality and had to come to terms with it.

text: there 's not enough here to justify the almost two hours .
translation: Tidak cukup di sini untuk membenarkan hampir dua jam itu.

text: matters become even more complicated when juwanna realizes that he is falling for his teammate michelle ( vivica a . fox ) , who shows him that there is more to women than meets the eye .
translation: Keadaan menjadi lebih rumit apabila Juwanna sedar bahawa dia sedang jatuh cinta kepada rakan pasukannya, Michelle (Vivica A. Fox), yang menunjukkan kepadanya bahawa wanita itu lebih dari yang dilihat oleh mata.
back_translation: Things get more complicated when Juwanna realizes that she is falling in love with her teammate, Michelle (Vivica A. Fox), who shows her that the woman is more than meets the eye.

text: based on the famous 1947 hoax letter written to vought aviation in which thousands of copies have since been distributed .
translation: Berdasarkan surat pembohongan terkenal tahun 1947 yang ditulis kepada Vought Aviation di mana ribuan salinan telah diedarkan sejak itu.
back_translation: Based on the famous hoax letter of 1947 written to Vought Aviation where thousands of copies have been circulated since then.

text: a british television personality , terry twillstein ( bob odenkirk ) , gets sight of ronnie and brings ronnie to hollywood to get him his own tv show .
translation: Seorang personaliti televisyen British, Terry Twillstein (Bob Odenkirk), melihat Ronnie dan membawa Ronnie ke Hollywood untuk memberinya rancangan TV sendiri.
back_translation: A British television personality, Terry Twillstein (Bob Odenkirk), spots Ronnie and takes Ronnie to Hollywood to give him his own TV show.

text: the tuxedo was n't just bad ; it was , as my friend david cross would call it , 'hungry-man portions of bad ' .
translation: Seluar tuxedo itu bukan sahaja buruk; sebagaimana kata kawan saya, David Cross, ia adalah 'bahagian buruk yang banyak'.
back_translation: The tuxedo pants are not only bad; as my friend David Cross would say, it is a 'lot of bad part'.

text: kimberly corman and her friends decide to head out on a trip .
translation: Kimberly Corman dan kawannya memutuskan untuk pergi bercuti.
back_translation: Kimberly Corman and her friends decided to go on vacation.

text: utterly lacking in charm , wit and invention , roberto benigni 's pinocchio is an astonishingly bad film .
translation: Benigni's Pinokio adalah filem yang amat teruk kerana sangat kurang daya tarikan, ketajaman, dan inovasi.
back_translation: Benigni's Pinocchio is a very bad movie because it lacks charm, sharpness, and innovation.

text: an experimental documentary about a family 's loss of a child and the struggle between remembrance and forgetting .
translation: Sebuah dokumentari eksperimental mengenai kerugian seorang anak dalam sebuah keluarga dan perjuangan antara ingatan dan lupakan.
back_translation: An experimental documentary about a child's loss within a family and the struggle between remembering and forgetting.

text: message movie or an action-packed submarine spectacular ? alas , it 's neither .
translation: filem mesej atau spektakular kapal selam yang penuh aksi? malangnya, ia bukan kedua-duanya.
back_translation: A message film or a spectacular action-packed submarine? Unfortunately, it is neither.

text: 'wheatfield with crows ' takes the life of vincent van gogh and sets it in the modern day music industry .
translation: 'ladang gandum dengan gagak' mengambil kehidupan vincent van gogh dan menetapkannya dalam industri muzik zaman moden.
back_translation: 'Wheat Field with Crows' takes Vincent van Gogh's life and places it in the modern music industry.

text: a dozen years later we find west is an inmate at a forbidding old prison .
translation: Dua belas tahun kemudian, kita dapati Barat adalah seorang banduan di dalam sebuah penjara tua yang menakutkan.
back_translation: Twelve years later, we find Barat is a prisoner in a terrifying old prison.

text: an immensely entertaining look at some of the unsung heroes of 20th century pop music .
translation: sorotan yang sangat menghiburkan mengenai beberapa wira yang kurang dikenali dalam muzik pop abad ke-20.
back_translation: highly entertaining highlights about some lesser-known heroes in 20th century pop music.

text: broomfield reveals an ironic manifestation of institutionalized slavery that ties a black-owned record label with a white-empowered police force .
translation: broomfield mendedahkan satu manifestasi ironi mengenai perhambaan yang terkonsepkan secara institusi yang mengaitkan label rakaman milik orang kulit hitam dengan pasukan polis yang dikuasai oleh orang kulit putih.
back_translation: broomfield reveals a manifestation of irony regarding slavery that is institutionally concreted by associating the recording label of black people with a police force dominated by white people.

text: even on those rare occasions when the narrator stops yammering , miller 's hand often feels unsure .
translation: Walaupun pada sesetengah kejadian jarang ketika pencerita berhenti membebel, tangan Miller seringkali terasa tidak pasti.
back_translation: Although in some instances rarely does the storyteller stop jabbering, Miller's hands often feel uncertain.

text: a brain twister , less a movie-movie than a funny and weird meditation on hollywood , success , artistic integrity and intellectual bankruptcy .
translation: teka-teki minda, kurang filem biasa daripada satu meditasi lucu dan aneh tentang hollywood, kejayaan, integriti seni dan kebangkrutan intelektual.
back_translation: Mind puzzle, less a regular film but rather a funny and strange meditation on Hollywood, success, artistic integrity, and intellectual bankruptcy.

text: consequently , what begins as an enthusiastic road trip is soon plagued with mysterious roadside obstacles that threaten to prevent the boys from ever making it to the competition .
translation: Akibatnya, apa yang bermula sebagai perjalanan jalan raya yang penuh semangat segera dirundung dengan rintangan misteri di tepi jalan yang mengancam untuk menghalang budak-budak daripada sampai ke pertandingan itu.
back_translation: As a result, what started as an enthusiastic road trip quickly became overshadowed by mysterious obstacles on the roadside that threatened to prevent the children from reaching the competition.

text: shanghai ghetto , much stranger than any fiction , brings this unknown slice of history affectingly to life .
translation: Shanghai Ghetto, jauh lebih aneh daripada fiksyen mana-mana, membawa potongan sejarah yang tidak diketahui ini secara menyentuh kehidupan.
back_translation: The Shanghai Ghetto, far more bizarre than any fiction, brings this unknown piece of history touching into life.

text: inherently caustic and oddly whimsical , the film chimes in on the grieving process and strangely draws the audience into the unexplainable pain and eccentricities that are attached to the concept of loss .
translation: Secara semula jadi berbahaya dan anehinya memikat, filem ini turut serta dalam proses berkabung dan dengan anehnya menarik penonton ke dalam kesakitan yang tak dapat dijelaskan dan keanehan yang melekat pada konsep kehilangan.
back_translation: Naturally dangerous and strangely captivating, this film is also involved in the mourning process and strangely draws viewers into unexplainable pain and the oddity attached to the concept of loss.

text: the obnoxious special effects , the obligatory outbursts of flatulence and the incessant , so-five-minutes-ago pop music on the soundtrack overwhelm what is left of the scruffy , dopey old hanna-barbera charm .
translation: kesan khas yang menjengkelkan, letupan kentut yang wajib dan muzik pop yang kebiasaan lima minit yang lalu dalam trek bunyi mengatasi apa yang tinggal dari daya tarik lama yang kecil dan bodoh dari hanna-barbera.
back_translation: annoying special effects, mandatory fart explosions, and pop music that routinely drowns out what remains of the once small and silly charm of Hanna-Barbera.

text: ver wiel has concocted one of the most elaborately twisted , diverting caper films in years .
translation: Ver Wiel telah merancang salah satu filem penipuan yang paling rumit dan menghibur dalam tahun-tahun ini.
back_translation: Ver Wiel has designed one of the most complex and entertaining scam films in recent years.

text: james clayton ( farrell ) might not have the attitude of a typical recruit , but he is one of the smartest graduating seniors in the country - and he 's just the person that walter burke ( pacino ) wants in the agency .
translation: James Clayton (Farrell) mungkin tidak mempunyai sikap seorang calon biasa, tetapi dia adalah salah satu graduan senior yang paling bijak di negara - dan dia adalah orang yang Walter Burke (Pacino) mahu di agensi itu.
back_translation: James Clayton (Farrell) may not have the demeanor of a typical recruit, but he is one of the country's most brilliant senior graduates - and he is the person that Walter Burke (Pacino) wants at the agency.

text: a serious movie with serious ideas . but seriously , folks , it does n't work .
translation: Filem serius dengan idea-idea serius. Tetapi secara jujurnya, rakan-rakan, ia tidak berjaya.
back_translation: Serious movies with serious ideas. But honestly, my friends, it didn't succeed.

text: to get the job done , they must all do what they have never done before # trust each other .
translation: Untuk menyelesaikan tugas, merekalah semua harus melakukan apa yang belum pernah mereka lakukan sebelum ini - saling percaya.
back_translation: To complete the task, they all need to do what they have never done before - trust each other.

text: its scenes and sensibility are all more than familiar , but it exudes a kind of nostalgic spy-movie charm and , at the same time , is so fresh and free of the usual thriller nonsense that it all seems to be happening for the first time .
translation: Lakonannya dan daya kemanusiaannya semua lebih daripada biasa, tetapi ia mengeluarkan daya tarikan filem mata-mata nostalgia yang memikat dan, pada masa yang sama, begitu segar dan bebas daripada kebodohan thriller biasa sehingga semua kelihatan seperti berlaku untuk kali pertama.
back_translation: Its performances and human qualities are all more than usual, but it exudes a captivating nostalgia spy film appeal and, at the same time, is so fresh and free from the usual thriller clichés that everything seems to happen for the first time.

text: suddenly a hand can do something no hand has done before and lips something no lips have ever done .
translation: Tiba-tiba tangan boleh melakukan sesuatu yang tidak pernah dilakukan oleh tangan sebelum ini dan bibir melakukan sesuatu yang tidak pernah dilakukan oleh bibir sebelum ini.
back_translation: Suddenly, the hands can do something that they have never done before, and the lips do something that they have never done before.

text: at the same time , gwen who writes for the college paper , is tasked with doing a story on him , but van is too busy partying to do that .
translation: Pada masa yang sama, Gwen yang menulis untuk akhbar kolej, diberi tugas untuk membuat satu cerita tentangnya, tetapi Van terlalu sibuk berpesta untuk melakukan itu.
back_translation: At the same time, Gwen, who writes for the college newspaper, was assigned to create a story about herself, but Van was too busy partying to do it.

text: while accompanying an us senator on his mission in cuba , he makes a botch of so many things , that a minor blunder by the senator turns into a serious incident , which intensifies into a second cuban crisis - thanks to further entanglements by the media , police , and diplomats who represent the arch-enemies usa and cuba .
translation: Semasa menemani seorang ahli senator Amerika Syarikat dalam misinya di Cuba, dia membuat kesilapan dalam banyak perkara, sehingga kesilapan kecil oleh senator berubah menjadi insiden serius, yang berkembang menjadi krisis Cuba kedua - berkat leptapan media, polis, dan diplomat yang mewakili musuh kuat AS dan Cuba.
back_translation: While accompanying an American senator member on his mission in Cuba, he made mistakes in many things, so that the senator's small mistakes turned into a serious incident, which evolved into the second Cuban crisis - thanks to the media frenzy, police, and diplomats representing powerful enemies of the US and Cuba.

text: this `` league `` comprises seafarer/inventor captain nemo ( shah ) , vampiress mina harker ( wilson ) , an invisible man named rodney skinner ( curran ) , american secret service agent tom sawyer ( west ) , the ageless and invincible dorian gray ( townsend ) , and the dangerous split personality of dr . jekyll/mr .
translation: "liga" ini terdiri daripada kelasi/pencipta kapal Nemo (Shah), vampir wanita Mina Harker (Wilson), seorang lelaki tak nampak bernama Rodney Skinner (Curran), agen perkhidmatan rahsia Amerika Tom Sawyer (West), Dorian Gray yang kekal muda (Townsend), dan personaliti yang berbahaya Dr. Jekyll/Mr. Hyde.
back_translation: "This "league" comprises of the sailor/ship creator Nemo (Shah), the female vampire Mina Harker (Wilson), an invisible man named Rodney Skinner (Curran), American secret service agent Tom Sawyer (West), the eternally youthful Dorian Gray (Townsend), and the dangerous personality of Dr. Jekyll/Mr. Hyde."

text: the movie begins in the past where a young boy named sam attempts to save celebi from a hunter .
translation: Filem bermula di masa lampau di mana seorang budak lelaki bernama Sam cuba menyelamatkan Celebi daripada seorang pemburu.
back_translation: The movie starts in the past where a boy named Sam tries to save Celebi from a hunter.

text: after several scenes of this tacky nonsense , you 'll be wistful for the testosterone-charged wizardry of jerry bruckheimer productions , especially because half past dead is like the rock on a wal-mart budget .
translation: Selepas beberapa adegan kemungkiran yang tak berapa bagus ini, anda akan merindui keajaiban berhormon hasil ciptaan Jerry Bruckheimer, terutamanya kerana Half Past Dead seperti The Rock dengan bajet Wal-Mart.
back_translation: After some poorly-done scenes like this, you'll be longing for the hormonal wonders created by Jerry Bruckheimer, especially because Half Past Dead is like The Rock on a Wal-Mart budget.

text: when the day finally comes , johnny breaks from joe , which leads to only one thing - violence .
translation: Apabila hari akhirnya tiba, Johnny berpecah daripada Joe, yang membawa kepada hanya satu perkara - keganasan.
back_translation: When the last day arrives, Johnny separates from Joe, leading to only one thing - violence.

text: oops , she 's really done it this time . that chirpy songbird britney spears has popped up with more mindless drivel .
translation: oops, dia benar-benar telah melakukannya kali ini. Burung menyanyi yang ceria, Britney Spears telah muncul dengan lebih perkataan kosong yang tak bermakna.
back_translation: Oops, she really did it this time. The cheerful singing bird, Britney Spears, has emerged with more meaningless empty words.

text: this re-do is so dumb and so exploitative in its violence that , ironically , it becomes everything that the rather clumsy original was railing against .
translation: Pengulangan ini begitu bodoh dan begitu mengeksploitasi dalam kekerasan sehingga, ironisnya, ia menjadi segala-galanya yang asal agak gagal menentang.
back_translation: This repetition is so foolish and exploitative in its violence that, ironically, it becomes everything it originally somewhat fails to oppose.

text: when young , virginal caroline ( misty mundae ) learns of her mother 's death in paris , she travels to the city of lights for the funeral .
translation: Apabila masih muda, Caroline yang masih dara (Misty Mundae) mendapat tahu tentang kematian ibunya di Paris, lalu dia pergi ke bandar Cahaya tersebut untuk menghadiri upacara pengebumian.
back_translation: When she was still young, Caroline (Misty Mundae) who is still unmarried found out about her mother's death in Paris, and then she went to the City of Light to attend the funeral ceremony.

text: skins has a desolate air , but eyre , a native american raised by white parents , manages to infuse the rocky path to sibling reconciliation with flashes of warmth and gentle humor .
translation: Skins mempunyai suasana yang sunyi, tetapi Eyre, seorang orang Asli Amerika yang dibesarkan oleh ibu bapa berkulit putih, berjaya menyuntikkan laluan berbatu untuk rukun saudara dengan sentuhan kehangatan dan humor yang lembut.
back_translation: Skins have a lonely atmosphere, but Eyre, a Native American raised by white parents, successfully paved a rocky path for brotherly harmony with a gentle touch of warmth and humor.

text: there is no pleasure in watching a child suffer . just embarrassment and a vague sense of shame .
translation: Tidak ada kesenangan dalam melihat seorang kanak-kanak menderita. Hanya rasa malu dan rasa malu yang samar.
back_translation: There is no pleasure in seeing a child suffer. Only a feeling of shame and vague embarrassment.

text: enigma looks great , has solid acting and a neat premise . yet why it fails is a riddle wrapped in a mystery inside an enigma .
translation: Enigma kelihatan hebat, dengan lakonan mantap dan premis yang menarik. Namun mengapa ia gagal adalah teka-teki yang dilindungi oleh misteri di dalam enigma.
back_translation: Enigma looks great, with solid acting and an intriguing premise. But why it failed is a mystery shrouded within the enigma.

text: ultimately , she must accept that those she loves can give her love and nothing more and that she must find her own , uncertain way .
translation: Akhirnya , dia harus menerima bahawa orang yang dia sayangi hanya boleh memberinya kasih sayang dan tiada yang lebih, serta dia harus mencari jalan sendiri yang tidak pasti.
back_translation: Finally, she had to accept that the person she loved could only give her love and nothing more, and she had to find her own uncertain path.

text: for carlos - who has been challenged by his mentor to rework a superficial comic strip into something with depth and substance - running the store is the last thing on his mind .
translation: Bagi Carlos - yang telah digugahkan oleh mentornya untuk mengubah sebuah strip komik yang dangkal menjadi sesuatu yang mendalam dan bermakna - mengendalikan kedai bukanlah perkara yang terlintas dalam fikirannya.
back_translation: For Carlos - who was inspired by his mentor to turn a shallow comic strip into something deep and meaningful - running a shop was not something he had ever considered.

text: as tweedy talks about canning his stockbroker and repairing his pool , you yearn for a few airborne tv sets or nude groupies on the nod to liven things up .

text: but as documentary filmmaker , zeus papagianakopoulous , is about to find out , the real story took place when the cameras were n't rolling .

text: one of the pleasures in walter 's documentary . . . is the parade of veteran painters , confounded dealers , and miscellaneous bohos who expound upon the subject 's mysterious personality without ever explaining him .
translation: Salah satu kesenangan dalam dokumentari Walter. . . adalah perarakan pelukis veteran, peniaga yang terpinggir, dan bohos pelbagai yang menerangkan personaliti misterinya tanpa pernah menerangkan beliau.

translation: Tetapi dia mendapati sekutu yang tidak mungkin dalam sofia, kekasih seksi Beno.

text: fraud feathers and fairies ( one of the stories from the 'red rock ' trilogy of stage plays ) is based on the california gold rush era in the mythical town of red rock .

text: greg kinnear gives a mesmerizing performance as a full-fledged sex addict who is in complete denial about his obsessive behavior .
translation: Greg Kinnear memberikan persembahan yang memukau sebagai seorang pecandu seks sepenuhnya yang benar-benar enggan mengakui perilaku obsesifnya.

text: stryker puts into motion a plan to eradicate the mutants and begins an offensive on the x-men mansion and school .

text: the documentary will combine an interview with mr . mcnamara discussing some of the tragedies and glories of the 20th century , archival footage , documents , and an original score by philip glass .

text: he also does n't realize that he accidentally left one of his shoes there .
translation: Dia juga tidak sedar bahawa dia secara tidak sengaja meninggalkan salah satu kasutnya di sana.

text: it could change america , not only because it is full of necessary discussion points , but because it is so accessible that it makes complex politics understandable to viewers looking for nothing but energetic entertainment .
translation: Ini boleh mengubah Amerika, bukan hanya kerana ia penuh dengan perkara-perkara perbincangan yang diperlukan, tetapi kerana ia begitu mudah diakses sehingga ia menjadikan politik kompleks dapat difahami oleh penonton yang hanya mencari hiburan yang bertenaga.

text: anyone who suffers through this film deserves , at the very least , a big box of consolation candy .
translation: Sesiapa yang mengalami filem ini memang layak mendapat sekurang-kurangnya sebuah kotak besar gula-gula konsolasi.
back_translation: Anyone who experiences this movie deserves to receive at least a large box of consolation candies.

text: it proves quite compelling as an intense , brooding character study .
translation: Ia terbukti cukup memikat sebagai kajian watak yang intens dan misteri.

text: the internment of 120 , 000 innocent people was a dark moment in the history of this country .
translation: Penahanan 120,000 orang yang tidak bersalah adalah satu detik gelap dalam sejarah negara ini.

text: then you remember where the bad dreams came from .
translation: Kemudian kamu ingat dari mana datangnya mimpi buruk itu.
back_translation: Then you remember where that bad dream came from.

text: ajileo journeys from his home in zapotitlan de salinas , a village in southern mexico , makes a perilious border crossing through the desert , and comes to hollywood , where everything and nothing is as he dreamed it would be .
translation: Ajileo melakukan perjalanan dari rumahnya di Zapotitlán de Salinas, sebuah kampung di selatan Mexico, menyeberangi sempadan yang berbahaya melalui padang pasir, dan tiba di Hollywood, di mana segalanya dan tiada sesuatu pun sebagaimana yang diimpikannya.
back_translation: Ajileo travels from his home in Zapotitlán de Salinas, a village in southern Mexico, crossing dangerous borders through the desert, and arrives in Hollywood, where everything and nothing is as he imagined.

text: by contrast , tom finds her world increasingly seductive , and as fatal gradually loses the only person she trusts , she discovers destiny has other plans .
translation: Sebaliknya, Tom mendapati dunianya semakin memikat, dan apabila Fatal secara perlahan kehilangan satu-satunya orang yang dipercayainya, dia menemui takdir mempunyai rancangan lain.

text: a few zingers aside , the writing is indifferent , and jordan brady 's direction is prosaic .
translation: Beberapa ejekan di samping, penulisan itu biasa sahaja, dan arahan Jordan Brady adalah prosaik.

text: as an actress , madonna is one helluva singer . as the mediterranean sparkles , 'swept away ' sinks .
translation: Sebagai seorang pelakon, madonna adalah penyanyi yang sangat hebat. Sementara itu, di Lautan Mediterranean berkilau, filem 'Swept Away' tenggelam.

text: the last 6 weeks have been spent trying to `` get out `` of the relationship .
translation: Masa 6 minggu yang lepas telah digunakan untuk mencuba "keluar" dari hubungan tersebut.

text: one horrible night , kimberly mathews , a random girl from the nearby town , wanders too close to willy 's territory .
translation: Pada satu malam yang mengerikan, Kimberly Mathews, seorang gadis acak dari bandar berdekatan, berjalan terlalu hampir ke wilayah Willy.
back_translation: On a terrifying night, Kimberly Mathews, a random girl from a nearby town, walked too close to Willy's territory.

text: in the heart of a sanitized suburban neighborhood , herbert 's everyday life is filled with constant emasculation at the hands of his wife , eleanor , and the daily grind of work on the chain .
translation: Di tengah-tengah sebuah kawasan pinggir bandar yang dipertingkatkan kebersihannya, kehidupan seharian Herbert dipenuhi dengan perasaan rendah diri yang berterusan di tangan isterinya, Eleanor, dan rutin harian bekerja di kilang.
back_translation: In the midst of an upgraded cleanliness suburban area, Herbert's daily life is filled with continuous feelings of inferiority in the hands of his wife, Eleanor, and his daily routine at the factory.

text: thurman plays a character known as the bride , a pregnant assassin who is shot by her boss , bill ( david carradine ) , on her wedding day , leaving herself and the wedding guests lying for dead .
translation: Thurman memainkan watak yang dikenali sebagai pengantin perempuan, seorang pembunuh mengandung yang ditembak oleh bosnya, Bill (David Carradine), pada hari perkahwinannya, meninggalkannya dan tetamu tetamu perkahwinan terbaring mati.
back_translation: Thurman played a character known as the Bride, a pregnant assassin who was shot by her boss, Bill (David Carradine), on her wedding day, leaving her and the wedding guests lying dead.

text: a wedding is arranged and cassandra is left on the sidelines as everyone around her is drawn into a maelstrom of interconnected relationships .

text: beautifully written and directed and packed with excellent performances .
translation: Ditulis dan diarah dengan indah dan penuh dengan persembahan yang sangat hebat.

text: thirteen conversations about one thing lays out a narrative puzzle that interweaves individual stories , and , like a mobius strip , elliptically loops back to where it began .
translation: "Tiga belas percakapan tentang satu hal menyusun teka-teki naratif yang menganyam cerita-cerita individu, dan, seperti pita Mobius, melingkar kembali secara eliptis ke tempat awal."
back_translation: "Thirteen conversations about one thing compose a narrative puzzle weaving individual stories, and, like a Mobius strip, elliptically loop back to the starting point."

text: the police have no clues nor suspects until nick and his colleague realize the killer is a giant octopus .
translation: Polis tidak mempunyai petunjuk atau yang disyaki sehingga Nick dan rakannya sedar bahawa pembunuh itu adalah seekor gergasi sotong.
