text: as rachel and daniel race through london 's nightscape , desperate to stay one step ahead of betts , every discovery unleashes further hell , extending way beyond the disappearance of rachel 's baby .
translation: Apabila Rachel dan Daniel melumba melalui lanskap malam London, berusaha dengan putus asa untuk mengatasi Betts, setiap penemuan melahirkan neraka yang lebih teruk, melampaui kehilangan bayi Rachel.
back_translation: As Rachel and Daniel cycle through the nighttime landscape of London, desperately trying to outwit Betts, each discovery gives birth to a worse hell, surpassing Rachel's loss of her baby.

text: jim finally proposes to michelle , and both families gather for their upcoming wedding .
translation: Jim akhirnya membuat tawaran kepada Michelle, dan kedua keluarga berkumpul untuk majlis perkahwinan mereka yang akan datang.
back_translation: Jim finally made a proposal to Michelle, and both families gathered for their upcoming wedding ceremony.

text: the movie addresses a hungry need for pg-rated , nonthreatening family movies , but it does n't go too much further .

text: although very much like the first movie based on j . k . rowling 's phenomenal fantasy best sellers , this second go-round possesses a quite pleasing , headlong thrust and a likably delinquent attitude .
translation: Walaupun sangat mirip dengan filem pertama berdasarkan penjual terbaik fantasi yang luar biasa, kedua-dua filem ini memiliki daya tolak yang cukup menyeronokkan dan sikap nakal yang menyenangkan.
back_translation: While very similar to the first film based on the incredible best-selling fantasy novel, both films have a fairly entertaining appeal and delightful mischievous attitude.

text: there 's undeniable enjoyment to be had from films crammed with movie references , but the fun wears thin -- then out -- when there 's nothing else happening .
translation: Terdapat keseronokan yang tidak dapat dinafikan daripada filem yang dipenuhi dengan rujukan filem, tetapi keseronokan itu menjadi suram - kemudian hilang - apabila tiada perkara lain berlaku.
back_translation: There is undeniable joy from a film filled with film references, but that joy turns bleak - then disappears - when nothing else happens.

text: now joined by teiresias , the former king forces his daughter back to her senses and the horrifying realization that not only is her son dead , but that agave herself was `` amongst his butchers . ``
translation: Kini bersama dengan Teiresias, bekas raja memaksa anak perempuannya kembali kepada akalnya dan menyedari dengan ngerinya bahawa bukan sahaja anak lelakinya telah mati, tetapi bahawa Agave sendiri juga "di antara pembunuhnya."
back_translation: Now, together with Teiresias, the former king forces his daughter to return to her senses and realizes with horror that not only has his son died, but that Agave herself is also "among the murderers."

text: its spirit of iconoclastic abandon -- however canned -- makes for unexpectedly giddy viewing .
translation: Semangatnya yang memberontak, walaupun terencana, menjadikan tontonan yang mendebarkan secara tak terduga.

text: dana , a college student obsessed with the internet , explores the media to an extent where chatting with a stranger , becomes a higher priority than giving attention to her loved ones .
translation: Dana, seorang pelajar kolej yang obses dengan internet, meneroka media sehingga berkomunikasi dengan orang asing menjadi keutamaan yang lebih tinggi daripada memberi perhatian kepada orang yang dia sayangi.

text: a bright , inventive , thoroughly winning flight of revisionist fancy .

text: west has now identified an electrical phenomenon # the nee # which is discharged from the brain at the moment of death . . . and which may be the 'missing link ' in his studies : if the nee is re-injected into a re-animated corpse , it should restore the 'subject ' to full 'reason ' . . .
translation: Barat kini telah mengenal pasti satu fenomena elektrikal yang dinamakan 'nee' yang dikeluarkan dari otak pada saat kematian . . . dan yang mungkin menjadi 'pautan hilang' dalam kajiannya : jika nee disuntik semula ke dalam mayat yang dihidupkan semula , ia sepatutnya mengembalikan 'subjek' kepada 'akal yang sempurna' . . .
back_translation: The West has now identified an electrical phenomenon called 'nee' that is emitted from the brain at the moment of death . . . and which may be the 'missing link' in its study: if 'nee' is injected back into a revived corpse, it should restore the 'subject' to a 'complete mind' . . .

text: thoughtful , even stinging at times , and lots of fun .
translation: Penuh renungan, kadangkala menusuk, dan sangat menyeronokkan.

text: a carefully structured scream of consciousness that is tortured and unsettling -- but unquestionably alive .
translation: jeritan kesedaran yang teliti yang tertekan dan mengganggu - tetapi tidak diragukan lagi hidup.
back_translation: A careful, suppressed, and disturbing cry of consciousness - but undoubtedly alive.

text: shortly thereafter , kilo is involved in a drug deal with a wired frat boy that goes bad and he is imprisoned .

text: a young reporter named rachel is investigating these events , but after she and her small son watch the tape , it becomes a race against time to find out why the tape is killing everyone and how it could be stopped .

back_translation: A young journalist named Rachel is investigating these incidents, but after she and her son watched the recording, it turned into a race against time to find out why the recording killed everyone and how it can be stopped.

translation: Filem tersebut bersinar dengan cemerlang pada semua watak, kerana arahan dilaksanakan dengan bijak.

text: phileine is a super-bitch traveling to new york to visit her boyfriend maxto say sorry , for the first time in her life , for the argument the two of them were having before he left .
translation: Phileine adalah seorang wanita yang sangat kasar yang sedang melancong ke New York untuk mengunjungi kekasihnya, Max, untuk meminta maaf, untuk pertama kalinya dalam hidupnya, karena perselisihan yang mereka miliki sebelum dia pergi.
back_translation: Phileine is a very rough woman who is traveling to New York to visit her lover, Max, to apologize, for the first time in her life, for the quarrel they had before she left.

text: anchored by a terrific performance by abbass , satin rouge shows that the idea of women 's self-actualization knows few continental divides .
translation: Diperkuat oleh persembahan hebat oleh Abbass, Satin Rouge menunjukkan bahawa idea pemerkasaan diri wanita tidak mengenal sempadan benua.
back_translation: Empowered by a great performance by Abbass, Satin Rouge shows that the idea of empowering women transcends continental boundaries.

text: one well-timed explosion in a movie can be a knockout , but a hundred of them can be numbing . proof of this is ballistic : ecks vs . sever .
translation: Satu letupan yang tepat pada waktunya dalam filem boleh menjadi pukulan hebat, tetapi seratus daripadanya boleh menjadi menghanyutkan. Bukti akan ini ialah 'Ballistic: Ecks vs. Sever'.
back_translation: One well-timed explosion in a movie can be a great punch, but a hundred of them can be overwhelming. Proof of this is 'Ballistic: Ecks vs. Sever'.

text: as the investigation continues , catherine is forced to choose between her past passions and new possibilities , even as handler is discovering surprising new facts about embry and his possible connection to another disappearance from campus .
translation: Sementara siasatan berterusan, Catherine terpaksa memilih di antara gairah lamanya dan peluang baru, walaupun handler sedang menemui fakta-fakta baru yang mengejutkan tentang Embry dan kemungkinan kaitannya dengan kehilangan lain dari kampus.
back_translation: While the investigation continues, Catherine must choose between her old passion and new opportunities, even as the handler uncovers surprising new facts about Embry and its potential connection to another disappearance on campus.

text: adapted from a monologue in his `` blue jam `` radio series , chris morris ' first short film is a haunting black comedy about a man who no longer uses his name because he 's decided he 's ceased to deserve one , and a dog called rothko who says he is the man 's lawyer .
translation: Diadaptasikan dari monolog dalam siri radio "Blue Jam"nya, filem pendek pertama Chris Morris ialah komedi hitam yang menghantui tentang seorang lelaki yang tidak lagi menggunakan namanya kerana dia telah memutuskan bahawa dia tidak layak untuk memilikinya, dan seekor anjing yang dipanggil Rothko yang mengatakan dia adalah peguam lelaki itu.
back_translation: Adapted from a monologue in his radio series "Blue Jam," Chris Morris' first short film is a haunting dark comedy about a man who no longer uses his name because he has decided that he is unworthy to have it, and a dog named Rothko who claims to be the man's lawyer.

text: he has no life ( lives at home with his mother ) and no reason to live .
translation: Dia tidak mempunyai kehidupan (tinggal di rumah dengan ibunya) dan tiada alasan untuk hidup.
back_translation: He has no life (living at home with his mother) and no reason to live.

text: [ shyamalan ] continues to cut a swathe through mainstream hollywood , while retaining an integrity and refusing to compromise his vision .
translation: Shyamalan terus menembusi Hollywood utama, sambil mengekalkan integriti dan enggan mengorbankan visinya.
back_translation: Shyamalan continues to penetrate mainstream Hollywood, while maintaining integrity and being reluctant to sacrifice his vision.

text: windtalkers celebrates the human spirit and packs an emotional wallop .
translation: Windtalkers merayakan semangat manusia dan memuatkan dorongan emosi yang kuat.
back_translation: Windtalkers celebrates the human spirit and carries a strong emotional drive.

text: viveka is a glamorous woman and has high standards of living .
translation: viveka adalah seorang wanita glamor dan memiliki standard kehidupan yang tinggi.

text: kids five and up will be delighted with the fast , funny , and even touching story . parents may even find that it goes by quickly , because it has some of the funniest jokes of any movie this year , including those intended for adults .
translation: Kanak-kanak berusia lima tahun ke atas pasti akan gembira dengan cerita yang pantas, lucu, dan sentuhan yang menyentuh hati. Ibubapa mungkin akan dapati masa berlalu dengan cepat, kerana filem ini mengandungi jenaka-jenaka yang paling lucu daripada mana-mana filem tahun ini, termasuk yang ditujukan untuk orang dewasa.
back_translation: Children aged five and above will definitely be delighted with a suitable, funny, and heartwarming story. Parents may find time passing quickly because this film contains the funniest jokes of any film this year, even those aimed at adults.

text: no one , including the viewers , seems to know who can be trusted , and that 's what makes this movie fun to watch .
translation: Tiada sesiapa, termasuk penonton, nampaknya tahu siapa yang boleh dipercayai, dan itulah yang membuat filem ini seronok untuk ditonton.
back_translation: No one, including the audience, seems to know who can be trusted, and that's what makes this movie enjoyable to watch.

text: the director films a story of an immigrant actor who struggles with his religious and sexual identity in the new land .
translation: Pengarah membuat filem tentang seorang pelakon imigran yang bergelut dengan identiti agama dan seksualnya di tanah baru.

text: one day , lilja falls in love with andrej .
translation: Suatu hari, Lilja jatuh cinta pada Andrej.

text: a small independent film suffering from a severe case of hollywood-itis .
translation: filem indie kecil yang mengalami kes teruk hollywood-itis.

text: alex nohe 's documentary plays like a travelogue for what mostly resembles a real-life , big-budget nc-17 version of tank girl .
translation: Dokumentari Alex Nohe seakan seperti karya perjalanan untuk apa yang kebanyakannya menyerupai versi kehidupan nyata, beranggaran besar, versi NC-17 dari Tank Girl.

text: who knows what may be down the next block , or what lies in store for gigi at the end of the walk ?
translation: Siapa tahu apa yang mungkin berada di sebalik selekoh seterusnya, atau apa yang menanti Gigi di hujung jalan itu?
back_translation: Who knows what might be behind the next corner, or what awaits Gigi at the end of that road?

text: armed with just two revolvers and a dozen grenades , king persuades cuthbertson to join him on a mission to occupied france .
translation: Bersenjatakan hanya dua revolver dan dua belas grenade, raja membujuk Cuthbertson untuk bergabung dengannya dalam misi ke Perancis yang diduduki.
back_translation: Armed with only two revolvers and twelve grenades, the king persuaded Cuthbertson to join him on a mission to occupied France.

text: the story takes place in vermont , against the backdrop of the state capitol , where civil union laws are being debated along with gun control and dwi 's .

text: in the months that followed , he gave dozens of talks on four continents , conducted scores of interviews , and wrote a book 9-11 that was published in 22 countries and became a surprise bestseller in many of them , including japan .
translation: Dalam bulan-bulan yang berikutnya, dia memberikan puluhan ceramah di empat benua, mengadakan puluhan wawancara, dan menulis sebuah buku 9-11 yang diterbitkan di 22 negara dan menjadi penjual terlaris kejutan dalam banyak negara, termasuk Jepun.
back_translation: In the following months, he gave dozens of lectures on four continents, conducted dozens of interviews, and wrote a 9-11 book published in 22 countries and became a best-selling surprise in many countries, including Japan.

text: gigantic is the story of they might be giants , a unique musical group centered on john flansburgh and john linnell .
translation: "gigantic" adalah kisah tentang they might be giants, sebuah kumpulan muzik yang unik yang berpaku pada john flansburgh dan john linnell.

back_translation: Created intentionally and with great seriousness, far from heaven too perfect like a picture frame, too orderly and new like a pin meticulously redesigned to be effective.

text: plotless collection of moronic stunts is by far the worst movie of the year .

translation: Hanya kanak-kanak kecil sahaja yang mungkin menikmatinya... yang mungkin akan terganggu oleh pergerakan dan bunyi yang pantas dalam filem tersebut.

text: with a tone as variable as the cinematography , schaeffer 's film never settles into the light-footed enchantment the material needs , and the characters ' quirks and foibles never jell into charm .
translation: Dengan nada yang berubah-ubah seperti sinematografi, filem Schaeffer tidak pernah menetap dalam pesona yang ringan yang diperlukan oleh bahan itu, dan aneh unik watak-wataknya tidak pernah menyatu menjadi daya tarikan yang memikat.
back_translation: With ever-changing tones like cinematography, Schaeffer's films never settle into the light charm required by the material, and its peculiar unique characters never blend into a captivating attraction.

text: the rock as a bounty hunter who attempts to square a debt by heading to the amazon jungle to capture someone .
translation: Batu sebagai seorang pemburu upah yang cuba menyelesaikan hutang dengan pergi ke hutan Amazon untuk menangkap seseorang.
back_translation: Rock is a bounty hunter trying to settle his debt by going to the Amazon forest to capture someone.

text: like all abstract art , the film does not make this statement in an easily accessible way , and -- unless prewarned -- it would be very possible for a reasonably intelligent person to sit through its tidal wave of imagery and not get this vision at all .
translation: Seperti semua seni abstrak, filem ini tidak menyatakan kenyataan ini dengan cara yang mudah diakses, dan - kecuali diberitahu terlebih dahulu - ia sangat mungkin bagi seseorang yang cukup bijak untuk duduk dan menonton gelombang imejnya tanpa memahami visi ini sama sekali.
back_translation: Like all abstract art, this film does not express this statement in an easily accessible way, and - unless informed beforehand - it is very likely for someone clever enough to sit and watch the waves of its images without understanding this vision at all.

text: a penetrating glimpse into the tissue-thin ego of the stand-up comic .
translation: pandangan yang menyelami ego yang nipis seperti tisu dari pelawak yang berdiri.
back_translation: A view that delves into a thin ego like a comedian standing.

text: [ shyamalan ] turns the goose-pimple genre on its empty head and fills it with spirit , purpose and emotionally bruised characters who add up to more than body count .
translation: Shyamalan mengubah genre horor dengan cara yang unik dan memenuhkannya dengan semangat, tujuan, dan watak-watak yang penuh dengan emosi, yang lebih dari sekadar jumlah korban.
back_translation: Shyamalan transforms the horror genre in a unique way and fills it with spirit, purpose, and characters full of emotions, more than just the number of victims.

text: armed with a rad '80s soundtrack and a winning cast ( including indie rocker liz phair ) , cherish is an ingenious low-budget thriller .
translation: Bersenjata dengan soundtrack '80s yang hebat dan pelakon yang memenangi (termasuk rock indie Liz Phair), Cherish adalah filem thriller berteknologi rendah yang ingenius.
back_translation: Armed with a great '80s soundtrack and award-winning actors (including indie rock singer Liz Phair), Cherish is a low-tech ingenious thriller film.

text: fireman-turned-writer larry brown are examined in a unique documentary format that incorporates narrative film adaptations of three of his short stories : samaritans , wild thing , and boy & # 38 ; dog .
translation: Bomoh pemadam api yang berubah menjadi penulis, Larry Brown, disiasat dalam format dokumentari yang unik yang memasukkan filem naratif adaptasi tiga cerita pendek beliau: samaritans, wild thing, dan boy & anjing.
back_translation: Firefighter shaman who turned into a writer, Larry Brown, is being investigated in a unique documentary format that incorporates narrative film adaptations of three of his short stories: Samaritans, Wild Thing, and Boy & Dog.

text: the script was reportedly rewritten a dozen times -- either 11 times too many or else too few .
translation: Skrip tersebut dilaporkan telah ditulis semula sebelas kali -- sama ada sebelas kali terlalu banyak atau terlalu sedikit.
back_translation: The script has reportedly been rewritten eleven times - whether eleven times is too many or too few.

text: despite the 2-d animation , the wild thornberrys movie makes for a surprisingly cinematic experience .
translation: Walaupun animasi 2-d, filem The Wild Thornberrys menghasilkan pengalaman sinematik yang mengejutkan.
back_translation: Despite being 2D animation, The Wild Thornberrys movie delivers a surprising cinematic experience.

text: the two , along with their agent , go on a year long string of tryouts , impressing major league scouts with mid 90 mph pitching .
translation: Kedua-duanya, bersama wakil mereka, menghadiri siri percubaan selama setahun, mengagumkan pengintip liga utama dengan pusingan sekitar 90 mph.
back_translation: Both of them, together with their representatives, attended a year-long trial series, impressing the main league scout with pitches around 90 mph.

text: oscar is certain that he could be a better mate to eve than his work-obsessed father .
translation: Oscar yakin bahawa dia boleh menjadi pasangan yang lebih baik untuk Eve berbanding bapa yang obses dengan kerjanya.
back_translation: Oscar is confident that he can be a better partner for Eve than her work-obsessed father.

text: in the near future in the asian city-state sintawan , everyone 's identity is recorded in the vast cyberlink .
translation: Pada masa akan datang di bandar-bandar Asia, negara Sintawan, identiti setiap individu direkodkan dalam rangkaian siber yang luas.
back_translation: In the future in Asian cities, the country of Sintawan, the identity of each individual is recorded in a wide cyber network.

text: sent to a german stalag prison camp , lieutenant hart is at once thrust into the social order of pows , where every man thinks of himself first with bribery and trading with german captors commonplace .
translation: Dihantar ke kem tahanan Stalag Jerman, Leftenan Hart terus terjerumus ke dalam susunan sosial tawanan perang, di mana setiap lelaki memikirkan dirinya sendiri terlebih dahulu dengan rasuah dan berdagang dengan ahli tawanan Jerman adalah perkara biasa.
back_translation: Sent to the Stalag German prisoner of war camp, Lieutenant Hart immediately fell into the social hierarchy of prisoners of war, where every man thought of himself first, with bribery and trading with German prisoners being common practices.

text: can the elderly and feeble mccaleb , who had intended to spend his retirement living on his boat in the los angeles harbor , and who ca n't drive , and has to nap regularly , muster up the endurance to find the killer ?
translation: Bolehkah orang tua dan lemah McCaleb, yang bercadang untuk menghabiskan persaraannya dengan tinggal di atas botnya di pelabuhan Los Angeles, yang tidak boleh memandu, dan perlu tidur sebentar, mencari kekuatan untuk mencari pembunuh?
back_translation: Can the elderly and weak McCaleb, who plans to spend his retirement living on his boat in the port of Los Angeles, where he cannot drive, and needs to sleep briefly, find the strength to search for a killer?

text: and in the dogs , she finds lost pieces of herself as she fumbles with the leash to her own life - struggling to hold on as it pulls her toward a brighter future before her past catches up with her .
translation: dan dalam anjing-anjing, dia menemui potongan dirinya yang hilang ketika dia meraba-raba dengan tali kehidupannya sendiri - berjuang untuk bertahan saat tali itu menariknya ke arah masa depan yang lebih cerah sebelum masa lalunya mengejarnya.
back_translation: and amidst the dogs, he found fragments of his lost self as he grappled with his own lifeline - struggling to survive as the lifeline pulled him towards a brighter future before his past caught up with him.

text: daphne must attempt to fit in with the social requirements demanded of her , while also getting to know her father , dealing with his territorial other daughter , and maintaining her own self-identity .

back_translation: Daphne must try to adapt to the social demands placed on her, while also understanding her father, dealing with her jealous daughter, and maintaining her own identity.

text: disillusioned and with no money the secret knight joins the crusaders and embarks on new adventures .
translation: Terkecewa dan tanpa wang, kesatria rahsia menyertai tentera salib dan memulakan pengembaraan baru.

text: his model girl friend ( anne marie johnson ) immediately leaves him .
translation: Kekasih modelnya (Anne Marie Johnson) segera meninggalkannya.

back_translation: As their relationship progresses, Jenny begins to encounter challenges in her religious beliefs and new lifestyle.

text: `` dylan 's run `` chronicles the experiences of dylan glenn , the great-grandson of emancipated slaves , as he seeks to become the first black republican from the deep south elected to congress since reconstruction .
translation: "Perlumbaan Dylan" menceritakan pengalaman-pengalaman Dylan Glenn, cicit kepada hamba yang dimerdekakan, ketika dia berusaha menjadi orang Republican hitam pertama dari selatan dalam yang dipilih ke Kongres sejak era rekonstruksi.
back_translation: "The Race of Dylan" tells the experiences of Dylan Glenn, a descendant of a freed slave, as he strives to become the first black Republican from the South to be elected to Congress since the Reconstruction era.

text: the book records the entire history of the universe , revealing to its readers anything they wish to know .
translation: Buku itu mencatat seluruh sejarah alam semesta, mendedahkan kepada pembacanya apa sahaja yang mereka ingin tahu.

text: elizabethean playwright christopher marlowe runs afoul of the queen as well as a jealous male admirer who ultimately hands marlowe 's unpublished work to william shakespeare , an unsuccessful scribe who then pilfers marlowe 's writings .
translation: Penulis drama era Elizabethean, Christopher Marlowe, terlibat konflik dengan ratu serta pemuja lelaki yang cemburunya yang pada akhirnya menyerahkan karya tidak diterbitkan Marlowe kepada William Shakespeare, seorang penulis yang tidak berjaya yang kemudian mencuri tulisan Marlowe.
back_translation: Elizabethean era drama writer, Christopher Marlowe, was involved in conflicts with the queen and a jealous male admirer who eventually handed Marlowe's unpublished work to William Shakespeare, an unsuccessful writer who later stole Marlowe's writings.

text: even though many of these guys are less than adorable ( their lamentations are pretty much self-centered ) , there 's something vital about the movie .

text: however to keep the image of him as a sex guru going he has to get more lessons from sharonna whom he begins to fall for despite using her .

text: throws in enough clever and unexpected twists to make the formula feel fresh .
translation: Melemparkan cukup banyak putaran cerdik dan tak terduga untuk membuat formula terasa segar.

text: even though frode is only 7 years old , he does n't really believe in monsters .
translation: Walaupun Frode hanya berusia 7 tahun, dia tidak benar-benar percaya pada makhluk-makhluk seram.

text: they create a new day care facility called `` daddy day care `` and have kids like : the smart-mouthed-but-became-polite crispin ( shane baumel ) , the really-smart becca ( hailey noelle johnson ) , and the flash/tony ( jimmy bennett ) .
translation: Mereka mencipta sebuah kemudahan penjagaan kanak-kanak baru yang dipanggil "Daddy Day Care" dan memiliki kanak-kanak seperti: Crispin yang mulut-celah tetapi menjadi sopan (Shane Baumel), Becca yang sangat bijak (Hailey Noelle Johnson), dan Flash/Tony (Jimmy Bennett).
back_translation: They created a new child care facility called "Daddy Day Care" and have children like: Crispin, who talks a lot but is polite (Shane Baumel), Becca, who is very smart (Hailey Noelle Johnson), and Flash/Tony (Jimmy Bennett).

text: a tired , unnecessary retread . . . a stale copy of a picture that was n't all that great to begin with .
translation: sekadar ulangan yang lesu dan tidak diperlukan... sebuah salinan lapuk dari sebuah gambar yang bukan terlalu hebat dari awal.
back_translation: Just a tired repetition that is not necessary... an outdated copy of a picture that was not too great to begin with.

text: the words , 'frankly , my dear , i do n't give a damn , ' have never been more appropriate .
translation: Pernyataan, 'terus terang, sayangku, saya tidak peduli,' tidak pernah lebih sesuai.

text: succumbs to the same kind of maudlin , sentimental mysticism that mars the touched by an angel school of non-god spiritual-uplift movies .
translation: terpengaruh kepada jenis mistisisme melankolik yang sama yang merosakkan filem-filem yang mengangkat semangat spiritual bukan tuhan seperti 'touched by an angel'.

text: most fish stories are a little peculiar , but this is one that should be thrown back in the river .
translation: Kebanyakan cerita ikan agak aneh, tetapi ini adalah satu yang sepatutnya dilemparkan semula ke sungai.
back_translation: Most fish stories are quite strange, but this one is one that should be thrown back into the river.

text: decades ago , the legendary james brown sold his soul to the devil for fame and fortune .
translation: Beberapa dekad yang lalu, legenda James Brown menjual jiwanya kepada syaitan demi kemasyhuran dan kekayaan.
back_translation: A few decades ago, the legend James Brown sold his soul to the devil for fame and fortune.

text: no better or worse than 'truth or consequences , n . m . ' or any other interchangeable actioner with imbecilic mafia toolbags botching a routine assignment in a western backwater .
translation: Tidak lebih baik atau lebih buruk daripada 'kebenaran atau konsekuensi, N. M.' atau sebarang tindakan yang boleh digantikan dengan kumpulan mafia bodoh yang merosakkan tugasan rutin di bandar pedalaman Barat.
back_translation: No better or worse than 'truth or consequences, N.M.' or any action that could be replaced with a foolish mafia disrupting routine tasks in a Western hinterland town.

text: they detour from their trip to take the girl to the nearest town , where they meet the local sheriff who is hell bent on capturing the girl 's attackers .
translation: Mereka mengalihkan perjalanan mereka untuk membawa gadis itu ke bandar terdekat, di mana mereka bertemu dengan sheriff tempatan yang bertekad untuk menangkap penyerang gadis itu.
back_translation: They redirected their journey to take the girl to the nearest town, where they met the local sheriff determined to capture the attacker of the girl.

text: in a world ravaged by disease , disasters and hatred - a worldwide plan which dates back more than 2000 years has been implemented to show people that there 's more to life and living then just waste .
translation: Di dalam dunia yang dilanda penyakit, bencana, dan kebencian - satu rancangan global yang bermula lebih dari 2000 tahun lalu telah dilaksanakan untuk menunjukkan kepada manusia bahawa terdapat lebih dalam hidup daripada sekadar membazir.
back_translation: In a world plagued by sickness, disasters, and hatred - a global plan that started over 2000 years ago has been implemented to show humanity that there is more to life than mere waste.

text: like a veteran head cutter , barbershop is tuned in to its community .
translation: Seperti tukang gunting rambut veteran, barbershop ini selaras dengan komunitinya.
back_translation: Like a veteran hairdresser, this barbershop is in tune with its community.

text: a different kind of love story - one that is dark , disturbing , painful to watch , yet compelling .
translation: sejenis cerita cinta yang berbeza - satu yang gelap, mengganggu, menyakitkan untuk ditonton, namun memikat.
back_translation: A kind of love story that is different - one that is dark, disturbing, painful to watch, yet captivating.

text: for example , she collects cans and bottles to recycle from the beach and buys fish food with the money she makes , then paddles out in the ocean to feed the fish there .
translation: Sebagai contoh, dia mengumpul tin dan botol untuk dikitar semula dari pantai dan membeli makanan ikan dengan wang yang dia perolehi, kemudian belayar ke tengah laut untuk memberi makan ikan di sana.
back_translation: For example, he collects cans and bottles for recycling from the beach and buys fish food with the money he earns, then sails out to the sea to feed the fish there.

text: about a boy vividly recalls the cary grant of room for one more , houseboat and father goose in its affectionate depiction of the gentle war between a reluctant , irresponsible man and the kid who latches onto him .
translation: Tentang seorang budak dengan jelas mengingat kembali Cary Grant dalam filem "Room for One More", "Houseboat" dan "Father Goose" dalam gambaran penuh kasihnya mengenai perang lembut antara seorang lelaki yang enggan dan tidak bertanggungjawab dengan budak yang melekat padanya.
back_translation: About a child vividly recalling Cary Grant in the movies "Room for One More", "Houseboat", and "Father Goose" in his heartfelt portrayal of the gentle war between a reluctant and irresponsible man and the child attached to him.

text: the lizard , chaos , scar , heartless and sic inhabit the violent and often bizarre world of backyard wrestling .
translation: Kumbara, kacau, parut, tanpa belas kasihan, dan sakit mendiami dunia wrestling belakang yang ganas dan seringkali aneh.
back_translation: Trashcan, stir, grater, merciless, and pain inhabit the rough and often bizarre world of wrestling.

text: but when irrefutable proof that they are meant to be together arises , both of them are sent into conflict .
translation: Tetapi apabila bukti yang tidak dapat dinafikan bahawa mereka ditakdirkan bersama muncul, kedua-dua mereka dilemparkan ke dalam konflik.
back_translation: But when the undeniable evidence that they were destined to be together emerges, both of them are thrown into conflict.

text: the only camouflage carvey should now be considering is a paper bag to wear over his head when he goes out into public , to avoid being recognized as the man who bilked unsuspecting moviegoers .
translation: Carrey sepatutnya mempertimbangkan hanya menggunakan beg kertas untuk dipakai di kepalanya apabila keluar ke tempat awam, untuk mengelak dikenali sebagai lelaki yang menipu penonton filem yang tidak bersedia.
back_translation: Carrey should consider only using a paper bag to wear on his head when going out in public, to avoid being recognized as the man who tricked unprepared movie viewers.

text: a tender and touching drama , based on the true story of a troubled african-american 's quest to come to terms with his origins , reveals the yearning we all have in our hearts for acceptance within the family circle .
translation: Sebuah drama yang lembut dan menyentuh, berdasarkan kisah benar seorang lelaki Afrika-Amerika yang bermasalah dan berusaha untuk menerima asal-usulnya, mendedahkan kerinduan yang kita semua miliki di dalam hati untuk diterima dalam lingkaran keluarga.
back_translation: A gentle and touching drama, based on the true story of an African-American man struggling to come to terms with his origins, revealing the longing we all have in our hearts to be accepted within the family circle.

text: `` bad santa `` is the story of two conmen who go on a road trip to malls dressed as santa and his elf .
translation: "Bad Santa" adalah kisah dua penipu yang pergi dalam perjalanan jalan ke pusat membeli-belah berpakaian sebagai Santa dan elfnya.
back_translation: "Bad Santa" is a story of two con men who go on a shopping mall road trip dressed as Santa and his elf.

text: how i killed my father is one of those art house films that makes you feel like you 're watching an iceberg melt -- only it never melts .
translation: Bagaimana saya membunuh bapa saya adalah salah satu filem seni rumah yang membuat anda berasa seperti sedang menonton ais gunung mencair - hanya saja ia tidak pernah mencair.
back_translation: How I Killed My Father is one of those art house films that make you feel like you're watching a melting iceberg - except it never melts.

text: although shot with little style , skins is heartfelt and achingly real .
translation: Walaupun ditembak dengan sedikit gaya, Skins adalah penuh dengan rasa dan sungguh benar-benar realistik.
back_translation: Despite being shot with a touch of style, Skins is full of flavor and truly realistic.

text: must-see viewing for anyone involved in the high-tech industry . others may find it migraine-inducing , despite moore 's attempts at whimsy and spoon feeding .

text: has something to say . . . but it is a statement and issue worthy of a much more thoughtfulness and insight than a melodramatic and wholly predictable thriller .

back_translation: There is something that needs to be conveyed. . . but this is a statement and an issue that requires more thought and perspectives than a melodramatic horror movie that can be easily predicted.

text: los angeles ' little tokyo 's foremost studio photographer , miyatake smuggled a lens and film holder into the u . s . wwii camp he was incarcerated in and captured life behind barbed wire with a makeshift camera made of scrap wood .
translation: Fotografer studio terkemuka Little Tokyo di Los Angeles, Miyatake menyelundupkan lensa dan pemegang film ke dalam kamp penahanan Perang Dunia II di Amerika Serikat di mana ia dipenjarakan dan menangkap kehidupan di belakang kawat berduri dengan kamera sederhana yang terbuat dari kayu bekas.
back_translation: Renowned studio photographer from Little Tokyo in Los Angeles, Miyatake smuggled a lens and film holder into the World War II detention camp in the United States where he was imprisoned and captured life behind barbed wire with a simple camera made from old wood.

text: it 's hard to recognize change when you 're in the middle of it college follows a young man in his final semester of college as he segues into adult life .
translation: Sukar untuk mengenali perubahan apabila anda sedang berada di tengah-tengahnya. Filem ini mengikuti seorang pemuda dalam semester terakhirnya di kolej ketika beliau beralih ke kehidupan dewasa.
back_translation: It's difficult to recognize changes when you are in the midst of it. This movie follows a young man in his final semester at college as he transitions into adult life.

text: amber ( madonna ) is 40 , beautiful , rich , spoiled , and arrogant beyond measure .
translation: Amber (Madonna) berumur 40 tahun, cantik, kaya, dimanjakan, dan sangat sombong.

text: not a film for the faint of heart or conservative of spirit , but for the rest of us -- especially san francisco lovers -- it 's a spirited film and a must-see .
translation: Bukan filem untuk yang lemah semangat atau konservatif, tetapi untuk yang lain - terutamanya peminat San Francisco - ia adalah filem yang bersemangat dan wajib ditonton.

text: a thoughtful , moving piece that faces difficult issues with honesty and beauty .
translation: Sebuah tulisan yang penuh pemikiran dan mengharukan yang menghadapi isu-isu sukar dengan jujur dan keindahan.

text: children of the century , though well dressed and well made , ultimately falls prey to the contradiction that afflicts so many movies about writers .
translation: Kanak-kanak abad ini, walaupun berpakaian dengan baik dan baik dibuat, akhirnya menjadi mangsa kepada pertentangan yang melanda begitu banyak filem tentang penulis.

text: if you like your comedy dark and slightly freaky , then steve shainberg 's film deserves your attention .

text: believing that he is the `` world 's greatest swordsman , `` juan antonio merrily accepts the challenge until he learns that the duel will be fought with pistols , not swords .
translation: Menganggap dirinya sebagai `` ahli pedang terhebat di dunia,`` Juan Antonio dengan riang menerima cabaran sehingga dia mengetahui bahawa duel itu akan dilakukan dengan pistol, bukan pedang.
back_translation: Considering himself as the "greatest swordsman in the world," Juan Antonio joyfully accepted the challenge until he found out that the duel would be conducted with pistols, not swords.

text: in the heat of the moment dante blames lucy saying , `` you never wanted this baby .

text: along the way , he meets a long line of interesting and colorful characters , while back at home , ada is learning the ropes of managing her deceased father 's farm with ruby ( renee zellweger ) , a scrappy drifter who assists and teaches ada along the way .
translation: Sepanjang perjalanan, dia bertemu dengan barisan panjang watak-watak menarik dan berwarna-warni. Sementara di rumah, Ada sedang belajar cara mengurus ladang bapanya yang telah meninggal bersama Ruby (Renee Zellweger), seorang pengembara yang berani yang membantu dan mengajar Ada sepanjang perjalanan.
back_translation: Throughout the journey, she encountered a long line of interesting and colorful characters. Meanwhile at home, Ada was learning how to manage her late father's farm with Ruby (Renee Zellweger), a brave wanderer who helped and taught Ada along the way.

text: the film is itself a sort of cinematic high crime , one that brings military courtroom dramas down very , very low .

back_translation: The journey to the ultimate secret discovery is a unique and quite thrilling adventure.

text: unexpectedly , the caustic loner befriends the girl only to see his life take another turn when she is kidnapped and later murdered .

text: he can remember nothing and begins to try to rebuild his memory based on clues such as the swiss bank account , the number of which , is implanted in his hip .

text: when longfellow deeds , a small-town pizzeria owner and poet , inherits $ 40 billion from his deceased uncle , he quickly begins rolling in a different kind of dough .
translation: Apabila Longfellow Deeds, seorang pemilik pizzeria dan penyair dari sebuah bandar kecil, mewarisi $40 bilion daripada bapa saudaranya yang telah meninggal, beliau dengan cepat mula bergelimpangan dalam jenis duit yang berbeza.

text: young nicholas and his family enjoy a comfortable life , until nicholas ' father dies and the family is left penniless .

translation: Ini adalah satu kajian watak yang hebat, penyiasatan ke dalam kehidupan seorang lelaki yang kompleks.

text: this goofy gangster yarn never really elevates itself from being yet another earnestly generic crime-busting comic vehicle -- a well-intentioned remake that shows some spunk and promise but fails to register as anything distinctive or daring
translation: Kisah gangster yang kocak ini tidak benar-benar meningkatkan dirinya dari sekadar menjadi kendaraan komik pemecahan kejahatan yang generik dengan sungguh-sungguh - sebuah pembuatan ulang yang bersemangat dan menjanjikan namun gagal membuat kesan sebagai sesuatu yang unik atau berani.

text: the film is a confusing melange of tones and styles , one moment a romantic trifle and the next a turgid drama .

text: both stars manage to be funny , but , like the recent i spy , the star chemistry begs the question of whether random gags add up to a movie .

text: there is no substitute for on-screen chemistry , and when friel pulls the strings that make williams sink into melancholia , the reaction in williams is as visceral as a gut punch .

text: the gender-skewed adventures begin when butch , a handsome , but naive baby butch , is compelled by the queen to seek out and bring back her purlined `` koilos `` the source of all pleasures and the key to order and harmony on her island .

text: chalk it up to my adoration for both de niro and murphy , but i had a pretty good time with this movie - despite its myriad flaws .

text: chabrol has taken promising material for a black comedy and turned it instead into a somber chamber drama .

text: the unrelenting wind of the season disrupts a landscape of inaction , theft and drug use .

text: in this prequel to the exorcist , father merrin is a younger man working on a dig in africa .

text: using every means necessary-manipulation , extortion , blackmail-they brought the kingpins of the record industry to their knees , creating a network that controlled top 40 airplay across the country .

text: a ruined , jeckyll and hyde man he may be , but a ruined man may prove to be a heroic one when a villain emerges , and close . . .

text: a timeless , coming of age story set against the epic , sweeping landscape of north africa .
translation: Sebuah cerita yang abadi, tentang perjalanan dewasa yang terjadi di landskap epik yang luas di Afrika Utara.
back_translation: An eternal story about the adult journey that takes place in the vast epic landscape of North Africa.

text: melds derivative elements into something that is often quite rich and exciting , and always a beauty to behold .
translation: mencampurkan elemen-elemen turunan ke dalam sesuatu yang sering kali sangat kaya dan menarik, dan selalu indah untuk dilihat.
back_translation: Mixing derivative elements into something that is often very rich and interesting, and always beautiful to look at.

text: may not be a breakthrough in filmmaking , but it is unwavering and arresting .
translation: Mungkin bukan terobosan dalam pembuatan filem, tetapi ianya tidak terputus semangat dan memukau.

text: when valento lets his temper get the better of him , he needs a fall guy , and everyone 's favorite dupe rises to the top .
translation: Apabila Valento membiarkan amarahnya mengatasi dirinya, dia memerlukan orang yang diperalat, dan orang yang menjadi kambing hitam pilihan semua orang muncul ke permukaan.
back_translation: When Valento allows his anger to overpower him, he needs a scapegoat, and the chosen scapegoat of everyone emerges to the surface.

text: the quest takes him to the mountains of north carolina , the beaches of the dominican republic , the islands off of ireland , the gardens of japan and the holy land of india .
translation: Misi membawanya ke gunung-ganang Carolina Utara, pantai-pantai Republik Dominika, pulau-pulau di sekitar Ireland, taman-taman Jepun, dan tanah suci India.
back_translation: The mission takes him to the mountains of North Carolina, beaches of the Dominican Republic, islands around Ireland, Japanese gardens, and the holy lands of India.

text: the two play a high-stakes game of pool which ends in a huge debt owed to joe and soon johnny finds that his brother is in jail for trying to steal the money he owes .
translation: Mereka berdua bermain permainan pool yang melibatkan pertaruhan tinggi yang berakhir dengan hutang besar yang perlu dilunaskan kepada Joe dan tidak lama kemudian Johnny dapati bahawa abangnya dipenjarakan kerana cuba mencuri wang yang perlu dilunaskan.
back_translation: They both played a high-stakes pool game that ended with a large debt that needed to be paid to Joe and shortly after, Johnny found out that his brother was imprisoned for attempting to steal the money that needed to be repaid.

text: there 's so much to look at in metropolis you hate to tear your eyes away from the images long enough to read the subtitles .
translation: Ada begitu banyak perkara untuk dilihat di metropolis sehingga anda benci untuk memalingkan mata dari imej untuk membaca sarikata.
back_translation: There are so many things to see in the metropolis that you hate to avert your eyes from the images to read subtitles.

text: jamie has a `` to-do `` list for her life and also a very big secret she must keep from landon .
translation: Jamie mempunyai senarai "to-do" untuk hidupnya dan juga satu rahsia besar yang dia harus simpan dari Landon.
back_translation: Jamie has a "to-do" list for her life and also a big secret that she must keep from Landon.

text: a mass of weary knights , squires , soldiers of fortune and priests are making their way home across a europe that has changed forever .
translation: Sejumlah pasukan kesatria yang letih, squire, tentera bayaran, dan paderi sedang pulang melalui Eropah yang telah berubah selamanya.

text: romanek keeps adding flourishes -- artsy fantasy sequences -- that simply feel wrong . they cheapen the overall effect .
translation: romanek terus menambah sentuhan hiasan - urutan fantasi seni - yang terasa tidak kena. Mereka memberi kesan keseluruhan menjadi murah.
back_translation: Romanek continues to add decorative touches - a sequence of fantasy art - that feels off. They give an overall impression of being cheap.

text: he supports her completely , particularly as she begins to paint again .
translation: Dia memberikannya sokongan sepenuhnya, terutamanya apabila dia mula melukis semula.

text: the only thing in pauline and paulette that you have n't seen before is a scene featuring a football field-sized oriental rug crafted out of millions of vibrant flowers .
translation: Satu-satunya perkara dalam Pauline dan Paulette yang belum pernah anda lihat sebelum ini adalah adegan yang menampilkan sebuah permadani oriental berukuran padang bola sepak yang dihasilkan daripada jutaan bunga yang berwarna-warni.
back_translation: The only thing in Pauline and Paulette that you have never seen before is a scene featuring an oriental carpet the size of a football field made up of millions of colorful flowers.

text: every hour brings rausch one step closer to controlling the satellite and taking the world hostage .
translation: Setiap jam membawa Rausch satu langkah lebih dekat untuk mengawal satelit dan menjadikan dunia sebagai tebusan.

text: just about the best straight-up , old-school horror film of the last 15 years .
translation: Filem seram langsung yang terbaik, ala sekolah lama, dalam 15 tahun terakhir.

text: already living in a society that mistrusts them , the mutants are faced with even more discrimination after an unforeseen enemy - who may be a mutant with extraordinary powers - launches a devastating attack .
translation: Sudah tinggal dalam masyarakat yang tidak mempercayai mereka, mutan menghadapi diskriminasi yang lebih banyak setelah seorang musuh yang tidak terduga - yang mungkin seorang mutan dengan kuasa luar biasa - melancarkan serangan yang menghancurkan.
back_translation: Living in a society that does not trust them, mutants face even more discrimination after an unexpected enemy - possibly a mutant with extraordinary powers - launches an attack that destroys.

text: the story itself it mostly told through on-camera interviews with several survivors , whose riveting memories are rendered with such clarity that it 's as if it all happened only yesterday .
translation: Ceritanya kebanyakannya diceritakan melalui temubual di kamera dengan beberapa orang yang selamat, yang kenangan mereka yang menggugah itu disampaikan dengan begitu jelas sehingga terasa seolah-olah semuanya berlaku hanya semalam.
back_translation: The story is mostly told through on-camera interviews with a few survivors, their haunting memories conveyed so vividly that it feels as if it all happened just last night.

text: the unexpected result demonstrates ignored wills do not remain invisible forever .
translation: Keputusan yang tidak terduga menunjukkan keinginan yang diabaikan tidak kekal tersembunyi selamanya.

text: in a coastal north carolinian small town in the mid 1990 's , a boy from the popular but troubled undirected group of students gets busted , and for punishment , you guessed it , has to do community service activities which include the high school 's spring play .

text: dennis clegg is in his thirties and lives in a halfway house for the mentally ill in london .
translation: Dennis Clegg berusia tiga puluh tahun dan tinggal di rumah separuh jalan untuk orang yang mengalami gangguan mental di London.
back_translation: Dennis Clegg is thirty years old and lives in a halfway house for people with mental disorders in London.

text: but when the substitute institutes some strange redefinitions of naughty and nice , putting christmas at risk , it 's up to scott to return with a new bag of magic to try to save christmas .
translation: Tetapi apabila pengganti tersebut menggantikan beberapa pengertian yang aneh mengenai perbuatan suka dan jahat, sehingga mengancam Krismas, terserah kepada Scott untuk kembali dengan beg yang baru dengan sihir yang berusaha untuk menyelamatkan Krismas.
back_translation: But when the replacement replaces some strange notions about good and evil deeds, thereby threatening Christmas, it is up to Scott to return with a new bag with magic trying to save Christmas.

text: the catholic church and the irish courts decide the doyle children put into church-run orphanages .
translation: Gereja Katolik dan mahkamah Ireland memutuskan agar kanak-kanak Doyle dimasukkan ke dalam rumah anak yatim yang dijalankan oleh gereja.
back_translation: The Catholic Church and the Irish courts have decided that the Doyle children should be placed in an orphanage run by the church.

text: the tale of ancanar is an original fantasy story inspired by the author j . r . r . tolkien .
translation: Kisah ancanar adalah sebuah cerita fantasi asli yang diilhami oleh pengarang j. r. r. tolkien.
back_translation: The ancanar story is an original fantasy tale inspired by the author J.R.R. Tolkien.

text: and the conclusion of the story is how the four attempt to pull off their master plan , this well-thought-out bank robbery .
translation: Dan kesimpulan cerita adalah bagaimana keempat-empatnya mencuba untuk melaksanakan rancangan utama mereka, rompakan bank yang telah mereka fikirkan dengan baik.
back_translation: And the conclusion of the story is how all four of them try to carry out their main plan, a bank heist that they have thoroughly thought through.

text: the problem with the bread , my sweet is that it 's far too sentimental .
translation: Masalah dengan roti, sayang saya adalah terlalu sentimental.
back_translation: The problem with bread, my dear, is that I am too sentimental.

text: a static and sugary little half-hour , after-school special about interfaith understanding , stretched out to 90 minutes .
translation: Filem pendek dan manis selama setengah jam, khas selepas sekolah tentang pemahaman antara agama, dipanjangkan menjadi 90 minit.
back_translation: The short and sweet half-hour school special on understanding different religions was extended to 90 minutes.

text: ben rubin , a young israeli internist vying for the position of surgeon , learns that his internship has been terminated and he has been chosen to accompany abraham lazar , the hospital administrator and his wife , dori on a trip to india .
translation: Ben Rubin, seorang internis muda dari Israel yang bersaing untuk menduduki jawatan sebagai pakar bedah, mengetahui bahawa latihannya telah dihentikan dan beliau dipilih untuk menemani Abraham Lazar, pentadbir hospital, dan isterinya, Dori, dalam satu perjalanan ke India.
back_translation: Ben Rubin, a young internist from Israel vying for a position as a surgeon, learns that his training has been put on hold and he is chosen to accompany Abraham Lazar, the hospital administrator, and his wife, Dori, on a trip to India.

text: epic battles , spectacular effects and multiple story lines make the two towers a most excellent middle chapter in the lord of the rings film trilogy .
translation: Pertempuran epik, kesan yang spektakular, dan pelbagai jalan cerita menjadikan "The Two Towers" sebagai bab tengah yang paling cemerlang dalam trilogi filem "The Lord of the Rings".
back_translation: Epic battles, spectacular effects, and multiple storylines make "The Two Towers" the most outstanding middle chapter in "The Lord of the Rings" film trilogy.

text: throughout their journey they survive gun battles , vicious hand to hand fighting , vision blurring car chases and a heart stopping train wreck hundreds of feet above a rocky gorge .
translation: Sepanjang perjalanan mereka, mereka bertahan melalui tembakan senjata, pertempuran tangan kosong yang ganas, perlumbaan kereta berputar yang menyebabkan penglihatan kabur, dan kejatuhan kereta yang menghentikan detak jantung beratus kaki di atas gaung berbatu.
back_translation: Throughout their journey, they endured gunfire, fierce hand-to-hand battles, dizzying car races, and cliff-edge carriage falls that stopped hearts hundreds of feet above rocky cliffs.

text: it has a caffeinated , sloppy brilliance , sparkling with ideas you wish had been developed with more care , but animated by an energy that puts the dutiful efforts of more disciplined grade-grubbers to shame .
translation: Ia mempunyai kecerahan yang berkafein, agak berantakan, bersinar dengan idea-idea yang anda harapkan telah dibangunkan dengan lebih teliti, tetapi dianimasikan oleh tenaga yang menjadikan usaha yang tekun dari mereka yang lebih disiplin malu.
back_translation: It has a caffeine-fueled brightness, slightly messy, shining with ideas that you hope have been developed more carefully, but animated by an energy that puts the diligent efforts of the more disciplined to shame.

text: evokes a little of the fear that parents have for the possible futures of their children -- and the sometimes bad choices mothers and fathers make in the interests of doing them good .
translation: memunculkan sedikit rasa takut yang dimiliki oleh ibu bapa terhadap masa depan yang mungkin bagi anak-anak mereka - dan terkadang membuat pilihan yang buruk demi kebaikan mereka.
back_translation: bring out a bit of fear that parents have towards the possible future for their children - and sometimes make poor choices for their well-being.

text: portentous and pretentious , the weight of water is appropriately titled , given the heavy-handedness of it drama .
translation: Berbau angkuh dan mempesonakan, berat air adalah judul yang sesuai, mengingat keberatan dari dramanya.
back_translation: Titled arrogantly and captivating, "Heavy Water" is a fitting title, considering the weight of its drama.

text: two badly interlocked stories drowned by all too clever complexity .
translation: Dua cerita yang terjalin dengan buruk ditenggelamkan oleh kompleksiti yang terlalu cerdik.
back_translation: Two stories intertwined poorly were submerged by complexities that were too clever.

text: what makes how i killed my father compelling , besides its terrific performances , is fontaine 's willingness to wander into the dark areas of parent-child relationships without flinching .
translation: Apa yang membuat bagaimana saya membunuh ayah saya menarik, selain dari lakonan yang hebat, adalah keberanian Fontaine untuk mengembara ke dalam bidang gelap hubungan ibu-bapa dan anak tanpa berbelah.
back_translation: What makes how I kill my father interesting, besides the great acting, is Fontaine's courage to venture into the dark field of parent-child relationships without hesitation.

text: trapped in a lovers triangle and ruthless game of lust , greed , and betrayal we follow one woman 's hypnotic journey to discover her true self . . .
translation: Terperangkap dalam segitiga cinta dan permainan tanpa belas kasihan nafsu, keserakahan, dan pengkhianatan, kita mengikuti perjalanan hipnotis seorang wanita untuk menemukan diri sejatinya. . .
back_translation: Trapped in a love triangle and a ruthless game of lust, greed, and betrayal, we follow the hypnotic journey of a woman to find her true self...

text: a movie more to be prescribed than recommended -- as visually bland as a dentist 's waiting room , complete with soothing muzak and a cushion of predictable narrative rhythms .
translation: Filem ini lebih perlu diambil daripada disyorkan - seumpama ruang menunggu doktor gigi yang hambar secara visual, lengkap dengan muzik menenangkan dan alur cerita yang mudah diteka.
back_translation: This film is more compulsory to be taken than recommended - like a visually bland dental waiting room complete with soothing music and a predictable storyline.

text: after returning home from a two week trial in chicago , rachel bishop ( rachel nord ) finds her sister emily bishop ( nancy walters ) missing .
translation: Selepas pulang ke rumah dari ujian dua minggu di Chicago, Rachel Bishop (Rachel Nord) mendapati adiknya Emily Bishop (Nancy Walters) hilang.
back_translation: After returning home from a two-week exam in Chicago, Rachel Bishop (Rachel Nord) found her sister Emily Bishop (Nancy Walters) missing.

text: this event leads to deep thoughts about marriage , friendship , relationships and last not least life itself .
translation: Peristiwa ini membawa kepada pemikiran yang mendalam tentang perkahwinan, persahabatan, hubungan dan yang terakhir tidak kurang pentingnya kehidupan itu sendiri.
back_translation: This event leads to deep thoughts about marriage, friendship, relationships, and last but not least, the importance of life itself.

text: ( hamlet ) privilege seeks to produce a subliminal confrontation with its ever-shifting subject matter , much as the body is reputed to create vortexes of healing and repose in response to traumas .
translation: keistimewaan dalam Hamlet mencari untuk mencipta konfrontasi subliminal dengan subjek yang sentiasa berubah, sama seperti badan dikatakan mencipta pusaran penyembuhan dan ketenangan sebagai respons terhadap trauma.
back_translation: The uniqueness in Hamlet lies in its quest to create subliminal confrontations with the ever-changing subject, just as the body is said to create a whirlpool of healing and peace in response to trauma.

text: and suddenly , she spots her beloved , wandering over sand dunes and brings the exhausted patricia to his oasis called 'shangri-la ' . . .
translation: dan tiba-tiba, dia melihat kekasihnya, mengembara di atas bukit pasir dan membawa patricia yang keletihan ke oasinya yang bernama 'shangri-la'...
back_translation: and suddenly, he saw his lover, wandering on the sand dune and carrying the exhausted Patricia to his oasis named 'Shangri-La'...

text: no such thing may be far from perfect , but those small , odd hartley touches help you warm to it .
translation: Mungkin tidak sempurna, tetapi sentuhan halus dan unik Hartley membantu anda menyukainya.
back_translation: It may not be perfect, but Hartley's delicate and unique touch helps you to appreciate it.

text: to worsen things , during the holidays aksel gets teamed up with the two girls , fatima and annika , to perform a song to the local youth club 's song contest , melodi grand prix .
translation: Untuk memburuk-burukkan keadaan, semasa cuti, Aksel dikumpulkan dengan dua gadis, Fatima dan Annika, untuk menyanyikan lagu untuk pertandingan lagu kelab belia tempatan, Melodi Grand Prix.
back_translation: To make matters worse, during the holiday, Aksel was grouped with two girls, Fatima and Annika, to sing a song for the local youth club's song competition, Melodi Grand Prix.

text: with dickens ' words and writer-director douglas mcgrath 's even-toned direction , a ripping good yarn is told .
translation: Dengan kata-kata Dickens dan arahan yang seimbang dari penulis-pengarah Douglas McGrath, sebuah cerita yang menarik diceritakan.
back_translation: With Dickens' words and balanced direction from writer-director Douglas McGrath, an intriguing story is told.

text: from the trembling fury of gheorgiu 's tosca to the penetrating stare of raimondi 's scarpia , this tosca blazes with passion . at its best , it 's sublime .
translation: Dari kemarahan gemetar gheorgiu dalam Tosca ke pandangan tajam Raimondi sebagai Scarpia, Tosca ini menyala dengan semangat. Pada masa terbaiknya, ia adalah agung.
back_translation: From Gheorgiu's trembling anger in Tosca to Raimondi's sharp gaze as Scarpia, this Tosca blazes with passion. At its best, she is magnificent.

text: some of the featured art events include `` burial in space `` by woodpussy ( a group of musicians and pyro-technicians who blast their deceased founder into space in a rocket of their own creation ) ; `` nebulous entity `` and `` futura deluxe `` ( two large , roving installation pieces engineered using mathematics derived from fields of neural networks , ecological systems and fractals ) ; and a performance artist dea million who stages her `` wedding `` to america .
translation: Beberapa acara seni yang dipamerkan termasuk "penguburan di angkasa" oleh woodpussy (sekelompok musisi dan pyrotechnician yang meluncurkan pendirinya yang telah meninggal ke angkasa dalam roket ciptaan mereka sendiri); "entiti kabur" dan "futura deluxe" (dua instalasi berjalan besar yang dirancang dengan menggunakan matematika yang berasal dari bidang jaringan saraf, sistem ekologi, dan fraktal); dan seorang seniman performa Dea Million yang mengadakan "pernikahannya" dengan Amerika.
back_translation: Some of the art events showcased include "burial in space" by woodpussy (a group of musicians and pyrotechnicians who launch their deceased founder into space in their own rocket); "fugitive entities" and "futura deluxe" (two large walking installations designed using mathematics originating from the fields of neural networks, ecological systems, and fractals); and a performance artist, Dea Million, who held her "wedding" with America.

text: . . . one big laugh , three or four mild giggles , and a whole lot of not much else .
translation: ... satu gelak besar, tiga atau empat ketawa kecil, dan banyak perkara yang lain tidak begitu banyak.
back_translation: ... one big laugh, three or four small chuckles, and many other things not as much.

text: bold , imaginative , rational and persuasive an account of the lethally dangerous world we live in , the sum of all fears is an international spy drama with visceral impact .
translation: Sebuah akaun yang berani, imaginatif, rasional, dan meyakinkan tentang dunia yang penuh bahaya mematikan di mana kita hidup, "The Sum of All Fears" adalah sebuah drama pengintipan antarabangsa yang memberi impak yang mendalam.
back_translation: "A daring, imaginative, rational, and convincing account of the deadly dangerous world we live in, "The Sum of All Fears" is an impactful international espionage drama."

text: continually challenges perceptions of guilt and innocence , of good guys and bad , and asks us whether a noble end can justify evil means .
translation: Sentiasa mencabar persepsi tentang rasa bersalah dan kebenaran, tentang orang baik dan jahat, dan bertanya kepada kita sama ada tujuan mulia boleh membenarkan cara yang jahat.
back_translation: Always challenging the perception of guilt and truth, of good and evil, and asking us whether noble intentions can justify evil ways.

text: but does she realize , that this version of francis , douglas and henry is in reality her grown up son alan ( timothy bottoms ) . . . ?
translation: Tetapi adakah dia sedar bahawa versi ini dari Francis, Douglas dan Henry sebenarnya adalah anak lelaki dewasa beliau, Alan (Timothy Bottoms)...?
back_translation: But does she realize that this version of Francis, Douglas, and Henry is actually her young adult son, Alan (Timothy Bottoms)...?

text: the other members of the po-boys - peter , joseph and guy , are also facing a musician 's mid-life crisis in a business that the age 30 is seen as over the hill .
translation: Ahli-ahli lain dalam kumpulan Po Boys - Peter, Joseph, dan Guy, juga menghadapi krisis pertengahan hayat seorang pemuzik dalam industri di mana usia 30 tahun dianggap sebagai 'tak berguna'.
back_translation: Other members in the Po Boys band - Peter, Joseph, and Guy, are also facing a mid-life crisis as musicians in an industry where being 30 years old is considered 'useless'.

text: he lures her back to las vegas to continue her career .
translation: Dia memikatnya kembali ke Las Vegas untuk meneruskan kerjayanya.
back_translation: He lured her back to Las Vegas to continue her career.

text: the film has an infectious enthusiasm and we 're touched by the film 's conviction that all life centered on that place , that time and that sport .
translation: Filem ini memiliki semangat yang menular dan kami tersentuh dengan keyakinan filem itu bahawa seluruh kehidupan tertumpu pada tempat itu, waktu itu, dan sukan itu.
back_translation: This film has an infectious spirit and we are touched by the film's belief that all life revolves around that place, that time, and that sport.

text: about as satisfying and predictable as the fare at your local drive through .
translation: Sama memuaskan dan boleh diramalkan seperti makanan di tempat drive-through tempatan anda.
back_translation: Equally satisfying and predictable like the food at your local drive-through.

text: a new reality-style game show , `` treasure hunt `` has invited a cast of contestants , including a los angeles cop who 's joined to try and make up for an earlier pr blunder , to a tropical island to hunt for a buried treasure worth ten million dollars .
translation: Acara permainan gaya realiti baru, "harta karun", telah menjemput sekelompok peserta termasuk seorang polis Los Angeles yang menyertai untuk mencuba memperbetulkan kesilapan PR terdahulunya, ke sebuah pulau tropika untuk mencari harta karun yang terkubur bernilai sepuluh juta dolar.
back_translation: A new reality game show, "Treasure Hunt", has invited a group of participants including a Los Angeles police officer who joined to try to rectify his past PR mistakes, to a tropical island to search for a buried treasure worth ten million dollars.

text: it takes viewers on an intimate road trip across north america - from a polyamory conference in the catskills , a swingers ' convention in las vegas , to long-term multipartner families in california .
translation: Filem ini membawa penonton dalam perjalanan jalan raya yang intim di seluruh Amerika Utara - dari persidangan poliamori di Catskills, konvensyen swingers di Las Vegas, sehingga keluarga multipartner jangka panjang di California.
back_translation: This film takes viewers on an intimate road trip across North America - from a polyamory gathering in the Catskills, a swingers convention in Las Vegas, to a long-term multipartner family in California.

text: eight year old maria has her bicycle stolen , and like a lightning from the clear sky ploddy the policicar comes to the rescue !
translation: Maria berusia lapan tahun telah hadapi basikalnya dicuri, dan seperti kilat dari langit yang cerah, Ploddy kereta polis datang menyelamatkan!
back_translation: Maria, who is eight years old, had her bike stolen, and like a bolt from the blue sky, Ploddy the police car came to the rescue!

text: [ haynes ' ] homage to such films as `` all that heaven allows `` and `` imitation of life `` transcends them . simply put , `` far from heaven `` is a masterpiece .
translation: Hormat kepada filem-filem seperti "All That Heaven Allows" dan "Imitation of Life" oleh Haynes melampaui filem-file tersebut. Secara ringkas, "Far from Heaven" adalah sebuah arahan yang hebat.
back_translation: The respect for films like "All That Heaven Allows" and "Imitation of Life" by Haynes surpasses those films. In short, "Far From Heaven" is a great direction.

text: if you go to attic town you 'll find a place where the streets have no names and you can never turn back .
translation: Jika anda pergi ke bandar attic, anda akan menemui sebuah tempat di mana jalanan tidak mempunyai nama dan anda tidak akan pernah boleh berpatah balik.
back_translation: If you go to the attic city, you will find a place where the streets have no names and you will never be able to backtrack.

text: all very stylish and beautifully photographed , but far more trouble than it 's worth , with fantasy mixing with reality and actors playing more than one role just to add to the confusion .
translation: Semuanya sangat bergaya dan difoto dengan cantik, tetapi jauh lebih merepotkan daripada nilainya, dengan fantasi bercampur dengan realiti dan pelakon memainkan lebih dari satu watak hanya untuk menambah kekaburan.
back_translation: Everything is very stylish and beautifully photographed, but much more troublesome than its worth, with fantasy mixed with reality and actors playing more than one role just to add to the confusion.

text: what 's most memorable about circuit is that it 's shot on digital video , whose tiny camera enables shafer to navigate spaces both large . . . and small . . . with considerable aplomb .
translation: Yang paling menarik mengenai wayar litar adalah ia dirakam menggunakan video digital, di mana kamera kecil membolehkan Shafer menjelajah ruang besar... dan kecil... dengan kecekapan yang besar.
back_translation: The most interesting thing about circuit wiring is that it is recorded using digital video, where a small camera allows Shafer to navigate large and small spaces with great efficiency.

text: becoming fast friends , they soon both moved with their families near coney island , where they became active community leaders .
translation: Menjadi kawan rapat, kedua-dua mereka tidak lama kemudian berpindah dengan keluarga mereka berhampiran pulau Coney, di mana mereka menjadi pemimpin komuniti yang aktif.
back_translation: Becoming close friends, both of them shortly after moved with their families near Coney Island, where they became active community leaders.

text: watching haneke 's film is , aptly enough , a challenge and a punishment . but watching huppert , a great actress tearing into a landmark role , is riveting .
translation: Menonton filem haneke adalah, cukup tepat, satu cabaran dan hukuman. Tetapi menonton huppert, seorang pelakon hebat yang memegang watak penting, adalah memukau.
back_translation: Watching a Haneke film is, quite accurately, a challenge and punishment. But watching Huppert, a great actress who embodies important characters, is captivating.

text: ramsay succeeds primarily with her typical blend of unsettling atmospherics , delivering a series of abrasive , stylized sequences that burn themselves upon the viewer 's memory .
translation: Ramsay berjaya terutamanya dengan kecampuran khas atmosfera yang mengganggu, menyampaikan siri jujukan yang kasar dan berstil yang membakar diri dalam ingatan penonton.
back_translation: Ramsay succeeds primarily with a unique blend of disturbing atmosphere, delivering a series of rough and fiery sequences that burn into the audience's memory.

text: upon getting together on their spring break , they realize that they are bored in their small suburban connecticut hometown .
translation: Setelah berkumpul semasa cuti spring, mereka sedar bahawa mereka bosan di bandar kecil Connecticut.
back_translation: After gathering during spring break, they realized that they were bored in the small town of Connecticut.

text: kidd deals with lust and egoism the way a surgeon is interested in a tumor . he exposes ugly attitudes but maintains compassion for his mean-spirited subject .
translation: kidd berurusan dengan nafsu dan egoisme sebagaimana seorang pakar bedah berminat dengan tumor. beliau mendedahkan sikap yang buruk tetapi tetap menyimpan belas kasihan terhadap subjek berniat jahat.
back_translation: kidd deals with desire and egoism just as a surgeon is interested in a tumor. He exposes the bad behavior but still maintains compassion towards subjects with malicious intentions.

text: what if your most controversial act turned out to be the most traditional thing in the world ?
translation: Bagaimana jika tindakan paling kontroversial anda ternyata menjadi perkara paling tradisional di dunia ini?
back_translation: What if your most controversial action turns out to be the most traditional thing in the world?

text: the country bears wastes an exceptionally good idea . but the movie that does n't really deliver for country music fans or for family audiences
translation: Idea mengenai beruang negara membawa sampah adalah satu idea yang sangat baik. Tetapi filem tersebut sebenarnya tidak memuaskan peminat muzik negara atau penonton keluarga.
back_translation: The idea of a national bear collecting trash is a very good idea. But the film actually did not satisfy the country's music fans or family audience.

text: this is a movie filled with unlikable , spiteful idiots ; whether or not their friendship is salvaged makes no difference in the least .
translation: Ini adalah filem yang penuh dengan orang bodoh yang tidak disenangi dan penuh dendam; sama ada persahabatan mereka dipulihkan tidak memberi sebarang perbezaan sama sekali.
back_translation: This is a movie filled with disliked and vengeful foolish people; whether their friendship is restored makes no difference at all.

text: it 's a good thing that woolly mammoths are extinct , because this movie will have every kid in the schoolyard wishing for their very own .
translation: Adalah baik bahawa mamut bulu telah pupus, kerana filem ini akan membuat setiap kanak-kanak di halaman sekolah menginginkan mamut mereka sendiri.
back_translation: It is good that the woolly mammoth has gone extinct, as this movie will make every child in the schoolyard want their own mammoth.

text: someone killed legendary porn king fat guy , and detectives moose & # 38 ; squirrel must go deep undercover ( literally ) to find the murderer with the help of their `` special `` homicide unit .
translation: Seseorang telah membunuh raja filem lucah legenda yang gemuk, dan detektif moose & squirrel harus menyamar secara mendalam (secara harfiah) untuk mencari pembunuh dengan bantuan unit "istimewa" mereka dalam kes pembunuhan ini.
back_translation: Someone has killed the legendary fat porn king, and detectives moose & squirrel must go deep undercover to find the killer with the help of their "special" unit in this murder case.

text: overall , it 's a very entertaining , thought-provoking film with a simple message : god is love .
translation: Secara keseluruhan, filem ini sangat menghiburkan dan merangsang pemikiran dengan mesej yang mudah: Tuhan itu kasih sayang.
back_translation: Overall, this film is very entertaining and stimulates thinking with a simple message: God is love.

text: `` the ballad of bering strait `` is a two and a half year epic that follows bering strait 's amazing cultural fusion-coming of age journey in america .
translation: "Balada Selat Bering" adalah epik selama dua setengah tahun yang mengikuti perjalanan fusion budaya yang mengagumkan dari Selat Bering menuju dewasa di Amerika.
back_translation: "The Ballad of the Bering Strait" is an epic spanning two and a half years that follows the amazing cultural fusion journey from the Bering Strait to adulthood in America.

text: it is a look into one of the major social issues of the 21st century , inmigration .
translation: Ini adalah pandangan terhadap salah satu isu sosial utama abad ke-21, iaitu imigresen.
back_translation: This is a view on one of the major social issues of the 21st century, which is immigration.

text: anyone who can count to five ( the film 's target market ? ) can see where this dumbed-down concoction is going .
translation: Mana-mana yang boleh mengira hingga lima (pasaran sasaran filem ini?) boleh melihat ke arah mana pencampuran ini dikurangkan taraf kecerdasannya.
back_translation: Anyone who can count up to five (the target audience for this film?) can see how this mixing diminishes its level of intelligence.

text: about as enjoyable , i would imagine , as searching for a quarter in a giant pile of elephant feces . . . positively dreadful .
translation: Saya bayangkan bahawa pengalaman itu sama menyenangkan seperti mencari syiling dalam tumpukan besar najis gajah... sangat mengerikan.
back_translation: I imagine that the experience is as enjoyable as searching for a coin in a large pile of elephant dung... very horrifying.

text: but there is indie rock , a restless entrepreneurial spirit , and carly , morgan and chuck , three optimistic post college grads , ready to make their splash in the world .
translation: Tetapi ada indie rock, semangat keusahawanan yang gelisah, dan carly, morgan, dan chuck, tiga graduan pasca kolej yang optimis, bersedia untuk membuat kejayaan mereka dalam dunia ini.
back_translation: But there is indie rock, restless entrepreneurial spirit, and Carly, Morgan, and Chuck, three college postgraduates who are optimistic, ready to make their success in this world.

text: before they can win some money , a local mob boss , frank finnigan , sees the horse and steals it as payment for the gambling debt of tony , a local jockey and single parent .
translation: Sebelum mereka dapat memenangi sedikit wang, seorang bos geng tempatan, Frank Finnigan, melihat kuda tersebut dan mencurinya sebagai bayaran untuk hutang judi Tony, seorang joki tempatan dan ibu tunggal.
back_translation: Before they can win a little money, a local gang boss, Frank Finnigan, sees the horse and steals it as payment for Tony’s gambling debt, a local jockey and single mother.

text: aside from minor tinkering , this is the same movie you probably loved in 1994 , except that it looks even better .
translation: Selain daripada sedikit perubahan, ini adalah filem yang sama yang mungkin anda suka pada tahun 1994, cuma kelihatannya lebih baik.
back_translation: Apart from some minor changes, this is the same movie that you might have liked in 1994, only it looks better.

text: a year later , strange things start to happen , as each person that was connected to the hit and run incident is being killed . . . one
