translation: Setahun kemudian, perkara aneh mula berlaku, kerana setiap orang yang terlibat dalam insiden langgar dan lari dibunuh... satu.
back_translation: A year later, strange things began to happen, as everyone involved in the hit-and-run incident was killed... one by one.

text: our america is the true story of two bright and ambitious chicago teenagers who , living in one of the worst inner-city neighborhoods in the country , get a chance to become reporters for npr .
translation: "Our America" adalah kisah sebenar dua remaja cerdas dan berambisi dari Chicago yang, tinggal di salah satu kawasan bandar dalam negara yang paling teruk, mendapat peluang untuk menjadi wartawan bagi NPR.
back_translation: "Our America" is the true story of two intelligent and ambitious teenagers from Chicago who, living in one of the worst inner-city neighborhoods in the country, get the chance to become journalists for NPR.

text: when it comes to entertainment , children deserve better than pokemon 4ever .
translation: apabila berkaitan dengan hiburan, kanak-kanak layak mendapat lebih baik daripada Pokemon 4ever.
back_translation: When it comes to entertainment, children deserve better than Pokemon 4ever.

text: geordie ( thom fitzgerald ) , a visiting canadian pornographer , bogdan ( mihai calota ) , a reluctant city dog-catcher , and nathalie ( alberta watson ) , a lonely diplomat 's wife - each risks losing everything as they become embroiled in the struggles of bucharest 's abandoned children , gypsies , dogs and beggars .
translation: Geordie (Thom Fitzgerald), seorang pereka filem lucah Kanada yang melawat, Bogdan (Mihai Calota), seorang pemungut anjing bandar yang enggan, dan Nathalie (Alberta Watson), seorang isteri diplomat yang kesunyian - setiap orang mengambil risiko kehilangan segalanya ketika mereka terlibat dalam pergolakan kanak-kanak terbiar, orang Rom, anjing, dan pengemis di Bucharest.
back_translation: Geordie (Thom Fitzgerald), a Canadian porn filmmaker on assignment, Bogdan (Mihai Calota), a reluctant city dogcatcher, and Nathalie (Alberta Watson), a lonesome diplomat's wife - each risks losing everything as they become entangled in the struggles of abandoned children, Romany people, dogs, and beggars in Bucharest.

text: there are now two signs that m . night shyamalan 's debut feature sucked up all he has to give to the mystic genres of cinema : unbreakable and signs .
translation: Sekarang terdapat dua tanda bahawa filem sulung M. Night Shyamalan telah menyerap segala yang beliau miliki untuk genre mistik filem: Unbreakable dan Signs.
back_translation: Now there are two signs that M. Night Shyamalan's debut film has absorbed everything he has for the mystical film genre: Unbreakable and Signs.

text: jonathan parker 's bartleby should have been the be-all-end-all of the modern-office anomie films .
translation: Filem Bartleby karya Jonathan Parker sepatutnya menjadi titik tolak filem-filem anomie tempat kerja moden yang paling utama.
back_translation: Jonathan Parker's film Bartleby should serve as a milestone for modern workplace anomie films.

text: her struggle for freedom and a sense of identity culminates in a conflict where the one love may not be the one you can trust and the habits with which one sleepwalks through life are not easily broken .
translation: Perjuangannya untuk kebebasan dan rasa identiti mencapai kemuncak dalam konflik di mana cinta yang seorang percaya mungkin bukan orang yang boleh dipercayai dan tabiat yang digunakan seseorang untuk melalui kehidupan tidak dapat dipatahkan dengan mudah.
back_translation: The struggle for freedom and sense of identity reaches its peak in a conflict where the love that one believes in may not be from someone trustworthy, and the habits that someone uses to go through life cannot be easily broken.

text: if the plot seems a bit on the skinny side , that 's because panic room is interested in nothing more than sucking you inM-^Eand making you sweat .
translation: Jika plot kelihatan sedikit tipis, itu kerana bilik panik hanya berminat untuk menarik anda masuk dan membuat anda berkeringat.
back_translation: If the plot seems a bit thin, it's because the panic room is only interested in pulling you in and making you sweat.

text: feels aimless for much of its running time , until late in the film when a tidal wave of plot arrives , leaving questions in its wake .
translation: Terasa hampa sepanjang masa tayangan filem ini, sehingga ke hujung filem di mana gelombang plot tiba, meninggalkan pelbagai soalan.
back_translation: Feeling empty throughout the movie viewing until the end of the film where the plot twist arrives, leaving behind various questions.

text: this sade is hardly a perverse , dangerous libertine and agitator -- which would have made for better drama . he 's just a sad aristocrat in tattered finery , and the film seems as deflated as he does .
translation: Sade ini hampir tidak menjadi seorang yang serong, berbahaya, bebas dan penghasut - yang seharusnya akan menghasilkan drama yang lebih baik. Dia hanya seorang bangsawan yang sedih dalam pakaian kumuh, dan filem tersebut kelihatan sama redahnya seperti dirinya.
back_translation: Sade was nearly turning into a crooked, dangerous, free, and provocative character - which should have resulted in better drama. He was just a sad nobleman in shabby clothes, and the film looked as careless as he did.

text: despite its good nature and some genuinely funny moments , super troopers suffers from a bad case of arrested development .
translation: Walaupun sifat baiknya dan beberapa detik lucu yang sebenarnya, Super Troopers mengalami masalah terbantut perkembangan.
back_translation: Despite its good nature and some genuinely funny moments, Super Troopers suffers from stunted development.

text: a dark and quirky comedy set in an eccentric north london jewish old age home , paradise grove revolves around a dysfunctional family comprising 79-year-old izzie goldberg , determined to die with dignity , his daughter dee perry , a mixture of traditional jewish mother and child of the sixties , and her teenage son keith , who 's half-black and half-jewish , and understandably undergoing an identity crisis .
translation: Sebuah komedi gelap dan aneh yang berlatar di sebuah rumah tua Yahudi yang eksentrik di utara London, Paradise Grove berkisah tentang sebuah keluarga disfungsional yang terdiri dari Izzie Goldberg yang berusia 79 tahun, yang bertekad untuk mati dengan martabat, putrinya Dee Perry, kombinasi ibu Yahudi tradisional dan anak era 1960-an, serta anak remajanya, Keith, yang separuh hitam dan separuh Yahudi, dan wajar mengalami krisis identitas.
back_translation: A dark and bizarre comedy set in an eccentric old Jewish house in North London, Paradise Grove tells the story of a dysfunctional family consisting of 79-year-old Izzie Goldberg, determined to die with dignity, her daughter Dee Perry, a mix of a traditional Jewish mother and a 1960s child, and her teenage son, Keith, who is half-black and half-Jewish, and naturally experiencing an identity crisis.

text: it 's a celebration of self-confidence and a slap in the face of a society that cherises impossibly unnatural physical perfection .
translation: Ini adalah perayaan keyakinan diri dan tamparan kepada masyarakat yang mengagungkan kesempurnaan fizikal yang mustahil dan tidak semulajadi.
back_translation: This is a celebration of self-confidence and a slap to society that worships physical perfection that is impossible and unnatural.

text: and what dark secret does the house harbour that leaves them feeling as though they 're being watched by more than just a million pairs of eyes ?
translation: Dan apakah rahsia gelap yang disembunyikan oleh rumah itu yang membuat mereka merasa seolah-olah mereka sedang diperhatikan oleh lebih daripada sekadar sejuta pasang mata?
back_translation: And what is the dark secret hidden by that house that makes them feel as if they are being watched by more than just a million pairs of eyes?

text: none of this sounds promising and , indeed , the first half of sorority boys is as appalling as any 'comedy ' to ever spill from a projector 's lens .
translation: Tidak ada yang kedengaran menjanjikan dan, memang, separuh pertama Sorority Boys ini seburuk mana-mana 'komedi' yang pernah tumpah dari lensa projektor.
back_translation: Nothing sounds promising and, indeed, the first half of Sorority Boys is as bad as any 'comedy' that ever spilled out of a projector lens.

text: a corrupt cop is more interested in the money on the criminals he catches than justice ; a young woman discovers she 's pregnant , and her boyfriend is unfeeling ; and a young man calls a prostitute it 's the first time for both , and neither can go through with it .
translation: Seorang anggota polis yang rasuah lebih berminat dengan wang daripada keadilan yang menangkap penjenayah; seorang wanita muda mendapati dirinya hamil, dan teman lelakinya tidak berperasaan; dan seorang lelaki muda memanggil seorang pelacur, namun ini adalah kali pertama bagi kedua-duanya, dan sama-sama tidak mampu melakukannya.
back_translation: A corrupt police officer is more interested in money than in catching criminals; a young woman finds herself pregnant and her boyfriend is indifferent; and a young man calls a prostitute, but this is the first time for both of them, and they both are unable to go through with it.

text: a newscaster for the channel 7 eyewitness news complains about how god has only made his life a total waste .
translation: Seorang penyiar berita untuk berita mata-mata saluran 7 mengeluh tentang bagaimana Tuhan hanya menjadikan hidupnya sia-sia.
back_translation: A news anchor for channel 7 spy news complained about how God had made his life futile.

text: twists of fate along the way test and strain their relationship even further .
translation: Belokan takdir di sepanjang jalan menguji dan menegangkan hubungan mereka lebih jauh.
back_translation: The twists of fate along the road test and strain their relationship further.

text: desta vez , columbus capturou o pomo de ouro .
translation: Maksudnya, "kali ini, Columbus menawan epal emas."
back_translation: It means, "This time, Columbus captured the golden apple."

text: at his request , she puts him to death to end his suffering and is subsequently charged with murder .
translation: Atas permintaannya, dia membunuhnya untuk mengakhiri penderitaannya dan kemudian dituduh melakukan pembunuhan.
back_translation: At his request, he killed her to end her suffering and was then accused of murder.

text: will they be able to finally destroy the tall man for good ?
translation: Adakah mereka akhirnya dapat menghancurkan lelaki tinggi itu sekali andai semua?
back_translation: Can they finally manage to defeat that tall man once and for all?

text: legendary irish writer brendan behan 's memoir , borstal boy , has been given a loving screen transferral .
translation: Memoir penulis legenda Ireland, Brendan Behan, Borstal Boy, telah diberikan adaptasi layar yang penuh kasih sayang.
back_translation: The memoir of Irish legend writer, Brendan Behan, Borstal Boy, has been given a loving screen adaptation.

text: any intellectual arguments being made about the nature of god are framed in a drama so clumsy , there is a real danger less sophisticated audiences will mistake it for an endorsement of the very things that bean abhors .
translation: Sebarang hujah intelektual tentang sifat Tuhan yang dibuat adalah dipaparkan dalam sebuah drama yang begitu kekok, sehingga ada bahaya yang sebenarnya bahawa penonton yang kurang berpengalaman akan salah menganggapnya sebagai sokongan kepada perkara-perkara yang sebenarnya dibenci oleh bean.
back_translation: Any intellectual arguments about the nature of God that are made are presented in a rather awkward drama, to the extent that there is a real danger that inexperienced viewers may mistake it as support for things that are actually disliked by beings.

text: an inexplicable crack in the pyrenees mountains provokes excitement and scientific curiosity .
translation: Retakan yang tidak dapat dijelaskan di Pegunungan Pyrenees menimbulkan kegembiraan dan rasa ingin tahu saintifik.
back_translation: The unexplained cracks in the Pyrenees Mountains are causing scientific excitement and curiosity.

text: on this tricky topic , tadpole is very much a step in the right direction , with its blend of frankness , civility and compassion .
translation: Pada topik yang rumit ini, berudu adalah langkah yang sangat sesuai, dengan perpaduan kejujuran, kesopanan, dan belas kasihan.
back_translation: In this complex topic, compromise is a very suitable step, with a combination of honesty, courtesy, and compassion.

text: impressed by his extravagant lifestyle and prowess , his young son kilo yearns to follow in his footsteps .
translation: Terkesan dengan gaya hidup mewah dan kegagahan ayahnya, anak lelaki mudanya, Kilo, berhasrat untuk mengikut jejaknya.
back_translation: Impressed by his father's luxurious lifestyle and elegance, the young son, Kilo, aspires to follow in his footsteps.

text: the off-center humor is a constant , and the ensemble gives it a buoyant delivery .
translation: Humor yang tidak tepat itu berterusan, dan ansambel memberikan penghantaran yang bertenaga.
back_translation: Inappropriate humor persists, and the ensemble delivers powerful delivery.

text: the most memorable moment was when green threw medical equipment at a window ; not because it was particularly funny , but because i had a serious urge to grab the old lady at the end of my aisle 's walker and toss it at the screen in frustration .
translation: Momen paling memorable adalah ketika hijau melemparkan peralatan perubatan ke tingkap; bukan kerana itu lucu, tetapi kerana saya sangat ingin meraih walker wanita tua di hujung lorong saya dan melemparkannya ke skrin secara frustrasi.
back_translation: The most memorable moment is when the green one threw medical equipment out the window; not because it was funny, but because I was so tempted to grab the old lady's walker at the end of my hallway and throw it at the screen in frustration.

text: 'loosely based on a true love story ' is a romantic comedy starring kate hudson as emma and luke wilson as alex . alex is an author whose writer 's block and gambling debts have landed him in a jam .
translation: 'Berdasarkan kisah benar dengan beberapa kebebasan kreatif' merupakan sebuah filem komedi romantik yang dibintangi oleh Kate Hudson sebagai Emma dan Luke Wilson sebagai Alex. Alex adalah seorang penulis yang mengalami kebuntuan kreatif dan berhutang kerana judi, sehingga membawa dia ke dalam masalah.
back_translation: "Based on a true story with some creative freedom" is a romantic comedy film starring Kate Hudson as Emma and Luke Wilson as Alex. Alex is a writer who experiences creative block and is in debt due to gambling, leading him into trouble.

text: when kanna comes back from nagpur both the persons he loved the most rupi and ghisu are not there for him .
translation: Apabila Kanna kembali dari Nagpur, kedua orang yang paling dicintainya, Rupi dan Ghisu, tidak ada untuknya.
back_translation: When Kanna returned from Nagpur, the two people he loved the most, Rupi and Ghisu, were not there for him.

text: the gripping story of the dutch bettien martens , based on true facts .
translation: Kisah mendebarkan tentang Bettien Martens dari Belanda, berdasarkan fakta sebenar.
back_translation: Thrilling story about Bettien Martens from the Netherlands, based on true facts.

text: ben 's rock-solid , promising future and romance with amy are turned upside-down with the arrival of madison bell .
translation: Masa depan yang kukuh dan menjanjikan Ben bersama dengan Amy terbalik dengan kedatangan Madison Bell.
back_translation: A strong and promising future for Ben with Amy was disrupted by the arrival of Madison Bell.

text: naxalites are becoming more and more popular among tribles because of their capacity to give instant justice and more and more youths are joining them .
translation: Naxalites semakin popular di kalangan kumpulan etnik kerana keupayaan mereka memberikan keadilan segera dan semakin ramai belia yang menyertai mereka.
back_translation: Naxalites are becoming increasingly popular among ethnic groups because of their ability to provide immediate justice, leading more young people to join them.

text: former maintenance man gary fitch becomes the least likely candidate for mayor of santa monica , california , when he teams up with the wackiest `` dream-team `` imaginable : glory , a former high-priced call-girl ; his homeless buddy foster edwards , iii ; and shane martinez , a gay delivery boy .
translation: Pekerja penyelenggaraan terdahulu, Gary Fitch, menjadi calon yang paling tidak mungkin untuk menjadi wali bandar Santa Monica, California, apabila beliau bergabung dengan pasukan "pasukan impian" yang paling gila: Glory, bekas pelacur mahal; kawan gelandangan beliau, Foster Edwards III; dan Shane Martinez, seorang pekerja penghantaran gay.
back_translation: Former maintenance worker, Gary Fitch, is the least likely candidate to become the mayor of Santa Monica, California, when he joins the craziest "dream team": Glory, a former high-end prostitute; his homeless buddy, Foster Edwards III; and Shane Martinez, a gay delivery worker.

text: eric has married his high school sweetheart , has a good job , his first house , yet he jokes about all the things he 's missed in life .
translation: Eric telah berkahwin dengan teman sepermainan sekolah menengahnya, memiliki pekerjaan yang baik, rumah pertamanya, namun dia selalu bergurau mengenai hal-hal yang telah dia lewatkan dalam hidup.
back_translation: Eric has married his high school playmate, has a good job, and his first home, but he always jokes about the things he has missed in life.

text: a movie that 's just plain awful but still manages to entertain on a guilty-pleasure , so-bad-it's-funny level .
translation: Sebuah filem yang sungguh teruk tetapi masih berjaya menghiburkan pada tahap kesenangan bersalah, sehingga menjadi lawak kerana terlalu teruk.
back_translation: A movie that is really bad but still manages to entertain at the level of guilty pleasure, to the point of being funny because it's terribly bad.

text: but harper himself is a suspect in several bomb attacks , one of which killed rachel 's partner and friend .
translation: Namun Harper sendiri adalah seorang suspek dalam beberapa serangan bom, salah satunya menyebabkan kematian rakan dan sahabat Rachel.
back_translation: However, Harper himself is a suspect in several bomb attacks, one of which resulted in the death of Rachel's friend and comrade.

text: a disaster of a drama , saved only by its winged assailants .
translation: satu drama malang, hanya diselamatkan oleh pengganas bersayap.
back_translation: A tragic drama, saved only by the winged hero.

text: this is n't an original film , but it is an effective one .
translation: Ini bukan filem asal, tetapi ia adalah satu yang berkesan.
back_translation: This is not the original movie, but it is an impactful one.

text: poets concentrates on locations and issues within the uk and in an oblique way referencing poetry to the topography , at first seemingly random and esoterical , slowly and ultimately questioning the very nature of our british culture and heritage .
translation: Penyair memperhatikan lokasi dan isu-isu dalam UK dengan cara tersirat yang merujuk puisi kepada topografi, pada mulanya kelihatan rawak dan esoterik, secara perlahan dan akhirnya menyentuh hakikat budaya dan warisan British kita.
back_translation: The poet observes locations and issues in the UK in an implicit manner that refers poetry to topography, initially appearing random and esoteric, gradually and ultimately touching on the essence of our British culture and heritage.

text: perhaps no picture ever made has more literally showed that the road to hell is paved with good intentions .
translation: Mungkin tidak ada gambar yang pernah dibuat yang lebih secara harfiah menunjukkan bahawa jalan ke neraka diterapkan dengan niat baik.
back_translation: Perhaps there is no picture ever made that more literally shows that the road to hell is paved with good intentions.

text: dance teacher ramu leaves india to go to america and join his cousin who is rich and successful .
translation: Guru tari Ramu meninggalkan India untuk pergi ke Amerika dan bergabung dengan sepupunya yang kaya dan berjaya.
back_translation: Dance teacher Ramu left India to go to America and join his wealthy and successful cousin.

text: an un-relentless action film that will attract , through word of mouth , all those hooked on gaming on their pc 's and drag them back into the cinema auditoriums .
translation: Filem aksi yang tidak kenal lelah yang akan menarik, melalui kata-kata, semua yang ketagih bermain permainan video di komputer mereka dan menarik mereka kembali ke dalam dewan panggung.
back_translation: An action film that tirelessly draws in, through words, all the addicted gamers playing video games on their computers and pulls them back into the theater.

text: how do a man who has never loved and a woman who refused to ever love again deal with the fact that they are meant to be together ?
translation: Bagaimanakah seorang lelaki yang tidak pernah mencintai dan seorang wanita yang enggan untuk mencintai lagi berurusan dengan hakikat bahawa mereka sebenarnya ditakdirkan untuk bersama?
back_translation: How does a man who has never loved and a woman who is reluctant to love again deal with the fact that they are actually destined to be together?

text: francophiles will snicker knowingly and you 'll want to slap them .
translation: Peminat Francophile akan tersenyum dengan pengetahuan dan anda mungkin rasa nak menampar mereka.
back_translation: Francophiles will smile with knowledge and you may feel like slapping them.

text: it is story of an innocent boy ( krishna ) .
translation: Ini adalah cerita tentang seorang budak yang suci (Krishna).
back_translation: This is a story about a holy boy (Krishna).

text: kirshner and monroe seem to be in a contest to see who can out-bad-act the other . ( kirshner wins , but it 's close . )
translation: Kirshner dan Monroe kelihatan sedang dalam pertandingan untuk melihat siapa yang boleh melakonkan peranan terburuk. (Kirshner menang, tetapi ia berhampiran.)
back_translation: Kirshner and Monroe are seen in a competition to see who can play the worst role. (Kirshner wins, but it's close.)

text: a film at once depressing and uplifting -- depressing in terms of the sad , often horrifying subjects of nachtwey 's photographs but uplifting in terms of his commitment and integrity .
translation: sebuah filem yang pada satu masa menimbulkan rasa sedih dan memberikan semangat – sedih dalam hal subjek-subjek sedih dan seram dalam gambar-gambar nachtwey tetapi memberikan semangat dalam hal komitmen dan integriti beliau.
back_translation: A film that at one point evokes sadness and provides inspiration - sadness in terms of somber subjects and horror in Nachtwey's images but provides inspiration in terms of his commitment and integrity.

text: on the surface , their exchanges are trivial and stilted .
translation: Pada permukaan, pertukaran mereka adalah remeh dan kaku.
back_translation: On the surface, their exchange is trivial and stiff.

text: passing himself as a single father , he starts to meet a string of single mums , confident in his ability to leave them behind when they start to ask for a commitment .
translation: Dengan menyamar sebagai bapa tunggal, dia mula berjumpa dengan sejumlah ibu tunggal, yakin dengan keupayaannya untuk meninggalkan mereka apabila mereka mula meminta komitmen.
back_translation: Disguised as a single father, he began meeting with several single mothers, confident in his ability to leave them when they started asking for commitment.

text: gibney and jarecki just want to string the bastard up .
translation: Gibney dan Jarecki hanya mahu menggantung si haramjadah itu.
back_translation: Gibney and Jarecki just want to hang the bastard.

text: though ronnie works at hope house he does n't follow procedure when he finds sarah wandering outside the confines .
translation: Walaupun Ronnie bekerja di Hope House, dia tidak mengikut prosedur apabila dia menemui Sarah berjalan di luar kawasan.
back_translation: Even though Ronnie works at Hope House, he did not follow the procedure when he found Sarah walking outside the premises.

text: rachel soon finds herself involved with the playground and on the killers hitlist .
translation: Rachel segera terlibat dengan taman permainan dan masuk dalam senarai sasaran pembunuh.
back_translation: Rachel quickly got involved with the amusement park and ended up on the hit list.

text: the question is , will their lives change forever with the riches that come along with professional sports , or will they be destined to live a life in their home country , asking forever , what if ?
translation: Adakah kehidupan mereka akan berubah selamanya dengan kekayaan yang datang bersama dengan sukan profesional, atau adakah mereka ditakdirkan untuk menjalani kehidupan di negara asal mereka, sentiasa bertanya, "apakah jadinya?"
back_translation: Will their lives change forever with the wealth that comes with professional sports, or are they destined to live their lives in their home country, always asking, "what will become of it?"

text: after three rowdy guys get booted from their frat house , they dress up as women and pledge the `` ugly girl `` sorority , where they figure they 'll blend right in .
translation: Selepas tiga orang lelaki nakal diusir dari rumah persaudaraan mereka, mereka berpakaian sebagai wanita dan menyertai persaudaraan "perempuan tidak cantik", di mana mereka percaya mereka akan menjadi serasi.
back_translation: After three naughty men were expelled from their fraternity house, they dressed up as women and joined the "not beautiful women" sisterhood, believing they would fit in.

text: . . . a fluffy , flaky croissant of a culture clash comedy , barely substantial enough for a feature but just light and tasty enough to satisfy .
translation: . . . sebuah komedi pergelutan budaya yang lembut dan berlapis-lapis, hampir tidak mencukupi untuk sebuah filem panjang tetapi cukup ringan dan lazat untuk memuaskan.
back_translation: ...a gentle and multilayered comedy of cultural struggles, almost insufficient for a feature film but light and delicious enough to satisfy.

text: you can tell almost immediately that welcome to collinwood is n't going to jell .
translation: Anda boleh dengan cepat mengetahui bahawa 'welcome to collinwood' tidak akan berjaya.
back_translation: You can quickly find out that 'welcome to collinwood' will not be successful.

text: anxious to use artificial life to improve the world , rosetta stone , ( tilda swinton ) , a bio-geneticist creates a recipe for cyborgs and uses her own dna in order to breed three self replicating automatons , part human , part computer named ruby , olive and marine ( also played by tilda swinton ) .
translation: Gelisah untuk menggunakan kehidupan tiruan untuk memperbaiki dunia , Rosetta Stone , (tilda swinton) , seorang bio-genetis mencipta resepi untuk siborg dan menggunakan dna dirinya sendiri untuk membiakkan tiga automatons yang boleh mereplika diri sendiri , separuh manusia , separuh komputer yang diberi nama Ruby , Olive dan Marine (juga dilakonkan oleh tilda swinton).
back_translation: Restless to use artificial life to fix the world, Rosetta Stone (played by Tilda Swinton), a bio-geneticist creates a recipe for cyborgs and uses her own DNA to breed three automatons that can replicate themselves, half human, half computer named Ruby, Olive, and Marine (also played by Tilda Swinton).

text: beginning with the world trade center 's north tower afire and billowing dense smoke , and ending on the vast expanse of ash-brown debris the following morning , the first 24 hours documents `` ground zero `` in the immediate aftermath of the terrorist attacks on september 11 , 2001 .
translation: Bermula dengan Menara Utara World Trade Center yang terbakar dan mengeluarkan asap pekat, dan berakhir dengan reruntuhan luas berwarna abu-esok paginya, 24 jam pertama mendokumentasikan "kawasan sasaran" dalam rentetan langsung serangan pengganas pada 11 September 2001.
back_translation: Starting with the burning North Tower of the World Trade Center releasing thick smoke and ending with extensive ashen-colored ruins the next morning, the first 24 hours documented the "target area" in the sequence of direct terrorist attacks on September 11, 2001.

text: it is a dark comedy that challenges the traditional ideas of marriage and questions the societal values of money and sex .
translation: Ia merupakan komedi gelap yang mencabar idea tradisional perkahwinan dan mempersoalkan nilai-nilai masyarakat berkenaan wang dan seks.
back_translation: It is a dark comedy that challenges traditional ideas of marriage and questions societal values regarding money and sex.

text: george discovers both the princess and the truth behind her strange disappearance .
translation: George mengetahui bahawa puteri dan kebenaran di sebalik keanehan kehilangannya.
back_translation: George discovered that the princess and the truth behind her disappearance.

text: the film sounds like the stuff of lurid melodrama , but what makes it interesting as a character study is the fact that the story is told from paul 's perspective .
translation: Filem itu terdengar seperti bahan melodrama yang mengerikan, tetapi apa yang membuatnya menarik sebagai kajian watak ialah kisah itu diceritakan daripada sudut pandang Paul.
back_translation: The movie sounds like a terrible melodramatic material, but what makes it interesting as a character study is that the story is told from Paul's perspective.

text: now , it 's up to kimberly , along with the help of flight 180 junkie thomas burke , clear rivers , and the mortician william bloodworth , kimberly must find a way to stop death before it 's to late . . .
translation: Sekarang, bergantung kepada Kimberly, bersama dengan bantuan peminat penerbangan 180 Thomas Burke, Clear Rivers, dan pembalut mayat William Bloodworth, Kimberly harus mencari cara untuk menghentikan kematian sebelum terlambat...
back_translation: Now, depending on Kimberly, with the help of aviation enthusiasts 180 Thomas Burke, Clear Rivers, and mortician William Bloodworth, Kimberly must find a way to stop death before it's too late...

text: after losing his and young son to divorce , he finds no alternative but to kidnap the boy inevitably dragging him through a harrowing journey of grief and as he learns to accept himself .
translation: Selepas kehilangan isterinya dan anak lelaki muda akibat perceraian, dia tidak mempunyai pilihan selain menculik budak lelaki itu, dengan tidak dapat dielakkan menariknya melalui perjalanan yang mencekam yang penuh dengan duka dan seiring dia belajar menerima dirinya sendiri.
back_translation: After losing his wife and young son due to divorce, he had no choice but to kidnap the boy, inevitably pulling him through a gripping journey filled with sorrow as he learns to accept himself.

text: from the late master filmmaker krzysztof kieslowski comes 'heaven ' , the first installment of a trilogy .
translation: Dari pengarah filem ulung Krzysztof Kieślowski datang 'Heaven', bahagian pertama daripada sebuah trilogi.
back_translation: From the distinguished film director Krzysztof Kieślowski comes 'Heaven', the first part of a trilogy.

text: the plot is very clever , but boyd weighs it down with too many characters and events , all intertwined and far too complicated to keep track of .
translation: Plot tersebut sangat cerdik, tetapi Boyd membebani plot tersebut dengan terlalu banyak watak dan peristiwa, yang semuanya berkait rapat dan terlalu rumit untuk dikesan.
back_translation: The plot is very clever, but Boyd burdens it with too many characters and events, all of which are closely related and too complicated to detect.

text: her constant groans and howls of amorous pleasure turn ted 's domain of conquest and libidinous triumph into a nightmare world of bachelorman-interruptus .
translation: Keluhan dan jeritan keseronokan amorousnya yang berterusan mengubah domain kemenangan dan kemenangan libidinous Ted menjadi dunia mimpi ngeri bachelorman-interruptus.
back_translation: The complaints and cries of his continuous amorous pleasure turn Ted's domain of victory and libidinous triumph into a nightmarish world of bachelorman-interruptus dreams.

text: in 8 minutes we go into the life of a little boy who tries to get away with not doing his task .
translation: Dalam masa 8 minit, kita akan melihat kehidupan seorang budak lelaki yang cuba mengelak daripada membuat tugasan.
back_translation: In 8 minutes, we will see the life of a boy trying to avoid doing his assignment.

text: under the pressure of her psychological assaults , sam 's do-gooder vaneer cracks and his true nature is revealed .
translation: Di bawah tekanan serangan psikologi daripadanya, vena baik hati Sam retak dan sifat sebenarnya terbongkar.
back_translation: Under the pressure of psychological attack from him, Sam's kind hearted vein cracks and his true nature is exposed.

text: offers a gentle summer fantasy for both grown-ups and little ones .
translation: Menawarkan fantasi musim panas yang lembut untuk dewasa dan juga kanak-kanak.
back_translation: Offering a gentle summer fantasy for adults and children as well.

text: an empty exercise , a florid but ultimately vapid crime melodrama with lots of surface flash but little emotional resonance .
translation: Suatu latihan yang kosong, sebuah melodrama jenayah yang berbunga-bunga tetapi pada akhirnya hambar dengan banyak kilauan permukaan tetapi sedikit resonansi emosi.
back_translation: An empty exercise, a crime melodrama that is flashy but ultimately bland with lots of surface glitter but little emotional resonance.

text: . . . if it had been only half-an-hour long or a tv special , the humor would have been fast and furious -- at ninety minutes , it drags .
translation: . . . jika ia hanya berlangsung setengah jam atau satu siri khas tv , humor itu akan berlaku dengan pantas dan bergelora -- pada durasi sembilan puluh minit, ia menjadi lembam .
back_translation: . . . if it only lasts half an hour or one TV special series, the humor will happen quickly and excitingly - on a duration of ninety minutes, it becomes sluggish.

text: the x potion gives the quickly named blossom , bubbles and buttercup supernatural powers that include extraordinary strength and laser-beam eyes , which unfortunately do n't enable them to discern flimsy screenplays .
translation: Potion X memberi keupayaan ghaib kepada si cepat yang diberi nama Blossom, Bubbles, dan Buttercup yang merangkumi kekuatan luar biasa dan mata laser-beam, tetapi malangnya tidak membolehkan mereka mengenal pasti naskah skrip yang lemah.
back_translation: Potion X grants supernatural abilities to the quick trio named Blossom, Bubbles, and Buttercup, encompassing extraordinary strength and laser-beam eyes, but unfortunately, it does not allow them to identify weak script texts.

text: however , the enemy terrorists learn of his secret identity and kidnap his girlfriend/fiancee ( gabriel macht ) .
translation: Bagaimanapun, pihak musuh pengganas mengetahui identiti rahsia orang itu dan menculik kekasihnya/tunangnya (Gabriel Macht).
back_translation: However, the enemy terrorists have discovered the secret identity of the person and kidnapped his lover/fiancé (Gabriel Macht).

text: the ridiculed home secretary is slowly coming to life , but in his way stands a paranoid defense secretary .
translation: Menteri Dalam Negeri yang menjadi bahan ejekan sedang lambat-lambat bangun, tetapi dia terhalang oleh Menteri Pertahanan yang paranoid.
back_translation: The Minister of Home Affairs, who is the subject of ridicule, is slowly waking up, but he is hindered by the paranoid Minister of Defense.

text: what better place for a writer to pick up a girl ?
translation: Di mana tempat yang lebih baik bagi seorang penulis untuk mendekati seorang gadis?
back_translation: Where is the best place for a writer to approach a girl?

text: . . . while dark water is n't a complete wash ( no pun intended ) , watched side-by-side with ringu , it ultimately comes off as a pale successor .
translation: . . . sementara air gelap tidak lengkap (tidak berniat) sebagai pencucian lengkap, ditonton berdampingan dengan ringu, pada akhirnya ia terasa sebagai pewaris yang pucat.
back_translation: . . .while dark water is incomplete (not intended) as a complete wash, seen alongside the ringu, in the end it feels like a pale heir.

text: chelsea walls is a case of too many chefs fussing over too weak a recipe .
translation: Chelsea Walls adalah kes di mana terlalu banyak juru masak sibuk dengan resipi yang terlalu lemah.
back_translation: Chelsea Walls is a case where too many chefs are busy with recipes that are too weak.

text: what if hitler did n't die in berlin at the end of the war ?
translation: Apa jadinya jika Hitler tidak mati di Berlin pada akhir perang?
back_translation: What if Hitler didn't die in Berlin at the end of the war?

text: too restrained to be a freak show , too mercenary and obvious to be cerebral , too dull and pretentious to be engaging . . . the isle defies an easy categorization .
translation: Terlalu terikat untuk menjadi pertunjukan aneh, terlalu berorientasi pada keuntungan dan jelas untuk menjadi cerebral, terlalu membosankan dan pretentious untuk menarik. Pulau ini menolak untuk dikategorikan dengan mudah.
back_translation: Too bound to be a weird show, too profit-oriented and clear to be cerebral, too boring and pretentious to be attractive. This island refuses to be easily categorized.

text: the adventures of pluto nash is a whole lot of nada .
translation: Kisah-kisah petualangan Pluto Nash tidak ada apa-apanya.
back_translation: The adventures of Pluto Nash are nothing compared.

text: welcoming the challenge , roger guides nick through the city 's wild nightlife for an all-night crash course , only to realize that he -- the adult -- still has something to learn about what women , and men , really want .
translation: Sambut cabaran itu, Roger membimbing Nick melalui kehidupan malam liar bandar untuk kelas kecemasan sepanjang malam, hanya untuk sedar bahawa dia - dewasa - masih perlu belajar tentang apa yang benar-benar diinginkan oleh wanita, dan lelaki.
back_translation: Embracing the challenge, Roger guides Nick through the wild urban nightlife for an all-night emergency crash course, only to realize that he - as an adult - still needs to learn about what women and men really want.

text: i have a confession to make : i did n't particularly like e . t . the first time i saw it as a young boy . that is because - damn it ! - i also wanted a little alien as a friend !
translation: Saya ada pengakuan untuk dibuat: saya tidak begitu suka dengan filem E.T. pada kali pertama saya menontonnya sebagai seorang kanak-kanak. Itu kerana - sial! - saya juga ingin memiliki seorang makhluk asing kecil sebagai kawan!
back_translation: I have a confession to make: I didn't really like the movie E.T. the first time I watched it as a kid. That's because - darn! - I also wanted to have a little alien creature as a friend!

text: the crew traveled with the band to their homes in obninsk , russia and to their music conservatories in moscow , documenting how these two girls and five boys became so adept at playing american country music .
translation: Pasukan tersebut melancong bersama kumpulan musik ke rumah mereka di Obninsk, Rusia dan ke konservatori muzik mereka di Moscow, mendokumentasikan bagaimana kedua gadis dan lima orang lelaki tersebut menjadi sangat mahir dalam bermain muzik country Amerika.
back_translation: The team traveled with a music group to their home in Obninsk, Russia and to their music conservatory in Moscow, documenting how the two girls and five men became very skilled in playing American country music.

text: nice balance between real emotions and cute movie moments with a hilarious love scene .
translation: Keseimbangan yang baik antara emosi sebenar dan momen lucu dalam filem dengan adegan cinta yang menggelikan.
back_translation: A good balance between genuine emotions and funny moments in a movie with comical love scenes.

text: louiso lets the movie dawdle in classic disaffected-indie-film mode , and brother hoffman 's script stumbles over a late-inning twist that just does n't make sense .
translation: Louiso membiarkan filem itu berlarutan dalam mod filem indie yang tidak berminat klasik, dan skrip abang Hoffman tergelincir atas sebuah putaran akhir yang tidak masuk akal.
back_translation: Louiso let the film linger in indie film mode that isn't interested in classics, and brother Hoffman's script slipped over a nonsensical ending.

text: the venezuelans say things like `` si , pretty much `` and `` por favor , go home `` when talking to americans . that 's muy loco , but no more ridiculous than most of the rest of `` dragonfly . ``
translation: Orang Venezuela mengatakan perkataan seperti "ya, agak" dan "por favor, pulanglah" apabila bercakap dengan orang Amerika. Itu sangat gila, tetapi tidak lebih gila daripada kebanyakan bahagian "dragonfly" yang lain.
back_translation: Venezuelans say phrases like "yes, somewhat" and "please, go back" when speaking to Americans. It's very crazy, but not crazier than most other parts of the "dragonfly."

text: his plan goes awry , however , when the group is forced to work for a drug ring .
translation: Rancangannya terganggu, bagaimanapun, apabila kumpulan itu terpaksa bekerja untuk satu ring dadah.
back_translation: The plan was disrupted, however, when the group had to work for a drug ring.

text: its audacious ambitions sabotaged by pomposity , steven soderbergh 's space opera emerges as a numbingly dull experience .
translation: Ambisi berani itu dirampas oleh ketiadaan tenaga , opera angkasa Steven Soderbergh muncul sebagai pengalaman yang membosankan.
back_translation: Bolder ambition is robbed by lack of energy, Steven Soderbergh's space opera appears as a boring experience.

text: when she begins to question his sanity , she decides to take her chances on her own , only to run into another pair , who on the surface appear to be escaped prisoners on the run .
translation: Apabila dia mula mempertikaikan warasnya, dia memutuskan untuk mencuba nasib sendiri, hanya untuk bertembung dengan sepasang lain yang pada permukaannya kelihatan seperti banduan yang melarikan diri.
back_translation: When he began to question his sanity, he decided to try his luck on his own, only to encounter another pair that on the surface appeared to be escaped prisoners.

text: he must fend off beings that seek to gain control over the mysterious black mass .
translation: Dia harus menolak makhluk-makhluk yang cuba mendapatkan kawalan ke atas belang hitam misteri tersebut.
back_translation: He must reject creatures trying to gain control over the mysterious black stripes.

text: samira makhmalbaf 's new film blackboards is much like the ethos of a stream of consciousness , although , it 's unfortunate for the viewer that the thoughts and reflections coming through are torpid and banal
translation: Filem baru Samira Makhmalbaf, "Blackboards" sangat mirip dengan etos aliran kesedaran, walaupun sayangnya bagi penonton, pemikiran dan refleksi yang dipersembahkan adalah lembab dan klise.
back_translation: Samira Makhmalbaf's new film, "Blackboards," is very similar to the ethos of consciousness flow, although unfortunately, for the audience, the presented thoughts and reflections are sluggish and clichéd.

text: but when fred is fired , the well runs dry , and our heroes come up with a new plan : make their own `` adult `` film .
translation: Tetapi apabila Fred dipecat, sumber air kering, dan pahlawan kita datang dengan rancangan baru: membuat filem "dewasa" sendiri.
back_translation: But when Fred was fired, the water source dried up, and our hero came up with a new plan: making an "adult" film on his own.

text: capitalizing on his fame as the star of `` hogan 's heroes , `` bob crane ( greg kinnear ) dove into the freewheeling spirit of the 60s and 70s with relish , having affairs with numerous women .
translation: Memanfaatkan kemasyhuran sebagai bintang "Hogan's Heroes", Bob Crane (diperankan oleh Greg Kinnear) terjun ke dalam semangat bebas tahun 60-an dan 70-an dengan penuh semangat, menjalin hubungan dengan banyak wanita.
back_translation: Exploiting his fame as the star of "Hogan's Heroes," Bob Crane (portrayed by Greg Kinnear) immersed himself in the carefree spirit of the 60s and 70s with enthusiasm, engaging in relationships with many women.

text: an intelligently made ( and beautifully edited ) picture that at the very least has a spark of life to it -- more than you can say for plenty of movies that flow through the hollywood pipeline without a hitch .
translation: Sebuah gambar yang dibuat secara bijak (dan diedit dengan indah) yang setidaknya memiliki percikan kehidupan di dalamnya - lebih dari yang boleh dikatakan untuk banyak filem yang mengalir melalui saluran Hollywood tanpa sebarang gangguan.
back_translation: A cleverly crafted (and beautifully edited) picture that at least has a touch of life in it - more than can be said for many films flowing through Hollywood channels without any disruption.

text: this is a third-person story now , told by hollywood , and much more ordinary for it .
translation: Ini adalah sebuah cerita orang ketiga sekarang, diceritakan oleh Hollywood, dan jauh lebih biasa untuknya.
back_translation: This is a third person narrative now, told by Hollywood, and much more common for it.

text: even if you 're an elvis person , you wo n't find anything to get excited about on this dvd .
translation: Walaupun anda penggemar Elvis, anda tidak akan dapati apa-apa yang menarik di dalam DVD ini.
back_translation: Even though you are a fan of Elvis, you will not find anything interesting in this DVD.

text: but when he realizes that he has to deal with what has got to be god 's most arduous task , listening and answering prayers .
translation: tetapi apabila dia sedar bahawa dia perlu menangani tugas yang mungkin merupakan tugas yang paling sukar dari Tuhan, iaitu mendengar dan menjawab doa.
back_translation: However, when he realizes that he needs to handle a task that may be the most difficult task from God, which is to listen to and respond to prayers.

text: bravely explores the psychic damage inflicted on jean-luc by a withholding , then absent parent .
translation: Dengan berani menerokai kerosakan psikik yang ditimbulkan pada jean-luc oleh seorang ibu bapa yang bersikap mengekang, kemudian tidak hadir.
back_translation: Boldly exploring the psychic damage inflicted on Jean-Luc by controlling and then absent parents.

text: there 's something fishy about a seasonal holiday kids ' movie . . . that derives its moment of most convincing emotional gravity from a scene where santa gives gifts to grownups .
translation: Ada sesuatu yang mencurigakan tentang filem kanak-kanak musim perayaan yang mendapat titik paling meyakinkan dari segi emosi graviti daripada satu adegan di mana Santa memberikan hadiah kepada orang dewasa.
back_translation: There is something suspicious about the children's holiday season movie that received the most convincing point in terms of emotional gravity from a scene where Santa gives gifts to adults.

text: after gruelling training sessions , the three succeed in robbing the bank , but things go haywire .
translation: Selepas sesi latihan yang meletihkan, ketiga-tiga mereka berjaya merompak bank, tetapi keadaan menjadi huru-hara.
back_translation: After a tiring training session, all three of them successfully robbed the bank, but the situation turned chaotic.

text: movie fans , get ready to take off . . . the other direction .
translation: Peminat filem, bersedia untuk bergerak. . . ke arah yang lain.
back_translation: Movie fans, ready to move... towards something else.

text: she 's telling her story because she wants to set the record straight , to correct the lies in natalie 's book , which became a bestseller .
translation: Dia menceritakan kisahnya kerana dia ingin menegakkan fakta yang sebenarnya, untuk membetulkan fitnah dalam buku Natalie, yang telah menjadi bestseller.
back_translation: He told his story because he wanted to establish the real facts, to correct the defamation in Natalie's bestselling book.

text: the film intercuts between two days , two years apart .
translation: filem itu meliputi antara dua hari, dua tahun berbeza.
back_translation: The film spans between two days, two years apart.

text: phillip noyce and all of his actors -- as well as his cinematographer , christopher doyle -- understand the delicate forcefulness of greene 's prose , and it 's there on the screen in their version of the quiet american .
translation: phillip noyce dan semua pelakonnya - serta jurugambar beliau, christopher doyle - memahami daya penarik halus dalam prosa greene, dan ia ada pada skrin dalam versi mereka mengenai the quiet american.
back_translation: phillip noyce and all the cast - as well as his cinematographer, christopher doyle - grasp the subtle allure of greene's prose, and it is evident on screen in their version of the quiet american.

text: he awakes to what appears to be the next morning only to find that he is one year into the future and is an escaped convict for the murder of his fianc & # 233 ; e .
translation: Dia terjaga hanya untuk mendapati bahawa dia telah berada setahun ke hadapan dan menjadi seorang banduan yang melarikan diri kerana pembunuhan tunangnya.
back_translation: He woke up only to find himself one year ahead and becoming an escaped convict for the murder of his fiancée.

text: thirty years ago he was a poor worker who left his girlfriend to pursuit his dream of success .
translation: Tiga puluh tahun yang lalu dia adalah seorang pekerja miskin yang meninggalkan teman wanitanya untuk mengejar impian kejayaannya.
back_translation: Thirty years ago he was a poor worker who left his girlfriend to pursue his dreams of success.

text: big-shot executive robert stiles ' car is damaged when parked at the lodge .
translation: Kereta eksekutif penting, Robert Stiles, rosak apabila diparkir di lodge.
back_translation: The important executive car, Robert Stiles, was damaged when parked at the lodge.

text: as the boyfriend also becomes obsessed , it becomes apparent that something more is happening .
translation: Apabila kekasih juga menjadi obses, menjadi jelas bahawa sesuatu yang lebih berlaku.
back_translation: When a lover becomes an obsession, it becomes clear that something more is happening.

text: the asylum material is gripping , as are the scenes of jia with his family .
translation: Bahan asylum itu menggugat, begitu juga adegan-adegan Jia bersama keluarganya.
back_translation: The asylum material is challenging, as well as the scenes of Jia with her family.

text: the pair wave farewell in the airport and yoyo returns to hong kong to further her studies , while cheung continues to write his unfinished dissertation .
translation: Pasangan itu berpamitan di lapangan terbang dan Yoyo pulang ke Hong Kong untuk meneruskan pelajarannya, manakala Cheung meneruskan menulis disertasinya yang belum selesai.
back_translation: The couple bid farewell at the airport and Yoyo returned to Hong Kong to continue his studies, while Cheung continued working on his unfinished dissertation.

text: when fowler introduces pyle to his beautiful young vietnamese mistress phuong ( hai yen ) the three become swept up in a tempestuous love triangle that leads to a series of startling revelations and finally - murder .
translation: Apabila Fowler memperkenalkan pyle kepada gadis Vietnam yang cantik Phuong (Hai Yen), ketiganya terlibat dalam segitiga cinta yang bergelora yang membawa kepada siri pengakuan yang mengejutkan dan akhirnya - pembunuhan.
back_translation: When Fowler introduces Pyle to the beautiful Vietnamese girl Phuong (Hai Yen), the three are involved in a passionate love triangle that leads to a series of shocking revelations and ultimately - murder.

text: nevertheless , carlos puts his artistic aspirations on hold to take over the store and care for his father .
translation: Walau bagaimanapun, Carlos menangguhkan aspirasi seninya untuk mengambil alih kedai dan menjaga ayahnya.
back_translation: However, Carlos put his artistic aspirations on hold to take over the shop and take care of his father.

text: wanders all over the map thematically and stylistically , and borrows heavily from lynch , jeunet , and von trier while failing to find a spark of its own .
translation: Melalui peta secara tematik dan gaya, dan banyak terpengaruh oleh lynch, jeunet, dan von trier tanpa berjaya menemui percikan identitinya sendiri.
back_translation: Through thematic and stylish mapping, and greatly influenced by Lynch, Jeunet, and Von Trier without successfully finding its own spark of identity.

text: it is that rare combination of bad writing , bad direction and bad acting -- the trifecta of badness .
translation: Ia adalah gabungan jarang yang terdiri daripada penulisan yang buruk, arahan yang buruk, dan lakonan yang buruk - trifekta kejahatan.
back_translation: It is a rare combination of bad writing, bad direction, and bad acting - a trifecta of evil.

text: behind in rent , losing any real day jobs they have , they plan a bank robbery .
translation: Terlambat membayar sewa, kehilangan pekerjaan harian sebenar yang mereka miliki, mereka merancang perompakan bank.
back_translation: Being late in paying the rent, losing their actual daily jobs, they plan to rob a bank.

text: believing himself capable of understanding people from the other side of the track , michael fails to recognize that the ex-con is manipulating him and so sets off a catastrophic chain of events in the community .
translation: Yakin bahawa dia mampu memahami orang dari golongan lain, Michael gagal mengenali bahawa bekas banduan sedang mengendalikannya dan menyebabkan siri peristiwa yang mencetuskan bencana dalam komuniti.
back_translation: Confident that he could understand people from different walks of life, Michael failed to realize that a former convict was manipulating him and causing a series of events that sparked disasters in the community.

text: working in secret , the progressive group organised the 1959 theatre boycott to end segregation in movie theatres in hamilton .
translation: Bekerja secara rahsia, kumpulan progresif telah menganjurkan boikot teater 1959 untuk mengakhiri pengasingan di pawagam di Hamilton.
back_translation: Working in secrecy, the progressive group has organized a boycott of the 1959 theater to end segregation in cinemas in Hamilton.

text: the soviet union has collapsed and armenia is on the verge of her independence .
translation: Kesatuan Soviet telah runtuh dan Armenia hampir meraih kemerdekaannya.
back_translation: The Soviet Union has collapsed and Armenia is close to gaining its independence.

text: as charming , humorous and heimisch as its nomadic subjects .
translation: Sama menawan, lucu, dan selesa seperti subjek nomadiknya.
back_translation: Equally charming, cute, and comfortable like its nomadic subject.

text: a film within a film , this is a contemporary story of the making of a historical epic about the armenian holocaust between 1915 and 1918 .
translation: filem dalam filem ini merupakan kisah kontemporari tentang pembikinan epik sejarah mengenai holokaus Armenia antara tahun 1915 dan 1918.
back_translation: The movie in this film is a contemporary story about the making of an epic historical account of the Armenian genocide between 1915 and 1918.

text: the result is solemn and horrifying , yet strangely detached .
translation: Keputusannya adalah meriah dan menakutkan, namun secara anehnya terasa jauh.
back_translation: The decision is grand and terrifying, yet strangely distant.

text: beautiful , gentle people of all color of skin surround her and care about her .
translation: Orang-orang yang indah, lembut dari semua warna kulit mengelilinginya dan peduli tentang dia.
back_translation: Beautiful, gentle people of all skin colors surround her and care about her.

text: as janice , eileen walsh , an engaging , wide-eyed actress whose teeth are a little too big for her mouth , infuses the movie with much of its slender , glinting charm .
translation: Janice, Eileen Walsh, seorang pelakon yang menarik dan berwajah bulat dengan gigi yang sedikit terlalu besar untuk mulutnya, menambahkan sentuhan keanggunan dan daya tarikan yang tipis kepada filem ini.
back_translation: Janice, Eileen Walsh, an interesting and round-faced actress with slightly oversized teeth for her mouth, adds a touch of elegance and subtle allure to this film.

text: the angst-ridden , affluent slacker characters are more grating than engaging .
translation: Watak-watak yang terpinggir, orang kaya yang malas adalah lebih mengganggu daripada menarik.
back_translation: Marginalized characters, lazy rich people are more annoying than attractive.

text: a beguiling splash of pastel colors and prankish comedy from disney .
translation: suatu persembahan warna-warna pastel yang menawan dan komedi yang kocak dari Disney.
back_translation: A captivating showcase of pastel colors and hilarious comedy from Disney.

text: there 's no denying how nice it is to see veteran actors bob hoskins , michael caine and helen mirren interacting with each other on screen .
translation: Tidak dapat disangkal betapa menyenangkannya melihat pelakon veteran seperti Bob Hoskins, Michael Caine, dan Helen Mirren berinteraksi di layar.
back_translation: It cannot be denied how delightful it is to see veteran actors like Bob Hoskins, Michael Caine, and Helen Mirren interacting on the screen.

text: sinks so low in a poorly played game of absurd plot twists , idiotic court maneuvers and stupid characters that even freeman ca n't save it .
translation: Terperosok begitu rendah dalam permainan yang dimainkan dengan plot twist yang tidak masuk akal, manuver mahkamah yang bodoh, dan watak-watak bodoh sehingga tidak dapat diselamatkan oleh Freeman.

text: purely propaganda , a work of unabashed hero worship , it is nonetheless -- and likely inadvertently -- a timely and invaluable implicit reminder of the role that u . s . foreign policy has played in the rise of castro .

text: effectively feeds our senses with the chilling sights and sounds from within the camp to create a completely numbing experience .

text: the latest installment in the pokemon canon , pokemon 4ever is surprising less moldy and trite than the last two , likely because much of the japanese anime is set in a scenic forest where pokemon graze in peace .

text: ultimately , in the history of the academy , people may be wondering what all that jazz was about `` chicago `` in 2002 . zellweger 's whiny pouty-lipped poof faced and spindly attempt at playing an ingenue makes her nomination as best actress even more of a an a
translation: Pada akhirnya, dalam sejarah academy, orang mungkin bertanya-tanya apa sebenarnya yang terjadi dengan "Chicago" pada tahun 2002. Penampilan Zellweger yang penuh dengan rutukan mengecut dan terselindung serta cubaan yang lemah bermain watak pembayangan, membuat pencalonannya sebagai pelakon terbaik menjadi semakin meragukan.
back_translation: In the end, in the history of the academy, people might wonder what actually happened with "Chicago" in 2002. Zellweger's performance full of cursing shrank and concealed along with weak attempts at playing shadowy characters, making her nomination as best actress more questionable.

text: set in the los angeles police department in april 1992 , dark blue is a dramatic thriller that takes place just days before the acquittal of four white officers in the beating of black motorist rodney king and the subsequent l . a . riots .
translation: Ditugaskan di Jabatan Polis Los Angeles pada bulan April 1992, Dark Blue adalah sebuah drama thriller yang berlangsung hanya beberapa hari sebelum pembebasan empat pegawai kulit putih dalam pukulan pemandu kenderaan hitam Rodney King dan rusuhan L.A. yang berikutnya.
back_translation: Assigned to the Los Angeles Police Department in April 1992, Dark Blue is a thriller drama that takes place just a few days before the acquittal of four white officers in the beating of black motorist Rodney King and the subsequent L.A. riots.

text: 'murder by numbers ' is a psychological suspense-thriller that tells the story of a tenacious homicide detective , cassie mayweather ( sandra bullock ) and her new partner sam kennedy ( ben chaplin ) who become pitted against two malevolently brilliant young men ( ryan gosling and michael pitt ) in an ingenious battle of wits as they try to solve a murder case .
translation: ‘Pembunuhan Mengikut Nombor’ adalah sebuah filem psychological suspense-thriller yang mengisahkan kisah seorang detektif homisid yang gigih, Cassie Mayweather (Sandra Bullock) dan rakan sepasukannya yang baru, Sam Kennedy (Ben Chaplin) yang dilibatkan dalam pertarungan dengan dua lelaki muda yang jahat dan bijak, (Ryan Gosling dan Michael Pitt) dalam pertarungan kepandaian yang cekap semasa mereka cuba menyelesaikan kes pembunuhan.
back_translation: 'Murder by Numbers' is a psychological suspense-thriller film that tells the story of a diligent homicide detective, Cassie Mayweather (Sandra Bullock), and her new partner, Sam Kennedy (Ben Chaplin), as they engage in a battle with two cunning and evil young men (Ryan Gosling and Michael Pitt) in a test of skill as they try to solve a murder case.

text: the story line follows how making the film transforms the life of an 18-year-old man hired as a driver on the production .

text: beresford nicely mixes in as much humor as pathos to take us on his sentimental journey of the heart . it really is a shame that more wo n't get an opportunity to embrace small , sweet 'evelyn . '
translation: Beresford dengan baiknya mencampurkan sebanyak mungkin humor dan kesedihan untuk membawa kita dalam perjalanan sentimental hati. Sungguh disayangkan bahwa lebih banyak orang tidak akan mendapat kesempatan untuk merangkul 'Evelyn' yang kecil dan manis.
back_translation: Beresford skillfully mixes as much humor and sadness to take us on a sentimental heartwarming journey. It is a pity that more people will not have the opportunity to embrace the little and sweet 'Evelyn'.

text: the widow 's teenage daughter wants to be a professional gambler and she convinces her mother to date a british man whose new in town .
