back_translation: The widow's daughter wanted to become a professional gambler and she successfully convinced her mother to go on a date with a British man who had just arrived in town.

text: in order to appease the lord of gods indra ( amitabh bachchan ) , custodian of rain , a grand fire sacrifice is being conducted at the palace under the guidance of the chief priest , paravasu ( jackie shroff ) .
translation: Untuk meredakan Tuhan Dewa Indra (Amitabh Bachchan), penjaga hujan, sebuah korban api yang megah sedang diadakan di istana di bawah bimbingan pendeta utama, Paravasu (Jackie Shroff).
back_translation: To appease the rain god Lord Indra (Amitabh Bachchan), a grand fire sacrifice is being held at the palace under the guidance of the chief priest, Paravasu (Jackie Shroff).

text: throughout all the tumult , a question comes to mind : so why is this so boring ?
translation: Sepanjang keramaian, satu soalan terlintas di fikiran: jadi mengapa ini begitu membosankan?
back_translation: Throughout the bustle, one question crosses the mind: so why is this so boring?

text: two young mormon missionaries wake up to find themselves evicted from the house , where they had been renting rooms from a now deceased widow .
translation: Dua misionaris mormon muda terjaga untuk mendapati diri mereka diusir dari rumah, di mana mereka telah menyewa bilik dari seorang balu yang kini sudah meninggal.
back_translation: Two young Mormon missionaries woke up to find themselves being evicted from the house, where they had rented a room from a widow who had since passed away.

text: the values that have held the enterprise crew together through previous adventures and perils do so again-courage , self-sacrifice and patience under pressure .
translation: Nilai-nilai yang telah menyatukan krew enterprise melalui pengalaman dan bahaya sebelumnya kini sekali lagi sama - keberanian, pengorbanan diri, dan kesabaran dalam tekanan.
back_translation: The values that have brought the enterprise crew together through past experiences and dangers are once again the same - courage, self-sacrifice, and patience under pressure.

text: muccino seems to be exploring the idea of why human beings long for what they do n't have , and how this gets us in trouble . but even while his characters are acting horribly , he is always sympathetic .
translation: Muccino kelihatan sedang meneroka idea mengapa manusia kerap merindui apa yang tidak mereka miliki, dan bagaimana perkara ini membawa masalah kepada kita. Walaupun watak-wataknya berkelakuan dengan teruk, dia sentiasa simpatik.
back_translation: Muccino appears to be exploring the idea of why humans often long for what they do not have, and how this can bring problems for us. Although his characters behave badly, he is always sympathetic.

text: his older brother junnie offers to coach him on how to be a player , promising martin that within two weeks , she 'll be his .
translation: Abangnya yang lebih tua, Junnie menawarkan untuk melatihnya tentang cara menjadi seorang pemain, menjanjikan kepada Martin bahawa dalam masa dua minggu, dia akan menjadi miliknya.
back_translation: His older brother, Junnie offers to train him on how to become a player, promising Martin that within two weeks, he will be his.

text: at the beginning , the cast assembles for a seemingly traditional wedding shower .
translation: Pada permulaan, barisan pelakon berkumpul untuk majlis persandingan tradisional yang kelihatan biasa.
back_translation: In the beginning, the actors gathered for a traditional wedding ceremony that appeared ordinary.

text: feeling like a dope has rarely been more fun than it is in nine queens .
translation: Merasa bodoh jarang sekali lebih menyeronokkan daripada dalam sembilan ratu.
back_translation: Feeling dumb is seldom more fun than being in nine queens.

text: a sham construct based on theory , sleight-of-hand , and ill-wrought hypothesis .
translation: satu konstruk palsu yang berdasarkan teori, ilusi, dan hipotesis yang buruk.
back_translation: a false construct based on theory, illusion, and flawed hypotheses.

text: with nothing to go on but his dreams and gut instinct , vince launches into his own search for ellen . . . or is he really searching for sara ?
translation: Dengan tidak ada petunjuk selain mimpi dan naluri perutnya, Vince memulai pencariannya sendiri untuk Ellen. Ataukah sebenarnya dia sedang mencari Sara?
back_translation: With no clues except dreams and his gut instincts, Vince begins his own search for Ellen. Or is he actually searching for Sara?

text: . . . delivers few moments of inspiration amid the bland animation and simplistic story .
translation: . . . memberikan beberapa saat inspirasi di tengah animasi yang hambar dan cerita yang mudah.
back_translation: . . . providing moments of inspiration amidst bland animation and simplistic storytelling.

text: terri ( eve ) is a hard-edged woman who ca n't seem to leave her two-timing boyfriend .
translation: Terri (Eve) adalah seorang wanita yang tegas yang kelihatannya tidak dapat meninggalkan kekasihnya yang suka bermain dua hati.
back_translation: Terri (Eve) is a strong-willed woman who seemingly cannot leave her partner who is fond of playing with two hearts.

text: before long , pazuzu , the demon from the movies , fully possesses the boy and father merrin is the only one who can stop pazuzu 's evil plan of world domination .
translation: tidak lama kemudian, Pazuzu, iblis dari filem-filem, sepenuhnya merasuki budak itu dan bapa Merrin adalah satu-satunya yang boleh menghentikan rancangan jahat Pazuzu untuk menguasai dunia.
back_translation: Not long after, Pazuzu, the demon from the movies, completely possessed the child and Father Merrin was the only one who could stop Pazuzu's evil plan to take over the world.

text: to my taste , the film 's comic characters come perilously close to being amoses and andys for a new generation .
translation: Bagi selera saya, watak komik dalam filem ini hampir menjadi seperti Amoses dan Andys untuk generasi baru.
back_translation: In my opinion, the comic characters in this movie are almost like Amoses and Andys for the new generation.

text: whenever it threatens to get bogged down in earnest dramaturgy , a stirring visual sequence like a surge through swirling rapids or a leap from pinnacle to pinnacle rouses us . if horses could fly , this is surely what they 'd look like .
translation: Setiap kali ia mengancam untuk terjerumus dalam dramaturgi serius, urutan visual yang menggemparkan seperti lonjakan melalui arus berputar atau loncatan dari puncak ke puncak menggugah semangat kita. Jika kuda bisa terbang, inilah pasti yang mereka akan terlihat.
back_translation: Every time it threatens to fall into serious dramaturgy, the shocking visual sequences like surging through swirling currents or leaping from peak to peak excite our spirits. If horses could fly, this is definitely how they would look.

text: caught in an intrigue of baby-snatching , a bounty hunter and diaper-changing , dave and ruby spend a hilarious , unexpected and wild night together .
translation: Terperangkap dalam skandal penculikan bayi, seorang pemburu hadiah dan menukar lampin, Dave dan Ruby menghabiskan malam bersama yang lucu, tak terduga, dan liar.
back_translation: Trapped in a baby kidnapping scandal, a bounty hunter and a diaper changer, Dave and Ruby spend a night together that is funny, unexpected, and wild.

text: as the girls begin to bond , laura gradually begins to find herself abandoning the safety of the fantasy and falling into her first real friendship .
translation: Apabila gadis-gadis mula merapatkan hubungan, Laura secara perlahan-lahan mula merasakan dirinya meninggalkan keselamatan fiksyen dan jatuh ke dalam persahabatan sebenar pertamanya.
back_translation: When the girls started to form closer relationships, Laura slowly began to feel herself leaving the safety of fiction and falling into her first true friendship.

text: a counterfeit 1000 tomin bank note is passed in a bazaar .
translation: Satu nota bank palsu bernilai 1000 toman telah digunakan di sebuah pasar bazaar.
back_translation: A counterfeit banknote worth 1000 toman was used at a bazaar market.

text: this stuck pig of a movie flails limply between bizarre comedy and pallid horror .
translation: filem ini yang tersepit bagai babi berguling-guling antara komedi aneh dan kengerian yang hambar.
back_translation: This movie is caught in between awkward comedy and bland horror like a rolling pig.

text: paralyzed by the discovery he is only capable of leaving with a stupid excuse , trying to hide from ana the anguish that barely lets him breath .
translation: Terperangkap oleh penemuan bahawa dia hanya mampu pergi dengan alasan bodoh, cuba untuk bersembunyi daripada Ana kesakitan yang hampir tidak membenarkannya bernafas.
back_translation: Trapped by the realization that he could only leave with a foolish excuse, he tried to hide from Ana's almost suffocating pain.

text: it seems that vince 's sister , sara , has shown up too , about 22 years after she was abducted and murdered .
translation: Nampaknya adik Vince, Sara, juga muncul, kira-kira 22 tahun selepas dia diculik dan dibunuh.
back_translation: It appears that Vince's sister, Sara, also appeared, about 22 years after she was kidnapped and murdered.

text: despite the inexperience of the director and his cast , there 's rarely a false moment .
translation: Walaupun pengarah dan pelakonnya kurang berpengalaman, jarang terdapat saat palsu.
back_translation: Although the director and the actors are inexperienced, fake moments are rarely found.

text: absurdities and clichM-is accumulate like lint in a fat man 's navel .
translation: Kebengkokan dan klise bertimbun seperti lintah di pusat lemak lelaki gemuk.
back_translation: Curved and cliches pile up like leeches in the center of a fat man's belly.

text: it 's all very cute , though not terribly funny if you 're more than six years old .
translation: Semuanya sangat comel, walaupun tidak terlalu lucu jika anda lebih daripada enam tahun.
back_translation: Everything is very cute, although not too funny if you are over six years old.

text: ca n't get enough of libidinous young city dwellers ? try this obscenely bad dark comedy , so crass that it makes edward burns ' sidewalks of new york look like oscar wilde .
translation: Tidak dapat mendapat cukup dengan penduduk bandar muda yang berahi? Cuba komedi gelap yang teruk ini, begitu kasar sehingga membuat sidewalk Edward Burns di New York kelihatan seperti Oscar Wilde.
back_translation: Can't get enough of the lustful young urban population? Try this terribly dark comedy, so rough it makes Edward Burns' New York sidewalks look like Oscar Wilde.

text: but they 're also so much more , as you 'll find out in deborah dickson 's powerful and intimate documentary .
translation: Tetapi mereka juga merupakan jauh lebih banyak, seperti yang akan anda dapati dalam dokumentari yang kuat dan intim oleh deborah dickson.
back_translation: But they also represent a lot more, as you will find in a powerful and intimate documentary by Deborah Dickson.

text: between bursts of automatic gunfire , the story offers a trenchant critique of capitalism .
translation: Di antara letupan tembakan automatik, cerita ini memberikan kritikan yang tajam terhadap kapitalisme.
back_translation: Amongst the bursts of automatic gunfire, this story provides a sharp criticism of capitalism.

text: it will probably prove interesting to ram dass fans , but to others it may feel like a parody of the mellow , peace-and-love side of the '60s counterculture .
translation: Ia mungkin menarik bagi peminat-peminat Ram Dass, tetapi kepada yang lain, ia mungkin terasa seperti satu sindiran terhadap aliran budaya '60an yang tenang dan penuh kasih sayang.
back_translation: It may be interesting for Ram Dass fans, but to others, it may feel like a criticism of the peaceful and loving '60s cultural movement.

text: jacki resolves to play this one last gig and then throw in the towel if she does not find success .
translation: Jacki bersedia untuk membuat persembahan terakhir ini dan kemudian menyerah jika dia tidak mencapai kejayaan.
back_translation: Jacki is prepared to make this final presentation and then give up if he does not succeed.

text: when max 's performance is no competition for producers ' nephews and bigger `` names , `` his only option is to cripple the competition - literally .
translation: Apabila prestasi Max tidak dapat bersaing dengan anak buah pengeluar dan "nama-nama" yang lebih besar, satu-satunya pilihan baginya adalah menyekat persaingan - secara harfiah.
back_translation: When Max's performance cannot compete with the subordinates and bigger "names", his only choice is to block the competition - literally.

text: edi is wrongly accused of having raped the girl whose brothers have got the control over one of the city areas .
translation: Edi dituduh secara salah sebagai pemerkosa gadis yang saudara-saudaranya mengendalikan salah satu kawasan di bandar itu.
back_translation: Edi was wrongly accused of raping a girl whose siblings controlled one of the areas in the city.

text: lapd patrol officer trey sellars joined the force as a day job until his acting career took off .
translation: Pegawai ronda LAPD, Trey Sellars, menyertai pasukan itu sebagai pekerjaan harian sehingga kerjayanya dalam bidang seni lakonan mula berkembang.
back_translation: LAPD patrol officer Trey Sellars joined the team as a daily job, and his career in acting began to flourish.

text: this formulaic chiller will do little to boost stallone 's career .
translation: Filem seram ini tidak akan banyak membantu meningkatkan kerjaya Stallone.
back_translation: This horror film is not going to help improve Stallone's career much.

text: provides the kind of 'laugh therapy ' i need from movie comedies -- offbeat humor , amusing characters , and a happy ending . after seeing 'analyze that , ' i feel better already .
translation: Menyediakan jenis 'terapi gelak' yang saya perlukan dari komedi filem - humor yang tidak lazim, watak yang menghiburkan, dan akhir yang bahagia. Selepas menonton 'analyze that,' saya sudah merasa lebih baik.
back_translation: Providing the type of 'comedy therapy' I need from comedy movies - unusual humor, entertaining characters, and a happy ending. After watching 'Analyze That,' I already feel better.

text: this roller coaster tale teams a young man , will turner , with an unlikely ally in rogue pirate jack sparrow .
translation: Kisah roller coaster ini menggabungkan seorang pemuda, Will Turner, dengan sekutu yang tidak mungkin iaitu lanun rogue Jack Sparrow.
back_translation: The roller coaster story combines a young man, Will Turner, with an unlikely ally, the rogue pirate Jack Sparrow.

text: of course , this is n't the best idea , since it involves sneaking into gun-nut carl 's house in the middle of the night .
translation: Tentu saja, ini bukanlah idea yang terbaik, kerana melibatkan menyelinap masuk ke rumah Carl yang obses dengan senjata pada tengah malam.
back_translation: Of course, this is not the best idea, as it involves sneaking into Carl's gun-obsessed house in the middle of the night.

text: what if fate intervened and hitler was forced into hiding in post-war london ?
translation: Bagaimana jika takdir campur tangan dan Hitler terpaksa bersembunyi di London pasca-perang?
back_translation: What if fate interferes and Hitler is forced to hide in London post-war?

text: i did n't find much fascination in the swinging . what they 're doing is a matter of plumbing arrangements and mind games , of no erotic or sensuous charge . but that they are doing it is thought-provoking .
translation: Saya tidak mendapati banyak daya tarikan dalam bergoyang. Apa yang mereka lakukan adalah soal susunan paip dan permainan minda, tiada unsur erotik atau perasaan sensual. Tetapi fakta bahawa mereka melakukannya memang membangkitkan pemikiran.
back_translation: I do not find much appeal in dancing. What they do is more about pipe arrangements and intellectual games, with no elements of eroticism or sensuality. But the fact that they do it does stimulate thinking.

text: an edgy indie-psychological drama about an alluring but mixed-up l . a . girl who flip-flops between facing life 's uncertainty under her own direction or `` the good life `` provided by a wealthy , disturbing middle-aged benefactor .
translation: drama psychological indie yang mencengangkan mengenai seorang gadis yang menarik tetapi keliru di Los Angeles yang berbolak-balik antara menghadapi ketidaktentuan hidup di bawah arahannya sendiri atau "kehidupan yang baik" yang diberikan oleh penyumbang kaya dan mengganggu yang setengah baya.
back_translation: A stunning indie psychological drama about a captivating yet misguided girl in Los Angeles who oscillates between facing life's uncertainties under her own guidance or the "good life" offered by a wealthy and disturbing middle-aged benefactor.

text: as before , the resistance was able to send another t-800 as a protector for john , and its still a question of which one will reach him first . . .
translation: Seperti sebelum ini, pemberontak berjaya menghantar seorang lagi t-800 sebagai pelindung untuk John, dan masih menjadi soalan tentang yang mana akan sampai kepadanya dahulu...
back_translation: As before, the rebels successfully send another t-800 as a protector for John, and there is still a question of which one will reach him first...

text: when his only friend and co-worker dies , a young man born with dwarfism moves to an abandoned train depot in rural new jersey .
translation: Apabila rakan sekerja dan kawannya yang satu-satunya meninggal dunia, seorang lelaki muda yang dilahirkan dengan kerdil pindah ke stesen keretapi terbengkalai di New Jersey luar bandar.
back_translation: When a co-worker and his only friend passed away, a young man born with dwarfism moved to an abandoned train station in rural New Jersey.

text: many have no physical sex lives , living instead in a world of romance with stars like james dean or audrey hepburn .
translation: Banyak yang tidak memiliki kehidupan seks fizikal, hidup dalam dunia romantik dengan bintang-bintang seperti James Dean atau Audrey Hepburn.
back_translation: Many do not have physical sex lives, living in a romantic world with stars like James Dean or Audrey Hepburn.

text: he 's sixteen and lives with his younger sister , mother cheryl and her boyfriend john , in a modest house in bakersfield , california .
translation: Dia berusia enam belas tahun dan tinggal dengan adik perempuannya, ibu Cheryl, dan teman lelakinya John, di sebuah rumah sederhana di Bakersfield, California.
back_translation: She is sixteen years old and lives with her younger sister, Cheryl's mother, and her boyfriend John, in a simple house in Bakersfield, California.

text: he seems impossible to stop as when the possessed guest is killed , murray passes into the killer to continue his mission of murdering all nine of them .
translation: Dia nampaknya mustahil untuk dihentikan kerana apabila tetamu yang dimiliki itu dibunuh, Murray berpindah ke pembunuh untuk meneruskan misinya membunuh kesemua sembilan mereka.
back_translation: He seems impossible to stop because when his guests are killed, Murray moves on to the killer to continue his mission of killing all nine of them.

text: to spite the hated infidel ways of her father , she has settled into a complacent relationship and is struggling ( not too hard ) with issues of fidelity to her kind but unexciting husband .
translation: Bagi membalas dendam terhadap cara infidel yang dibenci oleh bapanya, dia telah menetap dalam hubungan yang puas dan sedang berjuang (tidak terlalu keras) dengan isu kesetiaan kepada suaminya yang baik tetapi membosankan.
back_translation: In order to seek revenge on the hated infidel ways of her father, she has settled in a satisfying relationship and is struggling (not too hard) with the issue of loyalty to her good but boring husband.

text: willy , on impulse , takes her captive and murders her .
translation: Willy, secara tiba-tiba, menawan wanita itu dan membunuhnya.
back_translation: Suddenly, Willy captured the woman and killed her.

text: the tone shifts abruptly from tense to celebratory to soppy .
translation: tonnya tiba-tiba berubah dari tegang ke meriah ke lembut.
back_translation: The atmosphere suddenly shifted from tense to lively to gentle.

text: the story follows a visit to bobby by his mother .
translation: Cerita mengikuti kunjungan ibu Bobby.
back_translation: The story follows Bobby's mother's visit.

text: 'you 'll laugh for not quite and hour and a half , but come out feeling strangely unsatisfied . you 'll feel like you ate a reeses without the peanut butter . . . '
translation: 'Anda akan gelak selama hampir sejam setengah, tetapi akhirnya merasa tidak puas. Anda akan berasa seolah-olah telah makan Reese's tanpa mentega kacang...'
back_translation: 'You will laugh for almost an hour and a half, but in the end, feel dissatisfied. You will feel as if you have eaten a Reese's without peanut butter...'

text: as a young man , walter t . shaw jr . saw his father go unaccredited for his remarkable work and set out on his ironically celebrated career in crime .
translation: Sebagai seorang lelaki muda, Walter T. Shaw Jr. melihat bapanya tidak diiktiraf atas kerja luar biasanya dan memulakan kerjayanya yang ironinya di dalam dunia jenayah.
back_translation: As a young man, Walter T. Shaw Jr. saw his father's exceptional work go unrecognized and ironically began his career in the world of crime.

text: if the last man were the last movie left on earth , there would be a toss-up between presiding over the end of cinema as we know it and another night of delightful hand shadows .
translation: Jika lelaki terakhir adalah filem terakhir yang tinggal di bumi, akan terdapat pertimbangan antara memimpin penghujung industri filem sebagaimana yang kita kenal atau malam yang lain bermain bayang-bayang tangan yang menyeronokkan.
back_translation: If the last man is the last movie remaining on earth, there would be a consideration between leading the end of the film industry as we know it or letting another night play with fun hand shadows.

text: but early on there are signs of trouble , and lena is prey to suspicions no one else need consider : a new face may be a new kid in town-or a face from the grave .
translation: Tetapi awal-awal sudah terdapat tanda-tanda masalah, dan Lena mudah diserang oleh kecurigaan yang tidak perlu dipertimbangkan oleh orang lain: wajah baru mungkin adalah seorang anak baru di kota - atau wajah dari kubur.
back_translation: But in the beginning, there were already signs of trouble, and Lena was easily attacked by unnecessary suspicions considered by others: a new face could be that of a new kid in town - or the face from the grave.

text: shanghai ghetto may not be as dramatic as roman polanski 's the pianist , but its compassionate spirit soars every bit as high .
translation: Ghetto Shanghai mungkin tidak se dramatik filem The Pianist arahan Roman Polanski, tetapi semangat belas kasihnya melayang setinggi mana juga.
back_translation: Ghetto Shanghai may not be as dramatic as Roman Polanski's film The Pianist, but its spirit of compassion soars just as high.

text: in an isolated town named raccoon city , the largest corporate supplier of healthcare , medical supplies , and defense technology has a secret research facility located half a mile underground called the hive .
translation: Di sebuah bandar terpencil yang diberi nama Raccoon City, pembekal korporat terbesar dalam bidang penjagaan kesihatan, bekalan perubatan, dan teknologi pertahanan mempunyai sebuah pusat penyelidikan rahsia yang terletak setengah batu di bawah tanah yang dipanggil The Hive.
back_translation: In a remote town known as Raccoon City, the largest corporate provider in healthcare, medical supplies, and defense technology has a secret research center underground called The Hive located half a mile below ground.

text: it 's a shame that pokemon 4ever 's dialogue is so trite and flatly delivered because the tale itself presents serious ideas worthy of more poetic language .
translation: Sungguh disayangkan bahawa dialog dalam Pokemon 4ever begitu klise dan disampaikan dengan cetek kerana ceritanya menyampaikan idea-idea yang serius yang patut dinyatakan dengan bahasa yang lebih berpuisi.
back_translation: It’s a pity that the dialogue in Pokemon 4ever is so cliché and delivered superficially because the story conveys serious ideas that should be expressed more poetically.

text: tor loves jessica but his life has got stuck in a rut .
translation: Tor mencintai Jessica tetapi kehidupannya terjebak dalam kebosanan.
back_translation: Tor loves Jessica but his life is trapped in boredom.

text: an interview with rick rescorla , head of security for morgan stanley dean witter , filmed in his office on the 44th floor of the world trade center in 1998 .
translation: sebuah temubual dengan rick rescorla, ketua keselamatan bagi morgan stanley dean witter, dirakam di pejabatnya di tingkat 44 Pusat Perdagangan Dunia pada tahun1998.
back_translation: An interview with Rick Rescorla, the head of security for Morgan Stanley Dean Witter, was recorded in his office on the 44th floor of the World Trade Center in 1998.

text: bittersweet comedy/drama full of life , hand gestures , and some really adorable italian guys .
translation: komedi/drama yang penuh dengan rasa getir, gerakan tangan, dan beberapa lelaki Itali yang sungguh comel.
back_translation: A comedy/drama filled with bitter moments, hand gestures, and some really handsome Italian men.

text: a beyond-lame satire , teddy bears ' picnic ranks among the most pitiful directing debuts by an esteemed writer-actor .
translation: Satire yang sangat lemah ini, Piknik Beruang Teddy menduduki tempat terendah sebagai pengarahan pertama oleh seorang penulis-pelakon yang dihormati.
back_translation: This extremely weak satire, Teddy Bear Picnic, occupies the lowest place as the directorial debut by a respected writer-actor.

text: but her stepmother bitch was to ruin it all .
translation: tapi ibu tiri jalangnya telah merosakkan segalanya.
back_translation: but the stepmother's promiscuity has ruined everything.

text: . . . the whole thing succeeded only in making me groggy .
translation: . . . keseluruhan perkara hanya membuat saya mengantuk .
back_translation: . . . everything just makes me sleepy.

text: its salient points are simultaneously buried , drowned and smothered in the excesses of writer-director roger avary .
translation: Titik-titik utamanya pada masa yang sama tertimbus, tenggelam, dan ditindas oleh kelebihan penulis-pengarah Roger Avary.
back_translation: Its main points are at the same time obscured, submerged, and suppressed by the excesses of the writer-director Roger Avary.

text: . . . a boring parade of talking heads and technical gibberish that will do little to advance the linux cause .
translation: . . . satu perarakan yang membosankan dengan ucapan belaka dan teknikal yang sukar difahami yang sedikit memberi sumbangan kepada penyebab Linux.
back_translation: ... a boring parade with only speeches and technical jargon that are difficult to understand and contribute little to the Linux cause.

text: but zamindar narayan mukherjee ( vijay crishna ) , devdas ' father , met paro 's mother sumitra 's ( kiran kher ) marriage proposal with condescending arrogance .
translation: Tetapi zamindar Narayan Mukherjee (Vijay Krishna), bapa kepada Devdas, bertemu tawaran perkahwinan Sumitra ibu kepada Paro (Kiran Kher) dengan sikap sombong yang merendahkan.
back_translation: However, landlord Narayan Mukherjee (Vijay Krishna), father of Devdas, met Sumitra's marriage proposal for Paro (Kiran Kher) with an arrogant and demeaning attitude.

text: it 's hard not to like a film that has sky divers jumping out of helicopters to catch flying dragons in a big net .
translation: Sukar untuk tidak suka filem yang menunjukkan pelayang terjun dari helikopter untuk menangkap naga terbang dengan jaring besar.
back_translation: It's hard not to like a movie that shows a stuntman jumping from a helicopter to capture a flying dragon with a big net.

text: an endearingly offbeat romantic comedy with a great meet-cute gimmick .
translation: satu komedi romantik yang aneh tetapi memikat dengan gimmick pertemuan yang hebat.
back_translation: a quirky yet captivating romantic comedy with a great meeting gimmick.

text: it is supremely unfunny and unentertaining to watch middle-age and older men drink to excess , piss on trees , b . s . one another and put on a show in drag .
translation: Ia sangat tidak lucu dan tidak menghibur untuk melihat lelaki separa baya dan yang lebih tua minum berlebihan, kencing di pokok, saling mengkritik, dan memperagakan pertunjukan berselendang.
back_translation: It is not funny and not entertaining at all to see middle-aged and older men drink heavily, urinate on trees, criticize each other, and put on a show wearing sarongs.

text: a brutal and funny work . nicole holofcenter , the insightful writer/director responsible for this illuminating comedy does n't wrap the proceedings up neatly but the ideas tie together beautifully .
translation: Satu karya yang brutal dan lucu. Nicole Holofcenter, penulis/pengarah yang berpengetahuan untuk komedi yang mencerahkan ini, tidak mengikatkan semua proses dengan rapi tetapi gagasan-gagasan itu dihubungkan dengan cantik.
back_translation: A work that is brutal and funny. Nicole Holofcenter, a knowledgeable writer/director for this enlightening comedy, does not tie up all the processes neatly but the ideas are beautifully connected.

text: it 's like every bad idea that 's ever gone into an after-school special compiled in one place , minus those daytime programs ' slickness and sophistication ( and who knew they even had any ? ) .
translation: Ia seperti setiap idea buruk yang pernah dimasukkan ke dalam satu persembahan selepas sekolah disusun di satu tempat, tanpa kelenturan dan kecanggihan program siang hari tersebut (dan siapa sangka mereka mempunyai sedikit? ).
back_translation: It's like every bad idea ever presented after school is put together in one place, without the flexibility and sophistication of the daytime program (and who would have thought they had any?).

text: when sara ( elizabeth hurley ) is served divorce papers while she is in new york , she is stunned .
translation: Apabila Sara (Elizabeth Hurley) diserahkan dokumen perceraian ketika dia berada di New York, dia terkejut.
back_translation: When Sara (Elizabeth Hurley) was handed the divorce papers while she was in New York, she was surprised.

text: whenever you think you 've figured out late marriage , it throws you for a loop .
translation: Setiap kali anda fikir anda telah pun mengetahui tentang perkahwinan lewat, ia membingungkan anda.
back_translation: Every time you think you already know about marriage late, it confuses you.

text: the overall result is an intelligent , realistic portrayal of testing boundaries .
translation: Hasil keseluruhan ialah penggambaran yang cerdas dan realistik dalam menguji batasan.
back_translation: The overall result is a smart and realistic portrayal in pushing boundaries.

text: they wander around japan in panda outfits , wreak havoc on a once civilized golf court , they even do stunts involving live alligators , and so on .
translation: Mereka mengembara di sekitar Jepun dengan pakaian panda, menimbulkan kekacauan di padang golf yang dahulunya beradab, mereka juga melakukan aksi berbahaya melibatkan buaya hidup, dan lain-lain.
back_translation: They wandered around Japan in panda costumes, creating chaos on the once-civilized golf course, they also performed dangerous stunts involving live crocodiles, and so on.

text: 4 friends , 2 couples , 2000 miles , and all the pabst blue ribbon beer they can drink - it 's the ultimate redneck road-trip .
translation: 4 kawan, 2 pasangan, 2000 batu jauhnya, dan segala bir Pabst Blue Ribbon yang mereka boleh minum - itu adalah perjalanan jalan raya redneck yang terbaik.
back_translation: 4 friends, 2 couples, 2000 miles away, and all the Pabst Blue Ribbon beer they can drink - that's the ultimate redneck road trip.

text: it 's a decent glimpse into a time period , and an outcast , that is no longer accessible , but it does n't necessarily shed more light on its subject than the popular predecessor .
translation: Ini adalah pandangan yang cukup baik ke dalam satu tempoh waktu, dan seorang yang terpinggir, yang tidak lagi boleh diakses, tetapi tidak semestinya memberikan lebih banyak cahaya kepada subjeknya daripada pendahulu yang popular.
back_translation: This is a fairly good insight into a period of time, and someone marginalized, who is no longer accessible, but not necessarily shed more light on the subject than the popular predecessor.

text: a sweet , tender sermon about a 12-year-old welsh boy more curious about god than girls , who learns that believing in something does matter .
translation: sebuah khotbah yang manis dan lembut tentang seorang budak lelaki Welsh berusia 12 tahun yang lebih ingin tahu tentang Tuhan daripada gadis, yang belajar bahawa mempercayai sesuatu itu penting.
back_translation: A sweet and gentle sermon about a 12-year-old Welsh boy who is more curious about God than girls, who learns that believing in something is important.

text: when danny 's beloved grandfather dies , does his greed overcome his love ?
translation: Apakah kekayuan Danny mengatasi cintanya ketika datuknya tersayang meninggal dunia?
back_translation: Did Danny's wealth overcome his love when his beloved grandfather passed away?

text: three mischevious employees ( paulo costanzo , woody harrelson , alicia silverstone ) of a bank in a small deserted town all make plans to rob at the same time , however none of them knows about the others .
translation: Tiga orang pekerja yang cerdik (Paulo Costanzo, Woody Harrelson, Alicia Silverstone) di sebuah bank di sebuah bandar kecil yang terpencil membuat rancangan untuk merompak pada masa yang sama, tetapi tidak seorang pun dari mereka mengetahui tentang yang lain.
back_translation: Three clever workers (Paulo Costanzo, Woody Harrelson, Alicia Silverstone) at a bank in a small remote town plan to rob it at the same time, but none of them know about each other.

text: the performances are strong , though the subject matter demands acting that borders on hammy at times .
translation: Pertunjukan tersebut hebat, walaupun topiknya menuntut lakonan yang kadang-kadang melebihi batas.
back_translation: The performance was great, even though the topic required acting that sometimes exceeded the limits.

text: borstal boy represents the worst kind of filmmaking , the kind that pretends to be passionate and truthful but is really frustratingly timid and soggy .
translation: 'Borstal Boy' mewakili jenis pembikinan filem terburuk, yang berpura-pura bersemangat dan jujur tetapi sebenarnya agak pengecut dan lembap.
back_translation: 'Borstal Boy' represents the worst kind of filmmaking, pretending to be enthusiastic and honest but actually quite cowardly and sluggish.

text: there 's something about a marching band that gets me where i live .
translation: Ada sesuatu tentang kumpulan pancaragam yang membuat saya terasa hidup.
back_translation: There is something about a music ensemble that makes me feel alive.

text: one of those rare films that seems as though it was written for no one , but somehow manages to convince almost everyone that it was put on the screen , just for them .
translation: Salah satu filem langka yang seolah-olah ditulis untuk tiada siapa, tetapi dengan cara yang mengagumkan mampu meyakinkan hampir semua orang bahawa ia ditayangkan, khas untuk mereka.
back_translation: One of the rare films that seems to be written for nobody, but in an amazing way manages to convince almost everyone that it is shown specifically for them.

text: to confirm his worst fears , thomas sprints outside and discovers that it is not just a terrible dream - his vision may never be the same .
translation: Untuk mengesahkan ketakutannya yang terburuk, Thomas berlari ke luar dan mendapati bahawa ini bukan sekadar mimpi buruk - penglihatannya mungkin tidak akan sama lagi.
back_translation: To confirm his worst fear, Thomas ran outside and found that this was not just a bad dream - his vision might never be the same again.

text: two tedious acts light on great scares and a good surprise ending .
translation: Dua aksi yang membosankan dengan ketakutan besar dan akhir yang mengejutkan yang baik.
back_translation: Two boring actions with great fear and a surprising good ending.

text: for sokurov , the hermitage -- home to generations of romonovs and repository of so much russian history -- is the ark of the russian soul , guarding it affectionately until the world sees better days .
translation: bagi Sokurov, Eremitage - tempat tinggal bagi generasi romonovs dan tempat penyimpanan begitu banyak sejarah Rusia - adalah bahtera jiwa Rusia, menjaganya dengan penuh kasih sayang sehingga dunia melihat hari yang lebih baik.
back_translation: For Sokurov, the Hermitage - the residence of the Romanov generation and a place that stores so much of Russian history - is the ark of the Russian soul, guarding it with love so that the world sees a better day.

text: a dopey movie clothed in excess layers of hipness .
translation: filem yang bodoh dilapisi dengan lapisan-lapisan kehipsteraan yang berlebihan.
back_translation: A silly movie coated with excessive layers of hipsterism.

text: it almost feels as if the movie is more interested in entertaining itself than in amusing us .
translation: Ia hampir terasa seolah-olah filem lebih berminat untuk menghiburkan diri sendiri daripada menghiburkan kita.
back_translation: It almost feels as if the movie is more interested in entertaining itself than entertaining us.

text: unfortunately , a cast of competent performers from movies , television and the theater are cast adrift in various new york city locations with no unifying rhythm or visual style .
translation: Tidak, pelakon yang kompeten dari filem, televisyen, dan teater dilemparkan ke pelbagai lokasi di bandar New York tanpa irama atau gaya visual yang seragam.
back_translation: No, competent actors from film, television, and theater are thrown into various locations in the city of New York without a uniform rhythm or visual style.

text: jack valento has the goods on the da and casts a mean shadow over his hand-picked micro-community of indentured employees .
translation: Jack Valento memiliki barang-barang yang dimiliki oleh DA dan melemparkan bayangannya di atas masyarakat mikro yang dipilihnya sendiri dari pekerja yang terikat.
back_translation: Jack Valento has belongings owned by DA and casts his shadow over a selected micro-community of bound workers.

text: the truly independent film , the after school special , was a simple story that said so much and touched people in so many ways .
translation: Filem benar-benar independen tersebut, 'the after school special', adalah sebuah cerita yang mudah tetapi mampu menyampaikan makna yang dalam dan menyentuh hati orang ramai dengan pelbagai cara.
back_translation: The truly independent film, 'the after school special', is a simple story but is able to convey deep and touching meanings to the public in various ways.

text: strong filmmaking requires a clear sense of purpose , and in that oh-so-important category , the four feathers comes up short .
translation: Pembikinan filem yang baik memerlukan tujuan yang jelas, dan dalam kategori yang sangat penting itu, filem "The Four Feathers" kurang memuaskan.
back_translation: The making of a good film requires a clear purpose, and in that very important category, the film "The Four Feathers" is less satisfying.

text: charly comes off as emotionally manipulative and sadly imitative of innumerable past love story derisions .
translation: Charly terlihat manipulatif secara emosi dan sedih meniru dari derision kisah cinta masa lalu yang tak terhitung jumlahnya.
back_translation: Charly appears to be emotionally manipulative and sad imitating countless stories of past love derision.

text: the you-are-there style ultimately enhances abc africa 's ability to get inside the soul of uganda , and of the viewer .
translation: Gaya 'anda-berada-di-situ' pada akhirnya meningkatkan keupayaan ABC Africa untuk memahami jiwa Uganda, dan juga penonton.
back_translation: The 'you-are-there' style ultimately enhances ABC Africa's ability to understand the soul of Uganda, as well as the audience.

text: thus , it is only natural that kyle begins a steady decline towards becoming one of the monsters he despises .
translation: Maka, adalah sesuatu yang wajar bagi Kyle untuk mula mengalami penurunan beransur menuju menjadi salah satu dari raksasa yang dibenci olehnya.
back_translation: So, it is only natural for Kyle to begin experiencing a gradual decline towards becoming one of the giants he despises.

text: as his agent pushes him to be bigger , and valerie , the bakery owner , adds a surprise of her own , stan begins to strain under the pressures of mass production while simultaneously trying to create hand painted masterpieces . . .
translation: Apabila ejennya mendorongnya untuk menjadi lebih besar, dan Valerie, pemilik bakery, menambahkan kejutan miliknya sendiri, Stan mula merasa tertekan di bawah tekanan pengeluaran berjumlah besar sambil pada masa yang sama cuba mencipta keajaiban lukisan tangan...
back_translation: When the agent pushes him to grow bigger, and Valerie, the bakery owner, adds her own surprise, Stan starts to feel pressured under the pressure of large production while at the same time trying to create a hand-painted miracle...

text: documentary about brazil 's best surfers , doing their thing on the best beaches around the world , located in hawaii , indonesia , brazil , south africa and california .
translation: Filem dokumentari mengenai surfer terbaik Brazil, menjalankan aktiviti mereka di pantai terbaik di seluruh dunia, terletak di Hawaii, Indonesia, Brazil, Afrika Selatan, dan California.
back_translation: A documentary film about the best Brazilian surfers, showcasing their activities on the best beaches around the world, located in Hawaii, Indonesia, Brazil, South Africa, and California.

text: based on nick hornby 's popular british novel , about a boy is a comedy-drama starring hugh grant as will , a rich , child-free and irresponsible londoner in his thirties who , in search of available women , invents an imaginary son and starts attending single parent meetings .
translation: Berdasarkan novel British yang popular dalam karya Nick Hornby, "About a Boy" adalah sebuah filem komedi-drama yang dibintangi oleh Hugh Grant sebagai Will, seorang penduduk London yang kaya, bebas anak, dan tidak bertanggungjawab dalam usianya yang tiga puluhan yang, dalam mencari wanita yang tersedia, mengarang seorang anak imaginari dan mula menghadiri mesyuarat ibu tunggal.
back_translation: Based on the popular British novel by Nick Hornby, "About a Boy" is a comedy-drama film starring Hugh Grant as Will, a wealthy, child-free, and irresponsible Londoner in his thirties who, in his quest for available women, invents an imaginary son and begins attending single mothers' group meetings.

text: together , miller , kuras and the actresses make personal velocity into an intricate , intimate and intelligent journey .
translation: Bersama-sama, Miller, Kuras dan para pelakon menjadikan Personal Velocity sebagai perjalanan yang rumit, intim dan bijak.
back_translation: Together, Miller, Kuras, and the actors have made Personal Velocity a complex, intimate, and wise journey.

text: i do n't think this movie loves women at all .
translation: Saya rasa filem ini tidak mencintai wanita sama sekali.
back_translation: I feel that this movie does not love women at all.

text: the pace and the visuals are so hyped up that a curious sense of menace informs everything .
translation: Kelajuan dan visualnya sangat membangkitkan minat sehingga menimbulkan rasa ancaman yang ingin diketahui dalam setiap perkara.
back_translation: The speed and visuals are very captivating, sparking interest and a sense of threat that piques curiosity in every matter.

text: a broad , melodramatic estrogen opera that 's pretty toxic in its own right .
translation: opera estrogen melodramatik yang meluas yang agak toksik dalam versinya sendiri.
back_translation: A widespread estrogen opera melodrama that is rather toxic in its own version.

text: delia is a spirited , working-class woman from a small town in new york who leaves her abusive husband and sets out on a journey to reclaim the power she has lost .
translation: Delia adalah seorang wanita yang bersemangat dari golongan pekerja dari sebuah bandar kecil di New York yang meninggalkan suaminya yang kejam dan memulakan perjalanan untuk mendapatkan semula kuasa yang telah hilang.
back_translation: Delia is an enthusiastic woman from the working class of a small town in New York who left her cruel husband and embarked on a journey to regain the lost power.

text: jim and michelle are getting married , and need to do it quickly because jim 's grandmother is sick and wants to see jim walk down the aisle .
translation: Jim dan Michelle akan berkahwin, dan perlu melakukannya dengan cepat kerana nenek Jim sakit dan ingin melihat Jim berjalan di lorong.
back_translation: Jim and Michelle are getting married, and need to do it quickly because Jim's grandmother is sick and wants to see Jim walking down the aisle.

text: it just might all be bearable , somehow possible to live through , if it were n't for those damned 'monsters ' that keep trying to kill him .
translation: Ia mungkin menjadi lebih tahan-lama, mungkin mungkin untuk terus hidup, jika bukan kerana 'rakus' yang cuba membunuhnya.
back_translation: It might last longer, it might be able to continue living, if not for the 'greed' that's trying to kill it.

text: fessenden continues to do interesting work , and it would be nice to see what he could make with a decent budget . but the problem with wendigo , for all its effective moments , is n't really one of resources .
translation: Fessenden terus melakukan kerja yang menarik, dan akan menjadi baik untuk melihat apa yang dapat dihasilkannya dengan belanjawan yang mencukupi. Tetapi masalah dengan Wendigo, walaupun mempunyai momen-momen yang berkesan, sebenarnya bukanlah berkaitan dengan sumber.
back_translation: Fessenden continues to do interesting work, and it will be good to see what he can produce with sufficient budget. But the issue with Wendigo, although having impressive moments, is actually not related to the source.

text: will you go ape over this movie ? well , it probably wo n't have you swinging from the trees hooting it 's praises , but it 's definitely worth taking a look .
translation: Adakah anda akan menjadi gila-gilaan dengan filem ini? Well, mungkin tidak akan membuat anda bergayut-gayut dari pokok dengan memuji, tetapi ia pasti layak untuk diberi tumpuan.
back_translation: Will you go crazy over this movie? Well, maybe it won't make you swing from trees with praise, but it is definitely worth checking out.

text: ruled by instant gratification and material desires , they plot to steal a napoleon collection from one of their parents ' homes .
translation: Diperintah oleh kepuasan segera dan kehendak bahan, mereka merancang untuk mencuri koleksi Napoleon dari salah satu rumah ibu bapa mereka.
back_translation: Driven by immediate gratification and material desires, they planned to steal Napoleon's collection from one of their parents' houses.

text: an improvement on the feeble examples of big-screen poke-mania that have preceded it .
translation: satu peningkatan daripada contoh lemah mania poke skrin besar yang telah mendahuluinya.
back_translation: An improvement from the previous weak example of a large screen touch mania poke.

text: the plot has a number of holes , and at times it 's simply baffling .
translation: Plot tersebut mempunyai beberapa kelemahan, dan pada masa yang sama ia hanya membingungkan.
back_translation: The plot has several weaknesses, and at the same time, it is just confusing.

text: edgar gets wind inez is up to something and blows his cool , beating her and making her a prisoner in their own home .
translation: Edgar mendapat tahu Inez sedang merancang sesuatu dan menjadi marah, dia memukulinya dan menjadikannya tahanan di dalam rumah mereka.
back_translation: Edgar found out that Inez was planning something and became angry, he hit her and made her a prisoner in their house.

text: taken seriously , it 's not much to think about , but taken as a dirtier version of other girlie films . . . it 's at least entertaining and sexy fun .
translation: Diambil serius, ini bukan sesuatu yang perlu difikirkan banyak, tetapi jika dianggap sebagai versi kotor filem-filem feminin lain... ia sekurang-kurangnya menghiburkan dan menyeronokkan secara seksi.
back_translation: Taken seriously, this is not something that needs to be thought about much, but if considered as the dirty version of other feminine films... it is at least entertaining and enjoyable in a sexy way.

text: bM-iart and berling are both superb , while huppert . . . is magnificent .
translation: bM-iart dan berling kedua-duanya hebat, manakala huppert... sungguh megah.
back_translation: The artwork and the crystal are both great, while Huppert... truly magnificent.

text: after five years of research and shooting , this unique film is now completed .
translation: Selepas lima tahun penyelidikan dan penggambaran, filem unik ini kini telah siap.
back_translation: After five years of research and filming, this unique film is now completed.

text: in the pianist , polanski is saying what he has long wanted to say , confronting the roots of his own preoccupations and obsessions , and he allows nothing to get in the way .
translation: Dalam filem The Pianist, Polanski mengatakan apa yang ingin dikatakannya selama ini, menghadapi akar perhatian dan obsesinya sendiri, dan dia tidak membenarkan apa-apa menghalang.
back_translation: In the film The Pianist, Polanski expresses what he has always wanted to say, confronting the roots of his own interests and obsessions, and he does not allow anything to stop him.

text: in imax in short , it 's just as wonderful on the big screen .
translation: Di IMAX dengan ringkas, pengalaman menontonnya di skrin besar juga sangat menakjubkan.
back_translation: At IMAX briefly, the experience of watching it on the big screen is also very amazing.

text: aloof and lacks any real raw emotion , which is fatal for a film that relies on personal relationships .
translation: Menjauh dan kurang memiliki sebarang emosi yang sebenar, ini fatal bagi filem yang bergantung kepada hubungan-hubungan peribadi.
back_translation: Being distant and lacking any real emotion, this is fatal for a film that relies on personal relationships.

text: a member of a vigilante group , fields decides to go undercover with a hidden camera and cross with a group of undocumented immigrants .
translation: Seorang ahli kumpulan pahlawan tempatan, Fields memutuskan untuk menyamar dengan kamera tersembunyi dan bersama dengan kumpulan imigran tanpa dokumen.
back_translation: A local hero group member, Fields, decided to go undercover with a hidden camera along with a group of undocumented immigrants.

text: she 's saving money for a ticket to rome to get out of her life and visit an italian with whom she had a one night stand several months ago .
translation: Dia sedang menyimpan wang untuk mendapatkan tiket ke Rome untuk melarikan diri daripada kehidupannya dan melawat seorang lelaki Itali yang pernah dia lalui hubungan seketika beberapa bulan yang lalu.
back_translation: She is saving money to get a ticket to Rome to escape from her life and visit an Italian man she had a brief relationship with a few months ago.

text: director jay russell weighs down his capricious fairy-tale with heavy sentiment and lightweight meaning .
translation: Pengarah Jay Russell membebani dongengnya yang berubah-ubah dengan sentimen yang berat dan makna yang ringan.
back_translation: Director Jay Russell burdens his ever-changing fable with heavy sentiments and light meanings.

text: tsai ming-liang 's ghosts are painfully aware of their not-being .
translation: Hantu-hantu Tsai Ming-Liang sedar dengan penderitaan tidak kewujudan mereka.
back_translation: Tsai Ming-Liang's ghosts are aware of the suffering of their non-existence.

text: big fat liar is little more than home alone raised to a new , self-deprecating level .
translation: "Big Fat Liar" hanyalah sedikit lebih daripada "Home Alone" yang ditingkatkan kepada tahap yang baru yang mengejek diri sendiri.
back_translation: "Big Fat Liar" is just a little more than an elevated version of "Home Alone" that mocks itself.

text: a woozy , roisterous , exhausting mess , and the off-beat casting of its two leads turns out to be as ill-starred as you might expect .
translation: Satu keadaan berbelit-belit, riuh rendah, penat, dan pemilihan pelakon utamanya yang tidak biasa ternyata sama malangnya seperti yang anda jangkakan.
back_translation: A complicated situation, noisy, tiring, and the unusual choice of the main actor turned out to be as unfortunate as you expected.

text: it has something of the aura of four weddings and a funeral about it , mixed in with a bit of bridget jones 's diary , but the movie 's just too different , too risky for huge popularity .
translation: Ia mempunyai sedikit aura daripada empat perkahwinan dan sebuah pengebumian, dicampur dengan sedikit dari diary bridget jones, tetapi filem ini terlalu berbeza, terlalu berisiko untuk mendapat populariti besar.
back_translation: It has a little touch of four weddings and a funeral, mixed with a bit of Bridget Jones's Diary, but the film is too different, too risky to achieve wide popularity.

text: an indelible and ultimately moving vision of humanity buffeted by the elements and by international political tides .
translation: suatu pandangan tegas dan akhirnya menggerakkan hati mengenai manusia yang terhempas oleh elemen dan oleh ombak politik antarabangsa.
back_translation: a firm stance that eventually moves the hearts of individuals who are battered by elements and by the waves of international politics.

text: during the course of the night each of the friends comes to terms with their lives and relationships and how they are not whom they thought each other was .
translation: Sepanjang malam, setiap kawan sedar akan kehidupan dan hubungan mereka serta bagaimana sesungguhnya mereka tidak seperti yang mereka sangka satu sama lain.
back_translation: Throughout the night, each friend becomes aware of their life and relationships and how they are actually not as they perceived each other.

text: the stakes are high and the characters have to face their fears , their futures and their fellow grads as the game , and their lives , advance towards the climactic ending .
translation: Taruhan sangat tinggi dan watak-watak tersebut harus menghadapi ketakutan mereka, masa depan mereka, dan rakan sekelas mereka ketika permainan, dan kehidupan mereka, menuju kepada kesudahan dramatik.
back_translation: The stakes are very high and the characters must face their fears, their future, and their peers during the game, and their lives, heading towards a dramatic conclusion.

text: this sensitive , smart , savvy , compelling coming-of-age drama delves into the passive-aggressive psychology of co-dependence and the struggle for self-esteem .
translation: Drama tentang kisah memasuki dewasa ini yang sensitif, cerdas, cekap, dan memikat meneliti psikologi pasif-agresif ketergantungan bersama dan perjuangan untuk harga diri.
back_translation: A drama about the sensitive, intelligent, capable, and captivating journey into adulthood that explores the psychology of passive-aggressive codependency and the struggle for self-esteem.

text: the film focuses on the relationships between each of the four people and what happens when an affair takes place between two of them who are not married to each other and logically betraying the two remaining characters .
translation: Filem itu memberi tumpuan kepada hubungan antara setiap daripada empat orang itu dan apa yang berlaku apabila sebuah perselingkuhan berlaku di antara dua daripada mereka yang tidak berkahwin dan secara logiknya mengkhianati dua watak yang lain.
back_translation: The movie focuses on the relationships between each of the four individuals and what happens when an affair occurs between two of the unmarried ones, logically betraying the other two characters.

text: through trial and failures , she teaches him to use the power of eternal souls to solve both his professional and personal problems .
translation: Melalui cubaan dan kegagalan, dia mengajarinya untuk menggunakan kuasa jiwa kekal untuk menyelesaikan masalah profesional dan peribadinya.
back_translation: Through trials and failures, he taught him to use the power of the eternal soul to solve professional and personal problems.

text: impossible as it may sound , this film 's heart is even more embracing than monty , if only because it accepts nasty behavior and severe flaws as part of the human condition .
translation: Walaupun kedengaran mustahil, hati filem ini lebih memeluk daripada Monty, kerana ia menerima tingkah laku buruk dan kelemahan yang teruk sebagai sebahagian daripada keadaan manusia.
back_translation: Although it may sound impossible, the film's heart embraces more than Monty's, as it accepts bad behavior and severe weaknesses as part of the human condition.

text: my oh my , is this an invigorating , electric movie .
translation: Wah, ini filem yang mengasyikkan dan penuh tenaga elektrik.
back_translation: Wow, this movie is exciting and full of electrical energy.

text: the latest vapid actor 's exercise to appropriate the structure of arthur schnitzler 's reigen .
