text: that enemy has developed a `` micro-device `` that can be injected into victims in order to kill them at will .
translation: Musuh itu telah membangunkan "mikro-peranti" yang boleh disuntik ke dalam mangsanya untuk membunuh mereka mengikut kehendak.
back_translation: The enemies have developed "micro-devices" that can be injected into their prey to kill them at will.

text: a dream cast of solid female talent who build a seamless ensemble . there is n't a weak or careless performance amongst them .
translation: sekelompok bakat wanita yang hebat yang membina ansambel yang lancar. Tidak ada persembahan yang lemah atau cuai di kalangan mereka.
back_translation: A group of talented women who build a smooth ensemble. There is no weak or sloppy performance among them.

text: in the process they have tortured villagers and something dreadful happens and rupi disappears .
translation: Dalam proses itu, mereka telah menyiksa penduduk kampung dan sesuatu yang mengerikan berlaku dan Rupi menghilang.
back_translation: In that process, they have tortured the villagers and something terrible happened and Rupi disappeared.

text: the sinister inspiration that fuelled devito 's early work is confused in death to smoochy into something both ugly and mindless .
translation: Inspirasi yang jahat yang menggerakkan karya awal Devito menjadi keliru dalam filem Death to Smoochy menjadi sesuatu yang sama-sama buruk dan tanpa akal.
back_translation: The evil inspiration that drove Devito's early work in the film Death to Smoochy to become misguided turned into something equally bad and senseless.

text: his only-way-out is to create for himself a new identity franklin mann one without the doubt , pain or guilt .
translation: Jalannya satu-satunya ialah dengan menciptakan identiti baru untuk dirinya sendiri, Franklin Mann, tanpa keraguan, kesakitan atau rasa bersalah.
back_translation: The only way is to create a new identity for himself, Franklin Mann, without doubt, pain, or guilt.

text: esha and rahul start a letter based friendship that blossoms into love .
translation: Esha dan Rahul memulakan persahabatan melalui surat yang berkembang menjadi cinta.
back_translation: Esha and Rahul started their friendship through letters that blossomed into love.

text: writer/director steve oedekerk uses contemporary characters and splices them into a 1970s kung-fu film , weaving the new and old together .
translation: Penulis/pengarah Steve Oedekerk menggunakan watak kontemporari dan mencantumkan mereka ke dalam filem kung-fu era 1970-an, menghubungkan yang baru dan lama bersama-sama.
back_translation: Writer/director Steve Oedekerk uses contemporary characters and integrates them into 1970s kung-fu films, connecting the new and old together.

text: i did n't laugh . i did n't smile . i survived .
translation: Saya tidak ketawa. Saya tidak senyum. Saya bertahan.
back_translation: I don't laugh. I don't smile. I persevere.

text: mitch does n't particular like the idea , especially working with his new partner trey sellars ( eddie murphy ) , a cop who spends much of his time mugging for the cameras mounted inside the car he shares with mitch .
translation: Mitch tidak begitu suka dengan idea itu, terutamanya bekerja dengan rakan barunya Trey Sellars (Eddie Murphy), seorang polis yang banyak meluangkan masanya beraksi untuk kamera yang dipasang di dalam kereta yang dikongsi dengan Mitch.
back_translation: Mitch is not very fond of the idea, especially working with his new partner Trey Sellars (Eddie Murphy), a cop who spends a lot of his time performing for the camera installed in the car shared with Mitch.

text: a young couple moves into a neighborhood obsessed with the frightening silent movie history that took place 80 years before .
translation: Se pasangan muda pindah ke sebuah kawasan yang terobsesi dengan sejarah filem senyap menakutkan yang berlaku 80 tahun sebelum ini.
back_translation: A young couple moves to an area obsessed with the scary silent film history that happened 80 years ago.

text: with an expressive face reminiscent of gong li and a vivid personality like zhang ziyi 's , dong stakes out the emotional heart of happy .
translation: Dengan wajah yang ekspresif yang mengingatkan pada Gong Li dan kepribadian yang hidup seperti Zhang Ziyi, Dong menempatkan hati emosional dari ceria.
back_translation: With an expressive face reminiscent of Gong Li and a vivacious personality like Zhang Ziyi, Dong embodies the emotional heart of cheerfulness.

text: ice age is the first computer-generated feature cartoon to feel like other movies , and that makes for some glacial pacing early on .
translation: Zaman Ais merupakan kartun fitur pertama yang dihasilkan oleh komputer yang terasa seperti filem lain, dan itu menghasilkan beberapa kelambatan yang sangat perlahan di awal.
back_translation: The Ice Age era was the first computer-generated feature film that felt like another movie, and it resulted in some very slow delays at the beginning.

text: the film favors the scientific over the spectacular ( visually speaking ) .
translation: Filem tersebut lebih memilih yang saintifik berbanding yang spektakuler (dari segi visual).
back_translation: The film prefers the scientific over the spectacular (in terms of visuals).

text: bennett 's dramatization of her personal descent into post-breakup perdition has a morbid appeal that 's tough to shake .
translation: Dramatisasi Bennett tentang penurunan peribadinya ke dalam ketergelapan selepas putus cinta mempunyai daya tarikan yang kelam yang sukar dilupakan.
back_translation: Bennett's dramatization of his personal descent into darkness after a breakup has a haunting appeal that is hard to forget.

text: emerging from the human psyche and showing characteristics of abstract expressionism , minimalism and russian constructivism , graffiti removal has secured its place in the history of modern art while being created by artists who are unconscious of their artistic achievements .
translation: Graffiti removal telah muncul dari psikologi manusia dan menunjukkan ciri-ciri ekspresionisme abstrak, minimalisme, dan konstruktivisme Rusia. Graffiti removal telah mengukuhkan tempatnya dalam sejarah seni moden sementara dicipta oleh seniman yang tidak sedar akan pencapaian seni mereka.
back_translation: Graffiti removal has emerged from human psychology and shows characteristics of abstract expressionism, minimalism, and Russian constructivism. Graffiti removal has solidified its place in art history while being created by artists who are unaware of their artistic achievements.

text: does an impressive job of relating the complicated history of the war and of filling in the background .
translation: Melakukan kerja yang mengagumkan dalam menceritakan sejarah yang rumit mengenai peperangan dan mengisi latar belakang dengan baik.
back_translation: Do an amazing job in narrating the complicated history of warfare and filling the background well.

text: chabrol ratchets up such a level of suspense -- and huppert gives such a mesmerizingly deadpan performance -- that merci pour le chocolat turns out to be as irresistible as a piece of dark chocolate .
translation: chabrol meningkatkan tahap ketegangan sehingga huppert memberikan persembahan yang begitu memikat dengan tenang yang memukau, sehingga merci pour le chocolat ternyata sama menariknya seperti sekeping coklat hitam.
back_translation: Chabrol increases the level of tension so that Huppert gives such a captivating performance with mesmerizing calmness, making Merci pour le chocolat turned out to be as intriguing as a piece of dark chocolate.

text: when his sister meets a grisly death in san francisco , he goes there to hunt her killer .
translation: Apabila adik perempuannya meninggal dengan cara yang mengerikan di San Francisco, dia pergi ke sana untuk mencari pembunuhnya.
back_translation: When his sister died in a horrific way in San Francisco, he went there to find her killer.

text: in 19th-century new mexico , a father ( tommy lee jones ) comes back home , hoping to reconcile with his adult daughter maggie ( cate blanchett ) .
translation: Pada abad ke-19 di New Mexico, seorang bapa (Tommy Lee Jones) pulang ke rumah, berharap untuk berdamai dengan anak perempuannya yang sudah dewasa, Maggie (Cate Blanchett).
back_translation: In the 19th century in New Mexico, a father (Tommy Lee Jones) returns home, hoping to reconcile with his adult daughter, Maggie (Cate Blanchett).

text: never mind whether you buy the stuff about barris being a cia hit man . the kooky yet shadowy vision clooney sustains throughout is daring , inventive and impressive .
translation: Jangan risau sama ada anda percaya cerita tentang barris sebagai pembunuh CIA. Pandangan yang gila namun misteri yang dihidupkan oleh Clooney sepanjang filem ini berani, kreatif, dan mengagumkan.
back_translation: Don't worry about whether you believe the story about Barry being a CIA assassin. The crazy yet intriguing view brought to life by Clooney throughout the film is bold, creative, and amazing.

text: an arrested drug kingpin is transported by a los angeles police department swat team led by jackson 's character out of the city and into federal custody .
translation: Seorang raja dadah yang ditangkap diangkut oleh pasukan SWAT jabatan polis Los Angeles di bawah pimpinan watak Jackson keluar dari bandar dan diserahkan kepada pihak berkuasa persekutuan.
back_translation: A drug kingpin who was captured was transported by the Los Angeles police SWAT team under the leadership of character Jackson out of the city and handed over to federal authorities.

text: matt , a city boy , island hopping to take in the festival of fire , hears that she has been tricked ; for jake is not dying .
translation: Matt, seorang budak bandar, melintasi pulau untuk menyaksikan festival api, terdengar bahawa dia telah ditipu; kerana Jake sebenarnya tidak sakit.
back_translation: Matt, a city boy, crossed the island to witness the fire festival, only to hear that he had been deceived; because Jake was not actually sick.

text: lanie 's professional success means she must be a failure at life , because she 's driven by ambition and does n't know how to have fun .
translation: Kejayaan profesional Lanie bermakna dia harus gagal dalam hidup, kerana dia digerakkan oleh ambisi dan tidak tahu cara berseronok.
back_translation: Lanie's professional success means she has to fail in life, as she is driven by ambition and doesn't know how to have fun.

text: sam leads the kids in a running battle with the gunmen throughout the school .
translation: Sam memimpin kanak-kanak dalam pertempuran berlari dengan penembak di seluruh sekolah.
back_translation: Sam led the children in a running battle with shooters throughout the school.

text: there 's a disreputable air about the whole thing , and that 's what makes it irresistible .
translation: Terdapat aura yang kurang baik tentang keseluruhan perkara itu, dan itulah yang membuatnya tidak dapat dilepaskan.
back_translation: There is a negative aura surrounding the whole matter, which is what makes it difficult to let go of.

text: unable to get time off work his mother leaves him outside in their garden to avoid him causing trouble .
translation: Tidak dapat mendapatkan cuti dari kerja, ibunya meninggalkannya di luar di halaman rumah untuk mengelakkan dia mencetuskan masalah.
back_translation: Unable to get leave from work, his mother left him outside in the front yard to prevent him from causing trouble.

text: this compelling undercover documentary is not for the faint of heart , taking you deep into a world where very often pain and blood are the price of glory .
translation: Dokumentari sulit ini yang menyamar ini bukan untuk yang lemah semangat, membawa anda ke dalam dunia di mana kesakitan dan darah sering kali menjadi harga kemuliaan.
back_translation: This intense undercover documentary is not for the faint-hearted, taking you into a world where pain and blood often come at a high price of glory.

text: the movie has lots of dancing and fabulous music . there are slow and repetitive parts , but it has just enough spice to keep it interesting .
translation: Filem ini mempunyai banyak tarian dan muzik yang hebat. Walaupun ada bahagian yang perlahan dan berulang, tetapi ia mempunyai bumbu yang mencukupi untuk menjadikannya menarik.
back_translation: This movie has a lot of great dances and music. Although there are slow and repetitive parts, it has enough spice to make it interesting.

text: frank and his sister caroline arrive in mystical attic town where the great syndicate is ruling and robbing the citizens .
translation: Frank dan adik perempuannya, Caroline, tiba di bandar loteng mistik di mana Sindiket Besar menguasai dan merompak penduduk.
back_translation: Frank and his younger sister, Caroline, arrived in the mystical rooftop city where the Big Syndicate rules and robs the residents.

text: no one can guess who the next killer will be or how to break the chain .
translation: Tiada sesiapa yang boleh menebak siapakah pembunuh seterusnya atau bagaimana untuk memutuskan rantaian tersebut.
back_translation: No one can guess who the next killer will be or how to break the chain.

text: that is , until the villainous captain hook mistakes her for wendy and abducts her to never land in an attempt to lure and capture peter pan .
translation: itu berlaku sehingga kapten yang jahat, Hook, tersilap mengambilnya sebagai Wendy dan menculiknya ke Neverland dalam cubaan untuk memikat dan menangkap Peter Pan.
back_translation: This happened until the evil captain, Hook, mistakenly took her for Wendy and kidnapped her to Neverland in an attempt to lure and capture Peter Pan.

text: this familiar rise-and-fall tale is long on glamour and short on larger moralistic consequences , though it 's told with sharp ears and eyes for the tenor of the times .
translation: Kisah naik turun yang akrab ini penuh dengan glamor dan kurang memberi tumpuan kepada akibat moral yang lebih besar, walaupun diceritakan dengan telinga yang tajam dan penglihatan yang tajam terhadap nada zaman.
back_translation: This familiar tale of ups and downs is filled with glamour and less focused on broader moral consequences, even though it is told with keen ears and sharp insight into the tones of the era.

text: it 's an exhilarating blast that makes good use of the large-format screen .
translation: Ini adalah satu pengalaman yang membangkitkan semangat yang mengambil kesempatan daripada skrin besar.
back_translation: This is an inspiring experience that seizes the opportunity from the big screen.

text: when their house is robbed on christmas eve they team up to track him down .
translation: Apabila rumah mereka dirampok pada malam Krismas, mereka bekerjasama untuk menjejaki pencuri tersebut.
back_translation: When their house was robbed on Christmas night, they worked together to track down the thief.

text: ao sair do cinema , eu estava feliz e com saudades de um tempo em que , para mim , a existM-jncia de papai noel era um fato inquestionM-avel .
translation: Apabila keluar dari panggung wayang, saya bahagia dan merindukan masa di mana, bagi saya, kewujudan Santa Claus adalah suatu keniscayaan yang tidak diragukan.
back_translation: When I leave the cinema, I am happy and long for the time when, for me, the existence of Santa Claus was an unquestionable certainty.

text: isabel ( rica ) and clara ( maui ) , two childhood friends separated by fate .
translation: Isabel (rica) dan Clara (Maui), dua sahabat karib yang dipisahkan oleh takdir.
back_translation: Isabel (rica) and Clara (Maui), two close friends separated by fate.

text: he is almost to school when a red neck attacks him .
translation: Dia hampir tiba di sekolah apabila seorang lelaki bertudung merah menyerangnya.
back_translation: He was almost at school when a man in a red headscarf attacked him.

text: an ambitious , guilt-suffused melodrama crippled by poor casting .
translation: sebuah melodrama yang ambisius dan diperlengkap dengan rasa bersalah yang terjejas oleh pemilihan pelakon yang buruk.
back_translation: An ambitious melodrama that is enhanced by a sense of guilt but marred by poor casting choices.

text: stiles takes red green and the other lodge members to court , forcing them to come up with $ 10 , 000 in damages in ten days - or else lose their beloved possum lodge .
translation: Stiles membawa ahli-ahli kediaman merah hijau dan yang lain ke mahkamah, memaksa mereka untuk membayar $10,000 sebagai ganti rugi dalam masa sepuluh hari - atau mereka akan kehilangan kediaman opossum tercinta mereka.
back_translation: Stiles brings the green and red residence members and others to court, forcing them to pay $10,000 as compensation within ten days - or they will lose their beloved opossum residence.

text: their timing and desperate behavior trigger a horror so powerful , no six-shooter can put a dent in it .
translation: Kelakuan mereka yang sewaktu dan bertindak secara putus asa mencetuskan satu kengerian yang begitu kuat, sehingga tidak ada pistol enam laras pun yang mampu mengatasi hal itu.
back_translation: Their erratic behavior and acting in desperation triggered a horror so strong that not even a six-barreled pistol could overcome it.

text: he falls in love with christine and wants her for his own , but she only has eyes for raoul viscount de chagny .
translation: Dia jatuh cinta dengan Christine dan menginginkannya untuk dirinya sendiri, tetapi dia hanya memiliki hati untuk Raoul Viscount de Chagny.
back_translation: He fell in love with Christine and wanted her for himself, but she only had her heart for Raoul Viscount de Chagny.

text: a frustrated businessman , jeffery goldman ( john pankow ) tries to end his hopeless marriage to wife , ellen ( rebecca pidgeon ) by asking his local rabbi ( eli wallach ) to place a curse on her .
translation: Seorang ahli perniagaan yang frustrasi, Jeffery Goldman (John Pankow) cuba mengakhiri perkahwinan yang tidak berharap dengan isterinya, Ellen (Rebecca Pidgeon) dengan meminta rabi tempatannya (Eli Wallach) untuk melontarkan kutukan ke atasnya.
back_translation: A frustrated businessman, Jeffery Goldman (John Pankow) tries to end his unhappy marriage with his wife, Ellen (Rebecca Pidgeon) by asking his local rabbi (Eli Wallach) to curse her.

text: now pistachio must make the most of his inherited power in an attempt to track down devilin and save his parents .
translation: Sekarang, pistachio harus memanfaatkan kekuatan yang diwarisinya untuk mencari devilin dan menyelamatkan orang tuanya.
back_translation: Now, pistachio must use the power inherited to find devilin and save his parents.

text: woo 's fights have a distinct flair . his warriors collide in balletic explosion that implies an underlying order throughout the chaos .
translation: Pertarungan Woo memiliki gaya yang unik. Para pejuangnya bertabrakan dalam ledakan yang berballetik yang mengimplikasikan ketertiban yang mendasari sepanjang kekacauan.
back_translation: Woo's battle has a unique style. Its fighters clash in balletic explosions that imply an underlying order amidst the chaos.

text: there are plot holes big enough for shamu the killer whale to swim through .
translation: Terlalu banyak lubang plot yang besar sehingga Shamu, paus pembunuh, boleh berenang melaluinya.
back_translation: There are too many gaping plot holes that Shamu, the killer whale, can swim through.

text: we never truly come to care about the main characters and whether or not they 'll wind up together , and michele 's spiritual quest is neither amusing nor dramatic enough to sustain interest .
translation: Kita tidak benar-benar menjadi prihatin tentang watak utama dan sama ada mereka akan berakhir bersama, dan pencarian spiritual michele tidak cukup menghiburkan atau dramatik untuk mengekalkan minat.
back_translation: We are not really concerned about the main characters and whether they will end up together, and Michele's spiritual quest is not quite entertaining or dramatic enough to sustain interest.

text: toula portokalos is 30 , greek , and works in her family 's restaurant , dancing zorba 's , in chicago .
translation: Toula Portokalos berumur 30 tahun, orang Greek, dan bekerja di restoran keluarganya, Dancing Zorba's, di Chicago.
back_translation: Toula Portokalos is 30 years old, Greek, and works at her family's restaurant, Dancing Zorba's, in Chicago.

text: birthday girl does n't try to surprise us with plot twists , but rather seems to enjoy its own transparency .
translation: Gadis hari jadi itu tidak cuba mengejutkan kita dengan plot twist, tetapi lebih suka menikmati ketelusurannya sendiri.
back_translation: The birthday girl didn't try to surprise us with a plot twist, but preferred to enjoy her own journey.

text: lost and stranded , they are set upon by a bizarre family of psychotics .
translation: Hilang dan terdampar, mereka diserang oleh sebuah keluarga aneh yang psikotik.
back_translation: Lost and stranded, they were attacked by a strange and psychotic family.

text: their only common bond is the vague promise of riches at the end of their journey as they try to stay one step ahead of santiago , a violent gangster out for their blood and gaining on them all the time .
translation: Satu-satunya ikatan bersama mereka hanyalah janji samar kekayaan di hujung perjalanan mereka sementara mereka cuba untuk terus selangkah di hadapan Santiago, seorang gangster ganas yang mengincar nyawa mereka dan semakin mendekati mereka sepanjang masa.
back_translation: The only bond between them is a vague promise of wealth at the end of their journey as they try to stay one step ahead of Santiago, a ruthless gangster who is after their lives and getting closer to them at all times.

text: shane bradley , who is fixated on ideas of luck and destiny , tries to win the girl of his dreams .
translation: Shane Bradley, yang terpaku pada idea keberuntungan dan takdir, cuba untuk memenangi gadis impiannya.
back_translation: Shane Bradley, who is fixated on the idea of luck and destiny, tries to win over his dream girl.

text: surrounded by a bevy of adoring but completely wrong for her men ( and one dead girl from manchester ) , chance has to pick her way through her messy life in order to figure out which guy is `` it `` .
translation: Dikelilingi oleh segelintir lelaki yang penuh kasih sayang tetapi tidak sesuai untuknya (dan seorang gadis mati dari Manchester), Chance terpaksa mengembara dalam kehidupannya yang bersepah untuk mencari tahu lelaki yang sesuai untuknya.
back_translation: Surrounded by a handful of men full of love but not suitable for her (and a dead girl from Manchester), Chance is forced to wander through her messy life to find out the right man for her.

text: a recent favourite at sundance , this white-trash satire will inspire the affection of even those unlucky people who never owned a cassette of def leppard 's pyromania .
translation: Sebuah filem kegemaran baru di Sundance, satira masyarakat kelas bawahan ini akan menginspirasikan kasih sayang, bahkan kepada orang yang malang yang tidak pernah memiliki kaset Def Leppard's Pyromania.
back_translation: A new favorite film at Sundance, this satire of the lower class community will inspire compassion, even towards the unfortunate ones who never owned a cassette of Def Leppard's Pyromania.

text: si el siglo xxi necesita de hM-iroes , el hombre araM-qa parece haber llegado para quedarse .
translation: Jika abad ke-21 memerlukan wira, manusia Arah M-Qa nampaknya sudah tiba untuk tinggal.
back_translation: If the 21st century requires heroes, the people of Arah M-Qa seem to have arrived to stay.

text: cho 's fans are sure to be entertained ; it 's only fair in the interest of full disclosure to say that -- on the basis of this film alone -- i 'm not one of them .
translation: Peminat-peminat Cho pasti akan terhibur; adalah hanya adil dalam kepentingan pendedahan penuh untuk mengatakan bahawa - atas dasar filem ini sahaja - saya bukan salah seorang dari mereka.
back_translation: Cho's fans will surely be entertained; it is only fair in the interest of full disclosure to say that - based on this film alone - I am not one of them.

text: not even steven spielberg has dreamed up such blatant and sickening product placement in a movie .
translation: Tidak pun Steven Spielberg pernah memikirkan penempatan produk yang begitu nyata dan menjijikkan dalam filem.
back_translation: Not even Steven Spielberg has ever considered such a real and disgusting product placement in a movie.

text: hoping to win prize money offered by a local band contest , dewey forms a rock band with the kids in the class .
translation: Dengan harapan untuk memenangi wang hadiah yang ditawarkan oleh pertandingan band tempatan, Dewey membentuk sebuah kumpulan rock dengan kanak-kanak dalam kelas.
back_translation: With hopes of winning the prize money offered by the local band competition, Dewey formed a rock group with kids in the class.

text: the documentary weaves verite rehearsal , interviews , rare holocaust footage , and performances into a revelation of the creative process .
translation: Dokumentari menggabungkan latihan verite, temubual, rakaman jarang Holocaust, dan persembahan menjadi pendedahan proses kreatif.
back_translation: The documentary combines cinema verite training, interviews, rare Holocaust recordings, and performances to reveal the creative process.

text: he moves around the urban landscape from park bench to bus bench with his best friend , an aging dog named bones .
translation: Dia bergerak di sekitar landskap bandar dari bangku taman ke bangku bas dengan sahabat baiknya, seekor anjing tua yang bernama Bones.
back_translation: He navigates around the cityscape from park benches to bus benches with his good friend, an old dog named Bones.

text: she sets out to strike down her once fellow assassins , leaving bill for last .
translation: Dia berusaha untuk menjatuhkan bekas rakan pembunuhnya, meninggalkan Bill untuk yang terakhir.
back_translation: He is trying to bring down his former colleague and killer, leaving Bill for the last.

text: benigni 's pinocchio is extremely straight and mind-numbingly stilted , its episodic pacing keeping the film from developing any storytelling flow .
translation: Filem Pinokio arahan Benigni sangat lurus dan membosankan, dengan rentak episodiknya menghalang filem itu daripada mengembangkan aliran penceritaan.
back_translation: Benigni's direction of the film Pinocchio is very straightforward and boring, with its episodic pace hindering the film from developing a flowing narrative.

text: it certainly wo n't win any awards in the plot department but it sets out with no pretensions and delivers big time .
translation: Ia pasti tidak akan memenangi sebarang anugerah dalam bahagian plot tetapi ia bermula tanpa pretensi dan memberikan hasil yang besar.
back_translation: It surely won't win any awards in the plot department, but it starts without pretense and delivers great results.

text: though an important political documentary , this does not really make the case the kissinger should be tried as a war criminal .
translation: Walaupun merupakan sebuah dokumentari politik yang penting, ini sebenarnya tidak membuktikan bahawa Kissinger sepatutnya diadili sebagai penjenayah perang.
back_translation: Although it is an important political documentary, it does not actually prove that Kissinger should be prosecuted as a war criminal.

text: benefits from a strong performance from zhao , but it 's dong jie 's face you remember at the end .
translation: Manfaat dari penampilan hebat Zhao, tetapi wajah Dong Jie lah yang kamu ingat pada akhirnya.
back_translation: The benefit of Zhao's great performance, but it's Dong Jie's face that you remember in the end.

text: the story follows a year in the life of the hemples , a family that takes home schooling to an extreme - and has for generations .
translation: Cerita ini mengikuti setahun dalam kehidupan keluarga Hemples, sebuah keluarga yang membawa pendidikan di rumah ke tahap yang ekstrem - dan sudah berlangsung selama beberapa generasi.
back_translation: This story follows a year in the life of the Hemples family, a family that takes homeschooling to an extreme level - and has been doing so for several generations.

text: until now , zak gibbs ' greatest challenge has been finding a way to buy a car .
translation: Sehingga kini, cabaran terbesar Zak Gibbs ialah mencari cara untuk membeli kereta.
back_translation: Until now, Zak Gibbs's biggest challenge is finding a way to buy a car.

text: and while ingrid 's gift is to give astrid the power to survive , astrid 's gift is to teach her mother about love .
translation: dan sementara hadiah Ingrid adalah memberikan kekuatan kepada Astrid untuk bertahan, hadiah Astrid adalah mengajarkan ibunya tentang cinta.
back_translation: and while Ingrid's gift is to give strength to Astrid to survive, Astrid's gift is to teach her mother about love.

text: the bottom line with nemesis is the same as it has been with all the films in the series : fans will undoubtedly enjoy it , and the uncommitted need n't waste their time on it .
translation: Apabila berurusan dengan Nemesis, situasinya sama seperti filem-filem dalam siri tersebut: peminat pasti akan menikmatinya, manakala yang tidak pasti tidak perlu menyia-nyiakan masa mereka untuk menontonnya.
back_translation: When dealing with Nemesis, the situation is just like the movies in the series: fans will surely enjoy it, while those who are not fans do not need to waste their time watching it.

text: raimi crafted a complicated hero who is a welcome relief from the usual two-dimensional offerings .

text: igby slocumb , a rebellious and sarcastic seventeen year-old boy , is at war with the oppressive world of his east coast `` old money `` family .
translation: Igby Slocumb, seorang remaja lelaki berusia tujuh belas tahun yang pemberontak dan sinis, berperang dengan dunia yang menindas keluarga "wang lama" pantai timurnya.

text: if you liked the 1982 film then , you 'll still like it now .
translation: Jika anda suka filem tahun 1982 itu, anda masih akan suka filem tersebut sekarang.

text: as fate would have it , they realize how close they all are from the other side ; of life , of love , and of losing it .

text: britney spears ' phoniness is nothing compared to the movie 's contrived , lame screenplay and listless direction .
translation: Kedustaan Britney Spears tidak berbanding dengan lakon layar yang dipaksakan dan lemah serta arahan yang lesu dalam filem tersebut.
back_translation: The falsehood of Britney Spears does not compare to the forced and weak acting as well as the lackluster direction in the film.

text: . . . the first 2/3 of the film are incredibly captivating and insanely funny , thanks in part to interesting cinematic devices ( cool visual backmasking ) , a solid cast , and some wickedly sick and twisted humor . . .
translation: . . . dua pertiga pertama filem itu sangat memukau dan sangat lucu, tidak terlepas dari sebahagian daripada peranti sinematik yang menarik (backmasking visual yang seronok), barisan pelakon yang kukuh, dan humor yang sangat gila dan tersimpang . . .
back_translation: . . . the first two-thirds of the film were very captivating and hilarious, thanks to some interesting cinematic devices (enjoyable visual backmasking), a strong cast, and incredibly crazy and offbeat humor . . .

text: the real reason to see runteldat is to watch lawrence deploy his deep and wide powers of empathy to depict such diverse experiences as childbirth , breast-feeding and recovering from illness .
translation: Sebab sebenar untuk menonton runteldat adalah untuk melihat Lawrence menggunakan kuasa simpati yang mendalam dan luas beliau untuk menggambarkan pengalaman yang pelbagai seperti kelahiran anak, penyusuan susu ibu, dan pemulihan dari penyakit.
back_translation: The real reason for watching runteldat is to see Lawrence using his profound and extensive empathy to depict various experiences such as childbirth, breastfeeding, and recovery from illness.

text: that all changes when a teammate is mysteriously stabbed during a ball field brawl .
translation: Semuanya berubah apabila seorang rakan pasukan secara misteri disambar semasa pergaduhan di padang bola.

text: go for la salle 's performance , and make do as best you can with a stuttering script .

text: deacon , matt and fred will do anything for even a glimpse of sex and spend their mornings pirating porno movies from fred 's after school job at the video store .

back_translation: Deacon, Matt, and Fred are willing to do anything just to steal a glance of sex and spend their mornings recording porn films from Fred's after-school job at the video store.

text: despite its dry wit and compassion , the film suffers from a philosophical emptiness and maddeningly sedate pacing .
translation: Walaupun memiliki kebijaksanaan yang kering dan belas kasihan, filem ini mengalami kekosongan falsafah dan kelajuan yang sangat tenang yang membingitkan.

text: he is sensitive and compassionate , speaks french fluently , is passionate about voltaire , and thinks the feature that tells the most about a woman is her hands .

back_translation: He is sensitive and compassionate, fluent in French, passionate about Voltaire, and believes that a defining feature of a woman is her hands.

text: seemingly a vehicle to showcase the canadian 's inane ramblings , stealing harvard is a smorgasbord of soliloquies about nothing delivered by the former mr . drew barrymore .
translation: Bermula sebagai kenderaan untuk mempersembahkan wacana yang tidak penting dari Kanada, Stealing Harvard adalah satu majlis makanan yang penuh dengan monolog tentang tiada apa yang disampaikan oleh bekas Mr. Drew Barrymore.
back_translation: Starting as a vehicle to present irrelevant discourses from Canada, Stealing Harvard is a food event filled with monologues about nothing conveyed by former Mr. Drew Barrymore.

text: while awaiting trial , zoe is confined to house arrest , where she alternates falling in love with her frequent visitor and parole officer , daly , and trying to prove her innocence to regain her life and freedom .

back_translation: While awaiting trial, Zoe is bound by house arrest, where she takes turns falling in love with her frequent guests and parole officer, Daly, and tries to prove her bravery to regain her life and freedom.

text: heartwarming and gently comic even as the film breaks your heart .
translation: Menghangatkan hati dan sedikit lucu walaupun filem itu memecahkan hati anda.
back_translation: It warms the heart and is slightly funny even though the movie breaks your heart.

text: the film uses chapman 's own unseen personal papers and unpublished memoirs in order to recreate his years at cambridge university , medical school , the monty python years , his struggles with alcohol , his ground-breaking stance on homosexuality , his exploits with john cleese , keith moon , harry nilsson , ringo starr , and his untimely death at age 48 , of cancer .
translation: Filem itu menggunakan kertas peribadi yang tidak pernah dilihat dan memoar yang belum diterbitkan milik Chapman untuk mencipta semula tahun-tahunnya di Universiti Cambridge, sekolah perubatan, tahun-tahun Monty Python, perjuangannya dengan alkohol, pendiriannya yang tertentu tentang homoseksualiti, pengalaman bersama John Cleese, Keith Moon, Harry Nilsson, Ringo Starr, dan kematian mendadaknya pada usia 48, akibat kanser.
back_translation: The film uses Chapman's unseen personal papers and unpublished memoir to recreate his years at the University of Cambridge, medical school, Monty Python years, struggles with alcohol, his particular stance on homosexuality, experiences with John Cleese, Keith Moon, Harry Nilsson, Ringo Starr, and his sudden death at the age of 48 due to cancer.

text: insomnia does not become one of those rare remakes to eclipse the original , but it does n't disgrace it , either .
translation: Insomnia tidak menjadi salah satu daripada pembuatan semula yang jarang untuk melampaui asalnya, tetapi ia juga tidak menghina, sama sekali.
back_translation: Insomnia is not one of the infrequent remakes that often surpasses the original, but it is also not insulting, at all.

text: blue crush follows the formula , but throws in too many conflicts to keep the story compelling .
translation: Blue Crush mengikut formula, tetapi memasukkan terlalu banyak konflik untuk menjadikan cerita tersebut menarik.
back_translation: Blue Crush follows the formula but adds too many conflicts to make the story interesting.

text: however tina disregards him and chooses not to respond to his first e-mail , in turn pooja decides to keep in touch with him but signs under tina 's name .

back_translation: However, Tina ignored it and chose not to reply to her first email; instead, Pooja decided to stay in touch with her but signed off with the name Tina.

text: it 's hard not to feel you 've just watched a feature-length video game with some really heavy back story .

text: there is a secret test hidden with in the sat .

text: `` it 's said that only love can save them from disgrace , but that 's crap .
translation: "Katanya hanya cinta yang boleh menyelamatkan mereka dari malu, tetapi itu omong kosong."

text: a film that takes you inside the rhythms of its subject : you experience it as you watch .
translation: filem yang membawa anda ke dalam irama subjeknya: anda mengalaminya semasa menonton.

text: here she encounters the menacing dennis betts ( clive russell ) and in an attempt to flee from him , she & # 237 ; s forced to hide in a car belonging to daniel stone ( douglas henshall ) , a hospital porter .
translation: Di sini dia bertemu dengan Dennis Betts yang mengancam (diperankan oleh Clive Russell) dan cuba melarikan diri daripadanya, dia terpaksa bersembunyi dalam kereta milik Daniel Stone (diperankan oleh Douglas Henshall), seorang pembawa di hospital.
back_translation: Here he meets Dennis Betts, who threatens him (played by Clive Russell) and tries to escape from him, he has to hide in the car of Daniel Stone (played by Douglas Henshall), a porter at the hospital.

text: . . . an enjoyably frothy 'date movie ' . . .
translation: . . . sebuah filem 'kencan' yang seronok dan ringan . . .

text: daria 's boys are : dante , who owns some of the hottest clubs in the city and believes monogamy is a dirty word , unless he 's being cheated on .
translation: Anak-anak lelaki Daria adalah: Dante, yang memiliki beberapa kelab paling panas di bandar dan percaya monogami adalah perkataan kotor, kecuali jika dia sedang ditipu.
back_translation: Daria's sons are: Dante, who owns some of the hottest clubs in town and believes monogamy is a dirty word, unless he's being cheated on.

text: quietly pulls you into its sun drenched style of american gothic in the heartland
translation: dengan diam membawa anda ke gaya amerika gothic yang disinari matahari di tengah benua tanah air
back_translation: silently transport you to the American gothic style illuminated by the sun in the heart of the homeland continent

text: now , johnny and lena ( wayne 's girlfriend ) are asked to make the ultimate baby product , called mighty baby .
translation: Sekarang, Johnny dan Lena (pacar Wayne) diminta untuk membuat produk bayi yang hebat, yang dinamakan Mighty Baby.

text: for the first time in several years , mr . allen has surpassed himself with the magic he 's spun with the hollywood empress of ms . leoni 's ellie .

text: it 's all going well for the very single eleanor , until she realizes it 's all a ruse .
translation: Semuanya berjalan lancar bagi Eleanor yang sangat single, sehingga dia sedar semuanya hanyalah tipu daya.

text: the characters struggle to find love in a world that no longer needs sex to reproduce , a world that is changing and is populated with people who use provisional identities and are seen through virtual selves and a world where love is the only thing that makes things real .
translation: Watak-watak bergelut untuk mencari cinta dalam dunia yang tidak lagi memerlukan seks untuk membiak, sebuah dunia yang berubah dan dihuni oleh orang-orang yang menggunakan identiti sementara dan dilihat melalui diri maya dan sebuah dunia di mana cinta adalah satu-satunya perkara yang menjadikan segala-gala menjadi nyata.
back_translation: Characters struggle to find love in a world that no longer requires sex for procreation, a world that has changed and is inhabited by people using temporary identities viewed through the digital self, a world where love is the only thing that makes everything real.

text: talk to her is excellent movie-making and much of it is wondrous , but my conscience wo n't allow me to be devoted to unconditionally singing its praises .
translation: Berbicara padanya adalah pembuatan filem yang sangat baik dan sebahagian besarnya adalah menakjubkan, tetapi hati nurani saya tidak membenarkan saya untuk dengan sepenuh hati memujiinya tanpa syarat.
back_translation: Speaking of him is making a very good movie and most of it is amazing, but my conscience does not allow me to wholeheartedly praise him unconditionally.

text: the story of two lads from belfast as they stumble their way through the london gay underworld in search of 'gainful employment ' .
translation: kisah dua pemuda dari Belfast yang tersesat di bawah dunia gay London dalam mencari 'pekerjaan yang mendatangkan keuntungan'.
back_translation: The story of two young men from Belfast who got lost in the underground gay world of London while searching for 'profitable jobs'.

text: as a revenge thriller , the movie is serviceable , but it does n't really deliver the delicious guilty pleasure of the better film versions .
translation: Sebagai filem pembalasan, filem ini memadai, tetapi ia tidak benar-benar memberikan keseronokan bersalah yang lazat seperti versi filem yang lebih baik.
back_translation: As a revenge film, this movie is adequate, but it doesn't really provide the guilty pleasure enjoyment like the better version of the film.

text: another in-your-face wallow in the lower depths made by people who have never sung those blues .
translation: Satu lagi dedahan yang jelas dilakukan oleh orang-orang yang tidak pernah merasai penderitaan tersebut.
back_translation: Another clear exposure made by those who have never experienced the suffering.

text: when the switchblade , the most sophisticated prototype stealth fighter created yet , is stolen from the u . s . government , one of the united states ' top spies , alex scott ( owen wilson ) , is called to action .
translation: Apabila Switchblade, pesawat pejuang senyap prototaip yang paling canggih dicipta, dicuri dari kerajaan AS, salah satu perisik terbaik Amerika Syarikat, Alex Scott (Owen Wilson), dipanggil untuk bertindak.
back_translation: When the Switchblade, the most advanced prototype stealth fighter jet, is stolen from the US government, one of America's best spies, Alex Scott (Owen Wilson), is called to take action.

text: as they used to say in the 1950s sci-fi movies , signs is a tribute to shyamalan 's gifts , which are such that we 'll keep watching the skies for his next project .
translation: Seperti yang selalu dikatakan dalam filem sains fiksyen tahun 1950-an, "Signs" adalah penghormatan kepada bakat Shyamalan, yang begitu hebat sehingga kita terus menantikan projek seterusnya daripadanya.
back_translation: As always said in the science fiction films of the 1950s, "Signs" is a tribute to Shyamalan's talent, which is so great that we always look forward to his next projects.

text: spellbound by the rich and mysterious world manuela has shown him , his idyll is shattered when the reality of why he 's there comes crashing down around him .
translation: Terpesona oleh dunia yang kaya dan misteri yang ditunjukkan oleh manuela padanya, idilanya hancur ketika realiti sebab dia berada di situ tiba-tiba menimpa dia.
back_translation: Fascinated by the rich and mysterious world revealed by Manuela to her, her idealism was shattered when reality suddenly hit her.

text: during the course of the story we also learn that his father died at age 40 ; and now , as jones approaches his 40th birthday , he suffers from `` survivor 's guilt . ``
translation: Semasa berlangsungnya cerita, kita juga mengetahui bahawa bapanya meninggal pada usia 40 tahun; dan kini, apabila Jones hampir mencapai ulang tahun ke-40, beliau mengalami "rasa bersalah kerana hidup."
back_translation: During the course of the story, we also learn that his father passed away at the age of 40; and now, as Jones is approaching his 40th birthday, he is experiencing a "guilt for living."

text: her stalker looks threatening but his manner seems to suggest that he is just a confused social outcast , trapped in an obsessive , repetitive rut that revolves around anna .
translation: Pematahannya kelihatan menakutkan tetapi sikapnya menunjukkan bahawa dia hanyalah seorang yang terpinggir sosial yang keliru, terperangkap dalam rutin yang obsesif dan berulang yang mengenai Anna.
back_translation: His breakdown looks frightening but his attitude shows that he is just a socially marginalized individual who is confused, trapped in an obsessive and repetitive routine involving Anna.

text: the cumulative effect of the movie is repulsive and depressing .
translation: Kesan kumulatif filem ini menjijikkan dan memurunkan semangat.

text: insomnia is one of the year 's best films and pacino gives one of his most daring , and complicated , performances .
translation: Insomnia adalah salah satu filem terbaik tahun ini dan Pacino memberikan salah satu persembahan terberani dan rumit.

text: the heart of the film is the drop dead sexy drea de matteo who , as the mother and real head of the family , commands every scene .
translation: Jantung filem tersebut adalah Drea De Matteo yang menawan dan memerintah setiap adegan sebagai ibu sebenar dan ketua keluarga.

text: he is under the impression that rupi is dead .
translation: Dia menganggap bahawa rupi telah meninggal.

text: in the affable maid in manhattan , jennifer lopez 's most aggressive and most sincere attempt to take movies by storm , the diva shrewdly surrounds herself with a company of strictly a-list players .
translation: Dalam filem yang mesra Maid in Manhattan, percubaan paling agresif dan paling jujur Jennifer Lopez untuk meraih kejayaan dalam filem, diva itu bijak mengelilingi dirinya dengan kumpulan pelakon daripada golongan A-list.
back_translation: In the heartwarming film Maid in Manhattan, Jennifer Lopez's most aggressive and honest attempt to achieve success in the film, the diva smartly surrounds herself with a group of A-list actors.

text: what makes blade 2 marginally better than blade , especially if you thought the first was a hollow spectacle ? it has a plot .
translation: Apa yang membuat Blade 2 sedikit lebih baik daripada Blade, terutamanya jika anda berpendapat bahawa yang pertama hanyalah satu persembahan kosong? Ia mempunyai plot.
back_translation: What makes Blade 2 slightly better than Blade, especially if you think the first one was just an empty spectacle? It has a plot.

text: each weekend they come back with nothing but a hangover .
translation: Setiap hujung minggu mereka pulang tanpa apa-apa selain rasa mabuk.

text: she wants justice and will do anything to get it .
translation: Dia mahu keadilan dan akan melakukan apa saja untuk mendapatkannya.
back_translation: He wants justice and will do anything to get it.

translation: Selepas pertemuan kebetulan di teater, dua lelaki, Benigno dan Marco, bertemu di sebuah klinik swasta tempat Benigno bekerja.
back_translation: After a chance encounter at the theater, two men, Benigno and Marco, meet at a private clinic where Benigno works.

text: that haynes can both maintain and dismantle the facades that his genre and his character construct is a wonderous accomplishment of veracity and narrative grace .
translation: bahawa Haynes boleh sama-sama menyelenggara dan membongkar tirai yang genre dan karakternya bina merupakan satu pencapaian yang mengagumkan dalam kebenaran dan keanggunan naratif.
back_translation: That Haynes can both maintain and dismantle the curtains that the genre and character he builds are truly an impressive achievement in truth and narrative elegance.

text: police and investigators believed the murders were in retaliation for a robbery days prior to the murders .
translation: Polis dan penyiasat percaya pembunuhan itu adalah sebagai pembalasan bagi satu rompakan beberapa hari sebelum pembunuhan.

text: a canny , derivative , wildly gruesome portrait of a london sociopath who 's the scariest of sadists .
translation: potret seorang sosiopat London yang licik, turunan, dan sangat mengerikan yang merupakan sadis yang paling menakutkan.
back_translation: A cunning, manipulative, and extremely terrifying portrait of a sociopathic Londoner who is the most frightening sadist.

text: well made but uninvolving , bloodwork is n't a terrible movie , just a stultifyingly obvious one -- an unrewarding collar for a murder mystery .
translation: Baik dibuat tetapi tidak melibatkan, Bloodwork bukan filem yang teruk, hanya satu yang jelas membosankan - tidak memberi ganjaran untuk pertanyaan pembunuhan.
back_translation: Well made but not engaging, Bloodwork is not a terrible film, just one that is clearly boring - does not reward the murder mystery questions.

text: like it or not , anne marie starts losing her balance - and finding it - as she falls for matt .
translation: Suka atau tidak, Anne Marie mula kehilangan keseimbangannya - serta menemukannya - ketika dia jatuh cinta pada Matt.

text: this is an ungainly movie , ill-fitting , with its elbows sticking out where the knees should be .
translation: Filem ini tidak kemas, tidak sesuai, dengan siku-siku tersepit di mana sepatutnya lutut berada.
back_translation: This film is messy, inappropriate, with elbows jammed where the knees should be.

text: jason must get back , therefore he gets a new and unique mask , and goes after the kids of elm street .
translation: Jason harus kembali, oleh itu dia mendapatkan topeng baru dan unik, dan pergi mengejar kanak-kanak di Elm Street.

text: tam & # 225 ; s is a young , budapest-based director of video clips and commercials who dreams of directing his first feature film with the title 'the guilty city ' .

text: try as you might to scrutinize the ethics of kaufman 's approach , somehow it all comes together to create a very compelling , sensitive , intelligent and almost cohesive piece of film entertainment .
translation: Cuba sebaik mungkin untuk mengkaji etika pendekatan Kaufman, namun entah bagaimana semuanya berjaya bersatu untuk mencipta sebuah hasil filem yang sangat menarik, sensitif, pintar, dan hampir padu.
back_translation: Try as best as possible to study Kaufman's approach to ethics, but somehow everything successfully comes together to create a film that is very interesting, sensitive, intelligent, and almost cohesive.

text: a young great gatsbyish hip hopper named summer g falls for a middle to upper class sister while in college .
translation: Seorang pemuda hip hop bernama summer g yang bergaya seperti Great Gatsby jatuh cinta kepada seorang kakak perempuan dari golongan kelas menengah hingga atas semasa di universiti.
back_translation: A hip hop youth named Summer G, who styles himself like the Great Gatsby, falls in love with an older sister from the upper middle to upper class while in university.

text: in addition to hoffman 's powerful acting clinic , this is that rare drama that offers a thoughtful and rewarding glimpse into the sort of heartache everyone has felt , or will feel someday .
translation: Selain daripada kelas lakonan yang hebat oleh Hoffman, ini adalah drama yang jarang terjadi yang memberikan pandangan yang berfikiran dan memuaskan kepada kesedihan yang sudah pernah dirasai oleh setiap orang, atau akan dirasai suatu hari nanti.
back_translation: Apart from Hoffman's great acting class, this is a rare drama that provides a thoughtful and satisfying view of the sadness experienced by everyone, or will experience one day.

text: and with the birth of tiz 's son , it becomes unavoidably evident that tiz 's fate and his hopes for success involve far more than just his own happiness .
translation: Dan dengan kelahiran anak lelaki Tiz, menjadi jelas dengan tidak dapat dielakkan bahawa nasib Tiz dan harapannya untuk berjaya melibatkan jauh lebih daripada sekadar kebahagiaannya sendiri.
back_translation: And with the birth of Tiz's son, it becomes evident and unavoidable that Tiz's fate and hopes for success involve far more than just his own happiness.

text: imamura 's delight in the infinite oddity of men and women is goofy ; it 's also , at heart , reverent .
translation: Kesenangan Imamura terhadap keanehan yang tak terbatas dalam lelaki dan wanita adalah lucu; juga, pada dasarnya, penuh penghormatan.
back_translation: Imamura's amusement at the boundless peculiarities in men and women is humorous; also, fundamentally, full of respect.

text: halpern and rolov follow three young men : 23-year old straight-laced circuit virgin , brandon ; 21-year old party boy with a drug problem , tone ; and sensitive but strong-willed 19-year old , jon .
translation: Halpern dan Rolov mengikuti tiga orang lelaki muda: Brandon, 23 tahun, yang lurus dan sopan; Tone, 21 tahun, yang suka berpesta dan memiliki masalah dadah; dan Jon, 19 tahun, yang peka tetapi berpendirian kuat.
back_translation: Halpern and Rolov follow three young men: Brandon, 23, who is straight and polite; Tone, 21, who enjoys partying and has drug problems; and Jon, 19, who is sensitive but strong-willed.

text: the fight scenes are fun , but it grows tedious .
translation: Pertarungan-pertarungan itu menyeronokkan, tetapi menjadi membosankan.
back_translation: Those fights were fun, but they became boring.

text: guns , money , and a chance at paradise . . .
translation: senjata, wang, dan peluang ke syurga...
back_translation: weapons, money, and chances to paradise...

text: its weighty themes are too grave for youngsters , but the story is too steeped in fairy tales and other childish things to appeal much to teenagers .
translation: Tema-temanya yang berat terlalu serius untuk kanak-kanak, tetapi ceritanya terlalu berunsur dongeng dan perkara kanak-kanak untuk menarik remaja.
back_translation: The themes are too heavy for children, but the story is too much like a fairy tale and child-related matters to appeal to teenagers.

text: with all the sympathy , empathy and pity fogging up the screen . . . his secret life enters the land of unintentional melodrama and tiresome love triangles .
translation: Dengan segala simpati, empati, dan belas kasihan yang memenuhi skrin... kehidupan rahsia lelaki itu memasuki tanah melodrama yang tidak disengajakan dan segitiga cinta yang membosankan.
back_translation: With all the sympathy, empathy, and compassion filling the screen... the secret life of the man entered into an unintentional melodramatic land and a boring love triangle.

text: beneath clouds is the story of lena , the light-skinned daughter of an aboriginal mother and irish father and vaughn , a murri boy doing time in a minimum security prison in north west nsw .
translation: Di bawah awan adalah kisah Lena, anak perempuan berkulit terang dari seorang ibu pribumi Aborigin dan ayah Irlandia, dan Vaughn, seorang anak lelaki Murri yang sedang menjalani hukuman di penjara keamanan minimum di barat laut NSW.
back_translation: Beneath the clouds lies the story of Lena, a fair-skinned Indigenous Australian girl with an Aboriginal mother and an Irish father, and Vaughn, a Murri boy serving time in a minimum-security prison in northwestern NSW.

text: bright seems alternately amused and disgusted with this material , and he ca n't help throwing in a few of his own touches .
translation: Bright kelihatan bergantian amused dan disgusted dengan bahan ini, dan dia tidak dapat menahan diri untuk menambahkan sedikit sentuhan miliknya.
back_translation: Bright appeared alternatively amused and disgusted with the material, and he couldn't help but add a little touch of his own.

text: when raj 's family move to england to get involved in an internet business , raj promises tina that he will keep in touch with her and that their friendship will always be forever .
translation: Apabila keluarga Raj berpindah ke England untuk terlibat dalam perniagaan internet, Raj berjanji kepada Tina bahawa dia akan tetap berhubung dengannya dan bahawa persahabatan mereka akan kekal selamanya.
back_translation: When Raj's family moved to England to get involved in the internet business, Raj promised Tina that he would stay in touch with her and that their friendship would last forever.

text: when wei is promoted from the rank of nightclub parking valet to the rank of debt-collector in brother gu 's gang , he persuades his boss to hire jie to work alongside him .
translation: Apabila Wei dipromosikan dari jawatan pemandu valet tempat letak kereta di kelab ke jawatan penagih hutang dalam kumpulan adik Gu, dia meyakinkan bosnya untuk mengupah Jie untuk bekerja bersamanya.
back_translation: When Wei was promoted from the valet parking attendant position at the club to the debt collector position in the younger brother Gu's group, he convinced his boss to hire Jie to work with him.

text: a perplexing example of promise unfulfilled , despite many charming moments .
translation: contoh yang membingungkan tentang janji yang tidak ditepati, walaupun terdapat banyak saat menarik.
back_translation: An example that confuses about unfulfilled promises, even though there are many attracting moments.

text: a path that will lead to the day in and day out drudgery of a soul-less survival or a path that will lead them down the road in pursuit their dreams .
translation: sebuah jalan yang akan membawa kepada rutinitas sehari-hari yang membosankan untuk bertahan hidup tanpa jiwa atau sebuah jalan yang akan membawa mereka mengejar impian mereka.
back_translation: a path that will lead to the mundane routines of daily survival without a soul or a path that will lead them to chase their dreams.

text: when he loses his power the bully becomes victim and blames everyone else for his demise .
translation: Apabila dia kehilangan kuasanya, si pengganas menjadi mangsa dan menyalahkan semua orang atas kejatuhannya.
back_translation: When he loses his power, the terrorist becomes a victim and blames everyone for his downfall.

text: chomsky places the terrorist attacks in the context of american foreign intervention throughout the postwar decades -- in vietnam , central america , the middle east , and elsewhere .
translation: Chomsky menempatkan serangan pengganas dalam konteks campur tangan asing Amerika sepanjang beberapa dekad pasca perang - di Vietnam, Amerika Tengah, Timur Tengah, dan tempat lain.
back_translation: Chomsky placed terrorist attacks in the context of American foreign intervention over several decades following the war - in Vietnam, Central America, the Middle East, and elsewhere.

text: all these games of chasing , rejecting and seducing are played out in an economically and spiritually depressed hong kong , without much gusto .
translation: Semua permainan mengejar, menolak, dan memikat ini berlaku di Hong Kong yang terjejas dari segi ekonomi dan rohani, tanpa semangat yang berapi-api.
back_translation: All these chasing, rejecting, and enticing games happen in Hong Kong which is affected economically and spiritually, with a lack of fiery spirit.

text: the ultimate forms of hell are about to be unleashed on earth once again .
translation: Bentuk terakhir neraka akan dilepaskan di bumi sekali lagi.
back_translation: The final form of hell will be unleashed on earth once again.

text: a punch line without a premise , a joke built entirely from musty memories of half-dimensional characters .
translation: sebuah hujah akhir tanpa premis, satu jenaka yang dibangunkan sepenuhnya dari kenangan berbau hapus watak separuh dimensi.
back_translation: A final argument without premises, a joke constructed entirely from fleeting memories of two-dimensional characters.

text: despite what anyone believes about the goal of its makers , the show . . . represents a spectacular piece of theater , and there 's no denying the talent of the creative forces behind it .
translation: Walaupun apa yang dipercayai orang mengenai tujuan pembuatnya, pertunjukan tersebut mewakili satu karya teater yang hebat, dan tidak dapat disangkal bakat dari pihak kreatif di sebaliknya.
back_translation: Regardless of what people believe about its creator's intentions, the performance represents a great piece of theater, and the undeniable talent of the creative team behind it.

text: dizzy harrison is an unpopular , high school geek going through a hellish senior year .
translation: Dizzy Harrison adalah seorang geeks sekolah tinggi yang tidak popular yang melalui tahun senior yang menyiksakan.
back_translation: Dizzy Harrison is a high school geek who is not popular, going through a tormenting senior year.

text: according to wendigo , 'nature ' loves the members of the upper class almost as much as they love themselves .
translation: Menurut wendigo, 'alam semula jadi' mengasihi ahli golongan atas hampir sebanyak yang mereka cintai diri mereka sendiri.
back_translation: According to the wendigo, 'Mother Nature' loves members of the upper class almost as much as they love themselves.

text: they all collide during the course of a typical no thrills weekend an urban fairy tale-romantic comedy , in which nola , an aspiring songwriter , leaves an abusive kansas home and journeys to new york to find her biological father .
translation: Mereka semua berlanggaran sepanjang hujung minggu yang biasa tanpa kemewahan dalam satu dongeng bandar romantik-komedi, di mana Nola, seorang penulis lagu yang berhasrat, meninggalkan rumah penindasan di Kansas dan menjejak ke New York untuk mencari bapanya yang sebenar.
back_translation: They all collided throughout the usual weekend without luxuries in a romantic-comedy city tale, where Nola, an aspiring songwriter, left her oppressive home in Kansas and journeyed to New York to find her real father.

text: when she hears about her plan going awry , she collapses .
translation: Apabila dia mendengar tentang rancangan nya yang terganggu, dia rebah.
back_translation: When he heard about his disrupted plan, he collapsed.

text: a women from holland returns to indonesia , the country of her roots .
translation: Seorang wanita dari Belanda kembali ke Indonesia, negara asalnya.
back_translation: A woman from the Netherlands returns to Indonesia, her home country.

text: often hilarious , well-shot and , importantly , entertaining , hell house is a fascinating document of an event that has to be seen to be believed .
translation: Seringkali lucu, diambil dengan baik dan, yang penting, menghibur, Hell House adalah sebuah dokumen yang menarik tentang sebuah acara yang harus dilihat untuk dipercaya.
back_translation: Often funny, taken well and, most importantly, entertaining, Hell House is an interesting document on a show that must be seen to be believed.

text: ziyad and maryam are a happy young couple in lebanon , yet after three years of marriage they remain childless .
translation: Ziyad dan Maryam merupakan pasangan muda yang bahagia di Lubnan, namun setelah tiga tahun berkahwin, mereka masih belum dikurniakan cahaya mata.
back_translation: Ziyad and Maryam are a happy young couple in Lebanon, but after three years of marriage, they have not been blessed with a child.

text: the name refers to the green mountains they felt they were being pushed into ( out of their new homes ) .
translation: Nama tersebut merujuk kepada gunung-gunung hijau yang mereka rasa seolah-olah mereka sedang didesak masuk (keluar dari rumah baru mereka).
back_translation: The name refers to the green mountains that they feel as if they are being pushed in (out of their new home).

text: paco ( debora falabella ) and tonho ( roberto bomtempo ) are illegal brazilian immigrants in new york .
translation: Paco (Debora Falabella) dan Tonho (Roberto Bomtempo) adalah imigran Brazil secara haram di New York.
back_translation: Paco (Debora Falabella) and Tonho (Roberto Bomtempo) are illegal Brazilian immigrants in New York.

text: the police investigation that followed - led by detectives sam nico ( ted levine ) , louis cruz ( frankie g . ) and mike peters ( m . c .
translation: Siasatan polis yang berikutnya - diketuai oleh detektif Sam Nico (Ted Levine), Louis Cruz (Frankie G.) dan Mike Peters (M.C.).
back_translation: The next police investigation - led by detective Sam Nico (Ted Levine), Louis Cruz (Frankie G.) and Mike Peters (M.C.).

text: because eight legged freaks is partly an homage to them , tarantula and other low- budget b-movie thrillers of the 1950s and '60s , the movie is a silly ( but not sophomoric ) romp through horror and hellish conditions .
translation: Kerana "Eight Legged Freaks" sebahagian besarnya adalah sebagai penghormatan kepada tarantula dan filem seram b-budget lain pada tahun 1950-an dan 60-an, filem ini adalah satu kisah seram (tetapi tidak menggatal) yang melalui pengalaman horor dan keadaan neraka.
back_translation: Because "Eight Legged Freaks" is largely a tribute to tarantulas and other low-budget horror films of the 1950s and 60s, this movie is a horror (but not itchy) tale that takes you through horror experiences and hellish situations.

text: williams has n't been this creepy since his starring role in popeye .
translation: Williams tidak pernah seaneh ini sejak peran utamanya dalam filem Popeye.
back_translation: Williams has never been as crazy as this since his lead role in the movie Popeye.

text: pryor lite , with half the demons , half the daring , much less talent , many fewer laughs .
translation: pryor lite, dengan separuh pemanah iblis, separuh keberanian, jauh lebih kurang bakat, kurang gelak ketawa.
back_translation: pryor lite, with half a demon archer, half courage, far less talent, less laughter.

text: there are times when a rumor of angels plays like an extended episode of touched by an angel -- a little too much dancing , a few too many weeping scenes -- but i liked its heart and its spirit .
translation: Terdapat masa di mana desas-desus tentang malaikat dimainkan seperti episod panjang Touched by an Angel - sedikit terlalu banyak tarian, sedikit terlalu banyak adegan menangis - tetapi saya suka hati dan semangatnya.
back_translation: There was a time when rumors about angels were played out like a long episode of "Touched by an Angel" - a little too much dancing, a little too many crying scenes - but I like the heart and spirit of it.

text: this `` hitchcockian `` thriller tells the story of a young new york investment banker ( hartnett ) who becomes obsessed with a woman he sees in a cafe , believing her to be his long-lost love , following her home to her apartment , where he waits for her , going so far as to put his engagement on hold .
translation: Filem thriller "hitchcockian" ini mengisahkan tentang seorang penganalisis pelaburan muda New York (Hartnett) yang menjadi obses dengan seorang wanita yang dilihatnya di sebuah kafe, mempercayai bahawa wanita itu adalah cinta lamanya yang hilang, mengikutinya pulang ke apartmennya dan menunggu di sana, sehingga menangguhkan pertunangan mereka.
back_translation: This "Hitchcockian" thriller film tells the story of a young New York investment analyst (Hartnett) who becomes obsessed with a woman he sees in a cafe, believing that she is his long-lost love, following her back to her apartment and waiting there, thus postponing their engagement.

text: unhappy father of a draining family he has no controls whatsoever over his life .
translation: Bapa yang tidak bahagia dengan keluarga yang melelahkan, dia tidak mempunyai sebarang kawalan terhadap kehidupannya.
back_translation: A father who is unhappy with his exhausting family, has no control over his life.

text: the new insomnia is a surprisingly faithful remake of its chilly predecessor , and when it does elect to head off in its own direction , it employs changes that fit it well rather than ones that were imposed for the sake of commercial sensibilities .
translation: Insomnia baru adalah sebuah pembuatan semula yang mengejutkan setia terhadap prekuel sejuknya, dan apabila ia memilih untuk bergerak dalam arahnya sendiri, ia menggunakan perubahan yang sesuai dengan baik bukannya yang dipaksakan demi kepentingan komersial.
back_translation: The new Insomnia is a surprising reimagining that stays true to its cool prequel, and when it chooses to move in its own direction, it makes changes that fit well rather than forced for commercial interests.

text: if you saw it on tv , you 'd probably turn it off , convinced that you had already seen that movie .
translation: Jika anda melihatnya di tv, anda mungkin akan mematikannya, yakin bahawa anda sudah melihat filem itu.
back_translation: If you see it on TV, you might turn it off, sure that you have already seen the movie.

text: this mistaken-identity picture is so film-culture referential that the final product is a ghost .
translation: Gambar kesilapan identiti ini begitu merujuk kepada budaya filem sehingga produk akhirnya adalah sebuah hantu.
back_translation: This image of mistaken identity is so cinematically inclined that the end product is a ghost.

text: a thoroughly entertaining comedy that uses grant 's own twist of acidity to prevent itself from succumbing to its own bathos .
translation: sebuah komedi yang sangat menghibur yang menggunakan sentuhan keasaman Grant sendiri untuk mengelak daripada terjerumus ke dalam bathosnya sendiri.
back_translation: A highly entertaining comedy that uses Grant's own touch of acidity to avoid falling into its own bathos.

text: `` austin powers in goldmember `` has the right stuff for silly summer entertainment and has enough laughs to sustain interest to the end .
translation: "Austin Powers in Goldmember" mempunyai elemen yang tepat untuk hiburan musim panas yang bodoh dan memiliki cukup gelak untuk mengekalkan minat hingga akhir.
back_translation: "Austin Powers in Goldmember" has the right elements for silly summer entertainment and has enough laughs to keep you interested until the end.

text: the only hope is the veritas project , a highly trained investigative team working undercover to expose the truth .
translation: Hanya harapan adalah projek veritas, satu pasukan penyiasat yang terlatih dengan baik yang bekerja secara sembunyi-sembunyi untuk mendedahkan kebenaran.
back_translation: Only hope is the Veritas project, a well-trained team of investigators working covertly to uncover the truth.

text: the painter visually depicts the life of a lonely immigrant woman who seeks companionship with the window repairman .
translation: Pelukis menggambarkan secara visual kehidupan seorang wanita imigran yang kesunyian yang mencari teman rapat dengan jurumengaji tingkap.
back_translation: The painter depicts visually the lonely life of a female immigrant seeking close companionship with the window cleaner.

text: `` nicholas nickleby `` is a perfect family film to take everyone to since there 's no new `` a christmas carol `` out in the theaters this year . charlie hunnam has the twinkling eyes , repressed smile and determined face needed to carry out a dickensian hero .
translation: "Nicholas Nickleby" adalah filem keluarga yang sempurna untuk dibawa semua orang kerana tidak ada "A Christmas Carol" yang baru di pawagam tahun ini. Charlie Hunnam mempunyai mata yang berkelip, senyuman yang tertekan, dan wajah yang bertekad yang diperlukan untuk menjadi hero ala Dickens.
back_translation: "Nicholas Nickleby" is the perfect family movie to bring everyone as there is no new "A Christmas Carol" in cinemas this year. Charlie Hunnam has twinkling eyes, a dimpled smile, and a determined face necessary to be a Dickensian hero.

text: tykwer 's surface flash is n't just a poor fit with kieslowski 's lyrical pessimism ; it completely contradicts everything kieslowski 's work aspired to , including the condition of art .
translation: Kilau permukaan Tykwer tidak hanya tidak sesuai dengan pesimisme lirikal Kieslowski; ia benar-benar bercanggah dengan segala aspirasi karya Kieslowski, termasuk keadaan seni.
back_translation: The surface shine of Tykwer not only does not match the lyrical pessimism of Kieslowski; it actually contradicts all the aspirations of Kieslowski's works, including the state of art.

text: it 's gruesome violence combined with tongue-in-cheek humor . . . fans of this genre will flock to fulltime killer , and they 'll be blown away .
translation: Ini adalah keganasan yang mengerikan yang digabungkan dengan humor santai... peminat genre ini pasti akan membanjiri Fulltime Killer, dan mereka akan terkesima.
back_translation: This is a terrifying violence combined with laid-back humor... fans of this genre will surely flock to Fulltime Killer, and they will be impressed.

text: george `` ice man `` chambers ( rhames ) is a top ranked heavyweight boxer .
translation: George "Ice Man" Chambers (Rhames) adalah petinju kelas berat yang menduduki tangga teratas.
back_translation: George "Ice Man" Chambers (Rhames) is a heavyweight boxer who sits at the top of the rankings.

text: time literally stops on a dime in the tries-so-hard-to-be-cool `` clockstoppers , `` but that does n't mean it still wo n't feel like the longest 90 minutes of your movie-going life .
translation: Masa secara harfiah berhenti sekelip mata di filem "Clockstoppers" yang cuba sangat untuk kelihatan keren, tetapi itu tidak bermakna ia tidak akan terasa seperti 90 minit terpanjang dalam kehidupan menonton filem anda.
back_translation: Time literally stops in the blink of an eye in the film "Clockstoppers" that tries very hard to look cool, but that doesn't mean it won't feel like the longest 90 minutes of your life watching a movie.

text: wonder of wonders -- a teen movie with a humanistic message .
translation: Keajaiban yang menakjubkan - filem remaja dengan mesej humanistik.
back_translation: Amazing wonders - a teenage film with a humanistic message.

text: . . . a somber film , almost completely unrelieved by any comedy beyond the wistful everyday ironies of the working poor .
translation: . . . filem yang suram, hampir tidak diselamatkan oleh sebarang unsur komedi selain daripada ironi harian yang sedih bagi golongan miskin yang bekerja.
back_translation: . . . a dark film, almost not saved by any comedic elements apart from the daily irony of the poor working class.

text: based on a devilishly witty script by heather mcgowan and niels mueller , the film gets great laughs , but never at the expense of its characters
translation: Berdasarkan skrip yang sangat lucu oleh Heather McGowan dan Niels Mueller, filem ini mendapat gelak ketawa yang hebat, tetapi tidak pernah dengan mengorbankan watak-wataknya.
back_translation: Based on a very funny script by Heather McGowan and Niels Mueller, this film gets great laughs, but never at the expense of its characters.

text: the problem , amazingly enough , is the screenplay .
translation: Masalahnya, yang cukup mengejutkan, adalah skrinplay.
back_translation: The problem, quite surprisingly, is the screenplay.

text: the entertaining new film version of robert ludlum 's 1980 spy thriller , the bourne identity , adds a crisp , tangy autumnal feel to the hot dog days of summer moviegoing .
translation: Filem baru yang menghiburkan versi 1980 thriller pengintip Robert Ludlum, The Bourne Identity, menambahkan rasa kemerahan dan sejuk ke dalam waktu panas musim panas yang menyeronokkan.
back_translation: The new entertaining film version of the 1980 spy thriller by Robert Ludlum, The Bourne Identity, adds a touch of excitement and coolness to the enjoyable hot summer time.

text: about the only thing to give the movie points for is bravado -- to take an entirely stale concept and push it through the audience 's meat grinder one more time .
translation: Satu-satunya hal yang boleh memberi filem mata adalah keberanian - untuk mengambil konsep yang sama sekali basi dan mendorongnya melalui penggiling daging penonton sekali lagi.
back_translation: The only thing that can give a film eyes is courage – to take a completely stale concept and push it through the audience meat grinder once again.

text: the mothman prophecies , which is mostly a bore , seems to exist only for its climactic setpiece .
translation: "The Mothman Prophecies, yang kebanyakannya membosankan, nampaknya wujud hanya untuk setiap babak kemuncaknya."
back_translation: "The Mothman Prophecies, which is mostly boring, seems to exist only for each of its climax scenes."

text: like brosnan 's performance , evelyn comes from the heart .
translation: Seperti persembahan Brosnan, Evelyn datang dari hati.
back_translation: Like Brosnan's presentation, Evelyn comes from the heart.

text: the news of the assault causes a public outcry against the mutants , including renewed support for the mutant registration act , and william stryker , a military leader rumored to have experimented on mutants ( possibly including wolverine ) , is among the most vocal supporters of the legislation .
translation: Berita mengenai serangan tersebut menyebabkan kemarahan umum terhadap mutan, termasuk sokongan baru untuk Akta Pendaftaran Mutan, dan William Stryker, seorang pemimpin tentera yang dikatakan melakukan eksperimen terhadap mutan (mungkin termasuk Wolverine), adalah antara penyokong paling vokal kepada undang-undang tersebut.
back_translation: News of the attack has stirred public anger towards mutants, leading to new support for the Mutant Registration Act, with William Stryker, a military leader believed to have conducted experiments on mutants (possibly including Wolverine), being among the most vocal supporters of the law.

text: . . . familiar and predictable , and 4/5ths of it might as well have come from a xerox machine rather than ( writer-director ) franc . reyes ' word processor .
translation: . . . biasa dan boleh diteka, dan 4/5 bahagian daripadanya seolah-olah datang dari mesin fotokopi berbanding daripada pemproses kata (pengarah penulis) franc. reyes.
back_translation: ... ordinary and guessable, and 4/5 parts of it seem to come from a photocopy machine rather than from the word processor of the (director-writer) franc. reyes.

text: a story of love and enchantment set in the coldest of winters , it explores the issues , dilemmas and barriers facing the lucky and unlucky in love in the 21st century , based on the novel of the same name by pullitzer prize-winning author carol shields .
translation: Sebuah cerita tentang cinta dan pesona yang berlangsung di musim sejuk yang paling sejuk, ia meneroka isu, dilema, dan halangan yang dihadapi oleh mereka yang beruntung dan malang dalam percintaan di abad ke-21, berdasarkan novel yang sama oleh penulis pemenang hadiah Pullitzer, Carol Shields.
back_translation: A story about love and charm that takes place in the coldest of winters, it explores the issues, dilemmas, and obstacles faced by those fortunate and unfortunate in love in the 21st century, based on the same novel by Pulitzer Prize-winning author, Carol Shields.

text: merely as a technical , logistical feat , russian ark marks a cinematic milestone .
