translation: Hanya sebagai pencapaian teknikal dan logistik, russian ark menandakan satu mercu tanda sinematik.
back_translation: Serving only as a technical and logistical achievement, Russian Ark signifies a cinematic milestone.

text: and to make matters worse , he 's been replaced by a man with a moustache !
translation: dan untuk memburukkan keadaan, dia telah digantikan oleh seorang lelaki berjanggut!
back_translation: And to make matters worse, he has been replaced by a bearded man!

text: that rara avis : the intelligent romantic comedy with actual ideas on its mind .
translation: filem comedi romantis yang pintar dengan idea sebenar dalam benaknya: seekor rara avis.
back_translation: a romantic comedy film that is clever with genuine ideas in its mind: a rare bird.

text: nick is about to discover , true love can be found in the strangest of places . . .
translation: Nick akan segera menemui, cinta sejati boleh ditemui di tempat yang paling aneh . . .
back_translation: Nick will soon find, true love can be found in the most unexpected places.

text: they are under the impression that models have more beauty than brains and are not capable of much more than looking good .
translation: Mereka beranggapan bahawa model memiliki kecantikan yang lebih daripada otak dan tidak mampu melakukan lebih daripada terlihat cantik.
back_translation: They believe that models have more beauty than brains and are unable to do more than looking pretty.

text: fourth generation war hero col . william mcnamara is imprisoned in a brutal german pow camp .
translation: Pahlawan peperangan generasi keempat, Col. William McNamara, dipenjarakan di kamp tahanan perang Jerman yang kejam.
back_translation: Fourth-generation war hero, Col. William McNamara, is imprisoned in a cruel German prisoner-of-war camp.

text: evans is such a capable storyteller that you find yourself liking him even though he 's not exactly likeable .
translation: Evans merupakan seorang pencerita yang sangat berbakat sehingga anda mendapati diri anda menyukainya walaupun dia tidak begitu disenangi.
back_translation: Evans is a very talented storyteller that you find yourself liking even though he is not very well-liked.

text: what we have here is n't a disaster , exactly , but a very handsomely produced let-down .
translation: Apa yang kita ada di sini bukanlah bencana, tetapi kekecewaan yang dihasilkan dengan sangat baik.
back_translation: What we have here is not a disaster, but disappointment produced very well.

text: when siti starts her `` siapa mr cinderella `` show , kumin is among the hundreds of fake mr cinderella that participates in the show to collect the reward .
translation: Apabila Siti memulakan pertunjukan "Siapa Mr Cinderella" beliau, Kumin adalah antara ratusan lelaki Cinderella palsu yang mengambil bahagian dalam pertunjukan itu untuk mengumpulkan ganjaran.
back_translation: When Siti started the show "Who is Mr. Cinderella," Kumin was among the hundreds of fake Cinderella men who participated in the show to earn rewards.

text: a generation x artifact , capturing a brief era of insanity in the sports arena that surely can not last .
translation: artefak generasi X, merakam era kegilaan dalam arena sukan yang pastinya tidak akan berterusan.
back_translation: Artifacts of Generation X, capturing the era of madness in the sports arena that surely will not continue.

text: move over bond ; this girl deserves a sequel .
translation: Beri jalan kepada bond; gadis ini layak untuk sekuel.
back_translation: Give way to the Bond; this girl is worthy of a sequel.

text: the pitch must have read like a discarded house beautiful spread .
translation: Lontaran itu mesti terbaca seperti penyebaran rumah yang cantik yang dibuang.
back_translation: The throw must be read like a beautiful house being discarded.

text: after leoncio 's death , robert feels terribly sorry for annie especially when he discovers that she is suffering from schizophrenia .
translation: Selepas kematian Leoncio, Robert berasa sangat sedih untuk Annie terutama apabila dia menyedari bahawa dia mengalami skizofrenia.
back_translation: After Leoncio's death, Robert feels very sad for Annie especially when he realized that she is suffering from schizophrenia.

text: linked to her only by cell phone , the driver narrows in on her location in a desperate race against time and tide .
translation: Terhubung dengannya hanya melalui telefon bimbit, pemandu mengerahkan usaha untuk mencari lokasinya dalam perlumbaan yang putus asa melawan masa dan air pasang.
back_translation: Connected with her only through the mobile phone, the driver made an effort to find her location in a desperate race against time and the rising tide.

text: though this film can be clumsy , its ambitions are equally -- and admirably -- uncommercial .
translation: Walaupun filem ini mungkin kasar, ambisinya sama kuat dan patut dipuji - tidak komersial.
back_translation: Although this film may be rough, its ambition is equally strong and deserving of praise - non-commercial.

text: serry perfectly captures the peculiar climate , creating uncanny echoes with today 's situation .
translation: serry dengan sempurna menggambarkan iklim yang aneh, menciptakan gema yang aneh dengan situasi hari ini.
back_translation: Serry perfectly describes the strange climate, creating an eerie echo with the current situation.

text: one of those based-on-truth stories that persuades you , with every scene , that it could never really have happened this way .
translation: Salah satu cerita yang berdasarkan pada kebenaran yang meyakinkan anda, dengan setiap adegan, bahawa ia tidak mungkin berlaku dengan cara ini.
back_translation: One story that is based on convincing truths that every scene could not have happened in this way.

text: this examination of aquatic life off the shores of the baja california peninsula of mexico offers an engrossing way to demonstrate the virtues of the imax format .
translation: Pemeriksaan kehidupan akuatik di sekitar pesisir Semenanjung Baja California di Mexico menawarkan cara yang menarik untuk menunjukkan kelebihan format imax.
back_translation: Aquatic life inspection along the coast of Baja California Peninsula in Mexico offers an interesting way to showcase the advantages of the IMAX format.

text: stan lee discusses the origins of the industry ; neil gaiman and john byrne speak on superheroes as modern mythology ; frank miller and bill sienkewicz discuss the relationship of politics and comics ; peter david tells the story of the meanest thing he has ever done to a fan ; and much more .
translation: stan lee membincangkan asal usul industri ini; neil gaiman dan john byrne bercakap mengenai watak superhero sebagai mitologi moden; frank miller dan bill sienkewicz membincangkan hubungan politik dan komik; peter david menceritakan kisah perkara paling kejam yang pernah dilakukannya kepada seorang peminat; dan banyak lagi.
back_translation: Stan Lee discusses the origins of this industry; Neil Gaiman and John Byrne talk about superhero characters as modern mythology; Frank Miller and Bill Sienkewicz discuss the relationship between politics and comics; Peter David tells the story of the most cruel thing he has ever done to a fan; and many more.

text: it 's not so much a movie as a joint promotion for the national basketball association and teenaged rap and adolescent poster-boy lil ' bow wow .
translation: Ini bukanlah filem yang menghiburkan, tetapi lebih kepada promosi bersama untuk Persatuan Bola Keranjang Kebangsaan dan remaja rap serta poster-boy remaja Lil ' Bow Wow.
back_translation: This is not an entertaining movie, but more of a joint promotion for the National Basketball Association and teenage rapper Lil' Bow Wow as the poster boy.

text: but when the cockettes flew to new york city to appear off broadway^ & # 197 ; well , you 'll just have to see what happened when new yorkers took a look at them .
translation: tetapi apabila cockettes terbang ke New York City untuk muncul di luar Broadway, anda perlu melihat apa yang berlaku apabila penduduk New York mengambil perhatian pada mereka.
back_translation: But when the Cockettes flew to New York City to appear off Broadway, you need to see what happens when New Yorkers take notice of them.

text: a very long movie , dull in stretches , with entirely too much focus on meal preparation and igloo construction .
translation: Filem yang sangat panjang, membosankan di sesetengah bahagian, dengan terlalu banyak tumpuan kepada persediaan makanan dan pembinaan iglu.
back_translation: The film is very long, boring in some parts, with too much focus on food preparation and igloo construction.

text: mark , fresh from college , returns to his boring hometown to work off his gambling debts .
translation: Mark, baru sahaja tamat pengajian di kolej, pulang ke bandar kelahirannya yang membosankan untuk menyelesaikan hutang judiannya.
back_translation: Mark has just completed his studies at college, returned to his boring hometown to settle his gambling debts.

text: macbeth . mcdonald 's . how far apart these poles of popular culture seemed until billy morrissette 's sly mcshakespeare crime comedy .
translation: macbeth. mcdonald's. Sejauh mana kutub budaya popular ini terpisah sehingga hasilnya adalah komedi jenayah sly mcshakespeare milik billy morrissette.
back_translation: macbeth. mcdonald's. To what extent are these popular culture poles apart to yield sly mcshakespeare crime comedy by billy morrissette.

text: this unique short film follows the night of a young british insomniac named jack , narrated almost hour by hour from a first hand perspective .
translation: Filem pendek unik ini mengisahkan malam seorang insomnia muda British bernama Jack, diceritakan hampir jam demi jam dari sudut pandang pertama.
back_translation: This unique short film tells the story of a young British insomniac named Jack, narrated almost hour by hour from a first-person perspective.

text: when spain and portugal physically separate from the continent , the detached iberian peninsula aimlessly floats off to sea , becoming home to a group of god-like humans .
translation: Apabila Sepanyol dan Portugal berpisah secara fizikal dari benua, tanah besar Iberia yang terputus terapung tanpa tujuan ke laut, menjadi tempat tinggal kepada kumpulan manusia yang seperti dewa.
back_translation: When Spain and Portugal physically separated from the continent, the disconnected Iberian landmass floated aimlessly into the sea, becoming a home to a group of god-like beings.

text: beautiful , sophisticated women are all over oscar grubman .
translation: Wanita-wanita cantik dan berwibawa ada di sekeliling Oscar Grubman.
back_translation: Beautiful and influential women surround Oscar Grubman.

text: goldmember has none of the visual wit of the previous pictures , and it looks as though jay roach directed the film from the back of a taxicab .
translation: Goldmember tidak mempunyai kecerdikan visual seperti filem-filem sebelumnya, dan kelihatan seolah-olah Jay Roach mengarahkan filem ini dari bahagian belakang kereta teksi.
back_translation: Goldmember lacks the visual wit of the previous films, and seems as if Jay Roach directed this film from the back of a taxi cab.

text: 3 beautiful agents try to find the treasure , but they must fight the evil datuk azmi , an old enemy of madame x . it has been four years since the alien-seeking agents averted an intergalactic disaster of epic proportions .
translation: 3 orang ejen yang cantik cuba mencari harta karun, tetapi mereka harus bertarung dengan Datuk Azmi yang jahat, seorang musuh lama Madame X. Sudah empat tahun sejak ejen yang mencari makhluk asing mengelakkan bencana antarabangsa berskala besar.
back_translation: 3 beautiful agents try to find a treasure, but they must battle against the evil Datuk Azmi, a long-time enemy of Madame X. It has been four years since the alien hunters avoided a major international disaster.

text: if you 're as happy listening to movies as you are watching them , and the slow parade of human frailty fascinates you , then you 're at the right film .
translation: Jika anda gembira mendengar filem sama seperti anda menontonnya, dan perbarisan perlahan kelemahan manusia memikat anda, maka anda berada di filem yang betul.
back_translation: If you delight in watching a movie as much as you enjoy listening to it, and a slow parade of human weaknesses captivates you, then you are in the right movie.

text: he tries , with his family 's support , to find a job and live a normal life .
translation: Dia cuba, dengan sokongan keluarganya, mencari pekerjaan dan menjalani kehidupan yang normal.
back_translation: With the support of his family, he tried to find a job and lead a normal life.

text: `` on guard ! `` wo n't be placed in the pantheon of the best of the swashbucklers but it is a whole lot of fun and you get to see the one of the world 's best actors , daniel auteuil , have a whale of a good time .
translation: "on guard!" tidak akan diletakkan di dalam pantheon para pendekar terbaik tetapi ia sangat menyeronokkan dan anda dapat melihat salah seorang pelakon terbaik dunia, Daniel Auteuil, berseronok dengan sepuas-puasnya.
back_translation: "on guard!" will not be placed in the pantheon of the greatest warriors, but it is very enjoyable and you can see one of the world's best actors, Daniel Auteuil, having fun to the fullest.

text: against their better judgment , dara and noble agree to deliver the body to duluth and hope that will be the end of it .
translation: Bertentangan dengan pertimbangan terbaik mereka, Dara dan Noble bersetuju untuk menghantar mayat ke Duluth dan berharap itu akan menjadi penamatnya.
back_translation: Contrary to their better judgment, Dara and Noble agreed to send the body to Duluth in hopes that it would be the end of it.

text: while introducing his film mockery , he receives a phone call from his producer lying in intensive care at a hospital .
translation: Semasa memperkenalkan filem parodinya , beliau menerima panggilan telefon daripada pengeluar filemnya yang sedang berbaring di unit rawatan rapi di hospital.
back_translation: While introducing his parody film, he received a phone call from the producer of his film who was lying in the intensive care unit at the hospital.

text: combine the paranoid claustrophobia of a submarine movie with the unsettling spookiness of the supernatural -- why did n't hollywood think of this sooner ?
translation: gabungkan paranoia klostrofobia filem kapal selam dengan ketegangan ketidakselesaan ke-dahsyatan yang supranatural -- mengapa hollywood tidak terfikir tentang ini lebih awal?
back_translation: Combine the paranoia claustrophobia of submarine films with the tension of supernatural horror - why didn't Hollywood think of this sooner?

text: all of her hard work pays off when she is accepted to a prominent dance program in new york .
translation: Semua kerja kerasnya berbaloi apabila dia diterima ke dalam program tarian terkemuka di New York.
back_translation: All his hard work paid off when he was accepted into the prestigious dance program in New York.

text: unfortunately this film will not satisfy if you are looking to discover the missing link , but if you are simply interested in humor and some 'interesting ' footage , to say the least , you will not be disappointed .
translation: Malangnya filem ini tidak akan memuaskan anda jika anda mencari untuk menemui pautan yang hilang, tetapi jika anda hanya berminat dalam humor dan beberapa rakaman 'menarik', untuk mengatakan yang paling tidak, anda tidak akan kecewa.
back_translation: Unfortunately, this movie will not satisfy you if you are looking to find the missing links, but if you are only interested in humor and some 'interesting' recordings, to say the least, you will not be disappointed.

text: there 's no mistaking the fact that this hybrid misses the impact of the disney classic , and even that of the excellent 1934 mgm version .
translation: Tiada siapa yang dapat mengabaikan hakikat bahawa hibrid ini tidak mampu menandingi impak klasik Disney, malah juga tidak mampu menandingi versi MGM yang hebat pada tahun 1934.
back_translation: No one can ignore the fact that this hybrid is unable to rival the classic impact of Disney, nor can it compete with the great MGM version in 1934.

text: shae powell , a successful single mom , wakes up rattled from a horrible dream .
translation: Shae Powell, seorang ibu tunggal yang berjaya, terjaga dengan terkejut daripada mimpi yang buruk.
back_translation: Shae Powell, a successful single mother, woke up startled from a bad dream.

text: a movie version of a paint-by-numbers picture . we can tell what it is supposed to be , but ca n't really call it a work of art .
translation: filem versi lukisan mengikut nombor. kita boleh tahu apa yang sepatutnya, tetapi tidak boleh benar-benar menyebutnya sebagai sebuah karya seni.
back_translation: A painted version of a film by numbers. We can tell what it should be, but we can't really call it a work of art.

text: `` the mothman prophecies `` is a difficult film to shake from your conscience when night falls .
translation: "``The Mothman Prophecies`` adalah filem yang sukar untuk dilupakan dari keinginan kita apabila malam tiba."
back_translation: "The Mothman Prophecies" is a film that is hard to forget once night falls.

text: now a new terminaor whos has power over all machines , has been sent back to kill him , the terminatrix or t-x ( kristanna loken ) who does n't require weapons as she has a laser cannon on her hand and is capable of turning herself into machinery .
translation: Kini seorang terminaor baru yang mempunyai kuasa ke atas semua jentera, telah dihantar untuk membunuhnya, terminatrix atau t-x (Kristanna Loken) yang tidak memerlukan senjata kerana dia mempunyai meriam laser pada tangannya dan mampu mengubah dirinya menjadi jentera.
back_translation: Now a new terminator who has power over all machines has been sent to kill her, the terminatrix or t-x (Kristanna Loken) who does not need weapons because she has a laser cannon on her hand and can transform herself into a machine.

text: the fact that he owns the gun of a popular man , who got killed , from that town makes him prime suspect .
translation: Fakta bahawa dia memiliki senjata milik seorang lelaki popular yang telah dibunuh dari bandar itu menjadikannya tersangka utama.
back_translation: The fact that he owns a weapon belonging to a popular man who was killed in the city makes him the prime suspect.

text: [ a ] smarter and much funnier version of the old police academy flicks .
translation: Versi yang lebih bijak dan jauh lebih lucu daripada filem-filem lama Polis Akademi.
back_translation: A wiser and much funnier version than the old Police Academy movies.

text: it 's unnerving , stimulating , likely to provoke anger and sorrow on both political sides -- and , above all , it 's extremely funny .
translation: Ia mengganggu, merangsang, mungkin menyebabkan kemarahan dan kesedihan di kedua belah pihak politik - dan, yang paling penting, ia sangat lucu.
back_translation: It is disruptive, provocative, may cause anger and sadness on both sides of the political divide - and, most importantly, it is very funny.

text: the nicest thing that can be said about stealing harvard ( which might have been called freddy gets molested by a dog ) is that it 's not as obnoxious as tom green 's freddie got fingered .
translation: Satu perkara yang baik boleh dikatakan tentang mencuri Harvard (yang mungkin dipanggil Freddy kena dicabul oleh anjing) adalah bahawa ia tidak sejahat Freddie got Fingered oleh Tom Green.
back_translation: One good thing that can be said about stealing Harvard (which might be called Freddy gets violated by dogs) is that it is not as bad as Freddie got Fingered by Tom Green.

text: but her marriage is loveless and she suffers from the loss of her baby in childbirth .
translation: Namun perkahwinannya tidak penuh kasih dan dia menderita kerana kehilangan bayinya semasa bersalin.
back_translation: However, her marriage was not full of love and she suffered because of losing her baby during childbirth.

text: viewers of `` the ring `` are more likely to remember the haunting images than the plot holes .
translation: Penonton filem "The Ring" lebih cenderung mengingati imej yang menakutkan berbanding kelemahan plot cerita.
back_translation: Audiences of the movie "The Ring" are more likely to remember the scary images rather than the weaknesses of the plot.

text: sleepwalking tells the story of three friends at three very different stages of their lives .
translation: sleepwalking menceritakan kisah tiga sahabat pada tiga peringkat kehidupan yang sangat berbeza.
back_translation: sleepwalking tells the story of three friends at three very different stages of life.

text: he soon escapes and runs into a woman who has recently had a car accident and is suffering with amnesia .
translation: Dia segera melarikan diri dan bertemu dengan seorang wanita yang baru sahaja mengalami kemalangan kereta dan mengalami amnesia.
back_translation: He immediately fled and met a woman who had just experienced a car accident and was suffering from amnesia.

text: while some of the subplots are very sketchy and the motivations of some of the characters are not clear , it is a journey worth taking because of the wondrous imagery .
translation: Walaupun beberapa subplot sangat kabur dan motivasi beberapa watak tidak jelas, ini adalah perjalanan yang layak diambil kerana imej yang mengagumkan.
back_translation: Although some subplots are very vague and the motivations of some characters are unclear, this is a journey worth taking because of the stunning visuals.

text: is it possible for a documentary to be utterly entranced by its subject and still show virtually no understanding of it ?
translation: Adakah mungkin bagi sebuah dokumentari untuk betul-betul terpesona dengan subjeknya tetapi masih tidak menunjukkan pemahaman yang sebenar terhadapnya?
back_translation: Is it possible for a documentary to be truly fascinated with its subject but still not show a real understanding of it?

text: her cathexis was rapid and she formed an intense attachment to her young doctor , who seems to have reciprocated .
translation: Cathexisnya adalah cepat dan dia membentuk ikatan yang kuat dengan dokter muda tersebut, yang nampaknya juga merasakannya.
back_translation: Her cathexis is quick and she forms a strong bond with the young doctor, who seems to reciprocate.

text: along the way , ash continues to mature into the unstoppable pok & # 233 ; mon trainer he will become in the future .
translation: Sepanjang perjalanan, Ash terus membesar menjadi jurulatih Pokémon yang tidak terhenti yang akan menjadi di masa depan.
back_translation: Throughout the journey, Ash continues to grow as an unstoppable Pokémon trainer who will become successful in the future.

text: a muckraking job , the cinematic equivalent of a legal indictment , and a fairly effective one at that .
translation: satu tugas menggali kotoran, setara dengan tuduhan undang-undang dalam dunia filem, dan satu yang cukup berkesan sebenarnya.
back_translation: One task of digging dirt is equivalent to a legal charge in the world of films, and one that is quite impressive indeed.

text: this is standard crime drama fare . . . instantly forgettable and thoroughly dull .
translation: Ini adalah hidangan drama jenayah standard. . . terus dilupakan dan benar-benar membosankan.
back_translation: This is a standard crime drama fare... easily forgotten and truly boring.

text: first time director sam jones documents the making of wilco 's fourth studio album , yankee hotel foxtrot .
translation: Pengarah baru, Sam Jones, mendokumentasikan proses penghasilan album studio keempat Wilco, Yankee Hotel Foxtrot.
back_translation: The new director, Sam Jones, documented the production process of Wilco's fourth studio album, Yankee Hotel Foxtrot.

text: we have poignancy jostling against farce , thoughtful dialogue elbowed aside by one-liners , and a visual style that incorporates rotoscope animation for no apparent reason except , maybe , that it looks neat .
translation: Kita mempunyai kesedihan bertentangan dengan fars, dialog berfikir disingkirkan oleh jenaka, dan gaya visual yang menggabungkan animasi rotoskop tanpa sebab yang jelas, mungkin hanya kerana nampak kemas.
back_translation: We have sadness contradictory to farce, thoughtful dialogue overshadowed by jokes, and a visual style that combines rotoscope animation without clear reason, perhaps just to look neat.

text: his mother persuades a renowned entomologist to take them on a trip to the jungle to search for the butterfly , leading to an adventure that will transform their lives .
translation: Ibunya memujuk seorang ahli entomologi terkemuka untuk membawa mereka dalam sebuah perjalanan ke hutan untuk mencari kupu-kupu, membawa kepada suatu pengembaraan yang akan mengubah hidup mereka.
back_translation: His mother persuaded a prominent entomologist to take them on a journey to the forest to search for butterflies, leading to an adventure that would change their lives.

text: a martial artist , afflicted with a disease that makes beautiful women want to kill him , goes on a suicide mission to find true love anyway .
translation: Seorang ahli seni bela diri, yang diganggu dengan penyakit yang membuat wanita cantik ingin membunuhnya, mengambil misi bunuh diri untuk mencari cinta sejati.
back_translation: A martial artist, plagued by a disease that causes beautiful women to want to kill him, takes on a suicide mission to find true love.

text: terry and dean are lifelong friends who have grown-up together : shotgunning their first beers , forming their first garage band , and growing the great canadian mullet known as `` hockey hair `` .
translation: Terry dan Dean adalah kawan karib sejak kecil yang telah berkembang bersama: minum bir pertama mereka, membentuk band garage pertama mereka, dan menumbuhkan gaya rambut khas Kanada yang dikenal sebagai "rambut hoki".
back_translation: Terry and Dean are close friends since childhood who have grown up together: sharing their first beer, forming their first garage band, and developing the distinctive Canadian hairstyle known as "hockey hair".

text: the low-key direction is pleasingly emphatic in this properly intense , claustrophobic tale of obsessive love .
translation: Pendekatan yang rendah kunci sangat menekankan dalam kisah obsesi cinta yang intens dan sesak ini dengan betul.
back_translation: The low-key approach is emphasized very much in this intense and suffocating love obsession story correctly.

text: everyone thinks that it 's him that has opened the chamber of secrets because that is what slytherin was famous for .
translation: Semua orang menganggap bahawa dia yang telah membuka bilik rahsia kerana itulah apa yang Slytherin terkenal dengan.
back_translation: Everyone believes that he's the one who opened the secret room because that's what Slytherin is known for.

text: one senses in world traveler and in his earlier film that freundlich bears a grievous but obscure complaint against fathers , and circles it obsessively , without making contact .
translation: Seseorang merasakan dalam seorang pelancong dunia dan dalam filem terdahulunya bahawa Freundlich memikul aduan yang serius tetapi kabur terhadap bapa, dan mengitarinya secara obsesif, tanpa membuat hubungan.
back_translation: Someone felt like a world traveler in his previous film that Freundlich carried a serious but blurry complaint against his father, and surrounded him obsessively, without establishing a connection.

text: a lot more dimensional and complex than its sunny disposition would lead you to believe .
translation: Jauh lebih dimensi dan kompleks daripada sikap ceria yang ia tunjukkan.
back_translation: Far more dimensional and complex than the cheerful attitude it displays.

text: it 's push-the-limits teen comedy , the type written by people who ca n't come up with legitimate funny , and it 's used so extensively that good bits are hopelessly overshadowed .
translation: Ini adalah komedi remaja yang mendorong batas, jenis yang ditulis oleh orang yang tidak bisa menciptakan lelucon yang sah, dan digunakan begitu banyak sehingga bagian bagusnya tertutup dengan begitu luar biasa.
back_translation: This is a teen comedy that pushes boundaries, the kind written by someone who can't create genuine jokes, and used so much that its good parts are overshadowed by the overwhelming.

text: writer-director steven soderbergh follows up ocean 's 11 with the low-budget 'full frontal ' , his first digitally shot film .
translation: Penulis-pengarah Steven Soderbergh mengikuti 'Ocean's 11' dengan filem berbajet rendah 'Full Frontal', filem pertamanya yang dirakam secara digital.
back_translation: Writer-director Steven Soderbergh followed 'Ocean's 11' with the low-budget film 'Full Frontal,' his first digitally recorded film.

text: the movie features veteran horror heroines leslie culton and jenny wallace , and actors john saenz and jonathan tabor .
translation: Filem ini menampilkan heroin seram veteran Leslie Culton dan Jenny Wallace, serta pelakon-pelakon John Saenz dan Jonathan Tabor.
back_translation: This film features horror veteran Leslie Culton and Jenny Wallace, as well as actors John Saenz and Jonathan Tabor.

text: here the love scenes all end in someone screaming . maybe there 's a metaphor here , but figuring it out would n't make trouble every day any better .
translation: Di sini setiap adegan cinta berakhir dengan seseorang berteriak. Mungkin ada metafora di sini, tetapi memahaminya tidak akan membuat masalah sehari-hari menjadi lebih baik.
back_translation: Here every love scene ends with someone screaming. There might be a metaphor here, but understanding it won't make everyday problems any better.

text: an entertaining and topical adventure drama which responds to our society 's fascination with doomsday cults , survivalist sects and their messianic leaders .
translation: sebuah drama pengembaraan yang menghiburkan dan aktual yang merespon ketertarikan masyarakat kita pada kultus kiamat, sekte survivalis, dan pemimpin-pemimpin mereka.
back_translation: an entertaining and relevant adventure drama that responds to our society's interest in cults of doom, survivalist sects, and their leaders.

text: [ t ] he film is never sure to make a clear point M-^V even if it seeks to rely on an ambiguous presentation .
translation: Filem itu tidak pernah pasti untuk menyampaikan satu titik yang jelas, walaupun cuba bergantung pada pembentangan yang ambigu.
back_translation: The film never really manages to convey a clear point, despite attempting to rely on ambiguous presentation.

text: on the road to lake tahoe , a stressed out young executive meets a woman who forever changes his life .
translation: Di jalan menuju Tasik Tahoe, seorang eksekutif muda yang tertekan bertemu dengan seorang wanita yang selamanya mengubah hidupnya.
back_translation: On the way to Lake Tahoe, a stressed young executive meets a woman who forever changes his life.

text: the primitive force of this film seems to bubble up from the vast collective memory of the combatants . it 's like watching a nightmare made flesh .
translation: Kuasa primitif filem ini kelihatan timbul dari ingatan kolektif luas pihak yang terlibat. Ia seperti menonton mimpi ngeri menjadi nyata.
back_translation: The primitive power of this film seems to arise from the vast collective memory of those involved. It's like watching a nightmare come to life.

text: the dialogue is very choppy and monosyllabic despite the fact that it is being dubbed .
translation: Dialog itu terlalu terputus-putus dan bersifat monosilabik walaupun sedang di-dub.
back_translation: The dialogue is too disconnected and monosyllabic even though being dubbed.

text: who needs mind-bending drugs when they can see this , the final part of the 'qatsi ' trilogy , directed by godfrey reggio , with music by philip glass ?
translation: Siapa yang memerlukan dadah yang mengubah fikiran apabila mereka boleh melihat ini, bahagian terakhir trilogi 'qatsi', arahan oleh godfrey reggio, dengan muzik oleh philip glass?
back_translation: Who needs mind-altering drugs when they can watch this, the final part of the 'qatsi' trilogy, directed by Godfrey Reggio, with music by Philip Glass?

text: but ralph 's got a special talent - an ability to impersonate any hollywood celebrity - the perfect disguise to hide his stutter . . .
translation: tetapi Ralph memiliki bakat istimewa - kebolehan untuk meniru mana-mana selebriti Hollywood - penipuan yang sempurna untuk menyembunyikan kekokohannya . . .
back_translation: but Ralph has a special talent - the ability to mimic any Hollywood celebrity - a perfect deception to conceal his firmness . . .

text: in gleefully , thumpingly hyperbolic terms , it covers just about every cliche in the compendium about crass , jaded movie types and the phony baloney movie biz .
translation: Dengan penuh sukacita, penuh hiperbola, ia merangkumi hampir setiap stereotaip dalam katalog tentang jenis filem kasar dan jaded serta dunia filem palsu yang dibuat-buat.
back_translation: With full joy, full hyperbole, it encompasses nearly every stereotype in the catalog of rough and jaded film types and the fake world of fabricated films.

text: how has the `` excitement `` of the 70 's turned into the `` blandness `` of today ?
translation: Bagaimana "keghairahan" pada tahun 70-an berubah menjadi "kehambaran" pada masa kini?
back_translation: How did the "enthusiasm" of the 70s turn into "boredom" today?

text: the action of the story derives from the collision of these two competing worlds .
translation: Tindakan dalam cerita berasal daripada perlanggaran dua dunia yang bersaing ini.
back_translation: The actions in the story stem from the clash of these two competing worlds.

text: what could and should have been biting and droll is instead a tepid waste of time and talent .
translation: Apa yang sepatutnya menjadi tajam dan lucu menjadi suatu pembaziran masa dan bakat yang hambar.
back_translation: What should have been sharp and witty has become a waste of time and talent.

text: but , sometimes what we teach our children can be as deadly as not teaching them .
translation: Tetapi, kadang-kadang apa yang kita ajarkan kepada anak-anak kita boleh sama berbahayanya dengan tidak mengajar mereka.
back_translation: However, sometimes what we teach our children can be just as harmful as not teaching them.

text: writer-director debrauwer does manage to wrap things up in an * * * -pleasing 78 minutes . it 's is n't much , but it 's a lot more than callous callie khouri did with that `` ya-ya `` mess . also , there are no irritating hats .
translation: Penulis-pengarah Debrauwer berjaya mengemas segalanya dalam 78 minit yang memuaskan. Ia mungkin tidak banyak, tetapi jauh lebih baik daripada kesilapan "ya-ya" yang dilakukan oleh Callie Khouri. Selain itu, tidak ada topi yang mengganggu.
back_translation: Director Debrauwer successfully manages to pack everything in a satisfying 78 minutes. It may not be much, but much better than the "yes-yes" mistakes made by Callie Khouri. Additionally, no unnecessary distractions.

text: to say analyze that is de niro 's best film since meet the parents sums up the sad state of his recent career .
translation: Untuk mengatakan bahawa 'Analyze That' adalah filem terbaik De Niro sejak 'Meet the Parents' memberi gambaran tentang keadaan sedih kerjaya beliau pada masa kini.
back_translation: Saying that 'Analyze That' is De Niro's best film since 'Meet the Parents' gives an insight into the current sad state of his career.

text: and the detective is n't convinced that this will be the last . . .
translation: dan detektif itu tidak yakin bahawa ini akan menjadi yang terakhir...
back_translation: and the detective is not sure that this will be the last...

text: it suggests the wide-ranging effects of media manipulation , from the kind of reporting that is done by the supposedly liberal media . . . to the intimate and ultimately tragic heartache of maverick individuals like hatfield and hicks .
translation: Ia mencadangkan kesan meluas manipulasi media, dari jenis liputan yang dilakukan oleh media liberal yang seolah-olah ... hingga dukacita intim dan akhirnya tragis individu maverick seperti Hatfield dan Hicks.
back_translation: It suggests the widespread impact of media manipulation, from the type of coverage done by liberal media that appears to... to the intimate sorrow and ultimately tragic individual mavericks like Hatfield and Hicks.

text: based on an attraction at disneyland , the country bear jamboree , `` the country bears `` ( 2002 ) is one in a long line of live action disney family films .
translation: Berdasarkan tarikan di Disneyland, Country Bear Jamboree, "The Country Bears" (2002) adalah salah satu dari senarai panjang filem keluarga aksi langsung Disney.
back_translation: Based on the attraction at Disneyland, Country Bear Jamboree, "The Country Bears" (2002) is one of the many live-action family adventure films on Disney's long list.

text: on her deathbed , candice klein accidentally asks the question , `` what did i ever do to deserve this ? ``
translation: Di atas ranjang kematiannya, Candice Klein secara tidak sengaja bertanya, "Apa dosa yang pernah aku lakukan untuk layak menerima ini?"
back_translation: On her deathbed, Candice Klein accidentally asked, "What sin have I committed to deserve this?"

text: chao was chen kaige 's assistant for years in china . he has not learnt that storytelling is what the movies are about .
translation: Chao adalah pembantu Chen Kaige selama bertahun-tahun di China. Dia tidak belajar bahawa menceritakan cerita adalah inti dalam filem.
back_translation: Chao has been Chen Kaige's assistant for years in China. He did not learn that storytelling is the essence of film.

text: stephen rea , aidan quinn , and alan bates play desmond 's legal eagles , and when joined by brosnan , the sight of this grandiloquent quartet lolling in pretty irish settings is a pleasant enough thing , 't is .
translation: Stephen Rea, Aidan Quinn, dan Alan Bates memainkan peguam Desmond, dan apabila bersama Brosnan, pemandangan kuartet megah ini berada di suasana Ireland yang cantik adalah sesuatu yang cukup menyenangkan.
back_translation: Stephen Rea, Aidan Quinn, and Alan Bates play the lawyers in Desmond, and when Brosnan joins them, the sight of this magnificent quartet in the beautiful Irish setting is quite delightful.

text: watching queen of the damned is like reading a research paper , with special effects tossed in .
translation: Menonton Queen of the Damned ibarat membaca kertas penyelidikan, dengan kesan visual yang dicampurkan.
back_translation: Watching Queen of the Damned is like reading a research paper with added visual impact.

text: shaun brumder is a local surfer kid from orange county who dreams of going to stanford to become a writer and to get away from his disfunctional family household .
translation: Shaun Brumder adalah seorang remaja peselancar tempatan dari Orange County yang bercita-cita untuk pergi ke Stanford untuk menjadi seorang penulis dan untuk menjauh dari rumah tangga keluarganya yang tidak berfungsi.
back_translation: Shaun Brumder is a local teenage surfer from Orange County who aspires to go to Stanford to become a writer and to get away from his dysfunctional family life.

text: new best friend should n't have gone straight to video ; it should have gone straight to a mystery science theater 3000 video .
translation: Rakan baru terbaik sepatutnya tidak terus pergi ke video; sepatutnya terus pergi ke video mystery science theater 3000.
back_translation: The best new friends should not immediately go to video; they should go straight to the video mystery science theater 3000.

text: the mystery of enigma is how a rich historical subject , combined with so much first-rate talent . . . could have yielded such a flat , plodding picture .
translation: Misteri enigma ialah bagaimana subjek sejarah yang kaya, digabungkan dengan bakat yang sangat berkualiti. . . telah menghasilkan gambaran yang begitu datar, membosankan.
back_translation: The mystery of the enigma is how a rich historical subject, combined with such high-quality talent... has resulted in a depiction that is so flat and boring.

text: craig is an older , average-looking man who is n't handling aging well .
translation: Craig adalah seorang lelaki yang lebih tua, rupa parasnya sederhana dan tidak menghadapi penuaan dengan baik.
back_translation: Craig is an older man, his appearance is plain and he does not age well.

text: in this cinematic concert , mesmerizing images are plucked from everyday reality , then visually altered with state-of-the-art digital techniques .
translation: Dalam konsert sinematik ini, imej yang memukau diambil daripada realiti harian, kemudian diubah secara visual dengan teknik digital bertaraf tinggi.
back_translation: In this cinematic concert, captivating images are taken from daily reality, then visually transformed using high-level digital techniques.

text: his destiny lies in the shadows of a black rose - the symbol of decayed innocence .
translation: Masa depannya terletak di bayang-bayang sebuah bunga ros hitam - lambang kekotoran ketidaktahuan.
back_translation: His future lies in the shadows of a black rose - a symbol of the filth of ignorance.

text: strangely comes off as a kingdom more mild than wild .
translation: agak memancarkan gambaran sebuah kerajaan yang lebih tenang daripada liar.
back_translation: somewhat evokes the image of a kingdom that is calmer than wild.

text: gambling and throwing a basketball game for money is n't a new plot -- in fact toback himself used it in black and white . but toback 's deranged immediacy makes it seem fresh again .
translation: Berjudi dan melemparkan perlawanan bola keranjang demi wang bukanlah plot baru - sebenarnya Toback sendiri menggunakannya dalam filem hitam putih. Tetapi kegerunan segerak Toback menjadikan plot ini terasa segar sekali lagi.
back_translation: Gambling and throwing basketball games for money is not a new plot - in fact, Toback himself used it in his black and white film. But Toback's fervor instantly makes this plot feel fresh once again.

text: smith examines the intimate , unguarded moments of folks who live in unusual homes -- which pop up in nearly every corner of the country .
translation: Smith mengkaji momen intim dan tidak terjaga dari orang-orang yang tinggal di rumah-rumah yang tidak biasa - yang muncul hampir di setiap sudut negara.
back_translation: Smith examines intimate and vulnerable moments of people living in unusual homes - which appear in almost every corner of the country.

text: two college grads land an entry level mafia job driving a retiring don 's car cross country .
translation: Dua orang graduan kolej mendapat pekerjaan peringkat permulaan dalam mafia untuk memandu kereta bos mafia yang sedang bersara merentasi negara.
back_translation: Two college graduates got entry-level jobs in the mafia to drive the mafia boss's car retired, traveling across the country.

text: screenwriter maureen tilyou , director martin duffy and an extremely competent cast handle the controversial aspects of the topic in an even-handed manner .
translation: Penulis skrip Maureen Tilyou, pengarah Martin Duffy, dan barisan pelakon yang sangat kompeten mengendalikan aspek kontroversial topik tersebut dengan penuh beradab.
back_translation: Scriptwriter Maureen Tilyou, director Martin Duffy, and a highly competent cast handle the controversial aspects of the topic with civility.

text: katie 's father 's injury comes back to haunt him and he finds himself paralyzed from the neck down .
translation: Kecederaan bapa Katie kembali menghantui beliau dan beliau mendapati dirinya lumpuh dari leher ke bawah.
back_translation: Katie's father's injury haunted her again and she found herself paralyzed from the neck down.

text: he is imprisoned , awaiting the death sentence for his crimes .
translation: Dia dipenjarakan, menunggu hukuman mati bagi jenayahnya.
back_translation: He is imprisoned, waiting for the death sentence for his crime.

text: now the chinese man shows up wanting the gems .
translation: Lelaki Cina itu kini muncul untuk meminta permata.
back_translation: The Chinese man now appears to ask for the gem.

text: the whole mess boils down to a transparently hypocritical work that feels as though it 's trying to set the women 's liberation movement back 20 years .
translation: Keseluruhan kekacauan itu terkait dengan satu kerja yang hipokrit secara terang-benderang yang terasa seolah-olah cuba mengundurkan gerakan pembebasan wanita 20 tahun ke belakang.
back_translation: The entire chaos is related to a blatant act of hypocrisy that feels as if it's trying to roll back the women's liberation movement by 20 years.

text: after selling the shop to a local loan shark , calvin slowly begins to see his father 's vision and legacy and struggles with the notion that he just sold it out .
translation: Selepas menjual kedai kepada seorang penyamun pinjaman tempatan, Calvin perlahan-lahan mula melihat visi dan warisan bapanya dan bergelut dengan fikiran bahawa dia baru sahaja menjualnya.
back_translation: After selling the shop to a local loan shark, Calvin slowly began to see his father's vision and legacy, struggling with the thought that he had just sold it.

text: simultaneously devastating and hilarious , the film manages to capture the daily rituals and mundanities of life in such engrossing proximity that everything becomes drama .
translation: Pada masa yang sama meruntuhkan dan lucu, filem ini berjaya merakamkan ritual harian dan kebiasaan hidup dalam kedekatan yang begitu memikat sehingga segalanya menjadi drama.
back_translation: At the same time destructive and funny, this film successfully captures daily rituals and living habits in such an engaging closeness that everything turns into drama.

text: adam sandler 's heart may be in the right place , but he needs to pull his head out of his butt
translation: Hati Adam Sandler mungkin betul, tetapi dia perlu mengeluarkan kepala daripada punggungnya.
back_translation: Adam Sandler's heart may be right, but he needs to take his head out of his behind.

text: that the e-graveyard holds as many good ideas as bad is the cold comfort that chin 's film serves up with style and empathy .
translation: Kubur e menyimpan idea baik dan buruk dalam jumlah yang sama adalah keselesaan dingin yang filem chin tawarkan dengan gaya dan empati.
back_translation: The tomb that holds both good and bad ideas in equal measure is the cold comfort that Chin's film offers with style and empathy.

text: when virginia visits her aunt millie at christmas , she discovers a stack of handwritten letters over half a century old , and unlocks the story of her aunt 's youthful days as a young woman living in hamilton , mississippi , during the second world war .
translation: Apabila Virginia melawat bibinya, Aunt Millie, semasa Krismas, dia menjumpai setumpuk surat bertulis lebih separuh abad yang lalu, dan mendedahkan kisah hari-hari remaja bibinya sebagai seorang wanita muda yang tinggal di Hamilton, Mississippi, semasa Perang Dunia Kedua.
back_translation: When Virginia visited her aunt, Aunt Millie, during Christmas, she found a stack of letters written over half a century ago, revealing the story of her aunt's teenage days as a young woman living in Hamilton, Mississippi, during World War II.

text: ultimately engages less for its story of actorly existential despair than for its boundary-hopping formal innovations and glimpse into another kind of chinese 'cultural revolution . '
translation: Pada akhirnya, filem itu menarik perhatian kurang kerana kisah putus asa eksistensi pelakonnya tetapi lebih kerana inovasi formal yang melintasi batasan dan sekilas pandang ke dalam jenis 'revolusi budaya' Cina yang lain.
back_translation: In the end, the film drew less attention due to the desperate story of the actor's existence but more because of the formal innovation that transcends boundaries and offers a glimpse into another type of Chinese 'cultural revolution'.

text: a few nonbelievers may rethink their attitudes when they see the joy the characters take in this creed , but skeptics are n't likely to enter the theater .
translation: Beberapa yang tidak percaya mungkin akan memikirkan kembali sikap mereka apabila melihat kegembiraan yang dirasakan oleh watak-watak ini terhadap keyakinan ini, tetapi orang yang skeptikal tidak mungkin akan masuk ke dalam teater.
back_translation: Some non-believers might reconsider their stance when they see the joy felt by these characters towards this belief, but skeptical individuals are unlikely to enter the theater.

text: and although billy does n't want jackson , two other guys do : derek , a clean-cut record store customer , and sam , the straight record store owner .
translation: Dan walaupun Billy tidak menginginkan Jackson, dua lelaki lain menginginkannya: Derek, seorang pelanggan kedai rekod yang kemas, dan Sam, pemilik kedai rekod yang lurus.
back_translation: And even though Billy does not desire Jackson, two other men desire him: Derek, a tidy record store customer, and Sam, the straight record store owner.

text: i walked away not really know who `` they `` were , what `` they `` looked like . why `` they `` were here and what `` they `` wanted and quite honestly , i did n't care .
translation: Saya berjalan pergi tanpa benar-benar tahu siapa "mereka" itu, bagaimana "mereka" kelihatan. Mengapa "mereka" berada di sini dan apa yang "mereka" mahu dan jujur saja, saya tidak peduli.
back_translation: I walked away without really knowing who "they" are, how "they" look. Why "they" are here and what "they" want and honestly, I don't care.

text: with the machine they travel across the country ( uruguay ) traing to escape to brazil .
translation: Dengan mesin itu, mereka melancong merentasi negara (Uruguay) dalam cubaan untuk melarikan diri ke Brazil.
back_translation: With that engine, they traveled across the country (Uruguay) in an attempt to escape to Brazil.

text: in the spirit of voltaire and moliM-hre , on guard volleys great wit and deadly gestures in a milieu of lush apparel , landscapes , captivating music and 18th-century lacy sleeves .
translation: Dengan semangat Voltaire dan Molière, dijaga olahragawan menyampaikan kecerdikan besar dan gerakan mematikan dalam suasana pakaian mewah, pemandangan, muzik menawan dan lengan berenda abad ke-18.
back_translation: With the spirit of Voltaire and Molière, the athlete is preserved delivering great wit and deadly movements in an atmosphere of luxurious clothing, magnificent scenery, enchanting music, and 18th-century lace sleeves.

text: exonerated of lying , king and cuthbertson are nevertheless reprimanded by the court for their behaviour , but receive an invitation to tea with the prime minister should they ever be in whitehall .
translation: Dibebaskan daripada berbohong, raja dan Cuthbertson masih ditegur oleh mahkamah atas tingkah laku mereka, tetapi menerima jemputan untuk minum teh dengan perdana menteri jika mereka berada di Whitehall suatu hari nanti.
back_translation: Absolved from lying, the king and Cuthbertson are still reprimanded by the court for their behavior but receive an invitation to have tea with the prime minister if they are in Whitehall one day.

text: the kind of sweet-and-sour insider movie that film buffs will eat up like so much gelati .
translation: Jenis filem yang manis masam yang peminat filem akan menikmati dengan sangat.
back_translation: Sweet and sour movies that movie fans will thoroughly enjoy.

text: [ it 's ] a clever thriller with enough unexpected twists to keep our interest .
translation: Ini adalah filem seram yang bijak dengan plot twist yang tidak terduga yang mencukupi untuk mengekalkan minat kita.
back_translation: This is a smart horror film with unexpected plot twists that are enough to keep our interest.

text: the word that comes to mind , while watching eric rohmer 's tribute to a courageous scottish lady , is painterly .
translation: Istilah yang terlintas dalam fikiran, semasa menonton persembahan erik rohmer kepada seorang wanita Scotland yang berani, adalah melukis.
back_translation: The term that came to mind while watching erik rohmer's performance with a brave Scottish woman is painting.

text: three fraternal bank robbers languishing in jail , discover a profitable ( if not dodgy ) way to spend their time .
translation: Tiga pencuri bank saudara yang sedang berada di dalam penjara, menemukan cara yang menguntungkan (walaupun agak meragukan) untuk menghabiskan waktu mereka.
back_translation: Three brothers who are bank robbers and currently in prison, have found a profitable (albeit dubious) way to spend their time.

text: noyce films it more as a shocking history lesson than as drama .
translation: Filem ini dipaparkan lebih sebagai satu pelajaran sejarah yang mengejutkan daripada drama.
back_translation: This film is portrayed more as a surprising history lesson than a drama.

text: a fourteen year old lad discovers his first love at the point of his pencil whilst drawing the portrait of a sickly but coquettish fifteen year old girl .
translation: Seorang anak lelaki berusia empat belas tahun menemui cinta pertamanya semasa menggambar potret seorang gadis berumur lima belas tahun yang lemah lembut tetapi manja.
back_translation: A fourteen-year-old boy meets his first love while drawing a portrait of a gentle but affectionate fifteen-year-old girl.

text: a young professional discovers the difficulty of leaving the corporate nest .
translation: Seorang profesional muda mengetahui kesukaran meninggalkan sarang korporat.
back_translation: A young professional knows the difficulty of leaving the corporate nest.

text: a demand for money is made and the men wait for payment .
translation: Tuntutan wang dibuat dan lelaki tersebut menunggu pembayaran.
back_translation: A money claim has been made and the man is waiting for payment.

text: but their cultural difference further separates them as lando ( antonio aquitania ) , isabel 's boyfriend , enters into the picture .
translation: Tetapi perbezaan budaya mereka lebih memisahkan mereka kerana lando (antonio aquitania), kekasih Isabel, muncul dalam gambar.
back_translation: But their cultural differences further separate them because Lando (antonio aquitania), Isabel's lover, appeared in the picture.

text: rarely has so much money delivered so little entertainment .
translation: Jarang sekali ada begitu banyak wang memberikan sedikit hiburan.
back_translation: Rarely do you find so much money providing so little entertainment.

text: especially one girl , isa , has to choose between two boys who are fighting against each other .
translation: Terutamanya seorang gadis, Isa, terpaksa memilih di antara dua lelaki yang bertentangan satu sama lain.
back_translation: Especially a girl, Isa, had to choose between two conflicting men.

text: the fictional film `` the dragon `` tells the story of how a young boy , who 's master is killed by a group of thugs , grows up to avenge his teacher 's murder .
translation: Filem rekaan "naga" mengisahkan kisah seorang budak lelaki yang guru beliau dibunuh oleh kumpulan penjahat dan bagaimana dia membesar untuk membalas pembunuhan guru beliau.
back_translation: The fictional film "dragon" tells the story of a young boy whose teacher was killed by a group of criminals and how he grew up to avenge his teacher's murder.

text: michael , sr . and michael , jr . then set out to get revenge on the man who killed peter and mrs . sullivan .
translation: Michael, Sr. dan Michael, Jr. kemudian berusaha untuk membalas dendam kepada lelaki yang membunuh Peter dan Mrs. Sullivan.
back_translation: Michael, Sr. and Michael, Jr. then seek revenge against the man who killed Peter and Mrs. Sullivan.

text: lukas and his friends live in a commune out in the woods .
translation: Lukas dan kawannya tinggal di sebuah komun di hutan.
back_translation: Luke and his friends live in a commune in the forest.

text: when his affair with a young troubled janitor ( kidman ) is uncovered , the secret silk had harbored for over fifty years from his wife , his children and colleague , writer nathan zuckerman , fast explodes in a conflagration of devastating consequences .
translation: Apabila hubungan sulitnya dengan seorang jururawat muda yang bermasalah (Kidman) terbongkar, rahsia yang terpendam selama lebih lima puluh tahun dari isterinya, anak-anaknya, dan rakan sepejabat, penulis Nathan Zuckerman, cepat meletup dalam bencana menghancurkan.
back_translation: When the difficult relationship with a troubled young nurse (Kidman) is revealed, the long-buried secret of more than fifty years from his wife, children, and colleagues explodes into a devastating disaster for the writer Nathan Zuckerman.

text: the most impressive quality of this charming movie is the way the characters , who are all recognizable 'types , ' refuse to behave the way we expect .
translation: Kualiti paling mengagumkan filem yang menarik ini ialah cara watak-wataknya, yang semuanya dikenali sebagai "jenis", enggan berkelakuan seperti yang kita jangkakan.
back_translation: The most amazing quality of this interesting film is the way its characters, all recognized as "types", refuse to behave as we expect.

text: after one gets the feeling that the typical hollywood disregard for historical truth and realism is at work here , it 's a matter of finding entertainment in the experiences of zishe and the fiery presence of hanussen .
translation: Setelah seseorang merasa bahawa sikap Hollywood yang cenderung mengabaikan kebenaran sejarah dan realisme sedang digunakan di sini, hal ini menjadi soal menemukan hiburan dalam pengalaman Zishe dan kehadiran berapi-api Hanussen.
back_translation: When someone feels that Hollywood's tendency to ignore historical accuracy and realism is being used here, it becomes a question of finding entertainment in Zishe's experience and the passionate presence of Hanussen.

text: it 's a movie -- and an album -- you wo n't want to miss .
translation: Ini adalah filem - dan album - yang anda tidak mahu terlepas.
back_translation: This is a film - and album - that you do not want to miss.

text: jolie 's performance vanishes somewhere between her hair and her lips .
translation: Pentasannya pudar di antara rambutnya dan bibirnya.
back_translation: The stage fades among her hair and lips.

text: what 's most unusual about beijing bicycle in terms of recent chinese history is that any form of class conflict is depicted at all .
translation: Yang paling tidak biasa tentang "Beijing Bicycle" dalam konteks sejarah China baru-baru ini adalah penggambaran konflik kelas.
back_translation: The most unusual thing about "Beijing Bicycle" in the context of recent Chinese history is the depiction of class conflicts.

text: in present-day london , twelve-year-old quinn watches as his mother , a construction engineer , inadvertently wakes an enormous fire-breathing beast from its century-long slumber .
translation: Di London zaman sekarang, Quinn yang berusia dua belas tahun menyaksikan ibunya, seorang jurutera pembinaan, secara tidak sengaja membangunkan seekor binatang besar yang memuntahkan api dari tidurnya selama berabad-abad.
back_translation: In present-day London, twelve-year-old Quinn witnesses his mother, a construction engineer, accidentally awaken a large creature that spews fire from its slumber after centuries.

text: the story suffers a severe case of oversimplification , superficiality and silliness .
translation: Kisah itu menghasilkan keadaan ringkas yang terlalu mudah, sekadar di permukaan, dan bodoh.
back_translation: The story produces a brief situation that is too easy, just surface-level, and foolish.

text: a criminal mastermind has set in motion a plan to infiltrate a high tech prison in order to persuade a death row inmate to reveal the whereabouts of $ 200 million worth of gold .

text: documentary feature about the traditional viennese cinema `` bellaria `` , which is specialised in german cinema from the 20s , 30s and 40s and its regular customers , whose idols are stars like zarah leander or karl sch & # 246 ; nb & # 246 ; ck .
translation: Filem dokumentari mengenai pawagam tradisional Vienna "Bellaria", yang pakar dalam filem Jerman dari tahun 20-an, 30-an, dan 40-an serta pelanggannya yang tetap, yang idolanya adalah bintang-bintang seperti Zarah Leander atau Karl Schönbröck.

text: [ the kid 's ] just too bratty for sympathy , and as the film grows to its finale , his little changes ring hollow .

text: in any case , i would recommend big bad love only to winger fans who have missed her since 1995 's forget paris . but even then , i 'd recommend waiting for dvd and just skipping straight to her scenes .

back_translation: For me, I would only recommend Big Bad Love to Winger fans who have missed it since Forget Paris in 1995. However, even so, I would suggest waiting for the DVD and skipping straight to the scenes only.

text: as both marly and desiree grapple with the sometimes overwhelming weight of family history and family expectations , and wrestle with questions of love , duty and responsibility , the tale offers a portrait of two women , two families , and two communities standing on the brink of change .
translation: Apabila Marly dan Desiree bergelut dengan beban sejarah keluarga dan harapan keluarga yang kadang-kadang sangat memberatkan serta mempertimbangkan soal cinta, kewajiban dan tanggungjawab, kisah ini menawarkan gambaran dua wanita, dua keluarga, dan dua komuniti yang berada di tepi perubahan.

back_translation: It is too interested in masturbation in all its intricate incarnations to provide pleasure to its audience.

text: hired to take mr . brown to a rendezvous with the devil ( gary oldman ) , the driver soon finds himself entangled in fiendish plans .
translation: Ditugaskan untuk membawa Tuan Brown ke pertemuan dengan syaitan (Gary Oldman), pemandu itu tidak lama kemudian terjerat dalam rancangan jahat.
back_translation: Assigned to bring Mr. Brown to a meeting with the devil (Gary Oldman), the driver soon becomes entangled in an evil plot.

text: in the end , the film feels homogenized and a bit contrived , as if we 're looking back at a tattered and ugly past with rose-tinted glasses .
translation: Pada akhirnya, filem tersebut terasa dijajarkan dan sedikit dipura-pura, seolah-olah kita sedang melihat kembali pada masa lalu yang rosak dan buruk dengan kaca mata berwarna pink.
back_translation: In the end, the film felt contrived and slightly pretentious, as if we were looking back at a damaged and dark past through rose-colored glasses.

text: when she 's approached one day by a handsome stranger while trying to hail a taxi , she becomes obsessed with him and eventually starts an affair .
translation: Apabila dia didekati oleh seorang lelaki tampan ketika cuba menaiki teksi, dia menjadi obses dengan lelaki tersebut dan akhirnya memulakan perselingkuhan.
back_translation: When she was approached by a handsome man while trying to catch a taxi, she became obsessed with him and eventually started an affair.

text: lynn and yan shared an unspoken love in the past which is now rekindled in the open , and lynn begins to question whether she wants to continue to be an assassin .
translation: lynn dan yan berkongsi cinta yang tidak disebutkan di masa lalu yang kini disapu bersih, dan lynn mula mempertikaikan sama ada dia mahu terus menjadi pembunuh.
back_translation: lynn and yan share an unspoken love in their past that is now wiped clean, and lynn begins to question whether she wants to continue being a killer.

text: his story explores the ramifications of leaving afghanistan and living as a refugee in america .
translation: Kisah ini meneroka akibat meninggalkan Afghanistan dan hidup sebagai pelarian di Amerika.
back_translation: This story explores the consequences of leaving Afghanistan and living as a refugee in America.

text: when the professor turns up missing , one of his students , jake whitcomb , finds the professor 's journal , inside of which is a copy of the map .
translation: Apabila profesor hilang, salah seorang daripada pelajarnya, Jake Whitcomb, menemui jurnal profesor, di dalamnya terdapat salinan peta.
back_translation: When the professor went missing, one of his students, Jake Whitcomb, found the professor's journal, in which there was a copy of a map.

text: a film that will be best appreciated by those willing to endure its extremely languorous rhythms , waiting for happiness is ultimately thoughtful without having much dramatic impact .
translation: Filem yang paling dihargai oleh mereka yang bersedia menerima irama yang sangat lambat, Waiting for Happiness pada akhirnya adalah satu yang berfikir tanpa memberikan kesan dramatik yang besar.
back_translation: The most appreciated film by those willing to accept a very slow pace, Waiting for Happiness ultimately is one that makes one think without providing significant dramatic impact.

text: set in san francisco , this is the story of a mysterious immortal tibetan kung fu master ( yun-fat ) , who has spent the last 60 years traveling around the world protecting an ancient scroll , who is now mentoring a street kid ( scott ) in the wonders of his ancient ways . . .
translation: Terletak di San Francisco, ini adalah kisah seorang guru kung fu Tibet misterius yang abadi (Yun-fat), yang telah menghabiskan 60 tahun terakhir melakukan perjalanan di seluruh dunia untuk melindungi sebuah gulungan kuno, dan kini menjadi mentor bagi seorang anak jalanan (Scott) tentang keajaiban cara kuno tersebut...
back_translation: Located in San Francisco, this is the story of a mysterious immortal Tibetan kung fu master (Yun-fat), who has spent the last 60 years traveling the world to protect an ancient scroll, and now becomes a mentor to a street kid (Scott) about the wonders of this ancient way...

text: nights feels more like a quickie tv special than a feature film . . . it 's not even a tv special you 'd bother watching past the second commercial break .
translation: Malam ini terasa lebih seperti program khas tv yang singkat daripada filem panjang. . . Ia bukan malah program khas tv yang anda sanggup menonton selepas iklan ke-2.
back_translation: Tonight feels more like a special short TV program rather than a long movie. It's not even a TV special program that you'd be willing to watch after the second commercial.

text: it is no coincidence that funding for `` anti-graffiti `` campaigns often outweighs funding for the arts .
translation: Tidaklah kebetulan bahawa pembiayaan untuk kempen "anti-graffiti" sering melebihi pembiayaan untuk bidang seni.
back_translation: It is not coincidental that funding for "anti-graffiti" campaigns often exceeds funding for the arts.

text: the characters seem one-dimensional , and the film is superficial and will probably be of interest primarily to its target audience .
translation: Watak-watak kelihatan datar, dan filem ini adalah secara permukaan dan mungkin hanya menarik kepada penonton sasarannya.
back_translation: The characters appear flat, and this film is superficial and may only appeal to its target audience.

text: aside from being the funniest movie of the year , simone , andrew niccol 's brilliant anti-hollywood satire , has a wickedly eccentric enchantment to it .
translation: Selain menjadi filem paling lucu dalam tahun itu, "Simone", satura anti-Hollywood yang brilian oleh Andrew Niccol, mempunyai daya tarikan eksentrik yang jahat padanya.
back_translation: Besides being the funniest film of the year, "Simone", a brilliant anti-Hollywood satire by Andrew Niccol, has a wickedly eccentric appeal to it.

text: reinforces the often forgotten fact of the world 's remarkably varying human population and mindset , and its capacity to heal using creative , natural and ancient antidotes .
translation: memperkuat fakta yang sering dilupakan tentang populasi manusia yang sangat berbeza di dunia ini serta cara berfikir mereka, dan keupayaannya untuk menyembuhkan diri menggunakan penawar kreatif, semulajadi, dan kuno.
back_translation: To strengthen the often forgotten facts about the vastly different human populations in this world and their ways of thinking, as well as their ability to heal themselves through creative, natural, and ancient remedies.

text: soon it 's not just harry who is worried about survival , as dreadful things begin to happen at hogwarts .
translation: Tidak lama lagi, bukan hanya Harry yang bimbang tentang kelangsungan hidup, kerana perkara-perkara yang mengerikan mula terjadi di Hogwarts.
back_translation: Not long after, it was not just Harry who was worried about survival, as terrible things began to happen at Hogwarts.

text: as with so many merchandised-to-the-max movies of this type , more time appears to have gone into recruiting the right bands for the playlist and the costuming of the stars than into the script , which has a handful of smart jokes and not much else .
translation: Seperti kebanyakan filem yang sangat digunakan secara komersil, lebih banyak masa nampaknya telah digunakan untuk mendapatkan kumpulan band yang tepat untuk senarai main dan pakaian bintang daripada untuk skrip, yang hanya mempunyai beberapa jenaka pintar dan tidak banyak lagi.
back_translation: Like most commercially-driven films, it seems that more time has been spent on securing the right band lineup and star costumes for the cast list rather than on the script, which only has a few clever jokes and not much more.

text: in his sleepy home town on the english coast , nothing much inspires him . . . apart from bowls .
translation: Di bandar kecilnya yang tenang di pantai England, tidak ada yang begitu membangkitkan semangatnya... kecuali mangkuk.
back_translation: In his quiet little coastal town in England, nothing stirs his spirits quite like a bowl.

text: beneath the uncanny , inevitable and seemingly shrewd facade of movie-biz farce . . . lies a plot cobbled together from largely flat and uncreative moments .
translation: Di bawah tirai aneh, tidak dapat dielakkan dan seolah-olah cerdik dari sandiwara dunia filem... terdapat plot yang disusun dari sebahagian besar momen yang datar dan tidak kreatif.
back_translation: Under the strange curtain, unavoidable and seemingly clever from the world of film drama... there lies a plot constructed from mostly flat and uncreative moments.

text: rather than spreading good cheer , the duo 's motive is to rob each establishment , a strategy that becomes complicated when they encounter a precocious 8-year old that teaches them the true meaning of christmas .
translation: Berbanding menyebarkan keceriaan, motif pasangan itu adalah untuk merompak setiap premis, sebuah strategi yang menjadi rumit apabila mereka bertemu dengan seorang kanak-kanak cerdik berusia 8 tahun yang mengajar mereka erti sebenar Krismas.
back_translation: Rather than spreading joy, the couple's motive is to plunder every premise, a strategy that becomes complex when they encounter an intelligent 8-year-old child who teaches them the true meaning of Christmas.

text: serry does a fine job of capturing the climate of the times and , perhaps unwittingly , relating it to what is happening in america in 2002 . but hard-to-believe plot twists force the movie off track in its final half hour .
translation: Serry melakukan kerja yang baik dalam menangkap iklim pada masa itu dan mungkin tanpa disedarinya, mengaitkannya dengan apa yang berlaku di Amerika pada tahun 2002. Tetapi plot twist yang sukar dipercayai menyebabkan filem ini tergelincir dalam separuh jam terakhirnya.
back_translation: Serry did a good job in capturing the climate at that time and perhaps without realizing it, linked it to what was happening in America in 2002. But an unbelievable plot twist caused the film to slip in its last half hour.

text: transforms one of [ shakespeare 's ] deepest tragedies into a smart new comedy .
translation: Menukar salah satu tragedi yang paling mendalam [ Shakespeare ] menjadi sebuah komedi baru yang pintar.
back_translation: Transforming one of the deepest tragedies [Shakespeare] into a new smart comedy.

text: during his skyrocketing career , johnathan has to experience what alexi has found out : blood brings more viewing pleasure to the audience .
translation: Semasa kerjayanya yang meroket, Johnathan terpaksa merasai apa yang ditemui oleh Alexi: darah membawa lebih banyak keseronokan kepada penonton.
back_translation: During his skyrocketing career, Johnathan had to experience what Alexi found: blood brings more joy to the audience.

text: ghisu and rupi are now promoted as commanders of their new dalam .
translation: ghisu dan rupi kini dipromosikan sebagai komander dalam dalam baru mereka.
back_translation: Ghisu and Rupi are now promoted as commanders in their new unit.

text: with no option , joe and katsuragi must use their martial arts skills to fight in the muscle dome .
translation: Tanpa pilihan, Joe dan Katsuragi harus menggunakan kemahiran seni bela diri mereka untuk bertarung di muscle dome.
back_translation: Without a choice, Joe and Katsuragi had to use their martial arts skills to fight in the muscle dome.

text: it 's an often-cute film but either needs more substance to fill the time or some judicious editing .
translation: Ini adalah filem yang kerap kali comel tetapi perlu lebih kandungan untuk mengisi masa atau sedikit penyuntingan yang bijak.
back_translation: This is a movie that is often cute but needs more substance to fill in the time or a little smart editing.

text: the film presents a brief but intriguing biography of its subject .
translation: Filem tersebut menyajikan biografi yang ringkas tetapi menarik tentang subyeknya.

text: veteran film director matty bonkers ( bob rafelson ) , a hollywood legend , arrives in berlin for an honorary retrospective tribute .
translation: Pengarah filem veteran Matty Bonkers (Bob Rafelson), seorang legenda Hollywood, tiba di Berlin untuk menerima penghormatan retrospektif kehormatannya.
back_translation: Veteran filmmaker Matty Bonkers (Bob Rafelson), a Hollywood legend, arrives in Berlin to receive retrospective honors for his distinguished career.

text: da primeira seqM-|M-jncia de luta M-` piada que encerra a histM-sria , o espectador jamais desgruda os olhos da tela , saindo do cinema com a sensaM-gM-co de que gastou bem seu dinheiro .
translation: Dari awal adegan pertarungan hingga akhir cerita yang lucu, penonton tidak pernah melepaskan pandangannya dari layar, keluar dari bioskop dengan perasaan telah menghabiskan uang dengan baik.
back_translation: From the beginning of the fighting scenes to the end of the funny story, the audience never takes their eyes off the screen, leaving the cinema feeling like they have spent their money well.

text: with a cast of non-actors , drawn from the very world which the film portrays , 'shooters ' is not just another british genre gangster film - it 's a film about real british gangsters .
translation: Dengan barisan pelakon bukan profesional, yang diambil dari dunia yang filem persembahkan, 'shooters' bukan sekadar filem gangster genre British yang lain - ini adalah filem tentang gangster sebenar dari Britain.
back_translation: With a cast of non-professional actors taken from the world that the film portrays, 'Shooters' is not just another British gangster genre film - this is a film about real gangsters from Britain.

text: this 'blonde goddess ' , however , left her career at its peak to devote herself to a life of meditation and religious devotion , in the mountains of rio de janeiro .
translation: 'Gadis pirang' ini, bagaimanapun, meninggalkan kerjayanya pada puncak kejayaannya untuk mendedikasikan dirinya kepada kehidupan meditasi dan kehambaan agama, di kawasan gunung Rio de Janeiro.
back_translation: However, this 'blonde girl' left her career at the height of her success to dedicate herself to a life of meditation and religious devotion, in the mountains of Rio de Janeiro.

text: holofcener sees all of her characters as loving and amazing and she spreads the love to each .
translation: Holofcener melihat semua wataknya sebagai penuh kasih dan menakjubkan dan dia menyebarkan kasih sayang kepada setiap satu.
back_translation: Holofcener sees all her characters as loving and amazing and she spreads love to each one.

text: they 're also neighbours , living with widower fathers and problem siblings in the suburbs of taipei .
translation: Mereka juga jiran, tinggal dengan bapa yang ditinggalkan isteri dan adik-beradik yang bermasalah di pinggir bandar Taipei.
back_translation: They are also neighbors, living with a father who was left by his wife and siblings with problems on the outskirts of Taipei city.

text: the boys ' sparring , like the succession of blows dumped on guei , wears down the story 's more cerebral , and likable , plot elements .
translation: Penggulungan gaduh lelaki seperti pertemuan pukulan ke atas Guei , melemahkan elemen plot yang lebih bersifat cerebral dan menyenangkan dalam cerita.
back_translation: The chaotic fighting scenes involving men, like the brawl with Guei, weaken the more cerebral and enjoyable plot elements in the story.

text: winnie falls inlove with one of the tucks , jesse , a `` 17 `` year old boy who shares the same feelings for her .
translation: Winnie jatuh cinta pada salah seorang dari keluarga Tuck, Jesse, seorang jejaka berusia "17" tahun yang juga berkongsi perasaan yang sama untuknya.
