text: in the 1800 's there was a woman that little children would take their old teeth ( ones they had recently lost ) to in exchange for a gold coin .
translation: Pada tahun 1800-an, terdapat seorang wanita yang kanak-kanak kecil akan memberikan gigi susu mereka (gigi yang baru mereka lepaskan) sebagai pertukaran untuk sebuah syiling emas.
back_translation: In the 1800s, there was a woman who would give her small children's baby teeth (the ones they had just lost) in exchange for a gold coin.

text: may lack the pungent bite of its title , but it 's an enjoyable trifle nonetheless .
translation: Mungkin tiada kepedasan yang bergelora seperti judulnya, tetapi tetap merupakan sesuatu yang menyeronokkan.
back_translation: There may not be a fiery spiciness like its title suggests, but it's still something enjoyable.

text: soon discovering that they 're in a strange fourth dimension where our laws of physics do n't apply , they have to unravel the secrets of the `` hypercube `` in order to survive . . .
translation: Mereka segera mengetahui bahawa mereka berada dalam dimensi keempat yang aneh di mana undang-undang fizik kita tidak berlaku, mereka harus mengungkap rahasia "hiperkubus" untuk bertahan hidup...
back_translation: They immediately realised that they were in a strange fourth dimension where our laws of physics do not apply, they must uncover the secret of the "hypercube" to survive...

text: a zippy , enormously entertaining heist movie that , with a kind heart at its core , encompasses the styles of yesterday , today , and if we 're lucky , maybe even tomorrow .
translation: Filem rampasan yang pantas, sangat menghiburkan yang, dengan hati yang baik di intinya, merangkumi gaya-gaya semalam, hari ini, dan jika kita bernasib baik, mungkin juga esok.
back_translation: A fast-paced action movie, very entertaining, with a good heart at its core, encompassing styles of yesterday, today, and if we're lucky, possibly tomorrow too.

text: urban ground squirrels is the hilarious tale of love , friendship , and experiences set against the battlefield of a modern college campus .
translation: Urban ground squirrels adalah kisah lucu tentang cinta, persahabatan, dan pengalaman yang berlangsung di medan perang kampus universiti moden.
back_translation: Urban ground squirrels is a funny tale of love, friendship, and experiences that unfold in the modern university campus battlefield.

text: with this masterful , flawless film , [ wang ] emerges in the front ranks of china 's now numerous , world-renowned filmmakers .
translation: Dengan filem yang mahir dan sempurna ini, [wang] muncul di barisan hadapan pengarah filem China yang kini ramai dan terkenal di seluruh dunia.
back_translation: With this skillful and perfect film, [the money] emerges as one of the forefront Chinese filmmakers who are now prominent and famous worldwide.

text: meanwhile , dre is growing increasingly restless with his company 's focus on profit over artistry , which leads to signing the gimmicky duo ren and ten while ignoring the talented chris .
translation: Sementara itu, Dre semakin gelisah dengan fokus syarikatnya pada keuntungan berbanding seni, yang mengakibatkan dia menandatangani duo yang berputar-putar, Ren dan Ten, sementara mengabaikan bakat Chris.
back_translation: Meanwhile, Dre is becoming restless with his company's focus on profits rather than art, which leads him to sign the duo Ren and Ten, while disregarding the talent of Chris.

text: the picture seems uncertain whether it wants to be an acidic all-male all about eve or a lush , swooning melodrama in the intermezzo strain .
translation: Gambar itu kelihatan tidak pasti sama ada mahu menjadi filem berunsur asidik yang melibatkan lelaki semata-mata berunsur 'All About Eve', atau sebuah melodrama yang merunsingkan dalam aliran 'Intermezzo'.
back_translation: The picture seems uncertain whether it wants to be an acidic-themed film involving only male elements like 'All About Eve', or a poignant melodrama in the 'Intermezzo' style.

text: the submarine 's crew , led by the unyielding captain alexi vostrikov , races against time to prevent a chernobyl-like nuclear disaster which threatens not only the lives of his crew , but has the potential to ignite a world war between the super powers .
translation: Pasukan kapal selam , dipimpin oleh kapten yang tidak pernah berundur, Alexi Vostrikov, berlumba melawan masa untuk mencegah bencana nuklear yang mengancam seperti Chernobyl yang bukan sahaja mengancam nyawa pasukannya, tetapi juga berpotensi melonjakkan peperangan dunia antara kuasa besar.
back_translation: The submarine team, led by the unwavering captain, Alexi Vostrikov, races against time to prevent a nuclear disaster that threatens like Chernobyl, not only risking the lives of his crew but also potentially fueling a world war between major powers.

text: jenny even turns to the flower girl - who is n't much help .
translation: Jenny bahkan meminta tolong kepada gadis penjual bunga - yang tidak terlalu membantu.
back_translation: Jenny even asked for help from the flower seller girl - who was not very helpful.

text: one year later , in los angeles , the surviving team members create a smart and devious plan to steal back the gold and get their revenge on the traitor .
translation: Setahun kemudian, di Los Angeles, ahli pasukan yang masih hidup membuat rancangan pintar dan licik untuk mencuri semula emas dan menyokong dendam mereka terhadap pengkhianat.
back_translation: A year later, in Los Angeles, the surviving team members devised a cunning and clever plan to steal back the gold and seek revenge on the traitor.

text: the pied piper production penned by christian otjen concerns a 36-year-old man ( brian wimmer ) who returns to his hometown to confront the harsh reality of his father 's supposed suicide .
translation: Produksi Pied Piper yang ditulis oleh Christian Otjen berkisar tentang seorang lelaki berusia 36 tahun (Brian Wimmer) yang kembali ke kampung halamannya untuk menghadapi kenyataan pahit dari kematian ayahnya yang diduga bunuh diri.
back_translation: The production of Pied Piper, written by Christian Otjen, revolves around a 36-year-old man (Brian Wimmer) who returns to his hometown to confront the harsh reality of his father's alleged suicide.

text: the brass are convinced this is a serial killer chosing victims at random , but sam and buckley discover a pattern involving health personnel who work in neonatal intensive care .
translation: Para anggota kumpulan khas itu yakin bahawa ini adalah pembunuh bersiri yang memilih mangsa secara rawak, tetapi Sam dan Buckley menemui corak yang melibatkan kakitangan kesihatan yang bekerja di unit rawatan neonatal.
back_translation: The members of the special task force are confident that this is a serial killer who chooses victims at random, but Sam and Buckley discovered a pattern involving healthcare staff working in the neonatal care unit.

text: zhang . . . has done an amazing job of getting realistic performances from his mainly nonprofessional cast .
translation: Zhang telah melakukan kerja yang mengagumkan dalam mendapatkan persembahan realistik daripada barisan pelakonnya yang kebanyakannya bukan profesional.
back_translation: Zhang has done an amazing job in getting a realistic performance from his mostly non-professional cast members.

text: it 's a beautifully accomplished lyrical meditation on a bunch of despondent and vulnerable characters living in the renown chelsea hotel . . .
translation: Ini adalah meditasi lirik yang indah tentang beberapa watak yang sedih dan rentan yang tinggal di hotel terkenal Chelsea...
back_translation: This is a beautiful lyrical meditation about some sad and vulnerable characters living in the famous Chelsea hotel...

text: you see what he sees , you feel what he feels , you experience the horrible delusions and the verge of insanity as he struggles to find the thinning line between reality and the subconscious .
translation: Anda melihat apa yang dilihatnya, anda merasai apa yang dirasainya, anda mengalami khayalan yang mengerikan dan tepi kegilaan ketika dia berjuang untuk mencari garis tipis antara realiti dan subseksus.
back_translation: You see what he sees, you feel what he feels, you experience frightening fantasies and the brink of madness as he struggles to find the thin line between reality and subconsciousness.

text: part way through the filming , stevie is arrested and charged with a serious crime that tears his family apart .
translation: Di tengah-tengah proses penggambaran, Stevie ditangkap dan dituduh melakukan jenayah serius yang meruntuhkan keluarganya.
back_translation: In the middle of the drawing process, Stevie was arrested and accused of committing a serious crime that tore his family apart.

text: riveting when it focuses on the challenges of crossing a generational divide .
translation: Mengasyikkan apabila memberi tumpuan kepada cabaran dalam merentasi jurang generasi.
back_translation: It is enjoyable to focus on the challenges in bridging the generation gap.

text: the impact of the armenian genocide is diluted by too much stage business in the modern day .
translation: Kesan genosida Armenia telah disapu oleh terlalu banyak urusan pentas dalam zaman moden.
back_translation: The impact of the Armenian genocide has been overshadowed by too many other issues on the global stage in the modern era.

text: windtalkers is shapelessly gratifying , the kind of movie that invites you to pick apart its faults even as you have to admit that somehow it hit you where you live .
translation: "Windtalkers sangat memuaskan tanpa bentuk yang jelas, jenis filem yang mengajak anda untuk mengkritik kelemahannya walaupun anda terpaksa mengakui bahawa ia memukau anda di tempat yang mendalam."
back_translation: "Windtalkers is very satisfying without a clear form, the type of film that invites you to critique its weaknesses even though you have to admit that it captivates you on a deep level."

text: a young boy is devastated when the planned vacation with his father is cancelled due to an emergency salvage mission at a remote canadian lake .
translation: Seorang budak lelaki terkejut apabila percutian yang dirancang bersama bapanya dibatalkan kerana misi penyelamat kecemasan di sebuah tasik terpencil di Kanada.
back_translation: A boy was surprised when the planned vacation with his father was canceled due to an emergency rescue mission at a remote lake in Canada.

text: a coming of age dramatic comedy dealing with the effect that two `` summers `` have on the lives of several teenagers .
translation: sebuah komedi dramatik tentang dewasa yang membincangkan kesan dua "musim panas" terhadap kehidupan beberapa remaja.
back_translation: A dramatic comedy about adults discussing the effects of two "summer seasons" on the lives of several teenagers.

text: what really makes it special is that it pulls us into its world , gives us a hero whose suffering and triumphs we can share , surrounds him with interesting characters and sends us out of the theater feeling we 've shared a great adventure .
translation: Apa yang membuatnya benar-benar istimewa adalah ia menarik kita ke dalam dunianya, memberi kita seorang wira yang penderitaan dan kejayaannya dapat kita kongsi, mengelilinginya dengan watak-watak menarik dan menghantar kita keluar dari teater dengan rasa bahawa kita telah berkongsi pengembaraan yang hebat.
back_translation: What makes it truly special is that it draws us into its world, giving us a hero whose suffering and triumphs we can share, surrounding him with interesting characters, and sending us out of the theater feeling that we have shared a great adventure.

text: she is really hiding her true emotional motivation behind a mask .
translation: Dia benar-benar menyembunyikan motivasi emosinya yang sebenar di sebalik topeng.
back_translation: He truly hides his true emotional motives behind a mask.

text: it showcases carvey 's talent for voices , but not nearly enough and not without taxing every drop of one 's patience to get to the good stuff .
translation: Ia memperlihatkan bakat Carvey dalam suara, tetapi tidak cukup dan tidak tanpa mengecewakan kesabaran seseorang untuk sampai kepada bahagian yang baik.
back_translation: It showcases Carvey's talent in voice, but it's not enough and not without disappointing someone's patience to reach a good part.

text: though the film is well-intentioned , one could rent the original and get the same love story and parable .
translation: Walaupun filem itu bertujuan baik, seseorang boleh menyewa versi asalnya dan mendapatkan cerita cinta dan perumpamaan yang sama.

text: harry potter is in his second year of hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry .
translation: Harry Potter berada dalam tahun kedua di Sekolah Hogwarts untuk Seni Sihir dan Penyihir.
back_translation: Harry Potter is in his second year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

text: as the girls foil this threat and defeat an army of superpowered monkeys , the powerpuff girls learn that with great power comes great responsibility .
translation: Apabila gadis-gadis menggagalkan ancaman ini dan mengalahkan tentera monyet superkuasa, Powerpuff Girls belajar bahawa dengan kuasa yang besar, datang tanggungjawab yang besar.
back_translation: When the girls thwarted this threat and defeated the super-powered monkey army, the Powerpuff Girls learned that with great power comes great responsibility.

text: the actors improvise and scream their way around this movie directionless , lacking any of the rollicking dark humor so necessary to make this kind of idea work on screen .

text: no , the dangerous lives of altar boys does not exist in a state of perfect grace . however , its sins are forgivably venial , because its virtues are palpably human .

text: like being trapped inside a huge video game , where exciting , inane images keep popping past your head and the same illogical things keep happening over and over again .

text: as laughable is his vanity fair interview , incriminating of `` the gay mafia `` for his fall , `` my dinner with ovitz `` is even funnier as it rams the actual interview headlong into coppola 's `` godfather . ``

text: in this sense it is merely a travelogue , yet there is so much more , spanning from the traditional to the avant-garde , from the sublime to the ridiculous , very different , highly original and with a unique zeitgeist narrative structure .

text: the story unveils three high school seniors who dress and live by the philosophy of `` goth , `` good friends and great rebels : digger , noisy , and dvd .

back_translation: The story tells about three Form Five students who dress and live their lives according to the "goth" philosophy, great friends and strong rebels: digger, noisy, and dvd.

text: there 's ushi , harry 's lawyer , who knows something about harry lena does n't know , eddie , a friend of harry and his new girlfriend pol , and at last , there are two policemen who are in fact unwelcome .
translation: Ada ushi, peguam Harry, yang tahu sesuatu tentang Harry yang Lena tidak tahu, Eddie, seorang kawan Harry dan teman perempuan baru dia, Pol, dan akhir sekali, ada dua orang polis yang sebenarnya tidak diundang.

text: though howard demonstrates a great eye as a director , this southern gothic drama is sadly a tough sit , with an undeveloped narrative and enough flashbacks and heavy-handed metaphors to choke a horse -- or at least slow him down to a canter .
translation: Walaupun Howard menunjukkan bakat yang hebat sebagai pengarah, drama gotik selatan ini disayangkan sukar untuk dinikmati, dengan naratif yang tidak terbangun dan cukup banyak kilas balik serta metafora yang terlalu berat yang cukup untuk membuat kuda tercekik - atau sekurang-kurangnya melambatkan langkahnya.
back_translation: While Howard shows great talent as a director, this Southern Gothic drama is unfortunately difficult to enjoy, with an unfocused narrative and plenty of flashbacks and heavy-handed metaphors that are enough to make a horse choke - or at least slow its pace.

text: more intimate than spectacular , e . t . is carried less by wow factors than by its funny , moving yarn that holds up well after two decades .
translation: Lebih intim daripada spektakuler, E.T. dibawa lebih oleh faktor-faktor lucu, bergerak yang bertahan dengan baik selepas dua dekad.

text: his exciting and stylish life as a drug lord seems to have come to a halt .
translation: Kehidupan yang mencabar dan bergaya sebagai ketua dadah nampaknya telah berhenti.

text: crumbling yerba city stands empty , except for its drug-parlors , where the remnants of the population cluster , drifting towards oblivion .

text: nobody seems to have cared much about any aspect of it , from its cheesy screenplay to the grayish quality of its lighting to its last-minute , haphazard theatrical release .
translation: Tiada sesiapa yang nampaknya mengambil berat tentang sebarang aspek filem tersebut, dari skrip yang cheesy sehingga kualiti kelabu pencahayaannya sehingga penayangannya yang terakhir minit dan terburu-buru.

text: especially one of them , holo tokyo boy , was designed to be her lover .
translation: Khususnya salah satunya, holo tokyo boy, direka untuk menjadi kekasihnya.

text: on the case , he soon deducts that the killer , who staged the murder to look like a random robbery , may actually be a serial killer terry was trailing for years in the fbi .
translation: Dalam kes ini, dia dengan cepat membuat kesimpulan bahawa pembunuh, yang menyusun pembunuhan itu untuk kelihatan seperti perompakan rawak, sebenarnya mungkin merupakan seorang pembunuh berantai yang Terry telah menjejak selama bertahun-tahun di FBI.

text: time changer may not be the most memorable cinema session but its profound self-evaluation message about our fragile existence and the absence of spiritual guidance should at least invade an abundance of mindsets
translation: Pertukar masa mungkin bukan sesi wayang yang paling mudah dilupakan tetapi mesej penilaian kendiri yang mendalam tentang kewujudan kita yang rapuh dan ketiadaan panduan spiritual sekurang-kurangnya seharusnya memasuki pelbagai pemikiran.
back_translation: The exchange of time may not be the easiest cinema session to forget, but the deep self-assessment message about our fragile existence and the lack of spiritual guidance at the very least should enter various thoughts.

text: aka birdseye is the saga of an obsessive colorado sheriff and his trusting teenage son , who risk it all when their twisted reconstruction of a mysterious kidnapping case escalates into a dangerous hunt for a mythical swiss criminal .
translation: "Aka Birdseye" adalah kisah tentang seorang sheriff yang obsesif dari Colorado dan anak remajanya yang percaya padanya, yang mengambil risiko besar saat rekonstruksi yang terpelintir dari kasus penculikan misterius berkembang menjadi perburuan berbahaya untuk penjenayah asal Swiss yang mitos.
back_translation: "Aka Birdseye" is a story about an obsessive sheriff from Colorado and his teenage son who believes in him, taking great risks as the twisted reconstruction of a mysterious kidnapping case evolves into a dangerous hunt for a mythical Swiss criminal.

text: with virtually no interesting elements for an audience to focus on , chelsea walls is a triple-espresso endurance challenge .
translation: Dengan hampir tiada elemen menarik untuk penonton memberi tumpuan, Chelsea Walls merupakan satu cabaran ketahanan tripli-espresso.

text: a delightful fable about the enduring value of literature .
translation: sebuah dongeng yang mengasyikkan tentang nilai kekal sastera.

text: little more than a stylish exercise in revisionism whose point . . . is no doubt true , but serves as a rather thin moral to such a knowing fable .

translation: Mereka berdua melarikan diri ke bandar Hamburg dan menyeludup bersama mereka apa yang dulunya merupakan eksport terbesar orang Viking, seekor falcon Islandia.
back_translation: They both fled to the city of Hamburg and smuggled with them what used to be the Vikings' largest export, an Icelandic falcon.

text: henrik , the young cook , is hopelessly in love with enchanting elena , but lacks the courage to dance with her .
translation: Henrik, tukang masak muda, putus asa jatuh cinta kepada Elena yang mempesonakan, tetapi kurang keberanian untuk menari dengannya.

text: the second : a saturday two years later , where charlotte and cecil now a couple , fight , break-up and finally reunite .
translation: Pada hari Sabtu dua tahun kemudian, di mana Charlotte dan Cecil kini merupakan pasangan, bertengkar, berpisah, dan akhirnya berdamai semula.
back_translation: On a Saturday two years later, where Charlotte and Cecil are now a couple, they argued, separated, and finally made peace again.

text: flashy gadgets and whirling fight sequences may look cool , but they ca n't distract from the flawed support structure holding equilibrium up .
translation: Gajet yang mencolok dan adegan pertarungan berputar mungkin kelihatan keren, tetapi mereka tidak boleh mengalihkan perhatian dari struktur sokongan yang rosak yang mengekalkan keseimbangan.

translation: Apabila Eliza mengetahui bahawa pemburu haram di gurun Serengeti Afrika merancang untuk membunuh kawanan gajah dengan pagar elektrik, dia dan rakan simpanse nya, Darwin, harus mencari cara untuk menghentikan mereka.
back_translation: When Eliza found out that poachers in the Serengeti Desert in Africa are planning to kill a herd of elephants with an electric fence, she and her chimp friend, Darwin, have to find a way to stop them.

text: the trouble with making this queen a thoroughly modern maiden is that it also makes her appear foolish and shallow rather than , as was more likely , a victim of mental illness .

text: sands also convinces jorge ramirez ( retired-fbi , has old scores to settle with barrillo ) to come out of retirement and take out barrillo and dr . guevera ( personal dr . to barrillo , killed jorge 's partner a long time ago ) , who brutally tortured and killed ramirez ' fbi partner .

text: very well made , but does n't generate a lot of tension .

text: as his circle of friends keeps getting smaller one of the characters in long time dead says 'i 'm telling you , this is f * * * ed ' . maybe he was reading the minds of the audience .

text: it 's hard to fairly judge a film like ringu when you 've seen the remake first . many of the effective horror elements are dampened through familiarity , [ yet ] are worthwhile .

text: may be far from the best of the series , but it 's assured , wonderfully respectful of its past and thrilling enough to make it abundantly clear that this movie phenomenon has once again reinvented itself for a new generation .
translation: Mungkin jauh dari yang terbaik dalam siri ini, tetapi pastinya dijamin, begitu menghormati warisan masa lalunya dan cukup mengasyikkan untuk menjelaskan dengan jelas bahawa fenomena filem ini sekali lagi telah membaharui dirinya untuk generasi baru.
back_translation: Perhaps not the best in the series, but it is certainly guaranteed, so respectful of its past heritage and engaging enough to make it clear that this film phenomenon has once again refreshed itself for a new generation.

text: the film includes victim discussion therapy sessions , phone councilling , conversations between police and abusers , arrests , debates and discussion between the workers at the refuge , trying to decide what should be done about certain cases .

text: on the whole , the movie lacks wit , feeling and believability to compensate for its incessant coarseness and banality .

text: carion relies on a gesture or passages of silence to get his point across ; it 's a technique that packs a greater emotional punch than a tidy , hollywood-style monologue ever would .

back_translation: Carion depends on cues or levels of silence to convey its meaning; it is a technique that delivers a greater emotional impact than the polished Hollywood-style monologues.

text: however when her doodles of a spiralling forest continue to draw themselves it is only the start of a creative process that will see her removed from her dull form .

text: after a confrontation with a house elf named dobby , harry escapes to the weasley house with ron weasley ( rupert grint ) in a flying car .

text: it is a film that will have people walking out halfway through , will encourage others to stand up and applaud , and will , undoubtedly , leave both camps engaged in a ferocious debate for years to come .

text: martin and barbara are complex characters -- sometimes tender , sometimes angry -- and the delicate performances by sven wollter and viveka seldahl make their hopes and frustrations vivid .

text: it takes this never-ending confusion and hatred , puts a human face on it , evokes shame among all who are party to it and even promotes understanding .

text: since then , he was considered crazy by everyone in town , except for his childhood girlfriend , caitlin ( emma caulfield ) , and her younger brother .

text: `` politics are murder `` is a `` film noir `` comedy mixing dry martinis with politics and murder .

text: there is no solace here , no entertainment value , merely a fierce lesson in where filmmaking can take us .

text: against the background of an australian desert landscape , so much space and so few people , sandy , a geologist , and hiromitsu , a japanese businessman , play out a story of human inconsequence in the face of the blistering universe .

text: one of the film 's most effective aspects is its tchaikovsky soundtrack of neurasthenic regret .

text: a set of grisly murders brings fbi agent will graham ( norton ) out of retirement and puts him in search of an atrocious killer ( fiennes ) who 's driven by the image of a painting .

back_translation: A series of brutal murders brings FBI agent Will Graham (Norton) out of retirement and leads him on the hunt for a cruel killer (Fiennes) driven by images of paintings.

text: taken outside the context of the current political climate ( see : terrorists are more evil than ever ! ) , the sum of all fears is simply a well-made and satisfying thriller .
translation: Di luar konteks iklim politik semasa (lihat: pengganas lebih jahat dari sebelumnya!), kesemua ketakutan hanyalah sebuah filem thriller yang baik dan memuaskan.
back_translation: Outside the context of the current political climate (see: terrorists more wicked than ever!), all fears are just a good and satisfying thriller movie.

text: a peruvian film that tells the story of the bank robberies ' legend , orlando gonz & # 225 ; les best known as django .
translation: Filem Peru yang menceritakan kisah legenda perampok bank, Orlando González yang lebih dikenali sebagai Django.

text: the ultimate hell is about to be raised on earth .
translation: Neraka terakhir akan dinaikkan di bumi.

text: `` washington heights `` tells the story of carlos ramirez , a young illustrator burning to escape the latino neighborhood of the same name to make a splash in new york city 's commercial downtown comic book scene .
translation: ``Washington Heights`` mengisahkan tentang Carlos Ramirez, seorang ilustrator muda yang bercita-cita untuk melarikan diri dari kawasan Latino yang sama untuk mencipta nama di arena komik kota New York.
back_translation: ``Washington Heights'' tells the story of Carlos Ramirez, a young illustrator with aspirations to escape from the same Latino neighborhood to make a name for himself in the New York City comic arena.

text: terry , a spoilt brat is just too lazy a student .
translation: Terry, seorang anak manja terlalu malas sebagai seorang pelajar.

text: when his wayward sister , kassie ( kerry washington ) , goes missing eddie burns finds himself subjected to a fiendish and ingenious campaign of revenge by the mysterious charlie strom ( gary oldman ) .
translation: Apabila adiknya yang suka sesat, Kassie (Kerry Washington), hilang, Eddie Burns mendapati dirinya menjadi mangsa kempen balas dendam yang sengit dan bijak oleh Charlie Strom yang misteri (Gary Oldman).
back_translation: When her wandering-loving sister, Kassie (Kerry Washington), goes missing, Eddie Burns finds himself the target of a fierce and cunning revenge campaign by the mysterious Charlie Strom (Gary Oldman).

text: if . . . you 're the adventurous sort , check it out .
translation: Jika... kamu jenis yang suka cabaran, periksalah.

text: it 's exactly what you 'd expect : no more and no less .

text: however a school teacher warned the train , so the gang and all the others in the pub ended up in a shootout with scores of policemen .

text: the game 's mastermind has stolen his identity , put him on the fbi 's most wanted list , and is blackmailing him to take a part in a real twisted plan of world destruction .

text: like a can of 2-day old coke . you can taste it , but there 's no fizz .

text: the film is a hoot , and is just as good , if not better than much of what 's on saturday morning tv especially the pseudo-educational stuff we all ca n't stand .

text: for as god watches we live , some according to his will and some not .

text: the film creates an effective sense of time and place , though sheridan is not above hitting us over the head with obvious stylistic contrivances .

text: the talents of the actors helps `` moonlight mile `` rise above its heart-on-its-sleeve writing .

text: a coming-of-age tale from new zealand whose boozy , languid air is balanced by a rich visual clarity and deeply felt performances across the board .
translation: kisah tumbesaran dari New Zealand yang atmosfera mabuknya seimbang dengan kejelasan visual yang kaya dan lakonan yang dirasai secara mendalam di seluruh pihak.

text: a steroid of sorts , it drives whoever takes the drugs to kill .

text: several years after his release , his drug-using father manny comes back into his life and kilo reluctantly welcomes him back with a job overseeing all of his drug runners .
translation: Beberapa tahun selepas dilepaskan, bapa Kilo yang pengguna dadah, Manny, kembali ke dalam hidupnya dan Kilo menerima kedatangannya dengan berat hati dengan memberikannya pekerjaan mengawasi semua pengedar dadahnya.
back_translation: Several years after being released, Kilo's drug user father, Manny, returned to his life and Kilo reluctantly welcomed him by giving him the task of overseeing all his drug dealers.

text: this film is based on `` our sunshine `` by robert drew , a novel based on the life of australian bushranger and icon , ned kelly .

text: she is forced to approach roxie with an offer of a part in her vaudville act ( filling the gap left by her murdered sister ) , but roxie turns down her offer flat , thinking she needs no support in topping the bill .
translation: Dia terpaksa mendekati Roxie dengan tawaran untuk bergabung dalam aksi vaudeville-nya (mengisi kekosongan yang ditinggalkan oleh kakak perempuannya yang telah dibunuh), tetapi Roxie menolak tawarannya dengan tegas, berpikir bahwa dia tidak memerlukan bantuan dalam menjadi bintang utama.
back_translation: She had to approach Roxie with an offer to join her vaudeville act (filling the gap left by her murdered sister), but Roxie firmly rejected her offer, thinking that she did not need help in becoming the leading star.

text: from her complex and enduring relationship with her mentor and husband to her illicit and controversial affair with leon trotsky , to her provocative and romantic entanglements with women , frida kahlo lived a bold and uncompromising life as a political , artistic , and sexual revolutionary .
translation: Dari hubungannya yang kompleks dan berkekalan dengan mentornya dan suaminya hingga hubungan gelap dan kontroversialnya dengan Leon Trotsky, hingga keterlibatannya yang provokatif dan romantis dengan wanita-wanita, Frida Kahlo menjalani kehidupan yang berani dan tegas sebagai revolusioner politik, seni, dan seksual.
back_translation: From her complex and enduring relationship with her mentor and husband to her dark and controversial relationship with Leon Trotsky, to her provocative and romantic involvement with women, Frida Kahlo lived a bold and assertive life as a political, artistic, and sexual revolutionary.

text: set 10 years after the events in `` the phantom menace `` .

text: there 's nothing provocative about this film save for the ways in which it studiously avoids provoking thought .

text: his dream had vanished , so he went home and got a job at his fathers gas station in virgil grove , population 28 .
translation: Impiannya telah lenyap, jadi dia pulang dan mendapat pekerjaan di stesen minyak bapanya di Virgil Grove, dengan populasi 28 orang.

text: its impressive images of crematorium chimney fires and stacks of dead bodies are undermined by the movie 's presentation , which is way too stagy .

text: as the death toll mounts , it falls to detective maria delgado - mistrusted outsider from madrid ( played by mira sorvino ) - to stop the bizarre killings .

text: though the bosses killed his father , he is loyal to them and is considered family .

text: though it is by no means his best work , laissez-passer is a distinguished and distinctive effort by a bona-fide master , a fascinating film replete with rewards to be had by all willing to make the effort to reap them .

text: their assignment : using equal parts skill and humor , catch arnold gundars , one of the world 's most successful illegal arms dealers , and foil his treacherous plans for the plane .

text: as gamely as the movie tries to make sense of its title character , there remains a huge gap between the film 's creepy , clean-cut dahmer ( jeremy renner ) and fiendish acts that no amount of earnest textbook psychologizing can bridge .

text: for those with the stomach and stamina for its heartbeat-quickening intensity and body-slamming action , rollerball delivers exactly what it promises : a people 's hero you can really get behind .

text: goes some way towards explaining how the tragedy occurred and its enduring legacy today .

translation: Danny, yang menjadi paranoid dan menciptakan kekacauan ketika menonton "der lift" (filem seram hitam-putih Jerman) dan mengalami halusinasi tentang menjadi pelakon dalam filem itu (Ricardo Mamood), tidak memiliki keberanian untuk berdepan dengan seorang gadis separuh usianya.

translation: Brad, seorang pelajar seni yang berharap untuk memenangi biasiswa bergengsi, mendapati kehidupan dan kerjayanya menjadi kacau bilau apabila dia jatuh cinta pada seorang ahli fakulti di kolejnya, Lisa Ducharme, yang kebetulannya menjadi penyelia tesis kekasihnya...

translation: Sejak itu, Patricia bangkit dengan segera menjadi bintang.

text: certainly no biopic , nijinsky is short on facts , but long on expression .

text: as bob the tomato and the kids settle in to wait for a tow truck to help get their van back on the road , the `` pirates who do n't do anything `` share a little story about a guy named jonah .

text: six of the nations brightest spoken word artists came together in new orleans on september 2 , to begin a life transforming journey to new york city for the memorial anniversary of september 11 .

text: both lead performances are oscar-size . quaid is utterly fearless as the tortured husband living a painful lie , and moore wonderfully underplays the long-suffering heroine with an unflappable '50s dignity somewhere between jane wyman and june cleaver .
translation: Kedua lakonan utama adalah layak digelar sebagai yang layak untuk Oscar. Quaid benar-benar berani sebagai suami yang teraniaya hidup dalam kebohongan yang menyakitkan, dan Moore hebat mempersembahkan watak heroin yang menderita lama dengan martabat tahun 50-an yang teguh di antara Jane Wyman dan June Cleaver.

text: they 're jewish , they 're grandmothers , and they 're lesbians .

text: whether or not ram dass proves as clear and reliable an authority on that as he was about inner consciousness , fierce grace reassures us that he will once again be an honest and loving one .

text: sam and ash become good friends as they fight to save celebi from the new team rocket villain , the iron-masked marauder and his darkball , which turns pok & # 233 ; mon evil and augments their powers to the maximum .

text: 'enigma ' is the kind of engaging historical drama that hollywood appears to have given up on in favor of sentimental war movies in the vein of 'we were soldiers . '

text: the trinity assembly approaches the endeavor with a shocking lack of irony , and george ratliff 's documentary , hell house , reflects their earnestness M-^W which makes for a terrifying film .

text: a triumph , a film that hews out a world and carries us effortlessly from darkness to light .

text: the originally noble motive rapidly degenerated into an orgy of bloodletting and terror .

text: as this bizarro weekend unfolds , we see exactly what adam has to do to preserve his sanity and his friendships .

text: when taraneh discovers she is pregnant she decides against all advice and intense social pressure , to keep the baby .

text: he begins to spread the gospel of communal ideals , which he has absorbed during his travels in india .

text: where the trail ends , terror begins soft-spoken 15-year old leland fitzgerald ( gosling ) commits a seemingly senseless murder that shocks his community , affecting both his victim 's family and his own .
translation: Di mana lorong berakhir, teror bermula dengan Leland Fitzgerald yang berusia 15 tahun dan berbicara dengan lembut (gosling) melakukan pembunuhan yang nampaknya tanpa sebab yang mengejutkan komunitinya, mempengaruhi keluarga mangsanya dan keluarganya sendiri.

text: colorful , energetic and sweetly whimsical . . . the rare sequel that 's better than its predecessor .
translation: Warna-warni, penuh dengan tenaga dan manis serta kekanakan. . . sekuel yang jarang dijumpai yang lebih baik daripada prekuelnya.
back_translation: Colorful, full of energy and sweetness, and childish... a rare sequel that is better than its prequel.

text: moves in such odd plot directions and descends into such message-mongering moralism that its good qualities are obscured .
translation: bergerak dalam arah plot yang aneh dan mula tenggelam dalam moralisme yang terlalu didaktik sehingga kualiti baiknya terabai.
back_translation: moves in a strange direction and begins to sink into overly didactic moralism, causing its good quality to be neglected.

text: it is most of the things costner movies are known for ; it 's sanctimonious , self-righteous and so eager to earn our love that you want to slap it .
translation: Ini adalah kebanyakkan perkara yang filem-file Costner dikenali; ia bersifat suci, sombong, dan begitu bersungguh-sungguh untuk mendapatkan kasih sayang kita sehingga anda ingin menamparnya.
back_translation: This is most of what Costner's films are known for; they are sacred, pompous, and so earnest in seeking our affection that you want to slap him.

text: johnny knoxville and his crazy friends appear on the big screen for the very first time in jackass : the movie .
translation: Johnny Knoxville dan rakan-rakannya yang gila muncul di skrin besar untuk kali pertama dalam Jackass: Filem.
back_translation: Johnny Knoxville and his crazy friends appeared on the big screen for the first time in Jackass: The Movie.

text: a gracefully acted , unsentimental , quite likable little coming-of-age movie .
translation: Sebuah filem kecil tentang peringkat muda yang dilakonkan dengan anggun, tanpa sentimental, dan agak menyenangkan.
back_translation: A small film about young adults performed elegantly, without sentimentality, and quite enjoyable.

text: johnathan accepts and learns the ropes of rollerball : the players are on rollerblades , trying to bring a heavy metal ball into a high goal .
translation: Johnathan menerima dan belajar cara bermain rollerball: para pemain menggunakan rollerblade, cuba memasukkan bola logam berat ke dalam gol tinggi.
back_translation: Johnathan received and learned how to play rollerball: players use rollerblades, trying to score a heavy metal ball into a high goal.

text: resort to an all-night crime spree that nets them a ten thousand dollar reward for their own crimes , thanks to a bizarre twist of fate .
translation: melakukan gelora jenayah sepanjang malam yang menghasilkan ganjaran sepuluh ribu dolar atas jenayah mereka sendiri, berkat putaran takdir yang aneh.
back_translation: committing a crime spree all night that resulted in a ten thousand dollar reward for their own crimes, thanks to a strange twist of fate.

text: while van wilder may not be the worst national lampoon film , it 's far from being this generation 's animal house .
translation: Walaupun Van Wilder mungkin bukan filem National Lampoon yang terburuk, ia jauh dari menjadi Animal House generasi ini.
back_translation: Although Van Wilder may not be the worst National Lampoon movie, it's far from being the Animal House of this generation.

text: the driver races to locate a kidnapped victim locked in the trunk of an abandoned car somewhere on the water 's edge .
translation: Pemandu berlumba untuk mencari mangsa diculik yang terkunci dalam bonet kereta terbiar di tepi air.
back_translation: The drivers raced to find the kidnapped victim locked in the abandoned car trunk by the river.

text: sean 's a drug dealer , owes a lot of money to `` fellow `` dealer rupert guest ( clifton collins , jr . ) , and sleeps with nearly half of the female population on campus .
translation: Sean adalah seorang peniaga dadah, berhutang banyak wang kepada peniaga lain yang bernama Rupert Guest (diwatakkan oleh Clifton Collins, Jr.), dan tidur dengan hampir separuh dari populasi wanita di kampus.
back_translation: Sean is a drug dealer, owes a lot of money to another dealer named Rupert Guest (portrayed by Clifton Collins, Jr.), and sleeps with almost half of the female population on campus.

text: . . . a b-movie-and-proud-of-it thrill ride , probably the best of its kind since tremors .
translation: . . . suatu pengalaman yang mengasyikkan ala filem B, dan bangga dengan itu, mungkin yang terbaik dalam kategorinya sejak Tremors.
back_translation: ...an enjoyable experience akin to a B-movie, and proud of it, possibly the best in its category since Tremors.

text: in awe of seductive club singer velma kelly ( who is subsequantly arrested for the murder of her husband and sister - after discovering their affair ) , roxie meets fred cassely a man who convinces her he can 'make her showbiz career take off ' .
translation: Terpesona dengan penyanyi kelab yang memikat, Velma Kelly (yang kemudian ditangkap kerana membunuh suaminya dan adiknya - setelah mengetahui perselingkuhan mereka), Roxie bertemu dengan Fred Cassely, seorang lelaki yang meyakinkannya bahawa dia boleh 'membuat kerjaya dalam dunia hiburannya melonjak'.
back_translation: Enthralled by the captivating club singer, Velma Kelly (who later got arrested for killing her husband and sister after discovering their affair), Roxie meets Fred Cassely, a man who convinces her that she can 'launch a career in the entertainment world'.

text: everything is pegged into the groove of a new york dating comedy with 'issues ' to simplify .
translation: Semuanya terikat dalam alur sebuah komedi kencan New York dengan 'isu-isu' untuk disederhanakan.
back_translation: Everything is intertwined in the plot of a New York romantic comedy with 'issues' to be simplified.

text: a beautiful meditation on the life force and redemptive power of literature -- for writers and readers alike -- and on what it means to be fully alive , navigating the rocky terrain between vision and execution .
translation: sebuah meditasi yang indah tentang daya hidup dan kekuatan penebusan dari sastera - baik bagi penulis dan pembaca - dan tentang apa maksudnya untuk benar-benar hidup, melalui medan yang bergelombang antara visi dan pelaksanaan.
back_translation: A beautiful meditation on the power of life and the redemptive power of literature - for both the writer and the reader - and what it means to truly live, through the undulating terrain between vision and execution.

text: the word in las vegas is that he is dead .
translation: Khabar di Las Vegas mengatakan bahawa dia telah meninggal dunia.
back_translation: Reports from Las Vegas say that he has passed away.

text: the real draw , though , is the performance by dunst that is , alone , worth the price of admission .
translation: tetapi, yang benar-benar menarik adalah persembahan oleh Dunst yang sendirian, bernilai harga tiket.
back_translation: However, what is truly intriguing is Dunst's solo performance, worth the ticket price.

text: after a decade of hidden feelings , divorces and failed relationships , they both finally reveal their true feelings for one another - to find out they both are in love with the other .
translation: Selepas satu dekad menyimpan perasaan terpendam, perceraian dan hubungan yang gagal, mereka akhirnya mendedahkan perasaan sebenar mereka satu sama lain - hanya untuk mengetahui bahawa mereka sebenarnya saling mencintai.
back_translation: After a decade of holding back their feelings, divorce, and failed relationships, they finally revealed their true feelings to each other - only to realize that they actually love each other.

text: they threw loads of money at an idea that should 've been so much more even if it was only made for teenage boys and wrestling fans .
translation: Mereka membuang banyak wang pada idea yang sepatutnya lebih baik walaupun hanya untuk remaja lelaki dan peminat gulat.
back_translation: They wasted a lot of money on ideas that should have been better even if only for teenage boys and wrestling fans.

text: credit director ramsay for taking the sometimes improbable story and making it feel realistic .
translation: Kredit kepada pengarah Ramsay kerana menjadikan cerita yang kadang-kadang mustahil itu terasa realistik.
back_translation: Credit to director Ramsay for making a story that sometimes seems impossible feel realistic.

text: enter four months later , when it seems reasonable to say that charlie should be feeling better .
translation: Empat bulan kemudian, di mana nampaknya wajar untuk mengatakan bahawa Charlie sepatutnya berasa lebih baik.
back_translation: Four months later, where it seems appropriate to say that Charlie should be feeling better.

text: if the man from elysian fields is doomed by its smallness , it is also elevated by it -- the kind of movie that you enjoy more because you 're one of the lucky few who sought it out .
translation: Jika lelaki dari Elysian Fields ditentukan oleh kekecilannya, ia juga dinaikkan olehnya - jenis filem yang anda lebih menikmati kerana anda adalah salah seorang dari yang bertuah yang mencarinya.
back_translation: If the man from Elysian Fields is defined by his smallness, he is also raised by it - the kind of film that you enjoy more because you are one of the fortunate ones seeking it.

text: amanda is faced with making right decisions amidst trying circumstances .
translation: Amanda dihadapkan dengan membuat keputusan yang tepat di tengah-tengah keadaan yang mencabar.
back_translation: Amanda is faced with making the right decision in the midst of challenging circumstances.

text: new york serves as a backdrop for a cast of characters in search of love , lust or lucre including a woman who makes awkward moves on the man renovating her soho loft , an embezzler , a sleazy artist and a phone psychic .
translation: New York berfungsi sebagai latar belakang untuk sekumpulan watak yang mencari cinta, nafsu atau kekayaan termasuk seorang wanita yang membuat gerak-geri awkward pada lelaki yang sedang mengubah suho loftnya, seorang pencuri wang, seorang seniman yang licik dan seorang ahli ramalan telefon.
back_translation: New York serves as the backdrop for a group of characters seeking love, desire, or wealth, including a woman who makes awkward moves on a man who is renovating his loft, a money thief, a cunning artist, and a telephone psychic.

text: in the end , we are left with something like two ships passing in the night rather than any insights into gay love , chinese society or the price one pays for being dishonest .
translation: Pada akhirnya, kita hanya ditinggalkan dengan sesuatu yang seperti dua kapal yang lewat di malam hari daripada pengetahuan mengenai cinta sesama jenis, masyarakat Cina, atau harga yang perlu dibayar kerana tidak jujur.
back_translation: In the end, we are only left with something like two ships passing in the night rather than knowledge of same-sex love, the Chinese community, or the price to pay for being dishonest.

text: the following things are not at all entertaining : the bad sound , the lack of climax and , worst of all , watching seinfeld ( who is also one of the film 's producers ) do everything he can to look like a good guy .
translation: Berikut adalah perkara-perkara yang sama sekali tidak menghiburkan: bunyi yang buruk, ketiadaan klimaks, dan yang paling teruk, menonton Seinfeld (yang juga merupakan salah seorang penerbit filem itu) berusaha sebaik mungkin untuk kelihatan seperti orang baik.
back_translation: Here are things that are entirely not entertaining: bad sounds, lack of climax, and worst of all, watching Seinfeld (who is also one of the film's producers) try his best to appear as a good person.

text: one ca n't shake the feeling that crossroads is nothing more than an hour-and-a-half-long commercial for britney 's latest album .
translation: Seseorang tidak dapat menghilangkan perasaan bahawa crossroads hanyalah sebuah iklan selama satu setengah jam untuk album terbaru britney.
back_translation: Someone can't shake off the feeling that the crossroads is just a one-and-a-half-hour advertisement for Britney's latest album.

text: all these developments and challenges facing santa weigh down the plot so heavily that they drain all the film of its energy and needlessly strain credibility .
translation: Semua perkembangan dan cabaran yang dihadapi oleh Santa ini begitu memberatkan plot sehingga mengalihkan seluruh tenaga filem dan secara tidak perlu menekan kebolehpercayaannya.
back_translation: All the developments and challenges faced by Santa are so burdensome to the plot that it diverted the entire film's energy and unnecessarily pressed on its credibility.

text: the good girl is a film in which the talent is undeniable but the results are underwhelming .
translation: Filem "the good girl" adalah satu filem di mana bakatnya tidak dapat dinafikan tetapi hasilnya kurang memuaskan.
back_translation: The film "The Good Girl" is a movie where the talent cannot be denied, but the outcome is less satisfying.

text: when all but one of mi5 's top agents are killed in an explosion .
translation: apabila hampir semua ejen teratas MI5 terbunuh dalam letupan itu.
back_translation: When almost all the top agents of MI5 were killed in the explosion.

text: the whole of sunshine state is less than the sum of its parts , but the parts are often lovely , and always true .
translation: Negara bagian Sunshine secara keseluruhan kurang dari jumlah bagian-bagiannya, tetapi bagian-bagiannya sering indah, dan selalu benar.
back_translation: The state of Sunshine as a whole is less than the sum of its parts, but its parts are often beautiful and always correct.

text: treats a potentially explosive set-up with adult reflection and thoughtfulness .
translation: Merawat satu situasi yang berpotensi meletup dengan pemikiran dewasa dan kebijaksanaan.
back_translation: Handle a potentially explosive situation with mature thoughts and wisdom.

text: though not as tightly focused or as well-performed as malkovich , human nature has its own absurdist flair .
translation: Walaupun tidak seketat fokus atau sebaik persembahan seperti Malkovich, sifat manusia mempunyai gaya absurdisnya sendiri.
back_translation: Although not as tight in focus or as good a performance as Malkovich, human nature has its own absurd style.

text: in a surrealistic approach typical of the director , a clumsy cat and an intelligent monkey are also present in the film .
translation: Dalam pendekatan surrealistik yang lazim bagi pengarahnya, seekor kucing yang ceroboh dan seekor monyet yang bijak juga hadir dalam filem tersebut.
back_translation: In the usual surrealist approach of the director, a careless cat and a wise monkey also appear in the film.

text: it 's deep-sixed by a compulsion to catalog every bodily fluids gag in there 's something about mary and devise a parallel clone-gag .
translation: Ia disisihkan oleh satu paksaan untuk mengkatalog setiap lelucon tentang cecair badan di dalam filem "There's Something About Mary" dan mencipta satu lelucon palsu yang sepadan.
back_translation: It is overshadowed by a compulsion to catalog every joke about body fluids in the movie "There's Something About Mary" and create a matching fake joke.

text: a kilted jackson is an unsettling sight , and indicative of his , if you will , out-of-kilter character , who rambles aimlessly through ill-conceived action pieces .
translation: Seorang Jackson yang memakai kilt adalah pemandangan yang mengganggu, dan menggambarkan dirinya, jika boleh dikatakan, sebagai seorang yang tidak seimbang, yang berkelana tanpa tujuan melalui adegan tindakan yang direncanakan dengan buruk.
back_translation: A Jackson wearing a kilt is a disturbing sight, and portrays himself, so to speak, as an unbalanced individual, wandering aimlessly through poorly planned action scenes.

text: less an examination of neo-nazism than a probe into the nature of faith itself .
translation: bukanlah suatu pemeriksaan terhadap neo-nazisme tetapi suatu siasatan terhadap sifat iman itu sendiri.
back_translation: It is not an investigation into neo-Nazism but an investigation into the nature of faith itself.

text: despite impeccable acting . . . and a script that takes some rather unexpected ( even , at times , preposterous ) turns , love is just too , too precious in the end .
translation: Walaupun lakonan yang tidak dapat dinafikan kehebatannya . . . dan skrip yang mengambil beberapa perubahan yang agak tak terduga (bahkan, pada masa tertentu, absurd ), cinta pada akhirnya terlalu, terlalu berharga.
back_translation: Despite the undeniable brilliance of the acting... and the script that takes some quite unexpected turns (even, at times, absurd), love ultimately is far too, too precious.

text: vincent gallo is right at home in this french shocker playing his usual bad boy weirdo role .
translation: Vincent Gallo sesuai benar di rumah dalam filem mengejutkan Perancis ini memainkan peranan biasa sebagai bad boy aneh.
back_translation: Vincent Gallo perfectly fits in at home in this surprising French film playing the role of an unusual bad boy.

text: director roger kumble offers just enough sweet and traditional romantic comedy to counter the crudity . and there 's the inimitable diaz , holding it all together .
translation: Pengarah Roger Kumble menawarkan cukup komedi romantik manis dan tradisional untuk menyeimbangkan kekasaran. Dan di sini, ada Diaz yang tidak dapat ditiru, yang mengekalkan kesemuaannya.
back_translation: Director Roger Kumble offers enough sweet and traditional romantic comedy to balance out the roughness. And here, there's Diaz, who is incomparable, maintaining her charm throughout.

text: after a long inventory of break-up mishaps , nick enlists the help of his best friend to plan the perfect escape from his overbearing girlfriend .
translation: Selepas mengalami banyak kejadian yang tidak menyenangkan semasa putus cinta, Nick mendapatkan bantuan dari sahabat karibnya untuk merancang pelarian yang sempurna dari kekasihnya yang terlalu mendominasi.
back_translation: After experiencing many unpleasant events during a breakup, Nick gets help from his close friend to plan the perfect escape from his overly dominating partner.

text: < em > the crocodile hunter : collision course < /em > is one of the most unusual movies i 've ever seen , but it remains faithful to irwin 's appeal , and therefore it works .
translation: "the crocodile hunter: collision course" adalah salah satu filem yang paling tidak biasa yang pernah saya tonton, tetapi ia tetap setia kepada daya tarikan Irwin, dan oleh itu ia berjaya.
back_translation: "The crocodile hunter: collision course" is one of the most unusual films I have ever watched, but it remains true to Irwin's charm, and hence, it succeeds.

text: nemesis suffers from a paunchy midsection , several plodding action sequences and a wickedly undramatic central theme .
translation: Nemesis mengalami masalah bahagian tengah yang buncit, beberapa adegan aksi yang berat dan tema pusat yang tidak dramatik.
back_translation: Nemesis is experiencing issues with its bloated middle section, some heavy action scenes, and a central theme that is undramatic.

text: he dies before he gets a chance to communicate with the spirit and his dead body with the ouija board is left to the devices to his strung out friends .
translation: Dia meninggal sebelum berpeluang untuk berkomunikasi dengan roh dan mayatnya yang sudah mati dengan papan ouija ditinggalkan kepada rakan-rakan yang terpinggir.
back_translation: He died before having the chance to communicate with his deceased spirit and body with the Ouija board left to his marginalized friends.

text: only nurse bloom knows the spells to ensure that the child will see benevolent spirits , not evil ones , but she has n't bargained for lena 's mother , who scoffs at 'old time ideas ' and discreetly disposes of the special tea the nurse has brewed .
translation: Hanya jururawat Bloom yang tahu mantra untuk memastikan bahawa kanak-kanak akan melihat roh-roh yang baik, bukan yang jahat, tetapi dia tidak mengira dengan ibu Lena, yang menghina 'idea lama' dan diam-diam membuang teh istimewa yang disediakan oleh jururawat.
back_translation: Only Bloom's nurse knows the mantra to ensure that children will see good spirits, not evil ones, but she is unaware of Lena's mother who mocks the 'old idea' and secretly discards the special tea provided by the nurse.

text: the warden 's attitude starts to change after 8 years , when mitra tries to protect a new inmate from rape at the hands of her older cellmates .
translation: Sikap penjaga berubah selepas 8 tahun, apabila Mitra cuba melindungi tahanan baru daripada dicabul oleh tahanan lain yang lebih tua.
back_translation: The guard's attitude changed after 8 years, when Mitra tried to protect the new prisoner from being molested by older prisoners.

text: if you think it 's a riot to see rob schneider in a young woman 's clothes , then you 'll enjoy the hot chick .
translation: Jika anda berfikir lawak melihat Rob Schneider memakai pakaian wanita muda, anda pasti akan suka filem "The Hot Chick".
back_translation: If you think it's funny to see Rob Schneider wearing young women's clothes, you will definitely like the movie "The Hot Chick".

text: there 's enough melodrama in this magnolia primavera to make pta proud yet director muccino 's characters are less worthy of puccini than they are of daytime television .
translation: Terlalu banyak melodrama dalam filem Magnolia Primavera ini untuk membuat PTA bangga namun watak-watak pengarah Muccino kurang layak untuk Puccini daripada layak untuk televisyen siang hari.
back_translation: There is too much melodrama in the film Magnolia Primavera for PTA to be proud of, but the characters directed by Muccino are more suitable for daytime television than for Puccini.

text: wise , cruelly observant of human nature and hysterically funny .
translation: bijak, kejam dalam mengamatikaan manusia dan sangat lucu.
back_translation: Wise, cruel in observing people and very funny.

text: it 's the kind of film where the villain even gives an evil look for his passport photo . how can you resist that ?
translation: Ini adalah jenis filem di mana penjahat juga memberikan pandangan jahat untuk gambar pasportnya. Bagaimana anda boleh tahan itu?
back_translation: This is the kind of movie where even the villains give a sinister look for their passport photo. How can you resist that?

text: pascale bailly 's rom-com provides amM-ilie 's audrey tautou with another fabuleux destin -- i . e . , a banal spiritual quest .
translation: Filem rom-com Pascale Bailly memberikan Audrey Tautou dari Amélie dengan destinasi yang hebat yang lain - iaitu, satu pencarian spiritual yang biasa.
back_translation: Pascale Bailly's rom-com film presents Audrey Tautou of Amélie with another great destination - a usual spiritual quest.

text: astonishing is n't the word -- neither is incompetent , incoherent or just plain crap . indeed , none of these words really gets at the very special type of badness that is deuces wild .
translation: Tak tertanggung adalah bukan perkataan yang sesuai - begitu juga tidak bersalahan, tidak konsisten, atau hanya teruk. Memang, tidak satu pun perkataan tersebut benar-benar menjelaskan jenis keburukan yang sangat istimewa dalam filem Deuces Wild.
back_translation: Unbearable is not an appropriate word - nor is faultless, inconsistent, or just terrible. Indeed, not one of those words truly captures the unique kind of awfulness present in the film Deuces Wild.

text: when two african american pilots become the first non-white soldiers in the camp , one turns up murdered and the other accused of killing a white sergeant .
translation: Apabila dua juruterbang Amerika Afrika menjadi tentera bukan kulit putih pertama di kem, salah seorang diketemukan dibunuh dan yang satu lagi dituduh membunuh seorang sersan kulit putih.
back_translation: When two African American pilots become the first non-white soldiers in the camp, one of them is found murdered and the other is accused of killing a white sergeant.

text: as a result , sarah embarks upon a journey of discovery that leads to danger , heartbreak and romance in the far corners of the world .
translation: Akibatnya, Sarah memulakan sebuah perjalanan penemuan yang membawanya ke bahaya, kesedihan, dan roman di sudut-sudut dunia yang jauh.
back_translation: As a result, Sarah embarked on a journey of discovery that led her to danger, sorrow, and romance in the corners of the distant world.

text: the two animals decide to search for the father and return the baby to him .
translation: Kedua haiwan itu memutuskan untuk mencari bapa dan mengembalikan bayi itu kepada beliau.
back_translation: Both animals decided to search for the father and return the baby to him.

text: at least it 's a fairly impressive debut from the director , charles stone iii .
translation: Setidak-tidaknya itu merupakan penampilan perdana yang cukup mengagumkan dari pengarah, Charles Stone III.
back_translation: At the very least, it was quite an impressive directorial debut from Charles Stone III.

text: and he also has to deal with the daughter 's older brother , who 's on the run from local drug dealers .
translation: Dan dia juga terpaksa berurusan dengan abang perempuan anak perempuannya, yang sedang lari dari penjual dadah tempatan.
back_translation: And he also had to deal with his daughter's older brother who was running away from local drug dealers.

text: john has become not just a full fledged phenomenon and household word , but a critics darling and social enigma as well .
translation: John telah menjadi bukan sahaja satu fenomena sepenuhnya dan perbualan yang biasa, tetapi juga kekasih kritis dan enigma sosial.
back_translation: John has become not just a complete phenomenon and a common conversation, but also a critical lover and social enigma.

text: they must begin a journey , avoiding the mysterious detective mr barlow and the terrifying inhuman jack , to uncover the dark truth to charlie 's life .
translation: Mereka harus memulakan perjalanan, mengelakkan detektif misteri Mr. Barlow dan manusia menakutkan Jack, untuk mengungkap kebenaran gelap tentang kehidupan Charlie.
back_translation: They have to start the journey, avoiding mystery detective Mr. Barlow and frightening human Jack, to uncover the dark truth about Charlie's life.

text: the film is rich with colorful characters and enlivened by its strong , convincing picture of rural trinidad .
translation: Filem itu kaya dengan watak-watak berwarna dan diperkayakan dengan gambaran kuat dan meyakinkan mengenai Trinidad luar bandar.
back_translation: The film is rich with colorful characters and enriched with strong and convincing portrayals of rural Trinidad.

text: together [ time out and human resources ] establish mr . cantet as france 's foremost cinematic poet of the workplace .
translation: bersama [waktu dan sumber manusia] menetapkan Tuan Cantet sebagai penyair sinematik utama tempat kerja di Perancis.
back_translation: Together [time and human resources] establishes Mr. Cantet as the principal cinematic poet in the workplace in France.

text: suddenly , going to church becomes much more appealing .
translation: Tiba-tiba, pergi ke gereja menjadi lebih menarik.
back_translation: Suddenly, going to church became more interesting.

text: such an incomprehensible mess that it feels less like bad cinema than like being stuck in a dark pit having a nightmare about bad cinema .
translation: Sungguh berbelit-belit sehingga terasa lebih seperti filem buruk daripada seperti terperangkap dalam kubangan gelap yang bermimpi tentang filem buruk.
back_translation: It's so convoluted that it feels more like a bad movie than being trapped in a dark pit dreaming about a bad movie.

text: lillard and cardellini earn their scooby snacks , but not anyone else .
translation: lillard dan cardellini mendapat snek scooby mereka, tetapi bukan sesiapa yang lain.
back_translation: Lillard and Cardellini got their hands on their Scooby snacks, but no one else.

text: the result , however well-intentioned , is ironically just the sort of disposable , kitchen-sink homage that illustrates why the whole is so often less than the sum of its parts in today 's hollywood .
translation: Keputusannya, bagaimanapun baik niatnya, ironisnya hanyalah jenis penghormatan yang boleh dibuang begitu sahaja, yang menunjukkan mengapa keseluruhannya sering kali kurang daripada jumlah bahagiannya dalam industri hiburan Hollywood hari ini.
back_translation: The decision, no matter how good the intention is, ironically, is just the kind of respect that can be easily discarded, indicating why the whole is often less than the sum of its parts in today's Hollywood entertainment industry.

text: the trick when watching godard is to catch the pitch of his poetics , savor the pleasure of his sounds and images , and ponder the historical , philosophical , and ethical issues that intersect with them .
translation: Tip ketika menonton filem Godard adalah untuk menangkap nada poesisnya, menikmati keseronokan bunyi dan imejnya, serta merenungkan isu-isu sejarah, falsafah, dan etika yang berpotongan dengannya.
back_translation: The tip when watching Godard films is to capture the poetic tone, enjoy the pleasure of its sound and images, and contemplate the historical, philosophical, and ethical issues that intersect with it.

text: with no known family , he leave his california roots for middle america in search of what may be a distant cousin .
translation: Tanpa keluarga yang diketahui, dia meninggalkan akar California-nya untuk tengah Amerika demi mencari kemungkinan seorang sepupu jauh.
back_translation: Without a known family, she left her California roots for the Midwest in search of a distant cousin's possibility.

text: soul is what 's lacking in every character in this movie and , subsequently , the movie itself .

back_translation: The spirit is what is lacking in every character in this movie and, as a result, in the movie itself.

text: in order to protect his sister , eddie - disabled , betrayed and alone - journeys into the heart of his own darkness : where he discovers that the reason for his ordeal lies in his own past sins and those of his adversary charlie strom .
translation: Untuk melindungi adik perempuannya, Eddie - yang kurang upaya, dikhianati dan sendirian - memulakan perjalanan ke dalam kegelapan hatinya sendiri: di mana dia menemui bahawa sebab ujian yang dialaminya terletak pada dosa-dosa masa lalunya sendiri dan juga dosa-dosa musuhnya, Charlie Strom.
back_translation: To protect his disabled sister, Eddie - who is betrayed and alone - embarked on a journey into his own dark heart: where he discovers that the reason for the trials he faced lies in his own past sins and also the sins of his enemy, Charlie Strom.

text: less cinematically powerful than quietly and deeply moving , which is powerful in itself .
translation: Kurang berkuasa secara sinematik berbanding mendalam dan menyentuh hati secara diam-diam, yang mempunyai daya penarik yang kuat pada dirinya sendiri.
back_translation: Less powerful cinematically compared to deeply touching and quietly touching the heart, which has a strong inherent appeal.

text: sharkey , part of the sinister world of child trade , picks up vlado , an orphan of war , dreaming of freedom and a better life .
translation: Sharkey, sebahagian daripada dunia yang jahat perdagangan kanak-kanak, mengambil Vlado, seorang anak yatim dari zaman peperangan, yang bermimpi akan kebebasan dan kehidupan yang lebih baik.
back_translation: Sharkey, a part of the evil world of child trafficking, takes Vlado, an orphan from the war era, who dreams of freedom and a better life.

text: it gets onto the screen just about as much of the novella as one could reasonably expect , and is engrossing and moving in its own right .

text: after he arrives , things seem to go smoothly at first , but eventually , life becomes very complicated for the young father as he spends more time in the community .

text: the film 's plot may be shallow , but you 've never seen the deep like you see it in these harrowing surf shots .

text: a fascinating examination of the joyous , turbulent self-discovery made by a proper , middle-aged woman .
translation: suatu pemeriksaan yang memikat tentang proses penemuan diri yang gembira dan bergolak yang dialami oleh seorang wanita separa dewasa yang baik.

text: raimi and his team could n't have done any better in bringing the story of spider-man to the big screen .

text: if deuces wild had been tweaked up a notch it would have become a camp adventure , one of those movies that 's so bad it starts to become good . but it was n't .
translation: Jika deuces wild telah dimutakhirkan sedikit, ia akan menjadi pengembaraan perkhemahan, salah satu filem yang begitu buruk sehingga ia mula menjadi baik. Tetapi itu tidak berlaku.
back_translation: If Deuces Wild had been updated a bit, it would have become a campy adventure, one of those movies so bad that it starts to become good. But that didn't happen.

text: while johnny knoxvile and his pals put their life at risk , they are entertaining people at the same time .

text: tiz 's best friend mel is a veteran of the `` drug game `` and has spent some part of every year in prison since he was twelve .

text: being a sayles film , this has a way of looking at things with more patience and maturity than a plot summary might lead us to expect .

text: lars von trier re-explores the concept of goodness , but this in an idiom very different from that of his gold heart trilogy ( breaking the waves , the idiots and dancer in the dark ) .

text: in `` the hill `` , director kurt burk brings us on a voyage through dreams of a lost childhood , to the emptiness of a normal , conditioned life , into a fantastic , surreal dream world that echoes of the past .
translation: Dalam filem "the hill", pengarah Kurt Burk membawa kita dalam perjalanan melalui impian masa kanak-kanak yang hilang, ke kekosongan kehidupan biasa yang terkondisi, masuk ke dalam dunia impian fantastik, surreal yang bergema dari masa lalu.

text: sam and the kids band together and manage to combat the armed thugs and foil lamb 's perfectly planned crime .

text: the film is ultimately about as inspiring as a hallmark card .

text: together , tok and o orchestrate a buoyant , darkly funny dance of death . in the process , they demonstrate that there 's still a lot of life in hong kong cinema .
translation: Bersama, tok dan o menyelaraskan tarian kematian yang riang gembira dan lucu gelap. Dalam proses itu, mereka membuktikan bahawa masih banyak kehidupan dalam filem Hong Kong.

text: in the meantime , josh applies some of his newly acquired wisdom coupled with his own honest approach on doreen ( marlo marron ) - a woman his two buddies have deemed out of his league .

text: watching e . t now , in an era dominated by cold , loud special-effects-laden extravaganzas , one is struck less by its lavish grandeur than by its intimacy and precision .

text: amongst these are a middle-aged couple who met through the classified ads in a newspaper , a call-girl who keeps her daughter and her sister , a retired actor , an ex-football player , and a janitor who suspects that his adopted father , whom he dreams about every night , is his real father .
translation: Di antara mereka adalah sepasang suami isteri paruh baya yang bertemu melalui iklan diklasifikasikan dalam akhbar, seorang pelacur yang membesarkan anak perempuannya dan adik perempuannya, seorang pelakon bersara, seorang bekas pemain bola sepak, dan seorang penyelia cleaner yang mengesyaki bahawa bapanya angkat, yang selalu muncul dalam mimpinya setiap malam, adalah bapanya sebenar.
back_translation: Among them are a middle-aged couple who met through classified ads in newspapers, a prostitute raising her daughter and sister, a retired actress, a former football player, and a cleaning supervisor who suspects that her adoptive father, who always appears in her dreams every night, is her real father.

text: the entire town begins to look for ellen when she fails to appear at home that night .

text: there are just too many characters saying too many clever things and getting into too many pointless situations . where 's the movie here ?

text: the course of their experiences ultimately involves with sammy boi , an aggressive rapper caught in a bad contract while on of his songs is a major radio hit ; joan vicks , a devious a & # 38 ; r executive for viewpointe records , randy tigge , a drug addicted , cross-dressing rock star ; and michael dileo , the chairman of viewpointe record , who some simply call satan .
translation: Pengalaman mereka pada akhirnya melibatkan Sammy Boi, seorang rapper agresif yang terperangkap dalam kontrak buruk saat salah satu lagunya menjadi hit radio besar; Joan Vicks, seorang eksekutif A&R yang licik untuk Viewpointe Records; Randy Tigge, seorang rock star pecandu narkoba yang suka berpakaian wanita; dan Michael DiLeo, pengerusi Viewpointe Records, yang beberapa orang sebut sebagai syaitan.
back_translation: Their experience eventually involved Sammy Boi, an aggressive rapper trapped in a bad contract when one of his songs became a major radio hit; Joan Vicks, a cunning A&R executive for Viewpointe Records; Randy Tigge, a drug-addicted rock star who enjoys dressing in women's clothing; and Michael DiLeo, the chairman of Viewpointe Records, who some call a devil.

text: a pathetically inane and unimaginative cross between xxx and vertical limit .

text: yes , i have given this movie a rating of zero . but fans of the show should not consider this a diss . consider it 'perfection . '

text: shot perhaps 'artistically ' with handheld cameras and apparently no movie lights by joaquin baca-asay , the low-budget production swings annoyingly between vertigo and opacity .
translation: Ditembak mungkin 'secara artistik' dengan kamera genggam dan nampaknya tanpa lampu filem oleh Joaquin Baca-Asay, produksi berbajet rendah ini berayun mengganggu di antara vertigo dan ketidakjelasan.
back_translation: Shot perhaps 'artistically' with a mobile camera and seemingly without film lighting by Joaquin Baca-Asay, this low-budget production swings disturbingly between vertigo and ambiguity.

text: those who managed to avoid the deconstructionist theorizing of french philosopher jacques derrida in college can now take an 85-minute brush-up course with the documentary derrida . or , you can do something fun tonight .
translation: Mereka yang berjaya mengelak daripada teori dekonstruktivisism ahli falsafah Perancis Jacques Derrida semasa di kolej kini boleh mengambil kursus semula selama 85 minit dengan dokumentari Derrida. Atau, anda boleh melakukan sesuatu yang menyeronokkan malam ini.
back_translation: Those who successfully avoided the deconstruction theory of French philosopher Jacques Derrida in college can now take an 85-minute course with the documentary "Derrida." Alternatively, you can do something fun tonight.

text: he works as a photocopy clerk under the close watch of his sexy boss sabine , who uses him to his libido 's advantage .
