back_translation: Marly Temple is living out her father's dream to run a motel, only it has become her nightmare.

text: in the end , they confront an unparalleled horror , with the fate of the world in the balance .
translation: Pada akhirnya, mereka berhadapan dengan ketakutan yang tiada tandingannya, dengan nasib dunia di ambang kehancuran.
back_translation: In the end, they faced an unparalleled fear, with the fate of the world on the brink of destruction.

text: thomas , the studious and responsible brother , creates a better life for himself through education and hard , honest work .
translation: Thomas, abang yang rajin dan bertanggungjawab, mencipta kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk dirinya melalui pendidikan dan kerja keras serta jujur.
back_translation: Thomas, the diligent and responsible elder brother, creates a better life for himself through education, hard work, and honesty.

text: director duncan roy impressively presents aka through three simultaneous frames rather than one , offering the audience a deeper and more complex perspective through which to view dean 's engrossing story .
translation: Pengarah Duncan Roy dengan hebat mempersembahkan aka melalui tiga bingkai serentak berbanding satu, memberikan penonton satu perspektif yang lebih mendalam dan kompleks untuk melihat kisah menarik Dean.
back_translation: Director Duncan Roy brilliantly presents the plot through three simultaneous frames instead of one, providing the audience with a deeper and more complex perspective to view Dean's intriguing story.

text: the film explores the cultural differences between a north american mother and a mexican father in the face of death .
translation: Filem ini meneroka perbezaan budaya antara seorang ibu Amerika Utara dan seorang bapa Mexico di hadapan kematian.
back_translation: This film explores the cultural differences between a North American mother and a Mexican father in the face of death.

text: hands down the year 's most thought-provoking film . but it pays a price for its intricate intellectual gamesmanship .
translation: Filem yang paling merangsang pemikiran tahun ini tanpa ragu. Tetapi ia membayar harganya kerana permainan intelektual yang rumit.
back_translation: The most thought-provoking film of the year, undoubtedly. But it comes at a cost due to its complex intellectual gameplay.

text: his plans go awry , however , when his older brother , keith , returns from prison .
translation: Rancangannya menjadi terganggu, bagaimanapun, apabila abang sulungnya, Keith, kembali dari penjara.
back_translation: His plan was disrupted, however, when his elder brother, Keith, returned from prison.

text: `` a sound of thunder `` is about a game hunter ( burns ) who goes on a time-traveling safari owned and operated by kingsley 's character to hunt dinosaurs in the prehistoric era .
translation: ``A Sound of Thunder`` mengisahkan mengenai seorang pemburu permainan (Burns) yang pergi ke safar perjalanan masa yang dimiliki dan dioperasikan oleh watak Kingsley untuk berburu dinosaur dalam era pra-sejarah.
back_translation: "A Sound of Thunder" tells the story of a game hunter (Burns) who goes on a time travel safari owned and operated by the character Kingsley to hunt dinosaurs in the prehistoric era.

text: now faced with the discovery of a bloodied body , a flaming liquor store just off native land that sells millions of cans of beer a year to the native population , and his brother 's ongoing self-destruction , rudy goes on a quest to avenge himself , his family , and his culture and to seek justice .
translation: Kini berhadapan dengan penemuan mayat berdarah, kedai arak yang terbakar tepat di luar tanah asli yang menjual berjuta-juta tin bir setiap tahun kepada penduduk asli, dan kebinasaan diri abangnya yang berterusan, Rudy pergi dalam satu misi untuk membalaskan dendam ke atas dirinya, keluarganya, dan budayanya serta mencari keadilan.
back_translation: Now faced with the discovery of a bloody corpse, a burnt liquor store just outside his ancestral land that sells millions of beer cans every year to the natives, and his brother's ongoing self-destruction, Rudy embarks on a mission to seek revenge for himself, his family, and his culture and to find justice.

text: in its ragged , cheap and unassuming way , the movie works .
translation: Dalam cara yang lusuh, murah, dan merendah diri, filem itu berjaya.
back_translation: In a simple, inexpensive, and humble way, the film succeeded.

text: it irritates and saddens me that martin lawrence 's latest vehicle can explode obnoxiously into 2 , 500 screens while something of bubba ho-tep 's clearly evident quality may end up languishing on a shelf somewhere .
translation: Saya terganggu dan sedih bahawa kenderaan terbaru Martin Lawrence boleh meletup dengan begitu keras di 2,500 skrin sementara sesuatu yang jelas kualitinya seperti Bubba Ho-Tep boleh terbiar di rak di suatu tempat.
back_translation: I am disturbed and sad that Martin Lawrence's latest vehicle can explode so loudly on 2,500 screens while something of clear quality like Bubba Ho-Tep can be left on a shelf somewhere.

text: it has the requisite faux-urban vibe and hotter-two-years-ago rap and r & b names and references .
translation: Ia mempunyai aura bandar palsu yang diperlukan dan nama-nama serta rujukan rap dan r & b yang lebih popular dua tahun lalu.
back_translation: It has the necessary fake urban vibes and the names and references of more popular rap and r&b from two years ago.

text: the tonal shifts are jolting , and though wen 's messages are profound and thoughtfully delivered , more thorough transitions would have made the film more cohesive .
translation: Perubahan nada yang mendadak, dan walaupun mesej-mesej Wen adalah mendalam dan disampaikan dengan berfikir, transisi yang lebih teliti akan menjadikan filem lebih kohesif.
back_translation: The sudden change in tone, and although Wen's messages are deep and delivered thoughtfully, more careful transitions would make the film more cohesive.

text: she bets ( against all logic ) to be able to build a new palace for caesar within three months .
translation: Dia bertaruh (bertentangan dengan segala logik) bahawa dia boleh membina istana baru untuk Caesar dalam tempoh tiga bulan.
back_translation: He bet (against all logic) that he can build a new palace for Caesar within a period of three months.

text: yet , while all this is going on , sauron 's troops mass toward the city of gondor , for the war of the ring is about to begin .
translation: Namun, semasa semua ini berlaku, tentera Sauron berkumpul menuju ke bandar Gondor, kerana peperangan cincin akan segera bermula.
back_translation: However, during all of this, Sauron's army gathered towards the city of Gondor, as the battle of the ring was about to begin.

text: the movie straddles the fence between escapism and social commentary , and on both sides it falls short .
translation: Filem itu berada di antara pelarian dan komen sosial, namun di kedua-dua sisi, ia tidak mencapai matlamatnya.
back_translation: The film sits between escapism and social commentary, but on both sides, it fails to achieve its goal.

text: no amount of good acting is enough to save oleander 's uninspired story .
translation: Tiada jumlah lakonan yang baik mencukupi untuk menyelamatkan cerita yang tidak bermaya Oleander.
back_translation: No amount of good performances is enough to save an uninspired story like Oleander.

text: a superfluous sequel . . . plagued by that old familiar feeling of 'let 's get this thing over with ' : everyone has shown up at the appointed time and place , but visible enthusiasm is mighty hard to find .
translation: sekuel yang berlebihan . . . dirundung oleh perasaan 'mari kita selesaikan saja' yang sudah dikenal: semua telah tiba tepat waktu dan tempat yang disepakati, tapi antusiasme yang nyata sangat sulit ditemukan.
back_translation: A sequel that is too excessive... overshadowed by the feeling of "let's just get it over with" that is well-known: everyone has arrived at the agreed time and place, but genuine enthusiasm is very hard to find.

text: one whom he could never love and one whom he could never stop loving . . .
translation: seseorang yang tidak pernah dapat dia cintai dan seseorang yang tidak pernah dapat dia hentikan cintanya...
back_translation: someone who can never be loved by him and someone whom he can never stop loving...

text: why sit through a crummy , wannabe-hip crime comedy that refers incessantly to old movies , when you could just rent those movies instead , let alone seek out a respectable new one ?
translation: Kenapa duduk menonton komedi jenayah yang buruk dan cuba-hip yang merujuk terus kepada filem-filem lama, sedangkan anda boleh sewa filem-filem tersebut, apatah lagi mencari filem baru yang baik?
back_translation: Why sit and watch bad crime comedies that awkwardly reference old movies when you can rent those films, even more so, find good new movies instead?

text: little do they know that these pirates are cursed .
translation: Mereka tidak tahu bahawa lanun ini telah dikutuk.
back_translation: They do not know that these pirates have been cursed.

text: when johnny and lena are stumped , they turn to wayne . . . but
translation: apabila johnny dan lena keliru, mereka meminta pandangan wayne...tetapi
back_translation: When Johnny and Lena are confused, they seek Wayne's opinion...but

text: a tough go , but leigh 's depth and rigor , and his skill at inspiring accomplished portrayals that are all the more impressive for their lack of showiness , offsets to a notable degree the film 's often-mined and despairing milieu .
translation: Satu perjalanan yang mencabar, tetapi kedalaman dan kekerasan Leigh, bersama kebolehannya dalam mengilhami perwatakan yang berjaya yang lebih mempesonakan kerana kurangnya kesombongan, menyekat dengan ketara milieux filem yang sering dibangkitkan dan berputus-asa.
back_translation: A challenging journey, but Leigh's depth and fierceness, along with her ability to inspire successful characters that are more captivating due to the lack of arrogance, clearly contrasts with the often evoked and despairing film milieux.

text: it looks closely , insightfully at fragile , complex relationships .
translation: Melihat dengan teliti, dengan wawasan yang mendalam tentang hubungan yang rapuh dan kompleks.
back_translation: Observing carefully, with deep insight into fragile and complex relationships.

text: tabloid journalist annika bengtzon is writing about a murder in the port of stockholm and she suspects that the yugoslav mafia is involved .
translation: Wartawan tabloid Annika Bengtzon sedang menulis tentang pembunuhan di pelabuhan Stockholm dan dia menduga mafia Yugoslavia terlibat.
back_translation: Tabloid journalist Annika Bengtzon is writing about a murder in the port of Stockholm and she suspects that the Yugoslav mafia is involved.

text: `` dreamcatcher `` tells the story of four young friends who perform a heroic act - and are changed forever by the uncanny powers they gain in return .
translation: "dreamcatcher" mengisahkan kisah empat sahabat muda yang melakukan perbuatan heroik - dan berubah selamanya oleh kuasa aneh yang mereka perolehi sebagai balasan.
back_translation: "dreamcatcher" tells the story of four young friends who perform heroic deeds - and are forever changed by the strange power they receive as a reward.

text: his dog is missing and he suspects the people at work might be behind it .
translation: Anjingnya hilang dan dia mengesyaki orang-orang di tempat kerja mungkin terlibat dalam kejadian itu.
back_translation: His dog is missing and he suspects that people at work may be involved in the incident.

text: an undercover narc dies , the investigation stalls , so the detroit p . d .
translation: seorang perisikan palsu mati, siasatan terhenti, jadi p.d. Detroit.
back_translation: A fake spy died, investigation stalled, so P.D. Detroit.

text: a simple , sometimes maddeningly slow film that has just enough charm and good acting to make it interesting , but is ultimately pulled under by the pacing and lack of creativity within .
translation: Filem yang ringkas, kadang-kadang membuak-buak lambat yang mempunyai daya tarikan dan lakonan yang baik yang mencukupi untuk membuatnya menarik, tetapi pada akhirnya ditarik ke bawah oleh kelajuan cerita dan kurangnya kreativiti di dalamnya.
back_translation: A short film, sometimes slowly bubbling, that has strong appeal and good acting sufficient to make it interesting, but ultimately gets pulled down by the pace of the story and its lack of creativity.

text: even if you 've seen `` stomp `` ( the stage show ) , you still have to see this !
translation: Walaupun anda sudah melihat "stomp" (pertunjukan pentas), anda masih perlu melihat ini!
back_translation: Even though you have seen "stomp" (stage performance), you still need to see this!

text: they swore to have their unborn babies get married when they grew up .
translation: Mereka bersumpah untuk mengahwinkan bayi yang belum lahir mereka apabila mereka dewasa.
back_translation: They vowed to marry their unborn baby when they grow up.

text: the volatile dynamics of female friendship is the subject of this unhurried , low-key film that is so off-hollywood that it seems positively french in its rhythms and resonance .
translation: Dinamika yang tidak stabil dalam persahabatan wanita adalah subjek filem yang tenang ini, yang begitu berbeza dari filem Hollywood sehingga ia seolah-olah secara positif Perancis dalam ritma dan keberkesanannya.
back_translation: The unstable dynamics in women's friendships is the subject of this quiet film, which is so different from Hollywood films that it seems positively French in its rhythm and effectiveness.

text: the ring is worth a look , if you do n't demand much more than a few cheap thrills from your halloween entertainment .
translation: Cincin itu layak diperhatikan, jika anda tidak banyak menuntut selain sedikit keseronokan murah dari hiburan Halloween anda.
back_translation: The ring is worth noting, if you don't demand much other than a little cheap thrill from your Halloween entertainment.

text: by providing a dynamic expression of the struggles and celebrations of the expatriate lifestyle , leela has the potential to be a crossover film - popular among expatriate south asians and mainstream english speaking audiences the world over .
translation: Dengan menyampaikan ungkapan dinamik kehidupan yang penuh dengan cabaran dan sambutan dalam gaya hidup ekspatriat, Leela berpotensi menjadi filem lintas budaya - popular di kalangan ekspatriat Asia Selatan dan penonton berbahasa Inggeris utama di seluruh dunia.
back_translation: By conveying the dynamic expressions of life filled with challenges and receptions in the expatriate lifestyle, Leela has the potential to become a cross-cultural film - popular among expatriates from South Asia and main English-speaking audiences worldwide.

text: after all , she is the woman of his dreams .
translation: Akhirnya, dia adalah wanita impiannya.
back_translation: Finally, she is the woman of his dreams.

text: depressive , slow , darkly funny , unyielding in its formal rigor , and unsettlingly beautiful .
translation: depresif, perlahan, gelap tetapi lucu, teguh dalam ketegasan formalnya, dan indah dengan cara yang mengganggu.
back_translation: Depressive, slow, dark yet humorous, resolute in its formal firmness, and disturbingly beautiful.

text: it 's a talking head documentary , but a great one .
translation: Ini adalah sebuah dokumentari yang menggunakan wawancara langsung, tetapi ia sangat hebat.
back_translation: This is a documentary that uses direct interviews, but it is really great.

text: in 1975 , as the vietnam war was ending , thousands of orphans and amerasian children were brought to the united states as part of `` operation babylift . ``
translation: Pada tahun 1975, semasa Perang Vietnam berakhir, ribuan anak yatim piatu dan kanak-kanak Amerasian dibawa ke Amerika Syarikat sebagai sebahagian daripada "Operasi Babylift".
back_translation: In 1975, when the Vietnam War ended, thousands of orphans and Amerasian children were brought to the United States as part of "Operation Babylift".

text: `` brown sugar `` admirably aspires to be more than another `` best man `` clone by weaving a theme throughout this funny film .
translation: "Gula perang" dengan baik berhasrat untuk menjadi lebih daripada tiruan "best man" yang lain dengan merangkai tema sepanjang filem lucu ini.
back_translation: "Sweet War" well intends to be more than just another imitation of other "best man" by weaving a theme throughout this funny film.

text: nothing can detract from the affection of that moral favorite : friends will be friends through thick and thin .
translation: Tiada apa yang boleh mengurangkan kasih sayang kepada kekasih moral itu: rakan akan sentiasa menjadi rakan dalam susah dan senang.
back_translation: Nothing can diminish the affection for that moral lover: a friend will always be a friend in good times and bad.

text: incredibly , dionysus ' unarmed women defeat pentheus ' formidable royal army .
translation: Dengan luar biasanya, wanita-wanita bersenjata Dionysus mengalahkan tentera diraja yang tangguh milik Pentheus.
back_translation: In an extraordinary manner, the armed women followers of Dionysus defeat the formidable royal army of Pentheus.

text: if you 've grown tired of going where no man has gone before , but several movies have - take heart . this is the best star trek movie in a long time .
translation: Jika anda sudah bosan pergi ke tempat yang belum pernah dilalui oleh sesiapa, tetapi beberapa filem sudah pernah - bersukacitalah. Ini adalah filem Star Trek terbaik dalam masa yang lama.
back_translation: If you're bored, go to a place that no one has ever passed through, but some films have - rejoice. This is the best Star Trek film in a long time.

text: will lightman is a hip londoner who one day realizes that his friends are all involved with the responsibilities of married life and that leaves him alone in the cold .
translation: Will Lightman ialah seorang penduduk bandar London yang hip yang suatu hari sedar bahawa rakan-rakannya terlibat dengan tanggungjawab kehidupan berumahtangga dan itu meninggalkannya seorang diri.
back_translation: Will Lightman is a hip city dweller in London who one day realizes that his friends are getting involved in the responsibilities of married life, leaving him alone.

text: it seems like a perfect opportunity for kilo to get back to his family , but this job leads to a world of trouble for kilo after his release .
translation: Nampaknya ini adalah peluang yang sempurna bagi Kilo untuk kembali kepada keluarganya, tetapi pekerjaan ini membawa kepada dunia yang penuh dengan masalah bagi Kilo selepas dia dibebaskan.
back_translation: This appears to be the perfect opportunity for Kilo to reunite with his family, but this job leads to a world full of troubles for Kilo after he is released.

text: finds a way to tell a simple story , perhaps the simplest story of all , in a way that seems compelling and even original .
translation: Menemui cara untuk menceritakan sebuah cerita yang mudah, mungkin cerita yang paling mudah, dengan cara yang tampak menarik dan bahkan original.
back_translation: Finding a way to tell a story that is simple, perhaps the simplest story, in a way that seems interesting and even original.

text: sunk by way too much indulgence of scene-chewing , teeth-gnashing actorliness .
translation: Terbenam oleh terlalu banyak pemujaan adegan yang berlebihan, lakonan aktor yang terlalu berlebihan.
back_translation: Drowned by too much excessive scene worship, exaggerated acting by the actor.

text: until she leaves to the kitchen and he finds out that under the bed a male shoe that does not belong to him is carefully hidden by a male hand , under his own eyes .
translation: Sehingga dia pergi ke dapur dan dia mendapati sepatu lelaki yang tidak dimilikinya terselindung dengan rapi di bawah katil oleh tangan lelaki, di hadapan matanya sendiri.
back_translation: Until he went to the kitchen and found a man's shoe that did not belong to him neatly tucked under the bed by the hands of a man, right in front of his own eyes.

text: tired of his constant fixation on drinking and television , herk 's wife anna and daughter jenny decide to find new love interests in divorced dad eliot arnold and his son matt .
translation: Bosan dengan kecenderungan yang kerap pada minum dan menonton televisyen, isteri Herk, Anna, dan anak perempuannya, Jenny, memutuskan untuk mencari minat percintaan baru dalam diri ayah yang bercerai, Eliot Arnold, dan anak lelakinya, Matt.
back_translation: Tired of the frequent tendency towards drinking and watching television, Herk's wife, Anna, and their daughter, Jenny, decided to seek new romantic interests within Herk's divorced father, Eliot Arnold, and his son, Matt.

text: a positively thrilling combination of ethnography and all the intrigue , betrayal , deceit and murder of a shakespearean tragedy or a juicy soap opera .
translation: gabungan antropologi dan segala intrik, pengkhianatan, tipu daya, dan pembunuhan dari tragedi Shakespeare atau drama sabun yang merangsang hingga ke hujung rambut.
back_translation: A combination of anthropology and all the intrigues, betrayals, deceit, and murders from Shakespearean tragedies or soap dramas that are stimulating to the core.

text: cannon 's confidence and laid-back good spirits are , with the drumming routines , among the film 's saving graces .
translation: Keyakinan yang dimiliki oleh Cannon dan semangat yang santai, bersama dengan rutin pukulan dramatis, adalah di antara daya tarik tersendiri filem ini.
back_translation: The confidence wielded by Cannon and their relaxed spirit, along with the dramatic punch routines, are among the unique charms of this film.

text: when she ventures to vietnam to meet her mother , she unknowingly embarks on an emotional pilgrimage that spans decades and distance .
translation: Apabila dia memulakan perjalanan ke Vietnam untuk bertemu ibunya, dia tanpa disedar memulakan ziarah emosi yang merentasi dekad dan jarak.
back_translation: When she began her journey to Vietnam to meet her mother, she unknowingly embarked on an emotional pilgrimage that traversed decades and distances.

text: scared and confused , frank and caroline must find their way back home , all the while avoiding danger at every turn .
translation: Takut dan keliru, Frank dan Caroline harus mencari jalan pulang, sambil mengelakkan bahaya di setiap selekoh.
back_translation: Afraid and confused, Frank and Caroline must find their way home while avoiding danger at every turn.

text: the importance of being earnest resonates and inspires rapid-fire bouts of laughter , perhaps even a few giggles from the author himself , whom posterity has rewarded the last laugh .
translation: Kepentingan untuk jujur bersepadu dan menginspirasi letupan gelak yang pantas, mungkin termasuk sedikit ketawa kecil dari pengarang sendiri, yang masa akan datang telah memberikan gelak terakhir.
back_translation: The importance of being honestly integrated and inspiring quick bursts of laughter, including perhaps a little chuckle from the author themselves, whose future has already delivered the final laugh.

text: harrison 's flowers puts its heart in the right place , but its brains are in no particular place at all .
translation: Harrison's Flowers meletakkan hatinya di tempat yang betul, tetapi akalnya tidak berada di mana-mana tempat yang khusus.
back_translation: "Harrison's Flowers placed his heart in the right place, but his mind was nowhere in particular."

text: as adapted by kevin molony from simon leys ' novel `` the death of napoleon `` and directed by alan taylor , napoleon 's journey is interesting but his parisian rebirth is stillborn
translation: seperti yang diadaptasi oleh kevin molony dari novel simon leys ' "the death of napoleon" dan diarahkan oleh alan taylor, perjalanan napoleon itu menarik tetapi kelahiran semula parisnya sia-sia
back_translation: As adapted by Kevin Molony from Simon Leys' novel "The Death of Napoleon" and directed by Alan Taylor, Napoleon's journey is captivating but his Parisian rebirth is in vain.

text: the movie is a lumbering load of hokum but . . . it 's at least watchable .
translation: Filem ini seperti tumpukan cerita karut tetapi. . . ia sekurang-kurangnya boleh ditonton.
back_translation: This movie is like a stack of nonsense stories but... it is at least watchable.

text: . . . ambition is in short supply in the cinema , and egoyan tackles his themes and explores his characters ' crises with seriousness and compassion .
translation: . . . ambisi adalah kurang di pasaran dalam dunia filem, dan Egoyan mengendalikan tema-temanya dan meneroka krisis karakternya dengan serius dan belas kasihan.
back_translation: ". . . ambition is less in the market in the world of films, and Egoyan handles his themes and explores his character crises seriously and empathetically."

text: a documentary examining the december 2nd , 1999 assassination of microsoft ceo bill gates in los angeles , and the group of key players seeking to unravel the mystery of his alleged assassin as well as the circumstances surrounding his death .
translation: Sebuah dokumentari yang mengkaji pembunuhan CEO Microsoft, Bill Gates pada 2 Disember 1999 di Los Angeles, dan kumpulan pemain utama yang cuba mengungkap misteri pembunuhnya yang didakwa serta keadaan sekeliling kematian beliau.
back_translation: A documentary that examines the assassination of Microsoft CEO, Bill Gates on December 2, 1999 in Los Angeles, and the main group of players who are trying to uncover the alleged killer's mystery and the circumstances surrounding his death.

text: this orange has some juice , but it 's far from fresh-squeezed .
translation: Oren ini ada sedikit jus, tetapi ia jauh dari segar diperas.
back_translation: This orange has a little juice, but it's far from freshly squeezed.

text: director dan verete uses his camera as the metaphoric needle , and his cast in each segment as his thread , to form a sweeping tapestry of mis-explanation and contention .
translation: Pengarah dan vereté menggunakan kameranya sebagai jarum metafora, dan barisannya dalam setiap bahagian sebagai benangnya, untuk membentuk kain tenun yang meluas tentang penafsiran yang salah dan pertikaian.
back_translation: The director and cinematographer use their camera as a metaphorical needle, and the shots in each segment as its thread, to weave an extensive fabric about misunderstandings and conflicts.

text: it centers on inez macbeth ( dominique swain ) , a wisp of a girl just a shade over twenty , who may lack a formal education , but has already been taught plenty by life .
translation: Cerita ini berkisar pada Inez Macbeth (Dominique Swain), seorang gadis muda berusia dua puluh tahun yang mungkin kurang pendidikan formal, tetapi telah banyak diajari oleh kehidupan.
back_translation: This story revolves around Inez Macbeth (Dominique Swain), a young woman of twenty years who may lack formal education, but has been taught a lot by life.

text: if you like quirky , odd movies and/or the ironic , here 's a fun one .
translation: Jika anda suka filem yang aneh dan unik dan/atau yang berkisar tentang ironi, ini satu filem yang menyeronokkan.
back_translation: If you like weird and unique movies and/or those revolving around irony, this is an enjoyable film.

text: a fine documentary can be distinguished from a mediocre one by the better film 's ability to make its subject interesting to those who are n't part of its supposed target audience . judging by those standards , 'scratch ' is a pretty decent little documentary .
translation: Sebuah dokumentari yang baik dapat dibezakan daripada satu yang biasa saja dengan keupayaan filem yang lebih baik untuk menjadikan subjeknya menarik kepada mereka yang bukan sebahagian daripada audiens sasaran yang sepatutnya. Dilihat dari standard-standard tersebut, 'scratch' adalah sebuah dokumentari yang cukup baik.
back_translation: A good documentary can be distinguished from an ordinary one by the ability of the film to make its subject interesting to those who are not part of the intended target audience. Judging by these standards, 'scratch' is a quite good documentary.

text: a very funny look at how another culture handles the process of courting and marriage .
translation: satu pandangan yang sangat lucu tentang bagaimana budaya lain mengendalikan proses mendekati dan perkahwinan.
back_translation: A very amusing view on how other cultures handle the process of dating and marriage.

text: at the last minute a cyber-friend arrives to join the battle .
translation: Pada minit terakhir, seorang kawan siber tiba untuk menyertai pertempuran.
back_translation: At the last minute, a cyber friend arrived to join the battle.

text: even if you do n't think [ kissinger 's ] any more guilty of criminal activity than most contemporary statesmen , he 'd sure make a courtroom trial great fun to watch .
translation: Walaupun anda tidak menganggap Kissinger lebih bersalah daripada kebanyakan ahli politik zaman ini, pasti akan membuat perbicaraan mahkamah menjadi sangat menyeronokkan untuk ditonton.
back_translation: Although you may not consider Kissinger more guilty than most politicians of this era, it would definitely make the court hearings very entertaining to watch.

text: when sang-woo 's mother finds work and finally returns for him , sang-woo has become a different boy .
translation: Apabila ibu Sang-woo mendapat kerja dan akhirnya pulang untuknya, Sang-woo telah menjadi seorang budak yang berbeza.

text: city by the sea is the cinematic equivalent of defensive driving : it 's careful , conscientious and makes no major mistakes . but what saves lives on the freeway does not necessarily make for persuasive viewing .

back_translation: A seaside town is equivalent to driving defensively in the world of movies: it is cautious, effective, and does not make major mistakes. But what saves lives on the highway does not necessarily make for compelling viewing.

translation: "Secretary" dimiliki oleh rakan sebarisnya, Spader dan Gyllenhaal. Maggie G. membuat terobosan yang menakjubkan dalam peranan utama pertamanya dan memberikan penampilan yang mencuri tumpuan.
back_translation: "Secretary" is owned by her co-stars, Spader and Gyllenhaal. Maggie G. made a remarkable breakthrough in her first lead role and delivered a attention-catching performance.

text: a delightful surprise because despite all the backstage drama , this is a movie that tells stories that work -- is charming , is moving , is funny and looks professional .
translation: satu kejutan yang menyeronokkan kerana walaupun dengan segala drama di belakang tabir, filem ini menceritakan cerita-cerita yang berkesan - memikat, menggerakkan, lucu, dan terlihat profesional.
back_translation: a pleasant surprise because despite all the drama behind the scenes, this film tells impactful stories - captivating, moving, funny, and professionally made.

text: second in a three-part anthology on relationships between humans and aliens .
translation: Kedua dalam antologi tiga bahagian mengenai hubungan antara manusia dan makhluk asing.
back_translation: Second in an anthology of three parts about the relationship between humans and alien beings.

text: it is best appreciated as an immersion in a three-dimensional toyland outfitted with enough whimsical gadgetry to fill a thousand playrooms .
translation: Ia lebih baik dinikmati sebagai pengalaman meresap dalam sebuah tanah mainan tiga dimensi yang dilengkapi dengan cukup banyak perangkat ajaib untuk mengisi seribu bilik mainan.
back_translation: It is better enjoyed as an immersive experience in a three-dimensional playground equipped with plenty of magical devices to fill a thousand toy rooms.

text: a distinctly mixed bag , the occasional bursts of sharp writing alternating with lots of sloppiness and the obligatory moments of sentimental ooze .
translation: Sesuatu yang campuran yang jelas, kadang-kadang ada penulisan yang tajam bergantian dengan banyak kecerobohan dan momen-momen berlebihan sentimental.
back_translation: A clear mixture, sometimes sharp writing alternating with many carelessness and moments of excessive sentimentality.

text: somewhere short of tremors on the modern b-scene : neither as funny nor as clever , though an agreeably unpretentious way to spend ninety minutes .
translation: Di suatu tempat di bawah gempa bumi di dalam arena seni b-moden: tidak seketawa atau sebijak, walaupun cara yang menyenangkan dan tidak berpura-pura untuk menghabiskan sembilan puluh minit.
back_translation: In a place beneath an earthquake within the arena of modern art: neither laughter nor wisdom, yet a fun and genuine way to spend ninety minutes.

text: as their adopted identity grows , the gang tumbles into a downward spiral of excitement , excess and fun .
translation: Apabila identiti yang diterima oleh mereka semakin berkembang, geng itu terjerumus ke dalam spiral kegembiraan, berlebihan dan keseronokan.
back_translation: As their accepted identity grows, the gang plunges into a spiral of excitement, excess, and pleasure.

text: the movie is beautiful to behold and engages one in a sense of epic struggle -- inner and outer -- that 's all too rare in hollywood 's hastier productions .
translation: Filem ini indah untuk disaksikan dan memperlihatkan satu pergolakan epik -- dalaman dan luaran -- yang jarang berlaku dalam produksi cepat Hollywood.
back_translation: This film is beautiful to watch and showcases an epic struggle -- internal and external -- that rarely occurs in fast-paced Hollywood productions.

text: it 's pretentious in a way that verges on the amateurish .
translation: Ia pretentious dengan cara yang hampir amatiran.
back_translation: It is pretentious in a rather amateurish way.

text: in the end , ted bundy 's only justification is the director 's common but unexplored fascination with the frustrated maniac ; there 's no larger point , and little social context .
translation: Pada akhirnya, satu-satunya justifikasi Ted Bundy adalah kefahaman pengarah yang biasa tetapi tidak diteroka dengan ketagihan kepada si maniak yang frustrasi; tiada titik yang lebih besar, dan sedikit konteks sosial.
back_translation: In the end, the only justification for Ted Bundy is the director's common but unexplored empathy towards the frustrated maniac; no larger point, and little social context.

text: she is married to henry bauford ( linus roache ) son of a wealthy british industrialist , when she encounters nick callahan ( clive owen ) a renegade doctor , whose impassioned plea for help to support his relief efforts in war-torn africa moves her deeply .
translation: Dia berkahwin dengan Henry Bauford (Linus Roache), anak lelaki kepada seorang industrialis British yang kaya, apabila dia bertemu dengan Nick Callahan (Clive Owen), seorang doktor derhaka, yang rayuan berapi-api untuk bantuan bagi menyokong usahanya dalam usaha penolongannya di Afrika yang dilanda peperangan, menggerakkan emosinya.
back_translation: She marries Henry Bauford (Linus Roache), the son of a wealthy British industrialist, but her emotions are stirred when she meets Nick Callahan (Clive Owen), a rebellious doctor with a passionate appeal for assistance to support his efforts in his humanitarian mission in war-torn Africa.

text: it 's dumb fun slapped silly , a new franchise inspired by the bond films that 's not far from the porn its title promises ; the film is a veritable orgy of outrageous stunts .
translation: Ini adalah keseronokan bodoh yang dipaparkan dengan penuh kebodohan, sebuah francais baharu yang terinspirasi oleh filem-filem bond yang tidak jauh daripada filem lucah yang dijanjikan oleh judulnya; filem ini adalah suatu pesta hingar-bingar daripada aksi luar biasa.
back_translation: This is a silly fun displayed with full foolishness, a new franchise inspired by Bond movies not far from the promised pornographic movies by its title; this film is a wild party of extraordinary action.

text: discovering the hard way that their involved in witchcraft .
translation: Mereka sedang menemui dengan cara yang sukar bahawa mereka terlibat dalam ilmu sihir.
back_translation: They are finding it difficult to realize that they are involved in magic.

text: danny is antagonized by undercover narcotics agents ( anthony lapaglia and doug hutchison ) and sadistic dealer pooh bear ( vincent d'onfronio ) .
translation: Danny diganggu oleh ejen narkotik bertopeng (Anthony LaPaglia dan Doug Hutchison) dan penjual kejam Pooh Bear (Vincent D'Onofrio).
back_translation: Danny is harassed by masked narcotics agents (Anthony LaPaglia and Doug Hutchison) and ruthless vendor Pooh Bear (Vincent D'Onofrio).

text: evergon is ultimately a compelling story about the human condition , exploring a young man 's search for love , steady employment and self-respect .
translation: Evergon pada akhirnya merupakan kisah yang memukau tentang keadaan manusia, meneroka pencarian seorang lelaki muda untuk cinta, pekerjaan tetap, dan harga diri.
back_translation: Evergon in the end is a captivating tale about the human condition, exploring the journey of a young man in search of love, a stable job, and self-worth.

text: with `` ichi the killer `` , takashi miike , japan 's wildest filmmaker gives us a crime fighter carrying more emotional baggage than batman . . .
translation: Dengan "Ichi the Killer", Takashi Miike, pengarah filem liar Jepun memberi kita seorang pejuang jenayah yang membawa lebih banyak beban emosi daripada Batman. . .
back_translation: With "Ichi the Killer", Takashi Miike, the wild Japanese film director, gives us a criminal fighter who carries more emotional weight than Batman.

text: a handsome and talented college student , david morales , is devastated when a bum knee causes him to lose his scholarship to the university of san diego .
translation: Seorang pelajar kolej yang kacak dan berbakat, David Morales, hancur apabila lutut yang cedera menyebabkan beliau kehilangan biasiswa ke Universiti San Diego.
back_translation: A handsome and talented college student, David Morales, was devastated when a knee injury caused him to lose his scholarship to the University of San Diego.

text: stir in some language barriers , cultural faux pas and a bright , young japanese female undergrad , and the intensity of the experience heightens to comical proportions .
translation: Campurkan beberapa halangan bahasa, kesilapan budaya, dan seorang siswi universiti Jepun muda yang cerdas, dan keintensifan pengalaman itu meningkat kepada proporsi yang lucu.
back_translation: Mix in some language barriers, cultural misunderstandings, and a young, intelligent Japanese university student, and the intensity of the experience escalates to comical proportions.

text: a vile , incoherent mess . . . a scummy ripoff of david cronenberg 's brilliant 'videodrome . '
translation: satu kekacauan keji dan tidak konsisten. . . satu salinan rendah daripada filem cemerlang 'Videodrome' oleh David Cronenberg.
back_translation: A vile and inconsistent mess... a poor copy of the brilliant film 'Videodrome' by David Cronenberg.

text: a number of new allies join with aragorn , gimli , legolas , pippin and merry .
translation: Beberapa sekutu baru bergabung dengan Aragorn, Gimli, Legolas, Pippin, dan Merry.
back_translation: Several new allies have joined Aragorn, Gimli, Legolas, Pippin, and Merry.

text: a documentary , this film , co-produced by several countries finally became reality .
translation: Sebuah dokumentari, filem ini, yang dihasilkan bersama oleh beberapa negara akhirnya menjadi kenyataan.
back_translation: A documentary film, produced in collaboration with several countries, has finally become a reality.

text: when possum lodge is taken to court by big-shot executive robert stiles ( richard fitzpatrick ) , whose limousine was damaged while parking at the lodge , the boys are ordered to pay $ 10 , 000 in damages within ten days - or their beloved lodge will become property of the town .
translation: Apabila Possum Lodge dihadirkan ke mahkamah oleh eksekutif berprestij Robert Stiles (Richard Fitzpatrick), yang limosinnya rosak semasa parkir di lodge, anak-anak lelaki disuruh membayar $10,000 sebagai ganti rugi dalam masa sepuluh hari - atau lodge tercinta mereka akan menjadi milik bandar tersebut.
back_translation: When Possum Lodge is brought to court by prestigious executive Robert Stiles (Richard Fitzpatrick), whose limousine was damaged while parked at the lodge, the boys are ordered to pay $10,000 in damages within ten days - or their beloved lodge will become property of the city.

text: the lead character of bruce is a tribute to the late great martial arts legend and portrays many of the stereotypical characteristics and ideosyncrasies that distinguished his illustrious career .
translation: Watak utama Bruce adalah penghormatan kepada legenda seni bela diri yang hebat yang telah meninggal dan menggambarkan banyak ciri stereotaip dan idiosinkrasi yang membezakan kerjayanya yang cemerlang.
back_translation: The main character Bruce is a tribute to the great martial arts legend who has passed away and depicts many stereotypical traits and idiosyncrasies that distinguish his outstanding career.

text: `` the ring `` is pretty much an english-language copy of the film that inspired it , and it carries the same strengths and flaws .
translation: "the ring" adalah hampir salinan berbahasa Inggeris dari filem yang menginspirasikannya, dan ia membawa kelebihan dan kelemahan yang sama.
back_translation: "the ring" is nearly an English-language copy of the film that inspired it, and it carries the same advantages and disadvantages.

text: nair does n't treat the issues lightly . she allows each character to confront their problems openly and honestly .
translation: Nair tidak menganggap remeh masalah-masalah tersebut. Dia membiarkan setiap karakter menghadapi masalah mereka secara terbuka dan jujur.
back_translation: Nair does not underestimate those issues. She allows each character to face their problems openly and honestly.

text: told in five parts to represent each of the five senses , the sheltered 25-year-old learns to understand his own senses and those around him .
translation: Diceritakan dalam lima bahagian untuk mewakili setiap daripada lima deria, orang yang berusia 25 tahun yang terlindung itu belajar memahami deria sendiri dan orang di sekelilingnya.
back_translation: Told in five parts to represent each of the five senses, the 25-year-old sheltered individual learns to understand their own senses and the people around them.

text: but this is 1960 's england , and when the neighbours start to make life difficult for the new arrivals , david 's family are caught in the middle , and he has to choose between fitting in and standing up for the new friends who have turned his world upside down .
translation: Tetapi ini adalah tahun 1960-an di England, dan apabila jiran-jiran mula menyukarkan kehidupan bagi pendatang baru, keluarga David terperangkap di tengah-tengah, dan dia terpaksa memilih antara menyesuaikan diri dan membela rakan-rakan baru yang telah menggoncangkan dunianya.
back_translation: But this was the 1960s in England, and as neighbors started to make life difficult for newcomers, David's family found themselves caught in the middle, forcing him to choose between fitting in and standing up for new friends who had shaken his world.

text: it helps that lil bow wow . . . tones down his pint-sized gangsta act to play someone who resembles a real kid .
translation: Ia membantu apabila lil bow wow meredakan aksi gangsta bersaiz setengahnya untuk memainkan watak seseorang yang menyerupai seorang kanak-kanak sebenar.
back_translation: It helps when Lil Bow Wow tones down his half-sized gangsta act to play a role resembling a real child.

text: the planet however is populated by murderous psychopaths who kill two of the astronauts right away .
translation: Planet tersebut didiami oleh psikopat yang pembunuh yang membunuh dua daripada ahli angkasawan tersebut dengan serta-merta.
back_translation: The planet is inhabited by psychopathic murderers who instantly killed two of the astronauts.

text: cinematic pyrotechnics aside , the only thing avary seems to care about are mean giggles and pulchritude . it makes sense that he went back to school to check out the girls -- his film is a frat boy 's idea of a good time .
translation: Di sisi percikan api sinematik, satu-satunya perkara yang Avary nampaknya peduli adalah ketawa sinis dan kecantikan. Masuk akal bahawa dia kembali ke sekolah untuk melihat gadis-gadis - filemnya adalah idea seorang budak bradik mengenai masa yang menyeronokkan.
back_translation: In the midst of cinematic sparks, the only thing Avary seems to care about is cynical laughter and beauty. It makes sense that he returned to school to see girls - his film is a kid's fantasy about fun times.

text: the script , the gags , the characters are all direct-to-video stuff , and that 's where this film should have remained .
translation: Skrip, lawak-lawak, watak-watak semuanya bahan video terus ke video, dan itulah tempat di mana filem ini sepatutnya kekal.
back_translation: The script, the jokes, the characters are all material for video straight to video, and that is where this movie should stay.

text: if you love the music , and i do , its hard to imagine having more fun watching a documentary . . .
translation: Jika anda suka muzik, dan saya juga suka, sukar untuk membayangkan lebih seronok menonton dokumentari...
back_translation: If you like music, and I also like it, it is hard to imagine a more enjoyable experience than watching a documentary...

text: the script is a disaster , with cloying messages and irksome characters .
translation: Skrip itu satu malapetaka, dengan mesej-mesej yang manis-manis dan watak-watak yang menjengkelkan.
back_translation: The script is a disaster, with sweet messages and irritating characters.

text: fresh out of a long-term relationship in which she lost custody of a dog , janey passes the end of day on her stoop .
translation: Baru saja berakhir dari hubungan jangka panjang di mana dia kehilangan hak pemeliharaan anjing, Janey menghabiskan akhir hari di tangga rumahnya.
back_translation: Just ended a long-term relationship where she lost custody rights of the dog, Janey spent the end of the day on the steps of her house.

text: just a kiss wants desperately to come off as a fanciful film about the typical problems of average people . but it is set in a world that is very , very far from the one most of us inhabit .
translation: Hanya satu ciuman sangat ingin memberikan kesan sebagai filem yang angan-angan mengenai masalah-masalah biasa orang biasa. Tetapi ia diletakkan dalam dunia yang sangat, sangat jauh dari dunia yang kebanyakan daripada kita dihuni.
back_translation: Just one kiss is very eager to make an impact as a dreamy film about ordinary people's common issues. But it is placed in a world that is very, very far from the world that most of us inhabit.

text: part travelogue , part road picture , part meditation on class , mortality and intimacy , this extraordinary little movie might be the perfect harbinger of summer , as astute as it is steamy .
translation: Sebahagian travelog, sebahagian gambar jalanraya, sebahagian meditasi tentang kelas, kematian, dan keintiman, filem kecil yang luar biasa ini mungkin menjadi penunjuk sempurna bagi musim panas, secerdas dan menggairahkan.
back_translation: Part travelogue, part road movie, part meditation on class, death, and intimacy, this extraordinary little film may well be the perfect guide for the summer season, smart and invigorating.

text: a woman who has recently discovered that she is the daughter of angelo , a major mafia boss , decides to wreak vengeance when he is killed by a hitman .
translation: Seorang wanita yang baru sahaja mengetahui bahawa dia adalah anak perempuan Angelo, bos mafia utama, memutuskan untuk membalas dendam apabila dia dibunuh oleh seorang pembunuh upahan.
back_translation: A woman who has just found out that she is the daughter of Angelo, the main mafia boss, decides to seek revenge when he is killed by a hitman.

text: the two jedi are then sent on two different missions , anakin is sent to naboo with padme and obi-wan is sent to the planet of kamino where he will investigate the assassination attempts .
translation: Dua Jedi kemudian dihantar untuk misi yang berbeza, Anakin dihantar ke Naboo bersama Padme dan Obi-Wan dihantar ke planet Kamino di mana dia akan menyiasat percubaan pembunuhan.
back_translation: Two Jedi were then sent on separate missions, Anakin was sent to Naboo with Padme and Obi-Wan was sent to the planet Kamino where he would investigate an assassination attempt.

text: one day , his own name arrives in the `` perpetrator `` chute , and the precogs predict that he will kill a man he never knew in less than 36 hours .
translation: Suatu hari, namanya sendiri tiba di dalam saluran "penjenayah", dan para precog meramalkan bahawa dia akan membunuh seorang lelaki yang tidak pernah dikenalinya dalam masa kurang dari 36 jam.
back_translation: One day, his own name appeared in the "criminal" channel, and the precogs predicted that he would kill a man he had never known in less than 36 hours.

text: . . . unlikable , uninteresting , unfunny , and completely , utterly inept .
translation: . . . tidak disenangi, tidak menarik, tidak lucu, dan benar-benar tidak cekap.
back_translation: ...not favored, not attractive, not funny, and really not efficient.

text: a young african american man , quickly closing in on the much sought after american dream , comes to terms with the fact that no amount of success can shield him from the ills that face our society .
translation: Seorang lelaki berbangsa Afrika-Amerika muda, yang hampir mencapai impian Amerika yang banyak dicari, sedar bahawa tidak ada jumlah kejayaan pun yang boleh melindunginya daripada masalah yang dihadapi masyarakat kita.
back_translation: A young African-American man, who is on the brink of achieving the highly sought-after American dream, realizes that no amount of success can shield him from the issues faced by our society.

text: when perry fists a bull at the moore farm , it 's only a matter of time before he gets the upper hand in matters of the heart .
translation: Apabila Perry menjuarai seekor lembu di ladang Moore, hanya akan menjadi soal masa sebelum dia mendapat keunggulan dalam hal hati.
back_translation: When Perry wins over a cow in Moore's field, it will only be a matter of time before he gains an advantage in matters of the heart.

text: the clues are few and time is running out for the students of rogers high school .
translation: Petunjuk-petunjuk sedikit dan masa semakin berkurang bagi pelajar-pelajar sekolah menengah Rogers.
back_translation: The high school students at Rogers are facing diminishing time and scant instructions.

text: few films this year have been as resolute in their emotional nakedness .
translation: Beberapa filem tahun ini tidak seberani dalam kejujuran emosional mereka.
back_translation: Some movies this year are not as bold in their emotional honesty.

text: for his drug is not dope or crack or smack . . .
translation: kerana dadahnya bukan ganja atau dadah keras atau dadah suntikan . . .
back_translation: because the drug is neither cannabis nor hard drugs nor injectable drugs . . .

text: i do n't even care that there 's no plot in this antonio banderas-lucy liu faceoff . it 's still terrible !
translation: Saya tidak peduli bahawa tidak ada plot dalam pertarungan wajah Antonio Banderas-Lucy Liu ini. Ia tetap teruk!
back_translation: I don't care that there is no plot in this Antonio Banderas-Lucy Liu face-off. It's still terrible!

text: lynn tells sue she wants to stop their criminal life and get married ^ & # 214 ; she wo n't accept chow nunn 's order for the second killing .
translation: lynn memberitahu sue bahawa dia mahu berhenti dari kehidupan jenayah mereka dan berkahwin. Dia tidak akan menerima arahan Chow Nunn untuk pembunuhan kedua.
back_translation: Lynn told Sue that she wants to quit their life of crime and get married. She will not take Chow Nunn's orders for a second murder.

text: to define 'family ' , guy must seek beyond what he can see , touch , taste , smell or hear .
translation: Untuk mentakrifkan 'keluarga', seseorang harus mencari lebih daripada yang boleh dilihat, disentuh, dirasa, dicium atau didengar.
back_translation: To define 'family', one must search beyond what can be seen, touched, felt, smelled, or heard.

text: tian emphasizes the isolation of these characters by confining color to liyan 's backyard .
translation: tian menekankan pengasingan watak-watak ini dengan menghadkan warna kepada halaman belakang liyan.
back_translation: Tian emphasizes the differentiation of these characters by limiting the color to the backdrop pages.

text: meanwhile the kids find a stray dog who needs a home .
translation: Sementara itu, kanak-kanak menemui seekor anjing jalanan yang memerlukan tempat tinggal.
back_translation: Meanwhile, the children found a stray dog in need of a home.

text: in fact a blueprint : a blueprint of her mother .
translation: sebuah denah: denah ibunya.
back_translation: A blueprint: her mother's blueprint.

text: clara has gone wild after her mother runs off with another man .
translation: Clara telah menjadi liar setelah ibunya melarikan diri dengan lelaki lain.
back_translation: Clara has become wild after her mother ran away with another man.

text: his songs are no longer seen as top grade .
translation: Lagunya tidak lagi dilihat sebagai kelas teratas.
back_translation: The song is no longer seen as top class.

text: retired nfl linebacker , `` terrible `` terry tate enforces the office rules at the felcher and sons ' headquarters the only way he knows how : with bone-crushing tackles and hard-core trash-talk .
translation: Linebacker NFL yang bersara, "terrible" Terry Tate menegakkan peraturan pejabat di ibu pejabat Felcher and Sons dengan cara satu-satunya yang dia tahu, iaitu dengan tackle yang membelit tulang dan pertuturan kasar yang keras.
back_translation: Retired NFL linebacker, "terrible" Terry Tate enforces office rules at the headquarters of Felcher and Sons in the only way he knows how, with bone-crunching tackles and loud, harsh speech.

text: a strong first quarter , slightly less so second quarter , and average second half .
translation: suku pertama yang kuat, sedikit kurang kuat suku kedua, dan separuh kedua yang sederhana.
back_translation: The first tribe is strong, slightly less strong the second tribe, and the second half is moderate.

text: 'the war of the roses , ' trailer-trash style . entertaining but like shooting fish in a barrel .
translation: Perang bunga-bunga, gaya trailer-trash. Menghibur tetapi seperti menembak ikan dalam tong.
back_translation: Flower wars, trailer-trash style. Entertaining but feels like shooting fish in a barrel.

text: as a kind of colorful , dramatized pbs program , frida gets the job done . but , for that , why not watch a documentary ?
translation: Sebagai satu jenis program pbs yang berwarna-warni dan dramatis, Frida berjaya menyelesaikan tugas tersebut. Tetapi, mengapa tidak menonton sebuah dokumentari?
back_translation: As a colorful and dramatic type of PBS program, Frida successfully completed the task. But, why not watch a documentary?

text: all in all , it 's a pretty good execution of a story that 's a lot richer than the ones hollywood action screenwriters usually come up with on their own .
translation: Secara keseluruhan, itu adalah satu pelaksanaan cerita yang cukup baik yang jauh lebih kaya daripada cerita-cerita yang biasa dicipta oleh penulis skrin aksi Hollywood sendiri.
back_translation: Overall, it is a pretty good execution of a story that is much richer than the usual stories created by Hollywood action screenwriters themselves.

text: a loyal british drummer , one of the thousands of british soldiers stationed in america , accidently drops his canteen into a stream while trying to fill it with water .
translation: Seorang pemain dram Britania yang setia, salah seorang daripada ribuan tentera Britania yang ditempatkan di Amerika, secara tidak sengaja menjatuhkan cawannya ke dalam sungai semasa cuba mengisinya dengan air.
back_translation: A loyal British drama player, one of the thousands of British soldiers stationed in America, accidentally dropped his hat into the river while trying to fill it with water.

text: can the three dons outwit them and not get bluffed by their obvious charms ?
translation: Bolehkah ketiga orang don itu menipu mereka dan tidak terpedaya oleh pesona mereka yang jelas?
back_translation: Can those three men deceive them and not be charmed by their clear charm?

text: as a result of one of his liaisons , he meets marcus , an odd 12-year-old boy with problems at school .
translation: Akibat dari salah satu hubungannya, dia berjumpa dengan Marcus, seorang budak lelaki berusia 12 tahun yang aneh dengan masalah di sekolah.
back_translation: As a result of one of her connections, she met Marcus, a 12-year-old boy who is odd and experiencing issues at school.

text: fails to satisfactorily exploit its gender politics , genre thrills or inherent humor .
translation: Gagal untuk memanfaatkan politik gender, sensasi genre, atau humor yang ada dengan memuaskan.
back_translation: Failed to utilize existing gender politics, genre sensation, or humor satisfactorily.

text: vile and tacky are the two best adjectives to describe ghost ship .
translation: "Busuk dan jijik adalah dua kata adjektif terbaik untuk menggambarkan kapal hantu."
back_translation: "Rotten and disgusting are the two best adjectives to describe a ghost ship."

text: . . . very funny , very enjoyable . . .
translation: Sangat lucu, sangat menyeronokkan.
back_translation: Very funny, very enjoyable.

text: it understands , in a way that speaks forcefully enough about the mechanisms of poverty to transcend the rather simplistic filmmaking .
translation: Ia memahami, dengan cara yang cukup kuat untuk menggambarkan mekanisme kemiskinan dengan cemerlang melebihi pembikinan filem yang agak sederhana.
back_translation: It understands, in a strong enough way to vividly describe poverty mechanism beyond the making of a rather simple film.

text: spanning from post world war ii during the late 1950 's through the irish mob wars of the 1970 's and culminating in their adulthood in the 1990 's , the story is set to the backdrop of backroom politics and the realities of the irish mob and it 's gang wars .
translation: Bermula dari selepas Perang Dunia II pada penghujung tahun 1950-an melalui peperangan geng Irish pada tahun 1970-an dan mencapai kemuncak dewasa mereka pada tahun 1990-an, cerita ini berlangsung di tengah-tengah politik sulit dan realiti gerombolan Irish dan peperangan gengnya.
back_translation: Starting from after World War II in the late 1950s through the Irish gang wars in the 1970s and peaking in the 1990s, this story unfolds amid the turbulent politics and the reality of Irish mobsters and their gang wars.

text: in the vein of raiders of the lost ark , this action packed thriller takes us on a roller coaster ride from the bone chilling cold of moscow to the mystical beauty of india .

text: not really bad so much as distasteful : we need kidnapping suspense dramas right now like we need doomsday thrillers .

text: it 's mired in a shabby script that piles layer upon layer of action man clichM-i atop wooden dialogue and a shifting tone that falls far short of the peculiarly moral amorality of [ woo 's ] best work .
translation: Ia tenggelam dalam skrip yang lusuh yang menimbulkan berlapis-lapis cliché action man di atas dialog kayu dan nada yang berubah-ubah yang jauh dari keamoralan moral yang khas dalam karya terbaik [woo].

text: winds up being both revelatory and narcissistic , achieving some honest insight into relationships that most high-concept films candy-coat with pat storylines , precious circumstances and beautiful stars .
