back_translation: During Quinn's monitoring of Tasha, planning the right moment to kill her, he became mesmerized by her beauty and pure sincerity.

text: enlisted for a dangerous covert mission , he must combat a clever , organized , and ruthless enemy far beyond the scope of his experience .
translation: Diambil untuk misi rahsia yang berbahaya, dia harus melawan musuh yang bijak, teratur, dan kejam jauh di luar lingkup pengalamannya.
back_translation: Taken for a dangerous secret mission, he must fight against enemies who are cunning, organized, and cruel far beyond his experience.

text: . . . with `` the bourne identity `` we return to the more traditional action genre .
translation: . . . dengan "identiti bourne" kita kembali kepada genre aksi yang lebih tradisional.
back_translation: . . . with "Bourne identity," we return to a more traditional action genre.

text: she and her daughter flee to find sylvie 's first love in the countryside .
translation: Dia dan anak perempuannya melarikan diri untuk mencari cinta pertama Sylvie di desa.
back_translation: He and his daughter fled to the village to search for Sylvie's first love.

text: exhausted and physically drained , they slowly pack up their equipment as the dawn light gradually builds and the emotional impact of the night 's events deepens .
translation: Letih dan keletihan fizikal, mereka perlahan-lahan mengemas peralatan mereka sementara cahaya fajar secara perlahan-lahan muncul dan impak emosi daripada peristiwa malam itu semakin mendalam.
back_translation: Tired and physically exhausted, they slowly packed up their equipment as the dawn light slowly emerged, and the emotional impact of the night's events deepened.

text: interview with the assassin is structured less as a documentary and more as a found relic , and as such the film has a difficult time shaking its blair witch project real-time roots .
translation: Wawancara dengan pembunuh itu tidak diatur sebagai sebuah dokumentari tetapi lebih sebagai peninggalan yang ditemui, dan oleh itu filem ini mengalami kesulitan untuk melepaskan akar sebenar projek blair witch secara real-time.
back_translation: The interview with the killer was not arranged as a documentary but more like an unexpectedly discovered artifact, causing the film to struggle to break free from the real-time roots of the Blair Witch project.

text: nicklas lives a pretty normal teenage life , until one day , not far from graduation , when a gangster from his school beats him up .
translation: Nicklas menjalani kehidupan remaja yang agak normal, sehingga suatu hari, tidak lama sebelum tamat sekolah, seorang gengster dari sekolahnya menyerangnya.
back_translation: Nicklas led a rather normal teenage life, until one day, not long before finishing school, a gangster from his school attacked him.

text: the movie does n't think much of its characters , its protagonist , or of us .
translation: Filem itu tidak memikirkan banyak tentang watak-wataknya, protagonisnya, atau tentang kita.
back_translation: The movie doesn't think much about its characters, its protagonist, or about us.

text: chon lin follows rathbone to london to kill him , while sending chon a letter telling him of the murder .
translation: Chon Lin mengikuti Rathbone ke London untuk membunuhnya, sambil mengirim surat kepada Chon memberitahunya mengenai pembunuhan tersebut.
back_translation: Chon Lin followed Rathbone to London to kill him, while sending a letter to Chon informing him about the murder.

text: it 's a bad sign when you 're rooting for the film to hurry up and get to its subjects ' deaths just so the documentary will be over , but it 's indicative of how uncompelling the movie is unless it happens to cover your particular area of interest .
translation: Ia adalah tanda buruk apabila anda mendoakan agar filem segera mencapai kematian subjeknya hanya supaya dokumentari itu selesai, tetapi ia mencerminkan betapa tidak menariknya filem tersebut kecuali jika ia menangani topik yang anda minati.
back_translation: It's a bad sign when you pray for the film to quickly reach the death of its subject just so the documentary can be finished, but it reflects how uninteresting the film is unless it deals with a topic you are interested in.

text: neighbor 's dog operates at a consistent chuckle pitch that frequently gives way to guffaws .
translation: Anjing jiran beroperasi pada nada gelak yang konsisten yang sering menuju kepada ketawa besar.
back_translation: The neighbor's dog operates on a consistent tone of laughter that often leads to loud barks.

text: it 's a terrible movie in every regard , and utterly painful to watch .
translation: Ini adalah filem yang teruk dari segi apa jua, dan sangat menyakitkan untuk ditonton.
back_translation: This is a terrible movie in every aspect, and very painful to watch.

text: a mysterious video tape is killing off anyone who watches it .
translation: Sebuah pita video misteri sedang membunuh sesiapa sahaja yang menontonnya.
back_translation: A mysterious video tape is killing anyone who watches it.

text: to help him complete his manuscript he hires stenographer emma .
translation: Bagi membantu beliau menyiapkan manuskripnya, beliau menyewa stenografer Emma.
back_translation: To help him complete his manuscript, he hired a stenographer named Emma.

text: clarissa vaughn , a modern woman living in present times is throwing a party for her friend richard , a famous author dying of aids .
translation: Clarissa Vaughn, seorang wanita moden yang tinggal pada masa kini sedang mengadakan majlis untuk kawannya Richard, seorang penulis terkenal yang sedang sekarat akibat AIDS.
back_translation: Clarissa Vaughn, a modern woman living in the present, is holding a gathering for her friend Richard, a famous writer who is dying from AIDS.

text: for all its failed connections , divine secrets of the ya-ya sisterhood is nurturing , in a gauzy , dithering way .
translation: Bagi semua hubungan yang gagal, rahsia ilahi Ya-Ya Sisterhood itu menyuburkan, dengan cara yang samar dan ragu-ragu.
back_translation: For all failed relationships, the divine secret of the Ya-Ya Sisterhood nurtures them, in subtle and hesitant ways.

text: you 'd think by now america would have had enough of plucky british eccentrics with hearts of gold . yet the act is still charming here .
translation: Anda mungkin fikir pada masa ini Amerika sudah muak dengan watak Inggeris yang berani dengan hati emas. Namun, perbuatan ini masih menawan di sini.
back_translation: You might think that Americans are already tired of the bold English character with a golden heart at this time. However, this act is still captivating here.

text: by halfway through this picture i was beginning to hate it , and , of course , feeling guilty for it . . . . then , miracle of miracles , the movie does a flip-flop .
translation: Pada separuh jalan gambar ini, saya mula benci padanya, dan, tentu saja, berasa bersalah kerana itu. ... kemudian, keajaiban yang ajaib, filem tersebut berubah sikap.
back_translation: Halfway through this picture, I started to hate it, and, of course, felt guilty about it. ... then, miraculously, the film changed its attitude.

text: as this sacrifice draws to its close , our story begins .
translation: Apabila pengorbanan ini hampir berakhir, kisah kita bermula.
back_translation: When this sacrifice is almost over, our story begins.

text: returning aggressively to his formula of dimwitted comedy and even dimmer characters , sandler , who also executive produces , has made a film that makes previous vehicles look smart and sassy .
translation: Kembali dengan agresif kepada formula komedi bodohnya dan watak-watak yang lebih bodoh, Sandler, yang juga menjadi penerbit eksekutif, telah membuat filem yang membuat kenderaan sebelumnya kelihatan bijak dan cerdik.
back_translation: Returning aggressively to his stupid comedy formula and even stupider characters, Sandler, who also serves as an executive producer, has made a film that makes his previous works look wise and clever.

text: you 'll laugh at either the obviousness of it all or its stupidity or maybe even its inventiveness , but the point is , you 'll laugh .
translation: Anda akan ketawa sama ada kerana kejelasan keseluruhannya atau kebodohannya atau mungkin kejeniusannya, tetapi intinya, anda akan ketawa.
back_translation: You will laugh whether it's because of its clarity, stupidity, or perhaps its genius, but in essence, you will laugh.

text: just another combination of bad animation and mindless violence . . . lacking the slightest bit of wit or charm .
translation: hanya gabungan animasi buruk dan keganasan tanpa fikiran . . . tidak mempunyai sedikit kebijaksanaan atau daya tarikan .
back_translation: Just a combination of bad animation and violence without any thought . . . lacks any wisdom or appeal.

text: about nowhere kids who appropriated turfs as they found them and become self-made celebrity athletes -- a low-down version of the american dream .
translation: tentang kanak-kanak yang tidak diketahui yang merampas kawasan tanah sebagaimana yang mereka jumpai dan menjadi atlet terkenal buatan sendiri - versi rendah impian Amerika.
back_translation: about unknown children who seize land as they find it and become famous athletes of their own making - a low version of the American dream.

text: as he struggles to achieve social success , he discovers his darker side .
translation: Sementara dia berusaha mencapai kejayaan sosial, dia menemui sisi gelapnya.
back_translation: While he strives to achieve social success, he encounters his dark side.

text: faced with endless dead-end gigs and his own loss of passion for the music he once thought was his life , he finds himself returning home to the three generations of women that he left behind .
translation: Dihadapi dengan persembahan-persembahan yang tidak menghasilkan dan kehilangan minat terhadap muzik yang dulunya dia anggap sebagai hidupnya, dia mendapati dirinya pulang ke rumah kepada tiga generasi wanita yang ditinggalkannya.
back_translation: Faced with unproductive performances and a loss of interest in the music that she once considered her life, she found herself returning home to three generations of women whom she had left behind.

text: unfortunately , it 's also not very good . especially compared with the television series that inspired the movie .
translation: Malangnya, filem itu juga tidak begitu bagus. Terutama jika dibandingkan dengan siri televisyen yang menjadi inspirasi kepada filem itu.
back_translation: Unfortunately, the movie is also not that good. Especially when compared to the television series that inspired the film.

text: watching `` ending `` is too often like looking over the outdated clothes and plastic knickknacks at your neighbor 's garage sale . you ca n't believe anyone would really buy this stuff .
translation: Menonton "penamat" terlalu sering seperti melihat pakaian usang dan penuh gantungan plastik di jualan garaj jiran anda. Anda tidak boleh mempercayai ada orang yang benar-benar membeli barang-barang ini.
back_translation: Watching "endings" too often is like looking at old clothes and plastic hangers at your neighbor's garage sale. You can't believe that there are actually people who would buy these items.

text: as long as vincent lives in the protection of the present , he does n't have to deal with the pain of his past -- or his sorrow over his broken relationship with joey .
translation: Selagi Vincent terus hidup dalam perlindungan masa kini, dia tidak perlu menghadapi kesakitan dari masa lalunya - atau kesedihannya atas hubungan yang terputus dengan Joey.
back_translation: As long as Vincent continues to live under the protection of the present, he does not need to face the pain of his past - or his sadness over the severed relationship with Joey.

text: deep in the blue ridge mountains , just outside of a small , quiet town , lives willy , an animalistic , southern rebel .
translation: Di dalam Blue Ridge Mountains, tepat di luar sebuah bandar kecil dan aman, tinggal Willy, seorang pemberontak Selatan yang bersifat haiwan.
back_translation: In the Blue Ridge Mountains, just outside of a small and peaceful town, lives Willy, a Southern rebel with an animalistic nature.

text: the touch is generally light enough and the performances , for the most part , credible .
translation: Sentuhan itu secara umumnya cukup ringan dan persembahannya, dalam kebanyakan kes, boleh dipercayai.
back_translation: The touch is generally quite light and offerings, in most cases, can be trusted.

text: lynn runs into yan , the cousin of an old friend who died .
translation: lynn bertemu dengan yan, sepupu seorang kawan lama yang telah meninggal.
back_translation: Lynn met with Yan, a cousin of a long-lost friend who has passed away.

text: in theory , a middle-aged romance pairing clayburgh and tambor sounds promising , but in practice it 's something else altogether -- clownish and offensive and nothing at all like real life .
translation: Dalam teori, pasangan romantik di usia pertengahan antara Clayburgh dan Tambor kedengarannya menjanjikan, tetapi dalam praktiknya, ia menjadi sesuatu yang berbeza sama sekali - konyol dan menyakitkan dan tidak sama sekali seperti kehidupan nyata.
back_translation: In theory, the romantic relationship between Clayburgh and Tambor in their middle age sounds promising, but in practice, it turned out to be something entirely different - absurd and painful and not at all like real life.

text: set in present-day hollywood , the story concerns a script which does not exist , but nonetheless draws praise and bids from the creative community .
translation: Berlatar belakang Hollywood masa kini, cerita ini melibatkan sebuah skrip yang sebenarnya tidak wujud, tetapi tetap mendapat pujian dan tawaran dari komuniti kreatif.
back_translation: Set against contemporary Hollywood, this story involves a script that doesn't actually exist but still garners praise and offers from the creative community.

text: as it stands , there 's some fine sex onscreen , and some tense arguing , but not a whole lot more .
translation: Pada masa ini, terdapat adegan seks yang baik di skrin, dan beberapa pertengkaran tegang, tetapi tidak banyak lagi.
back_translation: At this time, there are some good sex scenes on screen, and a few tense arguments, but not much more.

text: secretary manages a neat trick , bundling the flowers of perversity , comedy and romance into a strangely tempting bouquet of a movie .
translation: Setiausaha mengendalikan satu trik yang cekap, menggabungkan bunga-bunga keanehan, komedi, dan romantis menjadi sebuah rangkaian filem yang menarik secara aneh.
back_translation: The secretary handles a clever trick, combining weirdness, comedy, and romance to create an oddly appealing series of films.

text: those of you who are not an eighth grade girl will most likely doze off during this one .
translation: Mereka yang bukan gadis tingkatan lapan kemungkinan besar akan terlena semasa ini.
back_translation: Those who are not in Form 4 girls are likely to be caught off guard at this time.

text: while they think they are driving out the rojas , a local gang that runs the meth trade for bosses in cabo san lucas , rikki is running an elaborate double-cross on his own family .
translation: Sementara mereka fikir mereka menghalau rojas, kumpulan tempatan yang mengendalikan perdagangan meth bagi bos-bos di cabo san lucas, rikki menjalankan tipu daya rumit terhadap keluarganya sendiri.
back_translation: While they thought they were driving away the Rojas, a local group controlling the meth trade for the bosses in Cabo San Lucas, Rikki is executing a complex deception against his own family.

text: it 's like a rap rashomon . there 's a million different stories here .
translation: Ia seperti sebuah Rashomon rap. Terdapat sejuta cerita yang berbeza di sini.
back_translation: It's like a Rashomon rap. There are a million different stories here.

text: 4ever has the same sledgehammer appeal as pokemon videos , but it breathes more on the big screen and induces headaches more slowly .
translation: 4ever mempunyai daya tarik yang sama kuat seperti video pokemon, tetapi ia lebih menarik apabila ditayangkan di skrin besar dan menyebabkan sakit kepala secara perlahan-lahan.
back_translation: 4ever has the same attraction power as a Pokemon video, but it is more captivating when displayed on a big screen and gradually causes a headache.

text: a cellophane-pop remake of the punk classic ladies and gentlemen , the fabulous stains . . . crossroads is never much worse than bland or better than inconsequential .
translation: satu penjanaan semula cellophane-pop dari klasik punk ladies and gentlemen, the fabulous stains . . . crossroads tidak pernah teruk lebih daripada membosankan atau lebih baik daripada tidak signifikan.
back_translation: a recycling generation of cellophane-pop from classic punk ladies and gentlemen, the fabulous stains . . . crossroads has never been more terrible than boring or better than insignificant.

text: cameroon and its peoples are the lark , its feathers plucked first by colonialism and then by native strong-men : `` alouette , je te plumerai . ``
translation: Kamerun dan penduduknya adalah kenari, bulunya dicabut pertama oleh kolonialisme dan kemudian oleh orang kuat tempatan: "alouette, je te plumerai."
back_translation: Cameroon and its inhabitants are like a canary, their feathers were first plucked by colonialism and then by local strongmen: "alouette, je te plumerai."

text: he then goes to paris where he prepares to make a political film criticizing the state of repression in his native land .
translation: Dia kemudian pergi ke Paris di mana dia bersedia untuk membuat filem politik yang mengkritik keadaan penindasan di tanah airnya.
back_translation: He later went to Paris where he was ready to make a political film criticizing the oppressive conditions in his homeland.

text: like a documentary version of fight club , shorn of social insight , intellectual pretension and cinematic interest .
translation: Ia seperti versi dokumentari Fight Club, tanpa wawasan sosial, pretensi intelektual, dan minat sinematik.
back_translation: It's like a documentary version of Fight Club, without social insights, intellectual pretensions, and cinematic interests.

text: the film is an earnest try at beachcombing verismo , but it would be even more indistinct than it is were it not for the striking , quietly vulnerable personality of ms . ambrose .
translation: Filem ini adalah percubaan yang sungguh-sungguh dalam mengekalkan verismo pantai, tetapi ia akan menjadi lebih kabur daripada sekarang jika bukan kerana personaliti menarik dan mudah terkesan milik ms. ambrose.
back_translation: This film is a sincere attempt to maintain the verismo of the coast, but it would be even blurrier than it is now if not for the captivating and easily impressed personality of Ms. Ambrose.

text: true to its animatronic roots : . . . as stiff , ponderous and charmless as a mechanical apparatus . . . 'the country bears ' should never have been brought out of hibernation .
translation: Setia kepada akar animatroniknya: ... sekeras, berat, dan tanpa pesona seperti mekanikal ... 'the country bears' sepatutnya tidak pernah dibangunkan dari hibernasi.
back_translation: Loyal to its animatronic roots: ... as tough, heavy, and devoid of charm as mechanical ... 'the country bears' should never have been awakened from hibernation.

text: frei assembles a fascinating profile of a deeply humanistic artist who , in spite of all that he 's witnessed , remains surprisingly idealistic , and retains an extraordinary faith in the ability of images to communicate the truth of the world around him .
translation: frei menyusun profil yang menarik mengenai seorang artis humanistik yang, walaupun telah menyaksikan segala hal, tetap sangat idealistik, dan mempertahankan keyakinan luar biasa dalam kemampuan imej untuk menyampaikan kebenaran dunia di sekelilingnya.
back_translation: He excels in creating an interesting profile of a humanistic artist who, despite having experienced everything, remains highly idealistic, and maintains an extraordinary belief in the power of imagery to convey the truth of the world around him.

text: the crossing , even after a hard year of hiding , was to be a hardship : three months in a makeshift vessel with two thousand other fugitives , the victims not only of disease , hunger , and death , but primarily of the british navy and intelligence services .
translation: Perjalanan merentasi lautan, walaupun selepas setahun sukar bersembunyi, akan menjadi satu liku-liku: tiga bulan dalam sebuah perahu sementara bersama dua ribu pelarian lain, mangsa bukan sahaja penyakit, kelaparan, dan kematian, tetapi lebih daripada itu, pihak tentera laut dan perkhidmatan perisikan British.
back_translation: The journey across the ocean, even after a year of difficult hiding, will become a twisty one: three months in a temporary boat with two thousand other refugees, victims not only of illness, hunger, and death, but also of the British navy and intelligence service.

text: the circles cause a media frenzy and test hess 's faith as he journeys to find out the truth behind the crop circles .
translation: Lingkaran-lingkaran itu menyebabkan kehebohan media dan menguji iman Hess ketika dia berusaha mencari kebenaran di sebalik lingkaran tanaman tersebut.
back_translation: Those circles caused media frenzy and tested Hess's faith as he tried to uncover the truth behind those crop circles.

text: this is , not to put too fine a point on it , a swashbuckler , a costume drama . if you love that old story form , you will be in old-fogy heaven , as it is nearly a perfect example of a genre that died out years ago .
translation: Ini adalah, tanpa perlu terlalu halus, sebuah filem petualang berbaju besi, sebuah drama pakaian. Jika anda suka bentuk cerita lama itu, anda akan berada di syurga orang tua, kerana hampir merupakan contoh sempurna dari genre yang sudah pun pupus bertahun-tahun lalu.
back_translation: This is, without being too fancy, an adventure movie clad in armor, a garment drama. If you like that old-fashioned storytelling style, you'll be in heaven of the elderly, as it is almost a perfect example of a genre that has long since disappeared.

text: director shekhar kapur and screenwriters michael schiffer and hossein amini have tried hard to modernize and reconceptualize things , but the barriers finally prove to be too great .
translation: Pengarah Shekhar Kapur dan penulis skrin Michael Schiffer dan Hossein Amini telah berusaha sebaik mungkin untuk memodenkan dan mengubah semula konsep-konsep, tetapi akhirnya rintangan yang dihadapi terlalu besar.
back_translation: Director Shekhar Kapur and screenwriters Michael Schiffer and Hossein Amini have tried their best to modernize and rework the concepts, but ultimately the challenges they faced were too great.

text: arrests of his posse are piling up and profits are plummeting .
translation: Tangkapan gengnya semakin bertambah dan keuntungan merosot.
back_translation: The gang's captures are increasing and profits are declining.

text: in the not-too-distant future , movies like ghost ship will be used as analgesic balm for overstimulated minds . right now , they 're merely signposts marking the slow , lingering death of imagination .
translation: Pada masa depan yang tidak terlalu jauh, filem seperti kapal hantu akan digunakan sebagai balsem analgesik untuk minda yang terlalu terangsang. Pada masa ini, mereka hanyalah tanda tanya yang menandakan kematian imaginasi yang perlahan dan menyakitkan.
back_translation: In the not too distant future, films like ghost ships will be used as analgesic balm for overstimulated minds. At present, they are just question marks signaling the slow and painful death of imagination.

text: a ragbag of promising ideas and failed narrative , of good acting and plain old bad filmmaking .
translation: sebuah kumpulan idea menarik dan naratif yang gagal, lakonan yang baik dan pembuatan filem yang teruk.
back_translation: An interesting collection of ideas and narratives that fail, good acting, and a terrible film production.

text: who , exactly , is fighting whom here ? ah , yes , that would be me : fighting off the urge to doze .
translation: Siapa, sebenarnya, yang sedang bertarung di sini? Ah, ya, itu saya: bertarung menahan hasrat untuk tidur.
back_translation: Who is actually fighting here? Ah, yes, that's me: fighting to resist the desire to sleep.

text: you need n't be steeped in '50s sociology , pop culture or movie lore to appreciate the emotional depth of haynes ' work . though haynes ' style apes films from the period . . . its message is not rooted in that decade .
translation: Anda tidak perlu mendalami sosiologi tahun 50-an, budaya pop atau sejarah filem untuk menghargai kedalaman emosi karya Haynes. Walaupun gaya Haynes meniru filem dari tempoh itu... pesanannya tidak berakar pada dekad itu.
back_translation: You don't need to delve into 1950s sociology, pop culture, or film history to appreciate the emotional depth of Haynes' work. Although Haynes' style emulates films from that period... his message is not rooted in that decade.

text: an action comedy prequel to spang olsen 's box office hit in china they eat dogs .
translation: prekuel komedi aksi kepada filem popular Spang Olsen di China iaitu "They Eat Dogs".
back_translation: A prequel action comedy to the popular Spang Olsen film in China titled "They Eat Dogs".

text: but as each retreats into their private worlds of fantasy , a much more lively story unfolds - a story of confrontations that should have happened , of secrets that need to be revealed .
translation: Namun ketika setiap orang mundur ke dalam dunia fantasi peribadi masing-masing, sebuah cerita yang lebih hidup terungkap - sebuah cerita tentang konfrontasi yang sepatutnya berlaku, tentang rahsia yang perlu dinyatakan.
back_translation: However, when everyone retreats into their own personal fantasy world, a more vibrant story unfolds - a tale of confrontations that should have occurred, about secrets that need to be revealed.

text: emory , a former governor of his tribe , is reunited with his son larry , via the help of a friend , sky montgomery , who invites larry to travel from the old pueblo to the new `` big city `` to join his father at a photo-art exhibition hosted by sky .
translation: Emory, seorang bekas ketua suku, dipertemukan semula dengan anaknya Larry, dengan bantuan seorang rakan, Sky Montgomery, yang menjemput Larry untuk melancong dari pekan lama ke bandar besar baharu untuk menyertai bapanya di pameran foto seni yang dihoskan oleh Sky.
back_translation: Emory, a former tribal chief, is reunited with his son Larry, with the help of a friend, Sky Montgomery, who invites Larry to travel from the old town to the new big city to join his father at an art photo exhibition hosted by Sky.

text: a much better documentary -- more revealing , more emotional and more surprising -- than its pedestrian english title would have you believe .
translation: Sebuah dokumentari yang jauh lebih baik -- lebih mendedahkan, lebih emosional dan lebih mengejutkan -- daripada judul Inggeris biasa yang mungkin membuat anda sangka.
back_translation: A documentary that is much better -- more revealing, more emotional, and more surprising -- than the usual English title might lead you to believe.

text: it 's the brilliant surfing photography bringing you right inside the massive waves that lifts blue crush into one of the summer 's most pleasurable movies .
translation: Ini adalah fotografi luncur yang brilian membawa anda terus ke dalam ombak besar yang mengangkat Blue Crush ke salah satu filem yang paling menyenangkan pada musim panas.
back_translation: This is a brilliant surfing photograph that takes you right into the huge waves that lift Blue Crush into one of the most enjoyable movies of the summer.

text: this latest installment of the horror film franchise that is apparently as invulnerable as its trademark villain has arrived for an incongruous summer playoff , demonstrating yet again that the era of the intelligent , well-made b movie is long gone .
translation: Bahagian terbaru daripada francais filem seram yang nampaknya tidak dapat dihancurkan sepertimana watak jahatnya telah tiba untuk pertandingan musim panas yang tidak tepat, sekali lagi menunjukkan bahawa era filem b yang bijak dan berkualiti telah lama berlalu.
back_translation: The latest installment of the horror movie franchise that seems indestructible as its evil character has arrived for an untimely summer showdown, once again demonstrating that the era of smart and quality B movies has long passed.

text: the overall effect is awe and affection -- and a strange urge to get on a board and , uh , shred , dude .
translation: Kesan keseluruhan adalah kagum dan kasih sayang - dan keinginan aneh untuk naik atas papan dan, uh, memotong-motong, kawan.
back_translation: The overall impression is one of admiration and love - and a strange desire to climb on a board and, uh, shred, buddy.

text: toledo ( daniel hendler ) , 25 years old , future architect , suffers from an acute jealousy .
translation: Toledo (Daniel Hendler), 25 tahun, bakal arkitek, mengalami rasa cemburu yang teruk.
back_translation: Toledo (Daniel Hendler), 25 years old, a prospective architect, experiences intense jealousy.

text: then after rumers spread that he was a communist he was blacklisted from hollywood forever .

translation: Ini adalah kisah sebenar Molly Craig, seorang gadis Australia hitam muda yang memimpin adik perempuannya dan sepupunya dalam pelarian dari kem tahanan rasmi kerajaan, yang ditubuhkan sebagai sebahagian daripada dasar rasmi kerajaan untuk melatih mereka sebagai pekerja domestik dan mengintegrasi mereka ke dalam masyarakat kulit putih.
back_translation: This is the true story of Molly Craig, a young black Australian girl who led her younger sister and cousin in an escape from a government-sanctioned racial detention camp, established as part of the government's official policy to train them as domestic workers and integrate them into white society.

text: it 's a sci-fi , time travel , action adventure , comedy , drama mystery all rolled into one as mark twain on the way home from one of his last speaking tours in 1906 , is jostled on a train by 2 men , one in pursuit of the other , twain picks up a newspaper that one of them drops and the headline reads `` manned mars mission . . . .

Twain mengambil surat khabar yang terjatuh dari salah seorang daripada mereka dan tajuknya adalah "misikan berawak ke Mars...".
back_translation: This is a science fiction tale, time travel, action-adventure, comedy, mystery drama combined into one, where Mark Twain on his journey back from one of his last speaking tours in 1906, is disturbed on a train by two men, one of them being pursued by the other. Twain picks up a newspaper that fell from one of them and the headline reads "manned mission to Mars...".

text: opens as promising as any war/adventure film you 'll ever see and dissolves into a routine courtroom drama , better suited for a movie titled `` glory : a soldier 's story . ``

back_translation: It started out like an exciting war/adventure film and eventually turned into a regular courtroom drama, more fitting for a movie titled "Greatness: The Story of a Soldier."

text: william winslow `` ( ron perlman ) , the chief psychiatrist at brookdale .
translation: William Winslow "Ron Perlman", ketua pakar psikiatri di Brookdale.
back_translation: William Winslow "Ron Perlman", the chief expert psychiatrist at Brookdale.

text: their task is now cut out for them : plan a - get into the fashion extortion business plan b - stage india 's biggest bank robbery to get the diamonds back plan c - decamp with the loot .
translation: Tugas mereka kini jelas: rancang plan a - terlibat dalam perniagaan pencerobohan fesyen, plan b - merancang perampokan bank terbesar di India untuk mendapatkan balik berlian, plan c - melarikan diri dengan rampasan.
back_translation: Their tasks are now clear: plan a - to be involved in the fashion invasion business, plan b - to plan the biggest bank robbery in India to retrieve the diamonds, plan c - to escape with the loot.

text: look , this is a terrific flick replete with dazzling camera-work , dancing and music .
translation: Pandangan ini adalah filem yang hebat yang penuh dengan kerja kamera yang memukau, tarian, dan muzik.
back_translation: This view is a great film filled with stunning camera work, dance, and music.

text: rayne johnson is a shrewd investment company assistant who turns a mob slaying into a golden opportunity for a new improved lifestyle , managing to outsmart the crooked cops who are very eager to see her disappear .
translation: Rayne Johnson adalah seorang pembantu syarikat pelaburan yang cerdik yang mengubah pembunuhan beramai-ramai menjadi peluang emas untuk gaya hidup baru yang lebih baik, berjaya menipu polis yang korup yang sangat ingin melihatnya lenyap.
back_translation: Rayne Johnson is a smart investment company assistant who turns mass murder into a golden opportunity for a better new lifestyle, successfully deceiving corrupt police officers who are very keen on making her disappear.

text: an old-fashioned but emotionally stirring adventure tale of the kind they rarely make anymore .
translation: kisah petualangan klasik yang kuno tetapi menggetarkan perasaan, jenis yang jarang dibuat lagi.
back_translation: A classic, ancient adventure story that is thrilling and rarely made anymore.

text: the movie sticks much closer to hornby 's drop-dead confessional tone than the film version of high fidelity did .
translation: Filem itu lebih dekat dengan nada pengakuan jujur Hornby daripada versi filem High Fidelity.
back_translation: The film is closer to Hornby's honest acknowledgment tone than the film version of High Fidelity.

text: wilco fans will have a great time , and the movie should win the band a few new converts , too .
translation: Peminat Wilco akan mengalami waktu yang hebat, dan filem tersebut sepatutnya memenangi beberapa peminat baru untuk kumpulan itu juga.
back_translation: Wilco fans will have a great time, and the film should win some new fans for the band as well.

text: he tries other legal approaches , which also fail .
translation: Dia mencuba pendekatan undang-undang lain, yang juga gagal.
back_translation: He tried another legal approach, which also failed.

text: knowing that the legend of the temple describes ancient mystical music as the key to unlock its secrets , jake enlists the help of samantha `` sam `` kincaid , an expert musicologist .
translation: Mengambil kira legenda kuil yang menggambarkan muzik mistik kuno sebagai kunci untuk membuka rahsianya, Jake membawa masuk bantuan Samantha "Sam" Kincaid, seorang ahli muzikologi.
back_translation: Taking into account the temple legend depicting ancient mystic music as the key to unlock its secrets, Jake enlisted the help of Samantha "Sam" Kincaid, a musicologist.

text: the film is just a big , gorgeous , mind-blowing , breath-taking mess .
translation: Filem itu hanya satu kekacauan yang besar, cantik, mengagumkan, memusingkan, dan memenangkan nafas.
back_translation: The film is just one big chaos, beautiful, amazing, dizzying, and breathtaking.

text: an atonal estrogen opera that demonizes feminism while gifting the most sympathetic male of the piece with a nice vomit bath at his wedding .
translation: sebuah opera estrogen atonal yang menghukum feminisme sambil memberikan seorang lelaki yang paling simpatik dalam kisah itu dengan mandi muntah yang bagus di hari perkahwinannya.
back_translation: An atonal estrogen opera that condemns feminism while giving the most sympathetic man in the story a good vomit shower on his wedding day.

text: many years have passed since the secret knight avenged his family by slaying the evil knight .
translation: Sudah bertahun-tahun berlalu sejak kesatria rahsia membalas dendam kepada keluarganya dengan membunuh kesatria jahat.
back_translation: It has been years since the secret knight avenged his family by killing the evil knight.

text: he does n't accept himself and even everyday contacts with others cause his aggression .
translation: Dia tidak menerima dirinya sendiri dan setiap hubungan harian dengan orang lain menyebabkan agresinya.
back_translation: He does not accept himself and every daily interaction with others causes his aggression.

text: provided with a blurry picture of william the media turns his ministry into a human interest story that spans the country in a massive media hunt for this `` miracle man `` .
translation: Diberikan gambar yang kabur mengenai William, media mengubah kementeriannya menjadi cerita minat manusia yang merentasi negara dalam satu buruan media besar untuk "lelaki ajaib" ini.
back_translation: Given a blurry picture of William, the media has turned his ministry into a human interest story that transcends borders in a major media chase for this "magical man".

text: bad . very bad . stultifyingly , dumbfoundingly , mind-numbingly bad .
translation: Buruk. Sangat buruk. Sangat membosankan, membingungkan, membius, buruk.
back_translation: Bad. Very bad. Very boring, confusing, numbing, bad.

text: max finally decides to help the fbi by describing his constant dreams about the kidnapping .
translation: Max akhirnya memutuskan untuk membantu FBI dengan menceritakan mimpi-mimpinya yang berulang tentang penculikan.
back_translation: Max finally decided to assist the FBI by recounting his recurring dreams about kidnappings.

text: the narrator and the other characters try to convince us that acting transfigures esther , but she 's never seen speaking on stage ; one feels cheated , and esther seems to remain an unchanged dullard .
translation: Pencerita dan watak-watak lain cuba meyakinkan kita bahawa berlakon mengubah Esther, tetapi dia tidak pernah dilihat bercakap di pentas; seseorang merasa ditipu, dan Esther kelihatan tetap tidak berubah.
back_translation: The storyteller and other characters try to convince us that acting changes Esther, but she is never seen speaking on stage; someone feels deceived, and Esther appears unchanged.

text: after he 's dumped on valentine 's day by mallory , his girlfriend of three years , charlie finds himself obsessed and unable to live a normal life without her .
translation: Selepas dibuang pada Hari Valentine oleh Mallory, teman wanitanya selama tiga tahun, Charlie mendapati dirinya terobsesi dan tidak mampu menjalani kehidupan normal tanpanya.
back_translation: After being dumped on Valentine's Day by Mallory, his girlfriend of three years, Charlie found himself obsessed and unable to carry on a normal life without her.

text: many a parent and their teen ( or preteen ) kid could bond while watching a walk to remember . so could young romantics out on a date .
translation: Banyak ibu bapa dan remaja (atau pra-remaja) mereka boleh mengukuhkan hubungan sambil menonton A Walk to Remember. Begitu juga untuk pasangan muda yang sedang berkencan.
back_translation: Many parents and teenagers (or pre-teens) can strengthen their relationships while watching A Walk to Remember. The same goes for young couples who are dating.

text: amongst these , ruth , a girl of 17 , writes a diary on the journey they are to undertake on the atlantic .
translation: Di antara mereka, Ruth, seorang gadis berusia 17 tahun, menulis sebuah buku harian tentang perjalanan yang akan mereka lakukan ke Atlantik.
back_translation: Among them, Ruth, a 17-year-old girl, wrote a diary about the journey they were going to take to the Atlantic.

text: it made me want to wrench my eyes out of my head and toss them at the screen .
translation: Ia membuat saya ingin meraih mata saya keluar dari kepala dan lemparkan mereka ke skrin.
back_translation: It makes me want to grab my eyes out of my head and throw them at the screen.

text: collapses after 30 minutes into a slap-happy series of adolescent violence .
translation: runtuh selepas 30 minit menjadi siri keganasan remaja yang gembira dengan tamparan.
back_translation: collapsed after 30 minutes into a series of happy teenage violence slaps.

text: it all drags on so interminably it 's like watching a miserable relationship unfold in real time .
translation: Semuanya berlarutan begitu lama sehingga seperti menonton hubungan yang malang terbuka di hadapan mata secara langsung.
back_translation: Everything dissolved for so long that it felt like watching a doomed relationship unfold right before the eyes.

text: jacobi , the most fluent of actors , is given relatively dry material from nijinsky 's writings to perform , and the visuals , even erotically frank ones , become dullingly repetitive .
translation: Jacobi, pelakon yang paling lancar, diberi bahan yang agak kering dari penulisan Nijinsky untuk dilakonkan, dan visualnya, walaupun yang jujur secara erotika, menjadi membosankan dan berulang-ulang.
back_translation: Jacobi, the most fluent actor, was given somewhat dry material from Nijinsky's writing to perform, and the visuals, though honest in terms of erotica, became boring and repetitive.

text: as [ the characters ] get more depressed , the story gets more tiresome , especially as it continues to mount a conspicuous effort to be profound .
translation: Apabila watak-watak menjadi lebih tertekan, kisah tersebut menjadi semakin membosankan, terutamanya apabila ia terus mencuba dengan jelas untuk menjadi mendalam.
back_translation: When characters become more stressed, the story becomes increasingly boring, particularly when it keeps trying too hard to be deep.

text: but this murder investigation is drawing vincent home to long beach , the self-proclaimed city by the sea , where the past has been waiting for him to return .
translation: Tetapi siasatan pembunuhan ini mengundang Vincent pulang ke Long Beach, bandar yang dipanggil sebagai bandar di tepi laut, di mana masa lalu sedang menunggunya untuk kembali.
back_translation: But this murder investigation summons Vincent back to Long Beach, a city dubbed as the seaside city, where his past is waiting for him to return.

text: a story about a troubled genius who attempts to build a magnetic engine in hopes of greatly reducing the worlds consumption of fossil fuels and electricity .
translation: Sebuah cerita tentang seorang jenius yang bermasalah yang cuba membina enjin magnetik dengan harapan dapat mengurangkan penggunaan bahan api fosil dan elektrik di dunia.
back_translation: A story about a troubled genius who attempts to build a magnetic engine in hopes of reducing the use of fossil fuels and electricity in the world.

text: the dons have their own hierarchal manipulations - chotte baba ( jackie shroff ) , medium baba ( gulshan grover ) and bade baba ( amitabh bachchan ) .
translation: Para don mempunyai manipulasi hierarki mereka sendiri - chotte baba (Jackie Shroff), medium baba (Gulshan Grover) dan bade baba (Amitabh Bachchan).
back_translation: The dons have their own hierarchy manipulation - chotte baba (Jackie Shroff), medium baba (Gulshan Grover), and bade baba (Amitabh Bachchan).

text: one of those movies that catches you up in something bigger than yourself , namely , an archetypal desire to enjoy good trash every now and then .
translation: Salah satu filem yang membuat anda terjerat dalam sesuatu yang lebih besar daripada diri anda sendiri, iaitu, keinginan arketipal untuk menikmati filem yang tidak baik sesekali.
back_translation: One of the films that traps you into something bigger than yourself, that is, the archetypal desire to indulge in films that are not good occasionally.

text: even if you do n't understand what on earth is going on , this is a movie that will stimulate hours of post viewing discussion , if only to be reminded of who did what to whom and why .
translation: Walaupun anda tidak memahami apa yang sedang berlaku, filem ini akan merangsang perbincangan berjam-jam selepas tontonan, walaupun hanya untuk diingatkan siapa melakukan apa kepada siapa dan mengapa.
back_translation: Even though you may not understand what is happening, this film will stimulate hours of discussion after watching, even just to remind who did what to whom and why.

text: [ grant 's ] bumbling magic takes over the film , and it turns out to be another winning star vehicle .
translation: Sihir ketinggalan 'grant' menguasai filem tersebut, dan ternyata menjadi kenderaan bintang yang menang lain.
back_translation: The missing magic 'grant' takes over the film, turning out to be another winning star vehicle.

text: the doctor also finds he has an attraction to her , despite their age difference .
translation: Doktor itu juga merasakan ada tarikan kepada wanita itu, walaupun terdapat perbezaan umur di antara mereka.
back_translation: The doctor also felt drawn to the woman, despite the age difference between them.

text: an exciting debut from promising , and fairly disturbed , young director/screenwriter dylan kidd .
translation: debut yang menarik dari pengarah/pengarang skrip muda yang menjanjikan, dylan kidd, yang agak terganggu.
back_translation: An exciting debut from promising young director/screenwriter, Dylan Kidd, who is quite disturbed.

text: the editing is chaotic , the photography grainy and badly focused , the writing unintentionally hilarious , the direction unfocused , the performances as wooden .
translation: Penyuntingan berterabur, fotografi berdakwat dan tidak fokus, penulisan tidak sengaja lucu, arahan tidak tumpu, lakonan seperti berkayu.
back_translation: Disorganized editing, blurry and unfocused photography, unintentionally funny writing, unfocused direction, wooden acting.

text: in this age of soulless , fx-driven action franchises raimi anachronistically emphasizes character development .
translation: Pada zaman ini di mana francais aksi yang dikuasai oleh efek khas semakin meningkat, Raimi dengan tidak kena pada masanya menekankan pembangunan watak.
back_translation: In this era where action movies dominated by special effects are increasing, Raimi, ahead of his time, emphasizes character development.

text: the only excitement comes when the credits finally roll and you get to leave the theater .
translation: Satu-satunya keghairahan datang apabila tajuk akhirnya dipaparkan dan anda boleh meninggalkan teater.
back_translation: The only excitement comes when the final title is displayed and you can leave the theater.

text: nothing makes this woman happy , including her wealthy but passive husband ( tony ) , a pharmaceutical kingpin .
translation: Tiada apa yang membuat wanita ini gembira, termasuk suaminya yang kaya tetapi pasif (Tony), seorang raja dadah farmaseutikal.
back_translation: There is nothing that makes this woman happy, including her wealthy but passive husband (Tony), a pharmaceutical drug lord.

text: in the bank vault the young man discovers his name , jason bourne .
translation: Di dalam peti besi bank, lelaki muda menemui namanya, Jason Bourne.
back_translation: Inside the bank safe deposit box, the young man found his name, Jason Bourne.

text: ultimately , the film amounts to being lectured to by tech-geeks , if you 're up for that sort of thing .
translation: Pada keseluruhannya, filem ini boleh dianggap sebagai diberi ceramah oleh pakar teknologi, jika anda suka perkara sebegini.
back_translation: Overall, this film can be considered as being lectured by a technology expert, if you are into that sort of thing.

text: she 's aided by her sister sue ( zhao wei ) , who operates the pair 's world panorama surveillance system , which allows them to tap into any video security system in the world .
translation: Dia dibantu oleh adik perempuannya, Sue (Zhao Wei), yang mengendalikan sistem pengawasan panorama dunia pasangan tersebut, yang membolehkan mereka merakam mana-mana sistem keselamatan video di seluruh dunia.
back_translation: He is assisted by his younger sister, Sue (Zhao Wei), who operates the couple's world panorama surveillance system, allowing them to record any video security system worldwide.

text: just a collection of this and that -- whatever fills time -- with no unified whole .
translation: Hanya sekumpulan ini dan itu - apa sahaja yang mengisi masa - tanpa keseluruhan yang serasi.
back_translation: Just a bunch of this and that - whatever fills the time - without a cohesive whole.

text: a lot can happen when an honest , young , naive japanese man visits a foreign country for the first time .
translation: Banyak perkara boleh berlaku apabila seorang lelaki Jepun yang jujur, muda, dan naif melawat negara asing untuk kali pertamanya.
back_translation: Many things can happen when a honest, young, and naive Japanese man visits a foreign country for the first time.

text: eva dandridge is a very uptight young woman who constantly meddles in the affairs of her sisters and their husbands .
translation: Eva Dandridge adalah seorang wanita muda yang sangat tegang yang selalu campur tangan dalam urusan adik-adik perempuannya dan suami-suami mereka.
back_translation: Eva Dandridge is a very nosy young woman who always meddles in the affairs of her younger sisters and their husbands.

text: suddenly , fields realizes that he has more in common with the migrants and their search for home , family and freedom than he thought .
translation: Tiba-tiba, Fields sedar bahawa dia mempunyai lebih persamaan dengan para pendatang dan pencarian mereka untuk rumah, keluarga, dan kebebasan daripada yang dia fikirkan.
back_translation: Suddenly, Fields realizes that he has more in common with immigrants and their quests for home, family, and freedom than he thought.

text: . . . in the pile of useless actioners from mtv schmucks who do n't know how to tell a story for more than four minutes .
translation: . . . dalam timbunan filem tindakan yang tidak berguna dari orang-orang mtv yang tidak tahu bagaimana nak bercerita lebih dari empat minit.
back_translation: . . . in a pile of action movies that are useless from MTV people who don't know how to tell a story beyond four minutes.

text: lilli black , battling her painful memories and the secrets surrounding her dying father , collides into the complicated and obsessive life of morrison wiley on the streets of new york city .
translation: Lilli Black, berjuang dengan kenangan yang menyakitkan dan rahsia yang melingkungi ayahnya yang sedang sakit, bertembung dengan kehidupan yang rumit dan obsesif Morrison Wiley di jalanan bandar New York.
back_translation: Lilli Black, struggling with painful memories and the secrets surrounding her ailing father, meets the complicated and obsessive life of Morrison Wiley on the streets of New York City.

text: the subtitled costume drama is set in a remote african empire before cell phones , guns , and the internal combustion engine , but the politics that thump through it are as timely as tomorrow .
translation: Drama kostum bersarikata itu berlatarkan sebuah empayar Afrika yang terpencil sebelum telefon bimbit, senjata api, dan enjin pembakaran dalam, namun politik yang mengemutinya begitu relevan seperti esok hari.
back_translation: The subtitled costume drama is set in a remote African empire before mobile phones, firearms, and internal combustion engines, yet its politics that inundate it are as relevant as tomorrow.

text: after being trapped in hell for quite some time , freddy krueger meets up with jason voorhees after jason is sent to hell by creighton duke ( forget part x ; rewind to friday the 13th part ix ) .
translation: Selepas terperangkap di neraka untuk sesaat , Freddy Krueger bertemu dengan Jason Voorhees selepas Jason dihantar ke neraka oleh Creighton Duke (lupakan bahagian X; balik ke Jumaat ke-13 bahagian IX).
back_translation: After being momentarily trapped in hell, Freddy Krueger meets Jason Voorhees after Jason is sent to hell by Creighton Duke (forget about Part X; go back to Friday the 13th Part IX).

text: rajani plans to offer her daughter to an older man , a rich husband and protector to her daughter .
translation: Rajani merancang untuk menawarkan anak perempuannya kepada seorang lelaki tua, suami kaya, dan pelindung untuk anak perempuannya.
back_translation: Rajani plans to offer her daughter to an old man, a wealthy husband, and a protector for her daughter.

text: sunshine state is sayles at his most robert altman-ish , purposefully juggling about a dozen narrative balls in the air , and letting the mundanity and smallish drama of everyday life tell a larger story .
translation: "Sunshine State" adalah karya Sayles pada tahap paling Robert Altman-ishnya, dengan sengaja menggoyang-goyangkan kira-kira dua belas bola naratif di udara, dan membiarkan kebiasaan dan dramatis kecil kehidupan seharian menceritakan cerita yang lebih besar.
back_translation: "Sunshine State" is Sayles' most Robert Altman-ish work, intentionally juggling about twelve narrative balls in the air and allowing the habits and small dramas of everyday life to tell a larger story.

text: the story revolves around a dying father and his son , who is trying to learn more about his dad by piecing together the stories he has gathered over the years .
translation: Cerita tersebut berkisar di sekitar seorang bapa yang sedang meninggal dan anak lelakinya, yang cuba untuk belajar lebih tentang ayahnya dengan menyusun kisah-kisah yang telah dikumpulkannya selama bertahun-tahun.
back_translation: The story revolves around a father who is dying and his son, who tries to learn more about his father by compiling the stories he has collected over the years.

text: 'all in all , reign of fire will be a good ( successful ) rental . '
translation: Secara keseluruhan, 'Reign of Fire' akan menjadi satu sewaan yang baik (berjaya).
back_translation: Overall, 'Reign of Fire' would be a good rental (success).

text: an unusual family and a staff of two are preparing a party on their cosy mansion .
translation: Sebuah keluarga yang tidak biasa dan dua orang staf sedang menyediakan parti di rumah mewah mereka.
back_translation: An unusual family and two staff members are preparing a party at their luxurious home.

text: cac & # 225 ; , a vj who works for s & # 227 ; o paulo mtv , comes to rio de janeiro to make a report about a new band , whose members are poor and live in a slum called morro do alem & # 227 ; o .
translation: cac, seorang vj yang bekerja untuk MTV São Paulo, datang ke Rio de Janeiro untuk membuat laporan tentang sebuah band baru, yang anggotanya miskin dan tinggal di sebuah kawasan kumuh bernama Morro do Alemão.
back_translation: cac, a vj working for MTV São Paulo, came to Rio de Janeiro to report on a new band, whose members are poor and live in a slum area called Morro do Alemão.

text: the filmmaker ascends , literally , to the olympus of the art world , but he would have done well to end this flawed , dazzling series with the raising of something other than his own cremaster .
translation: Pengarah filem naik, secara literal, ke olimpus dunia seni, tetapi lebih baik jika beliau mengakhiri siri yang mempesona ini dengan mengangkat sesuatu selain daripada cremaster sendiri.
back_translation: The film director ascends, quite literally, to the Olympus of the art world, but it would be better if he concludes this captivating series by exploring something other than his own cremaster.

text: maybe it 's the star power of the cast or the redundant messages , but something aboul `` full frontal `` seems , well , contrived .
translation: Mungkin itu adalah daya tarikan bintang pelakon atau mesej yang berulang, tetapi sesuatu tentang "full frontal" kelihatan, eh, direka.
back_translation: Perhaps it's the allure of the actor's star power or the recurring message, but something about the "full frontal" seems, uh, designed.

text: charlotte contacts the perfect life saver to thank him , but everything is n't what it seems .
translation: Charlotte menghubungi penolong yang sempurna untuk mengucapkannya terima kasih, tetapi tidak semuanya seperti yang kelihatan.
back_translation: Charlotte contacted the perfect assistant to thank them, but not everything is as it seems.

text: impostor does n't do much with its template , despite a remarkably strong cast .
translation: Pengganas tidak banyak berbuat dengan templatnya, walaupun memiliki barisan pelakon yang sangat kuat.
back_translation: Terrorists didn't do much with their template, even though they had a very strong cast.

text: works better in the conception than it does in the execution . . . winds up seeming just a little too clever .
translation: Lebih baik berfungsi dalam konsepsi daripada dalam pelaksanaan... berakhir nampak sedikit terlalu pintar.
back_translation: It is better to operate in the realm of conception than in implementation... ending up looking a bit too clever.

text: based on euripides ' immortal drama of the same name , the bacchae ( bahk-ai ' ) is an intense and contemporary retelling of the classic myth in which dionysus , son of zeus , seeks vengeance on thebes , the city of his birth and site of his mortal mother semele 's cruel and horrible death .
translation: Berdasarkan drama abadi yang sama oleh Euripides, The Bacchae (Bahk-ai) ialah sebuah kisah ulang yang intens dan kontemporari mengenai mitos klasik di mana Dionysus, anak Zeus, mencari balas dendam ke atas Thebes, bandar kelahirannya dan tempat kematian ibu jasmaninya, Semele yang kejam dan mengerikan.
back_translation: Based on the same timeless drama by Euripides, The Bacchae is a contemporary and intense retelling of a classic myth in which Dionysus, the son of Zeus, seeks revenge on Thebes, his birthplace and the site of the brutal and gruesome death of his mortal mother, Semele.

text: blade then tenuously enters into an alliance with the bloodpack , an elite team of vampires trained in all modes of combat to defeat the reaper threat .
translation: Blade kemudian merapatkan hubungan dengan bloodpack, sebuah pasukan elit vampir yang dilatih dalam semua mode pertempuran untuk menumpaskan ancaman reaper.
back_translation: Blade then established a connection with the bloodpack, an elite vampire squad trained in all modes of combat to eliminate the threat of reapers.

text: as they encounter ranger megan it turns out that werewolves are active in the region .
translation: Apabila mereka bertemu dengan ranger Megan, ternyata serigala manusia aktif di kawasan tersebut.
back_translation: When they met ranger Megan, it turned out that the werewolves were active in the area.

text: it is bad , but certainly not without merit as entertainment .
translation: Ia tidak baik, tetapi pasti ada nilai hiburannya.
back_translation: It is not good, but it definitely has its entertainment value.

text: but he meets cac & # 225 ; 's brother , nando , who tries to convince him to take part in a scam .
translation: Tetapi dia bertemu dengan abang Cac, Nando, yang cuba meyakinkannya untuk terlibat dalam penipuan.
back_translation: But he met his brother Cac, Nando, who tried to convince him to get involved in a fraud.

text: documentary about robert mcnamara , secretary of defense in the kennedy and johnson administrations , who subsequently became president of the world bank .
translation: filem dokumentari mengenai robert mcnamara, setiausaha pertahanan dalam pentadbiran kennedy dan johnson, yang kemudiannya menjadi presiden bank dunia.
back_translation: A documentary film about Robert McNamara, the Secretary of Defense in the Kennedy and Johnson administrations, who later became the President of the World Bank.

text: `` pink-loving , blonde-haired harvard law school graduate elle woods ( witherspoon ) returns in this sequel , as she turns her legal and fashion-savvy know-how towards getting a bill passed through congress , relocating a second time , after adapting her beverly hills ways to harvard , and now . . .
translation: "Peminat warna pink, graduan sekolah undang-undang Harvard berambut pirang Elle Woods (Witherspoon) kembali dalam sekuel ini, di mana dia menggunakan pengetahuan undang-undang dan fesyen serta kepandaiannya untuk mendapatkan sebuah undang-undang diluluskan melalui kongres, berpindah kediaman untuk kedua kalinya, selepas menyesuaikan dirinya dari gaya hidup Beverly Hills ke Harvard, dan kini..."
back_translation: "Pink lover, Harvard Law School graduate with blonde hair Elle Woods (Witherspoon) is back in this sequel, where she uses her legal and fashion knowledge as well as her cleverness to get a law passed through Congress, moves residences for the second time, after adapting from a Beverly Hills lifestyle to Harvard, and now..."

text: to what sweet end is the story of a reunion between mary and david , who were once passionate lovers - for two weeks , thirty-five years ago and have n't seen each other since .

text: he 's not happy just to run this fratricidal con , he also wants to cash in as much as he can of one hundred kilos of crystal meth that he stole from the rojas ( and the mexicans ) , seduce the girlfriend of one of his victims , and stay ahead of a cop who was a childhood friend .
translation: Dia tidak puas hanya menjalankan penipuan fratricidal ini, malah dia juga mahu mendapat wang sebanyak mungkin dari seratus kilogram meth kristal yang dicurinya dari keluarga Rojas (dan orang Mexico), merayu kekasih salah seorang mangsanya, dan terus berada di hadapan seorang anggota polis yang dulunya kawannya semasa kanak-kanak.
back_translation: He is not satisfied with just carrying out this fratricidal deception, but he also wants to get as much money as possible from the stolen hundred kilograms of crystal meth from the Rojas family (and Mexican people), seducing the lover of one of his victims, and appearing in front of a police officer who was once his childhood friend.

text: one by one , his friends are deserting his annual pilgrimage to the wisconsin state high school hockey tournament , forcing him to confront some harsh truths about his bizarre obsession .

back_translation: One after another, his friends skipped their yearly visit to the Wisconsin state high school hockey championship, forcing him to confront some bitter truths about the strangeness of his obsession.

text: using two separate filmmaking teams ( an all-white crew filming white residents and an all-black camera crew filming black residents ) , two towns of jasper captures very different racial views by townsfolk in jasper , texas , the location for a racially motivated murder of an african american in 1998 .
translation: Menggunakan dua pasukan pembikinan filem yang berasingan (pasukan yang terdiri daripada anggota kulit putih yang mengambil gambar penduduk kulit putih dan pasukan kamera berkulit hitam yang mengambil gambar penduduk kulit hitam), dua bandar di Jasper merekod pandangan perkauman yang sangat berbeza oleh penduduk bandar di Jasper, Texas, tempat berlakunya pembunuhan yang bermotif perkauman terhadap seorang Afro-Amerika pada tahun 1998.
back_translation: Using two separate filmmaking teams (a team of white members filming white residents and a team of black camera crew filming black residents), two cities in Jasper recorded highly contrasting racial perspectives by the urban population of Jasper, Texas, where a racially motivated murder of an African-American occurred in 1998.

text: a whimsical if predictable time-travel fable marred by a willful single-mindedness .
