back_translation: This story is becoming increasingly unavoidable following cliches about tortured (and torturing) artists and consuming but impossible love until you can't help but feel more disappointed every time every exaggerated reference is made wearily.

text: rudy yellowshirt is an investigator with the police department and witnesses firsthand the painful legacy of indian existence .
translation: Rudy Yellowshirt adalah seorang penyiasat dengan jabatan polis dan menyaksikan sendiri warisan menyakitkan keberadaan India.
back_translation: Rudy Yellowshirt is an investigator with the police department and personally witnesses the painful legacy of the Indian presence.

text: the waterlogged script plumbs uncharted depths of stupidity , incoherence and sub-sophomoric sexual banter .
translation: Naskah yang celup air tersebut menyelami kedalaman kebodohan yang belum dijelajahi, ketidakkonsistenan, dan percakapan seksual sub-sophomoric.
back_translation: The water-soaked manuscript delves into unexplored depths of ignorance, inconsistency, and sub-sophomoric sexual conversations.

text: anton jackson is an african-american man who seems harmless enough on the surface , but is a secret agent in the all-black brotherhood , an entity that levels the playing field against the all-white establishment .
translation: Anton Jackson adalah seorang lelaki Afrika-Amerika yang kelihatan tidak berbahaya pada permukaannya, tetapi dia adalah seorang ejen rahsia dalam Persaudaraan Hitam, entiti yang menyeimbangkan medan permainan menentang penguasaan orang kulit putih.
back_translation: Anton Jackson is an African-American man who appears harmless on the surface, but he is a secret agent in the Black Brotherhood, an entity that balances the playing field against white domination.

text: piccoli 's performance is amazing , yes , but the symbols of loss and denial and life-at-arm's-length in the film seem irritatingly transparent .
translation: Prestasi piccoli sangat menakjubkan, ya, tetapi simbol-simbol kehilangan, penafian, serta hidup dalam jarak dirasakan dalam filem itu terlalu mudah difahami.
back_translation: The remarkable achievements of Piccoli, yes, but the symbols of loss, denial, and living in perceived distance in the film are too easily understood.

text: a love triangle forms , with rachael , the least interested and keen to leave , but clues to her mothers whereabouts appear , as do her own problems which both rafe and matt wish to help with .
translation: Segitiga cinta terbentuk, dengan Rachael, yang kurang berminat dan ingin pergi, tetapi petunjuk mengenai di mana ibunya berada muncul, begitu juga dengan masalahnya sendiri yang ingin diselesaikan oleh baik Rafe dan Matt.
back_translation: A love triangle forms, with Rachael, who is not very interested and wants to leave, but clues about where her mother is emerge, as well as her own issues that both Rafe and Matt want to resolve.

text: hollywood ending is not show-stoppingly hilarious , but scathingly witty nonetheless .
translation: "Penutup Hollywood bukanlah sesuatu yang amat lucu, tetapi tetap tajam dan cerdik."
back_translation: "The Hollywood closure is not something that is very funny, but it is still sharp and witty."

text: ploddy and his policeman rikhard set out to find the thieves - but it turns out to be both difficult and challenging !
translation: Ploddy dan polisinya Rikhard bertolak untuk mencari pencuri - tetapi ternyata sangat sukar dan mencabar!
back_translation: Ploddy and his police officer Rikhard set off to search for the thief - but it turned out to be very difficult and challenging!

text: but too late or otherwise , love at first sight is exactly what happens .
translation: Tetapi terlambat atau sebaliknya, cinta pada pandangan pertama adalah tepat apa yang berlaku.
back_translation: However, whether late or otherwise, love at first sight is precisely what happens.

text: the plan goes awry when trasha and her psychosis find themselves a paying gig and tables are turned , trashed and burned .
translation: Rancangan ini menjadi kacau apabila Trasha dan psikosisnya mendapat pekerjaan berbayar dan situasinya berubah, tercemar dan terbakar.
back_translation: This plan turned chaotic when Trasha and her psychosis got a paying job and the situation turned polluted and inflamed.

text: for every inspired bit of absurdity , there 's a lame piece of improvisational noodling .
translation: Bagi setiap idea absurd yang memberi inspirasi, ada juga cubaan improvisasi yang hambar.
back_translation: For every absurd idea that inspires, there is also a bland attempt at improvisation.

text: asia authors herself as anna battista , an italian superstar and aspiring directress who just happens to be her own worst enemy .
translation: Asia menggambarkan dirinya sebagai Anna Battista, seorang bintang Italia yang berpengaruh dan berambisi menjadi pengarah, yang kebetulan juga menjadi musuh terbesarnya sendiri.
back_translation: Asia portrays herself as Anna Battista, an influential Italian star who is ambitious to become a director, and coincidentally, also happens to be her own greatest enemy.

text: half of it is composed of snappy patter and pseudo-sophisticated cultural observations , while the remainder . . . would be more at home on a daytime television serial .
translation: Separuh daripadanya terdiri daripada pertuturan yang pantas dan pemerhatian budaya palsu yang bersifat canggih, manakala bahagian yang lain lebih sesuai untuk program televisyen siang hari.
back_translation: Half of it consists of quick talk and sophisticated false cultural observations, while the other part is more suited for daytime television programs.

text: some movies were made for the big screen , some for the small screen , and some , like ballistic : ecks vs . sever , were made for the palm screen .
translation: Beberapa filem dibuat untuk skrin besar, beberapa untuk skrin kecil, dan beberapa, seperti ballistic: ecks vs. sever, dibuat untuk skrin tapak.
back_translation: Some films are made for the big screen, some for the small screen, and some, like ballistic: ecks vs. sever, are made for the foot screen.

text: berling and bM-iart . . . continue to impress , and isabelle huppert . . . again shows uncanny skill in getting under the skin of her characters .
translation: Berling dan Binoche terus memberikan kesan yang hebat, dan Isabelle Huppert sekali lagi menunjukkan kecekapan yang luar biasa dalam menghayati watak-wataknya.
back_translation: Berling and Binoche continue to make a great impact, and Isabelle Huppert once again demonstrates exceptional skill in embodying her characters.

text: without family and all on her own , she only can confide her troubles to simon ( ray walston ) .
translation: Tanpa keluarga dan sendirian, dia hanya dapat berkongsi masalahnya dengan Simon (Ray Walston).
back_translation: Without family and alone, she can only confide in her problems with Simon (Ray Walston).

text: its inescapable absurdities are tantamount to insulting the intelligence of anyone who has n't been living under a rock ( since sept . 11 ) .
translation: Absurditi yang tidak dapat dielakkan itu sama dengan menghina kecerdasan sesiapa yang tidak tinggal di bawah batu (sejak 11 September).
back_translation: The unavoidable absurdity is equivalent to insulting the intelligence of anyone who has not been living under a rock (since September 11).

text: this breezy caper movie becomes a soulful , incisive meditation on the way we were , and the way we are .
translation: Filem caper yang segar ini menjadi sebuah meditasi yang mendalam, tajam tentang bagaimana kita dulu, dan bagaimana kita sekarang.
back_translation: This fresh caper film has become a profound, sharp meditation on who we were, and who we are now.

text: somewhat blurred , but kinnear 's performance is razor sharp .
translation: Agak kabur, tetapi lakonan Kinnear sangat tajam.
back_translation: Somewhat blurry, but Kinnear's performance is very sharp.

text: the journey takes them from the inner city to a satanic black mass ceremony , and into the depths of their own souls , as they search for johann christoph haizmann , the antichrist .
translation: Perjalanan membawa mereka dari bandar raya ke upacara hitam setanik, dan ke dalam kedalaman jiwa mereka sendiri, ketika mereka mencari Johann Christoph Haizmann, Dajjal.
back_translation: The journey took them from the city to the satanic black ritual, and into the depths of their own souls, as they searched for Johann Christoph Haizmann, the Antichrist.

text: this seventh feature by chicago director covert uses the freedom of access afforded by the digital camera to emphasize the visceral quality of the story .
translation: Filem ketujuh arahan pengarah dari Chicago ini, Covert, menggunakan kebebasan akses yang diberikan oleh kamera digital untuk menekankan kualiti perasaan cerita.
back_translation: The seventh film directed by this Chicagoan, Covert, uses the freedom of access provided by digital cameras to emphasize the quality of the story's emotions.

text: 'dragonfly ' dwells on crossing-over mumbo jumbo , manipulative sentimentality , and sappy dialogue .
translation: 'Dragonfly' berkisar pada hal-hal yang rumit, sentimentalisme manipulatif, dan dialog yang lemah.
back_translation: 'Dragonfly' revolves around complicated matters, manipulative sentimentalism, and weak dialogues.

text: his loving wife maya vows to help get him out of jail .
translation: Isteri yang penyayangnya, Maya berjanji untuk membantu mengeluarkannya dari penjara.
back_translation: His loving wife, Maya, promised to help him get out of jail.

text: fedot the shooter is sent by the czar to find some special food for the foreighn ambassador 's visit .
translation: Fedot penembak telah dihantar oleh czar untuk mencari makanan istimewa bagi lawatan duta asing.
back_translation: The shooter Fedot has been sent by the czar to search for special food for the foreign diplomats' visit.

text: after a failed marriage to ali macgraw , a cocaine bust and rumored involvement with the cotton club murder , he disappeared into near-obscurity .
translation: Selepas perceraian yang gagal dengan Ali MacGraw, penahanan dadah kokain, dan desas-desus kaitan dengan pembunuhan Cotton Club, dia menghilang ke dalam kepucatan hampir penuh.
back_translation: After a failed divorce with Ali MacGraw, a cocaine drug arrest, and rumors of involvement in the Cotton Club murder, he disappeared into near-complete obscurity.

text: the scientist is sentenced to jail by the grand council of the galactic federation .
translation: Ahli sains itu dihukum penjara oleh majlis besar persekutuan galaksi.
back_translation: The scientist was sentenced to prison by the grand council of the galactic federation.

text: when the head of the order dies , alex is sent to rome to investigate mysterious circumstances surrounding the death .
translation: Apabila ketua persaudaraan meninggal, Alex dihantar ke Rom untuk menyiasat keadaan misteri yang melibatkan kematian tersebut.
back_translation: When the fraternity leader died, Alex was sent to Rome to investigate the mysterious circumstances surrounding the death.

text: it 's an exhilarating place to visit , this laboratory of laughter .
translation: Ini adalah tempat yang membangkitkan semangat untuk dilawati, makmal ketawa ini.
back_translation: This is a place that inspires spirits to be visited, this laughter laboratory.

text: mo is beautiful but bald , mei has excessive body hair ( that somehow resulted from a sexual assault ) , hung has a large red birthmark on her face , and pao has abnormally small eyes .
translation: Mo cantik tetapi botak, Mei memiliki bulu badan yang berlebihan (yang muncul akibat serangan seksual), Hung mempunyai tanda lahir besar warna merah di mukanya, dan Pao mempunyai mata yang tidak normal kecil.
back_translation: Mo is pretty but bald, Mei has excessive body hair (due to sexual assault), Hung has a large red birthmark on his face, and Pao has abnormally small eyes.

text: though frida is easier to swallow than julie taymor 's preposterous titus , the eye candy here lacks considerable brio .
translation: Walaupun Frida lebih mudah diterima daripada Titus yang keterlaluan oleh Julie Taymor, kandungan mata yang cantik di sini kurang brio yang ketara.
back_translation: Although Frida is more readily accepted than the overdone Titus by Julie Taymor, the beautiful visuals here lack the evident vivacity.

text: when a shoulder injury ended his minor league pitching career twelve years ago , jim morris resorted to the next best thing : coaching .
translation: Apabila kecederaan bahu mengakhiri kerjaya melontar di liga minornya dua belas tahun yang lalu, Jim Morris beralih kepada perkara yang terbaik seterusnya: melatih.
back_translation: When a shoulder injury ended his minor league pitching career twelve years ago, Jim Morris turned to the next best thing: coaching.

text: in the meantime , a grifter breaks into their apartments and rummages their personal belongings , thus unfolding hidden secrets .
translation: Pada masa yang sama, seorang penipu merampas masuk ke dalam apartmen mereka dan merumuskan harta benda peribadi mereka, dengan itu mendedahkan rahsia tersembunyi.
back_translation: At the same time, a scammer broke into their apartment and rummaged through their personal belongings, thereby uncovering hidden secrets.

text: zhuangzhuang creates delicate balance of style , text , and subtext that 's so simple and precise that anything discordant would topple the balance , but against all odds , nothing does .
translation: Zhuangzhuang mencipta keseimbangan halus antara gaya, teks, dan subteteks yang begitu mudah dan tepat sehingga apa pun yang tidak selaras akan meruntuhkan keseimbangan, tetapi dengan segala rintangan, tidak ada yang berlaku.
back_translation: Zhuangzhuang creates a subtle balance between style, text, and subtext that is so effortless and precise that anything out of sync would disrupt the balance, yet with all obstacles, nothing happens.

text: still rapturous after all these years , cinema paradiso stands as one of the great films about movie love .
translation: Masih mempesonakan setelah semua tahun ini, Cinema Paradiso dianggap sebagai salah satu filem hebat mengenai cinta terhadap filem.
back_translation: Still fascinating after all these years, Cinema Paradiso is considered one of the great films about the love of cinema.

text: it 's been 10 years since the events of the second film .
translation: Sudah 10 tahun sejak peristiwa filem kedua.
back_translation: It has been 10 years since the events of the second movie.

text: shyamalan offers copious hints along the way -- myriad signs , if you will -- that beneath the familiar , funny surface is a far bigger , far more meaningful story than one in which little green men come to earth for harvesting purposes .
translation: Shyamalan menawarkan petunjuk yang banyak sepanjang jalan - pelbagai tanda, jika anda mahu - bahawa di bawah permukaan yang akrab dan lucu adalah sebuah cerita yang jauh lebih besar, jauh lebih bermakna daripada cerita di mana makhluk hijau kecil datang ke bumi untuk tujuan penuaian.
back_translation: Shyamalan offers many clues along the way - various signs, if you will - that beneath the familiar and funny surface lies a story far greater, far more meaningful than the story of little green creatures coming to earth for harvesting purposes.

text: in the 1870s , jacobina , daughter of german immigrants to southern brazil , starts to break with both the catholic and lutheran churches to preach body healing through soul cleansing .
translation: Pada tahun 1870-an, Jacobina, anak kepada imigran Jerman di selatan Brazil, mula menyimpang daripada Gereja Katolik dan Lutheran untuk menyebarkan ajaran penyembuhan tubuh melalui penyucian jiwa.
back_translation: In the 1870s, Jacobina, the child of German immigrants in southern Brazil, began to deviate from the Catholic and Lutheran Churches to spread teachings of physical healing through soul purification.

text: i found the ring moderately absorbing , largely for its elegantly colorful look and sound .
translation: Saya mendapati cincin itu agak menarik, terutamanya kerana coraknya yang elegan dan warnanya yang berwarna-warni.
back_translation: I found the ring quite appealing, especially because of its elegant pattern and colourful hues.

text: her family doctor is baffled ; his examination reveals her story to be true !
translation: Doktor keluarganya terperanjat; pemeriksaannya mengesahkan ceritanya adalah benar!
back_translation: The doctor and his family were startled; his examination confirmed that his story was true!

text: a beautiful , entertaining two hours . you get the idea , though , that kapur intended the film to be more than that .
translation: dua jam yang cantik dan menghibur. Anda mendapat gambaran, walaupun, bahawa Kapur bermaksud agar filem itu menjadi lebih daripada itu.
back_translation: two beautiful and entertaining hours. However, you get the impression that Kapur means for the film to be more than that.

text: soon , against his own expectations and the scorn of his friends , landon finds himself falling in love with this outwardly plain girl who possesses a passion for life he never imagined possible .
translation: Segera, bertentangan dengan jangkaan sendiri dan ejekan daripada rakan-rakan, Landon mendapati dirinya jatuh cinta dengan gadis biasa ini yang memiliki semangat hidup yang tidak pernah dibayangkan sebelum ini.
back_translation: Contrary to his own expectations and mockery from his friends, Landon found himself falling in love with this ordinary girl who possessed a zest for life that he had never imagined before.

text: the making of the dragon emphasizes and exaggerates all the overly dramatic moments , simplistic storylines and farcical elements that make up the films of the kung-fu genre .
translation: Pembikinan naga menekankan dan membesar-besarkan semua saat dramatik berlebihan, jalan cerita yang mudah dan unsur-unsur farcical yang membentuk filem-filem genre kung-fu.
back_translation: The portrayal of dragons emphasizes and exaggerates all overly dramatic moments, simple plotlines, and farcical elements that shape kung-fu genre films.

text: johann christoph haizmann , who lived in the 1650s , was a painter and a deeply disturbed individual .
translation: Johann Christoph Haizmann, yang tinggal pada tahun 1650-an, adalah seorang pelukis dan individu yang sangat terganggu.
back_translation: Johann Christoph Haizmann, who lived in the 1650s, was a painter and an extremely disturbed individual.

text: it 's slow -- very , very slow . it 's not the ultimate depression-era gangster movie . that 's pure pr hype .
translation: Ia perlahan -- sangat, sangat perlahan. Ini bukan filem gangster era kemerosotan yang utama. Itu hanya gertakan pemasaran awam.
back_translation: It's slow - very, very slow. It's not the main decline-era gangster film. It's just public marketing gimmicks.

text: a modest and acerbically clever escapade that relies more on wit than excitement .
translation: suatu liku-liku yang sederhana dan tajam yang bergantung lebih kepada kecerdasan daripada keseronokan.
back_translation: A simple and sharp twist that relies more on intelligence than enjoyment.

text: depressingly thin and exhaustingly contrived . only masochistic moviegoers need apply .
translation: Sangat kurus dengan penuh usaha yang dipaksakan. Hanya penonton filem masokis yang perlu meliputi.
back_translation: Very thin with forced efforts. Only masochistic movie watchers need to get involved.

text: it 's a weepy , nail-biting story line that 's all too familiar , although abbass portrays her character with strong conviction and carries the film gracefully .
translation: Ini adalah sebuah cerita yang menyayat hati dan menggigit kukunya yang terlalu dikenali, walaupun Abbass menggambarkan wataknya dengan keyakinan yang kuat dan membawa filem tersebut dengan anggun.
back_translation: This is a heart-wrenching story and gripping to the core, even though Abbass portrayed his character with strong conviction and carried the movie gracefully.

text: a magnificent throwback to an almost vanished era of epic filmmaking by great filmmakers in thrall to their own passions , rather than to the studio bookkeepers .
translation: suatu pandangan yang megah kepada satu era hampir pupus pembikinan filem epik oleh pengarah-pengarah hebat yang terikat kepada keghairahan sendiri, daripada kepada pembukuan studio.
back_translation: a grand spectacle of an almost extinct era of epic filmmaking by great directors bound by their own passion, rather than to studio bookkeeping.

text: a strong first act and absolutely , inescapably gorgeous , skyscraper-trapeze motion of the amazing spider-man .
translation: sebuah babak pertama yang hebat dan benar-benar, tanpa keraguan yang indah, gerakan trapeze pencakar langit yang mengagumkan dari spider-man yang menakjubkan.
back_translation: A great and truly beautiful first act, no doubt, with amazing sky-scraper climbing trapeze moves by the astonishing Spider-Man.

text: together , they must battle a band of the world 's most treacherous pirates , led by the cursed captain barbossa , in order to save elizabeth , the love of will 's life , as well as recover the lost treasure that jack seeks .
translation: Mereka harus bersama-sama melawan kumpulan lanun paling curang di dunia, yang dipimpin oleh kapten barbossa yang terkutuk, untuk menyelamatkan elizabeth, cinta hidup will, serta mendapatkan kembali harta karun yang dicari jack.
back_translation: They must band together to fight the most deceitful group of pirates in the world, led by the cursed Captain Barbossa, to save Elizabeth, the love of Will's life, and to reclaim the treasure sought by Jack.

text: this unlikely pairing proves the rule that in love , there are no rules and the couple meet and fall deeply in love at first sight .
translation: Gabungan yang tidak mungkin ini membuktikan bahawa dalam percintaan, tidak ada peraturan dan pasangan itu bertemu dan jatuh cinta pada pandangan pertama.
back_translation: This unlikely combination proves that in love, there are no rules and the couple meets and falls in love at first sight.

text: separated from his wife , louis will be given the opportunity to find out what is most important . . .
translation: Terpisah dari isterinya, Louis akan diberi peluang untuk mengetahui apa yang paling penting.
back_translation: Separated from his wife, Louis will be given the opportunity to find out what is most important.

text: toledo awaits on the street for the exit of ana 's lover ( gustavo garz & # 243 ; n ) and begins a one-of-a-kind persecution-investigation that will last the whole night , to find out , before confronting him , who is that man and where did he meet ana .
translation: Toledo menanti di jalan untuk keluaran kekasih Ana (Gustavo Garzón) dan memulakan penyiasatan pengejaran yang unik yang akan berlangsung sepanjang malam, untuk mencari tahu, sebelum berhadapan dengannya, siapakah lelaki itu dan di mana dia bertemu dengan Ana.
back_translation: Toledo waits on the street for the release of Ana's lover (Gustavo Garzón) and begins a unique chase investigation that will last throughout the night, to find out, before confronting him, who that man is and where he met Ana.

text: most of the information has already appeared in one forum or another and , no matter how broomfield dresses it up , it tends to speculation , conspiracy theories or , at best , circumstantial evidence .
translation: Kebanyakan maklumat telah muncul dalam satu forum atau yang lain, dan, tidak kira bagaimana Broomfield menyampaikannya, ia cenderung kepada spekulasi, teori konspirasi, atau, pada tahap terbaik, bukti keadaan.
back_translation: Most information has emerged in one forum or another, and, no matter how Broomfield conveys it, it tends towards speculation, conspiracy theories, or, at best, circumstantial evidence.

text: life on the rez is no picnic : this picture shows you why .
translation: Hidup di rez bukanlah sesuatu yang menyenangkan: gambar ini akan memperlihatkan kepada anda sebabnya.
back_translation: Living in a dorm is not a pleasant experience: this picture will show you why.

text: in the cutthroat world of children 's television , rainbow randolph , the corrupt , costumed star of a popular children 's tv show , is fired over a bribery scandal and replaced by squeaky-clean smoochy , a puffy fuscia rhinoceros .
translation: Dalam dunia persaingan yang kejam dalam televisyen kanak-kanak, Rainbow Randolph, bintang berpakaian yang korup dari rancangan tv kanak-kanak yang popular, dipecat atas skandal suapan dan digantikan oleh Smoochy yang bersih berseri, seekor badak fusia yang bulat.
back_translation: In the cutthroat world of children's television competition, Rainbow Randolph, a corrupt and flashy star of a popular children's TV show, is fired over a bribery scandal and replaced by Smoochy, a clean and bright purple rhinoceros.

text: initially reluctant to help , daniel 's conscience eventually gets the better of him .
translation: Pada mulanya enggan untuk membantu, tetapi akhirnya suara hati nurani Daniel menang atas dirinya.
back_translation: At first, he was reluctant to help, but in the end, Daniel's conscience prevailed.

text: she further finds out her sister was working as a dominatrix at an unusual underground adult establishment in detroit called the playground .
translation: Dia kemudian mendapati bahawa adiknya bekerja sebagai seorang dominatrix di sebuah tempat perlakuan dewasa di bawah tanah yang tidak biasa di Detroit yang dipanggil The Playground.
back_translation: He later found out that his sister was working as a dominatrix at an unusual underground adult club in Detroit called The Playground.

text: calvin now has unbelievable basketball powers and has the chance to play for the nba .
translation: Calvin kini mempunyai keupayaan bola keranjang yang luar biasa dan berpeluang untuk bermain untuk NBA.
back_translation: Calvin now possesses exceptional basketball skills and has the opportunity to play for the NBA.

text: petra and karl must work together in order to thwart petrov , a cold-blooded gangster , who will kill anyone who gets in his way .
translation: Petra dan Karl harus bekerjasama untuk menghalang Petrov, seorang gangster kejam, yang akan membunuh sesiapa sahaja yang menghalangnya.
back_translation: Petra and Karl must work together to stop Petrov, a ruthless gangster, who will kill anyone who stands in his way.

text: with grit and determination molly guides the girls on an epic journey , one step ahead of the authorities , over 1 , 500 miles of australia 's outback in search of the rabbit-proof fence that bisects the continent and will lead them home .
translation: Dengan tekad dan keazaman, Molly memandu gadis-gadis itu dalam sebuah perjalanan epik, selangkah di hadapan pihak berkuasa, lebih dari 1,500 batu jauhnya di pedalaman Australia dalam usaha mencari pagar kelinci yang membelah benua itu dan akan membawa mereka pulang.
back_translation: With determination and perseverance, Molly led the girls on an epic journey, steps ahead of the authorities, over 1,500 miles deep into the Australian outback in their quest to find the rabbit-proof fence that cuts across the continent and will take them home.

text: a series of escapades demonstrating the adage that what is good for the goose is also good for the gander , some of which occasionally amuses but none of which amounts to much of a story .
translation: siri pengembaraan yang menunjukkan pepatah bahawa apa yang baik untuk itik juga baik untuk gander, di mana sesetengah daripadanya kadang-kadang menghiburkan tetapi tiada yang membentuk sebuah cerita yang bermakna.
back_translation: journey series that illustrates the saying that what is good for the goose is good for the gander, where some of them are sometimes entertaining but none forms a meaningful story.

text: five hours ago the `` t virus `` was `` accidentally `` released .
translation: Lima jam yang lepas, "virus t" telah "secara tidak sengaja" dilepaskan.
back_translation: Five hours ago, the "T virus" was "accidentally" released.

text: the french are rather good at this kind of thing , unlike the americans , who have a passion for musketeers , only to spoof them .
translation: Orang Perancis agak mahir dalam jenis perkara ini, berbeza dengan orang Amerika, yang mempunyai kegemaran terhadap musketeers, hanya untuk meniru mereka.
back_translation: The French are quite skilled in these things, unlike Americans who have a fondness for musketeers, merely imitating them.

text: her scholarship and her dreams are on the line and jenny takes an emotional roller coaster ride on the path to work it out .
translation: Biasiswa dan impian Jenny terancam dan dia mengalami riak emosi dalam usahanya menyelesaikan masalah ini.
back_translation: Jenny's scholarship and dreams are threatened, causing her to experience emotional turmoil in her efforts to solve this problem.

text: nicolas cage is n't the first actor to lead a group of talented friends astray , and this movie wo n't create a ruffle in what is already an erratic career .
translation: Nicolas Cage bukanlah pelakon pertama yang membawa kumpulan rakan berbakat ke jalan yang sesat, dan filem ini tidak akan menimbulkan kegemparan dalam apa yang sudah merupakan kerjaya yang tidak menentu.
back_translation: Nicolas Cage is not the first actor to lead a group of talented friends down the wrong path, and this movie will not cause a sensation in what is already an unstable career.

text: you 'll be left with the sensation of having just witnessed a great performance and , perhaps , give in to the urge to get on your feet and shake it .

text: day in , day out , the same routine is repeated .

text: [ diaz ] can blunder into the crudest situations with such sweet innocence as to inspire giggles rather than groans .

text: any film that does n't even in passing mention political prisoners , poverty and the boat loads of people who try to escape the country is less a documentary and more propaganda by way of a valentine sealed with a kiss .

text: less a study in madness or love than a study in schoolgirl obsession .

text: others , more attuned to the anarchist maxim that 'the urge to destroy is also a creative urge ' , or more willing to see with their own eyes , will find morrison 's iconoclastic uses of technology to be liberating .
translation: Orang lain, yang lebih selaras dengan maksim anarkis yang mengatakan 'keinginan untuk menghancurkan juga merupakan keinginan yang kreatif', atau lebih bersedia melihat dengan mata kepala sendiri, akan mendapati penggunaan teknologi yang ikonoklastik oleh Morrison sebagai pembebasan.

text: as patients mysteriously disappear , and the body count mounts , even the exterminators , ratmaster general `` hans `` ( john paul young ) and his assistant , `` jim `` ( adam redmond ) are no contest for the awesome force of this hybrid rodent strain .
translation: Sementara pesakit-pesakit hilang secara misteri, dan jumlah mayat bertambah, malah tukang membunuh tikus, ratumaster agung "Hans" (John Paul Young) dan pembantunya, "Jim" (Adam Redmond), tidak mampu mengatasi daya luar yang menakjubkan dari strain rodensia gabungan ini.

text: like lisa gossels ' children of chabannes ( 2000 ) , which tells another little-known story about french villagers who saved 400 jewish children , shanghai ghetto is a celebration of humanity .
translation: Sama seperti filem Lisa Gossels 'Children of Chabannes (2000)', yang menceritakan kisah yang kurang dikenali tentang penduduk desa Perancis yang menyelamatkan 400 kanak-kanak Yahudi, Shanghai Ghetto adalah satu perayaan tentang kemanusiaan.
back_translation: Just like Lisa Gossels' film 'Children of Chabannes (2000)', which tells the lesser-known story of French villagers saving 400 Jewish children, Shanghai Ghetto is a celebration of humanity.

text: bella is the picture of health with boundless energy until a few days before she dies . this is absolutely and completely ridiculous and an insult to every family whose mother has suffered through the horrible pains of a death by cancer .
translation: Bella adalah gambaran kesihatan yang baik dengan tenaga yang tidak terbatas sehingga beberapa hari sebelum dia meninggal. Ini benar-benar tidak masuk akal dan satu penghinaan kepada setiap keluarga yang ibunya telah mengalami penderitaan yang mengerikan akibat kematian oleh kanser.
back_translation: Bella was a picture of good health with unlimited energy until a few days before she passed away. This is truly unbelievable and an insult to every family whose mother has suffered terrible pain due to death from cancer.

text: it 's about as convincing as any other arnie musclefest , but has a little too much resonance with real world events and ultimately comes off as insultingly simplistic .
translation: Itu hampir sama meyakinkan dengan filem-filem Arnie yang lain, tetapi mempunyai terlalu banyak resonans dengan peristiwa dunia nyata dan pada akhirnya terlalu mudah dipahami sebagai sesuatu yang menghina secara terlalu mudah.

text: the script covers huge , heavy topics in a bland , surfacey way that does n't offer any insight into why , for instance , good things happen to bad people .

text: chance is a black comedy about how hard it is to find `` the one `` .
translation: "Chance" adalah sebuah komedi hitam mengenai seberapa sukar untuk mencari "yang satu".

text: cancelling a trip to disney world with his son , he decides to bring the boy along .

text: for devotees of french cinema , safe conduct is so rich with period minutiae it 's like dying and going to celluloid heaven .
translation: Bagi peminat filem Perancis, 'safe conduct' begitu kaya dengan butiran tempoh sehingga ia seolah-olah seperti mati dan pergi ke syurga seluloid.
back_translation: For French film enthusiasts, 'safe conduct' is so rich in detail that it seems as if it has died and gone to celluloid heaven.

text: set in the summer of 1942 during wwii , the film traces the trajectory of simple people thrown into extraordinary lives , revealing the heart-warming flame of hope and humanity that endures , even in times of war and dispair .
translation: Ditetapkan pada musim panas tahun 1942 semasa Perang Dunia II, filem ini menjejak laluan orang-orang biasa yang terjerumus ke dalam kehidupan luar biasa, mendedahkan nyala harapan dan kemanusiaan yang menghangatkan hati yang masih kekal, walaupun dalam zaman perang dan putus asa.
back_translation: Set in the summer of 1942 during World War II, this film traces the paths of ordinary people who fall into extraordinary lives, revealing the flicker of hope and humanity that warms the still-preserved heart, despite the time of war and despair.

text: one afternoon they discover the corpse of a young woman floating in the water .
translation: Pada satu petang, mereka menemui mayat seorang wanita muda mengapung di air.

text: it uses an old-time formula , it 's not terribly original and it 's rather messy -- but you just have to love the big , dumb , happy movie my big fat greek wedding .
translation: Ia menggunakan formula lama, tidak begitu original dan agak berantakan - tetapi anda hanya perlu menyukai filem besar yang bodoh dan bahagia, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.
back_translation: It uses an old formula, not very original and rather messy - but you just need to like silly and happy big films like My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

text: a dutch girl is getting sick of always losing her boyfriends , so when she loses her newest `` gain `` she decides to follow max ( her friend ) to new york where he 's starting a carreer as an actor .
translation: Seorang gadis Belanda mulai bosan kerana sentiasa kehilangan kekasihnya, jadi apabila dia kehilangan "perolehan" terbarunya, dia memutuskan untuk mengikuti Max (rakan lelakinya) ke New York di mana dia akan memulakan kerjaya sebagai pelakon.
back_translation: A Dutch girl started to get bored because she was always losing her lovers, so when she lost her latest "acquisition," she decided to follow Max (her male friend) to New York where she would start a career as an actress.

text: however , finch also has a dilemma when , after wise words from stifler , stifler 's mom and stifler 's dad ( played by tim allen ) decide to renew their vows , and get married again .
translation: Walau bagaimanapun, Finch juga mengalami dilema apabila, selepas kata-kata bijak daripada Stifler, ibu Stifler dan bapa Stifler (dimainkan oleh Tim Allen) memutuskan untuk memperbaharui sumpah mereka dan berkahwin semula.
back_translation: However, Finch also faced a dilemma when, after wise words from Stifler, Stifler's mother, and Stifler's father (played by Tim Allen), decided to renew their vows and get remarried.

text: when a group of teens win a contest to spend a night in michael myers ' childhood home to be broadcast live on the internet , they believe they are in for a little fun and some free publicity .
translation: Apabila sekumpulan remaja memenangi pertandingan untuk menghabiskan malam di rumah kelahiran Michael Myers yang akan disiarkan secara langsung di internet, mereka percaya mereka akan mendapat sedikit keseronokan dan beberapa publisiti percuma.

text: she spends the night with pqd , one of the musicians .
translation: Dia menghabiskan malam bersama pqd, salah seorang ahli muzik.

text: old people will love this movie , and i mean that in the nicest possible way : last orders will touch the heart of anyone old enough to have earned a 50-year friendship .
translation: Orang tua akan menyukai filem ini, dan saya maksudkan dengan cara yang paling baik: last orders akan menyentuh hati sesiapa yang sudah cukup tua untuk mendapat persahabatan 50 tahun.

text: there 's enough here to keep the sequel rocking , providing you can leave the adult in you at the door .
translation: Ada cukup di sini untuk membuat sambungan ini menarik, asalkan anda boleh meninggalkan sisi dewasa anda di pintu.

text: merchant effectively translates naipaul 's lively mix of characters from the page to screen .

text: it 's a compelling and horrifying story , and the laramie project is worthwhile for reminding us that this sort of thing does , in fact , still happen in america .
translation: Ini adalah sebuah cerita yang memikat dan menakutkan, dan projek Laramie adalah berharga untuk mengingatkan kita bahawa jenis perkara ini masih berlaku di Amerika.

text: gainey ) - would unearth a seedy world of drugs and violence , ultimately revealing a motley crew from la 's underbelly including ex-con david lind ( dylan mcdermott ) , nightclub impresario eddie nash ( eric bogosian ) , the most unlikely of american heroes - porn legend john holmes ( val kilmer ) - holmes ' estranged wife sharon ( lisa kudrow ) and his teenage lover dawn schiller ( kate bosworth ) . ``
translation: akan mengungkap dunia yang gelap penuh dengan dadah dan keganasan, akhirnya mendedahkan kumpulan yang terdiri dari bekas banduan david lind (dylan mcdermott), pengusaha kelab malam eddie nash (eric bogosian), pahlawan Amerika yang paling tidak masuk akal - legenda filem lucah john holmes (val kilmer) - isteri terasing holmes sharon (lisa kudrow) dan kekasih remaja dawn schiller (kate bosworth).``
back_translation: Will uncover a dark world full of drugs and violence, eventually revealing a group composed of ex-convict David Lind (Dylan McDermott), nightclub entrepreneur Eddie Nash (Eric Bogosian), the most unlikely American hero - porn film legend John Holmes (Val Kilmer) - Holmes' estranged wife Sharon (Lisa Kudrow), and Holmes' teenage lover Dawn Schiller (Kate Bosworth).

text: wallowing in self-pity for years , he decides to commit suicide .
translation: Meratap dalam kesedihan diri selama bertahun-tahun, dia memutuskan untuk melakukan bunuh diri.
back_translation: Mourning in self-sadness for years, he decided to commit suicide.

text: a comedy that swings and jostles to the rhythms of life .
translation: Sebuah komedi yang bergerak dan bergoyang mengikuti irama kehidupan.
back_translation: A comedy that moves and sways to the rhythm of life.

text: when two thirteen-year-old boys fall deeply in love with her , they find themselves on a collision course with one another that could not only destroy their friendship , but take the tiny town of medda , alabama with them .
translation: Apabila dua orang budak lelaki berumur tiga belas tahun jatuh cinta padanya, mereka mendapati diri mereka berada dalam landasan bertembung yang boleh bukan sahaja memusnahkan persahabatan mereka, tetapi juga membawa bersama bandar kecil Medda, Alabama.
back_translation: When two thirteen-year-old boys fall in love with her, they find themselves on a collision course that could not only destroy their friendship but also bring along the small town of Medda, Alabama.

text: the main story involves an innocent teenage boy and a conniving teenage girl who meet on a beach one summer in southern brazil .
translation: Kisah utamanya melibatkan seorang remaja lelaki yang masih muda dan seorang gadis remaja yang licik yang bertemu di pantai suatu musim panas di selatan Brazil.
back_translation: The main story involves a young teenage boy and a cunning teenage girl who meet on a beach during a summer season in southern Brazil.

text: lucy walks away from him , deciding to take time to make this decision for herself .
translation: Lucy berjalan menjauh darinya, memutuskan untuk mengambil masa untuk membuat keputusan ini untuk dirinya sendiri.
back_translation: Lucy walked away from him, deciding to take time to make this decision for herself.

text: the film lapses too often into sugary sentiment and withholds delivery on the pell-mell pyrotechnics its punchy style promises .
translation: Filem tersebut terlalu kerap jatuh ke dalam sentimen manis dan tidak memberikan penghantaran yang dijanjikan oleh gaya yang bersemangat.
back_translation: The film often falls into sweet sentiments and does not deliver the promised delivery by its enthusiastic style.

text: as his family is rounded up to be shipped off to the nazi labor camps , he escapes deportation and eludes capture by living in the ruins of warsaw .
translation: Apabila keluarganya ditangkap untuk dihantar ke kem buruh Nazi, dia melarikan diri dari penghantaran dan mengelakkan penangkapan dengan tinggal di reruntuhan Warsaw.
back_translation: When his family was arrested to be sent to a Nazi labor camp, he escaped from the transport and avoided capture by living in the ruins of Warsaw.

text: it would seem that nothing is capable of distracting scotty johns from working on his much-anticipated second book .
translation: Nampaknya tidak ada yang mampu mengalihkan perhatian Scotty Johns dari mengerjakan buku keduanya yang sangat dinantikan.
back_translation: It seems that nothing can distract Scotty Johns from working on his highly anticipated second book.

text: though shiri 's eruptions of violence , mayhem and gunplay are every bit as kinetic and dazzling as anything generated in hong kong or hollywood , the film 's primary focus is always on its characters .
translation: Walaupun letupan kekerasan, kekacauan, dan aksi tembak-menembak dalam filem Shiri sehebat dan menarik seperti dalam filem-filem dari Hong Kong atau Hollywood, fokus utama filem sentiasa pada watak-wataknya.
back_translation: Despite the intense explosions, chaos, and shooting action in the movie Shiri being as powerful and compelling as in movies from Hong Kong or Hollywood, the main focus of the movie has always been on its characters.

text: however , they must ge the migt baby product done before they can settle their personal affairs .
translation: Bagaimanapun, mereka mesti menyelesaikan produk bayi yang penting sebelum mereka boleh menyelesaikan urusan peribadi mereka.
back_translation: However, they must complete the important baby product before they can attend to their personal affairs.

text: i liked the movie , but i know i would have liked it more if it had just gone that one step further . i 'm left slightly disappointed that it did n't .
translation: Saya suka filem itu, tetapi saya tahu saya akan lebih suka jika ia telah melangkah satu langkah lagi. Saya agak kecewa bahawa ia tidak berbuat demikian.
back_translation: I like the movie, but I know I would have liked it more if it had taken one step further. I'm somewhat disappointed that it didn't do so.

text: secretary is not a movie about fetishism . it is a movie about passion .
translation: "Secretary" bukan filem tentang fetishisme. Ia adalah filem tentang gairah.
back_translation: "Secretary" is not a film about fetishism. It is a film about passion.

text: set in the early 1970 's , this is the tale of a young man whose fiancee has been killed , but who finds himself falling for another woman even while he is still living with his fiancee 's grieving parents and being drawn into the legal battle to bring her killer to justice .
translation: Ditetapkan pada awal tahun 1970-an, ini adalah kisah tentang seorang lelaki muda yang tunangannya telah terbunuh, tetapi dia mendapati dirinya jatuh cinta kepada wanita lain walaupun dia masih tinggal bersama ibu bapa tunangannya yang sedang berduka dan terlibat dalam pertempuran undang-undang untuk membawa pembunuhnya ke muka keadilan.
back_translation: Set in the early 1970s, this is a story about a young man whose fiancée has been murdered, but he finds himself falling in love with another woman even though he still lives with his fiancée's grieving parents and is involved in a legal battle to bring her killer to justice.

text: proof once again that if the filmmakers just follow the books , they ca n't go wrong . better effects , better acting and a hilarious kenneth branagh . an excellent sequel .
translation: Buktikan sekali lagi bahawa jika para pembuat filem hanya mengikuti buku, mereka tidak akan tersilap. Kesan yang lebih baik, lakonan yang lebih baik dan Kenneth Branagh yang lucu. Satu kesinambungan yang sangat baik.
back_translation: Prove once again that if filmmakers only follow the book, they will not go wrong. Better effects, better acting, and the funny Kenneth Branagh. A very good continuation.

text: an intense relationship drama that takes the form of a mystery , the event centers around a series of unexplained deaths that occur among the gay community in new york 's fashionable chelsea district .
translation: Satu drama hubungan yang intens yang mengambil bentuk misteri, kejadian tersebut berkisar pada siri kematian yang tidak dapat dijelaskan yang berlaku di kalangan komuniti gay di kawasan Chelsea yang bergaya di New York.
back_translation: An intense relationship drama that takes the form of a mystery, the events revolve around a series of unexplained deaths occurring within the stylish gay community in the Chelsea area of New York.

text: the plot grows thin soon , and you find yourself praying for a quick resolution .
translation: Jalan cerita menjadi nipis sebentar lagi, dan anda merasakan diri anda berdoa untuk penyelesaian yang cepat.
back_translation: The storyline is thinning out soon, and you find yourself praying for a quick resolution.

text: shade is set in the world of poker hustlers working the clubs and martini bars of los angeles .
translation: "Shade" berlatar dunia penjudi poker yang bekerja di kelab dan bar martini Los Angeles.
back_translation: "Shade" is set in the world of poker gamblers who work in clubs and martini bars in Los Angeles.

text: feels as if the inmates have actually taken over the asylum .
translation: Merasa seolah-olah banduan benar-benar mengambil alih pusat pemulihan.
back_translation: Feeling as if the prisoners had actually taken over the rehabilitation center.

text: the huskies are beautiful , the border collie is funny and the overall feeling is genial and decent .
translation: Husky yang indah, border collie yang lucu dan keseluruhan rasa adalah mesra dan baik.
back_translation: Beautiful huskies, cute border collies, and overall vibes are friendly and good.

text: what 's so striking about jolie 's performance is that she never lets her character become a caricature -- not even with that radioactive hair .
translation: Yang menarik tentang persembahan Jolie adalah dia tidak pernah membiarkan wataknya menjadi sebuah karikatur - bahkan dengan rambut berwarna radioaktif itu.
back_translation: What is intriguing about Jolie's performance is that she never allows her character to become a caricature - even with that radioactive-hued hair.

text: as reality bleeds into hallucination , rothko decides to take the man for a walk . . .
translation: Apabila realiti menyusup ke dalam halusinasi, Rothko memutuskan untuk membawa lelaki itu berjalan kaki...
back_translation: When reality seeps into hallucination, Rothko decided to take the man for a walk...

text: despite hoffman 's best efforts , wilson remains a silent , lumpish cipher ; his encounters reveal nothing about who he is or who he was before .
translation: Walaupun usaha terbaik Hoffman, Wilson tetap seorang simbol yang senyap dan lesu; pertemuan mereka tidak mendedahkan apa-apa tentang siapa dia atau siapa dia sebelum ini.
back_translation: Despite Hoffman's best efforts, Wilson remains a silent and subdued symbol; their meeting did not reveal anything about who he is or who he was before.

text: a triumph , relentless and beautiful in its downbeat darkness .
translation: kejayaan, tanpa henti dan indah dalam kegelapan yang muram.
back_translation: Success, endless and beautiful in the gloomy darkness.

text: one ( logue ) does it for the love of comics , while the other shop , run by a husband-and-wife team ( rapaport and lyonne ) are in it strictly for the money .
translation: Satu (logue) melakukannya kerana cinta kepada komik, manakala kedai yang lain, dijalankan oleh pasangan suami isteri (Rapaport dan Lyonne) melakukannya semata-mata untuk wang.
back_translation: One (log) does it out of love for comics, while the other store, run by a married couple (Rapaport and Lyonne), does it solely for money.

text: the people want to lynch him and blueberry can only just prevent that .
translation: Orang ramai ingin menggantungnya dan blueberry hanya boleh menghalang daripada itu.
back_translation: The public wants to hang it, and only blueberries can prevent that.

text: the film stars jim caviezel as dantes , a sailor who is falsely accused of treason by his best friend fernand ( guy pearce ) , who wants dantes ' girlfriend mercedes ( dagmara dominczyk ) for himself .
translation: Filem ini menjulangkan Jim Caviezel sebagai Dantes, seorang kelasi yang dituduh palsu melakukan pengkhianatan oleh sahabat baiknya, Fernand (Guy Pearce), yang ingin memiliki kekasih Dantes, Mercedes (Dagmara Dominczyk), untuk dirinya sendiri.
back_translation: This film stars Jim Caviezel as Dantes, a sailor falsely accused of treason by his best friend, Fernand (Guy Pearce), who desires Dantes' lover, Mercedes (Dagmara Dominczyk), for himself.

text: dr . evil and mini-me have somehow escaped from a maximum security prison and the duo team up with goldmember .
translation: Dr. Evil dan Mini-Me dengan sesuatu cara berjaya melarikan diri dari penjara keamanan maksimum dan pasangan tersebut bergabung dengan Goldmember.
back_translation: Dr. Evil and Mini-Me somehow successfully escaped from the maximum security prison and the duo joined forces with Goldmember.

text: the film 's snags and stumblings are more than compensated for by its wryly subversive tone .
translation: Ketidaksempurnaan filem dan rintangan yang dihadapinya lebih daripada digantikan oleh nada yang subversif dengan sindiran yang sinis.
back_translation: The imperfections of the film and the obstacles it faces are more likely to be replaced by a subversive tone with a cynical undertone.

text: in the end , both come to new understanding of what is important and appear to be set in new ethical and moral directions .
translation: Pada akhirnya, kedua-dua datang kepada pemahaman baru tentang apa yang penting dan kelihatan bergerak ke arah etika dan moral yang baru.
back_translation: In the end, both came to a new understanding of what is important and appeared to move towards a new ethics and morality.

text: a geo-political thriller where gerry anderson finds that sometimes , everybody really is out to get you .
translation: Sebuah cerita seram geo-politik di mana Gerry Anderson menemui bahawa terkadang, semua orang benar-benar memang berusaha untuk menyasarnya.
back_translation: A geopolitical horror story where Gerry Anderson discovers that sometimes, everyone is really out to get him.

text: turns out to be a nifty swashbuckler whose plot easily could have been lifted from a number of douglas fairbanks silent pictures .
translation: Ternyata menjadi seorang penjahat cekap yang plotnya dengan mudah bisa diambil dari sejumlah gambar senyap Douglas Fairbanks.
back_translation: It turns out that being a skilled criminal whose plot can easily be taken from silent film images of Douglas Fairbanks.

text: although the dogs seemingly have it in for ted , he decides to keep the dogs and race them in the local race , the arctic challenge , spiting a mountain man ( played by james coburn ) who wants the dogs .
translation: Walaupun anjing-anjing itu nampaknya bermusuhan dengan Ted, dia memutuskan untuk menyimpan anjing-anjing tersebut dan bertanding dengan mereka dalam perlumbaan tempatan, Arctic Challenge, menjengkelkan seorang lelaki gunung (dimainkan oleh James Coburn) yang mahukan anjing-anjing tersebut.
back_translation: Despite the dogs appearing hostile towards Ted, he decided to keep the dogs and compete with them in the local race, the Arctic Challenge, frustrating a mountain man (played by James Coburn) who wants the dogs.

text: this insightful , oscar-nominated documentary , in which children on both sides of the ever-escalating conflict have their say away from watchful parental eyes , gives peace yet another chance .
translation: Filem dokumentari yang mendalam ini, yang dinominasikan untuk Anugerah Oscar, di mana kanak-kanak dari kedua belah pihak konflik yang sentiasa meningkat memiliki pendapat mereka tanpa pantauan mata ibu bapa, memberi peluang keamanan sekali lagi.
back_translation: This in-depth documentary film, nominated for an Oscar Award, where children from both conflicting sides that are constantly escalating have their say without parental supervision, offers a chance for peace once again.

text: watch as superfag rescues anthony , a naive , adorably cute guy whom superfag falls head over heals in love with . . . watch
translation: Tontonlah bagaimana superfag menyelamatkan Anthony, seorang lelaki yang naif, sangat comel yang superfag jatuh cinta padanya sepenuh hati. . . tontonlah
back_translation: Watch how superfag saves Anthony, a naive, very adorable man whom superfag has fallen head over heels in love with. . . watch it

text: it uses the pain and violence of war as background material for color .
translation: Ia menggunakan kesakitan dan keganasan peperangan sebagai bahan latar belakang untuk warna.
back_translation: It uses the pain and violence of war as the background material for color.

text: this daring film challenges most widely held notions about religious conviction while providing a complex portrait of an identity crisis that 's run amok and a good mind that 's jumped the tracks .
translation: Filem berani ini mencabar kepercayaan agama yang paling lazim sambil memberikan potret kompleks tentang krisis identiti yang telah menjadi liar dan minda yang telah terkeluar landasan.
back_translation: This daring film challenges the beliefs of the most common religion while offering a complex portrait of identity crisis that has become wild and minds that have gone astray.

text: when not wallowing in its characters ' frustrations , the movie is busy contriving false , sitcom-worthy solutions to their problems .
translation: Apabila tidak tenggelam dalam frustrasi watak-wataknya, filem tersebut sibuk merancang penyelesaian palsu yang layak dalam situasi situasi mereka.
back_translation: When not drowned in frustration with its characters, the film is busy devising suitable fake solutions in their situations.

text: after witnessing a horrific and traumatic event , julia lund ( laura regan ) , a graduate student in psychology , gradually comes to the realization that everything which scared her as a child could be real .
translation: Selepas menyaksikan satu peristiwa yang mengerikan dan traumatik, Julia Lund (Laura Regan), seorang pelajar siswazah dalam psikologi, secara perlahan-lahan sedar bahawa segala-galanya yang menakutkannya semasa kanak-kanak boleh menjadi kenyataan.
back_translation: After witnessing a terrifying and traumatic event, Julia Lund (Laura Regan), a graduate student in psychology, slowly realizes that everything that frightened her as a child could become a reality.

text: a keep-'em-guessing plot and an affectionate take on its screwed-up characters .
translation: plot yang membuat mereka terus menebak dan memahami dengan penuh kasih terhadap karakter-karakter yang bermasalah.
back_translation: a plot that keeps them guessing and understanding with full empathy towards the troubled characters.

text: her hard fought for goal of a harmonic family life seems achieved .
translation: Matlamatnya yang sukar dicapai untuk kehidupan harmoni dalam keluarga tampaknya telah tercapai.
back_translation: The challenging goal of achieving harmony in family life seems to have been accomplished.

text: facing her past , culturally and emotionally , eve finds herself caught up in the independent movement of armenia , and the crisis of commitment with the man whom she falls in love .
translation: Menghadapi masa lalunya, secara budaya dan emosi, Eve mendapati dirinya terlibat dalam gerakan kemerdekaan Armenia, dan krisis komitmen dengan lelaki yang dia jatuh cinta.
back_translation: Facing her past, both culturally and emotionally, Eve found herself involved in the Armenian independence movement, and in a crisis of commitment with the man she fell in love with.

text: ami , having dropped out of college with twelve credits left , works at a flower shop , biding her time till she can get eric to understand what she knows deep down what she wants to do - be a mother .
translation: Ami, yang telah memutuskan untuk berhenti sekolah dengan hanya lapan belas kredit lagi, bekerja di kedai bunga, menunggu masa sehingga dia boleh membuat Eric memahami apa yang dia tahu secara mendalam apa yang dia mahu lakukan - menjadi seorang ibu.
back_translation: Ami, who has decided to drop out of school with only eighteen credits left, works at a flower shop, waiting for the time when she can make Eric understand what she knows deeply she wants to do - become a mother.

text: alarms for duvall 's throbbing sincerity and his elderly propensity for patting people while he talks .
translation: kepekaan pada keikhlasan yang berkobar-kobar milik Duval dan kecenderungan beliau yang tua untuk mengusap orang semasa dia bercakap.
back_translation: The burning sincerity sensitivity of Duval and his tendency to pat people while speaking.

text: a serial killer named shin-hyun gives himself up to police .
translation: Seorang pembunuh bersiri bernama Shin-Hyun menyerahkan diri kepada polis.
back_translation: A serial killer named Shin-Hyun surrendered to the police.

text: the issue at hand is animal testing , which elle becomes concerned about when the parents of her dog ca n't attend the pet 's wedding because of it .
translation: Isu yang dibangkitkan adalah ujian ke atas haiwan, yang menimbulkan kebimbangan dalam diri Elle apabila ibu bapa anjingnya tidak dapat menghadiri majlis perkahwinan haiwan kesayangannya kerana perkara tersebut.
back_translation: The issue raised is the animal test, which raises concern in Elle when her dog's parents are unable to attend their beloved animal's wedding ceremony because of that.

text: bob dobalina is an award-winning copywriter who really wants to be a screenwriter .
translation: Bob Dobalina adalah seorang penulis salinan yang memenangi anugerah yang sangat ingin menjadi seorang penulis skrip.
back_translation: Bob Dobalina is a copywriter who has won awards and really wants to become a scriptwriter.

text: but there is a political dilemma : if someone is arrested before he commits a murder , can the person be accused of the murder , which - because of the arrest - never took place ?
translation: Tetapi terdapat satu dilema politik: jika seseorang ditangkap sebelum dia melakukan pembunuhan, bolehkah individu itu dituduh melakukan pembunuhan, yang - kerana ditangkap - tidak pernah berlaku?
back_translation: But there is a political dilemma: if someone is arrested before they commit a murder, can that individual be accused of committing murder, which - because the arrest - never happened?

text: as the main character , the chosen one , oedekerk sets off to avenge the deaths of his parents at the hands of kung-fu legend master pain .
translation: Sebagai watak utama, "the chosen one", Oedekerk berangkat untuk membalas kematian ibu bapanya yang disebabkan oleh legenda kungfu Master Pain.
back_translation: As the main character, "the chosen one", Oedekerk sets off to avenge the death of his parents caused by the kung fu legend Master Pain.

text: perky , perfect carolyn and her alpha omega pi sisters plan to win sorority of the year by impressing the greek council with a killer charity : coaching mentally challenged athletes for the regional challenged games .
translation: Carolyn yang ceria dan sempurna serta saudari-saudarinya di Alpha Omega Pi merancang untuk memenangi persaudaraan tahun ini dengan mengesankan majlis Greek dengan program amal yang hebat: melatih atlet-Atlet berkeperluan khas untuk Sukan Tantangan serantau.
back_translation: Carolyn, who is cheerful and perfect, along with her sisters in Alpha Omega Pi, plan to win the sisterhood this year by impressing the Greek council with a great charity program: training special needs athletes for the Regional Challenge Sports.

text: an unpleasant though sometimes effective psychological thriller that is noteworthy for being the film in which actress sandra bullock has gotten her act back together .
translation: Sebuah thriller psikologi yang tidak menyenangkan namun kadang-kadang berkesan yang mencorakkan filem di mana pelakon Sandra Bullock kembali mengetengahkan bakatnya.
back_translation: An unsettling yet occasionally impactful psychological thriller that showcases actress Sandra Bullock's talent.

text: while lying in the middle of those flowers he devotes to his yearning for love .
translation: Sementara terbaring di tengah-tengah bunga-bunga itu, dia mendedikasikan dirinya kepada kehausan akan cinta.
back_translation: While lying amidst the flowers, she dedicated herself to the thirst for love.

text: this is the story of some of those who left .
translation: Ini adalah kisah mengenai sesetengah daripada mereka yang pergi.
back_translation: This is a story about some of those who have gone.

text: brings a rare , clinically specific sense of moral complexity and humanistic sympathy to the usual regimen of finger-pointing and exposure .
translation: Membawa satu kepelbagaian moral yang jarang, secara klinikal spesifik dan simpati humanistik kepada rutin biasa penudingan jari dan pendedahan.
back_translation: Bringing a rare variety of moral clarity, clinically specific and humanistic sympathy to the usual routine of finger-pointing and exposure.

text: this amiable picture talks tough , but it 's all bluster -- in the end it 's as sweet as greenfingers . . .
translation: Gambar yang mesra ini kelihatan berani, tetapi sebenarnya hanya bicara kosong - pada akhirnya ia sama manisnya seperti tangan hijau...
back_translation: This intimate picture appears bold, but in reality just empty talk - in the end, it is as sweet as a green hand...

text: so beautifully acted and directed , it 's clear that washington most certainly has a new career ahead of him if he so chooses .
translation: Dipersembahkan dan diarahkan dengan begitu indah, jelas bahawa Washington pasti mempunyai karier baru di hadapannya jika dia memilih demikian.
back_translation: Presented and directed so beautifully, it is clear that Washington definitely has a new career ahead of him if he chooses so.

text: imamura has said that warm water under a red bridge is a poem to the enduring strengths of women . it may also be the best sex comedy about environmental pollution ever made .
translation: Imamura telah menyatakan bahawa air panas di bawah jambatan merah adalah sebuah puisi tentang kekuatan yang abadi dalam wanita. Ia mungkin juga merupakan komedi seks terbaik tentang pencemaran alam yang pernah dibuat.
back_translation: Imamura has stated that the hot water under the red bridge is a poem on the eternal strength in women. It may also be one of the best sex comedies about environmental pollution ever made.

text: a sailor ( derek luke ) prone to violent outbursts is sent to a naval psychiatrist ( washington ) for help .
translation: Seorang kelasi (Derek Luke) yang rentan kepada ledakan amarah dipertemukan dengan seorang psikiatri tentera laut (Washington) untuk mendapatkan bantuan.
back_translation: A sailor (Derek Luke) prone to explosive anger is brought together with a navy psychiatrist (Washington) for help.

text: and some of these ghosts are down right unfriendly .
translation: dan sesetengah hantu ini benar-benar tidak ramah.
back_translation: And some of these ghosts are really unfriendly.

text: after realizing what had happened and unsure what else to do he began capturing the events unfolding around him .
translation: Setelah menyedari apa yang telah berlaku dan tidak pasti apa lagi yang perlu dilakukan, dia mula merakam peristiwa yang sedang berlaku di sekelilingnya.
back_translation: After realizing what had happened and unsure of what else needed to be done, he began recording the events taking place around him.

text: using only a phone , a polaroid camera and his wits , he reclaims control over his life , transforming himself from pawn to puppet master in a wicked tale of revenge .
translation: Menggunakan hanya telefon, kamera polaroid, dan kepandaiannya, dia mendapatkan semula kawalan kehidupannya, mengubah dirinya dari catur kepada dalang dalam cerita dendam yang jahat.
back_translation: Using only a phone, a Polaroid camera, and his wit, he regained control of his life, transforming himself from a pawn to the mastermind in a wicked revenge story.

text: when the machine 's serviceman is particularly rude to him , he gets revenge by having his double-parked truck ticketed ; the serviceman runs out and leaves his cart behind .
translation: Apabila juruteknik mesin itu terlalu kasar kepadanya, dia membalas dendam dengan membuatkan tiket untuk traknya yang dilanggar letaknya; juruteknik itu tergesa-gesa keluar dan meninggalkan keretanya di belakang.
back_translation: When the mechanic was too rough on him, he retaliated by issuing a ticket for the technician's misplaced truck; the technician hastily left, leaving his car behind.

text: a world in small , subtly acknowledging larger economic and cultural forces one moment , and in the next patiently observing the way a bowl of medicinal tea , seen turning in a microwave carousel , begins to describe its own slow epicycles .
translation: sebuah dunia dalam kecil, secara halus mengakui daya ekonomi dan budaya yang lebih besar pada satu saat, dan kemudian dengan sabar mengamati bagaimana sebuah mangkuk teh obat, dilihat berputar di dalam magnetron, mulai menggambarkan episykisnya yang perlahan.
back_translation: A small world, subtly acknowledging the greater economic and cultural powers at play at one moment, then patiently observing how a bowl of herbal tea, seen rotating inside a microwave, begins to portray its slow epicycles.

text: it has more than a few moments that are insightful enough to be fondly remembered in the endlessly challenging maze of moviegoing .
translation: Ia mempunyai lebih daripada beberapa saat yang cukup bermakna untuk dikenang dengan penuh rasa kasih sayang dalam labirin menantang yang tiada henti dalam menonton filem.
back_translation: It has more than a few moments significant enough to be fondly remembered in the endless maze of watching movies.

text: a dull , somnambulant exercise in pretension whose pervasive quiet is broken by frequent outbursts of violence and noise .
translation: suatu latihan yang membosankan, somnambulik dalam pretensi yang sunyi terganggu oleh pecahan keganasan dan bunyi yang kerap.
back_translation: a boring exercise, somnambulistic in a disrupted silence troubled by fragments of violence and frequent sounds.

text: attal pushes too hard to make this a comedy or serious drama . he seems to want both , but succeeds in making neither .
translation: attal terlalu berusaha untuk membuat ini menjadi komedi atau drama serius. Dia kelihatan mahu kedua-dua, tetapi tidak berjaya menjadi mana-mana.
