translation: Semua orang sepatutnya boleh menghargai sinematografi yang mengagumkan dan lakonan naturalistik.
back_translation: Everyone should be able to appreciate amazing cinematography and naturalistic acting.

text: originality ai n't on the menu , but there 's never a dull moment in the giant spider invasion comic chiller .
translation: Kerekaan tidak dijual di sini, tetapi tidak pernah ada masa yang membosankan dalam komik seram 'Giant Spider Invasion'.
back_translation: Carriages are not sold here, but there is never a dull moment in the horror comic 'Giant Spider Invasion'.

text: unbeknownst to her , the real scoop is much more awesome then even she could write about , should she live to tell .
translation: Tanpa pengetahuannya, cerita sebenar adalah jauh lebih hebat daripada yang dia boleh tulis, jika dia hidup untuk menceritakannya.
back_translation: Without his knowledge, the real story is far more astonishing than he could write, if he were alive to tell it.

text: jude law co stars as a hit man hired to kill sullivan .
translation: Jude Law berlakon sebagai seorang pembunuh yang dibayar untuk membunuh Sullivan.
back_translation: Jude Law acts as a paid killer to assassinate Sullivan.

text: each brush stroke brings him inexorably closer to an unknown fate , a fate that is perhaps foretold in the very visions that fuel his work .
translation: Setiap sapuan berus membawanya dengan pasti kepada nasib yang tidak diketahui, sebuah nasib yang mungkin telah diramalkan dalam visi-visi yang menggerakkan kerjanya.
back_translation: Every stroke of the brush leads him inevitably to an unknown fate, a fate that may have been predicted in the visions that move his actions.

text: a filmmaker , fascinated by the power of the camera and obsessed with the theories of russian film pioneer dziga vertov , decides to get a camera eye to replace the real eye he lost as a child .
translation: Seorang pembuat filem, yang terpesona dengan kuasa kamera dan terobsesi dengan teori pengasas filem Rusia, Dziga Vertov, memutuskan untuk mendapatkan mata kamera sebagai gantian kepada mata sebenar yang hilang semasa kecil.
back_translation: A filmmaker, who is fascinated by the power of the camera and obsessed with the theories of the Russian film pioneer Dziga Vertov, decides to acquire a camera lens in exchange for the real eye lost during childhood.

text: she soon finds out it 's hard to get to know him , or even to get nearby him !
translation: Dia segera menyedari bahawa sukar untuk mengenali lelaki itu, atau bahkan mendekatinya!
back_translation: He immediately realized that it was difficult to recognize that man, or even to approach him!

text: a thriller with an edge -- which is to say that it does n't follow the stale , standard , connect-the-dots storyline which has become commonplace in movies that explore the seamy underbelly of the criminal world .
translation: sebuah thriller yang tajam - dengan kata lain, ia tidak mengikuti jalan cerita yang basi, standard, menghubungkan titik-titik yang telah menjadi lazim dalam filem yang meneroka dunia jenayah yang gelap.
back_translation: A sharp thriller - in other words, it does not follow the stale, standard storyline, connecting the dots that have become common in films exploring the dark world of crime.

text: it can become even more complicated when the visit is a most unusual homestay with three single , american men with extremely diverse and . . . unique personalities .
translation: Ia boleh menjadi lebih rumit apabila lawatan tersebut adalah penginapan di rumah yang paling tidak biasa dengan tiga lelaki bujang Amerika yang sangat berbeza dan personaliti yang unik.
back_translation: It can become more complicated when the visit is a stay in the most unusual house with three very different American bachelors and unique personalities.

text: the film 's almost unbearable portrait of sadness and grief transcends its specific story to speak to the ways in which need , history and presumption tangle , and sometimes destroy , blood ties .
translation: potret sedih dan duka filem hampir tidak tertanggungkan itu melampaui ceritanya untuk menyentuh cara di mana keperluan, sejarah, dan sangkaan merumitkan, dan terkadang merosakkan, hubungan darah.
back_translation: A somber and heartbreaking portrait of that nearly unbearable film goes beyond its story to touch on the ways in which needs, history, and assumptions complicate, and sometimes damage, family relationships.

text: her all-star cast including nina hartley , kylie ireland , brooke hunter and more , peek at their highest performance levels .
translation: Pelakon bintang termasuk Nina Hartley, Kylie Ireland, Brooke Hunter, dan lain-lain, lihat prestasi tertinggi mereka.
back_translation: Starring actors including Nina Hartley, Kylie Ireland, Brooke Hunter, and others, see their highest achievements.

text: sean , an all go no quit , military driven high school student recieves a video tape of a brutal murder .
translation: Sean, seorang pelajar sekolah tinggi yang penuh semangat dan bersemangat tinggi yang didorong oleh ketenteraan menerima rakaman video pembunuhan yang kejam.
back_translation: Sean, a high school student full of enthusiasm and high passion who is driven by military interests, received a recording of a cruel murder.

text: a retired army colonel and veteran of three wars , rescorla was killed in the september 11 , 2001 attack on the world trade center , during which he saved the lives of thousands of wtc employees at the cost of his own life .
translation: Seorang kolonel tentera bersara dan veteran tiga peperangan, Rescorla terbunuh dalam serangan 11 September 2001 ke Pusat Perdagangan Dunia, semasa beliau menyelamatkan nyawa ribuan pekerja WTC dengan mengorbankan nyawanya sendiri.
back_translation: A retired army colonel and veteran of three wars, Rescorla was killed in the September 11, 2001 attack on the World Trade Center, while he was saving the lives of thousands of WTC workers by sacrificing his own life.

text: the screenplay is hugely overwritten , with tons and tons of dialogue -- most of it given to children .
translation: Naskah skrin ini sangat berlebihan, dengan banyak sekali dialog – kebanyakan diberikan kepada kanak-kanak.
back_translation: This screenplay is very excessive, with a lot of dialogue - mostly given to children.

text: an unremarkable , modern action/comedy buddy movie whose only nod to nostalgia is in the title .
translation: Filem kawan aksi/komedi moden yang tidak begitu istimewa, di mana satu-satunya penghormatan kepada nostalgia adalah dalam tajuknya.
back_translation: A modern action/comedy film that is not so special, where the only tribute to nostalgia is in its title.

text: despite its old-hat set-up and predictable plot , empire still has enough moments to keep it entertaining .
translation: Walaupun pengaturcaraan lama dan plot yang boleh diduga, empire masih mempunyai momen yang mencukupi untuk membuatnya menghiburkan.
back_translation: Despite the dated programming and predictable plot, empire still has enough moments to make it entertaining.

text: its adult themes of familial separation and societal betrayal are head and shoulders above much of the director 's previous popcorn work .
translation: Unsur-unsur dewasa berkenaan dengan pemisahan keluarga dan pengkhianatan masyarakat melonjak jauh di atas kebanyakan karya filem terdahulu pengarah tersebut.
back_translation: Adult elements concerning family separation and societal betrayal surge far above most of the director's previous film works.

text: the movie is obviously a labour of love so howard appears to have had free rein to be as pretentious as he wanted .
translation: Filem ini jelas merupakan sebuah usaha yang dilakukan dengan penuh kasih sayang, jadi Howard kelihatan diberi kebebasan untuk menjadi sepretensi seberapa pun yang diinginkannya.
back_translation: This film clearly is an effort made with full of love, so Howard seems to be given the freedom to be as pretentious as he desires.

text: he has had no formal education , but on his own , he systematically studies western theories of industrial management and such classical chinese philosophies as confucianism , taoism , and suntzu .
translation: Dia tidak mendapat pendidikan formal, tetapi dengan usahanya sendiri, dia secara sistematik mempelajari teori-teori pengurusan industri Barat serta falsafah-falsafah klasik China seperti Konfusianisme, Taoisme, dan Sunzi.
back_translation: He did not receive formal education, but through his own efforts, he systematically studied Western industrial management theories as well as classical Chinese philosophies such as Confucianism, Taoism, and Sunzi.

text: the three leads produce adequate performances , but what 's missing from this material is any depth of feeling .
translation: Ketiga-tiga watak utama memberikan lakonan yang mencukupi, tetapi apa yang hilang dari bahan ini adalah sebarang kedalaman perasaan.
back_translation: All three main characters deliver adequate performances, but what is missing from this material is any depth of emotion.

text: straight up : helicopters in action will take audiences on a series of aerial adventures .
translation: Helikopter dalam tindakan akan membawa penonton ke dalam beberapa pengembaraan udara.
back_translation: The helicopter in action will take the audience on several air adventures.

text: shankman . . . and screenwriter karen janszen bungle their way through the narrative as if it were a series of bible parables and not an actual story .
translation: shankman . . . dan penulis skrip karen janszen tersilap dalam naratif seolah-olah itu adalah satu siri perumpamaan Bible dan bukan sebuah cerita sebenar.
back_translation: Shankman and scriptwriter Karen Janszen mistakenly framed the narrative as if it were a series of biblical parables rather than a real story.

text: visually imaginative , thematically instructive and thoroughly delightful , it takes us on a roller-coaster ride from innocence to experience without even a hint of that typical kiddie-flick sentimentality .
translation: Secara visual berimaginasi, tema berinstruksi dan sangat menyeronokkan, ia membawa kita dalam perjalanan naik roller-coaster dari ketidaktahuan ke pengalaman tanpa sedikit pun sentimen tipikal filem kanak-kanak.
back_translation: Visually imaginative, instructive and highly enjoyable, it takes us on a roller-coaster journey from ignorance to experience without any hint of typical children's film sentimentality.

text: brilliantly captures the brightness of the light , the intensity of the colors and the omnipresence of mexican motifs that informed kahlo 's art .
translation: secara brilian menangkap kecerahan cahaya, intensiti warna, dan ketiadaan batasan motif-motif Mexico yang mempengaruhi seni Kahlo.
back_translation: brilliantly captures the brightness of light, intensity of colors, and the limitless motifs of Mexico that influenced Kahlo's art.

text: after taking a look at the people around her and examining her life 's choices , lucy decides that it would be unfair to give up this baby just because she did n't do what she wanted to with her own life .
translation: Selepas melihat orang-orang di sekelilingnya dan meneliti pilihan hidupnya, Lucy memutuskan bahawa akan tidak adil untuk menyerah kanak-kanak ini hanya kerana dia tidak melakukan apa yang diingininya dalam hidupnya sendiri.
back_translation: After observing the people around her and examining her life choices, Lucy decided that it would be unfair to give up on this child just because he did not do what she desired in her own life.

text: director and co-writer hilary birmingham 's maiden featureM-^E is a strong , polished , professional indie effort that bodes well for bigger success .
translation: Filem sulung pengarah dan penulis bersama, Hilary Birmingham, adalah satu usaha indie yang kukuh, bersih, dan profesional yang menjanjikan kejayaan yang lebih besar.
back_translation: The debut film by director and writer duo, Hilary Birmingham, is a solid, clean, and professional indie effort that promises greater success.

text: like most of godard 's films , in praise of love makes you stay awake and lean forward .
translation: Seperti kebanyakan filem Godard, dalam pujian kepada cinta membuat anda tetap terjaga dan duduk dengan bersungguh-sungguh.
back_translation: Like most Godard films, in praise of love will keep you awake and sitting attentively.

text: she 's aided by his faithful bodyguard , with whom she soon falls in love .
translation: Dia dibantu oleh pengawal badannya yang setia, dengan siapa dia tidak lama lagi jatuh cinta.
back_translation: He is helped by his loyal bodyguard, with whom he will soon fall in love.

text: in this playful and rollicking swashbuckler , drag king pirates take to the high seas on a quest to restore stolen treasures .
translation: Dalam filem ini yang riang dan penuh aksi, lanun raja berpakaian lelaki mengembara di lautan luas untuk mengembalikan harta yang dicuri.
back_translation: In this cheerful and action-packed film, a pirate king dressed as a man roams the vast ocean to retrieve stolen treasure.

text: it follows and in some cases re-enacts the chronology of shepherd 's visit to a local bar , his kidnap and beating , the discovery of him tied to a fence , the vigil at the hospital , his death and funeral , and the trial of his killers .
translation: Ia mengikuti dan dalam sesetengah kes mengulangi kronologi kunjungan gembala ke sebuah bar tempatan, penculikannya dan penderitaannya, penemuan dia diikat kepada pagar, jagaan di hospital, kematiannya dan upacara pengebumiannya, serta perbicaraan pembunuhnya.
back_translation: It follows and in some cases repeats the chronology of the shepherd's visit to a local bar, his kidnapping and suffering, his discovery tied to a fence, care at the hospital, his death and funeral ceremony, as well as the trial of his killer.

text: taylor williams iii , a wealthy seventeen year old meets his dream `` lavender `` girl ( mandi carson , who comes from a lower-middle class ) for the very first time at mr . dodson 's business education class at seaport-greene high school .
translation: Taylor Williams III, seorang remaja berusia tujuh belas tahun yang kaya bertemu dengan gadis impiannya "lavender" (Mandi Carson, yang berasal dari kelas menengah bawah) untuk pertama kalinya di kelas pendidikan bisnis Mr. Dodson di Sekolah Menengah Seaport-Greene.
back_translation: Taylor Williams III, a wealthy seventeen-year-old teenager, met his dream girl "Lavender" (Mandi Carson, who comes from a lower middle-class background) for the first time in Mr. Dodson's business education class at Seaport-Greene High School.

text: a heady , biting , be-bop ride through nighttime manhattan , a loquacious videologue of the modern male and the lengths to which he 'll go to weave a protective cocoon around his own ego .
translation: Perjalanan bop yang memikat dan tajam melalui Manhattan pada waktu malam, sebuah narasi panjang lebar tentang lelaki moden dan sejauh mana dia akan pergi untuk membina kokun perlindungan di sekeliling egonya sendiri.
back_translation: The captivating and sharp journey of a bop through Manhattan at night, a lengthy narrative about a modern man and how far he will go to build a cocoon of protection around his own ego.

text: it looks good , but it is essentially empty .
translation: Nampak bagus, tetapi pada dasarnya ia kosong.
back_translation: Looks good, but basically it's empty.

text: this includes never-before-seen images of tests of modified v-1s at point mugu naval air station , and the flight test program for regulus at edwards air force base in 1950 .
translation: Ini termasuk gambar-gambar yang belum pernah dilihat sebelumnya mengenai ujian v-1s yang telah diubah di stesen udara angkatan laut Point Mugu, dan program ujian penerbangan untuk regulus di pangkalan udara Edwards pada tahun 1950.
back_translation: This includes previously unseen pictures of the modified v-1s tests conducted at the Point Mugu naval air station, and the flight test program for the Regulus at Edwards Air Force Base in 1950.

text: as dex prepares to do battle with herb , he must also deal with all the intricacies it takes to make a relationship work .
translation: Semasa Dex bersedia untuk bertarung dengan Herb, Dia juga perlu menangani segala kompleksiti yang diperlukan untuk menjadikan hubungan berfungsi.
back_translation: While Dex is ready to fight Herb, He also needs to deal with all the complexities required to make the relationship work.

text: as shaky as the plot is , kaufman 's script is still memorable for some great one-liners .
translation: Walaupun jalan ceritanya goyah, skrip Kaufman masih dikenang kerana beberapa baris dialog yang hebat.
back_translation: Even though the storyline is shaky, Kaufman's script is still remembered for some great lines of dialogue.

text: in the end , the movie bogs down in insignificance , saying nothing about kennedy 's assassination and revealing nothing about the pathology it pretends to investigate .
translation: Pada akhirnya, filem itu tergelincir dalam ketiadaan penting, tidak memberitahu tentang pembunuhan Kennedy dan tidak mendedahkan apa-apa tentang patologi yang cuba disiasatinya.
back_translation: In the end, the film slipped into insignificance, failing to mention the Kennedy assassination and revealing nothing about the pathology it was trying to investigate.

text: one of the most depressing movie-going experiences i can think of is to sit through about 90 minutes of a so-called 'comedy ' and not laugh once .
translation: Salah satu pengalaman menonton filem yang paling memuramkan yang dapat saya bayangkan adalah duduk untuk kira-kira 90 minit menonton 'komedi' yang disebut dan tidak ketawa langsung.
back_translation: One of the most dismal movie-watching experiences I can imagine is sitting for about 90 minutes watching a so-called 'comedy' and not laughing at all.

text: the cousins work nights at a local mall as security guards .
translation: Sepupu-sepupu tersebut bekerja pada waktu malam sebagai pengawal keselamatan di pusat beli-belah tempatan.
back_translation: The cousins work as security guards at the local shopping center at night.

text: armed with a bag of money and mysterious martial arts skills , with marie by his side , bourne scours paris for clues about his identity and past life . . .
translation: Bersenjatakan beg duit dan kemahiran seni bela diri misteri, bersama Marie di sisinya, Bourne mengembara di Paris mencari petunjuk mengenai identiti dan kehidupan lampau nya...
back_translation: Armed with a money bag and mysterious martial arts skills, alongside Marie by his side, Bourne travels through Paris searching for clues about his identity and past life...

text: with only a few weapons and time running out , they take shelter in an ancient house , inside which they will uncover the secrets of the `` house of the dead . ``
translation: Dengan hanya sedikit senjata dan waktu semakin berkurang, mereka mencari perlindungan di sebuah rumah kuno, di dalamnya mereka akan mengungkap rahasia-rasanya "rumah orang mati."
back_translation: With only a few weapons and time running out, they seek refuge in an old house where they will uncover the secrets of the "house of the dead."

text: although the editing might have been tighter , hush ! sympathetically captures the often futile lifestyle of young people in modern japan .
translation: Walaupun penyuntingan mungkin perlu lebih ketat, 'Hush!' secara simpatik menangkap gaya hidup yang sering sia-sia bagi golongan muda di Jepun moden.
back_translation: Although editing may need to be tighter, 'Hush!' sympathetically captures the often futile lifestyle of young people in modern Japan.

text: chicago glorifies murder , glamorizes sex & death -- in other words it is just right for today 's unsunny times .
translation: Chicago memuja pembunuhan, memperindah seks & kematian - dengan kata lain, ia sangat sesuai untuk masa kini yang tidak cerah.
back_translation: Chicago glorifies murder, beautifies sex & death - in other words, it is very suitable for the current dark times.

text: at no point during k-19 : the widowmaker did this viewer feel enveloped in a story that , though meant to be universal in its themes of loyalty , courage and dedication to a common goal , never seems to leave the lot .
translation: Pada masa mana pun semasa menonton k-19: the widowmaker, penonton ini tidak pernah merasa diliputi dalam sebuah cerita yang, walaupun bertujuan untuk menjadi universal dalam tema-temanya mengenai kesetiaan, keberanian dan dedikasi kepada matlamat yang sama, tetapi tidak pernah kelihatan meninggalkan lotnya.
back_translation: At any time while watching k-19: the widowmaker, this viewer never felt engulfed in a story that, despite aiming to be universal in its themes of loyalty, courage, and dedication to a common goal, never seemed to leave its mark.

text: i was hoping that it would be sleazy and fun , but it was neither .
translation: Saya berharap ia akan menjadi merosakkan dan menyeronokkan, tetapi ia tidak sedikit pun.
back_translation: I hoped it would be destructive and fun, but it's not at all.

text: the egyptian queen cleopatra bets against the roman emperor , julius caesar , that her people are still great , even if the times of the pharaohs has long passed .
translation: Ratu Mesir Cleopatra bertaruh menentang kaisar Rom, Julius Caesar, bahawa rakyatnya masih hebat, walaupun zaman firaun sudah lama berlalu.
back_translation: Egyptian Queen Cleopatra challenged Roman Emperor Julius Caesar that her people are still great, even though the era of the pharaohs has long passed.

text: it works its magic with such exuberance and passion that the film 's length becomes a part of its fun .
translation: Filem itu berjaya menampilkan keajaiban dengan semangat dan gairah yang begitu memukau sehingga panjang filem menjadi sebahagian daripada keseruannya.
back_translation: The film successfully showcases wonders with such captivating spirit and enthusiasm that the length of the film becomes part of its charm.

text: series of 12 short movies from the start of the twentieth century , compiled by michel reilhac .
translation: Siri 12 filem pendek dari permulaan abad ke-20, yang disusun oleh Michel Reilhac.
back_translation: A series of 12 short films from the early 20th century, curated by Michel Reilhac.

text: this bold and lyrical first feature from raja amari expands the pat notion that middle-aged women just wan na have fun into a rousing treatise of sensual empowerment .
translation: filem pertama yang berani dan berpuitis dari Raja Amari ini meluaskan pandangan bahawa wanita separuh baya hanya ingin berseronok menjadi karya yang membangkitkan semangat empowerment sensual.
back_translation: Raja Amari's daring and poetic first film expands the view that middle-aged women just want to have fun into a work that revives the spirit of sensual empowerment.

text: atanarjuat , unfolding on a cold-blasted primeval arctic plain , has the quality of totem .
translation: Atanarjuat, yang terbentang di atas dataran Arktik purba yang dingin, mempunyai kualiti totem.
back_translation: Atanarjuat, which stretches across the ancient cold Arctic plain, has totem qualities.

text: . it 's a brilliant revision of the book and it offers a motivation for the invention that 's lacking in the first film version .
translation: Ini adalah revisi yang hebat mengenai buku tersebut dan ia memberikan motivasi untuk penemuan yang kurang dalam versi filem pertama.
back_translation: This is a great revision on the book and it provides motivation for the discoveries lacking in the first film version.

text: the country bears has no scenes that will upset or frighten young viewers . unfortunately , there is almost nothing in this flat effort that will amuse or entertain them , either .
translation: Beruang Negara tidak memiliki adegan yang akan membuat penonton muda terganggu atau ketakutan. Malangnya, hampir tiada yang dapat menghibur atau menghiburkan mereka dalam usaha yang datar ini.
back_translation: The National Bear does not have scenes that would disturb or frighten young viewers. Unfortunately, there is hardly anything to entertain or amuse them in this flat attempt.

text: austin powers in goldmember is a cinematic car wreck , a catastrophic collision of tastelessness and gall that nevertheless will leave fans clamoring for another ride .
translation: Austin Powers dalam Goldmember adalah satu kemalangan filem yang menggemparkan, satu perlanggaran teruk antara kekurangan selera dan keberanian yang namun akan meninggalkan peminat meminta untuk pengalaman lain.
back_translation: Austin Powers in Goldmember is a disastrous film that has shocked audiences, a serious clash between lack of taste and bravery that will still leave fans asking for another experience.

text: as the strange thefts escalate , detective phil barbara ( gale harold ) is assigned to the case and is soon on chep and fran 's trail .
translation: Apabila pencurian aneh meningkat, detektif Phil Barbara (Gale Harold) dipilih untuk menyiasat kes tersebut dan tidak lama kemudian mengikut jejak Chep dan Fran.
back_translation: When strange thefts increase, detective Phil Barbara (Gale Harold) is chosen to investigate the case and soon follows the trail of Chep and Fran.

text: let 's hope -- shall we ? -- that the 'true story ' by which all the queen 's men is allegedly `` inspired `` was a lot funnier and more deftly enacted than what 's been cobbled together onscreen .
translation: Mari kita berharap - tidak kah? - bahawa 'kisah sebenar' yang katanya dimohon oleh semua orang ratu itu "terinspirasi" lebih lucu dan dilakonkan dengan lebih cekap daripada apa yang telah disusun di layar.
back_translation: Let us hope - should we not? - that the 'true story' requested by all the queen's men will be "inspired" to be funnier and performed more skillfully than what has been scripted on screen.

text: when they come through , will is left with a decision .
translation: Apabila mereka tiba, Will ditinggalkan dengan satu keputusan.
back_translation: When they arrive, Will will be left with one decision.

text: imagine the cleanflicks version of 'love story , ' with ali macgraw 's profanities replaced by romance-novel platitudes .
translation: Bayangkan versi CleanFlicks filem 'Love Story' dengan kata-kata kesat Ali MacGraw digantikan dengan pepatah romantik novel.
back_translation: Imagine a CleanFlicks version of the movie 'Love Story' where Ali MacGraw's profane words are replaced with romantic novel quotes.

text: at first , it seems like a great place to hideout but soon they find themselves smack dab in the center of a family that gives a whole new definition to the word crazy and makes them think that maybe they 'd be better off with the mob .
translation: Pada mulanya, ia kelihatan seperti tempat yang bagus untuk bersembunyi tetapi tidak lama kemudian mereka mendapati diri mereka terjebak di tengah-tengah sebuah keluarga yang memberikan definisi baru kepada kata gila dan membuat mereka terfikir-fikir bahawa mungkin lebih baik berurusan dengan kumpulan mafia.
back_translation: Initially, it seemed like a good place to hide but before long, they found themselves trapped in the midst of a family that redefined the word crazy, making them think that it might be better to deal with a mafia group.

text: tom , a spaniard , is married to sylvie and lives a quiet but a bit boring life in the britanny countryside ( west of france ) .
translation: Tom, seorang Sepanyol, berkahwin dengan Sylvie dan tinggal dalam kehidupan yang tenang tetapi sedikit membosankan di pedesaan Brittany (barat Perancis).
back_translation: Tom, a Spanish man, marries Sylvie and lives a peaceful but slightly boring life in the countryside of Brittany (western France).

text: as jake and sam bicker throughout their trek across majestic india , they find kabir , a museum curator who possesses an artifact which he claims can produce the musical tone required to open the door to the temple .
translation: Semasa Jake dan Sam berbalah sepanjang perjalanan melintasi India yang megah, mereka bertemu dengan Kabir, seorang kurator muzium yang memiliki artifak yang kononnya boleh menghasilkan nada muzik yang diperlukan untuk membuka pintu ke kuil itu.
back_translation: During Jake and Sam's argument throughout their journey across majestic India, they met Kabir, a museum curator who possessed artifacts that supposedly could produce the musical notes needed to open the door to the temple.

text: yet , one rare pok & # 233 ; mon is n't safe without help from another - thus enters suicune , a . k . a . the north wind .
translation: Walau bagaimanapun, satu lagi pokémon yang jarang ditemui tidak selamat tanpa bantuan dari yang lain - maka muncul Suicune, juga dikenali sebagai angin utara.
back_translation: However, another rare Pokémon cannot survive without the help of others - thus emerges Suicune, also known as the north wind.

text: its plot and animation offer daytime tv serviceability , but little more .
translation: Jalan ceritanya dan animasinya menawarkan kebergunaan layanan TV siang hari, tetapi tidak lebih dari itu.
back_translation: The storyline and animation offer the usefulness of daytime TV services, but not more than that.

text: throughout the rest of the movie , the two never got along , whereas mitch is trying to investigate the whereabouts of a criminal who possesses a mythical `` big gun `` that has enough firepower to collapse a house , while trey just wants to be famous .
translation: Sepanjang sisa filem itu, kedua-duanya tidak pernah sehaluan, di mana Mitch cuba menyiasat di mana keberadaan seorang penjenayah yang memiliki senjata mitos "senjata besar" yang mempunyai kuasa tembakan yang mencukupi untuk menjatuhkan sebuah rumah, manakala Trey hanya mahu menjadi terkenal.
back_translation: Throughout the rest of the film, they never saw eye to eye, with Mitch trying to investigate the whereabouts of a criminal who possesses the mythical "big gun" weapon that has enough firepower to bring down a house, while Trey just wants to be famous.

text: under the queen 's wrathful gaze , tops are bottomed , tranny sailors seduce pirate captains , kings are mothers and cross-dressing femmes pack a wallop .
translation: Di bawah pandangan marah Ratu, si atas menjadi si bawah, pelaut trans menggoda kapten bajak laut, raja menjadi ibu dan wanita berpakaian lintas memberi kesan kuat.
back_translation: Under the angry gaze of the Queen, the top becomes the bottom, the sailor transforms into a pirate captain, the king becomes a mother, and the cross-dressed woman leaves a strong impression.

text: heidi , now living in tennessee - a married woman with kids - had always dreamt of a joyful reunion .
translation: Heidi, kini tinggal di Tennessee - seorang wanita berkahwin dengan anak-anak - sentiasa bermimpi tentang perjumpaan yang penuh kebahagiaan.
back_translation: Heidi, now residing in Tennessee - a married woman with children - always dreams of happy encounters.

text: the importance of being earnest , so thick with wit it plays like a reading from bartlett 's familiar quotations
translation: kepentingan untuk menjadi jujur, begitu kaya dengan kecerdikan hingga bermain seperti membaca kutipan-kutipan yang dikenal dari bartlett.
back_translation: The importance of being honest is so rich with wisdom that it plays out like reading well-known quotes from Bartlett.

text: mayhem and comedy explode as several members find price attractive while price struggles for his sanity .
translation: Keadaan kacau dan komedi merebak apabila beberapa ahli merasa harga yang menarik manakala harga bergelut untuk kewarasan.
back_translation: Chaos and comedy ensue when some members feel the attractive price while prices wrestle for sanity.

text: as commander-in-chief of this film , bigelow demonstrates a breadth of vision and an attention to detail that propels her into the upper echelons of the directing world .
translation: Sebagai panglima tertinggi filem ini, Bigelow menunjukkan cakupan visi dan perhatian terhadap butiran yang mendorongnya ke dalam golongan atasan dunia pengarah.
back_translation: As the film's top commander, Bigelow demonstrates a broad vision and attention to detail that elevates her into the ranks of top-tier directors worldwide.

text: the acting , costumes , music , cinematography and sound are all astounding given the production 's austere locales .
translation: Pentasannya, kostum, muzik, sinematografi, dan bunyi semuanya memukau mengingat lokasi produksi yang sederhana.
back_translation: The stage, costumes, music, cinematography, and sound were all stunning considering the simple production location.

text: meanwhile , wolverine heads north to investigate his past .
translation: Sementara itu, Wolverine menuju ke utara untuk menyelidiki masa lalunya.
back_translation: Meanwhile, Wolverine headed north to investigate his past.

text: the daughter mary yearns for a home where the books do n't always get sold .
translation: Anak perempuan Mary merindui sebuah rumah di mana buku-buku tidak sentiasa dijual.
back_translation: Mary's daughter yearns for a house where books are not always sold.

text: although rampant unemployment , alcoholism and domestic violence are the norm for many reservation inhabitants , rudy has largely escaped this cycle of despair .
translation: Walaupun pengangguran meluas, penagihan arak, dan keganasan domestik adalah perkara biasa bagi ramai penduduk kawasan larangan, Rudy secara besar-besaran terlepas dari kitaran putus asa ini.
back_translation: Despite widespread unemployment, alcoholism, and domestic violence being common issues for many residents of the restricted area, Rudy manages to escape from this cycle of despair on a large scale.

text: this is n't a terrible film by any means , but it 's also far from being a realized work .
translation: Ini bukan filem yang teruk sama sekali, tetapi juga jauh dari menjadi karya yang diwujudkan.
back_translation: This is not a bad movie at all, but it is also far from being a masterpiece.

text: jordan is a mom who is on a life long search for true faith as she tries to protect her only child from what she believes is injustice .
translation: Jordan adalah seorang ibu yang sedang dalam pencarian keimanan sejati sepanjang hidupnya sambil berusaha melindungi anak tunggalnya dari apa yang dia percayai sebagai ketidakadilan.
back_translation: Jordan is a mother who is on a lifelong quest for true faith while striving to protect her only child from what she believes is injustice.

text: a flawed film but an admirable one that tries to immerse us in a world of artistic abandon and political madness and very nearly succeeds .
translation: Filem yang tidak sempurna tetapi satu yang patut dipuji kerana cuba membenamkan kita dalam dunia derhaka artistik dan kegilaan politik dan hampir berjaya.
back_translation: A film that is imperfect but one that deserves praise for attempting to immerse us in the world of artistic rebellion and political madness and nearly succeeded.

text: `` cold mountain `` tells the story of a wounded confederate soldier named inman ( jude law ) who struggles on a perilous journey to get back home to cold mountain , n . c . as well as to ada ( nicole kidman ) , the woman he left behind before going off to fight in the civil war .
translation: "Gunung Sejuk" mengisahkan kisah seorang tentera konfederat yang terluka bernama Inman (Jude Law) yang berjuang dalam perjalanan berbahaya pulang ke rumah di Gunung Sejuk, N.C., dan juga untuk bertemu dengan Ada (Nicole Kidman), wanita yang ditinggalkannya sebelum pergi berperang dalam Perang Saudara.
back_translation: "Cold Mountain" tells the story of a wounded Confederate soldier named Inman (Jude Law) who struggles on a dangerous journey back home to Cold Mountain, N.C., and also to reunite with Ada (Nicole Kidman), the woman he left behind before going off to fight in the Civil War.

text: finally paula , who ran away from home and got pregnant , is now in a relationship she does n't want .
translation: Akhirnya Paula, yang melarikan diri dari rumah dan mengandung, kini berada dalam hubungan yang tidak diingininya.
back_translation: Finally, Paula, who ran away from home and got pregnant, is now in a relationship that she did not want.

text: but all is not smooth in the rockies , as their relationship accelerates - cultural differences , family issues , former loves and life-altering challenges threaten to shake things up .
translation: Namun tidak semuanya lancar di Rockies, semasa hubungan mereka semakin berkembang - perbezaan budaya, masalah keluarga, cinta lama, dan cabaran yang mengubah hidup mengancam untuk menggoncangkan keadaan.
back_translation: But not everything goes smoothly in the Rockies as their relationship grows - cultural differences, family issues, old loves, and life-changing challenges threaten to shake things up.

text: some of the most inventive silliness you are likely to witness in a movie theatre for some time .
translation: Beberapa kekonyolan yang paling inovatif yang mungkin anda saksikan di pawagam untuk sesuatu masa yang lama.
back_translation: Some of the most innovative silly antics that you may witness in the cinema for quite some time.

text: on the very day lizzy finds out she 's pregnant , she also finds herself the unwitting subject of a twisted television expos & # 233 ; perpetrated by the new world standard of unethical journalism : hardcore action news .
translation: Pada hari yang sama Lizzy mengetahui dia mengandung, dia juga mendapati dirinya menjadi subjek tanpa sengaja dalam pendedahan televisyen yang diperlihatkan oleh piawaian dunia baru dalam kewartawanan tidak bermoral: berita aksi tegar.
back_translation: On the same day Lizzy found out she was pregnant, she also discovered herself unwittingly becoming the subject of a television exposure shown by the new global standard in unethical journalism: hardcore news.

text: the movie is undone by a filmmaking methodology that 's just experimental enough to alienate the mainstream audience while ringing cliched to hardened indie-heads .
translation: Filem ini terganggu oleh metodologi pembuatan filem yang hanya eksperimen yang cukup untuk menjauhkan penonton mainstream sambil kedengaran klise kepada peminat filem indie yang tegar.
back_translation: This film is disrupted by a filmmaking methodology that only experiments enough to alienate mainstream audiences while sounding cliché to hardcore indie film fans.

text: harks back to a time when movies had more to do with imagination than market research .
translation: Mengingatkan pada zaman di mana filem lebih berkaitan dengan imaginasi daripada penyelidikan pasaran.
back_translation: Reminiscent of a time when movies were more about imagination than market research.

text: `` ox `` anderson , much greener , is also getting the same new task : protect the navajo codetalkers ( ben yahzee and charles whitehorse , respectively ) .
translation: "Ox" Anderson, yang jauh lebih hijau, juga mendapat tugasan baru yang sama: melindungi pengkomunikasi kod Navajo (Ben Yahzee dan Charles Whitehorse, masing-masing).
back_translation: "Ox" Anderson, who is much greener, also received the same new task: to protect the Navajo code talkers (Ben Yahzee and Charles Whitehorse, respectively).

text: but despite his looks of francis , he indeed is henry ( timothy bottoms ) , a man with a much better character than patricia ever could have dreamt of .
translation: Namun walaupun rupanya seperti Francis, dia memang adalah Henry (Timothy Bottoms), seorang lelaki dengan watak yang jauh lebih baik daripada yang pernah Patricia impikan.
back_translation: However, despite appearing like Francis, he is indeed Henry (Timothy Bottoms), a man with a character far better than Patricia ever dreamt of.

text: holy mad maniac in a mask , splat-man ! good old-fashioned slash-and-hack is back !
translation: pria gila suci dalam topeng, splat-man! Memotong dan menebas klasik kembali!
back_translation: The holy madman in a mask, splat-man! Cutting and slashing classic returns!

text: a weaving trail of twists and turns that left people unsettled for two generations until investigative persistence aided by modern technology brings justice for a young mother and her family some 28 years later .
translation: Jejak anyaman belit dan kerling yang menyebabkan orang terasa gementar selama dua generasi sehingga ketekunan penyiasatan dibantu oleh teknologi moden membawa keadilan untuk seorang ibu muda dan keluarganya kira-kira 28 tahun kemudian.
back_translation: The intertwined twists and glances that caused people to feel nervous for two generations until diligence in investigation assisted by modern technology brought justice for a young mother and her family about 28 years later.

text: clerick john preston ( bale ) is a top ranking government agent responsible for destroying those who resist the rules .
translation: Clerick John Preston (Bale) adalah seorang ejen kerajaan yang berpangkat tinggi bertanggungjawab untuk memusnahkan mereka yang memberontak terhadap peraturan.
back_translation: Clerick John Preston (Bale) is a high-ranking government agent responsible for eliminating those who rebel against the rules.

text: then one night when he 's up in his mom 's loft , a dead famous comedian appears who tells pauly to kill himself cause he 'll go down as a comedic genius who died before his time .
translation: Maka suatu malam ketika dia berada di loteng ibunya, seorang pelawak terkenal yang sudah meninggal muncul dan memberitahu Pauly agar membunuh dirinya sendiri kerana dia akan dihormati sebagai seorang jenius komedi yang meninggal sebelum masanya.
back_translation: So one night when he was in his mother's attic, a deceased famous comedian appeared and told Pauly to kill himself because he would be honored as a comedy genius who died before his time.

text: dantes is imprisoned on the island prison of chateau d'lf for 13 years , where he plots revenge against those who betrayed him .
translation: Dantes dipenjarakan di penjara pulau Chateau d'If selama 13 tahun, di mana dia merancang balas dendam terhadap orang-orang yang mengkhianatinya.
back_translation: Dantes was imprisoned in the island prison of Chateau d'If for 13 years, where he plotted revenge against those who betrayed him.

text: a woman who is again able to reach out for love .
translation: seorang wanita yang kembali mampu mencari cinta.
back_translation: A woman who is once again able to find love.

text: they have fallen on hard times and are now working jobs outside of show business to make ends meet .
translation: Mereka mengalami masa sukar dan kini bekerja di luar industri hiburan untuk mencukupi kehidupan.
back_translation: They went through tough times and now work outside the entertainment industry to make ends meet.

text: dejected , schmitz discovers robert stephens , a young , gay britney impersonator .
translation: Terkejut , Schmitz menemui Robert Stephens, seorang penyamar gay muda Britney.
back_translation: Surprised, Schmitz met Robert Stephens, a young gay Britney impersonator.

text: where as many films of this nature linger on the hard , the ugly , the blood , or just the stylistic ; empire focuses on the thinking , the love , and even the light-heartedness , as well as the violence .
translation: Di mana banyak filem seumpama ini mengetengahkan yang sukar, yang buruk, yang berdarah, atau hanya gaya; empire memberi tumpuan kepada pemikiran, cinta, dan juga kelucuan, serta keganasan.
back_translation: Whereas many films of this nature highlight the difficult, the bad, the bloody, or just style; the empire focuses on intellect, love, humor, and also violence.

text: she gets quite curious about this man , who is not like anyone she 's ever met before .
translation: Dia menjadi agak ingin tahu tentang lelaki ini, yang tidak seperti sesiapa yang pernah ditemuinya sebelum ini.
back_translation: He became quite curious about this man, who was unlike anyone he had ever met before.

text: all kinds of animals begin immigrating to the south , seeking more warm climates .
translation: Semua jenis haiwan mula berhijrah ke selatan, mencari iklim yang lebih panas.
back_translation: All kinds of animals are starting to migrate south, seeking a warmer climate.

text: there are many things that solid acting can do for a movie , but crafting something promising from a mediocre screenplay is not one of them .
translation: Ada banyak perkara yang boleh dilakukan oleh lakonan yang mantap bagi sebuah filem, tetapi mencipta sesuatu yang baik dari skrip sederhana bukanlah satu daripadanya.
back_translation: There are many things that can be done by great acting for a film, but creating something good from a simple script is not one of them.

text: it will make you think twice about what might be going on inside each trailer park you drive past -- even if it chiefly inspires you to drive a little faster .
translation: Ia akan membuat anda fikir dua kali tentang apa yang mungkin berlaku di dalam setiap taman kenderaan bergerak yang anda lalui - walaupun ia kebanyakannya mendorong anda untuk memandu sedikit lebih cepat.
back_translation: It will make you think twice about what might happen in every moving vehicle park you pass through - even though it mostly encourages you to drive a little faster.

text: the hand that eluded him his entire life , the one that held the cigarettes , and the hand he will never hold again .
translation: tangan yang mengelakinya sepanjang hidupnya, yang memegang rokok, dan tangan yang tidak akan pernah dia pegang lagi.
back_translation: The hands that avoided it all his life, the ones that held the cigarette, and the hands that he will never hold again.

text: shortly after the arrival of the rehab escapees , luck shoots and kills salo jr . and his wife .
translation: Sebentar selepas kedatangan orang-orang yang melarikan diri dari pusat pemulihan, Luck menembak dan membunuh Salo Jr. dan istrinya.
back_translation: Shortly after the arrival of the escapees from the recovery center, Luck shot and killed Salo Jr. and his wife.

text: a reasonably efficient mechanism , but it offers few surprises and finds its stars slumming in territory they should have avoided .
translation: Mekanisme yang agak cekap, tetapi ia tidak menawarkan banyak kejutan dan menjumpai bintang-bintangnya terjerumus ke dalam kawasan yang sepatutnya mereka elakkan.
back_translation: A fairly efficient mechanism, but it does not offer many surprises and finds its stars plummeting into areas they should have avoided.

text: in dogville trier works extensively with light , sound , score and music to obtain and heighten dramatic atmosphere .
translation: Di Dogville, Trier bekerja secara ekstensif dengan cahaya, bunyi, skor dan muzik untuk mendapatkan serta meningkatkan atmosfera dramatik.
back_translation: In Dogville, Trier extensively works with light, sound, score, and music to create and enhance the dramatic atmosphere.

text: by embracing the original series ' tacky elements and inserting just enough self-mockery to avoid smugness , the movie manages to fulfill basic expectations .
translation: Dengan merangkul elemen-elemen 'tacky' asal dan menyisipkan secukupnya pengolok-olokan diri untuk mengelakkan kesombongan, filem ini berjaya memenuhi harapan-harapan asas.
back_translation: By embracing the original 'tacky' elements and injecting just enough self-mockery to avoid arrogance, the film successfully meets basic expectations.

text: a young man ( keanu reeves ) plays a doctor caring for a man ( nicholson ) , who suffers a heart attack at the house of his young girlfriend 's mother ( keaton ) .
translation: Seorang pemuda (keanu reeves) memainkan watak seorang doktor yang merawat seorang lelaki (nicholson), yang mengalami serangan jantung di rumah ibu teman wanita mudanya (keaton).
back_translation: A young man (Keanu Reeves) plays the role of a doctor who treats a man (Nicholson) who suffers a heart attack at the home of his young woman friend's (Keaton) mother.

text: if you have an uneasy tummy , this movie is not for you !
translation: Jika anda mempunyai perut yang tidak selesa, filem ini bukan untuk anda!
back_translation: If you have an uncomfortable stomach, this movie is not for you!

text: it 's about issues most adults have to face in marriage and i think that 's what i liked about it -- the real issues tucked between the silly and crude storyline .
translation: Ia adalah mengenai isu-isu yang kebanyakan dewasa perlu hadapi dalam perkahwinan dan saya rasa itulah yang saya suka tentang itu - isu sebenar yang terselit di antara jalan cerita yang bodoh dan kasar.
back_translation: It is about the issues that most adults need to face in marriage, and I think that's what I like about it - the real issues hidden among the silly and rough storylines.

text: a diverse and astonishingly articulate cast of palestinian and israeli children .
translation: sekelompok kanak-kanak Palestin dan Israel yang pelbagai dan menakjubkan dalam berbicara.
back_translation: A diverse and amazing group of Palestinian and Israeli children were talking.

text: but , disaster strikes , when val goes temporarily blind , due to paranoia .
translation: Tetapi, bencana melanda apabila Val menjadi buta sementara akibat paranoia.
back_translation: However, disaster struck when Val became temporarily blind due to paranoia.

text: after a number of failed attempts , they finally arrive by boat and stumble across a german radar station .
translation: Selepas beberapa percubaan yang gagal, mereka akhirnya tiba dengan bot dan terserempak dengan sebuah stesen radar Jerman.
back_translation: After several failed attempts, they finally arrived with a boat and stumbled upon a German radar station.

text: patricia gets increasingly unhappy within the materialistic las vegas scene .
translation: Patricia semakin tidak bahagia dalam suasana materialistik di Las Vegas.
back_translation: Patricia is increasingly unhappy in the materialistic atmosphere of Las Vegas.

text: mr . deeds is not really a film as much as it is a loose collection of not-so-funny gags , scattered moments of lazy humor .
translation: "Mr. Deeds bukanlah filem yang benar-benar sebuah filem, sebaliknya ia adalah himpunan renyai gurauan yang tidak begitu lucu, dengan momen-momen humor yang malas."
back_translation: "Mr. Deeds is not truly a movie, instead it is a collection of scattered jokes that are not very funny, with lazy moments of humor."

text: the more he digs , the more evidence he finds that the overdose may have been attempted murder .
translation: Semakin dia menggali, semakin banyak bukti yang dia temui yang menunjukkan bahawa overdosis tersebut mungkin cubaan pembunuhan.
back_translation: The more he digs, the more evidence he finds indicating that the overdose may have been an attempted murder.

text: in prospect bay , a remote outpost on the south australian coast , two communities , the goonyas ( whites ) and the nungas ( blacks ) , come together on the one field they have in common , the football field .
translation: Di Prospect Bay, sebuah pos terpencil di pantai Selatan Australia, dua komuniti, goonyas (putih) dan nungas (hitam), berkumpul di satu padang yang mereka miliki bersama, padang bola sepak.
back_translation: In Prospect Bay, a remote post on the South Australian coast, two communities, goonyas (white) and nungas (black), gather on a field they co-own, a football field.

text: [ toback 's ] fondness for fancy split-screen , stuttering editing and pompous references to wittgenstein and kirkegaard . . . blends uneasily with the titillating material .
translation: Kecenderungan toback terhadap penyuntingan split-screen yang mahal, penyuntingan terhenti-henti, dan rujukan sombong kepada Wittgenstein dan Kirkegaard . . . tidak serasi dengan bahan yang merangsang.
back_translation: The tendency to lean towards expensive split-screen editing, sporadic editing, and pretentious references to Wittgenstein and Kierkegaard... do not align with stimulating content.

text: this is human comedy at its most amusing , interesting and confirming .
translation: Ini adalah komedi manusia pada tahap yang paling lucu, menarik, dan memastikan.
back_translation: This is human comedy at its funniest, intriguing, and surefire stage.

text: based on a true story , sergeant peter king ( kenneth cranham ) of the army dental corps , too old to fight , and private leslie cuthbertson ( leo bill ) , a trainee dental mechanic in the corps , are thrown together by their passionate desire to see active service .
translation: Berdasarkan kisah benar, sersan Peter King (Kenneth Cranham) dari badan pergigian tentera, terlalu tua untuk bertempur, dan rabun Leslie Cuthbertson (Leo Bill), seorang mekanik pergigian pelatih dalam badan tersebut, digabungkan oleh keinginan mereka yang bergelora untuk melihat perkhidmatan aktif.
back_translation: Based on a true story, Sergeant Peter King (Kenneth Cranham) from the military dental corps, is too old to fight, and myopic Leslie Cuthbertson (Leo Bill), a dental mechanic trainee in the corps, are brought together by their burning desire to see active service.

text: . . . tara reid plays a college journalist , but she looks like the six-time winner of the miss hawaiian tropic pageant , so i do n't know what she 's doing in here . . .
translation: . . . tara reid berperanan sebagai seorang wartawan kolej, tetapi dia kelihatan seperti pemenang enam kali pertandingan miss hawaiian tropic, jadi saya tidak tahu apa yang dia lakukan di sini . . .
back_translation: . . . tara reid plays the role of a college journalist, but she looks like a six-time winner of the Miss Hawaiian Tropic competition, so I don't know what she is doing here . . .

text: what he does n't know , however , is that syd has a tragic secret .
translation: Apa yang dia tidak tahu, bagaimanapun, adalah bahawa Syd mempunyai rahsia tragis.
back_translation: What he doesn't know, however, is that Syd has a tragic secret.

text: the fact is that the screen is most alive when it seems most likely that broomfield 's interviewees , or even himself , will not be for much longer .
translation: Kenyataannya ialah skrin paling hidup apabila kelihatan amat mungkin bahawa wawancara oleh broomfield, atau malah beliau sendiri, mungkin tidak akan berlangsung lama lagi.
back_translation: The fact is the screen was most lively when it appeared highly likely that the interview by Broomfield, or even himself, may not last much longer.

text: mike sullivan ( tom hanks ) works as a hit man for crime boss john rooney ( paul newman ) sullivan views rooney as a father figure .
translation: Mike Sullivan (Tom Hanks) bekerja sebagai pembunuh upahan untuk bos jenayah John Rooney (Paul Newman). Sullivan melihat Rooney sebagai figur bapa.
back_translation: Mike Sullivan (Tom Hanks) works as a hitman for crime boss John Rooney (Paul Newman). Sullivan sees Rooney as a father figure.

text: well cast and well directed - a powerful drama with enough sardonic wit to keep it from being maudlin .
translation: Penghayatan yang baik dan pengarahannya yang baik - sebuah drama yang kuat dengan cukup sindiran pedas untuk menjauhkannya dari menjadi sentimental.
back_translation: Good interpretation and good direction - a powerful drama with enough sharp satire to keep it from becoming sentimental.

text: dogville is shot exclusively in studio with a minimum of props once again allowing the actors ' maximum freedom and full exposure inspired by televised theatre of the 70s .
translation: Dogville ditembak secara eksklusif di studio dengan jumlah prop yang minima sekali lagi membolehkan pelakon-pelakon meraih kebebasan maksimum dan penampilan penuh terinspirasi oleh pentas televisyen tahun 70-an.
back_translation: Dogville was shot exclusively in a studio with minimal props once again allowing the actors to achieve maximum freedom and deliver performances inspired by 70's television stage.

text: both got stuck in a broken elevator , 17 level above ground .
translation: Kedua-dua terperangkap dalam lif yang rosak, 17 tingkat di atas tanah.
back_translation: Both trapped in a malfunctioning elevator, 17 levels above ground.

text: in addition to the overcooked , ham-fisted direction , which has all the actors reaching for the back row , the dialogue sounds like horrible poetry .
translation: Selain arahan yang terlalu berlebihan, kasar, yang membuat semua pelakon cuba untuk menarik perhatian penonton paling belakang, dialognya juga terdengar seperti puisi yang teruk.
back_translation: In addition to the excessive, rough directions that make all actors try to grab the attention of the farthest audience members, the dialogues also sound like terrible poetry.

text: daphne then must struggle with a snobby half-sister and with following the social obligations expected of her while maintaining her own identity .
translation: Daphne kemudiannya harus berhadapan dengan seorang kakak tiri sombong dan mematuhi kewajipan sosial yang diharapkan daripadanya sambil memelihara identitinya sendiri.
back_translation: Daphne then had to deal with an arrogant stepsibling and fulfill the social obligations expected of her while maintaining her own identity.

text: a picture that extols the virtues of comradeship and community in a spunky , spirited fashion .
translation: sebuah gambar yang memuji kelebihan persaudaraan dan komuniti dengan gaya yang bersemangat dan penuh semangat.
back_translation: An image that praises the advantages of brotherhood and community with an enthusiastic and spirited style.

text: godard has never made a more sheerly beautiful film than this unexpectedly moving meditation on love , history , memory , resistance and artistic transcendence .
translation: Godard tidak pernah membuat filem yang lebih indah daripada ini, yang secara mengejutkan memikat dengan tumpuan pada cinta, sejarah, ingatan, perlawanan, dan keagungan seni.
back_translation: Godard has never made a more beautiful film than this, which is surprisingly captivating with its focus on love, history, memories, resistance, and the glory of art.

text: set in 1986 when best friends harry ( olsen ) and lloyd ( richardson ) were teenagers , this is the madcap comic tale of their attempt to get out of the `` special needs `` department and into regular high school life .
translation: Ditetapkan pada tahun 1986 ketika sahabat karib Harry (Olsen) dan Lloyd (Richardson) masih remaja, ini adalah kisah komedi gila-gilaan tentang upaya mereka untuk keluar dari departemen "keperluan khas" dan hidup seperti pelajar sekolah menengah biasa.
back_translation: Set in 1986 when best friends Harry (Olsen) and Lloyd (Richardson) were still teenagers, this is a crazy comedy about their efforts to break out of the "special needs" department and live like regular high school students.

text: this is snappy , frothy screwball comedy awash in french understatement .
translation: Ini adalah komedi yang penuh dengan kelucuan, ringan, dan penuh dengan gaya bercakap yang lebih sopan dalam gaya Perancis.
back_translation: This is a comedy full of humor, lightness, and with a more polite speaking style in the French manner.

text: cuts right through the b . s . giving a big middle-fingered `` shut up `` to those who talk up what is nothing more than two guys beating the hell outta one another .
translation: Menelanjangkan kebenaran itu, memberikan jari tengah besar “diamlah” kepada mereka yang merayu apa yang sebenarnya hanya dua orang lelaki saling membelasah.
back_translation: Exposing the truth, giving a big middle finger "shut up" to those who romanticize what is actually just two men beating each other up.

text: their life , though unusual , is satisfying until one day , a man named barry kolker ( that her mother refers to at first as `` the goat man `` ) comes into their lives , and ingrid falls madly in love with him , only to have her heart broken , and her life ruined .
translation: Hidup mereka, walaupun tidak biasa, memuaskan sehinggalah suatu hari, seorang lelaki bernama Barry Kolker (yang ibunya pertama kali sebut sebagai "lelaki kambing") muncul dalam kehidupan mereka, dan Ingrid jatuh cinta padanya dengan gila, hanya untuk hatinya remuk dan hidupnya hancur.
back_translation: Their life, though not ordinary, was satisfying until one day, a man named Barry Kolker (whom his mother first referred to as the "goat man") appeared in their lives, and Ingrid fell madly in love with him, only for her heart to break and her life to shatter.

text: romantic comedy and dogme 95 filmmaking may seem odd bedfellows , but they turn out to be delightfully compatible here .
translation: Komedi romantis dan pembikinan filem Dogme 95 mungkin kelihatan aneh, tetapi ia ternyata sangat serasi di sini.
back_translation: Romantic comedy and the making of Dogme 95 films may seem strange, but they actually work very well here.

text: all in all , the count of monte cristo is okay , but it is surely no classic , like the novel upon which it is based .
translation: Secara keseluruhan, "The Count of Monte Cristo" adalah okay, tetapi ia tentu bukan klasik, seperti novel asalnya.
back_translation: Overall, "The Count of Monte Cristo" is okay, but it certainly isn't a classic like the original novel.

text: now he must battle the courts to get his children back .
translation: Sekarang dia harus berperang di mahkamah untuk mendapatkan anak-anaknya kembali.
back_translation: Now he has to fight in court to get his children back.

text: an enjoyably half-wit remake of the venerable italian comedy big deal on madonna street .
translation: satu penjelmaan yang menyeronokkan tetapi separuh bodoh dari filem komedi berwibawa Itali, Big Deal on Madonna Street.
back_translation: An enjoyable yet somewhat silly portrayal from the prestigious Italian comedy film, Big Deal on Madonna Street.

text: slim , otis , frank and alex ( three boys and a girl ) form a group of snowboard and skate young bank robbers .
translation: Slim, Otis, Frank, dan Alex (tiga lelaki dan seorang perempuan) membentuk kumpulan penjahat muda yang bermain snowboard dan skateboard.

text: 'christian bale 's quinn [ is ] a leather clad grunge-pirate with a hairdo like gandalf in a wind-tunnel and a simply astounding cor-blimey-luv-a-duck cockney accent . '
translation: 'Quinn Christian Bale adalah seorang gergasi pelaut grunge bertompok kulit dengan gaya rambut seperti Gandalf dalam terowong angin dan aksen cockney cor-blimey-luv-a-duck yang sungguh menakjubkan.'
back_translation: 'Quinn Christian Bale is a giant grunge sailor with a cluster of skin and hair style similar to Gandalf in the wind tunnel and a truly amazing cockney accent cor-blimey-luv-a-duck.'

text: this dramatically shaky contest of wills only reiterates the old hollywood saw : evil is interesting and good is boring .
translation: pertandingan bergolak ini secara dramatik hanya mengulangi kata-kata lama Hollywood: jahat menarik dan baik membosankan.
back_translation: This tumultuous competition dramatically echoes the old Hollywood adage: villains are captivating and heroes are dull.

text: a straight-shooting family film which awards animals the respect they 've rarely been given .
translation: filem keluarga yang jujur yang memberikan penghargaan kepada haiwan yang jarang diberi.
back_translation: a heartfelt family movie that honors seldom appreciated animals.

text: shot independently over a 24-hour period , the film is first a witness to the fall of the twin towers , as a line of fire and a buckle in the armature signal imminent collapse .
translation: Ditembak secara independen dalam tempoh 24 jam, filem ini pertama kali menjadi saksi kepada runtuhnya menara kembar, sebagaimana titisan api dan belitan dalam rangka sinyal runtuhan yang hampir pasti.
back_translation: Shot independently within 24 hours, this film first witnessed the collapse of the twin towers, as flashes of fire and swirls marked the impending collapse signal.

text: one minute , you think you 're watching a serious actioner ; the next , it 's as though clips from the pink panther strikes again and/or sailor moon have been spliced in .
translation: Satu minit, anda fikir anda sedang menonton filem aksi yang serius; minit seterusnya, seolah-olah klip dari filem The Pink Panther Strikes Again dan/atau Sailor Moon telah digabung bersama.
back_translation: One minute, you think you're watching a serious action movie; the next minute, it's as if clips from The Pink Panther Strikes Again and/or Sailor Moon have been combined together.

text: how would you feel if when you woke , the nightmare had just begun ?
translation: Bagaimana perasaan anda jika apabila anda terjaga, mimpi ngeri baru bermula?
back_translation: How would you feel if when you wake up, a nightmare begins?

text: oh come on . like you could n't smell this turkey rotting from miles away .
translation: Oh datang lah. Seperti kamu tidak boleh mencium ayam kalkun ini reput dari jauh.
back_translation: Oh come on. it's like you can't even smell this turkey chicken from afar.

text: despite a well-placed sense of historical outrage , fence is n't one-sided .
translation: Walaupun ada rasa marah sejarah yang tepat, pagar tidak satu pihak.
back_translation: Although there is a feeling of righteous anger, history is not one-sided.

text: as a thoughtful and unflinching examination of an alternative lifestyle , sex with strangers is a success .
translation: Sebagai pemeriksaan yang berfikir dan tidak gentar terhadap gaya hidup alternatif, seks dengan orang asing adalah kejayaan.
back_translation: As an examiner who is open-minded and unafraid of alternative lifestyles, having sex with strangers is a triumph.

text: for 7 years he has watched over the holy fire , forsaking his wife , family and every earthly pleasure .
translation: Selama 7 tahun dia telah menjaga api suci, meninggalkan isteri, keluarga, dan setiap kesenangan duniawi.
back_translation: For 7 years he has been keeping the sacred flame, leaving his wife, family, and every worldly pleasure.

text: the urban landscapes are detailed down to the signs on the kiosks , and the color palette , with lots of somber blues and pinks , is dreamy and evocative .
translation: Lanskap bandar yang terperinci sehingga tanda-tanda di kios-kios, dan palet warna, dengan banyak biru dan merah jambu yang suram, adalah berimpian dan membangkitkan perasaan.
back_translation: Detailed urban landscape up to the signs in the kiosks, and color palettes, with plenty of blue and dusky pink, are dreamy and evocative.

text: the story takes place over the course of a day , when the couples get together for an afternoon of dining , drinking , and hot tubbing .
translation: Cerita tersebut berlaku sepanjang satu hari, ketika pasangan berkumpul bersama untuk makan tengahari, minum, dan mandi air panas.
back_translation: The story took place throughout one day when the couple gathered together to have lunch, drink, and take a hot bath.

text: the author 's devotees will probably find it fascinating ; others may find it baffling .
translation: Peminat-peminat penulis kemungkinan akan mendapatinya menarik; orang lain mungkin akan teragak-agak.
back_translation: Fans of the writer may find it interesting; others may be hesitant.

text: like the best war movies -- and like martial literature going back to the iliad -- it balances the dreadful , unassuageable cruelty of warfare and the valor and decency of those who fight .
translation: Suka filem perang terbaik - dan seperti karya-karya sastra bela diri yang terdahulu seperti Iliad - ia seimbang antara kekejaman peperangan yang menakutkan dan tidak dapat diredakan dan keberanian serta kebaikan orang-orang yang bertempur.
back_translation: I love the best war films - and like previous martial arts literary works such as the Iliad - it strikes a balance between the terrifying and uncontrollable brutality of war and the courage and kindness of those who fight.

text: a little girl 's search for her biological mother who had abandoned her as a new born baby is brought out poignantly in 'kannathil muthamittal ' .
translation: Usaha seorang gadis kecil dalam mencari ibunya yang biologinya telah meninggalkannya sebagai bayi baru lahir didokumentasikan dengan sangat menyentuh dalam filem 'Kannathil Muthamittal'.
back_translation: A little girl's efforts to search for her biological mother who abandoned her as a newborn is documented very touchingly in the film 'Kannathil Muthamittal'.

text: he also meets yuki , a 9-year-old guitar prodigy , who could help dewey win a `` battle of the bands `` competition , which would solve his financial problems and put him back in the spotlight .
translation: Dia juga bertemu dengan Yuki, seorang ajaib gitar berusia 9 tahun, yang boleh membantu Dewey memenangi pertandingan "pertarungan kumpulan muzik", yang akan menyelesaikan masalah kewangan beliau dan mengembalikannya ke dalam fokus.
back_translation: He also met Yuki, a 9-year-old magical guitarist, who could help Dewey win the "music group battle" competition, which would solve his financial problems and bring him back into focus.

translation: Ethan Fernier terobsesi dengan filem seram pengarah filem B, Winston Korman.

text: his father eventually becomes very ill and passes away , the future of rammoth lays in ancanar 's hands .
translation: ayahnya akhirnya jatuh sakit dan meninggal, masa depan Rammoth bergantung kepada Ancanar.

text: eastwood is an icon of moviemaking , one of the best actors , directors and producers around , responsible for some excellent work . but even a hero can stumble sometimes .
translation: Eastwood adalah ikon pembuatan filem, salah seorang pelakon, pengarah, dan penerbit terbaik di sekeliling, bertanggungjawab atas beberapa hasil kerja yang cemerlang. Tetapi walaupun seorang wira juga boleh tersandung pada sesetengah masa.
back_translation: Eastwood is a film-making icon, one of the best actors, directors, and producers around, responsible for some excellent work. But even a hero can stumble at times.

text: imprisoned and depressed pete 's letter gives eagle rekindled spirit .
translation: Surat dari Pete yang dipenjarakan dan tertekan memberi semangat baru kepada burung helang.
back_translation: A letter from Pete who is imprisoned and oppressed gives new inspiration to the eagle.

text: in this film , aussie david caesar channels the not-quite-dead career of guy ritchie .
translation: Dalam filem ini, aussie david caesar mengalirkan kerjaya yang hampir tidak mati Guy Ritchie.
back_translation: In this movie, aussie david caesar channels a career that is almost dead Guy Ritchie.

text: [ demme ] creates a film that is both traditional , in keeping with its source material , and new millennium hip .
translation: Demme mencipta filem yang sama ada tradisional, sejajar dengan bahan sumbernya, dan hip era baru milenium.
back_translation: Demme creates films that are both traditional, in line with its source material, and hip for the new millennium era.

text: a sweet film about two gentle souls - there is a genuine caring between them that feels like watching old friends .
translation: Filem yang manis tentang dua jiwa yang lembut - terdapat perasaan kasih sayang yang jujur di antara mereka yang terasa seperti menonton kawan lama.
back_translation: A sweet film about two gentle souls - there is a genuine love between them that feels like watching old friends.

text: . . . either you 're willing to go with this claustrophobic concept or you 're not .
translation: . . . sama ada anda bersedia menerima konsep klaustrofobia ini atau tidak.
back_translation: ... whether you are ready to accept this concept of claustrophobia or not.

text: the film starts in 1846 and ends in 1863 with the draft riots .
translation: Filem bermula pada tahun 1846 dan berakhir pada tahun 1863 dengan rusuhan wajib tentera.
back_translation: The film begins in 1846 and ends in 1863 with mandatory military disturbances.

text: a solid , psychological action film from hong kong .
translation: filem aksi psikologi yang mantap dari hong kong.
back_translation: Solid psychological action film from Hong Kong.

text: birthday girl is an amusing joy ride , with some surprisingly violent moments .
translation: Birthday girl adalah suka duka yang menghiburkan, dengan beberapa momen kekerasan yang mengejutkan.
back_translation: Birthday girl is an entertaining mix of joy and sorrow, with some surprising moments of violence.

text: considering the harsh locations and demanding stunts , this must have been a difficult shoot , but the movie proves rough going for the audience as well .
translation: Mengambil kira lokasi yang sukar dan aksi berbahaya, penggambaran filem ini pastinya sukar, tetapi filem ini juga membuktikan menantang untuk penonton.
back_translation: Taking into account the difficult locations and dangerous actions, the filming of this movie is certainly challenging, but it also proves to be engaging for the audience.

text: parts of the film feel a bit too much like an infomercial for ram dass 's latest book aimed at the boomer demographic . but mostly it 's a work that , with humor , warmth , and intelligence , captures a life interestingly lived .
translation: Sebahagian filem itu terasa agak seperti iklan terselindung untuk buku terbaru Ram Dass yang ditujukan kepada demografi baby boomer. Tetapi secara keseluruhan, ia adalah sebuah karya yang, dengan humor, kehangatan, dan kecerdasan, merakamkan sebuah kehidupan yang dijalani dengan menarik.
back_translation: Some parts of the movie feel somewhat like a hidden advertisement for Ram Dass' latest book geared towards the baby boomer demographic. But overall, it is a work that, with humor, warmth, and intelligence, captures a life lived interestingly.

text: final report : good , yes ; great , no .
translation: laporan akhir : baik, ya; hebat, tidak.
back_translation: final report: good, yes; great, no.

text: leggy zeta-jones is so hot in the 'all that jazz ' number , she 's flammable . and zellweger defines delicious .
translation: Leggy Zeta-Jones sangat seksi dalam lagu 'All That Jazz', dia begitu mengasyikkan. dan Zellweger mentakrifkan lazat.
back_translation: Leggy Zeta-Jones is very sexy in the song 'All That Jazz', she is so captivating. and Zellweger defines delicious.

text: despite some gulps the film is a fuzzy huggy .
translation: Walaupun ada beberapa kelemahan, filem ini bersifat hangat.
