text: filmed in a california maximum security prison , the series is a look into the world of street and prison gangs , which ask is there a way out for these men who have dedicated their lives to gangs .
translation: Difilmkan di sebuah penjara berkeamanan maksimum di California, siri ini merungkai dunia kumpulan gangster jalanan dan penjara, yang bertanya adakah jalan keluar bagi lelaki-lelaki ini yang telah mengabdikan hidup mereka kepada kumpulan-kumpulan gangster.
back_translation: Filmed in a maximum security prison in California, this series unravels the world of street gang groups and prisons, asking if there is a way out for these men who have devoted their lives to these gang groups.

text: this is a film brimming with detail and nuance and one that speaks volumes about the ability of the human spirit to find solace in events that could easily crush it forever .
translation: Filem ini penuh dengan butiran dan nuansa serta mengungkapkan banyak tentang keupayaan semangat manusia untuk mencari ketenangan dalam peristiwa yang boleh dengan mudah menghancurkannya selamanya.
back_translation: This film is full of details and nuances and reveals a lot about the human spirit's ability to seek peace in events that could easily destroy it forever.

text: what separates miyazaki 's animation from everyone else 's is the way he imagines his worlds .
translation: Apa yang membezakan animasi Miyazaki daripada yang lain ialah cara beliau membayangkan dunianya.
back_translation: What sets Miyazaki's animations apart from others is the way he imagines his world.

text: a movie that will surely be profane , politically charged music to the ears of cho 's fans .
translation: filem yang pasti akan melanggar kesucian, diperangkap politik yang akan menjadi muzik sebagai telinga peminat-peminat cho.
back_translation: A film that is sure to break boundaries, trapped in politics that will turn into music for Cho's fans' ears.

text: nicks , seemingly uncertain what 's going to make people laugh , runs the gamut from stale parody to raunchy sex gags to formula romantic comedy .
translation: Nicks, kelihatan tidak pasti apa yang akan membuat orang ketawa, merangkumi dari parodi basi hingga lelucon seks cabul hingga komedi romantis berformula.
back_translation: Nicks, it's unclear what will make people laugh, ranging from stale parodies to raunchy sex jokes to formulaic romantic comedies.

text: the backyard follows several backyard wrestlers in different countries as they pursue their dream to become professional wrestlers .
translation: Belakang rumah mengikuti beberapa pegulat belakang rumah di negara yang berbeza ketika mereka mengejar impian untuk menjadi pegulat profesional.
back_translation: Behind the house follows several wrestlers behind the house from different countries as they pursue the dream of becoming professional wrestlers.

text: serious and conservative , jamie ( moore ) was as far from cool as she could possibly be , and did n't care .
translation: Serius dan konservatif, Jamie (Moore) jauh sekali dari menjadi keren dan dia tidak peduli.
back_translation: Serious and conservative, Jamie (Moore) is far from being cool, and she doesn't care.

text: this action-thriller/dark comedy is one of the most repellent things to pop up in a cinematic year already littered with celluloid garbage .
translation: Filem aksi-thriller/komedi gelap ini adalah salah satu perkara yang paling menjijikkan yang muncul dalam satu tahun sinematik yang sudah penuh dengan sampah seluloid.
back_translation: This dark comedy-action thriller film is one of the most disgusting things to emerge in a cinematic year that is already filled with celluloid trash.

text: feels like six different movies fighting each other for attention .
translation: Rasanya seperti enam filem berbeza bertarung untuk mendapat perhatian.
back_translation: It feels like six different movies fighting for attention.

text: after pulling off an amazing gold bullion heist from a heavily guarded palazzo in venice , italy , charlie and his gang -- inside man steve ( norton ) , computer genius lyle ( green ) , wheelman handsome rob ( statham ) , explosives expert left-ear ( mos def ) and veteran safecracker john bridger ( sutherland ) - ca n't believe when one of them turns out to be a double-crosser .
translation: Selepas melakukan rompakan emas bullion yang mengagumkan dari palazzo yang sangat dijaga di Venice, Itali, Charlie dan kumpulannya - pembantu dalaman Steve (Norton), ahli komputer Lyle (Green), pemandu kereta Handsome Rob (Statham), pakar letupan Left-Ear (Mos Def), dan pakar membuka keselamatan veteran John Bridger (Sutherland) - tidak boleh percaya apabila salah seorang dari mereka rupanya telah berkhianat.
back_translation: After pulling off a spectacular bullion heist from a heavily guarded palazzo in Venice, Italy, Charlie and his crew - inside man Steve (Norton), computer whiz Lyle (Green), getaway driver Handsome Rob (Statham), explosives expert Left-Ear (Mos Def), and veteran safecracker John Bridger (Sutherland) - could not believe it when one of them turned out to be a traitor.

text: chilling , well-acted , and finely directed : david jacobson 's dahmer .
translation: Menyeronokkan, lakonan yang baik, dan diarah dengan baik: Dahmer oleh David Jacobson.
back_translation: Enjoyable, well-acted, and well-directed: Dahmer by David Jacobson.

text: soon jonah embarks on an adventure that leads him into the belly of a whale , and to the heart of nineveh for a hilarious showdown .
translation: Tidak lama kemudian, Jonah memulakan pengembaraan yang membawanya ke dalam perut ikan paus, dan ke hati Nineveh untuk pertarungan lucu.
back_translation: Not long after, Jonah began a journey that led him into the belly of a whale, and to the heart of Nineveh for a humorous showdown.

text: this documentary by stacy peralta makes a convincing case on behalf of skateboarding , of all things , as a catalyst for this change , and for some delinquent youths in a derelict los angeles neighborhood as its agents .
translation: Dokumentari ini oleh Stacy Peralta memberikan hujah yang meyakinkan bagi pihak skateboarding, daripada semua perkara, sebagai pemangkin bagi perubahan ini, dan bagi beberapa belia nakal di kawasan Los Angeles yang terbiar sebagai agennya.
back_translation: This documentary by Stacy Peralta provides compelling arguments for skateboarding, of all things, as a catalyst for change, and for some wayward youth in the neglected areas of Los Angeles to serve as its agents.

text: scotland looks wonderful , the fans are often funny fanatics , the showdown sure beats a bad day of golf .
translation: Scotland kelihatan indah, peminat-peminatnya sering kali kelihatan gila-gila, perlawanan pasti lebih baik daripada hari golf yang buruk.
back_translation: Scotland looks beautiful, its fans often appear crazy, the match surely better than a bad day of golf.

text: the face of the serpent is an action-thriller with strong political undertones of local government corruption .
translation: Wajah si ular adalah sebuah filem aksi-thriller dengan nuansa politik yang kuat berkaitan dengan rasuah dalam pemerintahan tempatan.

text: nayomi and lisa go to do the hit but everything goes terribly wrong .
translation: Nayomi dan Lisa pergi untuk melakukan serangan tetapi segala-galanya menjadi sangat teruk.
back_translation: Nayomi and Lisa went to carry out the attack but everything turned out really bad.

text: a pointed , often tender , examination of the pros and cons of unconditional love and familial duties .
translation: satu pemeriksaan yang tajam, seringkali lembut, mengenai kebaikan dan keburukan cinta tanpa syarat dan tugas keluarga.
back_translation: A sharp, often gentle examination of the goodness and flaws of unconditional love and family duties.

text: a movie that 's full of deft , off-center observations about the world of filmmaking .
translation: Filem yang penuh dengan pemerhatian yang bijak dan tidak lazim mengenai dunia pembikinan filem.
back_translation: A film that is filled with insightful and unusual observations about the world of filmmaking.

text: so purely enjoyable that you might not even notice it 's a fairly straightforward remake of hollywood comedies such as father of the bride .
translation: Sangat seronok sehingga anda mungkin tidak sedar bahawa ia adalah pembuatan semula yang agak mudah dari komedi Hollywood seperti Father of the Bride.
back_translation: So much fun that you might not realize it is a fairly easy remake of Hollywood comedies like Father of the Bride.

text: they all died 48 hours after logging on to a site named feardotcom . com .
translation: Mereka semua meninggal 48 jam setelah log masuk ke laman web bernama feardotcom.com.

text: during his tenure , he was responsible for such revolutionary films as the godfather , rosemary 's baby , love story , the odd couple , harold and maude and chinatown .
translation: Semasa tempoh perkhidmatannya, beliau bertanggungjawab bagi filem-filem revolusioner seperti The Godfather, Rosemary's Baby, Love Story, The Odd Couple, Harold and Maude, dan Chinatown.
back_translation: During his tenure, he was responsible for revolutionary films such as The Godfather, Rosemary's Baby, Love Story, The Odd Couple, Harold and Maude, and Chinatown.

text: an impressively coordinated enterprise that lasts three hours , manages a large cast , and covers a period of 30-odd years while successfully unfolding as a series of scenes from the life of a single character .
translation: Suatu usaha yang terkoordinasi dengan baik yang berlangsung selama tiga jam, mengurus kumpulan pelakon yang besar, dan merangkumi tempoh lebih dari 30 tahun sambil berjaya mengungkapkan sebagai siri babak dalam kehidupan seorang watak tunggal.
back_translation: A well-coordinated effort that lasts for three hours, managing a large group of actors, and spanning over 30 years while successfully unfolding as a series of scenes in the life of a single character.

text: a comic tale about the end of the summer in ireland , 2001 , where 5 boys and 5 girls are out to end the summer with a bang before heading back to school to sit the final exams , only to be thwarted by comic mishappenings .
translation: Satu kisah komik mengenai akhir musim panas di Ireland, 2001, di mana 5 orang anak lelaki dan 5 orang anak perempuan berusaha mengakhiri musim panas dengan penuh semangat sebelum kembali ke sekolah untuk menghadapi peperiksaan akhir, tetapi terhalang oleh kejadian lucu yang berlaku.
back_translation: A comic story about the end of summer in Ireland, 2001, where 5 boys and 5 girls try to end the summer enthusiastically before returning to school to face their final exams, but are hindered by funny incidents that occur.

text: a summary of the plot does n't quite do justice to the awfulness of the movie , for that comes through all too painfully in the execution .
translation: Ringkasan plot tidaklah cukup adil untuk menjelaskan betapa teruknya filem ini, kerana keburukan itu begitu nyata dalam pelaksanaannya.
back_translation: A plot summary is not fair enough to explain how bad this movie is, because its flaws are so evident in its execution.

text: secrets of robert 's past start to emerge as he unleashes his awesome martial arts fighting abilities to defend himself and his wife .

text: it 's the extra layer that makes this one , the movie 's understanding of how disillusion and inner compromise can gradually separate a young artist from his divine spark .

text: lazy , miserable and smug . this is one of the biggest disappointments of the year .

text: a supernatural mystery that does n't know whether it wants to be a suspenseful horror movie or a weepy melodrama . it ends up being neither , and fails at both endeavors .

back_translation: A paranormal mystery that is unsure whether it wants to be a gripping horror film or a heart-wrenching melodrama. Ultimately, it turns out to be nothing special and fails in both attempts.

text: my wife is an actress has its moments in looking at the comic effects of jealousy . in the end , though , it is only mildly amusing when it could have been so much more .

text: she faces exams , completion of her thesis , and a competitive interview process , all of which is compounded when a police detective , wade handler ( bratt ) , begins investigating the two year-old disappearance of her boyfriend , embry langan ( hunnam ) , a young man whose memory haunts and obsesses her .
translation: Dia menghadapi peperiksaan, penyiapan tesis, dan proses temuduga yang kompetitif, yang semuanya menjadi lebih rumit apabila seorang detektif polis, Wade Handler (Bratt), mula menyiasat kehilangan lelaki kekasihnya dua tahun yang lalu, Embry Langan (Hunnam), seorang lelaki muda yang kenangan dan kisahnya menghantuinya.
back_translation: He faces exams, thesis preparation, and a competitive interview process, all of which become more complicated when a police detective, Wade Handler (Bratt), begins investigating the disappearance of his lover's ex-boyfriend two years ago, Embry Langan (Hunnam), a young man whose memories and story haunt him.

text: best enjoyed as a work of fiction inspired by real-life events . those seeking a definitive account of eisenstein 's life would do better elsewhere .

text: fresh from a series of emotional traumas , allison is distrustful and not so easily rescued , though over a period of two days she comes to regard her idealization of dylan as a last opportunity for security and happiness .

back_translation: Having just experienced some emotional trauma, Allison is not easily trusted and not easily rescued, although within two days she began to see idealization of Dylan as a last chance for safety and happiness.

text: sam decker ( dolph lundgren ) is giving up .

back_translation: Now he is a full-time tattoo artist, he met a young student named Sienna (de Rossi) who secretly works as a go-go dancer in a bar.

text: kudos to director doug liman for injecting textbook spy fare with slick intelligence and a truckload of tension .
translation: Terbaik untuk pengarah Doug Liman kerana menyuntikkan elemen filem spionaj klasik dengan kecerdasan yang licin dan banyak ketegangan.
back_translation: Great for director Doug Liman for injecting classic espionage film elements with slick intelligence and plenty of tension.

text: full of bland hotels , highways , parking lots , with some glimpses of nature and family warmth , time out is a discreet moan of despair about entrapment in the maze of modern life .
translation: Penuh dengan hotel yang hambar, lebuh raya, tempat letak kereta, dengan sedikit capaian kepada alam semula jadi dan kehangatan keluarga, Time Out adalah ratapan rahsia tentang rasa putus asa terperangkap dalam labirin kehidupan moden.
back_translation: Full of bland hotels, highways, parking spaces, with little access to nature and family warmth, Time Out is a secret lament about the feeling of desperation trapped in the labyrinth of modern life.

text: leigh is one of the rare directors who feels acting is the heart and soul of cinema . he allows his cast members to make creative contributions to the story and dialogue . this method almost never fails him , and it works superbly here .
translation: Leigh adalah salah seorang pengarah jarang yang merasakan lakonan adalah jantung dan jiwa sinema. Dia membenarkan ahli lakonannya membuat sumbangan kreatif kepada cerita dan dialog. Kaedah ini hampir tidak pernah gagal baginya, dan ia berfungsi dengan cemerlang di sini.
back_translation: Leigh is one of the few directors who believes that acting is the heart and soul of cinema. He allows his actors to make creative contributions to the story and dialogue. This method hardly ever fails for him, and it works brilliantly here.

text: the kind of movie that comes along only occasionally , one so unconventional , gutsy and perfectly executed it takes your breath away .
translation: Jenis filem yang hanya muncul sekali sekala, begitu tidak konvensional, berani dan dilaksanakan dengan sempurna sehingga membuat anda terkesima.
back_translation: The type of film that only appears once in a while, so unconventional, daring, and executed perfectly that it leaves you in awe.

text: it 's a fractured story about a naive , impulsive , but above all else passionate man , one who will do anything for his family , who will stop at nothing to live his dream .
translation: Ini adalah kisah yang tergugat tentang seorang lelaki yang naif, beremosi, tetapi di atas segalanya penuh dengan semangat, seseorang yang akan melakukan apa saja untuk keluarganya, yang tidak akan berhenti apa-apa untuk menghidupkan impian hidupnya.
back_translation: This is an intriguing story about a naive, emotional man, but above all full of spirit, someone who will do anything for his family, who will stop at nothing to bring his life dream to reality.

text: for all its random chaos , divine secrets works because of the power of its convictions -- and its cast .
translation: Walaupun penuh dengan kekacauan rawak, rahsia Ilahi berjaya kerana kuasa keyakinannya - dan pelakon-pelakonnya.
back_translation: Despite being filled with random chaos, the divine secret succeeds because of the power of its faith - and its actors.

text: a boy named frank ( pidgeon ) and his sister caroline ( podbielska ) find themselves in attic town after investigating strange noises coming from the house top .
translation: Seorang budak lelaki bernama Frank (Pidgeon) dan adik perempuannya Caroline (Podbielska) mendapati diri mereka di bandar loteng setelah menyiasat bunyi aneh yang datang dari atas rumah.
back_translation: A boy named Frank (Pidgeon) and his sister Caroline (Podbielska) found themselves in the attic of the town after investigating strange sounds coming from the roof of the house.

text: it may . . . work as a jaunt down memory lane for teens and young adults who grew up on televised scooby-doo shows or reruns .

back_translation: It may serve as a nostalgic journey for teenagers and young people who grew up watching Scooby-Doo on television or reruns.

text: each spring in the little port town of beaufort , north carolina , landon carter remembers his senior year at beaufort high and jamie sullivan , the girl who changed his life .
translation: Setiap musim bunga di bandar kecil pelabuhan Beaufort, North Carolina, Landon Carter mengingati tahun senior beliau di Beaufort High dan Jamie Sullivan, gadis yang mengubah hidupnya.

text: frank and steve came to atlantic city twenty years ago to make a big score .
translation: Frank dan Steve datang ke bandar Atlantic dua puluh tahun yang lalu untuk mencari keuntungan besar.

text: miyazaki is one of world cinema 's most wondrously gifted artists and storytellers .
translation: Miyazaki adalah salah satu seniman dan pencerita sinema dunia yang paling berbakat.

text: he sabotages evan and gets the job of anchorman .
translation: Dia merosakkan usaha Evan dan mendapat kerja sebagai pembawa berita.

text: she is a wealthy and arrogant girl who is used to getting things done her way .
translation: Dia adalah seorang gadis yang kaya dan sombong yang biasa mendapatkan apa yang diinginkannya.

text: more prophetic words have never been spoken in a world where love , sex , race , and betrayal are more than skin deep .

text: at times the guys taps into some powerful emotions , but this kind of material is more effective on stage . it 's not a motion picture ; it 's an utterly static picture .
translation: Terkadang orang-orang itu menyentuh emosi yang kuat, tetapi jenis bahan ini lebih efektif di pentas. Ini bukan filem; ini adalah gambar yang benar-benar statik.
back_translation: Sometimes those people touch strong emotions, but this type of material is more effective on stage. This is not a movie; this is truly a static image.

text: when his daughter is kidnapped and held in exchange for priceless diamonds , the leader of a crew of highly skilled urban thieves ( dmx ) forges an unlikely alliance with a taiwanese intelligence officer ( jet li ) to rescue her .
translation: Apabila anak perempuannya diculik dan ditahan sebagai pertukaran untuk berlian yang berharga, ketua kumpulan pencuri bandar yang sangat mahir (DMX) membina persekutuan yang tidak mungkin dengan seorang pegawai perisikan Taiwan (Jet Li) untuk menyelamatkannya.

text: there 's also a local detective ( swank ) who is conducting her own personal investigation . . .
translation: Terdapat juga seorang detektif tempatan (Swank) yang sedang menjalankan penyiasatan peribadinya sendiri.

text: never again does n't quite rise above the conventions it attempts to deconstruct , but at its center are two gifted actors who are more than willing to take chances .
translation: Tidak sekali-kali tidak betul mencapai tingkat di atas konvensyen yang cuba dihancurkan, tetapi di tengah-tengahnya terdapat dua pelakon berbakat yang lebih dari bersedia untuk mengambil peluang.
back_translation: It is never wrong to reach a level above the convention being tried to be destroyed, but in the midst of it, there are two talented actors more than willing to seize the opportunity.

text: hollywood comedian/actor pauly shore loses everything : his house , nobody in hollywood wants to represent him , he moves back home with his mom and is now parking cars at the comedy store .

back_translation: Hollywood comedian/actor, Pauly Shore, lost everything: his house, no one in Hollywood wants to represent him, he returned home with his mother and is now directing at the Comedy Store.

text: the sound of ma 's cello alone is reason not to miss naqoyqatsi .
translation: Bunyi cello Ma seorang sudah cukup untuk memberikan sebab untuk tidak terlepas Naqoyqatsi.

text: the master of disguise falls under the category of 'should have been a sketch on saturday night live . '
translation: Tajuk 'Master of Disguise' sepatutnya menjadi sketsa dalam Saturday Night Live.

text: muccino is honest in the emotional damage left by his immature men and passionate in his portraits of twentysomething commitment-phobes struggling against growing up .
translation: muccino jujur dalam kerosakan emosi yang ditinggalkan oleh lelaki yang tidak matang dan bersemangat dalam potretnya tentang individu yang dalam usia dua puluhan berjuang menentang kematangan.
back_translation: Muccino is honest in the emotional damage left by immature and enthusiastic men in his portraits of individuals in their twenties struggling against maturity.

text: so unassuming and pure of heart , you ca n't help but warmly extend your arms and yell 'safe ! '
translation: Begitu rendah hati dan tulus hati, anda tidak dapat tidak merentangkan tangan anda dengan hangat dan berseru 'selamat!'
back_translation: So humble and sincere, you can't help but extend your warm hand and shout 'congratulations!'

text: in 1968 poland expelled the last remaining jews from what once used to be the largest jewish settlement in the world , effectively ending over thousand year long history .
translation: Pada tahun 1968, Poland memulaukan orang-orang Yahudi terakhir dari apa yang pernah menjadi perkampungan Yahudi terbesar di dunia, dengan itu mengakhiri sejarah lebih seribu tahun.
back_translation: In 1968, Poland expelled the last Jews from what had once been the world's largest Jewish settlement, thus ending a history of over a thousand years.

text: this is a true documentry of art versus money-driven media conglomerates .
translation: Ini adalah sebuah dokumentari sebenar mengenai seni berbanding konglomerat media yang dikuasai oleh wang.

text: whether seen on a 10-inch television screen or at your local multiplex , the edge-of-your-seat , educational antics of steve irwin are priceless entertainment .

back_translation: Whether watched on a 10-inch television screen or at your local cinema, the enjoyable educational antics of Steve Irwin are priceless entertainment.

text: but there is one major problem -- oscar 's true love is his stepmother eve .
translation: Tetapi ada satu masalah utama - cinta sejati Oscar adalah ibu tirinya, Eve.

text: mocking kung fu pictures when they were a staple of exploitation theater programming was witty . mocking them now is an exercise in pointlessness .
translation: Menyindir gambar kung fu ketika mereka adalah tulang belakang dari pemrograman teater eksploitasi itu penuh dengan kecerdikan. Menyindir mereka sekarang adalah latihan yang sia-sia.
back_translation: Mocking kung fu movies when they are the backbone of the exploitation theater programming is full of wisdom. Mocking them now is a futile exercise.

text: in flashbacks that parallel his investigation , we see alicia , a scholarship girl worried about her grades , gradually pulled into the social life of three rich and amoral young women , led by the blond hadley , a femme fatale .
translation: Dalam adegan kilas balik yang sejajar dengan penyiasatannya, kita melihat Alicia, seorang gadis yang mendapat biasiswa yang bimbang tentang grednya, perlahan-lahan tertarik ke dalam kehidupan sosial tiga wanita muda yang kaya dan amorl, yang dipimpin oleh Hadley berambut pirang, seorang femme fatale.
back_translation: In a flashback scene parallel to her investigation, we see Alicia, a girl on scholarship who is worried about her grades, slowly drawn into the social life of three wealthy and amoral young women, led by Hadley, a blonde femme fatale.

text: an experience so engrossing it is like being buried in a new environment .
translation: Satu pengalaman yang begitu mendalam sehingga ia seperti terperangkap dalam persekitaran baru.

text: long before it 's over , you 'll be thinking of 51 ways to leave this loser .

text: now even that joy will be stripped away as his son prepares to place him in a nursing home .

text: this is darkest drama reminiscent of antonin artaud 's literary experiments in psychoanalysis .
translation: Ini adalah drama gelap yang mengingatkan kepada eksperimen sastra Antonin Artaud dalam psikoanalisis.
back_translation: This is a dark drama that echoes Antonin Artaud's literary experiments in psychoanalysis.

text: an 83 minute document of a project which started in a muddle , seesawed back and forth between controlling interests multiple times , then found its sweet spot
translation: Dokumen selama 83 minit bagi sebuah projek yang bermula dalam kekeliruan, berbolak-balik antara kepentingan yang berbeza beberapa kali, kemudian menemui tempat terbaiknya.

text: while grieving along with her parents and drawn into legal issues presented by a district attorney seeking justice for the family , he finds himself falling in love with another woman , against his own best intentions .
translation: Sementara sedang bersedih bersama ibu bapanya dan terlibat dalam isu undang-undang yang dikemukakan oleh seorang peguam wilayah yang mencari keadilan untuk keluarga tersebut, dia mendapati dirinya jatuh cinta kepada seorang wanita lain, bertentangan dengan hasrat terbaiknya sendiri.
back_translation: While grieving with his parents and being involved in legal issues presented by a district attorney seeking justice for the family, he finds himself falling in love with another woman, contrary to his own best wishes.

text: with salvage crews ordered to clear the crash zone for the busy easter traffic , the locals undertook their own salvage operation , making it their best easter ever .
translation: Dengan pasukan penyelamat diperintahkan untuk membersihkan kawasan kemalangan bagi trafik sibuk semasa cuti Paskah, penduduk tempatan mengambil tindakan penyelamatan sendiri, menjadikannya sebagai Paskah terbaik mereka.
back_translation: With the rescue team ordered to clear the accident area for the busy Easter traffic, the locals took matters into their own hands, making it their best Easter.

text: trivial where it should be profound , and hyper-cliched where it should be sincere .
translation: Lewah di mana sepatutnya dalam yang mendalam, dan terlampau klise di mana sepatutnya ikhlas.
back_translation: Excessive in where it should be profound, and too cliché in where it should be sincere.

text: watching living actors interact against the lush , studied inertia of the backdrops gives us the impression of history come to life , or statues magically transformed into living creatures .
translation: Menonton pelakon hidup berinteraksi dengan latar belakang yang subur dan diam, memberikan kita kesan sejarah menjadi hidup, atau patung yang berubah ajaib menjadi makhluk hidup.

text: unable to remember his name or anything from his past life , he can not get a job or an apartment , so he starts living on the outskirts of the city and slowly starts putting his life back on track .
translation: Tidak dapat mengingati namanya atau apa-apa dari kehidupan masa lalunya, dia tidak dapat mendapatkan pekerjaan atau apartmen, jadi dia mula tinggal di pinggir bandar dan perlahan-lahan mula mengatur semula kehidupannya.
back_translation: Unable to remember his name or anything from his past life, he couldn't find a job or an apartment, so he started living on the outskirts of town and slowly began to rearrange his life.

text: it 's kind of sad that so many people put so much time and energy into this turkey .
translation: Agak sedih melihat ramai orang melabur begitu banyak masa dan tenaga dalam kalkun ini.

text: this insufferable movie is meant to make you think about existential suffering . instead , it 'll only put you to sleep .

back_translation: This distressing film should make you ponder the existence of suffering. Instead, it will only make you doze off.

text: i basically went in expecting garbage , but color me surprised when it actually turned out to be quite funny !
translation: Saya sebenarnya mengharapkan sampah, tetapi saya terkejut bahawa ia sebenarnya sangat lucu!

text: nair and writer laura cahill dare to build a movie around some flawed but rather unexceptional women , emerging with a fine character study that 's short on plot but rich in the tiny revelations of real life .
translation: nair dan penulis laura cahill berani untuk membuat filem mengenai beberapa wanita yang bercelah tetapi agak biasa, dan berjaya menghasilkan satu kajian watak yang baik yang kurang plot tetapi kaya dengan pendedahan kecil kehidupan sebenar.
back_translation: nair and writer laura cahill dared to make a film about some women who are flawed but quite ordinary, and managed to create a good character study that lacks plot but is rich in small revelations of real life.

text: with its young cast and an appealing balance of uplifting attitude and irreverent humor , drumline has the potential to be a sleeper hit .
translation: Dengan barisan pelakon muda dan keseimbangan yang menarik antara sikap yang buat bersemangat dan humor yang tidak menghormati, drumline mempunyai potensi untuk menjadi hit yang tidak disangka-sangka.
back_translation: With a lineup of young actors and a compelling balance between enthusiastic attitudes and irreverent humor, drumline has the potential to be an unexpected hit.

text: largely , this is a movie that also does it by the numbers .
translation: Secara besar-besaran, filem ini juga dilakukan mengikut kaedah yang telah ditetapkan.

text: seduction strikes steve and tracy , and steve and sean 's lives may never be the same again .
translation: Penggodaan melanda kehidupan Steve dan Tracy, dan kehidupan Steve dan Sean mungkin tidak akan sama lagi.
back_translation: Temptation strikes Steve and Tracy's lives, and Steve and Sean's lives may never be the same again.

text: it has that rare quality of being able to creep the living hell out of you . . .
translation: Ia mempunyai kualiti jarang yang boleh membuat anda merasa sangat takut...

translation: . . . satu kepingan cerita yang remeh dan penuh dengan persembahan yang menyeronokkan serta rasa penting diri yang membingungkan.

text: in his flight he encounters sonya , a young bosnian mother desperately trying to return home to see her son .
translation: Dalam penerbangannya, dia bertemu dengan Sonya, seorang ibu muda Bosnia yang berusaha dengan putus asa untuk pulang melihat anak lelakinya.
back_translation: On his flight, he met Sonya, a young Bosnian mother who was desperately trying to return home to see her son.

text: the movie is essentially a series of fleetingly interesting actors ' moments .
translation: Filem itu pada dasarnya merupakan siri momen aktor yang menarik seketika.

text: she 's saving herself for her very shallow boyfriend , victor johnson ( kip pardue ) , who 's left the states to backpack across europe .
translation: Dia sedang menyimpan dirinya untuk kekasihnya yang sangat cetek, Victor Johnson (Kip Pardue), yang telah meninggalkan Amerika untuk melancong backpack di seluruh Eropah.

text: set from his college student years , to his first victims , his capture , escape from prison ( twice ) , his final killing spree to his trial , conviction and execution .
translation: Dari tahun-tahun sebagai pelajar kolejnya, kepada mangsanya yang pertama, penangkapannya, melarikan diri dari penjara (dua kali), rentetan pembunuhan terakhirnya hingga ke mahkamah, sabitan dan hukuman matinya.
back_translation: From his years as a college student, to his first victim, his capture, escaping from prison (twice), a series of his final murders leading to court, conviction and his death sentence.

text: if you want a movie time trip , the 1960 version is a far smoother ride .
translation: Jika anda mahu melakukan perjalanan masa filem, versi 1960 adalah lebih lancar.
back_translation: If you want to travel back in time to the 1960s film version, it is smoother.

text: with a story inspired by the tumultuous surroundings of los angeles , where feelings of marginalization loom for every dreamer with a burst bubble , the dogwalker has a few characters and ideas , but it never manages to put them on the same path .
translation: dengan sebuah cerita yang terinspirasi oleh suasana tumult Los Angeles, di mana perasaan marginalisasi menggantung bagi setiap pemimpi dengan gelembung yang pecah, pelawat anjing mempunyai beberapa watak dan idea, tetapi tidak pernah berjaya menggabungkannya dalam satu jalan.
back_translation: with a story inspired by the tumultuous atmosphere of Los Angeles, where feelings of marginalization hang for every dreamer with bursting bubbles, the dog visitor has several characters and ideas, but never successfully integrates them into one path.

text: starts as an intense political and psychological thriller but is sabotaged by ticking time bombs and other hollywood-action cliches .
translation: Bermula sebagai tontonan politik dan psikologi yang tegang tetapi disabotaj oleh bom masa yang menggerunkan dan klise aksi Hollywood lain.
back_translation: It began as a tense political and psychological spectacle but was sabotaged by a daunting time bomb and other Hollywood action clichés.

text: if you are into splatter movies , then you will probably have a reasonably good time with the salton sea .
translation: Jika anda suka filem-filem seram, anda mungkin akan menikmati masa yang baik dengan Salton Sea.
back_translation: If you enjoy horror films, you might have a good time with Salton Sea.

text: high in the mountains of macedonia a team of young film makers are making a documentary about katerina vandeva - a descendant of an ancient and very famous family .
translation: Di ketinggian gunung di Macedonia, sebuah pasukan pembuat filem muda sedang membuat sebuah dokumentari mengenai Katerina Vandeva - seorang keturunan dari sebuah keluarga purba dan sangat terkenal.
back_translation: At the heights of a mountain in Macedonia, a young film crew is making a documentary about Katerina Vandeva - a descendant of an ancient and highly renowned family.

text: by the end of the girl 's journey there is only one question to be answered : what is real and what is her imagination ?
translation: Pada akhir perjalanan gadis itu, hanya ada satu soalan yang perlu dijawab: apakah yang sebenarnya dan apakah yang hasil imaginasi beliau?
back_translation: At the end of her journey, there was only one question that needed to be answered: what is real and what is the product of her imagination?

text: it comes the closest to any movie experience i 've had in re-creating the aftermath of unexplained suicide .
translation: Ini merupakan pengalaman filem yang paling hampir kepada pengalaman saya dalam menghasilkan semula kesan selepas kematian secara tiba-tiba yang tidak dapat dijelaskan.
back_translation: This is the closest film experience to my experience in recreating the aftermath of an unexplained sudden death.

text: laugh-out-loud lines , adorably ditsy but heartfelt performances , and sparkling , bittersweet dialogue that cuts to the chase of the modern girl 's dilemma .
translation: Barisan dialog yang menggelikan, pertunjukan yang adorably ceroboh tetapi mendalam, dan dialog yang berkilauan serta pahit manis yang menghuraikan dilema gadis moden dengan tepat.
back_translation: A hilarious line-up of dialogues, a charmingly messy yet profound performance, and sparkling bittersweet dialogues that accurately depict the dilemma of modern girls.

text: see clockstoppers if you have nothing better to do with 94 minutes . but be warned , you too may feel time has decided to stand still . or that the battery on your watch has died .
translation: Tengoklah Clockstoppers jika anda tidak ada aktiviti lain selama 94 minit. Tetapi berhati-hatilah, anda juga mungkin merasakan masa telah berhenti bergerak. Atau bahawa bateri pada jam tangan anda telah mati.
back_translation: Watch Clockstoppers if you have no other activities for 94 minutes. But be careful, you might also feel that time has stopped moving. Or that the battery in your watch has died.

text: twenty years later , e . t . is still a cinematic touchstone .
translation: Dua puluh tahun kemudian, E.T. masih menjadi pemersatu sinematik.
back_translation: Twenty years later, E.T. still remains a cinematic unifier.

text: the girls have unwittingly botched up a diamond delivery to the middle east .
translation: Gadis-gadis tersebut secara tidak sengaja gagal menghantar penghantaran berlian ke Timur Tengah.
back_translation: The girls accidentally failed to deliver the diamond shipment to the Middle East.

text: ( wendigo is ) why we go to the cinema : to be fed through the eye , the heart , the mind .
translation: Kita pergi ke panggung wayang: untuk diberi makan melalui mata, hati, dan minda.
back_translation: We go to the cinema: to be fed through the eyes, heart, and mind.

text: alternative medicine obviously has its merits . . . but ayurveda does the field no favors .
translation: Perubatan alternatif jelas mempunyai kelebihannya . . . tetapi ayurveda tidak memberi manfaat kepada bidang tersebut.
back_translation: Alternative medicine definitely has its advantages . . . but Ayurveda does not provide benefits in that aspect.

text: he goes to a small room downtown , where he finds some rich asian teenager punks who are slumming it in their own little kick pad .
translation: Dia pergi ke sebuah bilik kecil di bandar, di mana dia bertemu dengan beberapa remaja Asia kaya yang menghabiskan masa di tempat tinggal persendirian mereka sendiri.
back_translation: He went to a small room in the city, where he met some wealthy Asian teenagers who spend their time at their own private residence.

text: an eloquent , reflective and beautifully acted meditation on both the profoundly devastating events of one year ago and the slow , painful healing process that has followed in their wake .
translation: sebuah meditasi yang anggun, reflektif, dan dipentaskan dengan indah tentang peristiwa yang sangat menghancurkan setahun yang lalu dan proses penyembuhan yang lambat dan menyakitkan yang telah menyusul setelahnya.
back_translation: An elegant, reflective meditation performed beautifully on the highly destructive events of a year ago and the slow and painful healing process that has followed.

text: anna changes her mind : when some rich , ignorant american couple wondering about if they should buy the house asks for the swimming pool ( while the mediterranean is half a mile away ) , she simply doubles the charge , and finally puts the `` for sale `` plate into the garbage can .
translation: Anna mengubah fikirannya: apabila pasangan kaya Amerika yang tidak ambil peduli memikirkan sama ada mereka harus membeli rumah tersebut bertanya tentang kolam renang (sedangkan Laut Mediterranean hanya setengah batu jauhnya), dia hanya menggandakan bayaran dan akhirnya meletakkan tanda "untuk dijual" ke dalam tong sampah.
back_translation: Anna changed her mind: when the wealthy American couple who did not care about whether they should buy the house asked about the swimming pool (while the Mediterranean Sea was only half a stone's throw away), she doubled the price and ultimately threw the sign "for sale" into the trash can.

text: this is one of mr . chabrol 's subtlest works , but also one of his most uncanny .
translation: Ini adalah salah satu karya yang paling halus oleh Tuan Chabrol, tetapi juga salah satu yang paling aneh.
back_translation: This is one of the finest works by Mr. Chabrol, but also one of the strangest.

text: in his determination to lighten the heavy subject matter , silberling also , to a certain extent , trivializes the movie with too many nervous gags and pratfalls .
translation: Dalam usahanya untuk meringankan topik yang berat, Silberling juga, hingga ke satu tahap tertentu, menganggap remeh filem tersebut dengan terlalu banyak kelucuan gugup dan jatuh tergolek.
back_translation: In his efforts to lighten the heavy subject matter, Silberling also, to a certain extent, trivialized the film with too much nervous humor and stumbling.

text: it 's the most nimble epic you 're likely to see .
translation: Ini adalah epik yang paling lincah yang anda mungkin akan lihat.
back_translation: This is the most lively epic you might see.

text: after the fellowship has broken , merry and pippin , taken by orcs , make new allies in the ents , while legolas , gimli and aragorn make allies in the people of rohan , and all of them must launch an assault on isengard .
translation: Selepas perkongsian itu terhenti, Merry dan Pippin, yang dirampas oleh orc, menjalin persekutuan baru dengan Ents, manakala Legolas, Gimli, dan Aragorn menjalin persekutuan dengan penduduk Rohan, dan mereka semua terpaksa melancarkan serangan ke Isengard.
back_translation: After the fellowship was broken, Merry and Pippin, who were abducted by orcs, forged a new alliance with the Ents, while Legolas, Gimli, and Aragorn allied with the people of Rohan, and they all had to launch an attack on Isengard.

text: this charmless nonsense ensues amid clanging film references that make jay and silent bob 's excellent adventure seem understated .
translation: Keadaan tanpa daya tarikan ini berlaku di tengah-tengah rujukan filem yang berbunyi keras yang membuat pengembaraan hebat jay and silent bob kelihatan bersahaja.
back_translation: The powerless situation occurs in the midst of the loud sounding references of the film that make the great adventure of Jay and Silent Bob appear simple.

text: for a film that 's being advertised as a comedy , sweet home alabama is n't as funny as you 'd hoped . for a film that 's being advertised as a comedy , sweet home alabama is n't as funny as you 'd hoped .
translation: Bagi filem yang diiklankan sebagai komedi, Sweet Home Alabama tidaklah sekelakar yang diharapkan.
back_translation: For a movie advertised as a comedy, Sweet Home Alabama is not as funny as expected.

text: who is murdered & # 38 ; who is the murderer . . .
translation: siapa yang dibunuh & siapa yang membunuh...
back_translation: Who was killed and who killed...

text: but genevieve is anticipating exactly that type of response from starla and soon turns everyone , including starla 's friends and family , against her by playing the poor victim and making it appear that starla 's the aggressor .
translation: Tetapi Genevieve mengharapkan respon seperti itu dari Starla dan tidak lama kemudian menjadikan semua orang, termasuk rakan-rakan dan keluarga Starla, menentangnya dengan berpura-pura menjadi mangsa yang lemah dan membuat Starla kelihatan sebagai penyerang.
back_translation: But Genevieve expected such a response from Starla and soon turned everyone, including Starla's friends and family, against her by pretending to be a weak victim and making Starla appear as the aggressor.

text: aaliyah rarely dampens her diva persona enough to spark genuine chemistry with townsend . when she speaks , her creepy egyptian demigod voice is as computer processed and overproduced as it was in her music .
translation: Aaliyah jarang sekali merendahkan persona divanya yang mencukupi untuk mencetuskan kimia yang sebenarnya dengan Townsend. Apabila dia bercakap, suaranya sebagai demigod Mesir yang menyeramkan adalah seolah-olah diproses komputer dan dihasilkan berlebihan seperti dalam muziknya.
back_translation: Aaliyah rarely lowers her divine persona enough to trigger genuine chemistry with Townsend. When she speaks, her voice as a terrifying Egyptian demigod seems like it is processed by a computer and overly produced like in her music.

text: while staking out his next assignment -- the innocent girlfriend of his notorious boss -- contract killer malik reflects on the dark path he 's chosen but can not escape .
translation: Semasa bertugas untuk tugas seterusnya - kekasih yang tidak bersalah kepada bos terkenalnya - pembunuh upah Malik merenung tentang jalan gelap yang telah dipilihnya tetapi tidak dapat lari.
back_translation: While working on his next assignment - the innocent lover of his notorious boss - the hired killer Malik reflects on the dark path he has chosen but cannot escape.

text: a great script brought down by lousy direction . same guy with both hats . big mistake .
translation: Sebuah skrip hebat yang terjejas oleh arahan yang buruk. Orang yang sama memegang kedua-dua topi. Kesilapan besar.
back_translation: A great script that was marred by poor direction. The same person wearing both hats. A big mistake.

text: rumours of haunting , paired with the desire to forget the painful tragedy that took place five years before , have kept the truth of holy angel 's last days buried with the innocent victims .
translation: Khabar angin tentang gangguan hantu, bersama dengan keinginan untuk melupakan tragedi menyakitkan yang berlaku lima tahun sebelumnya, telah menyebabkan kebenaran mengenai hari-hari terakhir malaikat suci terkubur bersama mangsa-mangsa yang tidak berdosa.
back_translation: Rumors of ghost disturbances, along with the desire to forget the painful tragedy that occurred five years earlier, have led to the truth about the final days of the holy angel being buried with innocent victims.

text: in the process , he comes to understand that if he is to make it as a comic artist , he must engage with the community he comes from , take that experience back out into the world , and put it in his work .

text: when dwindling membership and increasing overheads makes a local bowling club and prime candidate for a takeover , it 's all hands on deck to save the club , in what turns into an epic battle where young meets old , greed meets good and people rise to the occasion in extraordinary circumstances .

back_translation: As membership declines and overhead costs increase, local bowling clubs have become prime candidates for takeovers, requiring everyone to come together to save the club in what has become an epic battle where the younger generation meets the older generation, greed meets goodness, and humanity rises in extraordinary circumstances.

text: director roger michell does so many of the little things right that it 's difficult not to cuss him out severely for bungling the big stuff .

text: most new movies have a bright sheen . some , like ballistic , arrive stillborn . . . looking like the beaten , well-worn video box cover of seven years into the future .
translation: Kebanyakan filem baru mempunyai kilauan yang cerah. Sesetengahnya, seperti filem Ballistic, tiba mati . . . kelihatan seperti kover kotak video yang sudah dilanggar dan lusuh tujuh tahun di masa depan.

back_translation: In terms of spectacle, craftsmanship, romance, and humor, this is a film that must be beaten this summer.

text: a compassionate , moving portrait of an american ( and an america ) always reaching for something just outside his grasp .
translation: potret menyentuh dan penuh belas kasihan mengenai seorang Amerika (dan Amerika) yang sentiasa mencari sesuatu yang sedikit di luar jangkauannya.

text: despite its faults , this is a fascinating look at a subculture .

text: the early and middle passages are surprising in how much they engage and even touch us . this is not a classical dramatic animated feature , nor a hip , contemporary , in-jokey one . it 's sort of in-between , and it works .
translation: Bahagian awal dan pertengahan itu mengejutkan dengan betapa mereka dapat melibatkan dan menyentuh kita. Ini bukanlah filem animasi dramatik klasik, juga bukan filem animasi kontemporari yang hip atau penuh dengan lelucon dalaman. Ia agak di tengah-tengah, dan ia berjaya.
back_translation: The beginning and middle parts are surprising in how they can engage and touch us. It is not a classic dramatic animated film, nor is it a contemporary animated film that is trendy or full of internal jokes. It's kind of in the middle, and it works.

text: son of the bride is slight fare , but it does have it poignancies , and it is well-acted and sweet without being cloying .
translation: Anak perempuan pengantin itu agak ringan tetapi mempunyai perasaan yang mendalam, serta lakonan yang baik dan manis tanpa menjadi terlalu manis.
back_translation: The bride's daughter is light-hearted but has deep feelings, as well as good and sweet acting without being overly sweet.

text: in its dry and forceful way , it delivers the same message as jiri menzel 's closely watched trains and danis tanovic 's no man 's land .

text: each story is built on a potentially interesting idea , but the first two are ruined by amateurish writing and acting , while the third feels limited by its short running time .

text: nothing short of a respectful testament to the ingenious creative drive of the outsider .

text: though in some ways similar to catherine breillat 's fat girl , rain is the far superior film .

text: the film thrusts the inchoate but already eldritch christian right propaganda machine into national media circles .

text: a surprisingly good-natured throwback to the '80s heyday of the body-switching genre .

text: sometimes charming , sometimes infuriating , this argentinean 'dramedy ' succeeds mainly on the shoulders of its actors .

text: what begins as a seemingly brainless , bubbly romantic comedy becomes a cliche-drenched melodrama by mid-film and , by film 's end , a feminist action fantasy .

text: a budget affair that exposes the generally sad existence of the bedouins while providing a precious twinkle of insight into their lives .

text: amold & oacute ; var is a master of emotional texture , peeling away layer upon layer of the feelings . . . until he reaches benigno 's troubled psyche and marco 's benevolent soul .

text: while it 's genuinely cool to hear characters talk about early rap records ( sugar hill gang , etc . ) , the constant referencing of hip-hop arcana can alienate even the savviest audiences .

text: 'estupendamente actuada , sumamente emotiva y profundamente humana , es una experiencia fM-mlmica imposible de olvidar '
translation: Dipersembahkan dengan baik, sangat beremosi dan sangat manusiawi, ini pengalaman yang mustahil untuk dilupakan.

text: it 's a thin notion , repetitively stretched out to feature length , awash in self-consciously flashy camera effects , droning house music and flat , flat dialogue .
translation: Ia adalah satu gagasan yang nipis, diulang-ulang ditarikkan menjadi panjang, tenggelam dalam kesan kamera yang berkilauan secara sedar, muzik house yang monoton, dan dialog datar, sangat datar.

text: chaotic , self-indulgent and remarkably ugly to look at , it 's . . . like a series of pretentiously awful student films strung together into one feature-length horror .

back_translation: Messy, self-indulgent, and very unpleasant to look at, that's the description. Like a series of terrible student films with pretensions stitched together into one long horror film.

text: the film is about the relationships rather than about the outcome . and it sees those relationships , including that between the son and his wife , and the wife and the father , and between the two brothers , with incredible subtlety and acumen .

back_translation: This film is more about relationships than the end result. It depicts these relationships, including the relationship between a son and his wife, and between the wife and the father, as well as between the siblings, with incredible finesse and sharpness.

text: sacrifices the value of its wealth of archival foot-age with its less-than-objective stance .

text: touted as an unofficial sequel to his 1989 hit sex , lies , and videotape , this arty film-within-a-film ( which was shot in just 18 days ) revolves around seven people with little in common whose lives collide .
translation: Diketengahkan sebagai sekuel tidak rasmi kepada filem popularnya pada tahun 1989, sex, lies, and videotape, filem seni dalam filem ini (yang dihasilkan dalam tempoh hanya 18 hari) berkisar mengenai tujuh individu yang mempunyai sedikit persamaan dalam hidup mereka yang bertembung.
back_translation: Presented as an unofficial sequel to his popular 1989 film, sex, lies, and videotape, the artistic film within this film (produced in just 18 days) revolves around seven individuals with little in common in their intersecting lives.

text: beary , a young bear raised by a human family in a world where humans and talking bears coexist , attempts to trace his roots .
translation: Beary, seekor beruang muda yang dibesarkan oleh sebuah keluarga manusia dalam dunia di mana manusia dan beruang yang boleh bercakap hidup berdampingan, cuba menjejaki asal-usulnya.
back_translation: Beary, a young bear raised by a human family in a world where humans and talking bears live together, tries to trace his origins.

text: filmmakers have to dig deep to sink this low . fortunately for all involved , this movie is likely to disappear as quickly as an ice cube thrown into a pot of boiling water .
translation: Pereka filem perlu menggali dengan mendalam untuk jatuh begitu rendah ini. Untungnya bagi semua yang terlibat, filem ini kemungkinan akan lenyap dengan cepat seperti kiub ais dilemparkan ke dalam periuk air mendidih.
back_translation: Filmmakers need to dig deep to fall this low. Fortunately for everyone involved, this film is likely to disappear quickly like an ice cube thrown into a boiling pot of water.

text: an inexperienced director , mehta has much to learn .
translation: Seorang pengarah yang kurang berpengalaman, Mehta mempunyai banyak perkara untuk dipelajari.

text: this indie drama resonantly demonstrates how a person 's worth is weighed in a town where you 're only as good as your last game .

text: shahrul is a mechanic who also takes part in illegal bike racing .

text: two young gentlemen ( rupert everett & # 38 ; colin firth ) living in 1890s england use the same pseudonym ( `` earnest `` ) on the sly , which is fine until they both fall in love with women using that name , which leads to a comedy of mistaken identities . . .
translation: Dua jejaka muda (Rupert Everett & Colin Firth) yang tinggal di England pada tahun 1890 menggunakan nama palsu yang sama ("Earnest") secara rahsia, sehingga terjerumus dalam masalah apabila keduanya jatuh cinta pada wanita yang menggunakan nama yang sama, yang kemudiannya membawa kepada satu komedi kesilapan identiti...
back_translation: Two young bachelors (Rupert Everett & Colin Firth) living in England in 1890 use the same fake name ("Earnest") secretly, leading to trouble when both fall in love with a woman who uses the same name, ultimately resulting in a comedy of mistaken identities...

text: take a friend ( invisible or real ) to see this one . . . it 's laugh out loud funny
translation: Ajak seorang kawan (sama ada tidak kelihatan atau sebenar) untuk menonton ini . . . memang lucu sehingga ketawa terbahak-bahak
back_translation: Invite a friend (whether visible or not) to watch this... it's so funny you'll laugh out loud

text: measured against practically any like-themed film other than its oscar-sweeping franchise predecessor the silence of the lambs , red dragon rates as an exceptional thriller .
translation: Apabila dibandingkan dengan hampir mana-mana filem yang berkaitan kecuali waralaba pendahulunya yang meraih Anugerah Oscar, The Silence of the Lambs, Red Dragon diberi rating sebagai filem thriller yang luar biasa.
back_translation: Compared to almost any related film except its predecessor franchise that won an Oscar, The Silence of the Lambs, Red Dragon is rated as an outstanding thriller film.

text: elegantly produced and expressively performed , the six musical numbers crystallize key plot moments into minutely detailed wonders of dreamlike ecstasy .
translation: Dicipta dengan elegan dan dilakukan dengan penuh ekspresi, enam nombor muzik merangkumkan momen-momen plot penting menjadi keajaiban terperinci secara ekstasi berimpian.

text: offers big , fat , dumb laughs that may make you hate yourself for giving in . ah , what the hell .
translation: menawarkan gelak ketawa besar, gemuk, bodoh yang mungkin membuat anda benci pada diri sendiri kerana tergelak. ah, apa-apa sahaja.
back_translation: Offering loud, fat, stupid laughter that might make you hate yourself for laughing. Oh, anything.

text: the vistas are sweeping and the acting is far from painful .
translation: Pemandangan sangat luas dan lakonan jauh dari menyakitkan.
back_translation: The scenery is very vast and the acting is far from painful.

text: however when sex and greed rear-up between the good crims and the bad cops , the consequences are both bizarre and fatal .
translation: Walau bagaimanapun apabila hubungan seks dan tamak timbul di antara penjenayah yang baik dan polis yang jahat, akibatnya adalah sama-sama aneh dan mematikan.

text: everyday prisoners are led out in chain gangs to work the swamps and untamed bayous , festered with poisonous snakes and alligators .

text: by turns pretentious , fascinating , ludicrous , provocative and vainglorious .
translation: silih berganti sombong, menarik, keterlaluan, provokatif, dan congkak.

text: angela gheorghiu as famous prima donna floria tosca , roberto alagna as her lover mario cavaradossi , and ruggero as the villainous , lecherous police chief scarpia , all sing beautifully and act adequately .
translation: Angela Gheorghiu sebagai ratu pentas terkenal Floria Tosca, Roberto Alagna sebagai kekasihnya Mario Cavaradossi, dan Ruggero sebagai penjahat yang jahat, kepala polis liarnya Scarpia, semuanya menyanyi dengan indah dan berakting dengan baik.
back_translation: Angela Gheorghiu as the famous stage queen Floria Tosca, Roberto Alagna as her lover Mario Cavaradossi, and Ruggero as the wicked villain, the wild police chief Scarpia, all sang beautifully and acted well.

text: `` red dragon `` is entertaining . an obvious copy of one of the best films ever made , how could it not be ? but it is entertaining on an inferior level . it is a popcorn film , not a must-own , or even a must-see .
translation: ``Red Dragon`` menghiburkan. Ia jelas meniru salah satu filem terbaik yang pernah dibuat, bagaimana ia tidak menghibur? Tetapi ia menghiburkan pada tahap yang rendah. Ia merupakan filem popcorn, bukan keharusan dimiliki, atau malah ditonton.
back_translation: "Red Dragon" is entertaining. It clearly mimics one of the best films ever made, how could it not be entertaining? But it is entertaining at a low level. It is a popcorn movie, not a must-have, or even watched.

text: swims in mediocrity , sticking its head up for a breath of fresh air now and then .
translation: berenang dalam mediokriti, mengangkat kepala untuk mencari udara segar sesekali.

text: he is going to sweden , and invites lilja to come along and start a new life .

text: the humor is n't as sharp , the effects not as innovative , nor the story as imaginative as in the original . but it could have been worse .

text: the real charm of this trifle is the deadpan comic face of its star , jean reno , who resembles sly stallone in a hot sake half-sleep .

back_translation: The real attraction of this cake is the comic face without its star expression, Jean Reno, resembling Sly Stallone in a semi-conscious state while drinking hot sake.

text: her daughter siri , whom , in this way , she turns into her virtual twin , learns as a child that she is the world 's first cloned human being .
translation: Anak perempuannya, Siri, yang dengan cara ini, dia menjadi seperti klonnya yang maya, mengetahui sebagai kanak-kanak bahawa dia adalah manusia yang pertama diklon di dunia.
back_translation: Her daughter, Siri, in this way, she became like her virtual clone, knowing as a child that she was the first human being to be cloned in the world.

text: watch as superfag with the help of his zany superfriends , taco chick and salsa girl , the incredible dyke , the bionic old lady , supermomma , disco diva , the wonder trannies and many more , fight against the evil fiend , professor peckerhead who attempts to rid the world of homosexuality forever !
translation: Saksikan bagaimana Superfag dengan bantuan rakan-rakan superhero yang gilanya, Taco Chick dan Salsa Girl, The Incredible Dyke, The Bionic Old Lady, Supermomma, Disco Diva, The Wonder Trannies dan ramai lagi, memerangi kejahatan anasir jahat, Professor Peckerhead yang cuba untuk menghapuskan homoseksualiti dari dunia selamanya!
back_translation: Witness how Superfag with the help of his crazy superhero friends, Taco Chick and Salsa Girl, The Incredible Dyke, The Bionic Old Lady, Supermomma, Disco Diva, The Wonder Trannies, and many more, combat the evil forces led by Professor Peckerhead who is trying to eradicate homosexuality from the world forever!

text: a document about a unique political and artistic moment , the film traces the links between the two most important latin american filmmaking movements of the late '60s the brazilian cinema n & # 244 ; vo and the cuban cine revolucionario .
translation: sebuah dokumen mengenai satu momen politik dan artistik yang unik, filem ini menjejaki hubungan antara dua gerakan pembikinan filem Latin Amerika yang paling penting pada akhir tahun 60-an iaitu sinema Brazil Cinema Novo dan sinema Cuba Cine Revolucionario.
back_translation: A document about a unique political and artistic moment, this film traces the relationship between two of the most important Latin American film movements in the late 1960s, namely Brazilian Cinema Novo and Cuban Cinema Revolucionario.

text: the filmmakers try to balance pointed , often incisive satire and unabashed sweetness , with results that are sometimes bracing , sometimes baffling and quite often , and in unexpected ways , touching .
translation: Pengarah filem cuba untuk mengimbangkan satira yang tajam, seringkali tajam dan kemanisan yang tidak terhalang, dengan hasil yang kadang-kadang menyegarkan, kadang-kadang membingungkan dan seringkali, dan dengan cara yang tidak dijangka, menyentuh.
back_translation: The film director tries to balance sharp satire, often piercing and unbridled sweetness, with results that are sometimes refreshing, sometimes confusing, and often, unexpectedly touching.

text: stephen stalls his interrogators with stories of his affair with toni , while she risks her freedom by seducing an employee in the d . a . 's
translation: Stephen menghalang penyiasatnya dengan cerita tentang perselingkuhannya dengan Toni, sedangkan Toni mengambil risiko kebebasannya dengan merayu seorang pekerja di pejabat pendakwa raya.

text: as directed by dani kouyate of burkina faso , sia lacks visual flair . but kouyate elicits strong performances from his cast , and he delivers a powerful commentary on how governments lie , no matter who runs them .
translation: Seperti yang diarahkan oleh Dani Kouyate dari Burkina Faso, Sia kurang memiliki gaya visual yang menarik. Tetapi Kouyate berhasil memunculkan penampilan yang kuat dari para pelakonnya, dan beliau menyampaikan komentar yang kuat tentang bagaimana kerajaan bohong, tidak kira siapa yang menguruskan mereka.
back_translation: As directed by Dani Kouyate from Burkina Faso, Sia lacks an attractive visual style. But Kouyate managed to bring out strong performances from the actors, and he delivered powerful comments on how governments lie, no matter who runs them.

text: a movie that will touch the hearts of both children and adults , as well as bring audiences to the edge of their seats .
translation: Sebuah filem yang akan menyentuh hati kanak-kanak dan dewasa, serta membawa penonton ke tepi kerusi mereka.
back_translation: A film that will touch the hearts of children and adults, and bring viewers to the edge of their seats.

text: after a wild session of lovemaking , dawn goes for a walk .

text: one of the best films i have ever seen , constantly pulling the rug from underneath us , seeing things from new sides , plunging deeper , getting more intense .
translation: Salah satu filem terbaik yang pernah saya tonton, sentiasa menarik perhatian kita, melihat sesuatu dari sudut yang baru, semakin dalam, dan menjadi lebih intens.

text: a graceful , contemplative film that gradually and artfully draws us into a world where the personal and the political get fatally intertwined .
translation: Sebuah filem yang anggun dan berwawasan yang secara perlahan-lahan dan dengan seni menarik kita ke dalam dunia di mana perkara peribadi dan politik tercalar dengan fatalnya.
back_translation: An elegant and insightful film that gradually and artistically draws us into a world where personal and political matters are fatally tainted.

text: staked-out in his one-bedroom apartment with his kidnap victim , brian ( justin bartha ) , gigli soon realizes that what he thought would be a routine assignment soon becomes a tumultuous task .
translation: Gigli sedang ditempatkan di apartmen satu biliknya bersama mangsanya yang diculik, Brian (Justin Bartha), Gigli segera sedar bahawa apa yang dia fikirkan sebagai tugas rutin akan menjadi tugas yang penuh dengan cabaran.
back_translation: Gigli is placed in his one-bedroom apartment with his kidnapped captive, Brian (Justin Bartha), Gigli quickly realizes that what he thought was a routine task will be a challenging one.

text: this is the decades-long story of the relationship between a prominent high school football coach ( harris ) in a small south carolina town and the illiterate , mentally-challenged man nicknamed radio ( gooding ) whom he mentors , who before that had always been the target of jokes and teasing by the community .
translation: Ini adalah kisah panjang beberapa dekad mengenai hubungan antara seorang jurulatih bola sepak sekolah menengah yang terkenal (Harris) di sebuah bandar kecil di selatan Carolina dan seorang lelaki yang buta huruf dan berkekurangan mental yang dilabeli Radio (Gooding), yang sebelum ini sentiasa menjadi sasaran jenaka dan ejekan oleh komuniti.
back_translation: This is a long story spanning several decades about the relationship between a renowned high school football coach (Harris) in a small town in southern Carolina and a illiterate and mentally challenged man dubbed Radio (Gooding), who had previously been the target of ridicule and mockery by the community.

text: the dea finally convinces the chinese military that robert may be of more help to them outside jail by leading them to the real smugglers .
translation: DEA akhirnya meyakinkan tentera China bahawa Robert mungkin lebih berguna kepada mereka di luar penjara dengan membawa mereka ke pengedar sebenar.

text: more than the last time around , it has elements that might help divert those bigger people who find themselves unavoidably in attendance .

text: plays like a toddler running along a lumpy field , stumbling every few feet but always getting back up and eventually reaching his destination , unharmed and happy .
translation: Bermain seperti kanak-kanak yang berlari di padang berbukit, tergelincir setiap beberapa langkah tetapi sentiasa bangun semula dan akhirnya sampai ke destinasi, tanpa cedera dan gembira.
back_translation: Playing like children running in a hilly field, stumbling every few steps but always getting back up and eventually reaching the destination without any injuries and happy.

text: they feel they are at the end of their rope and know they need a big stash of cash to make their musical dreams a reality .
translation: Mereka merasa mereka sudah di hujung tanduk dan tahu bahawa mereka memerlukan simpanan tunai besar untuk menjadikan impian muzik mereka menjadi kenyataan.

text: four friends - one summer - an italian-american neighborhood in yonkers , ny .

text: after chance brings them together they create , 'searching for mr right . com , `` a web site to locate husbands for marie and liz .
translation: Selepas peluang membawa mereka bersama, mereka mencipta, 'mencari mr right.com', sebuah laman web untuk mencari suami untuk Marie dan Liz.
back_translation: After the opportunity to bring them together, they created 'finding mr right.com', a website to find husbands for Marie and Liz.

text: it desperately wants to be a wacky , screwball comedy , but the most screwy thing here is how so many talented people were convinced to waste their time .
translation: Filem ini dengan gigih cuba menjadi satu komedi gila and gila, tetapi perkara yang paling gila di sini ialah bagaimana begitu ramai orang berbakat dibujuk untuk membazirkan masa mereka.
back_translation: This film diligently tries to be a crazy and wild comedy, but the craziest thing here is how so many talented people are persuaded to waste their time.

text: what the film lacks in general focus it makes up for in compassion , as corcuera manages to find the seeds of hope in the form of collective action .
translation: Apa yang filem ini kurang dalam fokus umum, ia menampilkannya dengan belas kasihan, kerana Corcuera dapat menemui benih-benih harapan dalam bentuk tindakan kolektif.
back_translation: What this film lacks in mainstream focus, it presents with compassion, as Corcuera is able to find seeds of hope in the form of collective action.

text: vesa , a 16-year old bulgarian girl , can not speak .
translation: Vesa, seorang gadis Bulgaria berusia 16 tahun, tidak boleh bercakap.

text: this dark bittersweet drama focuses on roberta , a 350-lb secretary who loses her job and learns she is dying on the same day .
translation: Drama pahit manis gelap ini memberi tumpuan kepada Roberta, seorang setiausaha berat badan 350 paun yang kehilangan pekerjaannya dan mengetahui bahawa dia sedang sekarat pada hari yang sama.
back_translation: This bittersweet dark drama focuses on Roberta, a 350-pound secretary who loses her job and finds out that she is dying on the same day.

text: `` mudbloods `` ( people of muggle families ) are `` petrified `` by an evil monster lurking in the grounds .
translation: "mudbloods" (orang dari keluarga muggle) telah "terpetrify" oleh sebuah binatang jahat yang mengelilingi kawasan itu.
back_translation: "Mudbloods" (people from Muggle families) have been "petrified" by an evil creature that is lurking around the area.

text: this is the film training day wanted to be .
translation: Ini adalah filem Training Day yang diinginkan.

translation: Rodney Boland adalah seorang pembunuh profesional yang "membekalkan perkhidmatan" kepada ahli politik dan penyokong-penyokong kaya mereka.

text: suspiciously , word of the device got out to the underworld and both parents were brutally killed in front of the girls ' eyes by criminals eager to get their hands on the invention .
translation: Secara mencurigakan, berita tentang peranti tersebar ke dunia bawah dan kedua ibu bapa telah dibunuh secara kejam di depan mata gadis-gadis oleh penjenayah yang ingin mendapatkan penemuan tersebut.

translation: Persembahan yang mantap oleh Arliss Howard adalah daya tarikan untuk "big bad love".

text: will god let her fall or give her a new path ?
translation: Adakah tuhan akan membiarkannya jatuh atau memberikannya jalan yang baru?

text: while it has n't always been smooth sailing , they 've ridden out the rough spots with humor , passion , and wisdom , redefining and reinventing their own version of `` family values . ``
translation: Walaupun tidak selalu berjalan lancar, mereka telah menghadapi cabaran dengan humor, semangat, dan hikmah, menentukan semula dan mencipta semula versi mereka sendiri mengenai "nilai-nilai keluarga."
back_translation: While not always smooth sailing, they have faced challenges with humor, spirit, and wisdom, redefining and recreating their own version of "family values."

text: without [ de niro ] , city by the sea would slip under the waves . he drags it back , single-handed .
translation: Tanpa [De Niro], bandar di tepi laut akan tenggelam di bawah ombak. Beliau menariknya kembali, dengan sendirinya.
back_translation: Without [De Niro], the coastal town would sink beneath the waves. He pulled it back, on his own.

text: jack ( samuel l . jackson ) finds himself being held hostage while the criminals decide what to do with him , and the leader 's beautiful girlfriend , erin ( milla jovovich ) , is left alone to watch jack .
translation: Jack (Samuel L. Jackson) mendapati dirinya dijadikan tebusan semasa penjenayah memutuskan apa yang perlu dilakukan dengannya, dan kekasih cantik pemimpin, Erin (Milla Jovovich), ditinggalkan sendirian untuk mengawasi Jack.

text: the film is a contrivance , as artificial as the video games japanese teens play in a nightclub sequence , but it 's an enjoyable one .
translation: Filem ini merupakan satu rekaan, sebuas video game yang dimainkan oleh remaja Jepun dalam urutan kelab malam, tetapi ia adalah satu yang menyeronokkan.
back_translation: This movie is an invention, akin to a video game played by Japanese teenagers in a nightclub setting, but it is an enjoyable one.

text: this is scorsese 's finest work , and one of the best films of 2002 .
translation: Ini adalah karya terbaik Scorsese, dan salah satu filem terbaik tahun 2002.
back_translation: This is Scorsese's best work, and one of the best films of 2002.

text: having transplanted herself to hawaii with no one 's blessing but her own , anne marie finds all she needs in the adrenaline-charged surf scene . . .
translation: Setelah memindahkan dirinya ke Hawaii tanpa restu dari siapapun selain dirinya sendiri, Anne Marie mendapati semua yang dia butuhkan dalam scene selancar yang penuh adrenalin...
back_translation: After moving to Hawaii without the blessing of anyone but herself, Anne Marie found everything she needed in the adrenaline-filled surfing scene...
