text: for anyone who cares about the future of america , it 's required viewing .
translation: Bagi sesiapa yang prihatin tentang masa depan Amerika, ini adalah tontonan yang diperlukan.
back_translation: For anyone concerned about the future of America, this is a necessary watch.

text: he used to love mitchell allen ( thomas ian nicholas ) before mitchell dumped him for candice ( clare kramer ) .
translation: Dia dahulu mencintai Mitchell Allen (Thomas Ian Nicholas) sebelum Mitchell memutuskan hubungan dengannya demi Candice (Clare Kramer).
back_translation: She used to love Mitchell Allen (Thomas Ian Nicholas) before Mitchell decided to break up with her for Candice (Clare Kramer).

text: overwhelmed and excited about the big studio adventure ahead of him , alex moves into an apartment with two other up-n'-comings .
translation: Terlalu teruja dan teruja dengan pengembaraan studio besar yang menanti, Alex berpindah ke sebuah apartmen bersama dua individu yang juga tengah meraih kejayaan.
back_translation: Too excited and thrilled about the big studio adventure awaiting, Alex moved into an apartment with two individuals who were also achieving success.

text: funny and , at times , poignant , the film from director george hickenlooper all takes place in pasadena , `` a city where people still read . ``
translation: Filem dari pengarah George Hickenlooper yang lucu dan pada masa yang sama mengharukan, semuanya berlangsung di Pasadena, "sebuah bandar di mana orang masih membaca."
back_translation: A film by director George Hickenlooper that is funny and heartwarming at the same time, all set in Pasadena, "a town where people still read."

text: far-fetched premise , convoluted plot , and thematic mumbo jumbo about destiny and redemptive love .
translation: Premis yang jauh ditarik, plot yang rumit, dan teka-teki tema tentang takdir dan cinta penebusan.
back_translation: The distant setting, intricate plot, and enigmatic themes about fate and redemptive love.

text: using everything from closely mic-ed subjects to infrared video standing by yourself gets uncomfortably close to its subjects as they get drunk and high , squander money , rip-off their parents , and get in trouble with pretty much everyone in their paths as a conduit to simply having a good time .
translation: Dengan menggunakan segala sesuatu dari subyek-subyek yang di-mic secara dekat hingga video infrared, berdiri sendirian menjadi sangat dekat dengan subyek-subyek tersebut ketika mereka mabuk dan terpengaruh, menggunakan wang dengan sia-sia, menipu ibu bapa mereka, dan mendapat masalah dengan hampir semua orang yang terlibat sebagai saluran untuk sekadar berseronok.
back_translation: By using everything from subjects being up close mic'd to infrared video, standing alone gets very close to those subjects when they are drunk and influenced, wasting money, deceiving their parents, and getting into trouble with almost everyone involved as a channel just to have fun.

text: before long , the bay boy of bowls is turning the sedate and very english pastime upside down with hysterical results .
translation: Tidak lama lagi, pemuda teluk mangkuk sedang mengacaukan masa lalu yang damai dan sangat Inggeris dengan hasil yang histerikal.
back_translation: Not long after, the bowl bay youth is disrupting the peaceful and very English past with hysterical results.

text: poignant and moving , a walk to remember is an inspirational love story , capturing the innocence and idealism of that first encounter .
translation: Sentiasa menyentuh dan menggerakkan hati, A Walk to Remember adalah sebuah kisah cinta yang memberi inspirasi, merakamkan kemurnian dan idealisme pertemuan pertama itu.
back_translation: Always touching and moving the heart, A Walk to Remember is a love story that inspires, capturing the purity and idealism of that first meeting.

text: mitchell misses the bus and starts walking to school .
translation: Mitchell terlepas bas dan mula berjalan ke sekolah.
back_translation: Mitchell missed the bus and started walking to school.

text: the experiment is supposed to be transported to a prison asteroid , yet manages to escape captain gantu , who was supposed to deliver him there .
translation: Percubaan sepatutnya dibawa ke asteroid penjara, tetapi berjaya melarikan diri daripada Kapten Gantu, yang sepatutnya menghantarnya ke sana.
back_translation: The experiment should have been taken to the asteroid prison, but managed to escape from Captain Gantu, who was supposed to send it there.

text: but santa 's got problems ( he 's even mysteriously losing weight ) and things quickly go south when he finds out that his son , charlie , has landed on this year 's `` naughty `` list .
translation: Tetapi Sinterklas mengalami masalah (bahkan berat badannya turun secara misterius) dan segalanya segera menjadi kacau ketika dia mendapati bahawa anak lelakinya, Charlie, telah terdapat dalam senarai "nakal" tahun ini.
back_translation: But Santa Claus faces a problem (even his weight mysteriously decreases) and everything quickly becomes chaotic when he discovers that his son, Charlie, has been listed as "naughty" this year.

text: like being invited to a classy dinner soiree and not knowing anyone . you leave the same way you came -- a few tasty morsels under your belt , but no new friends .
translation: Seperti dijemput ke kenduri makan malam mewah dan tidak mengenali sesiapa. Anda pergi dengan cara yang sama seperti yang anda datang - dengan beberapa hidangan lazat di perut anda, tetapi tanpa rakan baru.
back_translation: It's like being invited to a luxurious dinner party and not knowing anyone. You leave the same way you came - with some delicious dishes in your stomach, but without new friends.

text: while the costumes hint at changes beneath the surface , it is abbass ' performance , as she vacillates flawlessly between muted hausfrau and shining hoofer , that reveals the depths of her transformation .
translation: Sementara kostum memberi petunjuk tentang perubahan di bawah permukaan, adalah persembahan Abbass, yang dengan lancar berubah antara hausfrau yang lebih merendah dan hoofer berkilauan, yang mendedahkan kedalaman transformasinya.
back_translation: While the costume hints at changes beneath the surface, it is Abbass's performance that smoothly transitions between a more humble hausfrau and a dazzling hoofer, revealing the depth of his transformation.

text: the only threat mastermind thief charlie croker ( wahlberg ) never saw coming was a member of his own crew .
translation: Ancaman yang tidak pernah dilihat oleh penjenayah kepala Charlie Croker (Wahlberg) adalah seorang anggota dalam pasukannya sendiri.
back_translation: The threat that was never seen by the criminal mastermind Charlie Croker (Wahlberg) is a member within his own team.

text: the correspondence between spielrein , freud and jung discovered that day in the geneva basement has become essential to understanding the evolution of psychoanalysis ^ & # 214 ; and the virtually insurmountable challenges facing women who sought to contribute in any role other than that of patient .
translation: Surat-menyurat antara Spielrein, Freud, dan Jung yang ditemui pada hari itu di bawah tanah Geneva telah menjadi penting untuk memahami evolusi psikoanalisis dan cabaran yang hampir tak dapat diatasi yang dihadapi oleh wanita yang cuba menyumbang dalam peranan lain selain sebagai pesakit.
back_translation: The correspondence between Spielrein, Freud, and Jung found on that day underground in Geneva has become important to understand the evolution of psychoanalysis and the almost insurmountable challenges faced by women trying to contribute in roles other than as patients.

text: the doctor delivers the news that this has been a false pregnancy , one in which the embryo never develops .
translation: Doktor memberitahu bahawa ini adalah kehamilan palsu, di mana embrio tidak pernah berkembang.

text: eagle is facing his own living hell 3 , 000 miles away in new jersey .
translation: Helang menghadapi neraka kehidupannya sendiri 3,000 batu jauhnya di New Jersey.

text: while there , the elder man falls in love with the mom ( keaton ) .
translation: Semasa di sana, lelaki tua tersebut jatuh cinta dengan ibu itu (Keaton).
back_translation: While there, the old man fell in love with the mother (Keaton).

text: vir , a young man from a rural village , learns on his wedding day that the people whom he thought were his parents ar n't .
translation: Vir, seorang pemuda dari kampung, mengetahui pada hari perkahwinannya bahawa orang yang dia fikirkan sebagai ibu bapa sebenarnya bukanlah.
back_translation: Vir, a young man from the village, discovered on his wedding day that the people he thought were his parents were actually not.

text: with rare birds , as with the shipping news before it , an attempt is made to transplant a hollywood star into newfoundland 's wild soil -- and the rock once again resists the intrusion .
translation: Dengan burung-burung langka, seperti berita mengenai penghantaran sebelum ini, cubaan dilakukan untuk merantik bintang Hollywood ke dalam tanah liar Newfoundland - dan batu itu sekali lagi menolak gangguan.
back_translation: With rare birds, as with news of previous expeditions - attempts were made to introduce Hollywood stars into the wilds of Newfoundland, and once again the stone refused disturbance.

text: abandoned and filled with a mysterious past , holy angel school for girls is about to reveal its secrets of betrayal , jealousy , and vengeance .
translation: Ditinggalkan dan dipenuhi dengan sejarah misteri, sekolah Angel Suci untuk gadis-gadis akan mendedahkan rahsianya mengenai pengkhianatan, kecemburuan, dan dendam.
back_translation: Abandoned and filled with mysterious history, the Holy Angel School for girls will reveal its secrets of betrayal, jealousy, and revenge.

text: the message becomes the savior for `` the country bears , `` an equal parts silly and sweet tale that wears its great big ol ' heart on its grizzly-sized sleeve .
translation: Mesej menjadi penyelamat untuk "negara beruang", sebuah cerita yang sama-sama bodoh dan manis yang menunjukkan hatinya yang besar di lengan besarnya yang sebesar beruang.
back_translation: The message is a savior for the "bear country", a story that is equally silly and sweet, showing his big heart in his big bear-like arms.

text: simon calms his prot & # 233 ; g & # 233 ; that genuine happiness only comes from the inside .
translation: Simon menenangkan anak didiknya dengan mengatakan bahawa kebahagiaan sebenar hanya datang dari dalam.
back_translation: Simon reassured his students by saying that true happiness only comes from within.

text: sandra bullock and hugh grant make a great team , but this predictable romantic comedy should get a pink slip .
translation: Sandra Bullock dan Hugh Grant membentuk pasukan yang hebat, tetapi filem komedi romantis yang boleh diteka ini sepatutnya dibuang.
back_translation: Sandra Bullock and Hugh Grant form a great team, but this romantic comedy film that can be guessed should be disposed of.

text: probes in a light-hearted way the romantic problems of individuals for whom the yearning for passion spells discontent .
translation: Menyiasat dengan cara yang ringan masalah-masalah romantis individu yang merasakan bahawa kerinduan untuk bergairah membawa kepada ketidakpuasan.
back_translation: Investigating lightly on the romantic issues of individuals who feel that the longing for passion leads to dissatisfaction.

text: a girl at a southern baptist high school finds that her pregnancy makes her an outcast .
translation: Seorang gadis di sekolah tinggi Baptist Selatan mendapati bahawa kehamilannya menjadikannya terasing.
back_translation: A girl at South Baptist High School found that her pregnancy made her isolated.

text: at the age of 25 , tiz is considered a survivor .
translation: Pada usia 25, Tiz dianggap sebagai seorang yang bertahan.
back_translation: At 25, Tiz is considered a survivor.

text: but katherine holds her back , not to let interfere anything with her successful career .
translation: Tetapi Katherine mengekang dirinya, supaya tidak mengganggu karier berjayanya.
back_translation: But Katherine restrains herself from disrupting her successful career.

text: the story of trouble every day . . . is so sketchy it amounts to little more than preliminary notes for a science-fiction horror film , and the movie 's fragmentary narrative style makes piecing the story together frustrating difficult .
translation: Kisah kesusahan setiap hari... begitu tidak lengkap sehingga hampir seperti catatan awal untuk filem seram sains fiksyen, dan gaya naratif yang pecahan filem tersebut menjadikan usaha menyusun semula cerita menjadi sesuatu yang sukar dan memeningkan.
back_translation: The tales of daily struggles... so incomplete that it almost resembles a rough draft for a science fiction horror movie, and the fragmented narrative style of the film makes the task of reconstructing the story difficult and bewildering.

text: with wit and empathy to spare , waydowntown acknowledges the silent screams of workaday inertia but stops short of indulging its characters ' striving solipsism .
translation: Dengan kecerdikan dan rasa empati yang mencukupi, waydowntown mengakui jeritan senyap dari inersia rutin pekerjaan tetapi tidak terlalu membiarkan solipsisme usaha watak-wataknya.
back_translation: With sufficient sharpness and empathy, waydowntown acknowledges the silent cries of routine work inertia but does not overly indulge in the solipsism of its characters' efforts.

text: tom is a charismatic late-night radio talk show host , whose unconventional upbringing has made him a little too quick to fall in love and marry , resulting in three divorces before the age of 40 .
translation: Tom adalah hos acara perbualan radio malam yang sangat karismatik, yang membesar dengan cara yang tidak biasa yang membuatnya terlalu cepat jatuh cinta dan berkahwin, yang mengakibatkan tiga penceraian sebelum berusia 40 tahun.
back_translation: Tom is a charismatic host of a late-night radio talk show, who grew up in an unusual way that made him fall in love and get married too quickly, resulting in three divorces before the age of 40.

text: philippa is arrested and questioned about her ( supposedly terroristic ) motives .
translation: Philippa ditahan dan ditanya mengenai motifnya (yang disyaki sebagai tindakan berteroris).
back_translation: Philippa was arrested and questioned about her motives (suspected of being a terrorist act).

text: he wanted to make a difference - but nothing does at downview high .
translation: Dia ingin membuat perubahan - tetapi tiada yang berlaku di Downview High.
back_translation: He wants to make a change - but nothing is happening at Downview High.

text: what might 've been an exhilarating exploration of an odd love triangle becomes a sprawl of uncoordinated vectors .
translation: Apa yang mungkin merupakan penerokaan yang mengujakan tentang segitiga cinta yang aneh menjadi merentasi vektor yang tidak sepadan.
back_translation: What could be an intriguing exploration of the strange love triangle veering across mismatched vectors.

text: this may be burns 's strongest film since the brothers mcmullen .
translation: Filem ini mungkin merupakan filem terbaik Burns sejak Brothers McMullen.
back_translation: This film may be the best film by Burns since Brothers McMullen.

text: the parts are better than the whole ( bizarre , funny , tragic - like love in new york ) .
translation: Bahagian-bahagian lebih baik daripada keseluruhannya (aneh, lucu, tragis - seperti cinta di New York).
back_translation: Parts are often better than the whole (strange, funny, tragic - like love in New York).

text: [ davis ] has a bright , chipper style that keeps things moving , while never quite managing to connect her wish-fulfilling characters to the human race .
translation: [ Davis ] mempunyai gaya yang ceria dan bersemangat yang membuat segala-galanya bergerak, tetapi tidak pernah benar-benar berjaya menghubungkan watak-watak yang mewakili impian mereka dengan manusia biasa.
back_translation: [ Davis ] has a cheerful and energetic style that gets everything moving, but has never truly succeeded in connecting characters embodying their dreams with ordinary people.

text: the cast , collectively a successful example of the lovable-loser protagonist , shows deft comic timing .
translation: Pengalaman pelakon, secara kolektifnya, merupakan contoh berjaya protagonis yang dikasihi tetapi gagal, dan memperlihatkan ketepatan semasa dalam penceritaan komedi.
back_translation: The actors' experience, collectively, is an example of successful protagonists who are loved but fail, and demonstrates the accuracy of timing in comedy storytelling.

text: leela is a film based on the south asian-american experience .
translation: Leela adalah filem berdasarkan pengalaman Asia Selatan Amerika.
back_translation: Leela is a film based on the experiences of South Asian America.

text: as he tries to re-discover the family that he abandoned long ago , he is forced to confront the anxieties in his memories - the family he betrayed and abandoned at the expense of his own happiness .
translation: Apabila dia cuba untuk mengemukakan semula keluarga yang ditinggalkannya sekian lama, dia terpaksa menghadapi kegelisahan dalam kenangan- keluarga yang dikhianati dan ditinggalkannya dengan mengorbankan kebahagiaannya sendiri.
back_translation: When he tries to reconnect with the family he left behind for so long, he has to face the anxiety in the memories - of a betrayed family and one he left behind by sacrificing his own happiness.

text: enough trivializes an important crisis , reduces it to an almost comic embarrassment .
translation: Cukup menganggap remeh suatu krisis penting, mengurangkannya menjadi suatu rasa malu hampir seperti komedi.
back_translation: Underestimating a significant crisis, reducing it to almost a sense of shame is akin to a comedy.

text: may not have generated many sparks , but with his affection for astoria and its people he has given his tale a warm glow .
translation: Mungkin tidak banyak mencetuskan percikan, tetapi dengan kasih sayangnya terhadap Astoria dan penduduknya, dia telah memberikan kisahnya sinar kehangatan.
back_translation: Perhaps not making much sparks, but with his love towards Astoria and its people, he has brought the warmth of his story.

text: narc is a no-bull throwback to 1970s action films . it zips along with b-movie verve while adding the rich details and go-for-broke acting that heralds something special .
translation: narc adalah satu penghargaan kepada filem aksi era 1970-an tanpa banyak lelembut. Filem ini bergerak pantas dengan semangat filem B, sambil menambah butiran kaya dan lakonan berani yang menandakan sesuatu yang istimewa.
back_translation: "Narc is a tribute to 1970s action films without much softness. The film moves quickly with a B-movie spirit, adding rich details and bold performances that signify something special."

text: as tricky and satisfying as any of david mamet 's airless cinematic shell games .
translation: sebagai berbelit-belit dan memuaskan seperti permainan dedaulat sinematik david mamet yang tiada udara.
back_translation: as convoluted and satisfying as David Mamet's airless cinematic puzzle game.

text: from the choppy editing to the annoying score to 'special effects ' by way of replacing objects in a character 's hands below the camera line , `` besotted `` is misbegotten
translation: Dari penyuntingan yang terputus-putus hingga skor yang menjengkelkan ke "kesan khas" dengan cara menggantikan objek dalam tangan watak di bawah garis kamera, "tersilap" adalah malang.
back_translation: From interrupted editing to annoying scores to the "special effects" by replacing objects in the character's hand below the camera line, "mistakes" are unfortunate.

text: the pink house is a fast-paced , youthful comedy that has been called a sweeter , more intellectual animal house .
translation: Rumah pink adalah sebuah filem komedi yang cepat bergerak dan muda yang telah digelar sebagai sebuah Animal House yang lebih manis dan lebih berfikiran.
back_translation: The Pink House is a fast-paced and youthful comedy film that has been described as a sweeter and more sophisticated version of Animal House.

text: shy tonho dreams of being successful , but misses his family and brazil .
translation: Tonho yang pemalu bermimpi untuk berjaya, tetapi rindu kepada keluarganya dan Brazil.
back_translation: Shy Tonho dreams of success, but misses his family and Brazil.

text: with a single clue to their whereabouts and nothing to lose , he leaves to find 'his people ' .
translation: Dengan petunjuk tunggal mengenai di mana mereka berada dan tiada apa yang hilang, dia pergi mencari 'rakan-rakannya'.
back_translation: With the single clue about where they are and nothing missing, he went to look for his 'friends'.

text: in the end , egoyan 's enormous talent and mychael danna 's intense score keep ararat interesting and emotional .
translation: Pada akhirnya, bakat yang besar milik Egoyan dan skor yang intens oleh Mychael Danna membuat filem Ararat menarik dan penuh emosi.
back_translation: In the end, Egoyan's great talent and Mychael Danna's intense score make the film "Ararat" captivating and full of emotions.

text: an afterschool special without the courage of its convictions .
translation: sebuah program selepas sekolah tanpa keberanian dalam keyakinannya.
back_translation: A post-school program without courage in its conviction.

text: despite the authenticity of the trappings , the film is overblown in its plotting , hackneyed in its dialogue and anachronistic in its style .
translation: Walaupun autentisiti peralatannya, filem itu terlalu berlebihan dalam plotnya, klise dalam dialognya, dan anakhronistik dalam gayanya.
back_translation: Although its equipment authenticity, the film is too excessive in its plot, clichéd in its dialogue, and anachronistic in its style.

text: despite a quieter middle section , involving aragorn 's dreams of arwen , this is even better than the fellowship . there are scenes of cinematic perfection that steal your heart away .
translation: Walaupun terdapat bahagian tengah yang lebih tenang, melibatkan mimpi Aragorn tentang Arwen, filem ini lebih baik daripada The Fellowship. Terdapat adegan-adegan kesempurnaan sinematik yang mencuri hati anda.
back_translation: Although there is a calmer middle section involving Aragorn's dream about Arwen, this movie is better than The Fellowship. There are cinematic perfection scenes that will steal your heart.

text: you really have to wonder how on earth anyone , anywhere could have thought they 'd make audiences guffaw with a script as utterly diabolical as this .
translation: Anda betul-betul harus bertanya bagaimana sesiapa pun, di mana-mana boleh berfikir bahawa mereka akan membuat penonton ketawa terbahak-bahak dengan skrip sebarangan ini.
back_translation: You really have to ask how anyone, anywhere could think that they would make the audience laugh out loud with such a random script.

text: the vitality of the actors keeps the intensity of the film high , even as the strafings blend together .
translation: Vitaliti pelakon-pelakon menjaga intensiti filem tinggi, walaupun aksi tembakan berterusan bergabung bersama.
back_translation: The actors' vitality maintains the high intensity of the film, even with continuous shooting action sequences joining in.

text: during that time , evelyn and her brothers suffer the abuses of living in orphanages while desmond struggles to secure finances .
translation: Pada masa itu, Evelyn dan adik-adik lelakinya menderita dari penindasan tinggal di rumah anak yatim sementara Desmond berjuang untuk memperoleh kewangan.
back_translation: At that time, Evelyn and her younger brothers were suffering from oppression living in a temporary orphanage while Desmond struggled to obtain finances.

text: the discovery of this new world is described parallel to other stories of emancipation , such as that of three young prostitutes , of an aged couple going nowhere and man 's n landing on the moon .
translation: Penemuan dunia baru ini digambarkan seiring dengan cerita-cerita pembebasan lain, seperti kisah tiga orang pelacur muda, sepasang tua yang tidak tahu hendak ke mana, dan ketibaan manusia di bulan.
back_translation: The discovery of this new world is depicted along with other liberation stories, such as the tale of three young prostitutes, an old couple unsure of where to go, and the arrival of humans on the moon.

text: an occasionally funny , but overall limp , fish-out-of-water story .
translation: Sebuah cerita yang kadang-kadang lucu, tetapi secara keseluruhan lemah, tentang ikan yang terdampar di tempat yang tidak sesuai.
back_translation: A story that is sometimes funny, but overall weak, about a fish stranded in an unsuitable place.

text: the period -- swinging london in the time of the mods and the rockers -- gets the once-over once again in gangster no . 1 , but falls apart long before the end .
translation: Tempoh itu - London bergoyang pada zaman mods dan rockers - sekali lagi diperhatikan dalam gangster no. 1, tetapi berantakan jauh sebelum berakhir.
back_translation: During that period - London was shaken by the mods and rockers era - once again observed in gangster no. 1, but fell apart far before it ended.

text: ben affleck as jack ryan , tom clancy 's intrepid hero ? ridiculous . what 's next ? d . j . qualls as indiana jones ? or tom green as han solo ?
translation: ben affleck sebagai jack ryan, pahlawan berani tom clancy? melampau. apakah seterusnya? d. j. qualls sebagai indiana jones? atau tom green sebagai han solo?
back_translation: Ben Affleck as Jack Ryan, Tom Clancy's brave hero? Too much. What's next? D.J. Qualls as Indiana Jones? Or Tom Green as Han Solo?

text: in the world of skin deep , not all suspects are created equal .
translation: Dalam dunia yang kelihatan, tidak semua suspek dicipta sama.
back_translation: In the visible world, not all suspects are created equal.

text: their reporting becomes more compelling when they gather the courage to tell the truth about witnessing two of their peers throw a four-year-old out of a 14th story window .
translation: Laporan mereka menjadi lebih menarik apabila mereka mengumpulkan keberanian untuk menceritakan kebenaran tentang menyaksikan dua rakan sebaya mereka melemparkan seorang kanak-kanak berusia empat tahun keluar dari tingkap tingkat 14.
back_translation: Their report became more interesting when they gathered the courage to tell the truth about witnessing two of their peers throwing a four-year-old child out of a 14th-floor window.

text: hellbent on vengence , jason renews his bloodbath in pursuit of personally slaughtering krueger , and anyone else in his path .
translation: Azam membalas dendam, Jason memulakan kembali pembunuhan dalam usahanya untuk membunuh Krueger secara peribadi, serta sesiapa sahaja yang berada di jalannya.
back_translation: Azam seeks revenge, Jason resumes the killing in his efforts to personally murder Krueger, as well as anyone in his way.

text: gradually , will and marcus become friends , and as will teaches marcus how to be a cool kid , marcus helps will to finally grow up .
translation: Secara perlahan, Will dan Marcus menjadi kawan, dan semasa Will mengajar Marcus untuk menjadi kanak-kanak keren, Marcus membantu Will akhirnya menjadi dewasa.
back_translation: Slowly, Will and Marcus became friends, and while Will taught Marcus to be a cool kid, Marcus helped Will eventually become an adult.

text: documentary-style drama showing the events that lead up to the tragic incident on january 30 , 1972 in the northern ireland town of derry when a protest march led by civil rights activist ivan cooper was fired upon by british troops , killing 13 protesters and wounding 14 more .
translation: Drama gaya dokumentari menunjukkan peristiwa yang mengakibatkan insiden tragis pada 30 Januari 1972 di bandar Derry, Ireland Utara di mana perarakan protes yang dipimpin oleh aktivis hak asasi manusia, Ivan Cooper, ditembaki oleh tentera British, menyebabkan 13 peserta protes terbunuh dan 14 lagi cedera.
back_translation: A docudrama style show depicts the events that led to the tragic incident on January 30, 1972 in the city of Derry, Northern Ireland where a protest march led by human rights activist, Ivan Cooper, was shot by the British army, resulting in the deaths of 13 protesters and injuries to 14 others.

text: but even with the two-wrongs-make-a-right chemistry between jolie and burns . . . this otherwise appealing picture loses its soul to screenwriting for dummies conformity .
translation: Tetapi walaupun dengan kimia dua-salah-menjadi-betul antara jolie dan burns . . . gambaran yang sebaliknya menarik ini kehilangan jiwanya kepada kepatuhan penulisan skrip yang mudah difahami.
back_translation: But even with the chemistry-gone-wrong between Jolie and Burns . . . this otherwise intriguing portrayal loses its soul to the compliance of an easily understood script.

text: in its understanding , often funny way , it tells a story whose restatement is validated by the changing composition of the nation .
translation: Dalam pemahamannya, dengan cara yang sering lucu, ia mengisahkan sebuah cerita yang penulisannya disahkan oleh perubahan susunan bangsa.
back_translation: In his understanding, often in a humorous way, he narrates a story that is authentically portrayed through changes in the nation's structure.

text: though the dutchman is white , he has been found to be a reincarnated king in the west african nation of ghana - his wife 's homeland .
translation: Walaupun orang Belanda itu berkulit putih, dia telah didapati menjadi seorang raja yang terlahir semula di negara Afrika Barat Ghana - tanah air isterinya.
back_translation: Even though the Dutch person is white-skinned, he has been found to be a king reborn in the West African country of Ghana - his wife's homeland.

text: how inept is serving sara ? it makes even elizabeth hurley seem graceless and ugly .
translation: Betapa tidak cekap melayan Sara? Ia membuatkan Elizabeth Hurley kelihatan kasar dan hodoh.
back_translation: How incompetent in treating Sara? It makes Elizabeth Hurley look rude and ugly.

text: money 's tight , relationships are tough and all around us , media and advertising constantly bombard us with competing messages .
translation: Wang terhad, hubungan sukar, dan di sekeliling kita, media dan pengiklanan sentiasa menyerang kita dengan mesej-mesej yang bersaing.
back_translation: Limited finances, difficult relationships, and around us, the media and advertising are constantly bombarding us with competing messages.

text: hard as this may be to believe , here on earth , a surprisingly similar teen drama , was a better film .
translation: Sukar untuk dipercayai, di bumi ini, sebuah drama remaja yang agak serupa, merupakan filem yang lebih baik.
back_translation: Hard to believe, on this earth, a somewhat similar teenage drama is a better movie.

text: it throws quirky characters , odd situations , and off-kilter dialogue at us , all as if to say , `` look at this ! this is an interesting movie ! `` but the film itself is ultimately quite unengaging .
translation: Filem itu melemparkan watak-watak aneh, situasi yang ganjil, dan dialog yang berlainan arah kepada kita, seolah-olah berkata, "Pandanglah ini! Ini adalah filem yang menarik!" tetapi filem itu pada hakikatnya agak tidak menarik.
back_translation: The movie throws strange characters, bizarre situations, and disjointed dialogues at us, as if saying, "Look at this! This is an interesting movie!" but the movie is actually quite uninteresting.

text: those 24-and-unders looking for their own caddyshack to adopt as a generational signpost may have to keep on looking .
translation: Mereka yang berusia 24 tahun ke bawah yang mencari caddyshack sendiri untuk dijadikan tanda zaman generasi mungkin perlu terus mencari.
back_translation: Those aged 24 and below looking for their own caddyshack as a symbol of their generation may need to continue searching.

text: first kammy meets the 40-year-old danny ( dave wong ) and falls head over heels .
translation: Pertama, Kammy bertemu dengan Danny yang berumur 40 tahun (Dave Wong) dan jatuh cinta dengan sepenuh hati.
back_translation: First, Kammy met Danny who is 40 years old (Dave Wong) and fell in love wholeheartedly.

text: when investigative reporter , chase somete and her team are on a trail of uncovering this organized fight ring , suk is torn between protecting the only family he knows , and defending the person who can bring him down .
translation: Apabila wartawan penyiasat, Chase Somite dan pasukannya sedang mengikuti jejak untuk mendedahkan gelanggang pertarungan teratur ini, Suk terbelah antara melindungi keluarga yang dia kenali, dan membela orang yang boleh menghancurkannya.
back_translation: When investigative journalist, Chase Somite and his team are on the trail to uncover this organized fighting ring, Suk is torn between protecting the family he knows, and defending those who could destroy him.

text: you might say tykwer has done all that heaven allows , if you wanted to make as anti-kieslowski a pun as possible . suffice to say its total promise is left slightly unfulfilled .
translation: Anda boleh kata bahawa Tykwer telah melakukan segalanya yang diperbolehkan syurga, jika anda ingin membuat pampasan anti-Kieslowski seberapa mungkin. Cukup kata janjinya keseluruhan ditinggalkan sedikit tidak terpenuhi.
back_translation: You could say that Tykwer has done everything allowed by heaven, if you want to compensate for the anti-Kieslowski as much as possible. Simply put, his overall promise is left somewhat unfulfilled.

text: when the young and highly repressive king pentheus discovers that his own mother agave has given herself over to this upstart god of wine and erotic joy , he declares a state of war , despite the very stern warnings of cadmus , the former king and the famed prophet teiresias .
translation: Apabila raja muda yang sangat tegas, Pentheus, mendapati bahawa ibunya sendiri, Agave, telah menyerahkan diri kepada dewa anggur dan kegembiraan erotis baru, dia mengisytiharkan keadaan peperangan, walaupun amaran-amran keras daripada Cadmus, bekas raja, dan nabi terkenal, Teiresias.
back_translation: When the very stern crown prince, Pentheus, found out that his own mother, Agave, had surrendered herself to the god of wine and new erotic joy, he declared a state of war, despite strong warnings from Cadmus, the former king, and the famous prophet, Teiresias.

text: a plan to start a parisian salon with a distinctively democratic air brings conflict with her new surroundings and an unusual ally in a country girl raised by pigs .
translation: Satu rancangan untuk memulakan sebuah salon Parisian dengan ciri-ciri demokratik yang menarik pertikaian dengan persekitarannya yang baru dan sekutu yang tidak biasa dalam seorang gadis desa yang dibesarkan oleh babi.
back_translation: A plan to start a Parisian salon with attractive democratic features that are in conflict with its new surroundings and unusual allies, featuring a country girl raised by pigs.

text: boll uses a lot of quick cutting and blurry step-printing to goose things up , but dopey dialogue and sometimes inadequate performances kill the effect .
translation: Boll menggunakan banyak pemotongan cepat dan cetakan kabur untuk menghidupkan suasana, tetapi dialog bodoh dan pertunjukan yang kadang-kadang tidak memuaskan merosakkan kesan tersebut.
back_translation: Boll uses a lot of fast editing and blurry shots to liven up the atmosphere, but silly dialogues and occasionally unsatisfying performances ruin the impact.

text: just like any other elevator in any old building .
translation: Sama seperti mana-mana lif dalam mana-mana bangunan lama.
back_translation: Just like any elevator in any old building.

text: `` issaquena `` chronicles the decay of a wealthy mississippi delta family in the 1930 's .
translation: ``Issaquena`` menceritakan kemerosotan sebuah keluarga kaya di delta Mississippi pada tahun 1930-an.
back_translation: "Issaquena" tells the decline of a wealthy family in the Mississippi delta in the 1930s.

text: then one night she surprises her husband frank ( dennis quaid ) having sex with another man , and her tidy world starts spinning out of control .
translation: Maka suatu malam dia terkejut apabila dia menemui suaminya, Frank (Dennis Quaid), sedang berhubungan badan dengan lelaki lain, dan dunianya yang teratur mula tergelincir dari kawalannya.
back_translation: One night she was shocked when she found her husband, Frank (Dennis Quaid), having intercourse with another man, and her orderly world began to slip out of control.

text: haynes has so fanatically fetishized every bizarre old-movie idiosyncrasy with such monastic devotion you 're not sure if you should applaud or look into having him committed .
translation: Haynes telah sangat mengidolakan setiap keanehan lama filem dengan penuh pemujaan sehingga anda tidak pasti sama ada anda perlu bertepuk tangan atau memikirkan untuk memasukkannya ke hospital.
back_translation: Haynes has idolized every old film quirk so reverently that you're not sure whether to applaud or think about checking him into a hospital.

text: i 'm not a fan of the phrase 'life affirming ' because it usually means 'schmaltzy , ' but real women have curves truly is life affirming .
translation: Saya tidak menyokong frasa 'memperkuat kehidupan' kerana ia biasanya bermaksud 'melampau-lampau', tetapi wanita sebenar mempunyai lengkung benar-benar memperkuat kehidupan.
back_translation: I do not support the phrase 'enhancing life' because it usually means 'going overboard', but a real woman truly has curves that truly enhance life.

text: with the help of an angry young filmmaker , a russian sound recordist hoping to break into the local film industry , and a seven-foot tall tow truck driver from quebec , he embarks on a comical investigation into . . .
translation: Dengan bantuan seorang pengarah filem muda yang marah, seorang juru rakam bunyi Rusia yang berharap untuk berjaya dalam industri filem tempatan, dan seorang pemandu truk tolak yang tingginya tujuh kaki dari Quebec, dia memulakan penyiasatan komikal ke dalam . . .
back_translation: With the help of an angry young film director, a Russian sound recordist hoping to succeed in the local film industry, and a seven-foot-tall Quebec tow truck driver, he embarks on a comical investigation into . . .

text: but when it comes down to it , the one thing stopping you from living your dreams is you .
translation: Tetapi apabila sampai pada perkara itu, satu hal yang menghalang anda daripada menjalani impian anda adalah anda sendiri.
back_translation: But when it comes to that, one thing that hinders you from pursuing your dreams is yourself.

text: pray 's film works well and will appeal even to those who are n't too familiar with turntablism .
translation: Filem 'Pray' akan berjaya dan menarik minat walaupun kepada mereka yang tidak terlalu faham tentang turntablism.
back_translation: The film 'Pray' will be successful and captivating, even to those who do not understand much about turntablism.

text: when a regular fashion show goes horribly wrong , they are sucked into the nasty but irresistible underworld of bombay .
translation: Apabila pertunjukan fesyen biasa menjadi sangat teruk, mereka disedut ke dalam dunia bawah tanah Bombay yang jahat tetapi tidak dapat dilawan.
back_translation: When a regular fashion show goes terribly wrong, they are sucked into the evil but unbeatable underworld of Bombay.

text: they start an in-depth investigation of a doctor chu , who is shin-hyun 's psychiatrist .
translation: Mereka memulakan penyiasatan mendalam mengenai seorang doktor Chu, yang merupakan psikiatri Shin-Hyun.
back_translation: They began an in-depth investigation into a doctor Chu, who is a psychiatrist Shin-Hyun.

text: with spy kids 2 : the island of lost dreams , the spy kids franchise establishes itself as a durable part of the movie landscape : a james bond series for kids .
translation: Dengan Spy Kids 2: The Island of Lost Dreams, francais Spy Kids membuktikan dirinya sebagai bahagian yang tahan lama dalam landskap filem: satu siri James Bond untuk kanak-kanak.
back_translation: With Spy Kids 2: The Island of Lost Dreams, the Spy Kids franchise proves itself as a durable part of the film landscape: a James Bond series for kids.

text: for the first time in years , de niro digs deep emotionally , perhaps because he 's been stirred by the powerful work of his co-stars .
translation: Untuk pertama kalinya dalam beberapa tahun, De Niro menggali emosi secara mendalam, mungkin kerana dipengaruhi oleh kerja hebat rakan lakonannya.
back_translation: For the first time in several years, De Niro delved into emotions deeply, perhaps influenced by the great work of his fellow actors.

text: the sweetest thing , a romantic comedy with outrageous tendencies , may be a mess in a lot of ways . but it does have one saving grace . a lot of its gags and observations reflect a woman 's point-of-view .
translation: Filem romantis komedi yang penuh kebaruan, mungkin kacau dalam banyak hal. Tetapi ia mempunyai satu kelebihan yang dapat diselamatkan. Banyak daripada jenaka dan pemerhatian filem itu mencerminkan sudut pandang seorang wanita.
back_translation: A romantic comedy film full of freshness, perhaps messy in many ways. But it has one redeeming quality. Many of the jokes and observations in the film reflect a woman's perspective.

text: adopting the name `` spider-man `` , peter first uses his newfound powers to make money , but after his uncle is murdered at the hands of a criminal peter failed to stop , he swears to use his powers to fight the evil that killed his uncle .
translation: Mengambil nama "spider-man", Peter pertama kali menggunakan kekuatan baru yang ditemuinya untuk mendapatkan wang, tetapi selepas bapa saudaranya dibunuh oleh seorang penjenayah yang gagal Peter halang, beliau bersumpah untuk menggunakan kekuatannya untuk memerangi kejahatan yang membunuh bapa saudaranya.
back_translation: Taking on the name "Spider-Man," Peter initially used his newfound powers to make money, but after his uncle was killed by a failed criminal Peter failed to stop, he swore to use his powers to fight the crime that killed his uncle.

text: he is still famous , although still disliked by snape , malfoy , and the rest of the slytherins .
translation: Dia masih terkenal, walaupun masih tidak disenangi oleh Snape, Malfoy, dan selebihnya daripada Slytherins.
back_translation: He is still famous, although he is still not liked by Snape, Malfoy, and the rest of the Slytherins.

text: sandra bullock , despite downplaying her good looks , carries a little too much ain't- she-cute baggage into her lead role as a troubled and determined homicide cop to quite pull off the heavy stuff .
translation: Sandra Bullock, walaupun merendahkan kecantikan, membawa terlalu banyak bagasi "ain't-she-cute" ke watak utama sebagai seorang polis pembunuh yang bermasalah dan bertekad untuk benar-benar menghadapi situasi yang berat.
back_translation: Sandra Bullock, despite downplaying her beauty, brings too much "ain't-she-cute" baggage to the lead role as a troubled and determined police killer facing some heavy situations.

text: if oscar had a category called best bad film you thought was going to be really awful but was n't , guys would probably be duking it out with the queen of the damned for the honor .
translation: Jika anugerah Oscar mempunyai kategori yang dipanggil filem terburuk yang anda fikir akan sangat teruk tetapi sebenarnya tidak, "Guys" mungkin akan bertarung dengan "Queen of the Damned" untuk kehormatan itu.
back_translation: If the Oscar had a category called the worst film that you think would be really bad but actually not, "Guys" might be competing with "Queen of the Damned" for that honor.

text: one of those decades-spanning historical epics that strives to be intimate and socially encompassing but fails to do justice to either effort in three hours of screen time .
translation: Salah satu epik bersejarah yang merentang dekad ini berusaha untuk menjadi intim dan meliputi secara sosial tetapi gagal memberikan keadilan kepada kedua usaha tersebut dalam tiga jam masa skrin.
back_translation: One of the historical epics spanning this decade strives to be intimate and socially comprehensive but fails to deliver justice to both endeavors within a three-hour screen time.

text: every moment crackles with tension , and by the end of the flick , you 're on the edge of your seat .
translation: Setiap detik diisi dengan ketegangan, dan menjelang akhir filem, anda berada di tepi kerusi anda.
back_translation: Every moment is filled with tension, and as the film nears its end, you are on the edge of your seat.

text: combining historical documentation , personal stories , and interviews with noted experts and legislators , this documentary honors the dildo 's fight for legitimacy and its many admirers .
translation: Dengan menggabungkan dokumentasi sejarah, cerita peribadi, dan temubual dengan pakar-pakar terkemuka dan ahli undang-undang, dokumentari ini mempersembahkan penghargaan kepada usaha dildo untuk mendapatkan pengiktirafan serta peminat-peminatnya yang ramai.
back_translation: By combining historical documentation, personal stories, and interviews with leading experts and legal professionals, this documentary pays tribute to the efforts of the dildo to gain recognition as well as its numerous fans.

text: the film is to be produced by jules , melina 's husband .
translation: Filem itu akan dihasilkan oleh Jules, suami Melina.
back_translation: The film will be produced by Jules, Melina's husband.

text: provides an intriguing look at how the new economy has redrawn class lines in contemporary china .
translation: Memberikan pandangan yang menarik tentang bagaimana ekonomi baru telah melukis semula garis kelas di China kontemporari.
back_translation: Providing an interesting perspective on how the new economy has redrawn class lines in contemporary China.

text: a film without surprise geared toward maximum comfort and familiarity .
translation: Filem tanpa kejutan yang ditujukan kepada keselesaan maksimum dan keseronokan.
back_translation: A movie without surprises directed towards maximum comfort and enjoyment.

text: in other words , it 's just another sports drama/character study . yet this one makes up for in heart what it lacks in outright newness . plus , like i already mentioned . . . it 's robert duvall ! c'mon !
translation: Dengan kata lain, ini hanyalah satu lagi drama sukan / kajian watak. namun yang ini diganti dengan keikhlasan walaupun tidak ada unsur kebaruan yang ketara. tambahan pula, seperti yang saya sebutkan sebelum ini... ini melibatkan Robert Duvall! Mari lah!
back_translation: In other words, this is just another sports drama / character study. However, this one is infused with sincerity despite the lack of significant innovation. Furthermore, as I mentioned earlier... this involves Robert Duvall! Let's go!

text: he has the wrong blood type to be able to donate one of his kidneys , so he arranges a trade with a group of organ dealers : one of his kidneys , and 10 million won , in return for their finding a kidney for his sister .
translation: Dia mempunyai jenis darah yang salah untuk menderma salah satu ginjalnya, jadi dia mengatur pertukaran dengan kumpulan penjual organ: salah satu ginjalnya, dan 10 juta won, sebagai ganti untuk mereka mencari ginjal untuk adiknya.
back_translation: He has the wrong blood type to donate one of his kidneys, so he arranged a trade with a group of organ sellers: one of his kidneys, and 10 million won, in exchange for them to find a kidney for his sibling.

text: these people , most of whom were american citizens , were taken from their homes and sent to `` relocation `` camps in desolate , isloated areas .
translation: Mereka, kebanyakan daripada mereka warga Amerika, telah diambil dari rumah mereka dan dihantar ke kem "pengasingan" di kawasan terpencil dan terpencil.
back_translation: Most of them, majority being Americans, have been taken from their homes and sent to "exile" camps in remote and isolated areas.

text: a bit too derivative to stand on its own as the psychological thriller it purports to be .
translation: Agak terlalu turut mengikut sertai untuk berdiri sendiri sebagai filem cerita seram psikologi yang dipercayai.
back_translation: Somewhat overly eager to join in standing alone as a believed psychological horror movie.

text: in the throes of falling for one another , they are soon forced to deal with the bitter realities of their lives prior to that chance encounter .
translation: Dalam lingkungan jatuh cinta satu sama lain, mereka segera terpaksa menghadapi realiti pahit kehidupan mereka sebelum pertemuan kebetulan itu.
back_translation: In the midst of falling in love with each other, they soon find themselves forced to confront the bitter reality of their lives before that chance encounter.

text: while soderbergh succeeds in recapturing the themes and mood of tarkovsky 's version , he also brings with them a cold , emotionless sheen , a detached air that defeats his efforts to truly engage us .
translation: Sementara Soderbergh berjaya menghidupkan semula tema dan suasana versi Tarkovsky, beliau juga membawa bersama ciri kilauan sejuk dan tanpa emosi, satu suasana yang tenang yang menumpaskan usahanya untuk benar-benar melibatkan kita.
back_translation: While Soderbergh successfully revived the theme and atmosphere of Tarkovsky's version, he also brought along a cool and emotionless quality, a serene atmosphere that hinders his efforts to truly engage us.

text: its purpose is to use the precog ( nitive ) potential of three genetically altered humans to prevent murders .
translation: Tujuannya adalah untuk menggunakan potensi kecerdasan (kognitif) tiga manusia yang diubah genetik untuk mencegah pembunuhan.
back_translation: The goal is to utilize the cognitive intelligence potential of three genetically modified humans to prevent murder.

text: every so often a movie comes along that confirms one 's worse fears about civilization as we know it . the new guy is one of them .
translation: Sesekali, filem baru muncul yang mengesahkan ketakutan terburuk seseorang tentang tamadun sebagaimana kita kenali. The New Guy adalah salah satunya.
back_translation: Occasionally, a new film emerges that validates one's worst fears about civilization as we know it. The New Guy is one of them.

text: director kevin bray excels in breaking glass and marking off the `` miami vice `` checklist of power boats , latin music and dog tracks . he does n't , however , deliver nearly enough of the show 's trademark style and flash .
translation: Pengarah Kevin Bray cemerlang dalam memecahkan kaca dan menandakan ''senarai semak 'miami vice' bot kuasa, muzik Latin dan lumba anjing. Walau bagaimanapun, dia tidak memberikan sebanyak gaya dan cahaya tanda dagangan rancangan tersebut.
back_translation: Director Kevin Bray excels in breaking glass and marking the 'Miami Vice' powerboat checklist, Latin music, and dog races. However, he does not provide as much style and trademark glamour of the show.

text: unlike most anime , whose most ardent fans outside japan seem to be introverted young men with fantasy fetishes , metropolis never seems hopelessly juvenile .
translation: Berbeza dengan kebanyakan anime, di mana peminat setia mereka di luar Jepun nampaknya adalah lelaki muda yang introvert dengan fesyen fantasi, Metropolis tidak pernah kelihatan terlalu remaja.
back_translation: Unlike most anime, where their loyal fans outside of Japan seem to be introverted young men with a penchant for fantasy fashion, Metropolis never seems too juvenile.

text: guzman 's powerful and sometimes triumphant documentary is not only an excellent overview of the affair , but serves as the perfect finale to the monumental trilogy about the coup and its aftermath .
translation: Dokumentari yang kuat dan kadang-kadang berjaya oleh Guzman bukan sahaja merupakan gambaran yang sangat baik tentang perkara tersebut, tetapi juga berperanan sebagai penutup yang sempurna kepada trilogi besar mengenai kudeta dan rentetan kejadian seterusnya.
back_translation: The powerful and sometimes successful documentary by Guzman not only provides a very good portrayal of the matter, but also serves as a perfect conclusion to the grand trilogy on coups and the subsequent events.

text: none of this is meaningful or memorable , but frosting is n't , either , and you would n't turn down a big bowl of that , would you ?
translation: Tiada yang bermakna atau mudah diingati, tetapi juga tidak begitu sebagai pemanis, dan anda tidak akan menolak mangkuk besar itu, bukan?
back_translation: Nothing is meaningful or easily remembered, but not so much as a sweetener, and you wouldn't reject that big bowl, would you?

text: torn between the divine and the carnal , the righteous and the unjust , father amaro must summon his strength to choose which life he will lead .
translation: Terjebak di antara yang ilahi dan yang duniawi, yang benar dan yang tidak adil, bapa Amaro harus mengumpulkan kekuatannya untuk memilih kehidupan mana yang akan dijalani.
back_translation: Caught between the divine and the earthly, the just and the unjust, Father Amaro must gather his strength to choose which life to lead.

text: over the next few days , united by nothing more than their common suffering , the two young women form an unlikely friendship to cope with the tragic events that threaten to overwhelm them .
translation: Dalam beberapa hari berikutnya, bersatu oleh penderitaan bersama mereka, kedua wanita muda membentuk persahabatan yang tidak mungkin untuk menghadapi peristiwa tragis yang mengancam untuk mengatasi mereka.
back_translation: In the following days, united by shared suffering, the two young women formed an unlikely friendship to face the tragic events that threatened to overwhelm them.

text: bigelow handles the nuclear crisis sequences evenly but milks drama when she should be building suspense , and drags out too many scenes toward the end that should move quickly .
translation: Bigelow mengendalikan urutan krisis nuklear dengan rata tetapi mengambil kesempatan untuk menambah dramatisasi ketika sepatutnya membangunkan ketegangan, dan melengahkan terlalu banyak adegan ke arah akhir yang sepatutnya bergerak dengan cepat.
back_translation: Bigelow handles the nuclear crisis sequence flatly but takes the opportunity to add dramatization when it should be building tension, and lingers too much on scenes towards the end that should move quickly.

text: i 'm not exactly sure what this movie thinks it is about .
translation: Saya tidak pasti apa yang filem ini cuba sampaikan.
back_translation: I am not sure what this movie is trying to convey.

text: this is the kind of movie that used to be right at home at the saturday matinee , and it still is .
translation: Ini adalah jenis filem yang dulu sangat sesuai ditayangkan pada waktu matinee hari Sabtu, dan masih begitu.
back_translation: This is the kind of movie that used to be very suitable to be shown during Saturday matinee, and still is.

text: femme fatale is not the director 's best work ever , but it is as good as we 've seen him be in much too long a time .
translation: Femme fatale bukanlah karya terbaik pengarah, tetapi ia sebaik yang pernah kita lihat beliau hasilkan dalam jangka masa yang terlalu lama.
back_translation: Femme fatale is not the director's best work, but it is the best that we have ever seen him produce in a very long time.

text: if you grew up on scooby -- you 'll love this movie . matthew lillard is born to play shaggy !
translation: Jika anda dibesarkan dengan Scooby-Doo, anda pasti akan suka filem ini. Matthew Lillard dilahirkan untuk memainkan watak Shaggy!
back_translation: If you were brought up with Scooby-Doo, you will surely love this movie. Matthew Lillard was born to play the role of Shaggy!

text: throwing caution to the wind with an invitation to the hedonist in us all , nair has constructed this motion picture in such a way that even the most cynical curmudgeon with find himself or herself smiling at one time or another .
translation: Melemparkan kehati-hatian ke angin dengan jemputan kepada hedonisme dalam diri kita semua, Nair telah membina filem ini dengan cara yang membuatkan walaupun orang yang paling sinis sekalipun akan mendapati dirinya tersenyum pada satu ketika atau yang lain.
back_translation: Throwing caution to the wind with an invitation to hedonism within all of us, Nair has crafted this film in a way that even the most cynical person will find themselves smiling at one point or another.

text: during the course of a single day all three will be faced with the difficult choice of choosing which path they will go down in life .
translation: Sepanjang satu hari, ketiga-tiga individu itu akan berhadapan dengan pilihan yang sukar untuk memilih jalan kehidupan yang mereka akan pilih.
back_translation: Throughout the day, all three individuals will face difficult choices in choosing the path of life they will take.

text: equilibrium the movie , as opposed to the manifesto , is really , really stupid .
translation: Filem Equilibrium, berbeza dengan manifesto, sangat, sangat bodoh.
back_translation: The film Equilibrium, different from the manifesto, is very, very stupid.

text: a limp eddie murphy vehicle that even he seems embarrassed to be part of .
translation: Sebuah filem Eddie Murphy yang hambar yang malah beliau sendiri nampak malu menjadi sebahagian daripadanya.
back_translation: An Eddie Murphy film that is so bland that he himself seems embarrassed to be a part of it.

text: the irony is that this film 's cast is uniformly superb ; their performances could have -- should have -- been allowed to stand on their own .
translation: Ironinya, pelakon dalam filem ini adalah sangat hebat; persembahan mereka sepatutnya telah - seharusnya telah - dibiarkan berdiri sendiri.
back_translation: Ironically, the actors in this film are very talented; their performance should have - must have - been allowed to stand on its own.

text: an uncomfortable movie , suffocating and sometimes almost senseless , the grey zone does have a center , though a morbid one .

back_translation: An uncomfortable, breath-taking, and sometimes almost nonsensical film, The Grey Zone has a center, albeit a horrifying one.

text: when a stranger stumbles in to their camp disoriented mumbling things about lights in the sky the four friends put in a struggle with a psychotic army colonel and a being that has taken control of one of their minds .

back_translation: When a stranger wanders into their camp in confusion, muttering about the light in the sky, the four friends get caught up in a struggle with a psychotic military colonel and a creature that controls one of their minds.

text: the biggest problem i have ( other than the very sluggish pace ) is we never really see her esther blossom as an actress , even though her talent is supposed to be growing .
translation: Masalah terbesar yang saya hadapi (selain daripada kelajuan yang sangat lambat) ialah kami tidak pernah benar-benar melihat bahawa Esther berkembang sebagai seorang pelakon, walaupun bakatnya sepatutnya semakin berkembang.
back_translation: The biggest issue I face (besides the very slow pace) is that we never truly see Esther grow as an actress, even though her talent should be flourishing.

text: the remaining friends must now rescue the captives , while desperately trying to avoid the long arm of the law .
translation: Rakan-rakan yang tinggal sekarang perlu menyelamatkan tebusan, sambil cuba dengan sangat mengelakkan tindakan undang-undang yang panjang.

text: it is intensely personal and yet -- unlike quills -- deftly shows us the temper of the times .
translation: Ia sangat peribadi dan namun -- tidak seperti bulu -- dengan cekap menunjukkan suasana waktu.
back_translation: It is very personal and yet - unlike feathers - efficiently indicates the passage of time.

text: 'bloody magic ' is the story of zack , an eleven year old school boy , who 's family is visited by three debt collectors .
translation: 'Bloody Magic' adalah kisah Zack, seorang budak lelaki berumur sebelas tahun, yang keluarganya dilawati oleh tiga penunggak hutang.
back_translation: 'Bloody Magic' is the story of Zack, an eleven-year-old boy, whose family is visited by three debt collectors.

text: an overstylized , purM-ied mM-ilange of sex , psychology , drugs and philosophy . sometimes entertaining , sometimes indulgent -- but never less than pure wankery .
translation: sebuah mélange terlalu dimuatkan dengan seks, psikologi, dadah, dan falsafah. Kadang-kadang menghibur, kadang-kadang berlebihan - tetapi tidak pernah kurang daripada penjilatan yang murni.

text: he follows them into a cave with a mysterious blue light and it turns out he is following h . g . wells , who , in turn , is on a time travel chase of dr . noah , a brilliant scientist who has gone mad with the intentions on destroying the world .

back_translation: He followed them into the cave with mysterious blue light and it turned out he was following H.G. Wells, who in turn was chasing Dr. Noah's time journey, a brilliant scientist who had gone mad with the intention of destroying the world.

text: based on nicole valery-grossu 's european best seller autobiographic novel `` bless you , prison `` , the film is a true story , with real events and characters .
translation: Berdasarkan novel autobiografi terlaris Eropah oleh Nicole Valery-Grossu "Bless You, Prison", filem ini adalah kisah benar dengan peristiwa dan watak sebenar.

text: in the year 2009 , a new drug known as blood heat is developed .

text: partnered with the sassy , stunning sistah girl , our hero must first undergo the ultimate attitude adjustment and trade in his 'fro and platforms for tennis sweaters and penny loafers .
translation: Berkongsi dengan gadis berani dan hebat, hero kita harus terlebih dahulu menjalani penyesuaian sikap yang utama dan menukarkan 'afro' dan platformnya dengan sweater tenis dan kasut penny.

text: no earth-shattering accomplishment , but an unusually smart movie that the whole family can go to without a single person getting bored or talked down to .
translation: Tiada kejayaan yang menggemparkan bumi, tetapi filem yang sangat bijak yang boleh dinikmati oleh seluruh keluarga tanpa ada seorang pun merasa bosan atau dianggap rendah.
back_translation: There is no groundbreaking success on Earth, but a very clever film that can be enjoyed by the whole family without anyone feeling bored or looked down upon.

text: it 's fun , but the code-talk will fly right over everyone 's head
translation: Ia menyeronokkan, tetapi cara percakapan kod akan terlalu rumit bagi sesiapa sahaja.

text: a bored secretary in the holiday firm funtime inc spends her time looking after the plants around her .

back_translation: A bored secretary at the funtime inc holiday firm spends his time taking care of the trees around him.

text: handsome and sincere but slightly awkward in its combination of entertainment and evangelical boosterism .
translation: Tampak tampan dan tulus tetapi sedikit canggung dalam gabungannya antara hiburan dan kerohanian penggalakan.

text: a film that perfectly distills the relationship between pop music and teens searching for identity .
translation: Filem yang sempurna merumuskan hubungan antara muzik pop dan remaja yang mencari identiti.
back_translation: The perfect film encapsulates the relationship between pop music and teenagers searching for identity.

text: but after he 's done his `` day job `` matt takes on a secret identity as `` the man without fear , `` daredevil , the masked avenger that patrols the neighborhood of hell 's kitchen and new york city to combat the injustice that he can not tackle in the courtroom .
translation: Tetapi setelah menyelesaikan "kerja harian"nya, Matt mengambil identiti rahsia sebagai "the man without fear," Daredevil, pahlawan bertopeng yang berpatroli di kawasan Hell's Kitchen dan New York City untuk memerangi ketidakadilan yang tidak dapat ditangani di mahkamah.
back_translation: But after completing his "daily job," Matt takes on the secret identity as "the man without fear," Daredevil, a masked hero who patrols the Hell's Kitchen and New York City areas to combat injustices that cannot be dealt with in court.

text: set in 1960 's sydney , this is the story of an australian gangster whose booming business , buoyed by the influx of u . s . soldiers in town for r & # 38 ; r during their tours in vietnam , attracts the attention of first the chicago mafia , and then their east coast competitors .
translation: Terletak di Sydney pada tahun 1960-an, ini adalah kisah tentang seorang gangster Australia yang bisnisnya berkembang pesat, didorong oleh kedatangan tentara Amerika Serikat yang berlibur selama tur mereka di Vietnam, menarik perhatian pertama-tama mafia Chicago, dan kemudian pesaing mereka di pantai timur.
back_translation: Set in Sydney in the 1960s, this is a story of an Australian gangster whose business flourished rapidly, driven by the arrival of American soldiers who were on vacation during their tour in Vietnam, drawing the attention first of the Chicago mafia, and later their rivals on the east coast.

text: prey for rock & # 38 ; roll is the story of jacki and her all-girl rock and roll band , clam dandy , who are trying to make it in the la club scene of the late 1980 's .
translation: Prey for Rock & Roll adalah kisah tentang Jacki dan band rock and roll wanitanya, Clam Dandy, yang berusaha untuk berjaya dalam scene kelab LA pada akhir tahun 1980-an.
back_translation: Prey for Rock & Roll is a story about Jacki and her all-female rock and roll band, Clam Dandy, who are striving to succeed in the LA club scene in the late 1980s.

text: meanwhile , a sith lord orchestrates events between the forces of good and evil , all the while waiting to play the final move that will ensure him control of the galaxy .
translation: Sementara itu, seorang tuan sith mengatur peristiwa antara pasukan kebaikan dan kejahatan, sambil menunggu untuk memainkan langkah terakhir yang akan memastikan dia menguasai galaksi.
back_translation: Meanwhile, a Sith lord orchestrates events between the forces of good and evil, waiting to make the final move that will ensure his dominance over the galaxy.

text: nick , a district attorney investigating the most recent case , a suspicious apparent suicide , and her interviews with friends and family of the deceased trigger extensive and intricately interwoven flashbacks that reveal surprising facts about the man 's life and death .
translation: Nick, seorang pendakwa raya yang sedang menyiasat kes terkini, satu kematian yang disyaki sebagai bunuh diri, dan temuramahnya dengan kawan-kawan dan keluarga si mati mencetuskan kilau balik yang meluas dan rumit yang mendedahkan fakta mengejutkan mengenai kehidupan dan kematian lelaki tersebut.
back_translation: Nick, a prosecutor investigating the latest case, a suspected suicide death, and his interviews with the deceased's friends and family triggered a wide and intricate turnaround revealing surprising facts about the man's life and death.

text: there 's a wickedly subversive bent to the best parts of birthday girl .
translation: Terdapat unsur-unsur yang jahat dan membelakangkan dalam bahagian terbaik birthday girl.
back_translation: There are evil and deceitful elements in the best part of the birthday girl.

text: in their own words , and not a moment too soon - 'broadway ' tells the stories of our theatrical legends , how they came to new york , and how they created this legendary century in american theatre .
translation: dengan kata-kata mereka sendiri , dan tidak sekejap mata - 'broadway' mengisahkan kisah-kisah legenda teater kita , bagaimana mereka tiba di new york , dan bagaimana mereka mencipta abad legenda ini dalam teater amerika.
back_translation: in their own words, and in the blink of an eye - 'broadway' tells the tales of our theater legends, how they arrived in New York, and how they created this legendary era in American theater.

text: schnieder bounces around with limp wrists , wearing tight tummy tops and hip huggers , twirling his hair on his finger and assuming that 's enough to sustain laughs . . .
translation: Schnieder melompat-lompat dengan pergelangan tangan yang lemah, memakai pakaian ketat yang menampakkan perut dan hip huggers, memutarkan rambutnya di jari dan menganggap itu sudah cukup untuk menimbulkan gelak tawa...
back_translation: Schneider jumped around with weak wrists, wearing tight clothes revealing the stomach and hip huggers, twirling her hair around her fingers and considering that enough to elicit laughter...

text: nicholas , his sister and mother venture to london to seek help from their uncle ralph , but ralph 's only intentions are to separate the family and exploit them .
translation: Nicholas, adik perempuannya, dan ibunya berjelajah ke London untuk mencari pertolongan dari bapa saudara mereka, Ralph, tetapi niat sebenarnya Ralph hanyalah untuk memisahkan keluarga itu dan mengeksploitasi mereka.
back_translation: Nicholas, his younger sister, and their mother journeyed to London to seek help from their uncle, Ralph, but Ralph's true intention was to separate the family and exploit them.

text: then , grace lets us in on the secret of their marriage , and how she is able to keep communication front and center in their relationship .
translation: Kemudian, Grace memberitahu kami rahsia perkahwinan mereka, dan bagaimana dia dapat menjadikan komunikasi sebagai fokus utama dalam hubungan mereka.
back_translation: Then, Grace told us the secret of their marriage, and how she can make communication the main focus in their relationship.

text: by the time you reach the finale , you 're likely wondering why you 've been watching all this strutting and posturing .
translation: Apabila anda sampai ke babak akhir, anda mungkin bertanya-tanya mengapa anda telah menonton semua persembahan gaya berjalan dan berlagak ini.
back_translation: When you reach the final stage, you might wonder why you have watched all these walking and posing performances.

text: bret has an idea that will push them both across lines they 'd never seriously considered crossing .
translation: Bret mempunyai idea yang akan mendorong mereka berdua melepasi batas yang tidak pernah mereka pertimbangkan secara serius untuk dilintasi.
back_translation: Bret has an idea that will push both of them beyond limits they have never seriously considered crossing.

text: with some encouragement from tom ( paul bettany ) , the self-appointed town spokesman , the little community agrees to hide her and in return , grace agrees to work for them .
translation: Dengan sedikit dorongan dari Tom (Paul Bettany), jurucakap sendiri bandar kecil itu, komuniti kecil bersetuju untuk menyembunyikannya dan sebagai balasan, Grace bersetuju untuk bekerja bagi mereka.
back_translation: With a little push from Tom (Paul Bettany), the town's own spokesperson, the small community agreed to hide it, and in return, Grace agreed to work for them.

text: ramu stands in and repeats the wisdom of sharonna , freeing the mind of the posh guests and attracting lexi to him .
translation: Ramu berdiri dan mengulangi kebijaksanaan Sharonna, melepaskan pikiran para tamu kelas atas dan menarik perhatian Lexi kepadanya.

text: neil burger here succeeded in . . . making the mystery of four decades back the springboard for a more immediate mystery in the present .
translation: Neil Burger berjaya dalam. . . menjadikan misteri empat dekad yang lalu sebagai batu loncatan untuk misteri yang lebih mendesak pada masa kini.

text: director yu seems far more interested in gross-out humor than in showing us well-thought stunts or a car chase that we have n't seen 10 , 000 times .
translation: Pengarah Yu kelihatan lebih berminat dalam humor yang mencabar daripada menunjukkan aksi yang direncanakan dengan baik atau persembahan rancangan kereta yang belum pernah kita lihat sebelum ini sebanyak 10,000 kali.
back_translation: Director Yu seems more interested in challenging humor than showcasing well-planned actions or presenting a car show we've never seen before 10,000 times.

text: patricia confides to her good-hearted maid maria ( theresa saldana ) , that she is convinced that her husband already waits for her in 'shangri-la ' , the fabulous get-away-paradise where she will fulfill her infinite happiness of a family .
translation: Patricia menceritakan kepada pembantunya yang baik hati, Maria (Theresa Saldana), bahawa dia yakin suaminya sudah menunggunya di 'Shangri-la', tempat surga yang indah di mana dia akan mencapai kebahagiaan keluarga yang kekal.
back_translation: Patricia told her kind-hearted assistant, Maria (Theresa Saldana), that she believed her husband was already waiting for her in 'Shangri-la', a beautiful paradise where she would attain eternal family happiness.

text: what full frontal lacks in thematic coherence it largely makes up for as loosey-goosey , experimental entertainment . still , i 'm not quite sure what the point isM-^E
translation: Apa yang kurang dalam koheren tema penuh frontal itu, sebahagian besar diganti dengan hiburan eksperimen yang longgar. Namun, saya tidak begitu pasti apa tujuannya.
back_translation: What is missing in the coherent full frontal theme is largely replaced with loose experimental entertainment. However, I am not so sure what its purpose is.

text: the jokes are sophomoric , stereotypes are sprinkled everywhere and the acting ranges from bad to bodacious .
translation: Jenaka itu hambar, stereotaip tersebar di mana-mana dan lakonan berkisar dari buruk hingga hebat.

text: the crew of the enterprise ( picard and company ) find themselves on planet romulus and eventually discover a threat to the earth .
translation: Pasukan Enterprise (Picard dan rakan-rakan) mendapati diri mereka di planet Romulus dan akhirnya menemui ancaman kepada bumi.

text: he has been hired by an american known only as `` wall street `` ( see rule two ) to make a delivery , but when frank stops along route , he notices his `` package `` is moving .

back_translation: He was hired by an American known only as "Wall Street" (see rule number two) to make a delivery, but when Frank stopped along the way, he noticed that his "package" was moving.

text: the only thing that matters for him is break dancing .
translation: Satu-satunya perkara yang penting baginya adalah tarian break.

text: heaven is a haunting dramatization of a couple 's moral ascension .
translation: Surga adalah dramatisasi yang mempesonakan tentang kenaikan moral pasangan tersebut.
back_translation: Heaven is a captivating dramatization of the moral elevation of the couple.

text: the united states of america is notorious for its astronomical number of people killed by firearms for a developed nation without a civil war .
translation: Amerika Syarikat terkenal dengan jumlah orang yang terbunuh oleh senjata api yang tinggi walaupun tidak mengalami peperangan saudara.
back_translation: The United States is known for its high number of deaths from firearms despite not experiencing a civil war.

text: the film is n't especially dynamic , but it brims with insightful , poignant memories from survivors .
translation: Filem itu tidak begitu dinamik, tetapi penuh dengan kenangan yang insightful dan menyentuh hati dari orang yang masih hidup.

text: the film culminates with the band 's arrival on the u . s . stage at wolf trap national park .
translation: Filem itu mencapai puncaknya dengan ketibaan kumpulan itu di pentas Amerika di Taman Kebangsaan Wolf Trap.

text: astrid magnussen is a 12 year old girl , living in california .
translation: Astrid Magnussen adalah seorang gadis berusia 12 tahun, tinggal di California.
