text: intriguing and beautiful film , but those of you who read the book are likely to be disappointed .
translation: Filem yang memikat dan indah, tetapi bagi mereka yang membaca buku mungkin akan rasa kecewa.
back_translation: A captivating and beautiful film, but those who read the book might feel disappointed.

text: the story follows unpredictable twists and turns until it climaxes with a madcap finale .
translation: Kisah ini mengikuti putaran dan belokan yang tidak dapat diduga hingga mencapai titik puncak dengan penutupan yang kacau-balau.
back_translation: This story follows unexpected twists and turns until reaching its climax with a messy conclusion.

text: a depressingly retrograde , 'post-feminist ' romantic comedy that takes an astonishingly condescending attitude toward women .
translation: filem komedi romantik yang menyedihkan, 'post-feminis' yang mengambil sikap merendahkan terhadap wanita.
back_translation: a sad romantic comedy film, a 'post-feminist' that takes a condescending attitude towards women.

text: amerika , zed and kyle are good friends until the excitingly undermedicated bitch goddess trasha enters the frame , cutting kyle off from his friends and their vacuous and unencumbered world of beer and porn .
translation: Amerika, Zed dan Kyle adalah kawan baik sehingga dewi biadap yang mendebarkan, Trasha masuk, memisahkan Kyle dari kawannya dan dunia mereka yang kosong dan bebas dari bir dan filem lucah.
back_translation: America, Zed, and Kyle are best friends until the daring goddess Trasha enters, separating Kyle from his friends and their empty world free from beer and porn movies.

text: a vivid , spicy footnote to history , and a movie that grips and holds you in rapt attention from start to finish .
translation: suatu catatan kaki yang hidup dan berapi-api untuk sejarah, dan sebuah filem yang merentap dan mengekalkan perhatian anda dari awal hingga akhir.
back_translation: A lively and passionate footnote to history, and a gripping film that captivates and maintains your attention from beginning to end.

text: a painting brought to life , the tracker is an enigmatic visual essay set on a vast australian landscape .
translation: satu lukisan menjadi hidup, "the tracker" adalah sebuah esei visual yang misteri diatur di landskap australia yang luas.
back_translation: One painting comes to life, "the tracker" is a visual essay that unfolds a mystery set in the vast Australian landscape.

text: an inept , tedious spoof of '70s kung fu pictures , it contains almost enough chuckles for a three-minute sketch , and no more .
translation: Siri menyampaikan bahawa filem ini adalah satu spoof yang kurang cekap dan membosankan terhadap filem-filem kung fu tahun 70-an, ia mengandungi hampir cukup guyonan untuk sketsa tiga minit, dan tidak lebih.
back_translation: The series conveyed that this film is an ineffective and boring spoof of 70s kung fu films, containing barely enough jokes for a three-minute sketch, and nothing more.

text: dek and shirley live together with 12 year-old marlene , her daughter by the sexy delinquent jimmy , who skeddadled years ago and has n't been heard from since .
translation: Dek dan Shirley tinggal bersama Marlene berusia 12 tahun, anak perempuan mereka dengan si pemuda nakal, Jimmy, yang menghilang beberapa tahun yang lalu dan tidak pernah terdengar kabarnya sejak itu.
back_translation: Dek and Shirley live with their 12-year-old daughter Marlene, the daughter of their wayward son, Jimmy, who disappeared several years ago and has not been heard from since.

text: the stars may be college kids , but the subject matter is as adult as you can get : the temptations of the flesh are unleashed by a slightly crazed , overtly determined young woman and a one-night swim turns into an ocean of trouble .
translation: Bintang-bintang mungkin pelajar kolej, tetapi perkara yang dibincangkan adalah seberapa dewasa yang anda boleh dapatkan: godaan daging dibebaskan oleh seorang wanita muda yang sedikit gila, sangat bertekad dan satu malam terjunan berubah menjadi lautan masalah.
back_translation: The stars may be college students, but what is being discussed is how mature can you become: the temptation of flesh unleashed by a slightly crazy, very determined young woman, and one night of plunge turns into a sea of problems.

text: maggie finds that life can take many unexpected turns as she discovers mateo has risked a dangerous trip at sea and he has made it to miami .
translation: Maggie mendapati bahawa kehidupan boleh mengambil banyak pusingan yang tidak dijangka apabila dia mengetahui bahawa Mateo telah mengambil risiko dalam perjalanan berbahaya di laut dan dia telah berjaya sampai ke Miami.
back_translation: Maggie realized that life can take many unexpected turns when she found out that Mateo had taken a risk on a dangerous journey at sea and had successfully made it to Miami.

text: the movie is the strangest experience : a matter-of-fact thing that swallows you whole .
translation: Filem itu adalah pengalaman yang paling aneh: sesuatu yang dianggap sebagai fakta yang menyerap anda sepenuhnya.
back_translation: The movie was the strangest experience: something that is considered a fact that completely absorbs you.

text: what jackson has accomplished here is amazing on a technical level .
translation: Apa yang telah dicapai oleh Jackson di sini sungguh mengagumkan dari segi teknikal.
back_translation: What Jackson has achieved here is truly impressive in technical terms.

text: by the end , only one thing is certain - justice is simply a toss of the coin .
translation: Pada akhirnya, hanya satu perkara yang pasti - keadilan hanyalah seperti lemparan syiling.
back_translation: In the end, only one thing is certain - justice is just like a coin toss.

text: just when we think we have a grasp on each character 's inner-motives , more characters get sucked into the fray altering everyone 's dynamic and the course of april 's `` perfect `` shower .
translation: Apabila kita rasa kita memahami motif dalaman setiap watak, lebih ramai watak terlibat mempengaruhi dinamika semua orang dan aliran acara mandian "sempurna" bulan April.
back_translation: When we feel we understand the internal motives of each character, more characters are involved in influencing the dynamics of everyone and the flow of the "perfect" April showers event.

text: dares to look conventional hollywood wisdom in the eye and refuses to blink
translation: berani melawan hikmah Hollywood konvensional dan enggan berpaling.
back_translation: dare to challenge conventional Hollywood wisdom and refuse to turn away.

text: off the hook is overlong and not well-acted , but credit writer-producer-director adam watstein with finishing it at all .
translation: "Off the Hook" terlalu panjang dan lakonannya tidak begitu baik, tetapi kita patut memberi kredit kepada penulis-penerbit-pengarah Adam Watstein kerana berjaya menyiapkannya.
back_translation: "Off the Hook" is too long and the acting is not that great, but we should give credit to the writer-producer-director Adam Watstein for successfully completing it.

text: this comic gem is as delightful as it is derivative .
translation: Permata komik ini sama menyeronokkan seperti punannya.
back_translation: The gem of this comic is just as entertaining as its content.

text: [ w ] hile long on amiable monkeys and worthy environmentalism , jane goodall 's wild chimpanzees is short on the thrills the oversize medium demands .
translation: Meskipun penuh dengan monyet yang bersahabat dan keprihatinan lingkungan yang baik, filem Jane Goodall tentang simpanse liar ini kurang mendebarkan seperti yang dijangkakan dari medium yang besar.
back_translation: Despite being filled with friendly monkeys and good environmental concerns, Jane Goodall's film about wild chimpanzees is less thrilling than expected from a big medium.

text: epic myth becomes burning truth on the mountain of fire .
translation: mitos epik menjadi kebenaran yang menyala di gunung berapi.

translation: Jenis latihan yang menggambarkan stereotype yang memburukkan nama genre komedi remaja.

text: it 's up to [ watts ] to lend credibility to this strange scenario , and her presence succeeds in making us believe .
translation: Ini adalah tugas [watts] untuk memberi kredibiliti kepada senario yang aneh ini, dan kehadirannya berjaya membuat kita percaya.

text: there is only one drawback , the sorceress and the priestess are sisters .
translation: ada hanya satu kelemahan, ahli sihir dan pendeta adalah saudara perempuan.

text: if it seems like a minor miracle that its septuagenarian star is young enough to be the nonagenarian filmmaker 's son , more incredible still are the clear-eyed boldness and quiet irony with which actor and director take on life 's urgent questions .
translation: Jika nampak seperti keajaiban kecil bahawa bintang berusia tujuh puluhan cukup muda untuk menjadi anak lelaki pengarah berusia sembilan puluhan, lebih luar biasa lagi adalah keberanian yang tajam dan ironi yang tenang dengan mana pelakon dan pengarah menghadapi soalan-soalan penting dalam kehidupan.
back_translation: If it appears as a small miracle that a seventy-year-old star is young enough to be the ninety-year-old director's son, even more remarkable is the sharp wit and calm irony with which the actors and director face important questions in life.

text: thinking the young man is dead , a curious fisherman with a scalpel finds two bullets in his back and a miniature laser device in his hip .
translation: Memikirkan lelaki muda itu sudah meninggal, seorang pemancing yang ingin tahu dengan skalpelnya menemui dua butir peluru di belakangnya dan sebuah peranti laser mini di pinggangnya.
back_translation: Thinking that the young man had died, an inquisitive fisherman found two bullets behind him and a mini laser device on his waist with a scalpel.

text: the story starts with a bit more in depth on the court house scene which ended the last film .
translation: Cerita bermula dengan lebih mendalam tentang adegan mahkamah yang mengakhiri filem terdahulu.

text: a lyrical , bittersweet film about what could be termed a by-product of battle .
translation: Filem yang liris dan pahit manis tentang apa yang boleh disebut sebagai hasil sampingan peperangan.
back_translation: A poignant and bittersweet film about what can be regarded as the byproducts of war.

text: while `` real women have curves `` suffers from an obvious and simplistic screenplay , it 's a bright looking , well-acted charmer .
translation: Sementara "wanita sejati mempunyai lengkung" mengalami teks skrip yang jelas dan ringkas, ia adalah sebuah filem yang cerah, kelihatan baik, dan dilakonkan dengan baik.
back_translation: While "a real woman has curves" has a clear and concise script, it is a bright and good-looking film that is well-acted.

text: meticulously mounted , exasperatingly well-behaved film , which ticks off kahlo 's lifetime milestones with the dutiful precision of a tax accountant .
translation: Filem yang dipasang dengan teliti, sangat teratur yang menjengkelkan, yang menyenaraikan pencapaian sepanjang hayat Kahlo dengan ketepatan tugas seorang akauntan cukai.
back_translation: The meticulously crafted film, very orderly to the point of annoyance, lists Kahlo's lifetime achievements with the precision of a tax accountant's duties.

text: the work of a filmmaker who has secrets buried at the heart of his story and knows how to take time revealing them . strange occurrences build in the mind of the viewer and take on extreme urgency .
translation: Karya seorang pengarah filem yang memiliki rahsia yang terpendam di tengah-tengah kisahnya dan tahu bagaimana mengambil masa untuk mendedahkan mereka. Kejadian aneh berkembang dalam minda penonton dan mengambil keadaan yang sangat penting.
back_translation: A film director's work with buried secrets in the midst of the story and knowing how to take time to reveal them. Strange events unfold in the minds of the audience and take on significant importance.

text: despite its lavish formalism and intellectual austerity , the film manages to keep you at the edge of your seat with its shape-shifting perils , political intrigue and brushes with calamity .
translation: Walaupun formalisme yang mewah dan kerapian intelektualnya, filem ini berjaya membuat anda terasa tegang dengan bahayanya yang sentiasa berubah, intrik politik, dan sentuhan dengan bencana.
back_translation: Despite its opulent formalism and intellectual tidiness, this film succeeds in making you feel tense with its ever-changing dangers, political intrigues, and touches of disaster.

text: years later murdock has grown into a man and becomes a respected criminal attorney .
translation: Beberapa tahun kemudian, Murdock telah berkembang menjadi seorang lelaki dewasa dan menjadi seorang peguam jenayah yang dihormati.
back_translation: Several years later, Murdock had grown into a mature man and become a respected criminal lawyer.

text: icon-bashing has never been as amusing as it is in michael rubbo 's documentary much ado about something .
translation: Mengkritik ikon belum pernah seseronok ini seperti dalam dokumentari Michael Rubbo, "Much Ado About Something".
back_translation: Criticizing icons has never been as enjoyable as in Michael Rubbo's documentary, "Much Ado About Something".

text: too bland and fustily tasteful to be truly prurient .
translation: Terlalu hambar dan klasik untuk benar-benar menjurus kepada kecabulan.
back_translation: Too bland and classic to truly veer into obscenity.

text: only a supremely flexible talent like kinnear could whittle away at crane 's nuances and come up with thespian gold .
translation: Hanya bakat yang sangat fleksibel seperti kinnear yang boleh mengupas halus pada nuansa crane dan menghasilkan emas teatrikal.
back_translation: Only a highly flexible talent like Kinnear can delicately peel back the nuances of a crane and produce theatrical gold.

text: never quite transcends jokester status . . . and the punchline does n't live up to barry 's dead-eyed , perfectly chilled delivery .
translation: Belum pernah benar-benar melampaui status pelawak . . . dan penutupnya tidak mencapai penghantaran dingin yang sempurna dari Barry yang sepenuhnya tumpul.
back_translation: Never really transcends the status of a comedian . . . and its conclusion does not achieve the perfect cold delivery of Barry that is completely blunt.

text: rocha 's years of exile in cuba ( 1971-72 ) , coincided with a period of great cultural ferment and debate about the roles of the arts in the social and political revolutions of latin america and the third world .
translation: Tempoh pengasingan Rocha di Cuba (1971-72) bertepatan dengan tempoh yang penuh dengan fermentasi budaya dan perdebatan tentang peranan seni dalam revolusi sosial dan politik di Amerika Latin dan dunia ketiga.
back_translation: Rocha's exile period in Cuba (1971-72) coincided with a time full of cultural ferment and debates about the role of art in the social and political revolution in Latin America and the Third World.

text: a dim-witted and lazy spin-off of the animal planet documentary series , crocodile hunter is entertainment opportunism at its most glaring .
translation: Sebuah tindakan bodoh dan malas dari siri dokumentari Animal Planet, crocodile hunter adalah oportunisme hiburan yang paling mencolok.
back_translation: A foolish and lazy act from the Animal Planet documentary series, crocodile hunter is the most prominent entertainment opportunism.

text: unfortunately , stiles has bought off a crooked sheriff who intends to make the trip very difficult for red . . .
translation: Malangnya, Stiles telah merasuk seorang sheriff yang salah yang berniat membuat perjalanan menjadi sangat sukar bagi Red...
back_translation: Unfortunately, Stiles has possessed the wrong sheriff who intends to make the journey very difficult for Red...

text: the sweetest thing is expressly for idiots who do n't care what kind of sewage they shovel into their mental gullets to simulate sustenance .

back_translation: The sweetest thing is specifically for fools who do not care what type of filth they ingest into their minds to equate it with nourishment.

text: this overproduced and generally disappointing effort is n't likely to rouse the rush hour crowd .
translation: Usaha yang berlebihan dan umumnya mengecewakan ini tidak kemungkinan akan menggugah orang ramai semasa waktu puncak.
back_translation: Excessive and generally disappointing efforts are unlikely to arouse the public during peak hours.

text: she 's helped along in that process by betsy wright ( pamela gordon ) , a misanthropic dog-walker in need of help with her business and struggling with her own dark past .
translation: Dia dibantu dalam proses itu oleh betsy wright (pamela gordon), seorang pembawa anjing yang antisosial yang memerlukan bantuan dengan perniagaannya dan bergelut dengan masa lalu gelapnya sendiri.
back_translation: He is assisted in the process by Betsy Wright (Pamela Gordon), an antisocial dog walker who needs help with her business and struggles with her own dark past.

text: a subtle , humorous , illuminating study of politics , power and social mobility .
translation: kajian halus, lucu, mencerahkan tentang politik, kuasa, dan mobiliti sosial.
back_translation: A subtle, humorous, enlightening study on politics, power, and social mobility.

text: an alcoholic former schoolteacher hired as security finds himself a reluctant mentor to mouse , the impressionable boy ward of the pimp dewey .
translation: Seorang bekas guru sekolah yang penagih arak yang diambil sebagai pengawal mendapati dirinya menjadi mentor yang enggan kepada Mouse, bocah lelaki mudah terkesan yang dijaga oleh germo Dewey.
back_translation: A former school teacher turned alcoholic seized as a guard found himself becoming an unwilling mentor to Mouse, a easily impressed young boy taken care of by the pimp Dewey.

text: miyazaki has provided another triumph , and , in the midst of the quality fall-off of disney 's in-house animated projects , a reason for animation-lovers to rejoice .

text: one night , tobias knifes his father in the back , and escape to switzerland .
translation: Pada satu malam, Tobias menusuk bapanya dari belakang, lalu melarikan diri ke Switzerland.
back_translation: One night, Tobias stabbed his father from behind, then fled to Switzerland.

text: he discovers that his friend has gone into business , and is successfully breeding black chickens .
translation: Dia dapati rakan baiknya telah menceburi perniagaan dan berjaya membiakkan ayam hitam.
back_translation: He found out that his good friend had ventured into business and successfully bred black chickens.

text: scherfig , who has had a successful career in tv , tackles more than she can handle .
translation: Scherfig, yang telah memiliki kerjaya yang berjaya dalam TV, menghadapi lebih daripada yang dia boleh atasi.
back_translation: Scherfig, who has had a successful career in TV, is facing more than she can handle.

text: on the granger movie gauge of 1 to 10 , the powerpuff girls is a fast , frenetic , funny , even punny 6 -- aimed specifically at a grade-school audience .
translation: Pada skala pengukuran filem Granger dari 1 hingga 10, The Powerpuff Girls adalah filem yang cepat, frenetik, lucu, malah penuh dengan sindiran, dengan penilaian 6 - direka khas untuk penonton sekolah rendah.
back_translation: On the Granger movie scale from 1 to 10, The Powerpuff Girls is a fast-paced, frenetic, funny, and even full of satire film, with a rating of 6 - specially designed for elementary school audience.

text: there are touching moments in etoiles , but for the most part this is a dull , dour documentary on what ought to be a joyful or at least fascinating subject .
translation: Terdapat momen-momen menyentuh dalam etoiles, tetapi sebahagian besar ia adalah sebuah dokumentari yang membosankan dan muram tentang apa yang sepatutnya menjadi subjek yang menggembirakan atau sekurang-kurangnya menarik.
back_translation: There are touching moments in etoiles, but for the most part, it is a boring and gloomy documentary about what should be a joyful or at least interesting subject.

text: what one is left with , even after the most awful acts are committed , is an overwhelming sadness that feels as if it has made its way into your very bloodstream .
translation: apa yang tinggal , walaupun selepas tindakan paling mengerikan dilakukan, adalah kesedihan yang sangat kuat yang terasa seolah-olah ia telah meresap ke dalam aliran darah anda.
back_translation: What remains, even after the most terrifying actions have been carried out, is a very strong sadness that feels as if it has seeped into your bloodstream.

text: the story is about a man , bruce hickman , and his relationship with another man , frank , the thing that they have in common is the relation with a deaf person .
translation: Cerita ini mengisahkan tentang seorang lelaki, Bruce Hickman, dan hubungannya dengan seorang lelaki lain, Frank, yang memiliki persamaan hubungan dengan seorang individu pekak.
back_translation: This story is about a man, Bruce Hickman, and his relationship with another man, Frank, who shares a similar relationship with a deaf individual.

text: allen 's underestimated charm delivers more goodies than lumps of coal .
translation: Daya tarikan yang terlalu diabaikan oleh Allen memberikan lebih banyak kebaikan daripada gumpalan batu bara.
back_translation: The attraction power that Allen has been neglecting provides more benefits than a lump of coal.

text: for oscar , diane is somewhat of a distraction , as his continued pursuit of eve leads to an unexpected resolution .
translation: Bagi Oscar, Diane agak mengganggu, kerana usahanya terus mengejar Eve membawa kepada penyelesaian yang tidak dijangka.
back_translation: For Oscar, Diane is quite annoying, because her relentless pursuit of Eve leads to an unexpected resolution.

text: this is a winning ensemble comedy that shows canadians can put gentle laughs and equally gentle sentiments on the button , just as easily as their counterparts anywhere else in the world .
translation: Ini adalah sebuah komedi ensemble yang memenangkan hati yang menunjukkan bahawa orang Kanada juga boleh membawa gelak tawa yang lembut dan sentimen yang sama lembut dengan baik, sama seperti rakan sejawat mereka di mana sahaja di dunia.
back_translation: This is an award-winning ensemble comedy that shows that Canadians can also bring gentle laughter and sentiments as well as their peers anywhere in the world.

text: a week later , jash contacts the police , asking not for a ransom but for retired police inspector mo to be his police contact .
translation: seminggu kemudian, Jash menghubungi polis, meminta bukan tebusan tetapi untuk bekas inspektor polis, Mo, menjadi kenalannya dalam polis.
back_translation: A week later, Jash contacted the police, not asking for ransom but for the former police inspector, Mo, to become his acquaintance in the police force.

text: the production values are up there . the use of cgi and digital ink-and-paint make the thing look really slick . the voices are fine as well . the problem , it is with most of these things , is the script .
translation: Nilai produksi tinggi. Penggunaan CGI dan dakwat dan cat digital menjadikan visualnya sangat menarik. Suara-suara juga bagus. Permasalahannya, seperti kebanyakan produk sebegini, adalah pada skrip.
back_translation: High production value. The use of CGI and digital inking and painting make the visuals very appealing. The sound effects are also good. The problem, like most products of this nature, lies in the script.

text: this is a romantic comedy about a girl named christina who , one day , meets a guy in a bar .
translation: Ini adalah sebuah komedi romantis mengenai seorang gadis bernama Christina yang, suatu hari, bertemu dengan seorang lelaki di sebuah bar.
back_translation: This is a romantic comedy about a girl named Christina who, one day, meets a man at a bar.

text: a psychological thriller that does n't really hold up if you think about it too much , but is nonetheless highly entertaining in a low-budget , david lynch-ian way .
translation: Sebuah cerita seram psikologi yang sebenarnya tidak begitu masuk akal jika difikirkan terlalu banyak, tetapi tetap sangat menghibur dengan gaya rendah bajet yang mirip dengan David Lynch.
back_translation: A psychologically creepy story that actually doesn't make much sense if overthought, but still very entertaining with a low-budget style similar to David Lynch.

text: e . t . works because its flabbergasting principals , 14-year-old robert macnaughton , 6-year-old drew barrymore and 10-year-old henry thomas , convince us of the existence of the wise , wizened visitor from a faraway planet .
translation: Filem E.T. berhasil kerana prinsip-prinsipnya yang mengejutkan, Robert Macnaughton berusia 14 tahun, Drew Barrymore berusia 6 tahun, dan Henry Thomas berusia 10 tahun, meyakinkan kita tentang wujud pengunjung yang bijak dari planet yang jauh.
back_translation: The movie E.T. succeeded due to its surprising principles, Robert Macnaughton at the age of 14, Drew Barrymore at the age of 6, and Henry Thomas at the age of 10, convinced us about the existence of intelligent visitors from a distant planet.

text: `` 13 conversations `` holds its goodwill close , but is relatively slow to come to the point .
translation: "13 perbualan" memegang kebaikan rapat, tetapi agak perlahan dalam menyampaikan inti masalah.
back_translation: "13 conversations" holds the benefit of being thorough, but somewhat slow in delivering the core issues.

text: cedar takes a very open-minded approach to this sensitive material , showing impressive control , both visually and in the writing .
translation: Cedar mengambil pendekatan yang sangat berfikiran terbuka terhadap bahan sensitif ini, menunjukkan kawalan yang mengagumkan, baik secara visual maupun dalam penulisan.
back_translation: Cedar takes a very open-minded approach to this sensitive material, showing amazing control, both visually and in writing.

text: he dwells in a world of external night -- but the blackness is filled with sounds and scents , tastes and textures that most can not perceive .
translation: Dia tinggal dalam dunia malam luaran - tetapi kegelapan itu dipenuhi dengan bunyi dan bau, rasa dan tekstur yang kebanyakan tidak dapat dikesan.
back_translation: He lives in the outer night world - but that darkness is filled with sounds and smells, tastes and textures that are mostly imperceptible.

text: three stories of undying love from acclaimed japanese filmmaker takeshi kitano .
translation: tiga cerita cinta yang abadi dari pengarah filem Jepun terkenal, Takeshi Kitano.
back_translation: three timeless love stories from the renowned Japanese filmmaker, Takeshi Kitano.

text: an incredibly clever and superbly paced caper filled with scams within scams within scams .
translation: sebuah penipuan yang sangat cerdik dan diatur dengan sangat baik yang penuh dengan penipuan di dalam penipuan di dalam penipuan.
back_translation: A very cunning and well-organized deception filled with deception within deception within deception.

text: reign of fire may well be the most grim dragon movie ever made -- and it 's all the more effective for the filmmakers ' decision to play it straight .
translation: Reign of Fire mungkin merupakan filem naga yang paling suram yang pernah dibuat - dan lebih berkesan lagi berkat keputusan pembuat filem untuk mengikuti alur cerita dengan serius.
back_translation: Reign of Fire may be the darkest dragon movie ever made - and even more impactful thanks to the filmmakers' decision to take the storyline seriously.

text: during the year 2000 geyrhalter and his teams travelled to a different destination each month , looking for places untouched by the millennium hysteria .
translation: Sepanjang tahun 2000, Geyrhalter dan pasukannya melawat ke destinasi yang berbeza setiap bulan, mencari tempat yang tidak terjejas oleh histeria milenium.
back_translation: Throughout the year 2000, Geyrhalter and his team visited different destinations every month, searching for places not affected by millennium hysteria.

text: fans of waiting for guffman , american movie and rushmore have found a new favorite in this hilarious mockumentary .
translation: Peminat-peminat Waiting for Guffman, American Movie, dan Rushmore telah menjumpai kegemaran baru dalam filem mockumentary yang lucu ini.
back_translation: Fans of Waiting for Guffman, American Movie, and Rushmore have discovered a new favorite in this funny mockumentary film.

text: it 's funny and human and really pretty damned wonderful , all at once .
translation: Ia lucu dan manusiawi dan sungguh indah luar biasa, semuanya pada satu masa.
back_translation: It is funny and humane and truly extraordinary beautiful, all at once.

text: the two engage in a spirited and acerbic dialogue - meanwhile accomplishing nothing .
translation: Kedua-dua mereka terlibat dalam dialog yang berapi-api dan sinis - sementara tidak mencapai apa-apa.
back_translation: Both of them were engaged in heated and sarcastic dialogue - while not achieving anything.

text: but things are not always what they may look like .
translation: tetapi sesuatu tidak selalu seperti yang kelihatan.

translation: Dr. David Gale, seorang pendokong penghapusan hukuman mati, dituduh secara palsu melakukan rogol dan pembunuhan.
back_translation: Dr. David Gale, a supporter of the abolition of the death penalty, was falsely accused of rape and murder.

text: thornton stars as a man who is free after serving 19 years for killing a teenager during an attempted robbery .
translation: Thornton berperanan sebagai seorang lelaki yang dibebaskan selepas menjalani hukuman 19 tahun kerana membunuh seorang remaja semasa cuba melakukan rompakan.
back_translation: Thornton played the role of a man released after serving a 19-year sentence for killing a teenager while attempting a robbery.

text: his attention settles on alicia browning ( busy philipps ) , a darkly troubled outsider who , as the only person present throughout the entire incident , is both the key witness and a possible suspect .
translation: Perhatiannya tertumpu kepada Alicia Browning (Busy Philipps), seorang individu luar yang gelap dan bermasalah yang, sebagai satu-satunya individu yang hadir sepanjang kejadian tersebut, merupakan saksi utama dan juga seorang yang mungkin disyaki.
back_translation: Attention is focused on Alicia Browning (Busy Philipps), an outsider who is dark and troubled, who, as the only person present throughout the incident, is the key witness and also a potential suspect.

text: 2 . a cranny , hollow , or crevice , as in a rock .
translation: lubang sempit, lobang, atau celah, seperti dalam batu.
back_translation: narrow hole, cavity, or crevice, such as in a rock.

text: johnny lever ( paaji ) is a millionaire sardarji who believes in distributing & # 38 ; spending lavishly his wealth on his friends .
translation: Johnny Lever (Paaji) adalah seorang sardarji jutawan yang percaya dalam memperuntukkan dan menghabiskan kekayaannya secara mewah kepada kawan-kawannya.
back_translation: Johnny Lever (Paaji) is a wealthy Sardarji who believes in allocating and spending his wealth lavishly on his friends.

text: engaging peter is the story of peter , a struggling documentary filmmaker who has resorted to shooting weddings for rent money .
translation: 'Engaging Peter' adalah kisah tentang Peter, seorang pembuat filem dokumentari yang berjuang dan terpaksa mengambil gambar perkahwinan untuk mendapatkan wang sewa.
back_translation: 'Engaging Peter' is a story about Peter, a documentary filmmaker who struggles and is forced to take wedding photos to earn rental money.

text: if you keep a list of films you want to see one way or another , you would be doing yourself a service by keeping this film high up on that list .
translation: Jika anda menyenaraikan filem-filem yang anda ingin tonton pada satu masa, anda akan memberi khidmat kepada diri sendiri dengan mengekalkan filem ini di bahagian atas senarai tersebut.
back_translation: If you list the movies you want to watch at a given time, you will be serving yourself by keeping these movies at the top of the list.

text: the battle results in an incident that sees one of the men re-evaluate his values in life .
translation: Keputusan pertempuran membawa kepada satu insiden yang menyebabkan salah seorang lelaki tersebut menilai semula nilai-nilai dalam hidupnya.
back_translation: The outcome of the battle led to an incident that caused one of the men to reassess the values in his life.

text: this film is adapted from the play the fire and the rain by one of india 's foremost playwrights , girish karnad .
translation: filem ini diadaptasi daripada drama api dan hujan oleh salah seorang pengarang drama terkemuka India, Girish Karnad.
back_translation: This film is adapted from the play "Fire and Rain" by one of India's leading playwrights, Girish Karnad.

text: the film 's images give a backbone to the company and provide an emotional edge to its ultimate demise .
translation: Imej filem memberi sokongan kepada syarikat dan memberikan sentuhan emosi kepada kejatuhan terakhirnya.
back_translation: The film's imagery supports the company and provides an emotional touch to its final downfall.

text: it 's all entertaining enough , but do n't look for any hefty anti-establishment message in what is essentially a whip-crack of a buddy movie that ends with a whimper .
translation: Ia kesemuanya menghiburkan, tetapi jangan harap untuk mencari sebarang mesej anti-ketuanan yang berat dalam filem kawan yang pada hakikatnya berakhir dengan sebatang kerenah.
back_translation: It's all entertaining, but don't expect to find any heavy anti-authoritarian messages in a buddy movie that essentially ends with a bunch of antics.

text: though the characters are sometimes forced into madcap situations for the sake of adding yuks , the film works best when the protagonists are just being themselves
translation: Walaupun watak-watak kadang-kadang dipaksa ke dalam situasi gila-gilaan hanya untuk menambah seronok, filem ini berjaya apabila protagonis hanya menjadi diri mereka sendiri.
back_translation: Although the characters are sometimes forced into crazy situations just to add more fun, the film succeeds when the protagonists just be themselves.

text: however after roxie has undergone the 'casting couch ' treatment , and fred has had his wicked way with her , he reveals that he has no more connections in showbusiness than she does .
translation: Bagaimanapun, setelah Roxie mengalami rawatan 'casting couch', dan Fred telah melakukannya dengannya, dia mengakui bahawa dia tidak mempunyai lebih banyak hubungan dalam dunia pertunjukan daripada dia.
back_translation: However, after Roxie experienced the 'casting couch' treatment, and Fred had done it with her, she admitted that she did not have more relationships in the show business world than he did.

text: along the way , they get tips from various experts , which include performances from george kennedy , tippi hedren , erick avari , and stephen furst .
translation: Sepanjang perjalanan, mereka mendapat tip daripada pelbagai pakar, termasuk persembahan daripada George Kennedy, Tippi Hedren, Erick Avari, dan Stephen Furst.
back_translation: Throughout the journey, they received tips from various experts, including presentations from George Kennedy, Tippi Hedren, Erick Avari, and Stephen Furst.

text: it 's young guns meets goodfellas in this easily skippable hayseeds-vs . -greaseballs mob action-comedy .
translation: Ini adalah gabungan antara young guns dan goodfellas dalam filem aksi-komedi mob yang boleh dilewati dengan mudah antara hayseeds-vs.-greaseballs.
back_translation: This is a combination of young guns and goodfellas in a mob action-comedy film that effortlessly navigates between hayseeds vs. greaseballs.

text: that a high-profile movie with big-name actors could inspire such philosophical reflection is impressive .
translation: Filem berprestij tinggi dengan pelakon terkenal boleh memberikan inspirasi untuk refleksi falsafah yang begitu mendalam adalah sesuatu yang mengagumkan.
back_translation: High-prestige films with famous actors can provide inspiration for deep philosophical reflection is something amazing.

text: as he chases the elusive bounty hunter , jango ( and his cloned son boba ) leads obi wan to geonosis , where he meets count dooku and finds a startling revelation about the former jedi .
translation: Semasa dia mengejar pemburu hadiah yang sukar dikesan, jango (dan anak tirinya yang di klon, boba) membawa Obi Wan ke Geonosis, di mana dia berjumpa dengan Count Dooku dan menemui pengakuan mengejutkan tentang bekas jedi itu.
back_translation: While chasing the elusive bounty hunter, Jango (and his cloned son, Boba) brought Obi Wan to Geonosis, where he met Count Dooku and made surprising revelations about the former Jedi.

text: one can only assume that the jury who bestowed star hoffman 's brother gordy with the waldo salt screenwriting award at 2002 's sundance festival were honoring an attempt to do something different over actually pulling it off
translation: Seseorang hanya dapat mengandaikan bahawa para juri yang menganugerahkan Hadiah Penulisan Skrip Waldo Salt kepada abang Star Hoffman, Gordy, di Festival Sundance tahun 2002 sedang menghormati percubaan untuk melakukan sesuatu yang berbeza daripada sebenarnya berjaya melakukannya.
back_translation: One can only imagine that the jurors awarding the Waldo Salt Screenwriting Award to Star Hoffman's brother, Gordy, at the 2002 Sundance Festival were honoring an attempt to do something different that actually succeeded.

text: daily prison life is not drab but full of unexpected happenings like a story .
translation: Kehidupan harian di penjara tidak membosankan tetapi penuh dengan peristiwa yang tidak dijangka seperti dalam sebuah cerita.
back_translation: Daily life in prison is not boring but full of unexpected events like in a story.

text: he tries to recapture the past , and make some sense of his life , that of his friends and family , and the present state of his native country .
translation: Dia cuba untuk mengembalikan kenangan lalu, dan mencari erti dalam hidupnya, juga kehidupan rakan-rakan dan keluarganya, serta keadaan semasa negaranya.
back_translation: He tries to retrieve past memories and seek meaning in his life, as well as in the lives of his friends and family, and the current state of his country.

text: rare is the 'urban comedy ' that even attempts the insight and honesty of this disarming indie .
translation: Jarang sekali "komedi bandar" yang cuba memberikan sudut pandangan dan ketulusan seumpama filem indie yang menawan ini.
back_translation: Very rarely does urban comedy attempt to provide perspectives and sincerity like this charming indie film.

text: rarely has a film 's title served such dire warning .
translation: Jarang sekali judul filem memberikan amaran yang begitu serius.
back_translation: Movie titles rarely give such serious warnings.

text: dialogue-heavy and too cerebral for its own good -- or , at any rate , too cerebral for its racy subject matter .
translation: Terlalu banyak dialog dan terlalu intelektual buat kebaikannya sendiri - atau paling tidak, terlalu intelektual untuk subjek yang berapi-api.
back_translation: Too much dialogue and too intellectual for its own good - or at least, too intellectual for a passionate subject.

text: as david letterman and the onion have proven , the worst of tragedies can be fertile sources of humor , but lawrence has only a fleeting grasp of how to develop them .
translation: Seperti yang telah dibuktikan oleh David Letterman dan The Onion, tragedi-tragedi terburuk boleh menjadi sumber humor yang subur, tetapi Lawrence hanya mempunyai pemahaman yang separuh hati dalam mengembangkannya.
back_translation: As proven by David Letterman and The Onion, the worst tragedies can be a rich source of humor, but Lawrence only has a half-hearted understanding in developing it.

text: wins my vote for 'the 2002 enemy of cinema ' award .
translation: memenangi undian saya untuk anugerah 'musuh filem 2002'.
back_translation: I won the lottery for the 'worst film enemy 2002' award.

text: the plan goes by smoothly , but troubles comes when ray actually falls in love with eva .
translation: Rancangan berjalan lancar, tetapi masalah timbul apabila Ray sebenarnya jatuh cinta dengan Eva.
back_translation: The program runs smoothly, but problems arise when Ray actually falls in love with Eva.

text: starving artist gus bishop ca n't even give away his paintings .
translation: Pelukis kelaparan Gus Bishop tidak mampu memberikan lukisannya secara percuma.
back_translation: Hungry painter Gus Bishop is unable to give away his paintings for free.

text: arcangel gets a message from his brother telling that their father is very sick .
translation: Arcangel menerima mesej daripada adiknya yang memberitahu bahawa bapa mereka sangat sakit.
back_translation: Arcangel received a message from his younger brother informing him that their father is very ill.

text: after collateral damage , you might imagine that most every aggrieved father clichM-i has been unturned . but no .
translation: Selepas kerosakan berkaitan, anda mungkin membayangkan bahawa hampir setiap cliché bapa yang teraniaya telah disentuh. Tetapi tidak.
back_translation: After the related damage, you might imagine that almost every cliché of an oppressed father has been touched. But no.

text: a unique and irreverent look at new york 's cubicle filled sweatshops .
translation: pandangan unik dan tidak menghormati tentang kilang-kilang peluh yang dipenuhi petak-petak di New York.
back_translation: Unique and disrespectful views on the sweatshop factories filled with cubicles in New York.

text: and lastly there 's dinka , a fellow barber who is madly in love with terri but does n't get the time of day .
translation: Dan akhirnya ada Dinka, seorang rakan tukang gunting rambut yang gila-gila cinta kepada Terri tetapi tidak mendapat perhatian daripadanya.
back_translation: And finally there was Dinka, a crazy-in-love hairdresser friend with Terri but not receiving attention from her.

text: through it all , carlos comes to understand that if he is to make it as a comic artist , he must engage with the community he comes from , take that experience back out into the world , and put it in his work .
translation: Melalui segala hal tersebut, Carlos menyedari bahawa jika dia ingin berjaya sebagai seorang pelukis komik, dia harus terlibat dengan komuniti tempat asalnya, membawa pengalaman itu ke seluruh dunia, dan mengaplikasikannya dalam karyanya.
back_translation: Through all of that, Carlos realized that if he wanted to succeed as a comic artist, he had to engage with his local community, bring that experience to the world, and apply it in his work.

text: it 's difficult to imagine that a more confused , less interesting and more sloppily made film could possibly come down the road in 2002 .
translation: Sukar untuk membayangkan bahawa filem yang lebih keliru, kurang menarik, dan lebih tidak teratur dibuat boleh muncul pada tahun 2002.
back_translation: It's hard to imagine that a more confusing, less engaging, and more disorderly film could emerge in 2002.

text: the result reverberates on the screen with a deadly force and fury more intense than anything mr . scorsese has yet achieved on the meanest and most beloved streets he could imagine or recall .
translation: Keputusan berdentum di skrin dengan kekuatan mematikan dan amarah yang lebih hebat daripada apa yang Mr. Scorsese pernah capai di jalanan yang paling kejam dan disayangi yang dapat dibayangkannya atau diingatinya.
back_translation: Thunderous impact on the screen with a power that is more deadly and fierce than anything Mr. Scorsese has ever achieved on the most cruel and beloved streets imaginable or remembered.

text: uses sharp humor and insight into human nature to examine class conflict , adolescent yearning , the roots of friendship and sexual identity .
translation: Menggunakan humor tajam dan wawasan ke dalam sifat manusia untuk menyiasat konflik kelas, kerinduan remaja, asal usul persahabatan, dan identiti seksual.
back_translation: Using sharp humor and insights into human nature to explore class conflict, teenage longing, the origins of friendship, and sexual identity.

text: in doing so , he learns that the conventional answers of easy availability of guns , violent national history , violent entertainment and even poverty are inadequate to explain this violence when other cultures share those same factors without the equivalent carnage .
translation: Dalam proses tersebut, beliau menyedari bahawa jawapan konvensional mengenai mudahnya mendapatkan senjata, sejarah keganasan negara, hiburan keganasan, dan juga kemiskinan tidak mencukupi untuk menjelaskan keganasan ini apabila budaya lain berkongsi faktor-faktor yang sama tanpa keganasan yang setaraf.
back_translation: In the process, he realized that conventional answers about ease of obtaining weapons, history of state violence, entertainment violence, and poverty are not sufficient to explain this violence when other cultures share the same factors without equivalent violence.

text: nine queens is exactly the sort of film hollywood is always re-making and utterly ruining in the process . see it in this incarnation .
translation: "Nine Queens adalah filem yang tepat seperti yang selalu dihasilkan semula oleh Hollywood dan terjejas sepenuhnya dalam proses tersebut. Saksikan dalam inkarnasinya yang ini."
back_translation: "Nine Queens is a film that is just like what Hollywood always produces, and is completely affected in the process. Watch it in this incarnation."

text: by turns gripping , amusing , tender and heart-wrenching , laissez-passer has all the earmarks of french cinema at its best .
translation: Dengan giliran yang mendebarkan, lucu, lembut, dan menusuk hati, laissez-passer mempunyai semua ciri terbaik filem Perancis.
back_translation: With thrilling, funny, gentle, and heart-piercing turns, laissez-passer has all the best features of French films.

text: it 's a shame the marvelous first 101 minutes have to be combined with the misconceived final 5 .
translation: Sungguh disayangkan bahawa 101 minit pertama yang menakjubkan perlu digabungkan dengan 5 minit terakhir yang salah tanggap.
back_translation: It is truly regrettable that the amazing first 101 minutes need to be combined with the misconstrued final 5 minutes.

text: when a movie is as down-and-out funny as austin powers in goldmember , it 's easy to overlook the missed opportunities and fizzled jokes littering the barrage of hilarity .
translation: Apabila sebuah filem lucu seolah-olah Austin Powers dalam Goldmember, adalah mudah untuk mengabaikan peluang yang terlepas dan jenaka yang gagal tersebar diantara deretan kelucuan.
back_translation: When a funny movie like Austin Powers in Goldmember comes along, it's easy to overlook missed opportunities and failed jokes scattered among the rows of hilarity.

text: with the help of his roommate , joe and his roommate 's girlfriend , bess , peter begins to explore more about himself and his values only to be crushed by those who love him .
translation: Dengan bantuan rakan biliknya, Joe dan gadis rakan biliknya, Bess, Peter mula meneroka dirinya dan nilai-nilainya hanya untuk ditindas oleh orang yang mencintainya.
back_translation: With the help of his roommate Joe and Joe's girlfriend Bess, Peter begins to explore himself and his values only to be oppressed by those who love him.

text: the story , touching though it is , does not quite have enough emotional resonance or variety of incident to sustain a feature , and even at 85 minutes it feels a bit long .
translation: Walaupun ceritanya menyentuh, namun tidak cukup menghadirkan resonansi emosi atau variasi kejadian untuk mengekalkan sebuah ciri khas, dan walaupun berdurasi 85 minit, ia terasa agak panjang.
back_translation: Although the story is touching, it does not bring out enough emotional resonance or event variations to maintain a distinctive feature, and even though it lasts 85 minutes, it feels somewhat lengthy.

text: luckily , this would n't be sabina 's final contribution to psychoanalysis .
translation: Untungnya, ini bukanlah sumbangan terakhir Sabina kepada psikoanalisis.
back_translation: Fortunately, this is not Sabina's final contribution to psychoanalysis.

text: when in their thirties , they lose their father and inherit his second-hand bookshop .
translation: Apabila berada di usia tiga puluhan, mereka kehilangan bapa mereka dan mewarisi kedai buku terpakai beliau.
back_translation: When they were in their thirties, they lost their father and inherited his secondhand bookstore.

text: when rebecca went away to college john thought webcams would help them keep in touch .
translation: Apabila Rebecca pergi belajar ke kolej, John fikir webcam boleh membantu mereka untuk kekal berhubung.
back_translation: When Rebecca went to study at college, John thought a webcam could help them stay connected.

text: they literally bump heads one night , and become best friends .
translation: Mereka secara harfiah menempel kepala pada malam itu, dan menjadi sahabat karib.
back_translation: They literally stuck heads that night, and became close friends.

text: painted with broad strokes but with a palette of rich , colorful details .
translation: Lukisan dilukis dengan sapuan yang lebar tetapi dengan palet butiran yang kaya dan berwarna-warni.
back_translation: The painting is painted with broad strokes but with a rich and colorful palette of details.

text: while playing , young t & # 252 ; rlich falls unconscious onto a duck nest and is carried away forever by the small river .
translation: Semasa bermain, pemuda Türlich jatuh pengsan ke sarang itik dan dibawa jauh oleh sungai kecil selamanya.
back_translation: While playing, the young man Türlich fainted into a duck's nest and was carried away far by a small river forever.

text: in the meantime , she has had a little love affair with a young man from the village , found a girlfriend from her childhood days , swum in the sea , and found a way to live in peace with her melancholic memories .
translation: Sementara itu, dia telah menjalin hubungan percintaan kecil dengan seorang lelaki muda dari kampung, bertemu kembali dengan seorang kawan perempuan dari zaman kanak-kanaknya, berenang di laut, dan menemui cara untuk hidup dengan aman damai bersama memori-memori melankoliknya.
back_translation: Meanwhile, she has established a small romantic relationship with a young man from the village, met a female friend from her childhood, swam in the sea, and found a way to live peacefully with her melancholic memories.

text: however he 's cauught by the mexican secret police and is forced to infiltrate a gruop political activist in the movement of 68 .
translation: Bagaimanapun, dia ditangkap oleh polis rahsia Mexico dan dipaksa untuk menyusup ke dalam kumpulan aktivis politik dalam pergerakan 68.
back_translation: However, he was caught by Mexican secret police and forced to infiltrate a group of political activists in the 68 movement.

text: mr . deeds is sure to give you a lot of laughs in this simple , sweet and romantic comedy .
translation: Tuan Deeds pasti akan memberi anda banyak gelak ketawa dalam komedi yang ringkas, manis, dan romantik ini.
back_translation: Mr. Deeds is sure to give you plenty of laughs in this short, sweet, and romantic comedy.

text: truth to tell , if you 've seen more than half-a-dozen horror films , there 's nothing here you have n't seen before .
translation: Sejujurnya, jika anda pernah menonton lebih daripada separuh lusin filem seram, tidak ada yang anda belum pernah lihat sebelum ini.
back_translation: Honestly, if you have watched more than half a dozen horror movies, there is nothing you have not seen before.

text: without the dark spookiness of crystal lake camp , the horror concept completely loses its creepy menace .
translation: Tanpa kegelapan yang menyeramkan dari perkhemahan Crystal Lake, konsep seram itu benar-benar kehilangan ancaman yang menyeramkan.
back_translation: Without the menacing darkness of Crystal Lake's campsite, the horror concept truly loses its chilling threat.

text: cruise 's character has the tables turned on him when he is accused of a future crime and must find out what brought it about and stop it before it can happen in the year 2054 , a so-called `` pre-crime division `` is working around washington , dc .
translation: Watak Cruise mengalami kejadian yang bertukar apabila dia dituduh melakukan jenayah di masa depan dan perlu mencari tahu apa sebabnya serta menghentikannya sebelum ia berlaku dalam tahun 2054, sebuah bahagian "pra-jenayah" sedang beroperasi di sekitar Washington, DC.
back_translation: Cruise's character undergoes a transformative event when he is accused of committing a crime in the future and needs to find out why and stop it before it occurs in the year 2054, a "pre-crime" division is operating around Washington, DC.

text: ricky is an ex-con with two strikes against him and is desperately trying to stay straight .
translation: Ricky merupakan bekas banduan dengan dua rekod kesalahan terhadapnya dan sedang berusaha dengan segenap usaha untuk hidup lurus.
back_translation: Ricky is a former convict with two records of offenses against him and is trying his best to live a straight life.

text: worthless , from its pseudo-rock-video opening to the idiocy of its last frames .
translation: tidak berharga, dari pembukaan video semu batuannya hingga kebodohan bingkainya yang terakhir.
back_translation: worthless, from the fake stone opening video to the final stupidity of its frame.

text: unfortunatly fate was not on his side because problems on location caused the film to go bankrupt within 12 days of shooting .
translation: Malangnya nasib tidak berpihak kepadanya kerana masalah di lokasi menyebabkan filem tersebut muflis dalam tempoh 12 hari penggambaran.
back_translation: Unfortunately, luck was not on his side as problems at the location caused the film to go bankrupt within 12 days of shooting.

text: so she writes it using info from people who talk about him and writes an unflattering piece , which does n't make him happy .
translation: Jadi dia menulis menggunakan maklumat daripada orang yang bercakap tentangnya dan menulis sebuah artikel yang tidak menyenangkannya.
back_translation: So, he wrote using information from people talking about him and wrote an article that displeased him.

text: nothing short of wonderful with its ten-year-old female protagonist and its steadfast refusal to set up a dualistic battle between good and evil .
translation: Tiada apa yang kurang daripada menakjubkan dengan protagonis perempuan berusia sepuluh tahun dan penolakannya yang tegar untuk mengatur pertempuran dwistik antara kebaikan dan kejahatan.
back_translation: There is nothing more amazing than being fascinated by a ten-year-old female protagonist and her strong refusal to orchestrate a two-sided battle between good and evil.

text: guru gulab leaves india for america and comes to stay in the neighbourhood of dr . anmol acharya ( aftab shivdasani ) .
translation: Guru Gulab berpindah dari India ke Amerika dan tinggal di kawasan kediaman Dr. Anmol Acharya (Aftab Shivdasani).
back_translation: Teacher Gulab moved from India to America and lived in the residence area of Dr. Anmol Acharya (Aftab Shivdasani).

text: shaky close-ups of turkey-on-rolls , stubbly chins , liver spots , red noses and the filmmakers new bobbed do draw easy chuckles but lead nowhere .
translation: Gambar dekat yang bergoyang-goyang mengenai ayam di roti, dagu berbulu, bintik-bintik hati, hidung merah, dan potongan rambut bob baru pereka filem menimbulkan gelak tawa yang mudah tetapi tidak membawa ke mana-mana.
back_translation: A close-up picture that wobbles about a chicken on toast, a furry chin, freckles of the heart, a red nose, and the new bob haircut of a movie designer evokes easy laughter but doesn't lead anywhere.

text: now the job is n't the payoff , it 's about payback .
translation: Sekarang pekerjaan bukan tentang bayaran, tetapi tentang balasan.
back_translation: Now work is not about payment, but about reward.

text: a sparkling cosmopolitan comedy that plays fast and loose with sacred cows of family values .
translation: satu komedi kosmopolitan yang berkilauan yang bermain dengan pantas dan bebas dengan lembu suci nilai keluarga.
back_translation: a cosmopolitan comedy that shines brightly that plays promptly and freely with the sacred cow of family values.

text: national lampoon 's van wilder was better than we expected ; a 'not a total waste of money ' kind of dateflick for those just hitting pre-collegiate years .
translation: Van Wilder dari National Lampoon lebih baik daripada yang kami jangkakan; sejenis filem tarikh yang 'tidak membazirkan sepenuhnya' untuk mereka yang baru mencecah tahun pra-kolej.
back_translation: Van Wilder from National Lampoon is better than we expected; a kind of 'not completely wasteful' date movie for those just about to hit the pre-college years.

text: mitch is left for dead in the desert -- or so they think -- rescued and nursed back to health by a gorgeous women named , angela rose ( nicole austin ) .
translation: mitch ditinggalkan mati di padang pasir - atau begitulah yang mereka fikir - diselamatkan dan dijaga kembali kesihatannya oleh seorang wanita cantik bernama, angela rose (nicole austin).
back_translation: Mitch was left for dead in the desert - or so they thought - saved and nursed back to health by a beautiful woman named Angela Rose (Nicole Austin).

text: a feature documentary offering a gripping portrait of the esgenoopetitj mi'gmaq first nation during the summer of 2000 as the canadian government appears to wage war on the community for exercising their inherent and court-affirmed fishing rights .
translation: Sebuah dokumentari yang menawarkan gambaran yang mendebarkan mengenai masyarakat asal Esgenoopetitj Mi'gmaq pada musim panas tahun 2000 ketika kerajaan Kanada nampaknya memulakan peperangan terhadap komuniti tersebut kerana menggunakan hak memancing yang diberikan oleh mahkamah.
back_translation: A documentary that offers a thrilling insight into the Esgenoopetitj Mi'gmaq community in the summer of 2000 when the Canadian government appeared to initiate a war against the community for exercising fishing rights granted by the court.

text: even if the ride 's a little bumpy , with a final lap that 's all too suspiciously smooth , you got ta give director roger michell , best known for the superfluous notting hill , credit for trying .
translation: Walaupun perjalanan agak bergelincir, dengan pusingan akhir yang terlalu licin dengan terlalu mencurigakan, anda perlu memberi penghargaan kepada pengarah roger michell, yang terkenal dengan filem tidak berapa penting seperti notting hill, kerana cuba.
back_translation: Despite a somewhat slippery journey, with a final twist that was too smooth and too suspicious, you must give credit to director Roger Michell, renowned for films not quite as significant as Notting Hill, for trying.

text: when images of nicholas 's absent father start to appear to him , the boy is understandably frightened .
translation: Apabila imej bapa Nicholas yang tidak hadir mula muncul kepadanya, budak itu tentu terasa takut.
back_translation: When the image of the absent father Nicholas began to appear to him, the boy certainly felt scared.

text: so , shaun goes to great lengths with a little help from his girlfriend ashley and his drugged-out loser brother lance to get into stanford any way they see fit .
translation: Jadi, Shaun mengambil langkah yang besar dengan sedikit bantuan dari kekasihnya Ashley dan abangnya yang lepuh, Lance, untuk masuk ke Stanford dengan cara apa pun yang mereka lihat sesuai.
back_translation: So, Shaun took a big step with a little help from his girlfriend Ashley and his blistered brother, Lance, to get into Stanford by any means they deemed appropriate.

text: told just proficiently enough to trounce its overly comfortable trappings .
translation: memberitahu dengan cukup mahir untuk mengatasi perangkap-perangkapnya yang terlalu selesa.
back_translation: Manage to navigate through its excessively comfortable traps quite skillfully.

text: though intrepid in exploring an attraction that crosses sexual identity , ozpetek falls short in showing us antonia 's true emotions . . . but at the very least , his secret life will leave you thinking .
translation: Walaupun berani dalam meneroka daya tarikan yang merentangi identiti seksual, Ozpetek gagal dalam menunjukkan emosi sebenar Antonia kepada kita... tetapi sekurang-kurangnya, kehidupan rahsia beliau akan membuat anda berfikir.
back_translation: Although brave in exploring the attraction that transcends sexual identity, Ozpetek fails to show Antonia's true emotions to us... but at least, his secret life will make you think.

text: the two leads are almost good enough to camouflage the dopey plot , but so much naturalistic small talk , delivered in almost muffled exchanges , eventually has a lulling effect .
translation: Kedua-dua watak utama hampir cukup baik untuk menyembunyikan plot yang bodoh, tetapi perbualan kecil yang naturalistik, disampaikan dalam pertukaran hampir dibisik, akhirnya memberikan kesan mengantuk.
back_translation: Both main characters are almost good enough to hide the stupid plot, but the naturalistic small talk, delivered in almost whispered exchanges, ultimately gives a boring impression.

text: raunchy though [ cho 's ] material is , it embraces all comers , regardless of gender , sexuality , race or ethnicity . and it 's never been sharper -- or funnier -- than it is here .
translation: Walaupun bahan [Cho's] agak lucah, ia merangkul semua individu, tanpa mengira jantina, seksualiti, bangsa atau etnik. Dan ia tidak pernah terlalu tajam - atau lucu - seperti di sini.
back_translation: Although the material [Cho's] is somewhat explicit, it embraces all individuals, regardless of gender, sexuality, race, or ethnicity. And it's never too sharp - or funny - like here.

text: sincere energy gives this soul-searcher something magic to find - if even along the beaten path .
translation: Tenaga yang tulus memberikan pencari jiwa ini sesuatu yang ajaib untuk ditemui - walaupun melalui jalan yang sudah biasa.
back_translation: Sincere energy gives this soul searcher something magical to discover - even through familiar paths.

text: a friendly vacation for four old friends - two couples from college - turns ugly . . . then
translation: sebuah percutian mesra untuk empat rakan tua - dua pasangan dari universiti - berubah menjadi buruk. . . kemudian
back_translation: A cozy vacation for four old friends - two couples from university - turns sour. . . then

text: . . . a pretentious and ultimately empty examination of a sick and evil woman .
translation: . . . satu kajian munafik dan hampa pada seorang wanita yang sakit dan jahat.
back_translation: . . . a hypocritical and futile study on a sick and wicked woman.

text: going to the website may be just as fun ( and scary ) as going to the film .
translation: Mengunjungi laman web mungkin sama seru (dan menakutkan) seperti menonton filem.
back_translation: Visiting websites can be just as exciting (and scary) as watching a movie.

text: the movie stays afloat thanks to its hallucinatory production design .
translation: Filem ini kekal menarik berkat reka bentuk pengeluaran halusinasinya.
back_translation: This movie remains captivating due to its sophisticated production design.

text: so , alexi starts to bribe members of the different teams to cause more trouble than necessary on the field , and the viewers love it .
translation: Alexi mula memberi rasuah kepada ahli-ahli pasukan yang berbeza untuk menyebabkan lebih banyak masalah daripada yang diperlukan di padang, dan para penonton menyukainya.
back_translation: Alexi began to bribe members of different teams to cause more trouble than necessary on the field, and the fans loved it.

text: has all the right elements but completely fails to gel together .
translation: Mempunyai semua elemen yang betul tetapi gagal sepenuhnya untuk menyatu bersama.
back_translation: Having all the right elements but failing completely to come together.

text: he has been with his girlfriend for 9 months too long .
translation: Dia telah berhubungan dengan kekasihnya selama 9 bulan terlalu lama.
back_translation: He has been in a relationship with his girlfriend for 9 months too long.

text: in a town of good intentions , memorbale characters and nothing much to do , the truth has a way of catching up with you .

text: daphne , a free-spirited american 19-year-old ( amanda bynes ) raised by her equally free-spirited mother goes to england to establish a relationship with her father ( colin firth ) , who turns out to be a prominent political figure heavily involved in social customs .
