back_translation: when his mother named him after Warren Beatty...

text: it 's hard to say who might enjoy this , are there tolstoy groupies out there ? it 's dark and tragic , and lets the business of the greedy talent agents get in the way of saying something meaningful about facing death
translation: Sukar untuk mengatakan siapa yang mungkin menikmati ini, adakah terdapat peminat Tolstoy di luar sana? Ia gelap dan tragis, dan membenarkan urusan agen bakat yang tamak menghalang daripada menyuarakan sesuatu yang bermakna mengenai menghadapi kematian.
back_translation: It's difficult to say who might enjoy this, are there any Tolstoy fans out there? It's dark and tragic, and allows greedy talent agents to prevent them from expressing anything meaningful about facing death.

text: time of fear is a taut psychological thriller thrusting an fbi agent and a grieving father into the dark world of a demented killer .
translation: "Time of Fear" adalah sebuah cerita seram psikologi yang menjejaskan seorang ejen FBI dan seorang bapa yang sedang bersedih ke dalam dunia gelap seorang pembunuh gila.
back_translation: "Time of Fear" is a psychological horror story that plunges an FBI agent and a grieving father into the dark world of a mad killer.

text: despite the film 's bizarre developments , hoffman keeps us riveted with every painful nuance , unexpected flashes of dark comedy and the character 's gripping humanity .
translation: Walaupun perkembangan filem yang pelik, Hoffman tetap membuat kita tertumpu dengan setiap nuan yang menyakitkan, kilauan komedi gelap yang tidak dijangka, dan kemanusiaan watak yang menggugat.
back_translation: Despite the bizarre developments in the film, Hoffman still keeps us focused with every painful nuance, unexpected dark comedic sparkles, and thought-provoking humanity of the characters.

text: `` bums in the mist `` will expose you to a world where alcohol is king and sloth is a virtue ; buddy george will discover , bums who are able to find love and professional success all while maintaining their `` mondern frontiersman `` lifestyle ; bums who 's natural gifts enable them to move down the ladder of success at an astronomical rate ( or whatever the opposite of astronomical is ) and who 's penchant for violence impact every aspect of their lives .
translation: "boms dalam embun" akan membuka mata anda kepada dunia di mana arak adalah raja dan kemalasan adalah satu kelebihan; kawan George akan menemui, boms yang mampu menemui cinta dan kejayaan profesional sambil mengekalkan gaya hidup "julang" mereka; boms yang memiliki bakat semulajadi yang membolehkan mereka turun tangga kejayaan dengan kadar yang sangat tinggi (atau apa yang bertentangan dengan sangat tinggi) dan yang kesukaan mereka terhadap keganasan mempengaruhi setiap aspek kehidupan mereka.
back_translation: "boms in the dew" will open your eyes to a world where alcohol is king and laziness is a virtue; George's friend will find boms who are able to find love and professional success while maintaining their "arrogant" lifestyle; boms who have a natural talent that allows them to climb the ladder of success at a very high rate (or the opposite of very high) and their fondness for violence influences every aspect of their lives.

text: little does he know , he is investigating some of the biggest events of the star wars saga , as he finds out that there is a connection between the assassination attempts and a separtists movement led by a former jedi ( christopher lee ) against the republic .
translation: Dia tidak menyedari bahawa dia sedang menyiasat beberapa peristiwa penting dalam siri Star Wars, apabila dia mengetahui bahawa terdapat hubungan antara percubaan pembunuhan dan gerakan separatis yang dipimpin oleh seorang bekas Jedi (Christopher Lee) menentang republik.
back_translation: He did not realize that he was investigating some important events in the Star Wars series when he found out that there was a connection between the assassination attempt and the separatist movement led by a former Jedi (Christopher Lee) against the republic.

text: however , nicholas can not keep the creature hidden forever and must eventually face his own feelings .
translation: Walau bagaimanapun, Nicholas tidak boleh menyembunyikan makhluk itu selamanya dan akhirnya harus menghadapi perasaannya sendiri.
back_translation: However, Nicholas cannot hide the creature forever and eventually must confront his own feelings.

text: it takes you on a personal journey through one family 's history , one man 's self-destructive grief and a love that transcends time and death .
translation: Ia membawa anda dalam perjalanan peribadi melalui sejarah sebuah keluarga, dukacita yang merosakkan diri seorang lelaki dan sebuah cinta yang melebihi zaman dan kematian.
back_translation: It takes you on a personal journey through the history of a family, the self-destructive grief of a man, and a love that transcends time and death.

text: short stories revolving around a bar and a hotel in recife , unveil a mosaic of exotic characters living in the brazilian underground : a butcher married with an evangelical woman , a necrophile in love with a bar owner , a transvestite , and many others .
translation: Kisah-kisah pendek yang berpusat di sekitar sebuah bar dan hotel di Recife, mendedahkan mozaik watak eksotik yang tinggal dalam dunia bawah tanah Brazil: seorang tukang daging yang berkahwin dengan seorang wanita evangelis, seorang nekrofil yang jatuh cinta dengan pemilik bar, seorang transgender, dan banyak lagi.
back_translation: Short stories centered around a bar and hotel in Recife reveal a mosaic of exotic characters living in the underground world of Brazil: a butcher married to an Evangelical woman, a necrophiliac in love with the bar owner, a transgender person, and many more.

text: compared to sorority boys . . . this is high comedic art .
translation: Berbanding dengan Sorority Boys . . . ini adalah seni komedi tinggi.
back_translation: Compared to Sorority Boys . . . this is high comedy art.

text: character development is conveyed primarily through the combatants actions and the choices they make as they progress across their combat route .
translation: Pembangunan watak disampaikan terutamanya melalui tindakan pejuang dan pilihan yang mereka buat ketika mereka melalui laluan pertempuran mereka.
back_translation: Character development is conveyed primarily through the actions of fighters and the choices they make as they go through their battles.

text: a broad stylistic combination of cinema verit & # 233 ; and magic realism , the film follows emile 's life as he tries to reconnect with his last remaining relation nada .
translation: sebuah gabungan gaya yang luas antara sinema verité dan realisme magis, filem ini mengikuti kehidupan Emile ketika dia cuba untuk menghubung semula dengan hubungan terakhirnya, Nada.
back_translation: A broad combination of cinema verité and magical realism styles, this film follows Emile's life as he tries to reconnect with his last relationship, Nada.

text: he is haunted by the ghost of his deceased brother paul who guides him toward his salvation .
translation: Dia diganggu oleh hantu abangnya yang telah meninggal, Paul yang membimbingnya ke arah keselamatan.
back_translation: He is disturbed by the ghost of his deceased brother, Paul, who guides him towards safety.

text: since all her architects are either busy otherwise or too conservative in style , this ambivalent honour falls to numerobis .
translation: Susulan keterlaluan semua arkiteknya sibuk dengan urusan lain atau terlalu konservatif dalam gaya, kehormatan yang meragukan ini jatuh kepada numerobis.
back_translation: Due to the excessive preoccupation of all the architects with other matters or being too conservative in style, this doubtful honor falls to Numerobis.

text: a film that clearly means to preach exclusively to the converted .
translation: filem yang jelas bermaksud untuk memberi ceramah secara eksklusif kepada penganutnya.
back_translation: The movie clearly aims to provide exclusive lectures to its followers.

text: evokes the 19th century with a subtlety that is an object lesson in period filmmaking .
translation: Menggugah abad ke-19 dengan halusnya yang merupakan pelajaran berharga dalam pembuatan filem zaman tersebut.
back_translation: Awakening the 19th century with its subtlety is a valuable lesson in filmmaking of that era.

text: with billy badly wounded , hotly pursued by a determined sheriff , the gang makes an unexpected and unwelcome visit .
translation: Dengan Billy terluka parah, dikejar dengan marah oleh seorang sheriff yang bertekad, geng itu membuat lawatan yang tidak dijangka dan tidak diingini.
back_translation: With Billy seriously injured, being angrily pursued by a determined sheriff, the gang made an unexpected and unwanted visit.

text: when jason sees a movie preview of his story , he and best friend kaylee ( amanda bynes ) go to los angeles to make wolf confess to using jason 's story as well as to clear jason 's name and to get him out of having to attend summer school .
translation: Apabila Jason melihat pratinjau filem kisahnya, dia dan sahabat karibnya Kaylee (Amanda Bynes) pergi ke Los Angeles untuk membuat Wolf mengakui menggunakan kisah Jason serta membersihkan nama Jason dan memastikan dia tidak perlu menghadiri sekolah musim panas.
back_translation: When Jason sees a preview of his story film, he and his close friend Kaylee (Amanda Bynes) go to Los Angeles to make Wolf confess to using Jason's story and clear Jason's name, ensuring that he doesn't have to attend summer school.

text: she must finally step out of her rarefied world and confront the assumptions on which she 's built her whole life .
translation: Dia akhirnya harus keluar dari dunianya yang mewah dan menghadapi anggapan-anggapan yang menjadi dasar dari seluruh hidupnya.
back_translation: He finally had to step out of his luxurious world and face the assumptions that formed the basis of his entire life.

text: a genuinely funny ensemble comedy that also asks its audience -- in a heartwarming , nonjudgmental kind of way -- to consider what we value in our daily lives .
translation: sebuah komedi ansambel yang benar-benar lucu yang juga meminta penontonnya - dengan cara yang mengharukan, tanpa menghakimi - untuk mempertimbangkan apa yang kita nilai dalam kehidupan kita sehari-hari.
back_translation: A truly funny ensemble comedy that also asks its audience - in a touching, non-judgmental way - to consider what we value in our everyday lives.

text: unfortunately things do n't go as planned , and when the kids ' van breaks down at an old slaughterhouse , they are hunted down one by one . . .
translation: Malangnya, segalanya tidak berjalan seperti yang dirancang, dan apabila van kanak-kanak rosak di sebuah kilang sembelihan lama, mereka diberburu satu persatu...
back_translation: Unfortunately, everything did not go as planned, and when the children's van broke down at an old slaughterhouse, they were hunted down one by one...

text: in the end , each must deal with the mysterious and , perhaps , scandalous reason their affair suddenly ended .
translation: Pada akhirnya, setiap individu harus berurusan dengan alasan misteri dan mungkin kontroversi yang menyebabkan hubungan mereka tiba-tiba berakhir.
back_translation: In the end, every individual must deal with the mysterious and possibly controversial reasons that cause their relationships to suddenly end.

text: the teen must decide whether to become immortal and stay with a tuck she 's fallen in love with .
translation: Remaja itu harus membuat keputusan sama ada untuk menjadi abadi dan tinggal bersama Tuck yang dia jatuh cinta.
back_translation: The teenager must make a decision whether to become immortal and stay with Tuck whom he/she has fallen in love with.

text: the performances are so leaden , michael rymer 's direction is so bloodless and the dialogue is so corny that the audience laughs out loud .
translation: Pentasannya sangat membosankan, arahan Michael Rymer sangat hambar, dan dialognya sangat klise sehingga penonton ketawa terbahak-bahak.
back_translation: The stage was very boring, Michael Rymer's direction was very dull, and the dialogue was very cliché that made the audience burst out laughing.

text: movies like this are selling the old european candor , the old wink of 'bold ' revelation . but in 2002 , such revelations wilt .
translation: Filem-filem seperti ini sedang memasarkan kejujuran Eropah lama, sentuhan usang pendedahan 'berani'. Tetapi pada tahun 2002, pendedahan sebegini mula pudar.
back_translation: Films like these are marketing old European honesty, the outdated touch of 'brave' revelations. But in 2002, such revelations began to fade.

text: otis wants to relive the old days , mark does n't .
translation: Otis ingin mengulangi hari-hari lama, Mark tidak.
back_translation: Otis wants to relive the old days, Mark doesn't.

text: one of the finest , most humane and important holocaust movies ever made .
translation: Salah satu filem holokaus yang terbaik, paling berperasaan, dan penting yang pernah dihasilkan.
back_translation: One of the best, most emotional, and important Holocaust films ever made.

text: a young korean war veteran returns home to find his parents have died and his wife has left him for another man .
translation: Seorang veteran perang Korea muda pulang ke rumah untuk mendapati ibu bapanya telah meninggal dan istrinya telah meninggalkannya untuk seorang lelaki lain.
back_translation: A young Korean war veteran returned home to find that his parents had passed away and his wife had left him for another man.

text: fontaine indulges her signature style , creating a carefully measured film -- the kind whose impact slowly sneaks up on its audience and haunts them long after leaving the theatre .
translation: Fontaine memuji gaya uniknya, mencipta filem yang diukur dengan teliti - jenis yang kesanannya perlahan-lahan meresapi penonton dan menghantui mereka lama selepas meninggalkan teater.
back_translation: Fontaine praises his unique style, creating films measured with precision - the kind that slowly seeps into the audience and haunts them long after leaving the theater.

text: living with the fosters is a darkly funny and dangerously subtle comedy about one family 's paranoid preparation for the year 2000 crisis and beyond .
translation: Menghidupi bersama keluarga angkat adalah satu komedi yang gelap dan halus tentang persiapan paranoid sebuah keluarga untuk krisis tahun 2000 dan seterusnya.
back_translation: Living together with a foster family is a dark and subtle comedy about a paranoid family's preparations for the Y2K crisis and beyond.

text: his odyssey finally leads him onto a theatre stage .
translation: Pelayarannya akhirnya membawanya ke pentas teater.
back_translation: His journey finally brought him to the theater stage.

text: on his way he gets again and again into situations of obsessive self-uncovering .
translation: Di perjalanan, dia berulang kali terjerumus dalam situasi pengungkapan diri yang obsesif.
back_translation: During the journey, he repeatedly stumbled into obsessive self-disclosure situations.

text: the connected stories of breitbart and hanussen are actually fascinating , but the filmmaking in invincible is such that the movie does not do them justice .
translation: Kisah yang berhubung dengan breitbart dan hanussen sebenarnya sangat menarik, tetapi pembikinan filem dalam Invincible adalah sedemikian rupa sehingga filem itu tidak memberi keadilan kepada kisah-kisah tersebut.
back_translation: The story related to breitbart and hanussen is actually very interesting, but the film production in Invincible is done in such a way that the film does not do justice to those stories.

text: dex and eric are ordinary , twenty-something guys dealing with work , relationships and friends .
translation: Dex dan Eric adalah lelaki biasa, dalam lingkungan usia dua puluhan yang menghadapi hal-hal seperti kerja, hubungan dan kawan-kawan.
back_translation: Dex and Eric are ordinary men in their twenties, dealing with things like work, relationships, and friends.

text: novak manages to capture a cruelly hilarious vein of black comedy in the situation with his cast of non-actors and a gritty , no-budget approach .
translation: Novak berjaya menangkap satu aspek komedi hitam yang kejam dengan jenaka dalam situasi tersebut dengan penggunaan pelakon bukan profesional dan pendekatan yang kering, tanpa bajet.
back_translation: Novak successfully captures a cruel aspect of dark comedy with humor in that situation through the use of non-professional actors and a dry, low-budget approach.

text: malone does have a gift for generating nightmarish images that will be hard to burn out of your brain . but the movie 's narrative hook is way too muddled to be an effectively chilling guilty pleasure .
translation: Malone memang memiliki bakat untuk menciptakan gambar-gambar yang menakutkan yang sukar dilupakan . tetapi plot filem ini terlalu kacau untuk menjadi keseronokan bersalah yang efektif .
back_translation: Malone does indeed have a talent for creating unforgettable and spooky images. However, the movie's plot is too messy to be an effective guilty pleasure.

text: subconscious art : a product of artistic merit that was created without conscious artistic intentions .
translation: Seni bawah sedar: sebuah hasil karya seni yang dicipta tanpa niat seni sedar.
back_translation: Subconscious art: an artwork created without conscious artistic intent.

text: if you 're part of her targeted audience , you 'll cheer . otherwise , maybe .
translation: Jika anda adalah sebahagian daripada audiens sasaran beliau, anda akan bersorak. Jika tidak, mungkin tidak.
back_translation: If you are part of his target audience, you will cheer. If not, maybe not.

text: however , when one of the lads accidentally shags a punter ( steven berkoff ) to death , they are forced to look for 'work ' elsewhere .
translation: Walau bagaimanapun, apabila salah seorang ahli kumpulan secara tidak sengaja menggoda seorang pelanggan (Steven Berkoff) hingga mati, mereka terpaksa mencari 'kerja' di tempat lain.
back_translation: However, when one of the group members accidentally teases a customer (Steven Berkoff) to death, they are forced to look for 'work' elsewhere.

text: the film provides some great insight into the neurotic mindset of all comics -- even those who have reached the absolute top of the game .
translation: Filem tersebut memberikan pandangan yang hebat tentang pemikiran neurotik semua pelawak - termasuk mereka yang telah mencapai puncak permainan.
back_translation: The film offers a great insight into the neurotic thinking of all comedians - including those who have reached the peak of their game.

text: a perfect example of rancid , well-intentioned , but shamelessly manipulative movie making .
translation: suatu contoh yang sempurna tentang filem yang busuk, bermaksud baik, tetapi dengan cara yang manipulatif dengan tiada rasa malu.
back_translation: A perfect example of a rotten film, well-intentioned but manipulative shamelessly.

text: discarded and forgotten , pete williams is living out his days in an old soldiers home in galveston , texas .
translation: Terbuang dan dilupakan, Pete Williams kini menjalani hari tuanya di rumah warga tua di Galveston, Texas.
back_translation: Thrown and forgotten, Pete Williams now spends his days at an elderly care home in Galveston, Texas.

text: while some will object to the idea of a vietnam picture with such a rah-rah , patriotic tone , soldiers ultimately achieves its main strategic objective : dramatizing the human cost of the conflict that came to define a generation .
translation: Walaupun sesetengah mungkin membangkang kepada idea gambar Vietnam dengan nada yang begitu rah-rah, patriotik, filem Soldiers pada hujungnya mencapai objektif strategik utamanya: mendramatisasi kos manusia dalam konflik yang menjadi ciri generasi tersebut.
back_translation: Although some may rebel against the idea of the Vietnam image being portrayed with such a rah-rah, patriotic tone, the film Soldiers ultimately achieves its main strategic objective: to dramatize the human cost in the conflicts that defined that generation.

text: for anni they are not enemies , but just men .
translation: Bagi Anni mereka bukan musuh, tetapi hanyalah lelaki.
back_translation: To Anni they are not enemies, but merely men.

text: are they illusions , visions from the past , ghosts - or is it reality ?
translation: Adakah mereka ilusi, visi dari masa lalu, hantu - atau adakah itu realiti?
back_translation: Are they illusions, visions from the past, ghosts - or are they reality?

text: sometimes makes less sense than the bruckheimeresque american action flicks it emulates .
translation: Kadang-kadang kurang bermakna berbanding filem aksi Amerika yang menirunya.
back_translation: Sometimes less meaningful compared to American action films that imitate them.

text: M-^Eit was n't the subject matter that ultimately defeated the filmM-^Eit was the unfulfilling , incongruous , `` wait a second , did i miss something ? `` ending .
translation: Ia bukanlah perkara yang menjadi subjek utama yang akhirnya mengalahkan filem - tetapi adalah penamat yang tidak memuaskan, tidak selaras, "tunggu sekejap, adakah saya terlepas sesuatu?"
back_translation: It is not the main subject that ultimately defeats the film - but it is an unsatisfying, incongruous conclusion, "wait, did I miss something?"

text: the l . a . dogwalking scene provides a colorful backdrop for the story of ellie moore ( diane gaidry ) , damaged goods on the run from her latest abusive boyfriend and on the verge of transformation .
translation: Laman jalan anjing di L.A. menyediakan latar belakang yang berwarna-warni untuk kisah Ellie Moore (Diane Gaidry), barang-barang rosak yang lari dari teman lelaki salah guna terbaru dan hampir menuju perubahan.
back_translation: The streets of L.A. provide a colorful backdrop for Ellie Moore's (Diane Gaidry) story, a broken-down woman running from her abusive boyfriend and on the brink of change.

text: the 50-something lovebirds are too immature and unappealing to care about .
translation: Pasangan kekasih yang berusia 50-an terlalu tidak matang dan tidak menarik untuk diambil peduli.
back_translation: A couple in their 50s is too immature and unattractive to be bothered with.

text: reluctantly , busy katherine allows patricia to audition and , at once , recognizes her incredible talent .
translation: dengan enggan, Katherine yang sibuk membenarkan Patricia untuk mengambil ujian dan, pada masa yang sama, mengakui bakat luar biasanya.
back_translation: Reluctantly, the busy Katherine allowed Patricia to take the exam and, at the same time, acknowledged her extraordinary talent.

text: one of the best examples of how to treat a subject , you 're not fully aware is being examined , much like a photo of yourself you did n't know was being taken .
translation: Salah satu contoh terbaik tentang bagaimana untuk merawat sesuatu, ketika anda tidak sepenuhnya sedar sedang diperiksa, mirip dengan foto diri anda yang tidak disedari diambil.
back_translation: One of the best examples of how to take care of something, when you are not fully aware that you are being observed, is similar to an unnoticed photo of yourself being taken.

text: the crassness of this reactionary thriller is matched only by the ridiculousness of its premise .
translation: Kesusahan filem cerita seram ini hanya sebanding dengan ketidakmasukannya dari premisnya yang melampau.
back_translation: The difficulty of this horror movie is only matched by its excessive deviation from its premise.

text: jones has crafted a natty narrative that , enhanced by erin nordstrom 's editing , is filled with payoffs .
translation: Jones telah mencipta naratif yang kemas yang, dipertingkatkan oleh penyuntingan Erin Nordstrom, penuh dengan ganjaran.
back_translation: Jones has created a polished narrative, enhanced by editor Erin Nordstrom, filled with rewards.

text: vividly conveys the shadow side of the 30-year friendship between two english women .
translation: secara jelas menyampaikan sisi gelap dari persahabatan 30 tahun antara dua wanita Inggris.
back_translation: Clearly conveys the dark side of a 30-year friendship between two British women.

text: . . . fifty minutes of tedious adolescent melodramatics followed by thirty-five minutes of inflated nonsense .
translation: . . . lima puluh minit drama remaja yang membosankan diikuti dengan tiga puluh lima minit perkara yang dibesar-besarkan.
back_translation: . . . fifty minutes of boring teenage drama followed by thirty-five minutes of exaggerated events.

text: the rebellion against sauron is building up and will be led by gandalf the white ( sir ian mckellen ) , who was thought to be dead after the balrog captured him .
translation: Pemberontakan terhadap Sauron semakin meningkat dan akan dipimpin oleh Gandalf yang berbaju putih (Sir Ian McKellen), yang sebelum ini disangka telah mati setelah ditangkap oleh Balrog.
back_translation: The rebellion against Sauron is growing and will be led by Gandalf in white robes (Sir Ian McKellen), who was previously thought to be dead after being captured by the Balrog.

text: every sequel you skip will be two hours gained . consider this review life-affirming .
translation: Setiap sambungan yang anda langkau akan memberikan anda tambahan dua jam. Pertimbangkan ulasan ini memberi keyakinan hidup.
back_translation: Every connection you skip will give you an additional two hours. Consider this review provides life confidence.

text: that the chuck norris `` grenade gag `` occurs about 7 times during windtalkers is a good indication of how serious-minded the film is .
translation: Fakta bahawa "gag granat" Chuck Norris berlaku kira-kira 7 kali semasa filem Windtalkers adalah petanda yang baik tentang betapa seriusnya filem tersebut.
back_translation: The fact that Chuck Norris' "grenade gag" happened about 7 times during the movie Windtalkers is a good indication of how serious the film is.

text: together they discover that a corporation funds and is profitting from the plantation-like work environment they are forced to work under .
translation: Mereka bersama-sama mengetahui bahawa sebuah syarikat menaja dan mendapat keuntungan daripada persekitaran kerja yang berbentuk ladang tempatan yang mereka terpaksa bekerja di bawahnya.
back_translation: They are together aware that a company sponsors and profits from the local farm-like working environment that they are forced to work under.

text: in the 1880 's , chon wang ( jackie chan ) 's father and keeper of the imperial seal has been murdered by parliament and royal family member rathbone ( aidan gillen ) , ( who steals the imperial seal ) with chon wang 's sister , chon lin ( fann wong ) witnessing the murder .
translation: Pada tahun 1880-an, bapa Chon Wang (Jackie Chan) dan penjaga meterai kekaisaran telah dibunuh oleh anggota parlimen dan keluarga diraja Rathbone (Aidan Gillen), yang mencuri meterai kekaisaran, dengan adik Chon Wang, Chon Lin (Fann Wong), menyaksikan pembunuhan itu.
back_translation: In the 1880s, Chon Wang's father (Jackie Chan) and the imperial seal guardian were killed by members of parliament and the royal Rathbone family (Aidan Gillen) who stole the imperial seal, with Chon Wang's sister, Chon Lin (Fann Wong), witnessing the murder.

text: the events of the film are just so weird that i honestly never knew what the hell was coming next .
translation: Peristiwa dalam filem itu sangat aneh sehingga sebenarnya saya tidak pernah tahu apa yang akan berlaku selepas ini.
back_translation: The events in the film were so strange that I actually never knew what would happen next.

text: the film is shot in multiple formats from 35mm ( the majority ) to the newer digital format of digi-beta , with a short , eerily beautiful dream segment shot in super-8 .
translation: Filem ini dirakam dalam pelbagai format dari 35mm (kebanyakan) hingga format digital baru digi-beta, dengan segmen mimpi yang pendek, menakjubkan yang dirakam dalam super-8.
back_translation: This film was recorded in various formats from 35mm (mostly) to the new digital format digi-beta, with short, amazing dream sequences recorded in super-8.

text: soon , however , they are regretting their decision and wishing christmas would hurry up and finish until a surprise christmas `` miracle `` , could there still be hope for christmas , and the websters ?
translation: Tetapi tidak lama selepas itu, mereka menyesali keputusan mereka dan berharap Krismas akan cepat berlalu sehingga suatu "mukjizat" Krismas boleh berlaku, adakah masih ada harapan untuk Krismas dan keluarga Webster?
back_translation: But not long after that, they regretted their decision and hoped that Christmas would soon pass so that a "Christmas miracle" could happen. Is there still hope for Christmas and the Webster family?

text: gino and settimo try to repay roberto 's hospitality by chasing off a debt collector who wants his property , but their strong arm tactics alarm him and he realises they are n't the pr consultants they claimed to be liquor store night clerk jose ( freddie ganno ) has two dreams : winning the state lottery and winning the heart of a lovely young shoe store salesperson , diana ( christi adams ) .
translation: Gino dan Settimo cuba membayar keramahannya kepada Roberto dengan mengusir penagih hutang yang mahu mengambil harta miliknya, tetapi taktik kekerasan mereka membuatnya bimbang dan dia sedar bahawa mereka bukanlah pengurus hubungan awam seperti yang mereka dakwa. Penjaga kedai arak malam, Jose (Freddie Ganno), mempunyai dua impian: memenangi loteri negeri dan memenangi hati seorang penjual kasut muda yang anggun, Diana (Christi Adams).
back_translation: Gino and Settimo attempt to repay Roberto's kindness by driving away debt collectors who want to take his belongings, but their violent tactics make him apprehensive and he realizes that they are not public relations managers as they claim. Nightclub bouncer, Jose (Freddie Ganno), has two dreams: winning the state lottery and winning the heart of a graceful young shoe saleswoman, Diana (Christi Adams).

text: at night he is daredevil , a masked vigilante stalking the dark streets of the city , a relentless avenger of justice .
translation: Pada waktu malam dia adalah seorang pendurjana, seorang penjaga hutan yang memburu di jalanan gelap bandar, seorang pemberi balas dendam yang tidak kenal lelah terhadap keadilan.
back_translation: At night, he is a criminal, a forest ranger hunting in the dark streets of the city, a relentless avenger who is relentless towards justice.

text: pauly then fakes his own death , and the media goes crazy .
translation: Kemudian, Pauly membuat kematian palsu sendiri, dan media menjadi gila.
back_translation: Then, Pauly faked his own death, and the media went crazy.

text: with the exception of mccoist , the players do n't have a clue on the park . the acting is n't much better .
translation: Kecuali McCoist, para pemain tidak mempunyai petunjuk di padang. Lakonan juga tidak jauh lebih baik.
back_translation: Except for McCoist, the players have no clue on the field. The performance is also not much better.

text: but jim 's team , knowing their coach is a great ball player , makes a deal with him : if they win the district championship , they want jim to try out for a major-league organization .
translation: Tetapi pasukan Jim, mengetahui jurulatih mereka adalah seorang pemain bola yang hebat, membuat perjanjian dengan beliau: jika mereka memenangi kejuaraan daerah, mereka mahu Jim mencuba untuk bergabung dengan organisasi liga utama.
back_translation: But Jim's team, knowing that their coach is a great football player, made a deal with him: if they win the district championship, they want Jim to try to join the premier league organization.

text: watching beanie and his gang put together his slasher video from spare parts and borrowed materials is as much fun as it must have been for them to make it .
translation: Menonton Beanie dan gengnya menyusun video slasher mereka dari barang-barang sisa dan bahan yang dipinjamkan sama menyeronokkannya seperti yang harus mereka alami semasa membuatnya.
back_translation: Watching Beanie and his gang putting together their slasher video from leftover items and borrowed materials was just as enjoyable as the experience they must have had while making it.

text: chock full of ethnic flavor , whimsy , doubt , faith , joy and wonder , mary and joe is a delightful surprise , as the old story is brought into the present with startling freshness and power .
translation: Penuh dengan rasa etnik, keanehan, keraguan, kepercayaan, kegembiraan, dan kekaguman, Mary dan Joe adalah satu kejutan yang menyeronokkan, ketika cerita lama dihidupkan semula dengan kesegaran dan kekuatan yang mengejutkan.
back_translation: Full of ethnic flavors, strangeness, doubts, beliefs, joys, and admiration, Mary and Joe are a delightful surprise when old stories are revived with freshness and surprising strength.

text: unfortunately , the bomb goes off unplanned and kills four innocent people .
translation: Malangnya , bom meletup secara tidak dirancang dan membunuh empat orang yang tidak bersalah.
back_translation: Unfortunately, the bomb exploded unexpectedly and killed four innocent people.

text: that rare film whose real-life basis is , in fact , so interesting that no embellishment is needed .
translation: filem yang jarang dan berdasarkan pada kisah benar, sebenarnya begitu menarik sehingga tidak memerlukan penambahan yang berlebihan.
back_translation: A rare film based on a true story is so intriguing that it does not need excessive additions.

text: he 's confused , he 's hurt , and he does n't know what to do .
translation: Dia keliru, dia terluka, dan dia tidak tahu apa yang perlu dilakukan.
back_translation: He is confused, he is hurt, and he doesn't know what to do.

text: more concerned with overall feelings , broader ideas , and open-ended questions than concrete story and definitive answers , soderbergh 's solaris is a gorgeous and deceptively minimalist cinematic tone poem .
translation: Lebih memperhatikan perasaan keseluruhan, idea yang lebih meluas, dan soalan yang terbuka daripada cerita yang konkrit dan jawapan yang pasti, Solaris karya Soderbergh adalah sebuah puisi sinematik yang cantik dan dengan gaya yang minimalis namun menipu.
back_translation: Paying more attention to overall feelings, broader ideas, and open-ended questions rather than concrete stories and definite answers, Soderbergh's Solaris is a beautiful cinematic poem with a minimalist yet deceptive style.

text: while everybody else sweats and frets , jim 's dad is cool while giving advice and getting ready for one of the best days of his life .
translation: Sementara semua orang lain berpeluh dan gelisah, ayah Jim tenang sambil memberi nasihat dan bersiap untuk salah satu hari terbaik dalam hidupnya.
back_translation: While everyone else is sweating and anxious, Jim's father is calm as he gives advice and prepares for one of the best days of his life.

text: once convicted , he ends up on death row in texas himself , telling his story to a reporter through a series of flashbacks .
translation: Setelah disabitkan, dia akhirnya berada di baris hukuman mati di Texas sendiri, menceritakan kisahnya kepada seorang wartawan melalui serangkaian kilas balik.
back_translation: After being sentenced, he finally found himself on the death row in Texas alone, recounting his story to a journalist through a series of flashbacks.

text: russian ark moves beyond a simple technical exercise and into the realm of greatness . it 's a masterpiece on every level .
translation: Russian Ark bergerak melepasi latihan teknikal yang mudah dan masuk ke dalam bidang kegemilangan. Ia adalah sebuah arca yang hebat di setiap tahap.
back_translation: Russian Ark moves beyond easy technical exercises and enters the realm of greatness. It is a great ark at every level.

text: the pianist is a fine valedictory work for polanski , made richer by his own experiences , making his other movies somehow richer in the bargain .
translation: "Pianis" merupakan sebuah karya perpisahan yang hebat bagi Polanski, diperkayakan oleh pengalaman peribadinya sendiri, menjadikan filem-filemnya yang lain lebih bermakna.
back_translation: "Pianist" is a great farewell work for Polanski, enriched by his personal experiences, making his other films more meaningful.

text: in the latino neighborhood of new york city 's washington heights , two sons of immigrants one dominican , one irish wrestle with ambition and identity , only to discover that sometimes pursuing one 's dreams comes at a heavy cost .
translation: Di lingkungan Latin di Washington Heights, New York City, dua orang anak lelaki imigran, satu orang Republik Dominika dan satu orang Irish bergelut dengan ambisi dan identiti, hanya untuk mengetahui bahawa terkadang mengejar impian seseorang datang dengan kos yang besar.
back_translation: In the Latin neighborhood of Washington Heights, New York City, two immigrant boys, one from the Dominican Republic and one Irish, grapple with ambition and identity, only to realize that sometimes chasing one's dreams comes at a high cost.

text: it 's fun , wispy , wise and surprisingly inoffensive for a film about a teen in love with his stepmom .
translation: Ia menyeronokkan, ringan, bijak, dan membingungkan tidak menyakitkan untuk filem tentang remaja yang jatuh cinta dengan ibu tiri.
back_translation: It's enjoyable, light, clever, and intriguing but not hurtful for a movie about teenagers falling in love with a stepmother.

text: too bad maggio could n't come up with a better script .
translation: Sayangnya Maggio tidak dapat mencipta skrip yang lebih baik.
back_translation: Unfortunately, Maggio could not create a better script.

text: the tragic real life story of a serial killer who stalked his victims in the early 1970 's in small town america .
translation: kisah tragis kehidupan seorang pembunuh berantai yang mengejar mangsanya pada awal tahun 1970-an di sebuah bandar kecil di Amerika.
back_translation: The tragic story of a serial killer who pursued his victims in a small American town in the early 1970s.

text: its message has merit and , in the hands of a brutally honest individual like prophet jack , might have made a point or two regarding life .
translation: Mesejnya mempunyai kepentingan dan, dalam tangan individu yang jujur seperti nabi jack, mungkin akan membuat satu atau dua perkara tentang kehidupan.
back_translation: His message is of importance and, in the hands of an honest individual like Prophet Jack, it may shed light on one or two things about life.

text: five hundred years before columbus ( 996 a . d . ) , a young norwegian viking with the heart of a lion and the soul of a poet discovers america while on a quest to bring his loved one to 'the top of the world ' .
translation: Lima ratus tahun sebelum Columbus (996 M), seorang Viking Norwegia muda dengan hati singa dan jiwa seorang penyair menemui Amerika semasa dalam misi membawa orang yang dicintainya ke 'puncak dunia'.
back_translation: Five hundred years before Columbus (996 AD), a young Norwegian Viking with the heart of a lion and the soul of a poet discovered America while on a mission to bring his loved one to the 'top of the world'.

text: over 80 of the world 's greatest martial artists demonstrate techniques and discuss philosophy in this fascinating account of the martial arts phenomenon and its increasing global popularity .
translation: Lebih daripada 80 ahli seni bela diri terhebat dunia mempersembahkan teknik dan membincangkan falsafah dalam akaun menarik tentang fenomena seni bela diri dan popularitinya yang semakin meningkat di peringkat global.
back_translation: More than 80 of the world's greatest martial arts artists showcase techniques and discuss the philosophy in an interesting account of the phenomenon of martial arts and its increasing popularity on a global scale.

text: an entertaining but unspectacular film . pretty goofy at times - but the slick and gleefully self-indulgent violence will not disappoint the action fan .
translation: Filem yang menghiburkan tetapi tidak luar biasa. Kadang-kadang agak bodoh - tetapi keganasan yang licin dan penuh keseronokan tidak akan mengecewakan peminat aksi.
back_translation: Entertaining film but not outstanding. Sometimes a bit silly - but the slick and fun violence will not disappoint action fans.

text: based on actual accounts , the untold is the story of harlan knowles ( lance henriksen ) , billionaire and president of bio-comp industries who heads up a team of experts in a quest to locate a company plane that disappeared over the remote forests of the pacific northwest .
translation: Berdasarkan cerita sebenar, "The Untold" adalah kisah Harlan Knowles (Lance Henriksen), seorang billionair dan presiden Bio-Comp Industries yang memimpin pasukan pakar dalam mencari pesawat syarikat yang hilang di hutan terpencil Pacific Northwest.
back_translation: Based on a true story, "The Untold" is the tale of Harlan Knowles (Lance Henriksen), a billionaire and president of Bio-Comp Industries who leads a team of experts in the search for the company's missing plane in the remote forests of the Pacific Northwest.

text: the character of zigzag is not sufficiently developed to support a film constructed around him .
translation: Watak zigzag tidak cukup dikembangkan untuk menyokong filem yang dibina mengelilinginya.
back_translation: The zigzag character is not adequately developed to support the film built around it.

text: as a good old-fashioned adventure for kids , spirit : stallion of the cimarron is a winner .
translation: Sebagai satu pengembaraan gaya lama yang baik untuk kanak-kanak, Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron adalah pemenang.
back_translation: As a good old-fashioned adventure for children, Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron is a winner.

text: two men ( eddie murphy and jeff garlin ) get laid off in product development at a large food company and are forced to become stay-at-home fathers and take their sons out of the exclusive chapman academy .
translation: Dua lelaki (Eddie Murphy dan Jeff Garlin) dipecat daripada jabatan pembangunan produk di sebuah syarikat makanan besar dan terpaksa menjadi bapa di rumah serta mengambil anak lelaki mereka daripada Akademi Chapman yang eksklusif.
back_translation: Two men (Eddie Murphy and Jeff Garlin) are fired from their positions in product development at a large food company and are forced to become stay-at-home dads and take their sons out of the exclusive Chapman Academy.

text: henry romero discovers , samantha already knows ( firsthand ) of the evils young men do .
translation: Henry Romero mendapati, Samantha sudah mengetahui (dengan pengalaman sendiri) tentang kejahatan yang dilakukan oleh lelaki muda.
back_translation: Henry Romero found out that Samantha already knew (from her own experience) about the crimes committed by the young man.

text: harry , a world-weary career criminal masquerading as a priest , takes to the road with escaped convict nate and his jailbait girlfriend angel .
translation: Harry, seorang penjenayah yang letih dengan dunia yang berpura-pura sebagai seorang paderi, membawa lari bersama narapidana yang melarikan diri, Nate, dan teman perempuan remaja dia yang bernama Angel.
back_translation: Harry, a criminal tired of a world pretending to be a priest, runs away with an escaped convict, Nate, and his teenage female friend named Angel.

text: shot like a postcard and overacted with all the boozy self-indulgence that brings out the worst in otherwise talented actors . . .
translation: Direkam seperti kad pos dan berlakon secara berlebihan dengan semua kelebihan mabuk yang mengeluarkan sifat terburuk pada pelakon berbakat.
back_translation: Recorded like a postcard and overacted with all the excesses of drunkenness that bring out the worst in talented actors.

text: he has to walk through some of the worst areas in l . a .
translation: Dia terpaksa berjalan melalui beberapa kawasan terburuk di Los Angeles.
back_translation: He had to walk through some of the worst areas in Los Angeles.

text: a stirring tribute to the bravery and dedication of the world 's reporters who willingly walk into the nightmare of war not only to record the events for posterity , but to help us clearly see the world of our making .
translation: satu penghargaan yang menggugah hati kepada keberanian dan dedikasi wartawan di seluruh dunia yang dengan rela masuk ke dalam mimpi ngeri perang bukan sahaja untuk mendokumentasikan peristiwa tersebut untuk masa depan, tetapi juga untuk membantu kita melihat dunia ciptaan kita dengan jelas.
back_translation: an inspiring tribute to the courage and dedication of journalists around the world who willingly enter the horrific nightmare of war not only to document the events for the future, but also to help us see our created world more clearly.

text: rewarding for its brash originality and daring in etching a portrait of a man who refuses to take life 's disappointments lying down .
translation: memberi ganjaran bagi keberanian dan keberanian yang terdapat dalam mengukir potret seorang lelaki yang enggan menerima kekecewaan hidup dengan pasrah.
back_translation: rewarding bravery and courage found in carving a portrait of a man who refuses to accept the disappointments of life passively.

text: as blunt as it is in depicting child abuse , el bola is a movie steeped in an ambiguity that lends its conflicts a symbolic resonance .
translation: Walaupun langsung dalam menggambarkan salah guna kanak-kanak, filem El Bola adalah sebuah filem yang penuh dengan ketidaktentuan yang memberikan ketegangan konfliknya satu nilai simbolik.
back_translation: Although not directly depicting child abuse, the film El Bola is full of uncertainties that give its conflict a symbolic value.

text: only through tremendous will and uncanny luck did he once again rise as the kid who stays in the picture .
translation: Hanya melalui kehendak yang luar biasa dan nasib yang aneh dia sekali lagi bangkit sebagai si kanak-kanak yang kekal dalam gambar.
back_translation: Only through an extraordinary will and strange fate did he rise again as the child who remains immortal in the picture.

text: their relationship has seen better days and jessica acquiring a clapped-out 1984 skoda does n't make things easier .
translation: Hubungan mereka telah melalui hari yang lebih baik dan Jessica memiliki sebuah Skoda 1984 yang buruk tidak membuat keadaan menjadi lebih mudah.
back_translation: Their relationship has gone through better days and Jessica's possession of a 1984 Skoda that is in bad condition does not make things easier.

text: uma thurman stars in quentin tarantino 's fourth film venture , kill bill .
translation: Uma Thurman membintangi filem keempat arahan Quentin Tarantino, Kill Bill.
back_translation: Uma Thurman starred in Quentin Tarantino's fourth film, Kill Bill.

text: solondz is without doubt an artist of uncompromising vision , but that vision is beginning to feel , if not morally bankrupt , at least terribly monotonous .
translation: Solondz adalah tanpa ragu seorang seniman dengan visi yang tak boleh dipersoalkan, tetapi visi tersebut mula terasa, jika tidak moral yang bangkrut, setidaknya sangat membosankan.
back_translation: Solondz is undoubtedly an artist with an unquestionable vision, but that vision begins to feel, if not bankrupt morals, at least very boring.

text: a classic romance always involves a certain formula : boy meets girl , boy loses girl , boy gets girl . beijing bicycle is a romance , except the love interest is a bicycle and not a girl .
translation: Sebuah romance klasik selalu melibatkan formula tertentuk: lelaki bertemu dengan perempuan, lelaki kehilangan perempuan, lelaki mendapatkan perempuan. "Beijing Bicycle" adalah sebuah romance, kecuali minat cinta melibatkan sepeda dan bukan seorang perempuan.
back_translation: A classic romance always involves a predetermined formula: man meets woman, man loses woman, man gets woman back. "Beijing Bicycle" is a romance, except the love interest involves a bicycle and not a woman.

text: there 's no denying the physically spectacular qualities of the film . . . or the emotional integrity of the performances .
translation: Tidak dapat dinafikan kehebatan fizikal filem itu. . . atau integriti emosi dari persembahan-persembahan.
back_translation: The physical greatness of the film cannot be denied. . . or the emotional integrity of the performances.

text: at its heart and most importantly , spirited away concerns a little girl learning to honour her friends and her family by valuing herself .
translation: Pada intinya dan yang paling penting, Spirited Away membincangkan mengenai seorang gadis kecil yang belajar untuk menghormati kawan-kawannya dan keluarganya dengan menghargai dirinya sendiri.
back_translation: In essence and most importantly, Spirited Away discusses a little girl who learns to respect her friends and family by valuing herself.

text: in betsy , she finds a dark mirror of herself - a lonely , angry , complex woman whose own troubled past proves disturbingly close to her own .
translation: Dalam Betsy, dia menemui cermin gelap dirinya sendiri - seorang wanita yang kesepian, marah, kompleks yang masa lalu yang bermasalahnya sendiri terbukti menakutkan dekat dengan dirinya.
back_translation: In Betsy, she encounters her own dark reflection - a lonely, angry, complex woman whose troubled past proves to be hauntingly close to her.

text: he falls for hunky diner owner matt , who falls just as hard back .
translation: Dia jatuh cinta pada pemilik diner yang gagah, Matt, yang juga jatuh cinta padanya dengan sekuat itu.
back_translation: She fell in love with the handsome diner owner, Matt, who also fell in love with her so deeply.

text: with no job possibilities on the horizon , the two dads open their own day care facility , `` daddy day care `` , and employ some fairly unconventional and sidesplitting methods of caring for children .
translation: Tanpa ada kemungkinan pekerjaan di depan mata, kedua bapa itu membuka pusat jagaan harian sendiri, "Daddy Day Care", dan menggunakan kaedah penjagaan kanak-kanak yang agak tidak konvensional dan menggelikan.
back_translation: With no job prospects in sight, the two fathers opened their own day care center, "Daddy Day Care", and adopted rather unconventional and humorous childcare methods.

text: scooby-doo does n't know if it wants to be a retro-refitting exercise in campy recall for older fans or a silly , nickelodeon-esque kiddie flick .
translation: Scooby-Doo tidak tahu sama ada ia mahu menjadi satu latihan pengubahsuaian retro dalam panggilan kampi untuk peminat-peminat yang lebih tua atau filem kanak-kanak yang bodoh, gaya nickelodeon.
back_translation: Scooby-Doo doesn't know whether it wants to be a retro makeover show for older fans or a silly children's film in the style of Nickelodeon.

text: the process of figuring out the moment the movie re-imagines the battle of the bulge with a bare-chested guardsman and a pike is more than worth the price of admission .
translation: Proses untuk memahami saat filem membayangkan semula pertempuran Battle of the Bulge dengan penjaga berjubah dada telanjang dan sebatang tombak benar-benar berbaloi dengan harga tiket masuk.
back_translation: The process of understanding when a movie reimagines the Battle of the Bulge with cloak-clad guards and a naked chest with a spear is truly worth the price of admission.

text: ricki ( jennifer lopez ) , a gorgeous , free-spirited female gangster is sent to assist gigli with the kidnapping because his boss does not think that gigli is up to the job .
translation: Ricki (Jennifer Lopez), seorang gangster perempuan yang cantik dan bebas, dihantar untuk membantu Gigli dengan penculikan kerana bosnya tidak yakin bahawa Gigli layak untuk tugasan tersebut.
back_translation: Ricki (Jennifer Lopez), a beautiful and independent female gangster, is sent to assist Gigli with the kidnapping because her boss is unsure if Gigli is suitable for the assignment.

text: turin , italy : philippa paccard , deeply disappointed by the police 's lax investigation following her husband 's drug death , places a bomb in the dealer 's cover office .
translation: Turin, Itali: Philippa Paccard, sangat kecewa dengan penyiasatan polis yang lemah berikutan kematian suaminya akibat dadah, meletakkan bom di pejabat penutupan penjual dadah tersebut.
back_translation: Turin, Italy: Philippa Paccard, very disappointed with the weak police investigation following her husband's death due to drugs, placed a bomb in the drug dealer's closure office.

text: with a court martial to keep visser and the germans distracted , mcnamara orchestrates a cunning scheme to escape and destroy a nearby munitions plant , enlisting the unwitting help of young lt . tommy hart .
translation: Dengan perbicaraan mahkamah untuk mengalih perhatian Visser dan tentera Jerman, McNamara merancang satu skema licik untuk melarikan diri dan memusnahkan kilang amunisi berdekatan, dengan meminta bantuan tanpa sebarang kecurigaan daripada Leftenan Muda Tommy Hart.
back_translation: During the court trial to distract Visser and the German soldiers, McNamara devised a cunning scheme to escape and destroy the nearby ammunition factory, seeking assistance without any suspicion from Lieutenant Junior Grade Tommy Hart.

text: you would n't want to live waydowntown , but it is a hilarious place to visit .
translation: Anda tidak mahu tinggal di tengah bandar, tetapi ia adalah tempat yang lucu untuk dilawati.
back_translation: You do not want to live in the middle of the city, but it is a fun place to visit.

text: they invite a group of prostitutes , among them irma whose fianc & # 233 ; has just been executed by the germans .
translation: Mereka menjemput kumpulan pelacur, di antaranya Irma yang tunangnya baru saja dihukum mati oleh tentera Jerman.
back_translation: They picked up a group of prostitutes, including Irma whose fiancé was just executed by the German army.

text: visits spy-movie territory like a novel you ca n't put down , examines a footnote to history seldom brought to light on the screen , and keeps you guessing from first frame to last .
translation: Melawat kawasan filem pengintip seperti sebuah novel yang anda tidak boleh lepaskan, menyelidiki sejarah yang jarang dibawa ke cahaya di skrin, dan membuat anda terus terteka-teki dari bingkai pertama hingga terakhir.
back_translation: Visiting spy movie locations is like a novel that you can't put down, delving into histories rarely brought to light on screen, and keeping you intrigued from the first frame to the last.

text: it 's not difficult to spot the culprit early-on in this predictable thriller .
translation: Tidak sukar untuk mengenal pasti pembuat onar awal dalam filem seram yang boleh dijangka ini.
back_translation: It is not difficult to identify the mischief maker early on in this predictable horror film.

text: max , a self-declared sugarholic , might be just what stan needs , and he , the answer to her addictions .
translation: Max, seorang pecandu gula yang mengaku dirinya, mungkin adalah apa yang Stan perlukan, dan dia, jawapan kepada kecanduannya.
back_translation: Max, a self-proclaimed sugar addict, might just be what Stan needs, and he, the answer to his addiction.

text: before she drowns , the baby is rescued by manny and sid .
translation: Sebelum dia lemas, bayi itu diselamatkan oleh Manny dan Sid.
back_translation: Before he drowned, the baby was rescued by Manny and Sid.

text: ultimately , it is harold who timidly suggests participating in the upcoming duct tape festival in minneapolis-st .
translation: Pada akhirnya, Harold secara berhati-hati mencadangkan untuk menyertai festival lak tape yang akan datang di Minneapolis-St.
back_translation: In the end, Harold carefully suggested to join the upcoming tapestry festival in Minneapolis-St.

text: and if she 's lucky , she may find love along the way .
translation: Dan jika dia bernasib baik, dia mungkin menemui cinta sepanjang jalan.
back_translation: And if he is lucky, he may find love along the way.

text: completely shocked , she ca n't take life anymore as all her dreams fall apart .
translation: Terkejut sepenuhnya, dia tidak boleh menerima kehidupan lagi kerana semua impiannya hancur.
back_translation: Completely shocked, he could no longer accept life because all his dreams were shattered.

text: greta is a sharp , spunky editor who is rotten with ambition .
translation: Greta adalah seorang editor yang tajam dan bersemangat yang penuh dengan ambisi.
back_translation: Greta is a sharp and passionate editor full of ambition.

text: an odd , haphazard , and inconsequential romantic comedy .
translation: sebuah komedi romantis yang aneh, tidak teratur, dan tidak penting.
back_translation: A strange, irregular, and insignificant romantic comedy.

text: not just unlikable . disturbing . disgusting . without any redeeming value whatsoever .
translation: Tidak hanya tidak disenangi. Mengganggu. Mengecewakan. Tanpa sebarang nilai yang baik sama sekali.
back_translation: Not just disliked. Disturbing. Disappointing. Without any good value at all.

text: using previously unseen video footage , the film shows rocha all jerky and with florid rhetoric urging his cuban comrades to embrace the new political and cultural challenges of the age ; outlining his vision of a unified third world ; and expounding on the differences and peculiarities of latin americans and the means by which their revolutionary aims might be achieved .
translation: Dengan menggunakan rakaman video yang sebelum ini tidak pernah dilihat, filem itu menunjukkan Rocha yang penuh rentak dan dengan retorik kembangnya, mendesak rakan sejawatnya dari Cuba untuk merangkul cabaran politik dan budaya baru era tersebut; menggariskan visinya tentang dunia ketiga yang bersatu; dan menjelaskan perbezaan dan keunikan orang Latin Amerika serta cara bagaimana matlamat revolusioner mereka boleh dicapai.
back_translation: Using previously unseen video recordings, the film showcases a vibrant Rocha with his bloated rhetoric, urging his Cuban comrades to embrace the new political and cultural challenges of that era; outlining his vision of a united Third World; and explaining the differences and uniqueness of Latin Americans and how their revolutionary goals can be achieved.

text: broomfield seems to uncover a massive scoop here , revealing the multitude of people involved and the possible motivations behind the killings of his titular subjects .
translation: Broomfield nampaknya menemui satu skop besar di sini, mendedahkan jumlah orang yang terlibat serta motif mungkin di sebalik pembunuhan subjek utamanya.
back_translation: Broomfield seems to have found a large scope here, exposing the number of people involved and the possible motives behind the murder of its main subject.

text: in her confusion and grief , she finds consolation in the friendship of their african-american gardener , raymond ( dennis haysbert ) - a socially taboo relationship that leads to the further disintegration of life as she knew it .
translation: Dalam kebingungan dan dukanya, dia mendapati penenang dalam persahabatan dengan tukang kebun mereka yang berbangsa Afrika-Amerika, Raymond (Dennis Haysbert) - hubungan sosial yang tabu yang membawa kepada kehancuran lebih lanjut kehidupan sebagaimana yang dikenalinya.
back_translation: In his confusion and sorrow, he found solace in a friendship with their African-American gardener, Raymond (Dennis Haysbert) - a taboo social relationship that led to further destruction in the life as he knew it.

text: they are told the story of the chamber of secrets .
translation: Mereka diceritakan kisah bilik rahsia.
back_translation: They were told the story of the secret room.

text: documentary about runaway and homeless lesbian , gay , and transsexual youth .
translation: Dokumentari mengenai remaja lesbian, gay, dan transeksual yang melarikan diri dan menjadi gelandangan.
back_translation: A documentary about lesbian, gay, and transgender teenagers who run away and become homeless.

text: the ingenious construction ( adapted by david hare from michael cunningham 's novel ) constantly flows forwards and back , weaving themes among three strands which allow us to view events as if through a prism
translation: Pembinaan yang cemerlang (diadaptasi oleh David Hare dari novel Michael Cunningham) sentiasa mengalir ke hadapan dan ke belakang, menyusun tema di antara tiga alur yang membolehkan kita melihat peristiwa seolah-olah melalui prisma.
back_translation: The excellent construction (adapted by David Hare from Michael Cunningham's novel) always flows forward and backward, arranging themes among three storylines that allow us to see events as if through a prism.

text: figuring it will be a good way to make money fellow convict emmanuel 'mendy ' ripstein ( peter falk ) sets up a prison boxing match between the two men to decide who is the real undisputed champ .
translation: Dengan menganggap itu sebagai cara yang baik untuk mencari wang, banduan rakan Emmanuel 'Mendy' Ripstein (Peter Falk) mengatur pertandingan tinju di dalam penjara antara kedua lelaki itu untuk menentukan siapakah juara yang sebenar.
back_translation: Considering it as a good way to make money, prisoner and friend Emmanuel 'Mendy' Ripstein (Peter Falk) organizes a boxing match inside the prison between the two men to determine who is the real champion.

text: starry-eyed forest ranger , jackie , rescues the hunk of her dreams from a cliff side motorcycle accident .
translation: Pegawai hutan bersemangat, Jackie, menyelamatkan lelaki impian daripada kecelakaan motosikal di tebing.
back_translation: The enthusiastic forest officer, Jackie, saved her dream man from a motorcycle accident on the cliff.

text: inside the breathtaking structure , they discover wondrous artifacts of an advanced , but long dead , civilization .
translation: Di dalam struktur yang memukau itu, mereka menemui artifak-artifak mengagumkan daripada sebuah tamadun yang maju, tetapi sudah lama punah.
back_translation: Within that impressive structure, they found amazing artifacts from an advanced civilization that had long been extinct.

text: while 'manhunter ' takes the prize for stylishness , 'dragon ' is much scarier and more emotionally involving .
translation: Sementara 'manhunter' memenangi hadiah untuk gaya yang hebat, 'dragon' jauh lebih menakutkan dan lebih melibatkan secara emosi.
back_translation: While 'manhunter' wins awards for great style, 'dragon' is far more terrifying and emotionally engaging.

text: definitely funny stuff , but it 's more of the 'laughing at ' variety than the 'laughing with . '
translation: Pasti bahan lawak, tetapi lebih kepada jenis 'ketawa pada' daripada jenis 'ketawa bersama'.
back_translation: Definitely comedic material, but more of the 'laugh at' type than the 'laugh together' type.

text: when raj arrives in india , he is struck by tina 's beauty but equally as struck to pooja 's personality .
translation: Apabila Raj tiba di India, dia terpesona dengan kecantikan Tina tetapi juga terpesona dengan personaliti Pooja.
back_translation: When Raj arrived in India, he was fascinated by the beauty of Tina but also charmed by the personality of Pooja.

text: set in 1898 sudan , this fifth film to be adapted from the a . e . w .
translation: Ditetapkan di Sudan pada tahun 1898, filem kelima yang diadaptasikan daripada a. e. w.
back_translation: Set in Sudan in 1898, the fifth film adapted from a. e. w.

text: escapes the precious trappings of most romantic comedies , infusing into the story very real , complicated emotions .
translation: Melepaskan perangkap berharga kebanyakan filem romantik komedi, menusukkan emosi yang sangat nyata dan rumit ke dalam cerita.
back_translation: Releasing the valuable trap of most romantic comedy films, injecting very real and intricate emotions into the story.

text: i ca n't remember the last time i saw worse stunt editing or cheaper action movie production values than in extreme ops .
translation: Saya tidak boleh mengingat bila kali terakhir saya melihat penyuntingan aksi yang lebih teruk atau nilai produksi filem aksi yang lebih murah daripada dalam Extreme Ops.
back_translation: I can't recall the last time I saw worse action editing or lower action film production values than in Extreme Ops.

text: they 've all got midlife crises : clownish beav has love problems ; the intellectual shrink , henry , is slowly succumbing to the siren song of suicide ; pete is losing a war with beer ; jonesy has had weird premonitions ever since he got hit by a car .
translation: Mereka semua mengalami krisis pertengahan hidup: si beav yang lucu mengalami masalah cinta; si psikoterapis intelektual, Henry, perlahan-lahan menyerah pada godaan bunuh diri; Pete kalah dalam peperangan dengan bir; Jonesy mendapat firasat aneh setelah ditabrak kereta.
back_translation: They all experience a midlife crisis: the funny beav has love troubles; the intellectual psychotherapist, Henry, slowly gives in to the temptation of suicide; Pete loses in a battle with beer; Jonesy has a strange premonition after being hit by a train.

text: betting xxx can succeed where other conventional spies have failed , gibbons sends xxx to enter this world of crime undetected , using his natural athletic prowess and a whole lot of attitude .
translation: Pertaruhan bahawa xxx boleh berjaya di mana mata-mata konvensional lain gagal, gibbons menghantar xxx untuk memasuki dunia jenayah ini tanpa dikesan, dengan menggunakan kecergasan semula jadi dan sikap yang sangat yakin.
back_translation: The bet that xxx can succeed where other conventional spies have failed, gibbons sends xxx to enter this world of crime undetected, using natural fitness and a highly confident attitude.

text: has the rare capability to soothe and break your heart with a single stroke .
translation: Mempunyai kebolehan langka untuk menenangkan dan memecahkan hati anda dengan satu sapuan.
back_translation: Having the rare ability to calm and mend your heart in one stroke.

text: truly an intellectual , igby is a modern day holden caulfield , and the world he lives in is far removed from the high standards of expectation he holds for it .
translation: benar-benar seorang intelektual, Igby adalah sebuah tokoh Holden Caulfield zaman moden, dan dunia tempat dia hidup jauh berbeza daripada standard yang tinggi yang dia miliki untuknya.
back_translation: Truly an intellectual, Igby is a modern-day Holden Caulfield figure, and the world he lives in is far different from the high standards he sets for himself.

text: directing with a sure and measured hand , [ haneke ] steers clear of the sensational and offers instead an unflinching and objective look at a decidedly perverse pathology .
translation: Dengan panduan yang pasti dan berpandu tangan yang selaras, [Haneke] mengelak dari sensasi dan sebaliknya menawarkan pandangan yang tegas dan objektif terhadap suatu patologi yang jelas pervers.
back_translation: With a definite guidance and a guided hand that is in harmony, [Haneke] avoids sensationalism and instead offers a clear and objective view of a clearly perverse pathology.

text: frank spens his days paying for his past sins and steve wants to be dean martin in `` oceans 11 `` .
translation: Frank menghabiskan hari-harinya membayar dosa-dosanya yang lalu dan Steve ingin menjadi Dean Martin dalam filem "Oceans 11".
back_translation: Frank spends his days atoning for his past sins and Steve wants to be Dean Martin in the movie "Ocean's 11".

text: collateral damage is , despite its alleged provocation post-9/11 , an antique , in the end . as are its star , its attitude and its obliviousness .
translation: Kerosakan collateral adalah, walaupun dipercayai provokasi selepas 9/11, adalah umpama barang antik pada akhirnya. Begitu juga bintangnya, sikapnya dan ketidakambilsedarannya.
back_translation: Collateral damage is, although believed to be a provocation after 9/11, is like antique items in the end. Just like its shine, its attitude, and its unawareness.

text: here 's yet another cool crime movie that actually manages to bring something new into the mix .
translation: Inilah lagi satu filem jenayah yang keren yang sebenarnya berjaya menyampaikan sesuatu yang baru dalam campuran tersebut.
back_translation: This is another cool crime movie that actually succeeds in delivering something new in that mix.

text: the story takes place in rural vermont , against the backdrop of the state capitol , where civil union laws are being debated along with gun control and dwis .
translation: Kisah ini berlaku di Vermont luar bandar, di latar belakang ibu negara, di mana undang-undang persatuan sivil, kawalan senjata api, dan DWI sedang diperdebatkan.
back_translation: This story takes place in rural Vermont, against the backdrop of the state capital, where civil rights laws, gun control, and DWI are being debated.

text: it 's up to an undercover fbi agent to stop him before it 's too late .
translation: Tugas jatuh kepada seorang ejen rahsia FBI untuk menghentikannya sebelum terlambat.
back_translation: The task falls on an FBI secret agent to stop it before it's too late.

text: s1m0ne 's satire is not subtle , but it is effective . it 's a quirky , off-beat project . . . .
translation: Satire s1m0ne tidak halus, tetapi ia berkesan. Ia merupakan projek yang aneh dan unik...
back_translation: Satire s1m0ne is not subtle, but it is effective. It is a strange and unique project...

text: but craig wants to be boyfriends , while gary has other issues .
translation: tetapi Craig ingin menjadi kekasih, manakala Gary mempunyai isu-isu lain.

text: to portray modern women the way director davis has done is just unthinkable .
translation: Menggambarkan wanita moden seperti yang dilakukan oleh pengarah Davis hanyalah sesuatu yang tidak terbayangkan.
back_translation: Depicting modern women as done by director Davis is truly unimaginable.

text: what he finds is a pocket of life that seems to be in another era , where prejudice and intolerance are accepted , where the small minds of angry men call the shots and where one woman attempts to save him and fails .
translation: Apa yang ditemuinya adalah sebuah tempat di mana kehidupan seolah-olah berada dalam era lain, di mana prasangka dan tidak toleransi diterima, di mana pemikiran sempit para lelaki marah yang memegang kendali, dan di mana seorang wanita berusaha menyelamatkannya namun gagal.
back_translation: What he found was a place where life seemed to be in another era, where prejudice and intolerance were accepted, where the narrow-minded thoughts of angry men in control, and where a woman tried to save him but failed.

text: so she invites niko to finish his erotic tale over a drink at her apartment !
translation: Jadi dia menjemput niko untuk menyiapkan kisah erotisnya sambil minum di apartemennya!
back_translation: So he invited Niko to prepare his erotic story while drinking at his apartment!

text: `` the dangerous lives of altar boys `` has flaws , but it also has humor and heart and very talented young actors
translation: " The dangerous lives of altar boys " mempunyai kelemahan, tetapi juga mempunyai humor dan sentuhan hati serta pelakon belia yang sangat berbakat.
back_translation: "The dangerous lives of altar boys" has weaknesses, but also has humor and heartwarming moments and very talented young actors.

text: not knowing that the others have also been invited , they show up and discover an amusement park that affects young visitors in very strange ways .
translation: Tanpa menyedari bahawa yang lain juga telah dijemput, mereka tiba dan menjumpai sebuah taman hiburan yang memberi kesan yang sangat pelik kepada pengunjung muda.

text: in a big corner office in hell , satan is throwing up his hands in surrender , is firing his r & d people , and has decided he will just screen the master of disguise 24/7 .
translation: Di sebuah pejabat besar di sudut neraka, syaitan mengangkat tangan menyerah, menggantungkan pekerjanya penyelidikan dan pembangunan (R&D), dan telah memutuskan bahawa dia hanya akan menayangkan filem "Master of Disguise" 24/7.
back_translation: In a large office at the corner of hell, the devil raised his hands in surrender, suspending his research and development (R&D) workers, and has decided that he will only screen the movie "Master of Disguise" 24/7.

text: matt lee has to stay a few steps ahead of his own police force and everyone he 's trusted in order to find out the truth .
translation: Matt Lee terpaksa berada beberapa langkah di hadapan pasukan polisnya sendiri dan sesiapa yang dia percayai untuk mencari tahu kebenaran.
back_translation: Matt Lee had to be a few steps ahead of his own police force and anyone he trusted to uncover the truth.

text: his sister nicole is 15 , and dealing with her impending womanhood ; middle brother mike is the `` normal `` one , but in some ways the most childish - his latest conquest is nadine , who runs the dog kennel at his security guard job .
translation: Adik perempuannya, Nicole berusia 15 tahun, dan menghadapi kewujudan wanita dewasanya yang akan datang; abang tengah mereka, Mike adalah yang "normal", tetapi dalam beberapa cara paling kanak-kanak - penaklukan terbarunya adalah Nadine, yang menguruskan tempat pembelaan anjing di tempat kerja penjaga keselamatannya.
back_translation: Her younger sister, Nicole, is 15 years old, and facing the upcoming presence of her adult self; their middle brother, Mike is "normal", but in some ways the most childish - his latest conquest is Nadine, who manages the dog shelter at his workplace as a security guard.

text: there 's a solid woman- finding-herself story somewhere in here , but you 'd have to dig pretty deep to uncover it .
translation: Terdapat sebuah cerita tentang seorang wanita yang kuat mencari jati diri di sini, tetapi anda perlu menggali dengan mendalam untuk mengungkapnya.
back_translation: There is a story about a strong woman searching for her identity here, but you need to dig deep to uncover it.

text: she meets noble , an endearing bundle of tragic flaws , and sparks fly between these two lost but likeable souls .
translation: Dia bertemu dengan Noble, seorang gumpalan kelemahan tragis yang menarik, dan percikan bunga api terjalin antara dua jiwa yang hilang namun bersifat menyenangkan ini.
back_translation: He met Noble, a fascinating cluster of tragic weaknesses, and sparks of fireworks intertwined between these two lost yet delightful souls.

text: there 's no getting around the fact that this is revenge of the nerds revisited -- again .
translation: Tidak dapat dinafikan bahawa ini adalah balas dendam para nerd yang dikaji semula - lagi sekali.
back_translation: It cannot be denied that this is a revenge of the nerds that is being reexamined - once again.

text: this story is a heartbreaking look into the addiction of smoking and its consequences to the loved ones of the smoker .
translation: cerita ini memberikan pandangan yang mengharukan tentang kecanduan merokok dan akibatnya kepada orang yang dikasihi oleh perokok tersebut.
back_translation: This story provides a heart-wrenching view on smoking addiction and its consequences on the loved ones of the smoker.

text: but now , hogwarts students are strangely being turned into stone .
translation: Tetapi sekarang, pelajar-pelajar Hogwarts sedang diubah menjadi batu dengan cara yang aneh.
