text: 'tracks ' chronicles their descent with a striking visual portrayal of a boy who made a mistake , paid the consequences and got back on 'track . '
translation: 'Tracks' menceritakan penurunan mereka dengan penggambaran visual yang mencolok tentang seorang anak lelaki yang membuat kesilapan, menghadapi akibatnya, dan kembali ke 'landasan'.
back_translation: 'Tracks' tells their descent with striking visual depictions of a boy making a mistake, facing the consequences, and returning to the 'track'.

text: but melanie 's past holds many secrets , including jake , the redneck husband she married in high school , who refuses to divorce her .
translation: Namun, masa lalu Melanie menyimpan banyak rahsia, termasuk Jake, suaminya yang redneck yang dia kahwini semasa di sekolah menengah, yang enggan bercerai dengannya.
back_translation: However, Melanie's past holds many secrets, including Jake, her redneck husband whom she married during high school, who is reluctant to divorce her.

text: real women have curves does n't offer any easy answers .
translation: Wanita sejati mempunyai belokan tidak menawarkan sebarang jawapan yang mudah.
back_translation: A true woman possesses curves that do not offer any easy answers.

text: parker updates the setting in an attempt to make the film relevant today , without fully understanding what it was that made the story relevant in the first place .
translation: Parker mengemaskini suasana dalam usaha untuk menjadikan filem relevan pada hari ini, tanpa sepenuhnya memahami apa yang membuat cerita itu relevan pada mulanya.
back_translation: Parker updates the atmosphere in an effort to make the film relevant today, without fully understanding what made the story relevant in the first place.

text: atlantic city serenade is about the price we pay for the choices we make in the quest for power over our own inner demons .
translation: 'Atlantic City Serenade' adalah mengenai harga yang kita bayar untuk pilihan yang kita buat dalam usaha untuk menguasai iblis dalaman kita sendiri.
back_translation: 'Atlantic City Serenade' is about the price we pay for the choices we make in our efforts to conquer our inner demons.

text: the phantom , feeling betrayed , kidnaps christine and brings her to his lair where he plans to make her his eternal bride .
translation: Hantu itu, merasa dikhianati, menculik Christine dan membawanya ke sarangnya di mana dia merancang untuk menjadikannya isteri kekalnya.
back_translation: The ghost, feeling betrayed, kidnapped Christine and took her to its lair where it planned to make her its eternal wife.

text: there 's the plot , and a maddeningly insistent and repetitive piano score that made me want to scream .
translation: Terdapat plot, dan skor piano yang sangat mendebarkan dan berulang-ulang yang membuat saya ingin menjerit.
back_translation: There is a plot, and a thrilling and repetitive piano score that makes me want to scream.

text: a continually fascinating exploration of the physical and psychological pain and pleasure of a bizarre relationship .
translation: Penjelajahan yang sentiasa menarik mengenai kesakitan fizikal dan psikologi serta kenikmatan dalam hubungan yang aneh.
back_translation: An intriguing exploration of both physical and psychological pain and pleasure in a strange relationship.

text: i enjoyed `` formula 51 `` in a guilty kind of way
translation: Saya menikmati "formula 51" dengan cara yang bersalah.
back_translation: I enjoy "formula 51" in a guilty way.

text: however , instead of bringing the prime minister down , ali is embraced by the nation as the voice of youth and 'realness ' , making the prime minister and his government more popular than ever .
translation: Walau bagaimanapun, Ali tidak berhasil menjatuhkan perdana menteri. Sebaliknya, dia diterima oleh negara sebagai suara pemuda dan 'ketulusan', membuat perdana menteri dan kerajaannya lebih popular dari sebelum ini.
back_translation: However, Ali failed to bring down the prime minister. Instead, he was embraced by the country as the voice of youth and 'sincerity', making the prime minister and his government more popular than before.

text: a young man lingers in the family home of his fiancee , after her accidental death .
translation: Seorang lelaki muda tinggal di rumah keluarga tunangannya setelah kematian kemalangan yang menimpanya.

text: spider-man is about growing strange hairs , getting a more mature body , and finding it necessary to hide new secretions from the parental units .
translation: Spider-Man adalah tentang tumbuh bulu-bulu aneh, mendapatkan tubuh yang lebih matang, dan merasa perlu untuk menyembunyikan sekresi baru dari unit-unit ibu bapa.
back_translation: Spider-Man is about growing strange hairs, getting a more mature body, and feeling the need to hide new secretions from the parental units.

text: when sai gwai ( turtle , in the english version ) starts working for lmf corporation with his cousin lun , he immediately meets the four `` pork chops `` ( cantonese slang for ugly women ) : mo , mei , hung and pao .
translation: Apabila sai gwai (penyu, dalam versi bahasa Inggeris) mula bekerja untuk syarikat lmf bersama sepupunya lun, dia segera bertemu dengan empat "chop pork" (pelbagai cacian bahasa Kanton untuk wanita yang tidak menarik): mo, mei, hung dan pao.
back_translation: When the sea turtle (gwai, in English version) started working for the lmf company with his cousin lun, he soon met four "chop pork" (various Cantonese derogatory terms for unattractive women): mo, mei, hung, and pao.

text: in order to arrive at a possible explanation , michael moore takes on a deeper examination of america 's culture of fear , bigotry and violence in a nation with widespread gun ownership .
translation: Untuk mencari penjelasan yang mungkin, Michael Moore melakukan pemeriksaan yang lebih mendalam terhadap budaya ketakutan, prejudis, dan kekerasan di Amerika, sebuah negara dengan pemilikan senjata yang meluas.
back_translation: To seek possible explanations, Michael Moore delves deeper into the culture of fear, prejudice, and violence in America, a country with widespread gun ownership.

text: she is intrigued by his knowledge of shakespeare , manner of living and the fifteen perfectly organized bags beneath his bench .
translation: Dia tertarik dengan pengetahuannya tentang Shakespeare, cara hidupnya, dan lima belas beg yang teratur di bawah bangkunya.
back_translation: He is interested in his knowledge of Shakespeare, his way of life, and fifteen well-organized bags under his bed.

text: shortly hereafter she encounters dieter , a charming young man .
translation: Tidak lama kemudian, dia bertemu dengan Dieter, seorang lelaki muda yang mempesonakan.
back_translation: Not long after, she met Dieter, a charming young man.

text: to the degree that ivans xtc . works , it 's thanks to huston 's revelatory performance .
translation: Secara umumnya, keberkesanan ivans xtc. adalah berkat kepada persembahan revolusioner Huston.
back_translation: In general, the effectiveness of ivans xtc. is thanks to the revolutionary performance by Huston.

text: meanwhile , obi-wan kenobi continues to train the young jedi anakin skywalker , who fears that the jedi code will forbid his growing romance with amidala . . .
translation: Sementara itu, Obi-Wan Kenobi terus melatih anak muda Jedi Anakin Skywalker, yang takut bahwa kod Jedi akan melarang hubungannya yang semakin berkembang dengan Amidala...
back_translation: Meanwhile, Obi-Wan Kenobi continues to train the young Jedi Anakin Skywalker, who is afraid that the Jedi code will forbid his growing relationship with Amidala...

text: one of the very best movies ever made about the life of moviemaking .
translation: Salah satu filem terbaik yang pernah dibuat mengenai kehidupan pembuatan filem.
back_translation: One of the best films ever made about the making of films.

text: a somewhat soapish but nonetheless beautifully acted excoriation of religious piousness and blind allegiance to faith as a socially constructed institution .
translation: Satu babak yang agak drama tetapi tetap indah dilakonkan tentang kecaman terhadap kesucian agama dan kesetiaan buta kepada kepercayaan sebagai institusi sosial yang dibina.
back_translation: A somewhat dramatic yet beautifully portrayed scene about criticism towards the purity of religion and blind loyalty to beliefs as a social institution constructed.

text: a comedy about bending the rules to reach your goal , bend it like beckham explores the world of women 's football , from kick-abouts in the park to freekicks in the final .
translation: Sebuah komedi mengenai melanggar peraturan untuk mencapai matlamat anda, 'Bend It Like Beckham' meneroka dunia bola sepak wanita, dari permainan ringan di taman sehingga sepakan percuma dalam perlawanan akhir.
back_translation: A comedy about breaking the rules to achieve your goals, 'Bend It Like Beckham' explores the world of women's football, from casual playing in the park to free kicks in the final match.

text: the first hour alone is worth the admission price .
translation: Jam pertama sendirian sudah cukup berbaloi dengan harga masuk.
back_translation: The first time being alone was already worth the entrance fee.

text: her recent divorce has left her with terminal writer 's block and extremely depressed , and her best friend , patti , is beginning to think she might never recover .
translation: Perceraian terbarunya telah meninggalkannya dengan penulis 's block yang teruk dan sangat bersedih, dan sahabat karibnya, Patti, mula berfikir bahawa dia mungkin tidak akan pulih.
back_translation: His recent divorce has left him with a severe writer's block and very sad, and his close friend, Patti, is beginning to think that he may not recover.

text: mirabelle falls in love with the glamorous ray , and her life takes a magical turn , but eventually she realizes that she must empower herself and make a choice between them .
translation: Mirabelle jatuh cinta dengan Ray yang glamor, dan hidupnya mengalami perubahan ajaib, tetapi akhirnya dia sedar bahawa dia harus memberdayakan dirinya sendiri dan membuat pilihan di antara mereka.
back_translation: Mirabelle falls in love with the glamorous Ray, and her life undergoes a magical transformation, but eventually she realizes that she must empower herself and make a choice between them.

translation: Seorang pemain dalam sebuah orkestra terkenal mendapati pengalaman seksual dengan seorang penyanyi opera Rusia, yang sangat dia nikmati kerana isterinya baru sahaja meninggalkannya kerana dia telah membeli filem porno.
back_translation: A player in a famous orchestra had a sexual experience with a Russian opera singer, which he greatly enjoyed as his wife had just left him because he bought a pornographic film.

text: woody allen 's latest is an ambling , broad comedy about all there is to love -- and hate -- about the movie biz .
translation: Filem terbaru Woody Allen adalah sebuah komedi yang mengembara dan luas mengenai segala yang boleh dicintai - dan dibenci - mengenai industri filem.

text: she is the supply teacher of the 6d , the worst group of st-c & # 233 ; cile elementary school .
translation: Dia adalah guru ganti bagi kelas 6D, kelas terburuk di Sekolah Rendah St-Cécile.

text: two sisters aged six years , no sooner see their remaining parent buried when they are torn apart .
translation: Dua beradik berusia enam tahun, tidak lama selepas melihat ibu bapa mereka yang tinggal dikuburkan, mereka diceraikan.
back_translation: Two siblings aged six, shortly after seeing their parents being buried, were separated.

text: [ drumline ] is entertaining for what it does , and admirable for what it does n't do .
translation: "Drumline" menghiburkan dengan apa yang dilakukannya, dan dihargai dengan apa yang tidak dilakukannya.
back_translation: "Drumline" entertains with what it does, and is appreciated for what it doesn't do.

text: `` all for nothin ' `` is their story of love , forgiveness and redemption .
translation: "Semua untuk tiada" adalah kisah cinta, pengampunan, dan penebusan mereka.
back_translation: "All for nothing" is their story of love, forgiveness, and redemption.

text: woody allen can write and deliver a one liner as well as anybody . but i had a lot of problems with this movie .
translation: Woody Allen boleh menulis dan menyampaikan satu baris dengan baik seperti sesiapa. Tetapi, saya mengalami banyak masalah dengan filem ini.
back_translation: Woody Allen can write and deliver a line well like anyone. But, I faced a lot of issues with this film.

text: he 's a middle aged hermit who likes to talk and has an answer to everything .
translation: Dia adalah seorang pertapa yang berusia pertengahan umur yang gemar bercakap dan mempunyai jawapan untuk setiap perkara.
back_translation: He is a middle-aged hermit who enjoys talking and has an answer for everything.

text: despite suffering a sense-of-humour failure , the man who wrote rocky does not deserve to go down with a ship as leaky as this .
translation: Walaupun mengalami kegagalan dalam rasa humor, lelaki yang menulis filem Rocky tidak layak untuk terperosok dengan kapal yang bocor seperti ini.
back_translation: Despite his failure in humor, the man who wrote the film Rocky is not deserving of sinking with a leaky ship like this.

text: a non-britney person might survive a screening with little harm done , except maybe for the last 15 minutes , which are as maudlin as any after-school special you can imagine .
translation: Seorang individu yang bukan Britney mungkin akan dapat bertahan semasa penayangan dengan sedikit kerosakan, kecuali mungkin untuk 15 minit terakhir, yang begitu sentimental seperti mana-mana program khas selepas waktu sekolah yang anda boleh bayangkan.
back_translation: A non-Britney individual may still be able to endure the screening with some damage, except perhaps for the last 15 minutes, which are so sentimental like any post-school special program you can imagine.

text: meanwhile , on jesse & # 180 ; s trail is the saint of the killers , a holy cowboy assassin with the mission of kill custer .
translation: Sementara itu, di jejak Jesse berada seorang pendosa pembunuh suci, seorang penembak jitu koboi suci dengan misi membunuh Custer.
back_translation: Meanwhile, in Jesse's footsteps, is a sinful holy killer, a holy cowboy sharpshooter with a mission to kill Custer.

text: . . . this is n't even a movie we can enjoy as mild escapism ; it is one in which fear and frustration are provoked to intolerable levels .
translation: . . . ini bukanlah filem yang boleh kita nikmati sebagai pelarian ringan; tetapi ia adalah salah satu di mana ketakutan dan frustrasi dipicu sehingga tahap yang tidak boleh ditanggung.
back_translation: ...this is not a film that can be enjoyed as a light escapade; but it is one where fear and frustration are triggered to an unbearable level.

text: the screenplay comes across , rather unintentionally , as hip-hop scooby-doo .
translation: Skrip filem itu terkesan, agak secara tidak sengaja, seperti hip-hop Scooby-Doo.
back_translation: The film script is reminiscent, somewhat unintentionally, of a hip-hop version of Scooby-Doo.

text: into their midst come a hotshot american , van zan ( matthew mcconaughey ) , who says he has a way to kill the beasts and save mankind - a way quinn 's never seen done .
translation: Di tengah-tengah mereka datang seorang Amerika cemerlang, Van Zan (Matthew McConaughey), yang mengatakan bahawa dia mempunyai cara untuk membunuh binatang itu dan menyelamatkan umat manusia - cara yang belum pernah dilihat oleh Quinn sebelum ini.
back_translation: In the midst of them came an outstanding American, Van Zan (Matthew McConaughey), who claimed to have a way to kill the creature and save humanity - a way never seen by Quinn before.

text: the quest is hope and the passions that drive us in this search .
translation: Hasrat itu adalah harapan dan emosi yang mendorong kita dalam pencarian ini.
back_translation: Aspiration is a hope and emotion that drives us in this pursuit.

text: ultimately she discovers that what appears on the surface to be true quite often is not .
translation: Akhirnya, dia mendapati bahawa apa yang kelihatan benar di permukaan seringkali tidak benar.
back_translation: Finally, he found that what appears to be true on the surface is often untrue.

text: leela is the story of leela , an aware , liberal woman who struggles with the true meaning of independence .
translation: Leela adalah kisah tentang Leela, seorang wanita yang peka dan liberal yang bergelut dengan erti sebenar kemandirian.
back_translation: Leela is a story about Leela, a sensitive and liberal woman who grapples with the true meaning of independence.

text: robert harmon 's less-is-more approach delivers real bump-in -the-night chills -- his greatest triumph is keeping the creepy crawlies hidden in the film 's thick shadows .
translation: Pendekatan less-is-more oleh Robert Harmon menghasilkan ketegangan yang sebenar - kejayaan terbesarnya adalah menjaga serangga-serangga menyeramkan tersembunyi di dalam bayang-bayang tebal filem itu.
back_translation: The less-is-more approach by Robert Harmon creates genuine tension - his greatest success is keeping the creepy insects hidden within the thick shadows of the film.

text: labute masterfully balances both traditional or modern stories together in a manner that one never overwhelms the other . something for everyone .
translation: Labute secara mahir menyeimbangkan cerita tradisional atau moden bersama-sama dengan cara yang satu tidak pernah mengatasi yang lain. Sesuatu untuk semua orang.
back_translation: Labute skillfully balances traditional and modern stories together in a way that one does not overshadow the other. Something for everyone.

text: however , his son is a celibate priest who has never had any success with women . . . , ever .
translation: walau bagaimanapun, anak lelakinya adalah seorang paderi yang bujang dan tidak pernah berjaya dengan wanita... sepanjang hidupnya.
back_translation: However, his son is a single priest who has never been successful with women... throughout his life.

text: well , bruce nolan , played by jim carrey , gets that chance after he freaks out on live tv , is fired and is offered a new job by an unknown place .
translation: Bruce Nolan, dilakonkan oleh Jim Carrey, mendapat peluang itu selepas dia freak out di tv secara langsung, dipecat, dan ditawarkan pekerjaan baru oleh sebuah tempat yang tidak dikenali.
back_translation: Bruce Nolan, portrayed by Jim Carrey, gets the opportunity after he freaks out on live TV, gets fired, and is offered a new job by an unknown place.

text: burns ' fifth beer-soaked film feels in almost every possible way -- from the writing and direction to the soggy performances -- tossed off .
translation: Filem kelima Burns yang direndam bir ini terasa dalam hampir setiap cara yang mungkin - dari penulisan dan arahan hingga lakonan yang lembap - dilontarkan.
back_translation: The fifth film by Burns which soaked in beer feels in almost every possible way - from the writing and directing to the sluggish acting - utter.

text: contributors include : director mimi leder , editor anne v . coates , producer gail katz and director claudia weill .
translation: Pengerusi-pengerusi termasuk: pengarah Mimi Leder, pengedit Anne V. Coates, pengeluar Gail Katz dan pengarah Claudia Weill.
back_translation: The chairpersons include: director Mimi Leder, editor Anne V. Coates, producer Gail Katz, and director Claudia Weill.

text: takes a look at an old world , passionless arrangement in a way that is at once so biting and so brutally honest that you chuckle first , then shudder .
translation: Melihat semula suatu susunan dunia lama yang tidak bersemangat dengan cara yang sekaligus menusuk dan jujur ​​sehingga anda tersenyum dulu, kemudian menggigil.
back_translation: Revisiting an old lifeless arrangement in a way that is simultaneously piercing and honest, making you smile first, then shiver.

text: but what exactly is good and waht exactly is evil ?
translation: Tetapi apakah sebenarnya yang baik dan yang jahat?
back_translation: But what is truly good and evil?

text: . . . [ a ] strained comedy that jettisons all opportunities for rock to make his mark by serving up the usual chaotic nonsense .
translation: . . . [suatu] komedi yang tegang yang mengecualikan semua peluang bagi rock menorehkan namanya dengan menyajikan kekacauan biasa yang tidak bermakna.
back_translation: ... [a] tense comedy that rules out all chances for rock to carve its name by presenting typical chaos that is insignificant.

text: this is a harrowing movie about how parents know where all the buttons are , and how to push them .
translation: Ini adalah filem yang menggerunkan mengenai bagaimana ibu bapa tahu di mana semua butang berada, dan bagaimana untuk menekannya.
back_translation: This is a chilling movie about how parents know where all the buttons are and how to push them.

text: at once emotional and richly analytical , the cosby-seinfeld encounter alone confirms the serious weight behind this superficially loose , larky documentary .
translation: Pertemuan Cosby-Seinfeld pada masa yang sama emosional dan kaya secara analitikal mengesahkan dengan sendirinya kepentingan serius di sebalik dokumentari yang kelihatan santai ini.
back_translation: The Cosby-Seinfeld meeting, at the same time emotional and rich analytically, confirms the serious underlying importance of this seemingly casual documentary.

text: a fast-moving , fluidly told tale , eugene jarecki 's documentary certainly will likely inflame kissinger 's ardent cronies . and yet , as one-sided as its story is , the movie also manages a measured disposition .
translation: Sebuah kisah yang diceritakan dengan cepat dan lancar, dokumentari Eugene Jarecki ini pasti akan membangkitkan kemarahan para pengikut setia Kissinger. Namun, meskipun ceritanya condong ke satu sisi, filem ini juga menunjukkan sikap yang berpada-pada.
back_translation: A story told quickly and smoothly, this documentary by Eugene Jarecki is sure to evoke anger among loyal Kissinger followers. However, despite the one-sided narrative, the film also demonstrates a balanced stance.

text: along the way , the filmmakers try to learn from these relationship veterans , while navigating their own fledgling polyamorous relationships .
translation: Dalam perjalanan itu, pembuat filem cuba belajar dari veteran hubungan ini, sambil menavigasi hubungan poliamor yang masih baru mereka sendiri.
back_translation: During the journey, the filmmaker tries to learn from veteran relationships while navigating their own new polyamorous relationship.

text: would anyone believe mary and joe 's claim to abstinence ?
translation: Adakah sesiapa percaya tuntutan Mary dan Joe untuk mengekalkan kesucian?
back_translation: Does anyone believe Mary and Joe's claim to maintain purity?

text: until it goes off the rails in its final 10 or 15 minutes , wendigo , larry fessenden 's spooky new thriller , is a refreshingly smart and newfangled variation on several themes derived from far less sophisticated and knowing horror films .
translation: hingga ia kacau di minit terakhirnya 10 atau 15 , wendigo , filem seram baru yang menyeramkan oleh larry fessenden , adalah variasi yang segar dan baru atas beberapa tema yang berasal dari filem seram yang kurang matang dan bijak.
back_translation: until it disrupts in its last 10 or 15 minutes, wendigo, a new horror film that is frightening by larry fessenden, is a fresh and new variation on some themes originating from less mature and wise horror films.

text: if ever a concept came handed down from the movie gods on a silver platter , this is it . if ever such a dependable concept was botched in execution , this is it .
translation: Jika pernah ada konsep yang datang dari para dewa filem dengan mudah, ini lah dia. Jika pernah ada konsep yang boleh dipercayai tetapi terjejas dalam pelaksanaannya, ini lah dia.
back_translation: If there ever was a concept that came easily from the film gods, this is it. If there ever was a reliable concept but damaged in its implementation, this is it.

text: as self-aware movies go , who is cletis tout ? is clever enough , though thin writing proves its undoing .
translation: Dalam konteks filem yang sedar diri, siapakah Cletis Tout? Cukup cemerlang, walaupun penulisan yang lemah membuktikan kelemahannya.
back_translation: In the context of self-aware films, who is Cletis Tout? Quite brilliant, although weak writing proves his weakness.

text: saigon , 1952 , a beautiful , exotic , and mysterious city caught in the grips of the vietnamese war of liberation from the french colonial powers .
translation: Saigon, 1952, sebuah bandar yang indah, eksotik, dan misteri yang terjerat dalam genggaman peperangan Vietnam untuk membebaskan diri daripada kuasa penjajah Perancis.
back_translation: Saigon, 1952, a beautiful, exotic, and mysterious city trapped in the grip of the Vietnam War to free itself from the grasp of French colonial power.

text: well , jason 's gone to manhattan and hell , i guess a space station in the year 2455 can be crossed off the list of ideas for the inevitable future sequels ( hey , do n't shoot the messenger ) .
translation: Yah, Jason telah pergi ke Manhattan dan betul lah, saya rasa stesen angkasa di tahun 2455 boleh dikeluarkan daripada senarai idea untuk sekuel-sekuel akan datang (eh, jangan tembak pembawa berita).
back_translation: Yes, Jason has gone to Manhattan and indeed, I feel the space station in the year 2455 can be removed from the list of ideas for future sequels (eh, don't shoot the messenger).

text: the heedless impetuousness of youth is on full , irritating display in [ this ] meandering and pointless french coming-of-age import from writer-director anne-sophie birot .
translation: Keangkuhan remaja yang ceroboh ini dipamirkan dengan jelas dan mengganggu dalam filem remaja Perancis yang tidak jelas dan tiada tujuan ini dari penulis-pengarah Anne-Sophie Birot.
back_translation: The reckless arrogance of this careless teenager is depicted clearly and disruptively in the unclear and aimless French teen film by writer-director Anne-Sophie Birot.

text: eva is an accidental witness of the death of a young girl , even more : she 's got it all on tape .
translation: Eva merupakan saksi secara tidak sengaja terhadap kematian seorang gadis muda, malah lebih dari itu: dia ada segalanya dalam rakaman.
back_translation: Eva accidentally became a witness to the death of a young girl, in fact, more than that: she was everything in the recording.

text: i 'm not sure which half of dragonfly is worse : the part where nothing 's happening , or the part where something 's happening , but it 's stupid .
translation: Saya tidak pasti bahagian mana daripada capung yang lebih teruk: bahagian di mana tiada apa yang berlaku, atau bahagian di mana sesuatu sedang berlaku, tetapi ianya bodoh.
back_translation: I am not sure which part of the dragonfly is worse: the part where nothing is happening, or the part where something is happening, but it is foolish.

text: and while bruce is getting everything he wants , he has been ignoring his girlfriend , grace and loses her .
translation: Dan semasa Bruce mendapat segala yang diinginkannya, dia telah mengabaikan kekasihnya, Grace dan kehilangannya.
back_translation: And while Bruce got everything he wanted, he neglected his girlfriend, Grace, and lost her.

text: the acting is amateurish , the cinematography is atrocious , the direction is clumsy , the writing is insipid and the violence is at once luridly graphic and laughably unconvincing .
translation: Lakonan amatir, sinematografi amat teruk, arahan kelas rendah, penulisan hambar dan keganasan pada masa yang sama terlalu grafik dan lucu tidak meyakinkan.
back_translation: Amateur acting, extremely terrible cinematography, low-class direction, bland writing and violence that is both too graphic and hilariously unconvincing at the same time.

text: oblivious of all the differences of status and background , a bond that would never break grew between them .
translation: Tidak peka terhadap semua perbezaan status dan latar belakang, satu ikatan yang tidak akan pernah putus tumbuh di antara mereka.
back_translation: Not sensitive to all differences in status and background, a bond that will never be broken grows between them.

text: from spiritual rebirth to bruising defeat , vincent 's odyssey resonates in a profound way , comparable to the classic films of jean renoir .
translation: Dari kelahiran semula spiritual hingga kekalahan yang menyakitkan, odisi Vincent berbunyi dengan cara yang mendalam, sebanding dengan filem klasik Jean Renoir.
back_translation: From spiritual rebirth to a painful defeat, Vincent's odyssey reverberates deeply, comparable to Jean Renoir's classic films.

text: in this debut short , meeper valiantly tries to warn the patrons of the ale-e-inn ( an intergalactic watering hole with its own constellation of stars ) of impending danger , only to find himself face-to-face with the most fearsome creatures in the galaxy .
translation: Dalam cerpen ini, meeper dengan berani cuba memberi amaran kepada pelanggan-pelanggan di ale-e-inn (sebuah tempat makan intergalaksi yang mempunyai konstelasi bintang sendiri) mengenai bahaya yang akan berlaku, hanya untuk mendapati dirinya berhadapan dengan makhluk yang paling menakutkan di galaksi.
back_translation: In this short story, Meeper bravely tries to warn the customers at ale-e-inn (an intergalactic dining place with its own constellation of stars) about the impending danger, only to find himself facing the most terrifying creature in the galaxy.

text: friday after next has the same problem that next friday did -- it 's called where 's chris tucker when you need him ?
translation: Jumaat selepas ini menghadapi masalah yang sama seperti Jumaat yang lepas - di mana Chris Tucker berada apabila anda memerlukannya?
back_translation: Next Friday facing the same problem as last Friday - where is Chris Tucker when you need him?

text: the director 's twitchy sketchbook style and adroit perspective shifts grow wearisome amid leaden pacing and indifferent craftsmanship ( most notably wretched sound design ) .
translation: Gaya sketsa yang resah dan peralihan perspektif yang mahir oleh pengarah menjadi membosankan disebabkan oleh pengarapan yang lambat dan kekurangan dalam kerja tangan (terutamanya dalam rekaan bunyi yang teruk).
back_translation: The restless sketch style and the director's skilled perspective transitions become boring due to slow pacing and shortcomings in craftsmanship (especially in poor sound design).

text: that 's why handsome and his three best friends sammy , victor and the cribsheet genius applebee have banded together and found ways to cheat on their tests all through their school years .
translation: Itulah sebabnya kacak dan tiga sahabat baiknya Sammy, Victor, dan jenius cribsheet Applebee bersatu padu dan mencari cara untuk menipu dalam ujian sepanjang masa sekolah mereka.
back_translation: That's why the handsome and his three good friends Sammy, Victor, and the genius cribsheet Applebee teamed up and found ways to cheat in exams throughout their school years.

text: beautifully filmed and well acted . . . but admittedly problematic in its narrative specifics .
translation: Filem yang difilmkan dengan cantik dan lakonan yang baik . . . tetapi diakui mempunyai masalah dalam naratifnya.
back_translation: The film was beautifully shot and well-acted . . . but it is acknowledged to have problems in its narrative.

text: lindberg demonstrates a remarkable sense of place , a keen understanding that emotions are boiled into a concentrate , not diluted , in the rural setting .
translation: lindberg menunjukkan rasa tempat yang luar biasa, pemahaman yang tajam bahawa emosi disuling menjadi campuran pekat, tidak diencerkan, dalam suasana luar bandar.
back_translation: lindberg showcases an exceptional sense of place, a sharp understanding that emotions are distilled into a concentrated blend, not diluted, in an urban setting.

text: i cry for i spy -- or i would if this latest and laziest imaginable of all vintage-tv spinoffs were capable of engendering an emotional response of any kind .
translation: Saya menangis kerana saya mengintai - atau saya akan jika spinoff TV lama yang paling terbaru dan paling malas ini mampu menimbulkan respons emosi apa pun.
back_translation: I cry because I peek - or I will if the latest and laziest old TV spinoff is able to evoke any emotional response.

text: four outlandish but faithful men , a moslem , a hindu , a jew and a christian coincidently meet up a mountain , at an altitude of 3000 metres .
translation: Empat lelaki aneh tetapi setia, seorang Muslim, seorang Hindu, seorang Yahudi dan seorang Kristian secara kebetulan bertemu di sebuah gunung, di ketinggian 3000 meter.
back_translation: Four strange but loyal men, a Muslim, a Hindu, a Jew, and a Christian, coincidentally met on a mountain at an altitude of 3000 meters.

text: but on the wedding day , they also sign a divorce agreement which is effective one year after their marriage .
translation: Tetapi pada hari perkahwinan, mereka juga menandatangani perjanjian perceraian yang berkuat kuasa setahun selepas perkahwinan mereka.
back_translation: However, on the wedding day, they also signed a divorce agreement that will come into effect a year after their marriage.

text: the film falls short on tension , eloquence , spiritual challenge -- things that have made the original new testament stories so compelling for 20 centuries .
translation: Filem ini kurang dalam ketegangan, keindahan bahasa, cabaran spiritual - perkara-perkara yang menjadikan cerita-cerita Perjanjian Baru asal begitu menarik selama 20 abad.
back_translation: This film lacks in tension, beauty of language, spiritual challenges - things that make original New Testament stories so captivating for 20 centuries.

text: you watch for that sense of openness , the little surprises .
translation: Anda mencari rasa keterbukaan itu, kejutan-kejutan kecil.
back_translation: You are looking for that sense of openness, small surprises.

text: miyazaki 's nonstop images are so stunning , and his imagination so vivid , that the only possible complaint you could have about spirited away is that there is no rest period , no timeout .
translation: Imej tanpa henti Miyazaki sangat menakjubkan, dan imaginasi beliau begitu hidup, satu-satunya aduan yang mungkin anda miliki tentang Spirited Away adalah bahawa tiada tempoh rehat, tiada masa rehat.
back_translation: Miyazaki's ceaseless imagery is truly amazing, and his imagination is so vivid, the only complaint you might have about Spirited Away is that there is no break, no rest period.

text: it 's the end of the world as metaphor for how we scuttle relationships , and it 's a remarkably apt one .
translation: Ini adalah akhir dunia sebagai metafora untuk bagaimana kita merosakkan hubungan, dan ini adalah metafora yang sangat tepat.
back_translation: This is the end of the world as a metaphor for how we ruin relationships, and it is a very accurate metaphor.

text: this film was made by and for those folks who collect the serial killer cards and are fascinated by the mere suggestion of serial killers . for the rest of us , sitting through dahmer 's two hours amounts to little more than punishment .
translation: filem ini dicipta oleh dan untuk golongan yang mengumpul kad pembunuh bersiri dan terpesona dengan hanya cadangan pembunuh bersiri. bagi kita yang lain, menonton dua jam dahmer hanyalah seperti satu hukuman.
back_translation: This film was created by and for people who collect serial killer trading cards and are fascinated by just the mere suggestion of a serial killer. For the rest of us, watching two hours of Dahmer is just like a punishment.

text: from stag beetle to swastika narrates in a richly detailed , associative montage the boundless possibilities of manipulating images and using images the historionaut , a history machine , produces an incessant stream of remembered , contemporary and future images .
translation: Dari kumbang tanduk ke swastika menceritakan dengan kaya terperinci, montaj asosiatif kemungkinan tanpa batas memanipulasi imej dan menggunakan imej sejarawan, sebuah mesin sejarah, menghasilkan aliran tak berkesudahan imej yang diingati, kontemporari, dan masa depan.
back_translation: From the horned beetle to the swastika detail richly speaks, with limitless possibilities of associative montage manipulating images and using historical images, a historical machine, producing an endless flow of images remembered, contemporary, and future.

text: by the time it ends in a rush of sequins , flashbulbs , blaring brass and back-stabbing babes , it has said plenty about how show business has infiltrated every corner of society -- and not always for the better .
translation: Apabila ia berakhir dalam kegemparan sequins, kilat lampu kilat, bunyi geseran logam dan wanita jahat yang cuba menjatuhkan orang lain, ia telah menyatakan banyak tentang bagaimana perniagaan hiburan telah meresap ke setiap sudut masyarakat - dan tidak selalu untuk kebaikan.
back_translation: When it all ends in the commotion of sequins, flashing lights, the sound of metal scraping, and wicked women trying to bring others down, it has revealed much about how the entertainment business has seeped into every corner of society - and not always for the better.

text: the film succeeds as an homage to human spirit in the most shattering of circumstances .
translation: Filem ini berjaya sebagai penghormatan terhadap semangat manusia dalam keadaan yang paling menggoncangkan.
back_translation: This film succeeds as a tribute to the human spirit in the most challenging situations.

text: arcangel and his son travel to hometown , the familiy house looks abandoned , only isabel , a misterious old woman , is there .
translation: Arcangel dan anak lelakinya berjalan ke kampung halaman, rumah keluarga terlihat terbiar, hanya Isabel, seorang wanita tua yang misterius, yang berada di sana.
back_translation: Arcangel and his son walked to their hometown, the family home looked deserted, only Isabel, a mysterious old woman, was there.

text: smart science fiction for grown-ups , with only a few false steps along the way .
translation: Fiksyen sains yang pintar untuk orang dewasa, dengan hanya sedikit langkah palsu sepanjang jalan.
back_translation: Smart science fiction for adults, with just a few missteps along the way.

text: i 'll go out on a limb . it is n't quite one of the worst movies of the year . it 's just merely very bad .
translation: Saya akan merisik kesempatan. Ini bukanlah salah satu filem terburuk tahun ini. Ia hanya sangat buruk.
back_translation: I will take a chance. This isn't one of the worst films of the year. It's just really bad.

text: disney has always been hit-or-miss when bringing beloved kids ' books to the screen . . . tuck everlasting is a little of both .
translation: Disney selalu berada di persimpangan apabila membawa buku kanak-kanak yang dikasihi ke layar. Tuck Everlasting adalah sedikit dari kedua-dua.
back_translation: Disney is always at a crossroads when bringing beloved children's books to the screen. Tuck Everlasting is just one of both.

text: . . . its stupidities wind up sticking in one 's mind a lot more than the cool bits .
translation: . . . kebodohan itu akhirnya lebih melekat dalam fikiran seseorang berbanding bahagian yang keren .
back_translation: . . . stupidity eventually becomes more ingrained in someone's mind than the cool parts.

text: in a world besieged by world war ii , wendy , now grown up , tries to give her own children hope by telling them of her magical experiences with peter pan in never land .
translation: Di dalam dunia yang diserang oleh Perang Dunia II, Wendy, yang kini sudah dewasa, cuba memberikan harapan kepada anak-anaknya dengan menceritakan pengalaman ajaibnya bersama Peter Pan di Tanah Orang Tidak Pernah.
back_translation: In a world ravaged by World War II, Wendy, who is now an adult, tries to give hope to her children by recounting her magical adventures with Peter Pan in Neverland.

text: the script is smart and dark - hallelujah for small favors .
translation: Skrip itu pintar dan gelap - syukur untuk anugerah kecil.
back_translation: The script is smart and dark - thankful for the small blessings.

text: a love story played out against a backdrop of political and religious upheaval .
translation: Kisah cinta berlangsung di tengah-tengah kisah politik dan pergolakan agama.
back_translation: A love story unfolds amidst political events and religious unrest.

text: an internet terrorist creates a computer source code based on the dna of a junkie .
translation: Seorang pengganas internet mencipta sebuah kod sumber komputer berdasarkan pada DNA seorang penagih.
back_translation: An internet terrorist creates a computer source code based on the DNA of an addict.

text: it 's at once laughable and compulsively watchable , in its committed dumbness .
translation: Ia pada satu masa yang lucu dan memikat untuk ditonton, dalam kebodohannya yang komited.
back_translation: It was a funny and captivating time to watch, in its committed foolishness.

text: retired fbi profiler terry mccaleb ( eastwood ) , who has recently had a heart transplant , is hired by graciela rivers ( de jesus ) , to investigate the death of her sister , gloria , who happens to have given mccaleb his heart .
translation: Profil penjenayah bersara FBI Terry McCaleb (Eastwood), yang baru sahaja menjalani pembedahan pemanjangan jantung, diupah oleh Graciela Rivers (De Jesus) untuk menyiasat kematian adik perempuannya, Gloria, yang kebetulan memberi jantung kepada McCaleb.
back_translation: Retired FBI criminal profiler Terry McCaleb (Eastwood), who has just undergone a heart transplant surgery, is hired by Graciela Rivers (De Jesus) to investigate the death of her sister, Gloria, who happened to have donated her heart to McCaleb.

text: sassy postgrad elle woods ( witherspoon ) is all about animal rights .
translation: Postgrad Elle Woods yang berani (diperankan oleh Witherspoon) sangat memperjuangkan hak-hak haiwan.
back_translation: Postgrad Elle Woods, portrayed by Witherspoon, bravely advocates for animal rights.

text: centuries of tradition place this holy mountain in the sinai peninsula of egypt , but compelling evidence will show that this hallowed ground , where moses was told to take the shoes of his feet before the burning bush , may actually be in the barren deserts of northwestern saudi arabia .
translation: Berabad-abad tradisi menempatkan gunung suci ini di Semenanjung Sinai di Mesir, tetapi bukti yang meyakinkan akan menunjukkan bahwa tanah suci ini, di mana Musa diperintahkan untuk melepaskan kasutnya di depan semak yang terbakar, mungkin sebenarnya berada di padang gurun tandus di barat laut Arab Saudi.
back_translation: For centuries, tradition has placed this holy mountain in the Sinai Peninsula in Egypt, but convincing evidence will show that this sacred land, where Moses was commanded to take off his shoes in front of the burning bush, might actually be in the barren deserts of northwest Saudi Arabia.

text: its valuable message makes it a must-see for children and teenagers , and even more so for those callous adults who have become casually corrupt in their efforts to simply get through life .
translation: Mesej yang berharga membuatnya sangat perlu untuk dilihat oleh kanak-kanak dan remaja, dan lebih lagi bagi golongan dewasa yang cuai yang telah menjadi tercalar dalam usaha mereka untuk hanya melalui kehidupan.
back_translation: Valuable messages are very important to be seen by children and teenagers, and even more so for careless adults who have become tainted in their efforts to just get through life.

text: it seems like i have been waiting my whole life for this movie and now i ca n't wait for the sequel .
translation: Nampaknya saya telah menunggu sepanjang hidup untuk filem ini dan sekarang saya tak sabar untuk sambungan filem.
back_translation: It seems like I have waited all my life for this movie and now I can't wait for the sequel.

text: this is n't just the cliffsnotes version of nicholas nickleby , it 's the cliffsnotes with pages missing .
translation: Ini bukan sekadar versi CliffsNotes untuk Nicholas Nickleby, ini adalah CliffsNotes yang hilang halamannya.
back_translation: This is not just a version of CliffsNotes for Nicholas Nickleby, this is the missing pages of CliffsNotes.

text: years later , at the inauguration of the 'paradise-casino ' , patricia announces to a stunned crowd and a flabbergasted katherine that she immediately retires from showbusiness .
translation: Beberapa tahun kemudian, pada majlis perasmian 'paradise-casino', Patricia mengumumkan kepada orang ramai yang terperanjat dan Katherine yang terkejut bahawa dia segera bersara daripada dunia hiburan.
back_translation: Several years later, at the opening ceremony of the 'paradise-casino', Patricia announced to the surprised crowd and the stunned Katherine that she would soon retire from the entertainment world.

text: a hip ride into hyper-time , clockstoppers is a lively and enjoyable adventure for all ages at any time .
translation: Sebuah perjalanan ke dalam masa hiper yang seronok, Clockstoppers adalah pengembaraan yang menyeronokkan dan menarik untuk semua peringkat umur pada bila-bila masa.
back_translation: A journey into hyper time that is fun, Clockstoppers is an enjoyable and engaging adventure for all ages at any time.

text: an entertaining and poignantly bittersweet take-down of a good man 's midlife crisis .
translation: sebuah kisah yang menghibur dan menusuk hati yang pahit-manis tentang krisis pertengahan hidup seorang lelaki baik.
back_translation: An entertaining and poignant story about the bittersweet midlife crisis of a good man.

text: ultimately this is a frustrating patchwork : an uneasy marriage of louis begley 's source novel ( about schmidt ) and an old payne screenplay .
translation: Pada hujungnya ini adalah sebuah karya yang membingungkan : perkahwinan yang tidak selesa antara novel asal oleh Louis Begley (tentang Schmidt) dan skrip lama oleh Payne.
back_translation: In the end, this is a perplexing work: an uncomfortable marriage between Louis Begley's original novel (about Schmidt) and Payne's old script.

text: sort of an existential version of a seinfeld episode .
translation: Jenis versi eksistensial episod Seinfeld.
back_translation: The type of existential version of Seinfeld episodes.

text: the camera cuts back and forth between gus and grace : he talks about what a great driver he is , she says he 's a lousy driver .
translation: Kamera memotong antara Gus dan Grace: dia bercerita tentang betapa hebatnya dia sebagai pemandu, dia berkata dia adalah seorang pemandu yang teruk.
back_translation: The camera cut between Gus and Grace: he was talking about how great he was as a guide, he said he was a terrible guide.

text: there has to be a few advantages to never growing old . like being able to hit on a 15-year old when you 're over 100 .
translation: Mesti ada beberapa kelebihan jika tidak pernah tua. Seperti boleh mengurat gadis berusia 15 tahun walaupun anda berumur lebih dari 100 tahun.
back_translation: There must be some advantages if you never get old. Such as being able to court a 15-year-old girl even if you are over 100 years old.

text: a london website designer ops out of her comfortable but ordinary relationship with a nice boyfriend when she forms a dangerously obsessive bond with a handsome , mysterious mountaineer , who turns out to have some secrets .
translation: Seorang pereka laman web dari London memutuskan hubungan yang selesa tetapi biasa dengan kekasih yang baik apabila dia terjalin hubungan yang obsesif dan berbahaya dengan seorang bergaya tangan yang misteri, yang akhirnya terbongkar mempunyai beberapa rahsia.
back_translation: A web designer from London decided to end a comfortable but ordinary relationship with her good partner when she got involved in an obsessive and dangerous relationship with a mysterious and stylish person, who was eventually revealed to have some secrets.

text: not only is it a charming , funny and beautifully crafted import , it uses very little dialogue , making it relatively effortless to read and follow the action at the same time .
translation: Bukan sahaja filem ini menarik, lucu, dan dihasilkan dengan indah, tetapi ia juga menggunakan sedikit dialog, menjadikannya mudah untuk dibaca dan mengikuti aksi pada masa yang sama.
back_translation: Not only is this movie interesting, funny, and beautifully produced, but it also uses minimal dialogue, making it easy to read and follow the action at the same time.

text: they will try to find hanareh , a singer with a magic voice who crossed the border and may now be in danger in the iraqi kurdistan .
translation: Mereka akan cuba mencari Hanareh, seorang penyanyi dengan suara ajaib yang melintasi sempadan dan mungkin kini berada dalam bahaya di Kurdistan Iraq.
back_translation: They will try to find Hanareh, a singer with a magical voice that crosses borders and may now be in danger in Kurdistan, Iraq.

text: nearly manages to be what `` blow `` could n't - a perpetual night party that generates a sick fascination to the bitter end .
translation: hampir berjaya menjadi apa yang "letupan" tidak dapat - satu parti malam yang berterusan yang menghasilkan daya tarikan yang menakutkan hingga ke hujung yang pahit.
back_translation: almost succeeded in becoming what the "explosion" cannot - a continuous night party that produces a frightening attraction until the bitter end.

text: the project of pre-crime , at the time being in a state of trial run , is going to be voted about in the near future .
translation: Projek prakemungkiran, pada masa ini sedang dijalankan ujikaji, akan diputuskan mengenainya dalam masa yang terdekat.
back_translation: The feasibility project is currently undergoing testing and a decision regarding it will be made in the near future.

text: fontaine 's direction , especially her agreeably startling use of close-ups and her grace with a moving camera , creates sheerly cinematic appeal .
translation: Pengarahan Fontaine, terutamanya penggunaan close-up yang mengejutkan tetapi menyenangkan dan kelembutan kamera yang bergerak, mencipta daya tarikan yang benar-benar sinematik.
back_translation: Fontaine's direction, especially the surprising yet delightful use of close-ups and the gentle movement of the camera, creates a truly cinematic attraction.

text: it 's a race against the clock as jay must convince kay -- who not only has no memory of his time spent with the agency , but is also the only person alive who has the expertise to save the galaxy -- to reunite with the mib before earth is destroyed completely .
translation: Ini adalah perlumbaan melawan masa kerana Jay harus meyakinkan Kay - yang tidak hanya tidak mempunyai ingatan tentang masa yang dihabiskannya dengan agensi, tetapi juga adalah satu-satunya individu yang masih hidup yang memiliki kepakaran untuk menyelamatkan galaksi - untuk bersatu semula dengan MIB sebelum bumi dimusnahkan sepenuhnya.
back_translation: This is a race against time because Jay must convince Kay - who not only has no memory of his time at the agency, but is also the only living individual with the expertise to save the galaxy - to reunite with MIB before the earth is completely destroyed.

text: marly has given her career as an aquatic weeki wachee mermaid up and her marriage to steve is over .
translation: Marly telah meninggalkan kerjayanya sebagai penyelam duyung di Weeki Wachee dan perkahwinannya dengan Steve telah berakhir.
back_translation: Marly has left her job as a mermaid diver at Weeki Wachee and her marriage to Steve has ended.

text: perry 's good and his is an interesting character , but `` serving sara `` has n't much more to serve than silly fluff . nor is it a romantic comedy .
translation: Perry baik dan beliau merupakan watak yang menarik, tetapi "Serving Sara" tidak mempunyai banyak kisah lebih selain daripada hiburan ringan yang bodoh. Ia juga bukan filem komedi romantik.
back_translation: Perry is good and he is an interesting character, but "Serving Sara" doesn't have much story other than silly light entertainment. It is also not a romantic comedy film.

text: the result of a weekend affair he had back at the height of his fame produced olivia , a newpaper delivery girl for the south wales echo .
translation: Hasil daripada hubungan hujung minggu yang dia ada semasa kemasyhuran dirinya menghasilkan Olivia, seorang gadis penghantar akhbar untuk South Wales Echo.
back_translation: As a result of the weekend fling he had during his fame, he produced Olivia, a newspaper delivery girl for the South Wales Echo.

text: everyone around graham has their reasons why he should or should n't fully recover . . .
translation: Setiap orang di sekeliling Graham mempunyai alasan mereka mengapa dia sepatutnya atau tidak sepatutnya pulih sepenuhnya.
back_translation: Everyone around Graham has their own reasons why he should or should not fully recover.

text: after confidential ( and shameful ) information was released by british authorities , this amazing story of survival was finally confirmed .
translation: Selepas maklumat sulit (dan memalukan) dikeluarkan oleh pihak berkuasa British, kisah mengagumkan ini mengenai kisah hidup akhirnya disahkan.
back_translation: After sensitive (and embarrassing) information was released by the British authorities, this amazing story about his life was finally confirmed.

text: hope looms on the horizon though : he 's closing in fast on his dream of opening a four-star restaurant in north conway .
translation: Harapan muncul di cakrawala meskipun : dia semakin dekat dengan impian membuka restoran bintang empat di utara Conway.
back_translation: Hope emerges on the horizon even though: he is getting closer to his dream of opening a four-star restaurant in northern Conway.

text: plays like one long , meandering sketch inspired by the works of john waters and todd solondz , rather than a fully developed story .
translation: Bermain seperti satu sketsa panjang yang mengembara yang terinspirasi oleh karya-karya John Waters dan Todd Solondz, daripada sebuah cerita yang sepenuhnya terbangun.
back_translation: Playing like a long wandering sketch inspired by the works of John Waters and Todd Solondz, rather than a fully constructed story.

text: using his family 's old mob connections , tony has mapped out every detail for a very special evening .
translation: Dengan menggunakan hubungan koneksi lama keluarganya, Tony telah membuat rancangan terperinci untuk sebuah malam yang sangat istimewa.
back_translation: Using his family's old connections, Tony has made detailed plans for a very special evening.

text: although no pastry is violated , this nasty comedy pokes fun at the same easy targets as other rowdy raunch-fests -- farts , boobs , unmentionables -- without much success .
translation: Walaupun tiada pastri dilanggar, komedi kasar ini mengolok-olok sasaran mudah yang sama seperti filem-filem lucah lain - kentut, buah dada, perkara-perkara yang tidak boleh disebut - tanpa banyak kejayaan.
back_translation: Although no boundaries are crossed, this crude comedy mocks the same easy targets as other pornographic films - flatulence, breasts, unspeakable things - without much success.

text: it is only natural for `` the shu `` to flourish under the care of corrupt and powerful men like battista .
translation: Adalah lumrah bagi "the shu" untuk berkembang di bawah jagaan lelaki yang korup dan berkuasa seperti Battista.
back_translation: It is natural for "the shu" to thrive under the care of corrupt and powerful men like Battista.

text: she trails the couch through a quirky landscape populated by hasidim in brooklyn , holocaust survivors and ex-communists in hungary , and , finally , the next generation of formerly-hasidic jews on the margins of their communities in new york and israel .
translation: Dia menjejakkan sofa melalui landskap yang aneh dihuni oleh hasidim di Brooklyn, mangsa Holokaus, bekas komunis di Hungary, dan akhirnya, generasi seterusnya orang-orang Yahudi yang dulunya berhasid di pinggiran komuniti mereka di New York dan Israel.
back_translation: He traced the sofa through a landscape strange inhabited by Hasidim in Brooklyn, Holocaust survivors, former communists in Hungary, and finally, the next generation of Jewish people who were once Hasidic on the fringes of their community in New York and Israel.

text: in cinemania , hollywood 's biggest fans become the true stars .
translation: Di dalam Cinemania, peminat terbesar Hollywood menjadi bintang sebenar.
back_translation: In Cinemania, the biggest fans of Hollywood become the real stars.

text: through his addiction to these ardent visions , he becomes more reclusive .
translation: Melalui kecanduannya kepada visi-visi yang bergelora ini, dia menjadi lebih tertutup.
back_translation: Through his addiction to these fervent visions, he became more closed off.

text: . . . best seen as speculative history , as much an exploration of the paranoid impulse as a creative sequel to the warren report .
translation: . . . lebih baik dilihat sebagai sejarah spekulatif, sebagai penerokaan keinginan paranoid daripada sekuel kreatif kepada laporan Warren.
back_translation: . . . better viewed as speculative history, as an exploration of paranoid desires rather than a creative sequel to the Warren report.

text: in building a home-made bomb and setting off a plan that fails miserably , her status changes from young widow to that of a criminal in custody .
translation: Dengan merancang sebuah bom buatan sendiri dan menjalankan rencana yang gagal, statusnya berubah dari janda muda kepada pesalah yang ditahan.
back_translation: By plotting her own homemade bomb and executing a failed plan, her status changed from a young widow to a detained criminal.

text: searching for validity , recognition , and truth , he befriends a quirky computer genius and a kickboxing goddess , who all help one another realize what they have been missing from their lives .
translation: Mencari keabsahan, pengiktirafan, dan kebenaran, dia bersahabat dengan seorang jenius komputer yang aneh dan seorang dewi kickboxing, yang semua membantu satu sama lain menyedari apa yang mereka sudah hilangkan dari kehidupan mereka.
back_translation: Seeking legitimacy, recognition, and truth, he befriends a strange computer genius and a kickboxing goddess, all of whom help each other realize what they have lost in their lives.

text: set in an american town in the rocky mountains in the 1930s .
translation: Ditetapkan di sebuah bandar Amerika di puncak Rockies pada tahun 1930-an.
back_translation: Set in an American town at the peak of the Rockies in the 1930s.

text: when a humans camp is attacked by tigers , a woman takes her baby and jumps on a river .
translation: Apabila perkhemahan manusia diserang oleh harimau, seorang wanita mengambil bayinya dan terjun ke sungai.
back_translation: When the human camp was attacked by a tiger, a woman took her baby and jumped into the river.

text: mother and daughter hide in the `` panic room , `` a secret room designed for just such a purpose , but still end up fighting for their lives . . .
translation: Ibu dan anak perempuan bersembunyi di "bilik keadaan panik", sebuah bilik rahsia yang direka khas untuk tujuan sedemikian, namun masih berakhir dengan berjuang untuk nyawa mereka...
back_translation: The mother and daughter hid in the "panic room", a secret room specially designed for such purposes, but still ended up fighting for their lives...

text: unless you 're a fanatic , the best advice is : 'scooby ' do n't .
translation: Kecuali jika anda adalah penggemar tegar, nasihat terbaik adalah: janganlah ikut.
back_translation: Unless you are a die-hard fan, the best advice is: do not follow.

text: it takes a strange kind of laziness to waste the talents of robert forster , anne meara , eugene levy , and reginald veljohnson all in the same movie .
translation: Ia perlu jenis kemalasan yang aneh untuk menyia-nyiakan bakat Robert Forster, Anne Meara, Eugene Levy, dan Reginald VelJohnson dalam filem yang sama.
back_translation: It takes a strange kind of laziness to waste the talents of Robert Forster, Anne Meara, Eugene Levy, and Reginald VelJohnson in the same movie.

text: french director helene angel 's dark but deftly handled fable about familial violence has a terrifying , fairy-tale atmosphere that 's in perfect keeping with its unique point of view .
translation: Fabel yang gelap tetapi diurus dengan bijak karya pengarah Perancis Helene Angel tentang keganasan dalam keluarga memiliki suasana dongeng yang menyeramkan, yang sesuai sepenuhnya dengan sudut pandangnya yang unik.
back_translation: A dark fable skillfully handled by French director Helene Angel about domestic violence has a creepy fairytale atmosphere that perfectly fits her unique perspective.

text: rainone 's love affair with singing sensation kelly mcguire whom he discovered and his near demise by the hands of his own prot & # 233 ; g & # 233 ; vincent riccola is the juice that fuels this roller coaster ride through two debauchery-filled decades of greed , sex , drugs and rock and roll .
translation: Kisah cinta Rainone dengan sensasi penyanyi Kelly McGuire yang ditemuinya dan hampir kehilangannya oleh tangan murid dan protege-nya sendiri, Vincent Riccola, adalah bahan bakar yang memacu kisah naik turun ini melalui dua dekad penuh kerakusan, seks, dadah, dan rock and roll.
back_translation: The love story of Rainone with the sensation singer Kelly McGuire that he met and almost lost by the hands of his own student and protege, Vincent Riccola, is the fuel that drives this roller coaster story through two decades of greed, sex, drugs, and rock and roll.

text: when billy becomes suspicious , all hell breaks loose .
translation: Apabila Billy menjadi curiga, segala-galanya menjadi kacau-bilau.
back_translation: When Billy becomes suspicious, everything becomes chaotic.

text: he holds her prisoner while awaiting the surgery , but she escapes and hides out until she raises enough money to flee to the u . s . when she arrives in new york , she is placed in a detention center .
translation: Dia memegangnya sebagai tawanan semasa menunggu pembedahan, tetapi dia melarikan diri serta bersembunyi sehingga dia mengumpulkan wang yang mencukupi untuk melarikan diri ke Amerika Syarikat. Apabila dia tiba di New York, dia ditempatkan di pusat tahanan.
back_translation: He held it as a captive while waiting for the surgery, but he escaped and went into hiding until he gathered enough money to escape to the United States. When he arrived in New York, he was placed in a detention center.

text: a penetrating , potent exploration of sanctimony , self-awareness , self-hatred and self-determination .
translation: Penemuan yang jitu, kuasa mendalam tentang kekudusan, kesedaran diri, kebencian diri dan penentuan diri.
back_translation: A profound discovery about holiness, self-awareness, self-hatred, and self-determination.

text: a big time drug dealer victor rosa ( john leguizamo ) is looking to get out of the game and sees his chance with a big deal with a new friend who happens to be a wall st . stockbroker .
translation: Seorang peniaga dadah gergasi Victor Rosa (John Leguizamo) sedang mencari jalan untuk keluar dari permainan dan melihat peluangnya dengan satu perjanjian besar bersama seorang kawan baru yang kebetulan menjadi seorang broker saham Wall Street.
back_translation: Drug lord Victor Rosa (John Leguizamo) is looking for a way out of the game and sees his opportunity with a big deal with a new friend who happens to be a Wall Street stockbroker.

text: clashing their swords in fiece mortal combat , will and jack attempt to recapture the black pearl ship , save the british navy , and relinquish a fortune in forbidden treasure thereby lifting the curse of the pirates of the caribbean .
translation: Berlawan dengan pedang mereka dalam pertempuran mematikan yang sengit, Will dan Jack cuba menawan semula kapal Black Pearl, menyelamatkan angkatan laut British, dan menyerahkan harta terlarang yang bernilai besar, serta mengangkat kutukan lanun di Lautan Karibia.
back_translation: In a deadly fierce battle, Will and Jack fought with their swords, attempting to reclaim the Black Pearl, save the British navy, hand over valuable forbidden treasure, and lift the curse of the pirates in the Caribbean Sea.

text: besides being performers , they are also political activists - in aids awareness , anti-gay violence , the sex workers movement and the struggle against the extreme right and racism .
translation: Selain menjadi artis, mereka juga merupakan aktivis politik - dalam kesedaran AIDS, menentang keganasan terhadap golongan gay, gerakan pekerja seks, serta perjuangan menentang ekstrem kanan dan perkauman.
back_translation: In addition to being artists, they are also political activists - in raising awareness about AIDS, opposing violence against the gay community, the sex workers movement, as well as fighting against the far right and racism.

text: desperate for a grandchild , she 's eager to see him married and spends much of her time planning introductions to suitable chinese girls for daniel .
translation: Terlalu ingin memiliki cucu, dia sangat ingin melihatnya menikah dan menghabiskan sebagian besar waktunya merancang pengenalan dengan gadis-gadis Cina yang cocok untuk Daniel.
back_translation: Too eager to have grandchildren, she really wants to see them get married and spends most of her time planning introductions with Chinese girls who are suitable for Daniel.

text: suddenly , patricia becomes suspicious that this arrogant man ca n't be her beloved husband .
translation: Tiba-tiba, Patricia menjadi curiga bahawa lelaki sombong ini tidak mungkin menjadi suaminya yang dikasihi.
back_translation: Suddenly, Patricia became suspicious that this arrogant man could not possibly be her beloved husband.

text: charlotte and teis , partners for some years , are going to climb a mountain , literally and metaphorically .
translation: Charlotte dan Teis, rakan kongsi selama beberapa tahun, akan mendaki gunung, secara harfiah dan metafora.
back_translation: Charlotte and Teis, partners for several years, will climb the mountain, both literally and metaphorically.

text: jimmy ( thomas ) is a highly educated barber with a superiority complex who ca n't stand isaac ( garity ) , the new , white barber who just wants a shot at cutting some hair .
translation: Jimmy (Thomas) ialah seorang tukang gunting rambut yang berpendidikan tinggi dengan kompleks keunggulan yang tidak boleh bertolak ansur dengan Isaac (Garity), tukang gunting rambut baru berbangsa putih yang hanya ingin peluang untuk gunting rambut.
back_translation: Jimmy (Thomas) is a highly educated hairdresser with an unmatched excellence complex that cannot compromise with Isaac (Garity), a new white hairdresser who just wants a chance to cut hair.

text: could matty finish a porn movie before his legs get broken by tokyo tony ?
translation: Adakah Matty dapat menyiapkan filem lucah sebelum kakinya patah oleh Tokyo Tony?
back_translation: Can Matty finish the porn movie before his leg is broken by Tokyo Tony?

text: but just when james starts to question his role and his cat-and-mouse relationship with his mentor , burke taps him for a special assignment to root out a mole .
translation: Tetapi tepat ketika James mula mempersoalkan peranannya dan hubungan kucing-kurapnya dengan mentornya, Burke menugaskan dia untuk misi khas menjejaki mole.
back_translation: But just as James began to question his role and his relationship with his mentor, Burke assigned him to a special mission to track down a mole.

text: a light-hearted french film about the spiritual quest of a fashion model seeking peace of mind while in a love affair with a veterinarian who is a non-practicing jew .

translation: Sean Bateman (James Van Der Beek) adalah adik lelaki kepada broker Wall Street psikotik Patrick Bateman.

text: writer/director walter hill is in his hypermasculine element here , once again able to inject some real vitality and even art into a pulpy concept that , in many other hands would be completely forgettable .
translation: Penulis/pengarah Walter Hill berada dalam elemen lelaki maskulinnya di sini, sekali lagi mampu menyuntikkan kehidupan sebenar dan bahkan seni ke dalam konsep yang berpulp, yang dalam banyak tangan lain akan dilupakan sepenuhnya.
back_translation: Writer/director Walter Hill is in his masculine element here, once again able to inject real life and even art into a pulp concept that in many other hands would be entirely forgotten.

text: she becomes part of anita 's world , but events do not run smoothly .
translation: Dia menjadi sebahagian dunia Anita, tetapi peristiwa tidak berjalan lancar.
back_translation: He became a part of Anita's world, but events did not go smoothly.

text: although sensitive to a fault , it 's often overwritten , with a surfeit of weighty revelations , flowery dialogue , and nostalgia for the past and roads not taken .
translation: Walaupun sensitif hingga ke tahap terlebih namun seringkali diabadikan, dengan berlebihan penyingkapan yang penting, dialog berbunga-bunga, dan kenangan akan masa lalu dan jalan yang tidak diambil.
back_translation: Although sensitive to the point of excess, it is often immortalized, with excessive disclosure being essential, flowery dialogues, and memories of the past and roads not taken.

text: at times a bit melodramatic and even a little dated ( depending upon where you live ) , ignorant fairies is still quite good-natured and not a bad way to spend an hour or two .
translation: Kadang-kadang agak melodramatik dan kadang-kadang agak ketinggalan zaman (bergantung di mana anda tinggal), Ignorant Fairies masih cukup baik hati dan bukan cara yang teruk untuk menghabiskan satu atau dua jam.
back_translation: Sometimes a bit melodramatic and sometimes somewhat outdated (depending on where you live), Ignorant Fairies is still quite a kind and not a terrible way to spend one or two hours.

text: full of unforgiving irony and quiet realism , a song for martin stands as a powerful and moving achievement .
translation: Penuh dengan ironi yang tidak mengampuni dan realisme yang tenang, sebuah lagu untuk Martin menjadi pencapaian yang kuat dan menggerakkan.
back_translation: Full of unforgiving irony and calm realism, a song for Martin becomes a powerful and moving achievement.

text: a dazzling thing to behold -- as long as you 're wearing the somewhat cumbersome 3d goggles the theater provides .
translation: sesuatu yang memukau untuk diperhatikan - selagi anda memakai cermin mata 3d yang agak besar yang disediakan oleh teater.

text: this romantic thriller is steeped in the atmosphere of wartime england , and ably captures the speech patterns , moral codes and ideals of the 1940s .
translation: Thriller romantis ini kaya dengan atmosfera Inggeris zaman perang, dan berjaya menangkap corak pertuturan, kod moral, dan cita-cita tahun 1940-an.
back_translation: This romantic thriller is rich with the atmosphere of wartime England, successfully capturing the patterns of speech, moral code, and aspirations of the 1940s.

text: a macabre and very stylized swedish fillm about a modern city where all the religious and civic virtues that hold society in place are in tatters .
translation: Filem Sweden yang mengerikan dan sangat berseni tentang sebuah bandar moden di mana semua nilai keagamaan dan persaudaraan yang mengekalkan masyarakat terhakis.
back_translation: A terrifying and very artistic film from Sweden about a modern city where all religious and brotherhood values ​​that sustain society are eroded.

text: waydowntown may not be an important movie , or even a good one , but it provides a nice change of mindless pace in collision with the hot oscar season currently underway .
translation: waydowntown mungkin bukan filem yang penting, atau bahkan baik, tetapi ia memberikan perubahan yang menyegarkan dari kelajuan tanpa fikiran bertembung dengan musim Oscar yang panas yang sedang berlangsung.

text: a dull , inconsistent , dishonest female bonding picture .
translation: gambaran hubungan wanita yang membosankan, tidak konsisten, tidak jujur.
back_translation: A depiction of a woman with a boring, inconsistent, and dishonest relationship.

text: a long-winded and stagy session of romantic contrivances that never really gels like the shrewd feminist fairy tale it could have been .
translation: Sesi roman yang berbelit-belit dan bertokoh yang tidak pernah benar-benar padu seperti dongeng feminis yang bijak yang sepatutnya.

text: certain to be distasteful to children and adults alike , eight crazy nights is a total misfire .
translation: Pasti tidak disenangi oleh kanak-kanak dan dewasa, "Eight Crazy Nights" adalah satu kesilapan besar.

text: despite these annoyances , the capable clayburgh and tambor really do a great job of anchoring the characters in the emotional realities of middle age .

text: max plays it cool as he infiltrates beno 's palace stronghold in the steamy jungle of the yucatan .

text: ai n't no mountain high enough to keep the funk brothers from getting to you .

text: they come across each other again and want to make their fathers ' wish come true , so they arrange for yoyo and cheung to meet in london .

text: third time 's the charm . . . yeah , baby !

text: good performances and a realistic , non-exploitive approach make paid in full worth seeing .
translation: Pentas yang baik dan pendekatan realistik serta tidak mengeksploitasi membuat filem Paid in Full layak ditonton.

text: the movie , so briskly alert in details , is generic in its guiding ideas .

text: a belgian gem on the twilight existence of four sisters of a certain age drawn together reluctantly by the need to care for one of their number .
translation: Sebuah permata Belgium mengenai keberadaan senja empat adik beradik pada usia tertentu yang digerakkan bersama dengan rasa tidak sukarela oleh keperluan untuk menjaga salah seorang daripada mereka.

text: jedi knights obi-wan kenobi and anakin skywalker discover there is more than meets the eye behind an assassination attempt on naboo senator padm & # 233 ; amidala 's life .

translation: Guru menyelamatkan Melinda (Jennie Dallery), seorang anggota geng yang sedang lari; Blake (Jeff Sauber), seorang seniman muda yang gagal; dan Ariel (Shannon Morris), seorang pelacur remaja; dan membawa mereka ke tempat perlindungan bersama dengan orang-orang yang ditolak oleh masyarakat.
back_translation: The teacher rescued Melinda (Jennie Dallery), a fleeing gang member; Blake (Jeff Sauber), a young failed artist; and Ariel (Shannon Morris), a teenage prostitute; and brought them to a safe place along with others rejected by society.

text: has its moments -- and almost as many subplots .
translation: memiliki momen-momennya - dan hampir sama banyaknya subplot.

text: a strong enough effort to be worthy of faint praise .
translation: usaha yang kuat sehingga layak mendapat pujian yang suram.

translation: Pada hari seorang jurugambar muda sedang berpindah keluar dari tempat tinggalnya untuk tinggal bersama kekasihnya, dia bertemu dengan gadis cantik yang sedang berpindah masuk dan jatuh cinta padanya pada pandangan pertama.

translation: Apa yang menjadikan Lucky tidak seperti anjing biasa adalah keupayaannya untuk bercakap.

text: a mix of gritty realism , crisp storytelling and radiant compassion that effortlessly draws you in .

text: heart problems force boston cop pally lamarr to retire ; he 's in a funk and his wife charlotte sends him packing .
translation: Masalah jantung memaksa polis Boston, Pally Lamarr, untuk bersara; dia dalam kesedihan dan isterinya, Charlotte menghantar dia pergi.

text: if you 're like me , a sucker for a good old fashion romance and someone who shamelessly loves to eat , then mostly martha offers all the perfect ingredients to more than satisfy your appetite .

back_translation: If you are like me, a traditional romantic enthusiast who loves to eat, then "mostly martha" offers all the perfect ingredients to satisfy your taste buds.

text: jesse custer , a texas preacher , is imbued by the power of an entity called genesis , part angel and part demon , who give him the power of the word , the ability to make anybody do anything he says .
translation: Jesse Custer, seorang paderi Texas, diilhamkan oleh kuasa entiti yang dipanggil genesis, separuh malaikat dan separuh iblis, yang memberinya kuasa firman, keupayaan untuk membuat sesiapa sahaja melakukan apa-apa yang dia katakan.
back_translation: Jesse Custer, a Texas preacher, is inspired by the power of an entity called Genesis, half angel and half demon, which grants him the power of the word, the ability to make anyone do whatever he says.

text: perhaps even the slc high command found writer-director mitch davis 's wall of kitsch hard going .
translation: Mungkin pihak pentadbiran tinggi slc juga menganggap dinding kitsch pengarah penulis Mitch Davis sukar difahami.

text: cathy , a young and innocent freshman , had a crush on senior hunk , nick , the campus ' basketball star .

text: fails in making this character understandable , in getting under her skin , in exploring motivation . . . well before the end , the film grows as dull as its characters , about whose fate it is hard to care .
translation: Gagal membuat watak ini difahami, gagal meresapi perasaannya, gagal meneroka motivasi... jauh sebelum akhir filem, ia menjadi membosankan seperti watak-wataknya, yang tak mudah untuk disayangi.
back_translation: Failing to make this character understood, failing to empathize with his feelings, failing to explore his motivations... long before the end of the film, it became as boring as its characters, who are not easy to love.

translation: Pelakon-pelakon memang mesti pandai untuk mengucapkan dialog yang lucu ini dengan muka serius.

translation: Pengarah baru, Kevin Donovan, terbelenggu oleh skrinplay yang terurus dengan buruk bagi konsep yang sebenarnya menghiburkan iaitu jubah tinggi teknologi yang mengubah pemakainya menjadi seorang superman.

text: wimps out by going for that pg-13 rating , so the more graphic violence is mostly off-screen and the sexuality is muted .
translation: Mereka memilih rating PG-13, jadi kekerasan grafik kebanyakan tidak ditunjukkan dan seksualiti diubahsuai.

text: as they make their way to the city from suburban pennsylvania , april must endure a comedy of errors - like finding out her oven does n't work - in order to pull off the big event .
translation: Apabila mereka bergerak ke bandar dari pinggir bandar Pennsylvania, April terpaksa menanggung kisah lucu kesilapan - seperti mengetahui bahawa ketuharannya tidak berfungsi - untuk menjayakan acara besar tersebut.
