text: ofrece una buena oportunidad de cultura ( aunque sea condensada ) que bien vale la pena aprovechar .
translation: Menawarkan peluang budaya yang baik (walaupun ringkas) yang sangat berharga untuk dimanfaatkan.
back_translation: Offering a good (albeit brief) cultural opportunity that is very valuable to be utilized.

text: on new year 's eve , 1969 , a flamboyant ragtag troupe of genderbending hippies took the stage of san francisco 's palace theater and the cockettes were born .
translation: Pada malam tahun baru, 1969, satu kumpulan kacukan yang berwarna-warni dan eksentrik daripada golongan hippies mengambil pentas di teater istana San Francisco dan The Cockettes dilahirkan.
back_translation: On New Year's Eve, 1969, a colorful and eccentric group of mixed race hippies took the stage at the Palace Theater in San Francisco and The Cockettes were born.

text: when he wakes up the morning after his bachelor party in bed with a strange woman ( stiles ) , a man ( lee ) presumes he must have cheated on his fiancee .

back_translation: When he woke up in the morning after his bachelor party on the bed with a strange woman (Stiles), a man (Lee) assumed that he must have cheated on his fiancée.

text: typifies the pros and cons of the films that india churns out .

text: in old-fashioned screenwriting parlance , ms . shreve 's novel proved too difficult a text to 'lick , ' despite the efforts of a first-rate cast .
translation: Dalam bahasa penulisan skrin lama, novel ms. Shreve terbukti terlalu sukar untuk 'diatasi,' walaupun usaha pelakon bertaraf tinggi.

text: yes , mibii is rote work and predictable , but with a philosophical visual coming right at the end that extravagantly redeems it .
translation: Ya, filem "Mibii" adalah kerja yang klise dan boleh diramal, tetapi dengan elemen visual yang bersifat kefilsafatan pada bahagian akhir filem itu membuatnya secara luar biasa mendalam.

text: this may not have the dramatic gut-wrenching impact of other holocaust films , but it 's a compelling story , mainly because of the way it 's told by the people who were there .
translation: Filem ini mungkin tidak mempunyai impak yang dramatik dan menusuk kalbu seperti filem-filem holokaus lain, tetapi ia adalah sebuah cerita yang menarik, terutamanya kerana cara ceritanya disampaikan oleh orang-orang yang berada di situ.
back_translation: This film may not have the dramatic and heart-rending impact of other Holocaust films, but it is an interesting story, especially because of the way it is told by the people who were there.

text: las horas es una de las obras que con mayor apasionamiento reflexiona acerca del hecho de vivir . . .
translation: Masa adalah salah satu karya yang paling bersemangat merenungkan tentang fakta hidup...
back_translation: Time is one of the most passionate works that reflect on the facts of life...

text: it is one of the last true medieval maximum-security penal farms in the country .
translation: Ia merupakan salah satu dari ladang penjara berprestasi maksimum sejagat medieval yang terakhir di negara ini.

text: there are few things more frustrating to a film buff than seeing an otherwise good movie marred beyond redemption by a disastrous ending .
translation: Tidak ada yang lebih membuat peminat filem frustrasi melihat sebuah filem baik dicemarkan hingga tidak dapat diperbaiki oleh satu akhir yang merosakkan.
back_translation: Nothing frustrates movie fans more than seeing a good film ruined and irreparable by a damaging ending.

text: forced to exist between living and dead , and only revealing their skeleton forms in the moonlight , the pirates intend to use elizabeth 's blood and necklace ( a part of their curse ) to return to their normal state .
translation: Terpaksa wujud di antara hidup dan mati, dan hanya menampakkan bentuk rangka mereka di bawah sinar bulan, para lanun bermaksud menggunakan darah Elizabeth dan kalungnya (sebahagian daripada kutukan mereka) untuk kembali ke keadaan normal.
back_translation: Forced to exist between life and death, and only revealing their skeletal forms under the moonlight, the pirates intend to use Elizabeth's blood and her necklace (part of their curse) to return to their normal state.

text: this is a fudged opportunity of gigantic proportions -- a lunar mission with no signs of life .
translation: Ini adalah peluang besar yang amat penting - misi bulan tanpa tanda-tanda kehidupan.

text: the subject of this documentary is private life in the big city , apartments as a last stronghold of individuality , in addition to emphasizing the fact that to live together in one and the same place does not ensure that a community will be formed .
translation: Subjek dokumentari ini adalah kehidupan peribadi di bandar besar, apartmen sebagai benteng terakhir individu, di samping menekankan hakikat bahawa tinggal bersama di satu tempat tidak menjamin pembentukan komuniti.
back_translation: The subject of this documentary is personal life in a big city, apartments as the last stronghold of individuals, while emphasizing the fact that living together in one place does not guarantee the formation of a community.

text: a sexy , surprising romance . . . idemoto and kim make a gorgeous pair . . . their scenes brim with sexual possibility and emotional danger .

text: sorvino makes the princess seem smug and cartoonish , and the film only really comes alive when poor hermocrates and leontine pathetically compare notes about their budding amours .
translation: Sorvino membuat puteri itu kelihatan angkuh dan kartun, dan filem hanya benar-benar menjadi hidup apabila Hermocrates yang miskin dan Leontine secara menyedihkan membandingkan catatan mengenai kasih yang sedang berkembang mereka.

text: perhaps it 's cliche to call the film 'refreshing , ' but it is . 'drumline ' shows a level of young , black manhood that is funny , touching , smart and complicated .
translation: Mungkin agak klise untuk menyebut filem ini 'segar', tetapi memang begitulah. 'Drumline' menunjukkan tahap kedewasaan lelaki muda berkulit hitam yang lucu, menyentuh, bijak dan rumit.
back_translation: It may be somewhat cliché to call this film 'fresh', but that's just how it is. 'Drumline' showcases the level of maturity of young black men who are funny, touching, intelligent, and complex.

text: the women clash as plans go awry , tragedy strikes , and hearts get broken .
translation: Wanita bertembung apabila rancangan terganggu, tragedi melanda, dan hati terluka.
back_translation: Women collide when plans are disrupted, tragedy strikes, and hearts are wounded.

text: it 's one of those baseball pictures where the hero is stoic , the wife is patient , the kids are as cute as all get-out and the odds against success are long enough to intimidate , but short enough to make a dream seem possible .
translation: Ini salah satu gambar baseball di mana watak utamanya bersikap tabah, isterinya sabar, anak-anaknya comel seperti semua yang kelihatan dan peluang kejayaannya cukup sukar untuk menakutkan, tetapi cukup mudah untuk menjadikan impian kelihatan mungkin.
back_translation: This is one of the baseball images where the main character is resilient, his wife is patient, his children are adorable as they all appear, and the chances of success are quite daunting, but easy enough to make dreams seem possible.

text: the story has some nice twists but the ending and some of the back-story is a little tired . the performances are all solid ; it merely lacks originality to make it a great movie .
translation: Ceritanya mempunyai beberapa plot twist yang menarik tetapi pengakhiran dan sebahagian daripada latar belakang agak membosankan. Persembahan semua pelakon adalah mantap; tetapi ia kurang asli untuk menjadikannya filem hebat.
back_translation: The story has some interesting plot twists but the ending and some of the backgrounds are quite dull. The performances of all the actors are solid; however, it lacks authenticity to make it a great film.

text: ahas , son from a poor family , in his inner struggles , joins the troop of his classmates and heads for the front .
translation: Ahas, anak lelaki dari keluarga miskin, dalam perjuangannya dalaman, menyertai pasukan rakan sekelasnya dan menuju ke barisan hadapan.
back_translation: Ahas, a boy from a poor family, in his internal struggle, joins his classmates' team and heads to the frontline.

text: the 70-year-old godard has become , to judge from in praise of love , the sort of bitter old crank who sits behind his light meter and harangues the supposed injustices of the artistic world-at-large without doing all that much to correct them .
translation: Godard yang berusia 70 tahun telah menjadi, jika dinilai dari dalam pujian cinta, jenis orang tua pahit yang duduk di belakang pengukur cahayanya dan meracau tentang ketidakadilan yang diduga terjadi di dunia seni secara umum tanpa melakukan banyak usaha untuk memperbaikinya.
back_translation: The 70-year-old Godard has become, if judged from within the adulation of love, the kind of bitter elder who sits behind his light meter and rambles about the alleged injustices that occur in the art world in general without making much effort to fix them.

text: the pianist [ is ] a supremely hopeful cautionary tale of war 's madness remembered that we , today , can prevent its tragic waste of life . here is a divine monument to a single man 's struggle to regain his life , his dignity and his music .
translation: Pianis adalah sebuah kisah peringatan yang sangat penuh harapan tentang kegilaan perang yang diingatkan bahawa kita, pada hari ini, boleh mencegah pembaziran tragis nyawa. Inilah sebuah monumen ilahi bagi perjuangan seorang lelaki untuk mendapatkan semula hidupnya, maruahnya dan muziknya.
back_translation: "Pianist is a poignant tale of a reminder filled with hope about the madness of war that serves as a reminder that we, today, can prevent tragic loss of lives. It is a divine monument to a man's struggle to reclaim his life, dignity, and music."

text: a cold-hearted judge finds out when a seemingly crazy young couple break into his house and take him captive .
translation: Seorang hakim yang berhati dingin tersedar apabila sepasang kekasih yang kelihatan gila memasuki rumahnya dan menjadikannya tawanan.
back_translation: A cold-hearted judge is awakened when a seemingly crazy couple enters his house and holds him captive.

text: i ca n't remember the last time i saw a movie where i wanted so badly for the protagonist to fail .
translation: Saya tidak ingat bila kali terakhir saya menonton filem di mana saya sangat ingin watak utama gagal.
back_translation: I can't remember the last time I watched a movie where I really wanted the main character to fail.

text: as a technical exercise that redefines moviemaking , it is astonishing .
translation: Sebagai suatu latihan teknikal yang menakrifkan semula pembikinan filem, ia sungguh menakjubkan.
back_translation: As a technical exercise that redefines the making of films, it is truly amazing.

text: eul-boon kim 's soulful portrayal of the illiterate , deaf-mute grandmother illuminates the dignity of her demeanor and the sad resignation in her eyes .
translation: Perwatakannya yang berjiwa oleh eul-boon kim mengenai nenek yang buta huruf dan pekak-mbisu menerangi martabat sikapnya dan kepasrahan sedih dalam matanya.
back_translation: Her character, inspired by Eul-Boon Kim, about a grandmother who is illiterate and deaf-mute, illuminates her dignity and the resignation of sadness in her eyes.

text: there is one surefire way to get a nomination for a best-foreign-film oscar : make a movie about whimsical folk who learn a nonchallenging , life-affirming lesson while walking around a foreign city with stunning architecture .
translation: Satu cara pasti untuk mendapatkan pencalonan untuk Oscar filem asing terbaik: buat filem tentang masyarakat whimsical yang belajar pelajaran yang tidak mencabar tetapi mengesankan semasa berjalan di sekitar bandar asing dengan senibina yang menakjubkan.
back_translation: One surefire way to get a nomination for the Best Foreign Language Film Oscar: make a movie about a whimsical community learning lessons that are not challenging but impressive while strolling around a foreign city with stunning architecture.

text: also , anthony is black and victoria is white , which does n't sit well with michael , anthony 's best friend since childhood and a surrogate older brother .
translation: Selain itu, Anthony berkulit hitam dan Victoria berkulit putih, yang tidak baik bagi Michael, sahabat karib Anthony sejak kecil dan seolah-olah abang angkat bagi mereka.
back_translation: In addition, Anthony has dark skin and Victoria has fair skin, which is not good for Michael, Anthony's close friend since childhood and seemingly like an older brother to them.

text: a mix of velocity and idiocy , this ruinous remake lacks the brawn -- and the brains -- of the 1970s original .
translation: Sebuah campuran kelajuan dan kebodohan, pembuatan semula yang merosakkan ini kekurangan kekuatan - dan kecerdasannya - dari versi asal tahun 1970-an.
back_translation: A mix of speed and foolishness, this damaging remake lacks the power - and intelligence - of the original 1970s version.

text: a young rebell oversteps the boarder between stage and life on the trail of francois villon .
translation: Seorang pemuda yang memberontak melangkah melewati batas antara pentas dan kehidupan dalam jejak Francois Villon.
back_translation: A rebellious youth crosses the boundary between the stage and life in the footsteps of François Villon.

text: events go from tragic to dangerous as racism , paranoia , and a secret mistress come into play .
translation: Acara berubah dari tragis ke berbahaya apabila perkauman, paranoia, dan seorang kekasih rahsia menjadi faktor-faktor penting.
back_translation: The event shifted from tragic to dangerous when racism, paranoia, and a secret lover became crucial factors.

text: yet , beneath an upbeat appearance , she is struggling desperately with the emotional and physical scars left by the attack .
translation: Namun, di sebalik penampilan yang ceria, dia berjuang dengan putus asa melawan parut emosi dan fizikal yang ditinggalkan oleh serangan itu.
back_translation: However, behind the cheerful appearance, she struggles desperately against the emotional and physical scars left by the attack.

text: each of the five patients realise their dreams individually , but ultimately they decide to choose for each other and the familiarity of their own place .
translation: Setiap daripada lima pesakit menyedari impian mereka secara individu, tetapi akhirnya mereka memutuskan untuk memilih bagi satu sama lain dan keselesaan tempat sendiri.
back_translation: Each of the five patients realized their dreams individually, but eventually decided to choose for each other and the comfort of their own place.

text: from naboo to tatooine , it grows into love for her .
translation: dari naboo ke tatooine, cintanya semakin membesar untuknya.
back_translation: From Naboo to Tatooine, her love for him grows stronger.

text: he is to build the palace and be covered in gold , if not , his fate is to be eaten by crocodiles .
translation: Dia akan membangunkan istana dan ditutup dengan emas, jika tidak, nasibnya adalah akan dimakan oleh buaya.
back_translation: He will build a palace covered in gold, if not, his fate is to be eaten by alligators.

text: if this is the danish idea of a good time , prospective tourists might want to consider a different destination -- some jolly country embroiled in a bloody civil war , perhaps .
translation: Jika ini adalah idea orang Denmark tentang masa yang baik, pelancong bakal mahu mempertimbangkan destinasi lain - mungkin sebuah negara yang riang terlibat dalam peperangan saudara yang berdarah.
back_translation: If this is Denmark's idea of a good time, tourists may want to consider other destinations - perhaps a country deeply involved in bloody civil wars.

text: that storytelling has value can not be denied . not even solondz 's thirst for controversy , sketchy characters and immature provocations can fully succeed at cheapening it .
translation: Bahawa nilai dalam menceritakan cerita tidak dapat disangkal. Malah, kehausan Solondz untuk kontroversi, watak-watak yang kabur, dan provokasi yang tidak matang tidak dapat sepenuhnya memperosokkannya.
back_translation: That the value in telling a story is undeniable. In fact, Solondz's thirst for controversy, ambiguous characters, and immature provocations cannot fully discredit it.

text: the kind of movie that seduces you into becoming putty in its manipulative card-sharking hands and making you enjoy being taken in by its shameless contrivance .
translation: Jenis filem yang menggodam anda untuk menjadi lembut dalam tangan penipuan kadnya yang manipulatif dan membuat anda menikmati diperdaya oleh kepura-puraan yang tidak berbelas kasih.
back_translation: The type of film that hacks into you to become gentle in the hands of its manipulative card fraud and makes you enjoy being deceived by heartless pretense.

text: when a cia agent is killed during a nuclear arms purchase , his partner oakes ( anthony hopkins ) , recruits his twin brother , jake hayes ( chris rock ) .
translation: Apabila seorang ejen CIA terbunuh semasa pembelian senjata nuklear, rakan sepasukannya Oakes (Anthony Hopkins), mengambil alih adik lelakinya, Jake Hayes (Chris Rock).
back_translation: When a CIA agent is killed during a nuclear weapons purchase, his partner Oakes (Anthony Hopkins) takes over his younger brother, Jake Hayes (Chris Rock).

text: . . . plays like somebody spliced random moments of a chris rock routine into what is otherwise a cliche-riddled but self-serious spy thriller .
translation: . . . bermain seperti seseorang yang menyelitkan momen acak dari rutin Chris Rock ke dalam apa yang sebaliknya merupakan cerita rahsia yang penuh dengan klise tetapi serius.
back_translation: . . . playing like someone weaving random moments from Chris Rock's routine into an otherwise clichéd but serious story full of clichés.

text: christians sensitive to a reductionist view of their lord as a luv-spreading dr . feelgood or omnipotent slacker will feel vastly more affronted than secularists , who might even praise god for delivering such an instant camp classic .
translation: Orang Kristian yang sensitif terhadap pandangan reduksi terhadap Tuhan mereka sebagai seorang doktor penebar cinta atau pemalas yang mahakuasa akan merasa jauh lebih tersinggung daripada sekularis, yang mungkin malah memuji Tuhan kerana menghasilkan sebuah karya klasik kem perkemahan dengan segera.
back_translation: Sensitive Christians towards reductionist views of their God as a loving doctor or an almighty lazy person would feel much more offended than secularists, who might even praise God for rapidly producing a classic camping equipment.

text: drank water from a spring that was actually a fountain of youth .
translation: Minum air dari mata air yang sebenarnya adalah mata air awet muda.
back_translation: Drinking water from a true spring is a fountain of youth.

text: the truth is that the truth about charlie gets increasingly tiresome .
translation: Kenyataannya ialah kebenaran tentang Charlie semakin membosankan.
back_translation: The fact is that the truth about Charlie is becoming more boring.

text: however , she got more than what she bargained for when she realised she could even see ghosts .
translation: Namun, dia mendapat lebih daripada yang dia perjuangkan apabila dia sedar bahawa dia juga boleh melihat hantu.
back_translation: However, she got more than she fought for when she realized that she could also see ghosts.

text: the trials of henry kissinger is a remarkable piece of filmmaking M-^E because you get it .
translation: Filem "The Trials of Henry Kissinger" adalah sebuah hasil pembikinan yang luar biasa kerana anda memahaminya.
back_translation: The film "The Trials of Henry Kissinger" is an extraordinary creation because you understand it.

text: pacino , connery , de nero , schwarzenegger - together on film - for the first time . . .
translation: Pacino, Connery, De Niro, Schwarzenegger - bersama dalam filem - untuk kali pertama. . .
back_translation: Pacino, Connery, De Niro, Schwarzenegger - together in a movie - for the first time...

text: . . . begins on a high note and sustains it beautifully .
translation: . . . bermula dengan nota tinggi dan mengekalkannya dengan indah.
back_translation: . . . starts with a high note and maintains it beautifully.

text: it is a journey that will take both carol and charlie to the edge of reality and force carol to face up to her terrifying destiny .
translation: Ini adalah perjalanan yang akan membawa Carol dan Charlie ke hujung realiti dan memaksa Carol menghadapi takdir menakutkan yang menanti.
back_translation: This is a journey that will take Carol and Charlie to the edge of reality and force Carol to confront the terrifying fate that awaits.

text: a twisted collision of `` barney `` `` the fisher king `` and `` serpico . ``
translation: perlanggaran yang berbelit-belit antara `` barney ``, `` the fisher king ``, dan `` serpico. ``
back_translation: The complicated collision between "barney," "the fisher king," and "serpico."

text: with films like 'mouna ragam ' , 'alaipayuthe ' and now 'kannathil muthamittal ' , maniratnam yet again proves that he is at his best when tackling human emotions and relationships .
translation: Dengan filem-filem seperti 'Mouna Ragam', 'Alaipayuthe' dan sekarang 'Kannathil Muthamittal', Maniratnam sekali lagi membuktikan bahawa beliau berada pada tahap terbaiknya apabila mengendalikan emosi manusia dan hubungan.
back_translation: With films like 'Mouna Ragam', 'Alaipayuthe', and now 'Kannathil Muthamittal', Maniratnam once again proves that he is at his best when handling human emotions and relationships.

text: what a pity . . . that the material is so second-rate .
translation: Alangkah malangnya... bahan ini sangat berkualiti rendah.
back_translation: How unfortunate... this material is of very low quality.

text: she is a very sweet girl , and they get along quite well with her .
translation: Dia adalah seorang gadis yang sangat manis, dan mereka sangat sepadan dengannya.
back_translation: She is a very sweet girl, and they are a perfect match for her.

text: annie , an alluring lady , catches the eye of old widower leoncio .
translation: Annie, seorang wanita yang memikat, menarik perhatian janda tua Leoncio.
back_translation: Annie, an enchanting woman, attracted the attention of the elderly widower Leoncio.

text: `` sumo east and west `` is a feature documentary about americans in the ancient japanese sport of sumo wrestling .
translation: "Sumo East and West" adalah sebuah dokumentari tentang orang Amerika dalam sukan sumo tradisional Jepun.
back_translation: "Sumo East and West" is a documentary about Americans in the traditional Japanese sport of sumo.

text: all the pieces in the mystery are finally starting to fit together , and the case seems almost resolved .
translation: Semua kepingan dalam misteri akhirnya mula seia sekata, dan kes tersebut nampaknya hampir selesai.
back_translation: All pieces in the mystery finally begin to fall into place, and the case seems to be almost resolved.

text: this is a story about the warm relationship between a little girl and her father despite the difficult conditions they have to live in .
translation: Ini adalah cerita tentang hubungan mesra antara seorang gadis kecil dan ayahnya walaupun dalam keadaan yang sukar mereka terpaksa hidup.
back_translation: This is a story about the close relationship between a young girl and her father even though they have to live in difficult circumstances.

text: rather than spreading good cheer , the duo 's motive is to rob each establishment , a strategy that becomes complicated when they encounter an 8-year-old who teaches them the true meaning of christmas .
translation: Daripada menyebarkan kegembiraan, motif dua individu itu adalah untuk merompak setiap premis, satu strategi yang menjadi rumit apabila mereka berdepan dengan seorang kanak-kanak berusia 8 tahun yang mengajar mereka erti sebenar Krismas.
back_translation: Instead of spreading joy, the motive of the two individuals is to rob every premise, a strategy that becomes complicated when they encounter an 8-year-old child who teaches them the true meaning of Christmas.

text: one thursday evening , their disagreements reach a fever pitch - anna is incensed that her mother does n't support her musical aspirations and tess , a widow about to remarry , ca n't see why anna wo n't give her fiance ( mark harmon ) a break .
translation: Pada sebuah petang Khamis, pertikaian mereka mencapai tahap yang memuncak - Anna marah kerana ibunya tidak menyokong aspirasi muziknya dan Tess, seorang balu yang akan berkahwin semula, tidak dapat memahami mengapa Anna tidak mahu memberikan kesempatan kepada tunangnya (Mark Harmon).
back_translation: On a Thursday evening, their conflict reached its peak - Anna was angry because her mother did not support her musical aspirations and Tess, a widow who was getting married again, could not understand why Anna did not want to give a chance to her fiancé (Mark Harmon).

text: as an added twist robert discovers upon meeting wong dai , that the evil man himself has been manipulating our protagonist in order to have him kill wong dai 's own tong members and thus , secure the ill gotten gains of wong dai 's empire of crime for himself .
translation: Dalam kejutan tambahan, Robert dapati setelah berjumpa dengan Wong Dai, bahawa lelaki jahat itu sendiri telah memanipulasi protagonis kita untuk membunuh ahli tong Wong Dai sendiri dan dengan itu, mengamankan keuntungan haram empayar jenayah Wong Dai untuk dirinya sendiri.
back_translation: In a surprising twist, Robert discovered after meeting with Wong Dai that the wicked man had manipulated our protagonist to kill Wong Dai's own tong member and thus, securing the illicit gains of Wong Dai's criminal empire for himself.

text: the problem is that the mysterious inhabitants are murderous lunatics out to kill every one of them . . .
translation: Masalahnya ialah penduduk misteri tersebut adalah gila pembunuh yang berniat untuk membunuh setiap seorang dari mereka...
back_translation: The problem is that the residents of that mysterious town are insane killers who intend to kill each and every one of them...

text: writer/director dante tomaselli merges two disturbing storylines into this visually arresting chiller .
translation: Penulis/pengarah Dante Tomaselli menyatukan dua alur cerita yang mengganggu ke dalam filem seram ini yang menarik secara visual.
back_translation: Writer/director Dante Tomaselli combines two disturbing storylines in this visually captivating horror film.

text: a small fortune in salaries and stunt cars might have been saved if the director , tom dey , had spliced together bits and pieces of midnight run and 48 hours ( and , for that matter , shrek ) .
translation: Sejumlah kecil wang dalam gaji dan kereta aksi boleh dijimatkan jika pengarah, Tom Dey, telah menyusun bersama potongan kisah Midnight Run dan 48 Hours (dan, pada keadaan itu, Shrek).
back_translation: A small amount of money from the salary and action car can be saved if the director, Tom Dey, has arranged together pieces of the stories of Midnight Run and 48 Hours (and, in that case, Shrek).

text: during the heist , the kids overcome high-tech security systems , guard dogs , and a nasty head of security to get to a bank vault suspended 100-feet above ground .
translation: Semasa rompakan, kanak-kanak tersebut berjaya mengatasi sistem keselamatan berteknologi tinggi, anjing penjaga, dan ketua keselamatan yang jahat untuk sampai ke khazanah bank yang digantung 100 kaki di atas tanah.
back_translation: During the heist, the child managed to overcome the high-tech security system, guard dogs, and the evil security chief to reach the bank vault hanging 100 feet above the ground.

text: director rob marshall went out gunning to make a great one .
translation: Pengarah Rob Marshall berusaha sekuat tenaga untuk membuat filem yang hebat.
back_translation: Director Rob Marshall is working very hard to make a great film.

text: a 19th century insane asylum is memorialized by a captivating montage of inventories , histories , and brain surgeries .
translation: Sebuah hospital mental abad ke-19 dikenang dengan kumpulan inventori yang menarik, sejarah, dan pembedahan otak.
back_translation: A 19th-century mental hospital is remembered for its interesting collection of inventories, history, and brain surgeries.

text: will anyone who is n't a fangoria subscriber be excited that it has n't gone straight to video ?
translation: Adakah sesiapa yang bukan pelanggan fangoria akan teruja bahawa filem tersebut tidak terus ke video?
back_translation: Would anyone who is not a fangoria customer be excited that the film did not immediately transition to video?

text: having given permission to male nurse greg focker to marry his daughter , ex-cia man jack byrnes and his wife travel to detroit to greg 's parents , who this time around are mr . and mrs . focker , who are as different from them as can be .
translation: Setelah memberikan kebenaran kepada jururawat lelaki, Greg Focker untuk mengahwini anak perempuannya, bekas pegawai CIA Jack Byrnes dan isterinya pergi ke Detroit untuk bertemu ibu bapa Greg, yang kali ini adalah Tuan dan Nyonya Focker, yang sangat berbeza dengan mereka.
back_translation: After giving permission to male nurse Greg Focker to marry their daughter, former CIA agent Jack Byrnes and his wife went to Detroit to meet Greg's parents, who this time are Mr. and Mrs. Focker, who are very different from them.

text: ray finds himself feeling cursed , trapped , and miserable as a parade of `` injured `` clients constantly pressure him for their money , most of which is not deserved .
translation: Ray mendapati dirinya merasa dikutuk, terperangkap, dan tidak bahagia ketika sekelompok klien "cedera" terus-menerus menekannya untuk mendapatkan uang, kebanyakan di antaranya tidak pantas.
back_translation: Ray found himself feeling cursed, trapped, and unhappy when a group of "injured" clients constantly pressured him to make money, most of which were inappropriate.

text: it 's refreshing that someone understands the need for the bad boy ; diesel , with his brawny frame and cool , composed delivery , fits the bill perfectly .
translation: Sungguh menyegarkan bahawa seseorang memahami keperluan akan lelaki jahat; diesel, dengan tubuh yang tegap dan gaya penyampaian yang keren dan tenang, sesuai dengan citarasa itu dengan sempurna.
back_translation: It is truly refreshing that someone understands the need for bad guys; diesel, with a fit body and cool and calm delivery style, fitting that taste perfectly.

text: a top secret military project hires prestigious university students to assist create a cell altering machine called the 'gammasphere ' .
translation: Sebuah projek ketenteraan rahsia mengambil bekerja pelajar universiti terkemuka untuk membantu mencipta mesin perubahan sel yang dipanggil 'gammasphere'.
back_translation: A secret military project has hired top university students to help create a cell-changing machine called 'gammasphere'.

text: the movie , despite its rough edges and a tendency to sag in certain places , is wry and engrossing .
translation: Filem itu, walaupun mempunyai keburukan dan sering mengendur di tempat tertentu, masih cerdik dan menarik.
back_translation: The movie, despite having flaws and often slackening in certain places, is still clever and engaging.

text: isabelle huppert excels as the enigmatic mika and anna mouglalis is a stunning new young talent in one of chabrol 's most intense psychological mysteries .
translation: Isabelle Huppert gemilang sebagai Mika yang misterius dan Anna Mouglalis adalah bakat muda yang memukau dalam salah satu misteri psikologi paling intens oleh Chabrol.
back_translation: Isabelle Huppert shines as the mysterious Mika and Anna Mouglalis is a captivating young talent in one of Chabrol's most intense psychological mysteries.

text: the movie starts with a legend and ends with a story that is so far-fetched it would be impossible to believe if it were n't true . this is the stuff that disney movies are made of .
translation: Filem bermula dengan sebuah legenda dan berakhir dengan sebuah cerita yang sangat sukar untuk dipercayai jika ia tidak benar. Inilah bahan yang biasa dalam filem-filem Disney.
back_translation: The film begins with a legend and ends with a story that is very difficult to believe if it is not true. This is a common material in Disney films.

text: . . . pays tribute to heroes the way julia roberts hands out awards -- with phony humility barely camouflaging grotesque narcissism .
translation: . . . memberikan penghormatan kepada wira seperti cara julia roberts memberikan anugerah - dengan kerendahan diri palsu hampir tidak dapat menyembunyikan narsisme yang menggeletar.
back_translation: ... giving honor to heroes like the way Julia Roberts presents awards - with a false humility that can hardly conceal the trembling narcissism.

text: but slowly , their teenage-son alan ( kristian horn ) got suspicious that henry is n't his father .
translation: Tetapi perlahan-lahan, anak remaja mereka Alan (Kristian Horn) menjadi curiga bahawa Henry bukan bapanya.
back_translation: However, slowly, their teenage son Alan (Kristian Horn) became suspicious that Henry was not his father.

text: in their love for each other and their ability to move on , the women are , in a way , lovely and amazing .
translation: Dalam kasih sayang mereka satu sama lain dan kebolehan mereka untuk terus maju, wanita-wanita itu, dalam satu cara, sangat indah dan menakjubkan.
back_translation: In their love for each other and their ability to keep moving forward, the women are, in a way, very beautiful and amazing.

text: this mild-mannered farce , directed by one of its writers , john c . walsh , is corny in a way that bespeaks an expiration date passed a long time ago .
translation: Farsa yang lembut ini, diarahkan oleh salah seorang penulisnya, John C. Walsh, berkonsep manis dengan cara yang mencerminkan tarikh luput yang sudah lama berlalu.
back_translation: This gentle farce, directed by one of its writers, John C. Walsh, has a sweet concept that reflects an expired deadline long past.

text: there follow three months of exhausting interrogation and isolation .
translation: Terdapat tiga bulan pemeriksaan yang meletihkan dan pengasingan.
back_translation: There are three exhausting examination months and isolation.

text: finally , the unequal lovers end up as fugitives from justice - but for how long ?
translation: Akhirnya, pasangan yang tidak sepadan berakhir sebagai buruan dari keadilan - tetapi untuk berapa lama?
back_translation: Finally, the mismatched pair ended up as prey of justice - but for how long?

text: for once the kids do n't let sam down - and they 're not likely to forget the lessons they 've learned .

translation: Kisah Annette Kellerman, bintang renang vaudeville dan filem senyap antarabangsa yang mengilhami kisah hidup klasik MGM, Million Dollar Mermaid yang dibintangi oleh Esther Williams, yang menampilkan adegan mewah Busby Berkeley.

text: by presenting an impossible romance in an impossible world , pumpkin dares us to say why either is impossible -- which forces us to confront what 's possible and what we might do to make it so .

text: proves that a movie about goodness is not the same thing as a good movie .

text: she does n't want christina to suffer as she has , so sam goes to the edge to try to save the life of this lost girl - whether she wants to be saved or not .
translation: Dia tidak mahu Christina menderita seperti dirinya, jadi Sam pergi ke hujung untuk cuba menyelamatkan nyawa gadis yang tersesat ini - sama ada dia mahu diselamatkan atau tidak.
back_translation: He did not want Christina to suffer like himself, so Sam went to great lengths to try to save the life of this lost girl - whether she wanted to be saved or not.

text: a movie that will wear you out and make you misty even when you do n't want to be .
translation: filem yang akan menguras tenaga anda dan membuatkan anda berkaca-kaca walaupun anda tidak mahu.
back_translation: a film that will drain your energy and make you teary even if you don't want to.

text: a smug and convoluted action-comedy that does n't allow an earnest moment to pass without reminding audiences that it 's only a movie .
translation: filem aksi-komedi yang sombong dan rumit yang tidak membenarkan sebarang saat tulus berlalu tanpa mengingatkan penonton bahawa ini hanyalah filem.
back_translation: an arrogant and complex action-comedy film that does not allow any genuine moment to pass without reminding the audience that this is just a film.

text: beautifully crafted and cooly unsettling . . . recreates the atmosphere of the crime expertly .
translation: Indah dipahat dan menimbulkan rasa tidak selesa dengan sangat baik . . . mencipta semula atmosfera jenayah dengan mahir.
back_translation: Beautifully carved and evokes discomfort very well... skillfully recreating a crime atmosphere.

text: apparently writer-director attal thought he need only cast himself and his movie-star wife sitting around in their drawers to justify a film .
translation: Rupanya penulis-pengarah Attal berfikir beliau hanya perlu meletakkan dirinya dan isteri bintang filemnya duduk di sekeliling dalam pakaian dalam untuk membenarkan sebuah filem.
back_translation: It seems that the writer-director Attal thought that he only needed to have himself and his film star wife sitting around in their underwear to make a film work.

text: on the bright side , it contains jesse ventura 's best work since the xfl .
translation: Di sisi yang lebih cerah, ia mengandungi hasil terbaik Jesse Ventura sejak XFL.

text: the verdict : two bodies and hardly a laugh between them .
translation: keputusan: dua mayat dan hampir tidak ada gelak tawa di antara mereka.

text: . . . with the gifted pearce on hand to keep things on semi-stable ground dramatically , this retooled machine is ultimately effective enough at achieving the modest , crowd-pleasing goals it sets for itself .
translation: . . . dengan Pearce yang berbakat di tangan untuk mengekalkan keadaan secara separa stabil secara dramatik, mesin yang diubahsuai ini pada akhirnya cukup berkesan untuk mencapai matlamat yang sederhana dan mendapat sambutan dari penonton yang ditetapkan.
back_translation: ... with Pearce's talent at hand to maintain the situation semi-stably in a dramatic way, this modified machine ultimately proved impressive enough to achieve its simple goal and received acclaim from the targeted audience.

text: like its bizarre heroine , it irrigates our souls .
translation: Seperti pahlawanane yang aneh, ia menyiram jiwa kita.

text: read my lips is to be viewed and treasured for its extraordinary intelligence and originality as well as its lyrical variations on the game of love .
translation: "Read my lips perlu dilihat dan dihargai atas kecerdasan luar biasa dan keaslian serta variasi liriknya dalam permainan cinta."
back_translation: "Read my lips needs to be seen and appreciated for its extraordinary intelligence, authenticity, and lyrical variety in the game of love."

text: unaware of the events to come , they quickly discovered that dabbling with the element of time may have dire consequences .
translation: Tidak menyedari akan peristiwa yang akan berlaku, mereka dengan cepat mengetahui bahawa mencampur aduk dengan elemen masa boleh membawa akibat yang mengerikan.

text: a perfectly acceptable , perfectly bland , competently acted but by no means scary horror movie .
translation: Filem seram yang diterima dengan baik, agak membosankan, dilakonkan dengan baik tetapi tidak langsung menakutkan.
back_translation: Well-received horror movie, somewhat boring, well-acted but not scary at all.

text: knowing his end is near , he puts out the call to his old comrade , john `` eagle eye `` pennell .

text: a happy young couple , sarah and tom ( brittany murphy and ashton kutcher ) marry against the wishes of sarah 's friends and family and go to europe for their honeymoon .

back_translation: A young happy couple, Sarah and Tom (Brittany Murphy and Ashton Kutcher), get married despite opposition from their friends and Sarah's family, and go to Europe for their honeymoon.

text: overall , this is a juicy movie but certainly not a trashy one .
translation: Secara keseluruhan, filem ini menarik tetapi pastinya bukan filem yang tidak berkualiti.

text: the change in political leaders sparks paranoia among american cia officials , so cia director bill cabot recruits a young analyst to supply insight and advice on the situation .
translation: Perubahan dalam pemimpin politik memunculkan rasa paranoia di kalangan pegawai CIA Amerika, oleh itu pengarah CIA Bill Cabot mewujudkan seorang analis muda untuk memberikan pandangan dan nasihat mengenai situasi tersebut.
back_translation: Changes in political leadership have triggered a sense of paranoia among American CIA employees, prompting CIA Director Bill Cabot to establish a young analyst to provide insight and advice on the situation.

text: though excessively tiresome , the uncertainty principle , as verbally pretentious as the title may be , has its handful of redeeming features , as long as you discount its ability to bore .
translation: Walaupun sangat meletihkan, prinsip ketidaktentuan, sepreti pretentious secara lisan seperti judulnya mungkin, mempunyai beberapa ciri-ciri yang menebus, selagi anda mengabaikan kemampuannya untuk membosankan.
back_translation: Although very exhausting, the principle of uncertainty, as pretentious as it may sound verbally like its title, has some redeeming qualities, as long as you overlook its ability to bore.

text: the plot is plastered with one hollywood cliche after another , most of which involve precocious kids getting the better of obnoxious adults .
translation: Plot tersebut diselaputi dengan satu klise Hollywood selepas yang lain, kebanyakan melibatkan kanak-kanak yang bijak mengatasi orang dewasa yang menyakitkan.
back_translation: The plot is filled with one Hollywood cliché after another, mostly involving clever children outsmarting hurtful adults.

text: one day a mysterious young man enters her world .

text: nomad explores the futility of insulating oneself from the sometimes painful reality of human interaction .
translation: Nomad meneroka kefanaan mengasingkan diri daripada realiti interaksi manusia yang kadang-kadang menyakitkan.
back_translation: Nomads explore the depths of isolating themselves from the sometimes painful reality of human interaction.

text: extreme oops - oops , ops , no matter how you spell it , it 's still a mistake to go see it .

text: what they do n't know , however , is that they 're filming near the secret hideout of slobodan pavle , a serbian war criminal .
translation: Apa yang mereka tidak tahu, bagaimanapun, ialah mereka sedang membuat filem berdekatan dengan tempat persembunyian rahsia slobodan pavle, seorang penjenayah perang Serbia.

text: frances decides to take a break and she buys a villa in the beautiful tuscan countryside and decides to begin anew .

text: everyone is sick with start-up fever ; dreaming of the power and freedom of starting their own internet company .

text: with this relation the characters will discover lot of things about their past .

text: chalk it up as the worst kind of hubristic folly .
translation: Terangkan sahaja sebagai satu bentuk kesombongan yang teruk.

text: this is a shrewd and effective film from a director who understands how to create and sustain a mood .

text: this is the sort of low-grade dreck that usually goes straight to video -- with a lousy script , inept direction , pathetic acting , poorly dubbed dialogue and murky cinematography , complete with visible boom mikes .
translation: Ini adalah jenis filem murahan yang biasanya terus ke video - dengan skrip buruk, arahan tidak cekap, lakonan yang menyedihkan, dialog yang tidak selari dengan visual dan sinematografi yang gelap, lengkap dengan mikrofon boom yang kelihatan.
back_translation: This is the kind of cheap film that usually ends up as a video - with poor scripts, ineffective direction, terrible acting, dialogues not aligning with the visuals, and dark cinematography, complete with visible boom microphones.

text: though a touch too arthouse 101 in its poetic symbolism , heaven proves to be a good match of the sensibilities of two directors .

back_translation: Although quite excessively art-house in the symbolism of its poetry, heaven proves to be a good match for the sensibilities of the two directors.

text: schaeffer has to find some hook on which to hang his persistently useless movies , and it might as well be the resuscitation of the middle-aged character .
translation: Schaeffer perlu mencari beberapa kait di mana dia boleh menggantung filem-filemnya yang selalu tidak berguna, dan mungkin lebih baik memilih untuk menghidupkan semula watak sederhana itu.
back_translation: Schaeffer needs to find some hooks where he can hang his useless films and perhaps would be better off reviving that simple character.

text: he leaves the city while searching for expression and finds a place to hide that he uses as his stage .

text: ' [ the cockettes ] provides a window into a subculture hell-bent on expressing itself in every way imaginable . '

text: he returns to chris who then sends him with the money he got from the drugs , to an old racist drunk gunrunner named harry , to buy a gun .
translation: Dia kembali kepada Chris yang kemudian menghantarnya dengan wang yang diperoleh daripada dadah, kepada seorang penjual senjata tua yang berbau rasisme dan dipengaruhi alkohol bernama Harry, untuk membeli sebatang senjata.
back_translation: He returned to Chris who then sent him with money obtained from drugs, to an old arms dealer with a racist and alcohol-influenced scent named Harry, to buy a weapon.

text: one day , butcher lee ( karen allen ) , inez 's trusted friend and an amateur mystic of sorts , reveals a vision that inez 's one true love is close by .

text: in their late twenties and tired of partying their way around the world , danish marie and irish sophie come ashore in northern scotland .
translation: Mereka berusia hampir tiga puluhan dan lelah dari berpesta di seluruh dunia, Marie dari Denmark dan Sophie dari Ireland tiba di pantai di utara Scotland.
back_translation: They are nearly in their thirties and tired of partying around the world, Marie from Denmark and Sophie from Ireland arrive at a beach in northern Scotland.

text: in the burial society , sheldon kasner , an unlikely criminal who works as a bank loan manager , infiltrates the mysterious world of the chevrah kadisha ( the jewish society that prepares bodies for burial according to ancient ritual ) in order to steal a body and fake his own death after mobsters come after him looking for two million dollars that he is accused of having stolen .
translation: Dalam masyarakat pengkebumian, Sheldon Kasner, seorang penjenayah yang tidak mungkin bekerja sebagai pengurus pinjaman bank, menyusup ke dalam dunia misteri Chevrah Kadisha (masyarakat Yahudi yang menyediakan jenazah untuk pengkebumian mengikut ritual kuno) untuk mencuri jenazah dan memalsukan kematiannya sendiri setelah pihak gangster mencarinya untuk dua juta dolar yang dituduh telah dicurinya.
back_translation: In the burial society, Sheldon Kasner, a criminal who could never work as a bank loan officer, infiltrates the mysterious world of Chevrah Kadisha (a Jewish community that provides corpses for burial according to ancient rituals) to steal a body and fake his own death after the gangsters hunt him down for two million dollars that he is accused of stealing.

text: jude law plays a leading role as inman , a wounded confederate soldier who is on a perilous journey home to his mountain community , hoping to reunite with his prewar sweetheart , ada , played by nicole kidman .
translation: Jude Law memainkan watak utama sebagai Inman, seorang tentera konfederat yang cedera yang sedang dalam perjalanan berbahaya pulang ke komuniti gunungnya, dengan harapan untuk bersatu kembali dengan teman wanita pra-perangnya, Ada, yang dilakonkan oleh Nicole Kidman.
back_translation: Jude Law plays the main character as Inman, a wounded Confederate soldier who is on a perilous journey back to his mountain community, hoping to reunite with his pre-war girlfriend, Ada, portrayed by Nicole Kidman.

text: the film is based on the true story of telecommunications genius walter l . shaw sr . and his son walter t . shaw jr . , the confessed `` dinner time burglar . ``
translation: Filem ini berdasarkan kisah benar tentang jenius telekomunikasi Walter L. Shaw Sr. dan anak lelakinya Walter T. Shaw Jr., yang mengakui sebagai "pencuri waktu makan".
back_translation: This film is based on a true story about telecommunications genius Walter L. Shaw Sr. and his son Walter T. Shaw Jr., who admitted to being "lunchtime bandits".

text: while holm is terrific as both men and hjejle quite appealing , the film fails to make the most out of the intriguing premise .
translation: Walaupun Holm hebat sebagai kedua-dua lelaki dan Hjejle cukup menarik, filem ini gagal untuk mengeksploitasi sepenuhnya premis yang menarik.

text: he also tries to cope with the recent death of his 6 year old son jacob , whose presence can still be felt in the house .

text: aspires to the cracked lunacy of the adventures of buckaroo banzai , but thanks to an astonishingly witless script ends up more like the adventures of ford fairlane .
translation: bergelora kepada kegilaan yang retak dari pengembaraan buckaroo banzai, tetapi berkat skrip yang sangat bodoh berakhir lebih seperti pengembaraan ford fairlane.

text: [ a ] n utterly charming and hilarious film that reminded me of the best of the disney comedies from the 60s .
translation: Filem yang benar-benar memukau dan lucu yang mengingatkan saya pada yang terbaik dari komedi Disney dari tahun 60-an.

text: amerika , zed and kyle are good friends until the wicked witch trasha comes along and takes kyle away .

text: they share their drugs and bodies , and beg or steal whatever they have to in order to get by .

text: when he unexpectedly leaves for a week to go skiing with his wife , lillian is dragged out on the town by her best friend , andrea .
translation: Apabila suaminya tiba-tiba pergi untuk seminggu pergi berski dengan istrinya, Lillian ditarik keluar di kota oleh sahabat karibnya, Andrea.

text: is office work really as alienating as 'bartleby ' so effectively makes it ?

text: a low-key labor of love that strikes a very resonant chord .

text: one of the theives betrays his companions and swipes the gold for himself .
translation: Salah seorang pencuri mengkhianati rakan-rakannya dan mencuri emas untuk dirinya sendiri.

text: hawke draws out the best from his large cast in beautifully articulated portrayals that are subtle and so expressive they can sustain the poetic flights in burdette 's dialogue .
translation: Hawke mengekspresikan yang terbaik dari barisan pelakonnya dengan lukisan yang indah dan halus yang begitu ekspresif sehingga mampu mengekalkan lontaran-lontaran puisi dalam dialog Burdette.
back_translation: Hawke expressed the best of his cast with beautiful and subtle paintings that were so expressive that they could maintain the poetry in Burdette's dialogues.

text: while maintaining the appearance of clinical objectivity , this sad , occasionally horrifying but often inspiring film is among wiseman 's warmest .
translation: Dengan mengekalkan penampilan objektiviti klinikal, filem ini yang sedih, kadang-kadang menakutkan tetapi sering memberi inspirasi adalah antara filem paling hangat daripada Wiseman.
back_translation: By maintaining a clinical objectivity in its portrayal, this sad, occasionally scary but often inspirational film is among Wiseman's warmest films.

text: the action sequences are fun and reminiscent of combat scenes from the star wars series .
translation: Jujukan tindakan itu menyeronokkan dan mengingatkan pada adegan pertempuran dari siri Star Wars.

text: a cheerful enough but imminently forgettable rip-off of [ besson 's ] earlier work .
translation: satu tiruan yang cukup ceria tetapi mudah dilupakan dari karya terdahulu [ Besson ].
back_translation: A cheerful but easily forgotten imitation of the previous work [Besson].

text: an impossible romance , but we root for the patronized iranian lad .
translation: Sebuah kisah cinta yang mustahil, namun kita menyokong pemuda Iran yang terpinggirkan.

text: neither revelatory nor truly edgy -- merely crassly flamboyant and comedically labored .
translation: Tidak mengungkapkan sesuatu yang signifikan atau benar-benar berani - hanya kasar secara terang-terangan dan berlebihan secara komedi.
back_translation: Not expressing anything significant or truly daring - just openly coarse and excessively comedic.

text: despite guidance from the blue fairy , and the love of his father , gepetto , a wooden puppet 's curious spirit leads him into one wild adventure after another .
translation: Walaupun mendapat panduan dari peri biru dan kasih sayang bapanya, Geppetto, semangat ingin tahu seekor patung kayu membawanya ke dalam satu petualangan liar selepas yang lain.

text: yet this highly traditional world is facing profound changes due to the postwar influx of foreign images and ideas in japanese culture .
translation: Namun, dunia tradisional ini menghadapi perubahan yang mendalam akibat daripada pencerapan imej dan idea asing pasca-perang dalam budaya Jepun.
back_translation: However, this traditional world is facing profound changes due to the assimilation of foreign images and ideas post-war in Japanese culture.

text: a young man in his early early 20 's discovers his first love is getting married so he drops everything to travel across california and stop her , with no money and no car , where he discovers life , love and secrets from his past .
translation: Seorang lelaki muda berusia awal 20-an mengetahui cinta pertamanya akan berkahwin jadi dia meninggalkan segalanya untuk mengembara merentasi California dan menghalangnya, tanpa wang dan kenderaan, di mana dia menemui kehidupan, cinta, dan rahsia dari masa lalunya.
back_translation: A young man in his early 20s discovers that his first love is getting married, so he leaves everything behind to travel across California to stop her, without money and transportation, where he finds life, love, and secrets from his past.

text: styled after vh1 's `` behind the music , `` this mockumentary profiles the rise and fall of an internet startup , called icevan . com .
translation: Diketengahkan berdasarkan program "Behind the Music" dari VH1, filem ini mengisahkan kenaikan dan kejatuhan sebuah syarikat permulaan internet yang dipanggil icevan.com.

text: the only upside to all of this unpleasantness is , given its labor day weekend upload , feardotcom should log a minimal number of hits .
translation: Sisi baik dari semua ketidakselesaan ini adalah, dengan pemuatan akhir pekan Hari Buruh, feardotcom sepatutnya mencatat jumlah klik yang minima.

text: an incredibly irritating comedy about thoroughly vacuous people . . . manages to embody the worst excesses of nouvelle vague without any of its sense of fun or energy .
translation: Sebuah komedi yang sangat menjengkelkan tentang orang-orang yang sangat kosong... berjaya mewakili keserampangan terburuk nouvelle vague tanpa sebarang perasaan keseronokan atau tenaga.

text: he lives in a motor garage with his six friends .

text: the embodiment of the very message it so modestly conveys -- it 's the accomplished little guy we fervently root for .
translation: perwataan pesanan yang begitu merendah diri - adalah si kecil yang berjaya yang kita dengan penuh semangat sokong.
back_translation: A message of such humble encouragement - it is the successful little ones that we passionately support.

text: if you act in an inverse way , you will not have the room for larger stones .
translation: Jika anda bertindak secara terbalik, anda tidak akan memiliki ruang untuk batu-batu yang lebih besar.

translation: Menawarkan 102 minit hiburan yang menyegarkan, kadang-kadang sangat lucu.

text: perhaps no greater example yet exists of the beauty achievable when one is a master of the digital aesthetic .

text: `` it 's like those monster vampire high school kind of movies , only here the monsters are jesus-freak teenagers , `` says michael stipe , the former r . e . m .

back_translation: "It's like high school vampire monster movies, but here, the monsters are teenage devotees of Jesus," said Michael Stipe, former R.E.M.

text: ultimately , quinn rescues tasha from the hands of another assassin and takes her into his protection .

text: a sweet-tempered comedy that forgoes the knee-jerk misogyny that passes for humor in so many teenage comedies .
translation: Sebuah komedi yang manis dan tidak menggunakan misogini yang terlalu cepat sebagai humor dalam banyak komedi remaja.
back_translation: A sweet comedy that doesn't resort to misogyny too quickly as humor in many teen comedies.

text: he enlists the support of other prisoners including crips , bloods and a very powerful jamaican mobster and is able to expand his drug empire .
translation: Dia mendapatkan sokongan daripada banduan-baduan lain termasuk kumpulan crips, bloods dan seorang ketua geng Jamaika yang sangat berkuasa dan berjaya mengembangkan empayar dadahnya.
back_translation: He received support from other prisoners including the groups crips, bloods, and a powerful Jamaican gang leader who successfully expanded his drug empire.

text: belongs in the too-hot-for-tv direct-to-video/dvd category , and this is why i have given it a one-star rating .
translation: Termasuk dalam kategori terlalu panas untuk TV langsung ke video / DVD, dan inilah mengapa saya memberikannya rating satu bintang.

text: as 'chick flicks ' go , this one is pretty miserable , resorting to string-pulling rather than legitimate character development and intelligent plotting .
translation: Apabila 'chick flicks' berkisar, filem ini agak menyedihkan, menggunakan cara yang kurang legit untuk pembangunan watak dan plot yang bijak.
back_translation: When it comes to 'chick flicks', this movie is quite sad, using less legitimate ways for character development and clever plots.

text: solondz may well be the only one laughing at his own joke
translation: Solondz mungkin benar-benar satu-satunya yang ketawa pada jenaka sendiri.

text: kosminsky . . . puts enough salt into the wounds of the tortured and self-conscious material to make it sting .
translation: Kosminsky. . . memberikan cukup garam ke dalam luka-luka bahan yang disiksa dan sedar diri untuk membuatnya terasa pedih.

text: almost nothing else -- raunchy and graphic as it may be in presentation -- is one-sided , outwardly sexist or mean-spirited . and in a sense , that 's a liability .
translation: Hampir tidak ada hal lain - biarpun mungkin kasarnya dan jelas dalam pemaparannya - bersifat satu pihak, secara terang seksis, atau jahat hati. Dan dalam satu perspektif, itu merupakan satu kelemahan.
back_translation: There is hardly anything else - even if it may be rough and clearly stated in its presentation - that is one-sided, blatantly sexist, or malicious. And from one perspective, that is a weakness.

text: potter begins his second year at hogwarts school of wizardry , but is warned by a mysterious creature that danger awaits him at the school .
translation: Potter memulakan tahun keduanya di sekolah sihir Hogwarts, tetapi diperingatkan oleh makhluk misteri bahawa bahaya menanti di sekolah tersebut.

text: a corrupt cia agent ( johnny depp ) who at that time , demands retribution from his worst enemy to carry out the drug lord 's uprising against the government .

text: automatically pegs itself for the straight-to-video sci-fi rental shelf .
translation: secara automatik meletakkan dirinya di rak sewa sci-fi video langsung ke rak.

text: somehow ms . griffiths and mr . pryce bring off this wild welsh whimsy .
translation: Bagaimanapun, Pn. Griffiths dan Encik Pryce berhasil membawa gaya Welsh yang liar ini dengan hebat.
back_translation: However, Ms. Griffiths and Mr. Pryce managed to bring this wild Welsh style brilliantly.

text: the three roommates have proudly scammed their way through the last four years of college and now , during the final exams , these big-men-on-campus are about to be busted by the most unlikely dude in school .
translation: Tiga orang rakan bilik dengan bangganya telah menipu jalan mereka sepanjang empat tahun terakhir di kolej dan kini, semasa peperiksaan akhir, ketiga-tiga lelaki kaya ini akan ditangkap oleh seorang pelajar paling tidak mungkin di sekolah.

text: all the amped-up tony hawk-style stunts and thrashing rap-metal ca n't disguise the fact that , really , we 've been here , done that .
translation: Semua aksi bergaya tony hawk yang dinaiktarafkan dan lagu rap-metal yang menggegar tidak dapat menyembunyikan hakikat bahawa, sebenarnya, kita sudah pernah melaluinya.
back_translation: All the upgraded Tony Hawk-style moves and the thundering rap-metal songs cannot hide the fact that, in reality, we have already been through it.

text: bielinsky 's script is slick and fiendishly clever , with seemingly a twist a minute .
translation: Skrip Bielinsky yang licin dan sangat cerdik, dengan kelihatan seperti ada kejutan setiap minit.
back_translation: Bielinsky's script is slick and very clever, with surprises apparent every minute.

text: an l . a . artist ( mark ruffalo ) with everything seemingly going for him suddenly finds a change in his life when an art curator cancels his upcoming one-man show .
translation: Seorang seniman dari L.A. (Mark Ruffalo) dengan segalanya kelihatan berjalan lancar tiba-tiba mengalami perubahan dalam hidupnya apabila seorang kurator seni membatalkan pameran tunggalnya yang akan datang.
back_translation: An artist from L.A. (Mark Ruffalo) whose life seemed to be going smoothly suddenly experiences a change when an art curator cancels his upcoming solo exhibition.

text: [ siegal ] proves that you do n't have to be a just out of film school gen-x'er to make a resonant and entertaining movie about young adults .
translation: [ siegal ] membuktikan bahawa anda tidak perlu merupakan seorang individu jen-X yang baru sahaja tamat dari sekolah filem untuk menghasilkan filem yang bermakna dan menghiburkan mengenai orang dewasa muda.
back_translation: [ siegal ] proves that you don't need to be a Gen-X individual who has just graduated from film school to produce meaningful and entertaining films about young adults.

text: opens at a funeral , ends on the protagonist 's death bed and does n't get much livelier in the three hours in between .
translation: Bermula di upacara pengebumian, berakhir di atas katil kematian protagonis dan tidak menjadi lebih ceria dalam tempoh tiga jam di antara itu.
back_translation: Starting from the funeral ceremony, it ends on the deathbed of the protagonist and doesn't become any cheerier in the three-hour period in between.

text: called `` an elegant documentary `` by sundance and `` eloquent and deeply moving `` by the la times , toyo miyatake : infinite shades of gray is a penetrating portrait of this photographer 's search for truth and beauty in a world of impermanence .
translation: Diberi gelaran 'dokumentari yang elegan' oleh Sundance dan 'cara berbicara yang indah dan mendalam' oleh LA Times, Toyo Miyatake: Infinite Shades of Gray adalah potret menembus tentang pencarian fotografer ini untuk kebenaran dan kecantikan dalam dunia ketidakkekalan.
back_translation: Dubbed as 'elegant documentary' by Sundance and 'beautiful and profound storytelling' by LA Times, Toyo Miyatake: Infinite Shades of Gray is a penetrating portrait of this photographer's search for truth and beauty in the world of impermanence.

text: it is far from the worst , thanks to the topical issues it raises , the performances of stewart and hardy , and that essential feature -- a decent full-on space battle .
translation: Ia jauh dari yang terburuk, terima kasih kepada isu-isu topikal yang dipaparkan, lakonan Stewart dan Hardy, dan ciri penting tersebut - pertempuran angkasa yang mantap.
back_translation: It's far from the worst, thanks to the topical issues presented, Stewart and Hardy's performances, and the crucial feature – the impressive space battle.

text: can martin regain his better self - and not lose paula ?
translation: Bolehkah Martin mendapatkan diri yang lebih baik - dan tidak kehilangan Paula?

text: according to eric and ami 's passive-aggressive mother who refuses to accept that her daughter is an adult ( jessica walters ) , that answer is `` yes `` .
translation: Menurut ibu pasif-agresif Eric dan Ami yang enggan menerima bahawa anak perempuannya sudah dewasa (Jessica Walters), jawapannya adalah "ya".
back_translation: According to the passive-aggressive mother, Eric and Ami, who are reluctant to accept that their daughter is already an adult (Jessica Walters), the answer is "yes".

text: successful filmmakers were asked how they balanced a family and a career .
translation: Filem pembikin yang berjaya ditanya bagaimana mereka mengimbangkan keluarga dan kerjaya.

text: a plodding look at the french revolution through the eyes of aristocrats .
translation: satu pemerhatian yang perlahan mengenai Revolusi Perancis melalui mata orang bangsawan.

text: a determined , ennui-hobbled slog that really does n't have much to say beyond the news flash that loneliness can make people act weird .
translation: usaha yang bertekad, berjalan dengan lesu yang sebenarnya tidak banyak menyuarakan selain dari berita bahawa kesepian boleh membuat orang bertindak aneh.

text: on their last night of high school life , six best friends vow to spend their spring break together .
translation: Pada malam terakhir kehidupan sekolah tinggi mereka, enam sahabat terbaik bersumpah untuk menghabiskan cuti persekolahan musim bunga bersama.

text: the farcical elements seemed too pat and familiar to hold my interest , yet its diverting grim message is a good one .
translation: Elemen-elemen yang lucu tampak terlalu mudah dan akrab untuk menarik minat saya, namun pesan kelam yang menghibur ini adalah yang baik.

text: wildly incompetent but brilliantly named half past dead -- or for seagal pessimists : totally past his prime .
translation: Sungguh tidak kompeten tetapi dinamakan dengan bijaksana "setengah mati" - atau untuk orang yang pesimis terhadap Seagal: sudah jauh dari zaman kegemilangannya.
back_translation: Truly incompetent but called wisely "half-dead" - or for those pessimistic towards Seagal: a far cry from his heyday.

text: even if the world does n't see things the way [ michael moore ] does , his questions are worth asking . M-^E and bowling for columbine benefits from his iconoclastic zeal .
translation: Walaupun dunia tidak melihat perkara dengan cara [Michael Moore], soalan-soalannya berbaloi untuk ditanyakan. M-^E dan bowling for columbine mendapat manfaat daripada semangat ikonoklastiknya.

text: the smug , oily demeanor that donovan adopts throughout the stupidly named pipe dream is just repulsive .

text: k-19 : the widowmaker is derivative , overlong , and bombastic -- yet surprisingly entertaining .
translation: k-19: the widowmaker adalah terbitan, terlalu panjang, dan bombastik - namun menarik untuk ditonton.

text: through dream manipulations and guilt , he 's able to convince hockey-masked psychopath jason which both freddy and jason sense as the perfect opportunity for a slice-and-dice job .

translation: Ini berlaku selepas serangan terhadap pasukan Taliban telah bermula.

translation: Pengenalan seorang budak kepada perbuatan melampau, pembunuhan, dan bunuh diri semuanya berlaku di dalam taman permainan terbiar.

text: even if britney spears is really cute , her movie is really bad .

text: mark me down as a non-believer in werewolf films that are not serious and rely on stupidity as a substitute for humor .
translation: Catatkan saya sebagai orang yang tidak percaya dalam filem werewolf yang tidak serius dan bergantung pada kebodohan sebagai pengganti humor.

text: perceiving his resignation as cowardice , his friends and fiancee give him four white feathers , the symbol of cowardice , but little do they know he 's actually going undercover and plans to redeem his honor .
translation: Memandang tindakannya meletakkan jawatan sebagai kelemahan, rakan-rakan dan tunangnya memberikan empat bulu putih kepadanya, lambang kelemahan, tetapi sedikit yang mereka tahu dia sebenarnya menyamar dan merancang untuk menebus kehormatannya.
back_translation: Viewing his resignation as a weakness, his friends and fiancee gave him four white feathers, a symbol of weakness, but little did they know he was actually feigning and planning to redeem his honor.

text: the fatal accident was actually choreographed by henrietta , a kervorkian wannabe , and dara and noble become henrietta 's unwitting pawns .

text: the 57-minute , color documentary feature film , wedding advice : speak now or forever hold your peace , explores contemporary american ambivalence about weddings and marriage .
translation: Filem dokumentari berwarna selama 57 minit, Wedding Advice: Speak Now or Forever Hold Your Peace, meneroka rasa ragu-ragu masyarakat Amerika kontemporari tentang perkahwinan dan perkahwinan.
back_translation: A 57-minute color documentary film, Wedding Advice: Speak Now or Forever Hold Your Peace, explores the contemporary American society's ambivalence towards marriage and weddings.

text: australia : land beyond time is an enjoyable big movie primarily because australia is a weirdly beautiful place .
translation: Australia: Tanah di luar masa adalah filem besar yang menyeronokkan terutamanya kerana Australia adalah tempat yang indah secara aneh.

text: some body smacks of exhibitionism more than it does cathartic truth telling .

text: later on , when frode is safely tucked in bed , something is stirring in the closet , because that little monster puppet is no ordinary puppet .
translation: Kemudian, apabila Frode selamat diselimuti di atas katil, sesuatu bergerak di dalam almari, kerana patung monsternya itu bukanlah patung biasa.

text: another story follows the relationship between a stepfather ( neeson ) and his young stepson .
translation: Kisah lain menceritakan hubungan antara seorang bapa tiri (Neeson) dan anak tirinya yang masih muda.

text: colson comes to live with them , an injection of danger in the form of a strange , silent houseguest with haunted eyes and odd habits .
translation: Colson datang untuk tinggal bersama mereka, sebuah suntikan bahaya dalam bentuk tetamu rumah yang aneh, pendiam, dengan mata yang diganggu dan tabiat aneh.
back_translation: Colson came to stay with them, a dangerous injection in the form of a strange, quiet house guest, with disturbing eyes and peculiar habits.

text: a young man shares his mantra and imagines innocent beauty as he reflects upon his lonely , mundane existence .
translation: Seorang pemuda berkongsi mantranya dan membayangkan keindahan yang suci ketika dia merenungkan kehidupan kesunyian dan menjemukan yang dihadapinya.
back_translation: A young man shares his mantra and imagines the sacred beauty as he contemplates the solitude and tedium of his life.

text: smart and alert , thirteen conversations about one thing is a small gem .
translation: Pintar dan peka, tiga belas perbualan mengenai satu perkara adalah permata kecil.
back_translation: Smart and sensitive, thirteen conversations about one thing are little gems.

text: they 're just a couple of cops in copmovieland , these two , but in narc , they find new routes through a familiar neighborhood .
translation: Mereka hanyalah sepasang polis di 'copmovieland', kedua-duanya, tetapi dalam 'narc', mereka menjumpai laluan baru melalui kawasan yang dikenali.
back_translation: They are just a pair of cops in 'copmovieland', both of them, but in 'narc,' they find a new path through the familiar territory.

text: the rich performances by friel -- and especially williams , an american actress who becomes fully english -- round out the square edges .
translation: persembahan yang hebat oleh Friel - dan khususnya Williams, seorang pelakon wanita Amerika yang menjadi sepenuhnya berbahasa Inggeris - melengkapkan tepi-tepi segi empat.
back_translation: A great performance by Friel - and particularly Williams, an American female actor who is fully English-speaking - completes the edges of the square.

text: they decide that the path to true love is to purposely set each other up on `` extreme dates `` with the objects of their affections .
translation: Mereka memutuskan bahawa jalan ke arah cinta sejati adalah dengan sengaja mengatur kencan-kencan "ekstrem" satu sama lain dengan objek kasih mereka.
back_translation: They decided that the path to true love is intentionally setting up "extreme" dates with their objects of affection.

text: purpo $ e is the story of young internet entrepreneur , john elias .
translation: Purpo $ e adalah kisah seorang usahawan internet muda, John Elias.
back_translation: "Purpose" is the story of a young internet entrepreneur, John Elias.

text: while tattoo borrows heavily from both seven and the silence of the lambs , it manages to maintain both a level of sophisticated intrigue and human-scale characters that suck the audience in .
translation: Walaupun tatu menumpukan banyak pada kedua-dua filem Seven dan The Silence of the Lambs, ia berjaya mengekalkan tahap daya tarikan yang sofistikated dan watak-watak berskala manusia yang menarik penonton.
back_translation: Even though the tattoo focuses heavily on both Seven and The Silence of the Lambs films, it successfully maintains a sophisticated level of appeal and interesting human-scaled characters that captivate viewers.

text: not just any dress , this is a 1930s parisian ball gown , and the two women 's respective desires for it are played out to a comical through bitter end .
translation: Bukan sekadar pakaian biasa, ini adalah gaun malam Paris pada tahun 1930, dan keinginan kedua wanita itu untuk gaun tersebut dimainkan hingga akhir yang lucu namun pahit.
back_translation: Not just ordinary clothes, this is a Paris evening gown from 1930, and the two women's desire for the dress played out until the funny yet bitter end.

text: even the finest chef ca n't make a hotdog into anything more than a hotdog , and robert de niro ca n't make this movie anything more than a trashy cop buddy comedy .
translation: Walau sehebat mana sekalipun chef itu, dia tidak boleh membuat hotdog menjadi lebih daripada hotdog, dan Robert De Niro tidak dapat membuat filem ini menjadi lebih daripada satu komedi polis yang tidak berkualiti.
back_translation: No matter how great the chef is, he cannot make a hotdog more than a hotdog, and Robert De Niro cannot make this film more than a low-quality police comedy.

text: the hilarity belies the poignancy of truth and love and the laughter is punctuated with honesty , tenderness and pain .
translation: Kelucuan mengaburkan keunggulan kebenaran dan kasih sayang, dan gelak tersedu dengan kejujuran, kelembutan, dan kesakitan.
back_translation: Humor blurs the excellence of truth and love, and laughter mixes with honesty, gentleness, and pain.

text: she works at a pet clinic and lives alone with her only `` true friend `` ; a doll her mother gave her when she was a little girl .
translation: Dia bekerja di klinik haiwan dan tinggal sendirian dengan satu-satunya "kawan sejati"nya; seorang patung yang diberikan oleh ibunya ketika dia masih kecil.
back_translation: She works at an animal clinic and lives alone with her only "true friend"; a statue given by her mother when she was young.

text: exquisitely nuanced in mood tics and dialogue , this chamber drama is superbly acted by the deeply appealing veteran bouquet and the chilling but quite human berling .
translation: Dengan nuansa mood dan dialog yang sangat halus, drama bilik ini dilakonkan dengan cemerlang oleh bunga veteran yang menarik dan berling yang sejuk tetapi sangat manusiawi.
back_translation: With subtle mood and dialogue nuances, this room drama is brilliantly performed by captivating and cool but very humane veteran actors.

text: in all , the film examines a destructive relationship that struggles with even the simplest decisions .
translation: Secara keseluruhan, filem ini mengkaji sebuah hubungan yang merosakkan yang berjuang dengan keputusan yang paling mudah sekalipun.
back_translation: Overall, this film explores a damaging relationship struggling with even the simplest of decisions.

text: imperfect ? yes , but also intriguing and honorable , a worthwhile addition to a distinguished film legacy .
translation: Tidak sempurna? Ya, tetapi juga menarik dan mulia, merupakan tambahan berharga kepada warisan filem yang mulia.
back_translation: Not perfect? Yes, but also interesting and noble, is a valuable addition to the noble film heritage.

text: the year 2002 has conjured up more coming-of-age stories than seem possible , but take care of my cat emerges as the very best of them .
translation: Tahun 2002 telah melahirkan lebih banyak cerita perkembangan dewasa daripada yang mungkin, tetapi Take Care of My Cat muncul sebagai yang terbaik di antara mereka.
back_translation: The year 2002 has generated more stories of adult development than possibly, but Take Care of My Cat emerges as the best among them.

text: harry , it turns out , is a parsel-tongue .
translation: Harry, rupanya, adalah seorang Parsel-lidah.

text: john connor ( nick stahl ) is living in the streets as a hacker .
translation: John Connor (Nick Stahl) tinggal di jalanan sebagai seorang penggodam.
back_translation: John Connor (Nick Stahl) lives on the streets as a hacker.

text: looking at the posters for blue crush , which show bosworth , rodriguez and lake posing with bikinis and surfboards , i expected another mindless surfing movie . blue crush is anything but .

text: oh yes , and there are no rules in the game .

text: watching trouble every day , at least if you do n't know what 's coming , is like biting into what looks like a juicy , delicious plum on a hot summer day and coming away with your mouth full of rotten pulp and living worms .
translation: Menonton masalah setiap hari, sekurang-kurangnya jika anda tidak tahu apa yang akan berlaku, sama seperti menggigit apa yang kelihatan seperti buah plum yang juicy dan lazat pada hari panas musim panas dan mendapati mulut anda penuh dengan isi buah yang reput dan cacing hidup.
back_translation: Facing problems every day, at least if you don't know what will happen, is like biting into what looks like a juicy and delicious plum on a hot summer day, only to find your mouth full of rotten fruit and live worms.

text: in a classic homage to chinese martial arts films , he is involved in intense hand to hand combat including sword fighting , guns , car chases , and other ingenious forms of fighting to mame and kill these tong members .
