back_translation: As a classic homage to Chinese martial arts films, she is involved in intense hand-to-hand combat including sword fighting, gun battles, chase scenes, and other clever forms of fighting to injure and kill the members of this criminal gang.

text: it finds its moviegoing pleasures in the tiny events that could make a person who has lived her life half-asleep suddenly wake up and take notice .

text: there 's no doubting that this is a highly ambitious and personal project for egoyan , but it 's also one that , next to his best work , feels clumsy and convoluted .

text: what lee does so marvelously compelling is present brown as a catalyst for the struggle of black manhood in restrictive and chaotic america . . . sketchy but nevertheless gripping portrait of jim brown , a celebrated wonder in the spotlight
translation: Apa yang Lee lakukan dengan begitu memukau adalah mempersembahkan Brown sebagai katalisator bagi perjuangan maskuliniti kaum hitam di Amerika yang terbatas dan kacau. . . gambaran yang kabur tetapi tetap menarik tentang Jim Brown, seorang keajaiban yang terkenal dalam sorotan:utf-8 Rujukan.
back_translation: What makes Lee's work so captivating is his presentation of Brown as a catalyst for the limited and chaotic struggle of black men's masculinity in America. . . a blurry but still fascinating depiction of Jim Brown, a renowned figure in the spotlight:utf-8 Reference.

text: a close acquaintance overhears their conversation , and , promised a fee , reports the win to max ( david winburn ) , smooth-talking but deadly leader of a hoodlum gang , who sends his beautiful paramour , cindy ( kelly taylor ) , to seduce jose , if necessary , to get her hands on the winning ticket .
translation: Seorang kenalan rapat mendengar perbualan mereka, dan, dengan janji bayaran, melaporkan kemenangan kepada Max (David Winburn), ketua geng berandal yang lancar bicara tetapi mematikan, yang menghantar kekasih jelita beliau, Cindy (Kelly Taylor), untuk merayu Jose, jika perlu, untuk mendapatkan pegangan pada tiket yang menang.
back_translation: A close acquaintance overheard their conversation and, for a promise of payment, reported the victory to Max (David Winburn), the smooth-talking but deadly leader of the gang, who sent his beautiful lover, Cindy (Kelly Taylor), to seduce Jose, if necessary, to get a hold of the winning ticket.

text: enough is not a bad movie , just mediocre . the performances are so overstated , the effect comes off as self-parody .

text: the film has a few cute ideas and several modest chuckles but it is n't exactly kiddie-friendlyM-^E alas , santa is more ho-hum than ho-ho-ho and the snowman ( who never gets to play that flute ) has all the charm of a meltdown .
translation: Filem tersebut mempunyai beberapa idea yang comel dan beberapa ketawaan yang sederhana tetapi tidak betul-betul mesra kanak-kanak. Malangnya, Santa lebih biasa daripada riuh-riuh dan snowman (yang tidak pernah dapat bermain seruling) mempunyai daya tarikan seumpama keadaan cecair.
back_translation: The movie has some cute ideas and a few light laughs, but it's not really kid-friendly. Unfortunately, Santa is more ordinary than jolly and the snowman (who can never play the flute) has a charm like a liquid state.

text: despite all evidence to the contrary , this clunker has somehow managed to pose as an actual feature movie , the kind that charges full admission and gets hyped on tv and purports to amuse small children and ostensible adults .
translation: Walaupun semua bukti menunjukkan sebaliknya, kereta usang ini bagaimanapun berjaya berpura-pura sebagai filem ciri sebenar, jenis yang mengecas bayaran penuh masuk dan mendapat promosi di tv serta berwangannya untuk menghiburkan kanak-kanak kecil dan orang dewasa yang seolah-olah.

text: we 've seen it all before in one form or another , but director hoffman , with great help from kevin kline , makes us care about this latest reincarnation of the world 's greatest teacher .

text: frank capra played this story straight . but the 2002 film does n't really believe in it , and breaks the mood with absurdly inappropriate 'comedy ' scenes .

text: change up is a documentary that follows the lives of best friends , rafael `` pepey `` rodriguez , and alex sosa , two hard throwing pitchers from the economically poor , but baseball rich island of the dominican republic .
translation: Change Up adalah sebuah dokumentari yang mengikuti kehidupan sahabat karib, Rafael "Pepey" Rodriguez, dan Alex Sosa, dua pemain lempar handal dari pulau Republik Dominika yang miskin secara ekonomi tetapi kaya akan baseball.
back_translation: "Change Up" is a documentary that follows the lives of close friends, Rafael "Pepey" Rodriguez, and Alex Sosa, two skilled baseball pitchers from the economically poor island of the Dominican Republic, but rich in baseball.

text: nearly a decade after skynet sent back the t-1000 , john connor faces a female terminator , the t-x , with power over all machines .
translation: Hampir satu dekad selepas Skynet menghantar T-1000, John Connor berdepan dengan terminator betina, T-X, yang mempunyai kuasa ke atas semua mesin.

text: the chateau has one very funny joke and a few other decent ones , but all it amounts to is a mildly funny , sometimes tedious , ultimately insignificant film .

text: dealing with the aftermath of the 'accident ' brings out the best and the worst in them .

text: a magnificent conjuring act , an eerie historical mirage evoked in a single sweeping wave of the hand by alexander sokurov .

text: a wonderfully speculative character study that made up for its rather slow beginning by drawing me into the picture .

text: kyle goes back to darkness falls to face his past , and the woman in the porceline mask ( aka the tooth fairy ) chance barron , a has-been `` cock-rock `` front-man , has wasted nearly eight years of his life working a dead-end job at softwipe incorporated , the world 's second largest manufacturer/distributor of double-plied toliet paper , but things change drastically for mr . barron when he receives a mysterious watch which counts down the number of days he has left to live .
translation: Kyle kembali ke Darkness Falls untuk menghadapi masa lalunya, dan wanita dalam topeng porselin (juga dikenali sebagai Tooth Fairy). Chance Barron, seorang 'cock-rock' yang sudah tidak terkenal, telah membazirkan hampir lapan tahun hidupnya bekerja di pekerjaan tanpa masa depan di Softwipe Incorporated, pengeluar/pembekal kertas tandas lipat dua terbesar kedua di dunia, tetapi segalanya berubah secara mendadak untuk Encik Barron apabila beliau menerima jam misteri yang mengira mundur bilangan hari yang tinggal sebelum beliau meninggal.
back_translation: Kyle returns to Darkness Falls to confront his past, and the woman in the porcelain mask (also known as the Tooth Fairy). Chance Barron, a former 'cock-rock' star, has wasted nearly eight years of his life working in a dead-end job at Softwipe Incorporated, the world's second largest producer/supplier of folded toilet paper, but everything suddenly changes for Mr. Barron when he receives a mysterious clock that counts down the number of days left before he dies.

text: the second chapter of the harry potter series is even more magical than the first and simply the best family film of the year .
translation: Bab dua siri Harry Potter lebih magis daripada yang pertama dan merupakan filem keluarga terbaik tahun ini.
back_translation: The second installment of the Harry Potter series is more magical than the first and is the best family film of the year.

text: behind the snow games and lovable siberian huskies ( plus one sheep dog ) , the picture hosts a parka-wrapped dose of heart .
translation: Di sebalik permainan salji dan anjing Siberia Husky yang boleh dibilang comel (ditambah dengan seekor anjing biri-biri), gambar itu menyimpan dosa kasih yang dibalut dalam parka.
back_translation: Behind the game of snow and the Siberian Husky dogs that can be said to be cute (plus a lamb), the picture holds a sin of love wrapped in a parka.

text: singer patricia paradise ( dee wallace stone ) has everything : beauty , fame , success , money . . .
translation: Penyanyi Patricia Paradise (Dee Wallace Stone) mempunyai segalanya: kecantikan, kemasyhuran, kejayaan, wang...
back_translation: Singer Patricia Paradise (Dee Wallace Stone) has everything: beauty, fame, success, money...

text: what if jesus were born in the year 2002 to a young jewish couple in new york city , instead of bethlehem two millennia ago ?
translation: Bagaimana jika Yesus dilahirkan pada tahun 2002 kepada sepasang pasangan Yahudi muda di bandar New York, bukannya di Bethlehem dua ribu tahun yang lalu?
back_translation: What if Jesus was born in the year 2002 to a young Jewish couple in the city of New York, instead of in Bethlehem two thousand years ago?

text: exploits [ headbanger ] stereotypes in good fun , while adding a bit of heart and unsettling subject matter .
translation: Memanfaatkan stereotaip [ headbanger ] dengan cara yang menyeronokkan, sambil menambahkan sedikit sentuhan emosi dan kandungan subjek yang mengganggu.
back_translation: Leveraging the [headbanger] stereotype in a fun way, while adding a touch of emotion and disturbing subject matter.

text: leading his army of women into the surrounding mountain glens , dionysus casts a spell on the city 's females , who abandon their husbands and fathers in order to engage in forbidden revels .
translation: Memimpin pasukannya wanita ke dalam lembah-lembah gunung sekitar, Dionysus melemparkan mantra kepada wanita-wanita di bandar tersebut, yang meninggalkan suami dan bapa mereka untuk terlibat dalam perayaan terlarang.
back_translation: Leading his army of women into the mountain valleys around, Dionysus cast a spell on the women in the town, causing them to abandon their husbands and fathers to partake in forbidden celebrations.

text: the fictional characters become part of the creators world as they appear on the subway with them , imagination becomes reality .
translation: Watak-watak rekaan menjadi sebahagian dunia pencipta apabila mereka muncul di dalam kereta bawah tanah bersama-sama mereka, imaginasi menjadi kenyataan.
back_translation: The fictional characters become part of the creator's world when they appear in the subway train with them, imagination becomes reality.

text: carefully crafted , notably in its deft dramatic structuring , and has become timely in a way its maker could never have anticipated .
translation: Telah dirancang dengan teliti, terutamanya dalam struktur dramatiknya yang mahir, dan telah menjadi relevan pada cara yang pembuatnya tidak pernah dapat ramal.
back_translation: It has been meticulously designed, especially in its skillful dramatic structure, and has remained relevant in ways its creators could never have predicted.

text: a comedic short about a man flying through mexico who despite not speaking the language meets a pretty girl only to juggle his attention between her and the world 's worst case of 'montezuma 's revenge ' .
translation: Sebuah komedi pendek tentang seorang lelaki yang terbang melalui Mexico yang walaupun tidak fasih berbahasa, berjumpa dengan seorang gadis cantik tetapi terpaksa menghadapi perhatiannya antara gadis itu dan kes terburuk 'balas dendam Montezuma'.
back_translation: A short comedy about a man flying through Mexico who, despite not being fluent in the language, meets a beautiful girl but has to deal with his attention between the girl and the worst case of 'Montezuma's revenge'.

text: for all its violence , the movie is remarkably dull with only caine making much of an impression .
translation: Walaupun penuh dengan keganasan, filem ini agak membosankan dengan hanya Caine yang memberi kesan yang banyak.
back_translation: Despite being full of violence, this movie is quite boring with only Caine making a significant impact.

text: follows the original film virtually scene for scene and yet manages to bleed it almost completely dry of humor , verve and fun .
translation: Mengikuti filem asal hampir secara keseluruhan dan namun berjaya menghilangkan hampir keseluruhan humor, semangat, dan keseronokan.
back_translation: Following the original movie almost entirely but successfully removing almost all of the humor, spirit, and fun.

text: after an ultimatum from his girlfriend tara ( alison eastwood ) , johnny finally commits to a `` real `` job in the construction business , but is soon miserable there .
translation: Setelah mendapat ultimatum dari kekasihnya Tara (Alison Eastwood), Johnny akhirnya bersetuju untuk bekerja dalam bidang pembinaan yang "sebenar", tetapi tidak lama selepas itu dia menjadi sangat tidak berpuas hati.
back_translation: After receiving an ultimatum from his girlfriend Tara (Alison Eastwood), Johnny finally agrees to work in the "real" construction field, but shortly after that, he becomes very dissatisfied.

text: while certainly more naturalistic than its australian counterpart , amari 's film falls short in building the drama of lilia 's journey .
translation: Walaupun lebih naturalistik daripada rakan sejawatnya di Australia, filem Amari gagal dalam membangunkan dramatik perjalanan Lilia.
back_translation: Although more naturalistic than its counterparts in Australia, the film Amari fails to develop the dramatic journey of Lilia.

text: despite dire warnings from his uncle , dean is seduced by the book 's knowledge .
translation: Walaupun amaran yang serius dari bapa saudaranya, Dean terpesona dengan pengetahuan buku tersebut.
back_translation: Despite the serious warning from his brother's father, Dean is captivated by the knowledge in the book.

text: keith bennets ( mark thompson ) mother passed away a year ago , and he feels like he has moved on with his life , until one morning his mothers jewellery shows up on keiths bathroom sink .
translation: Ibu Keith Bennet (Mark Thompson) meninggal setahun yang lalu, dan dia merasa seperti telah melangkah maju dengan hidupnya, sehingga suatu pagi perhiasan ibunya muncul di atas wastafel kamar mandi Keith.
back_translation: Keith Bennet's mother (Mark Thompson) passed away a year ago, and she felt like she had moved forward with her life, until one morning her mother's jewelry appeared on the bathroom sink.

text: despite the predictable parent vs . child coming-of-age theme , first-class , natural acting and a look at `` the real americans `` make this a charmer .
translation: Walaupun tema yang dapat diramalkan mengenai hubungan ibu bapa dan anak semasa dewasa pertama, lakonan yang berkualiti tinggi dan semulajadi serta pemerhatian terhadap "orang Amerika sebenar" menjadikan filem ini menarik.
back_translation: Although the predictable theme of parent-child relationships in early adulthood, the high-quality and natural acting, along with the observation of "real Americans," make this film intriguing.

text: as it abruptly crosscuts among the five friends , it fails to lend the characters ' individual stories enough dramatic resonance to make us care about them .
translation: Apabila cerita melompat-lompat di antara kelima sahabat tersebut dengan tiba-tiba, ia gagal memberi cerita individu setiap watak keharmonian dramatik yang mencukupi untuk membuat kita peduli terhadap mereka.
back_translation: When the story jumps between the five friends suddenly, it fails to provide each character with sufficient dramatic harmony to make us care about them.

text: a film so terrifying - even the monsters are frightened !
translation: filem yang sangat menakutkan - sehingga makhluk pun takut!
back_translation: a very scary movie - even creatures are scared!

text: romy dispenses orders like a drill sergeant as they scramble southwest to round up the last two surviving members of eagle 's wwii , b-17 bomber crew .
translation: Romy mengarahkan pesanan seperti seorang sersan berlatih ketika mereka bergegas ke arah barat daya untuk mengumpulkan dua anggota terakhir yang masih hidup dari kru pembom B-17 zaman Perang Dunia II.
back_translation: Romy directed the orders like a sergeant in training as they rushed to the southwest to gather the last two surviving members of the B-17 bomber crew from World War II era.

text: at best , cletis tout might inspire a trip to the video store -- in search of a better movie experience .
translation: Pada tahap terbaik, Cletis Tout mungkin menginspirasikan perjalanan ke kedai video - mencari pengalaman menonton filem yang lebih baik.
back_translation: At its best, Cletis Tout could inspire a trip to the video store - seeking a better movie-watching experience.

text: for a movie about the power of poetry and passion , there is precious little of either .
translation: Untuk filem tentang kuasa puisi dan semangat, terdapat sedikit sekali elemen tersebut.
back_translation: For a film about the power of poetry and spirit, there are very few elements of it.

text: he also shies away from the shallow young women that he and his friends micke and mario meet at bars .
translation: Dia juga enggan berurusan dengan wanita muda yang dangkal yang dia dan rakan-rakannya Micke dan Mario jumpai di bar.
back_translation: He also does not want to deal with shallow young women that he and his friends Micke and Mario encountered at the bar.

text: the story is set against a relationship that forms between a runaway american teenage boy and a brazilian teenage girl who meet in the drug and gang controlled slums of rio de janeiro .
translation: Kisah ini bertempat di atas hubungan yang terjalin antara seorang remaja lelaki Amerika yang melarikan diri dan seorang remaja perempuan Brasil yang bertemu di kawasan kumuh yang dikuasai oleh dadah dan geng di Rio de Janeiro.
back_translation: This story is about the relationship that develops between an American teenage boy who is on the run and a Brazilian teenage girl who meet in a drug and gang-controlled slum area in Rio de Janeiro.

text: you will emerge with a clearer view of how the gears of justice grind on and the death report comes to share airtime alongside the farm report .
translation: Anda akan muncul dengan pandangan yang lebih jelas tentang bagaimana gear keadilan bergulir dan laporan kematian datang untuk berkongsi waktu siaran bersama laporan ladang.
back_translation: You will emerge with a clearer view of how the gears of justice turn and death reports come to share airtime with field reports.

text: occupied france 1944 : in the castle , their local headquarters , the german officers decide to organize a party .
translation: Perancis yang diduduki 1944: Di istana, markas tempatan mereka, para pegawai Jerman memutuskan untuk menganjurkan sebuah parti.
back_translation: France, which was occupied in 1944: In the palace, their local headquarters, the German officials decided to organize a party.

text: but the memories of their time together lingers inside their hearts .
translation: tetapi kenangan masa mereka bersama masih melekat di dalam hati mereka.
back_translation: But the memories of their time together still linger in their hearts.

text: kids who are into this thornberry stuff will probably be in wedgie heaven . anyone else who may , for whatever reason , be thinking about going to see this movie is hereby given fair warning .
translation: Kanak-kanak yang suka dengan perkara Thornberry ini mungkin akan berada di syurga wedgie. Sesorang yang lain yang mungkin, atas sebab apa pun, sedang memikirkan untuk pergi menonton filem ini adalah diberikan amaran yang adil.
back_translation: Children who enjoy Thornberry things might be in wedgie heaven. Anyone else who is considering going to watch this movie for any reason is given a fair warning.

text: however , after an inexplicable letter arrives , any signs of normalcy in his life begin to fade .
translation: Walau bagaimanapun, selepas surat yang tidak dapat dijelaskan tiba, sebarang tanda kehidupan normal dalam hidupnya mula pudar.
back_translation: However, after the unexplainable letter arrived, any signs of normal life in his life began to fade.

text: jonathan ecks ( antonio banderas ) , an fbi agent , realizes that he must join with his lifelong enemy , agent sever ( lucy liu ) , a rogue dia agent with whom he is in mortal combat , in order to defeat a common enemy .
translation: Jonathan Ecks (Antonio Banderas), seorang ejen FBI, sedar bahawa dia perlu bergabung dengan musuh seumur hidupnya, ejen Sever (Lucy Liu), seorang ejen DIA yang derhaka dengannya dalam pertempuran mematikan, untuk menumpaskan musuh bersama.
back_translation: Jonathan Ecks (Antonio Banderas), an FBI agent, realizes that he needs to team up with his lifelong nemesis, agent Sever (Lucy Liu), a rogue DIA agent who betrayed him in a deadly battle, to crush a common enemy.

text: completely creatively stillborn and executed in a manner that i 'm not sure could be a single iota worse . . . a soulless hunk of exploitative garbage .
translation: Sepenuhnya mati secara kreatif dan dilaksanakan dengan cara yang saya tidak pasti boleh menjadi lebih teruk sedikit pun... sebongkah sampah yang kejam dan tanpa jiwa.
back_translation: Completely creatively dead and executed in a way that I am unfamiliar may become even worse a little bit... a cruel and soulless piece of garbage.

text: as animation increasingly emphasizes the computer and the cool , this is a film that takes a stand in favor of tradition and warmth .
translation: Apabila animasi semakin menekankan komputer dan gaya keren, filem ini mengambil pendirian bagi tradisi dan kehangatan.
back_translation: As the animation increasingly emphasizes computers and cool styles, this film takes a stand for tradition and warmth.

text: the characters , cast in impossibly contrived situations , are totally estranged from reality .
translation: Watak-watak yang terlibat dalam situasi yang mustahil direka ini benar-benar terasing daripada realiti.
back_translation: The characters involved in this impossible situation are truly alienated from reality.

text: in the end , white oleander is n't an adaptation of a novel . it 's a flashy , star-splashed reduction .
translation: Pada akhirnya, white oleander bukanlah adaptasi sebuah novel. Ia adalah sebuah penyederhanaan yang berkilauan dengan bintang.
back_translation: In the end, white oleander is not an adaptation of a novel. It is a shining simplification with stars.

text: guaranteed to move anyone who ever shook , rattled , or rolled .
translation: pasti menggerakkan sesiapa sahaja yang pernah bergoyang, menggeletek, atau berguling.
back_translation: It will surely move anyone who has ever swayed, grooved, or rolled.

text: will tom be able to persuade his naturally cautious and terminally confused fianc & # 233 ; e to work through all the damage and chaos ?
translation: Adakah Tom akan dapat meyakinkan tunangnya yang berhati-hati secara semulajadi dan selalu keliru untuk menyelesaikan segala kerosakan dan kekacauan?
back_translation: Will Tom be able to convince his naturally cautious and always confused fiancée to solve all problems and mess?

text: when fran , ( paige turco ) walks into the prop house where he lives looking for unusual objects , chep immediately develops a crush .
translation: Apabila Fran, (Paige Turco) masuk ke rumah aksesoris di mana dia tinggal mencari objek yang tidak biasa, Chep dengan segera jatuh cinta.
back_translation: When Fran (Paige Turco) enters the accessory house where she resides in search of unusual objects, Chep immediately falls in love.

text: the first question to ask about bad company is why anthony hopkins is in it . we assume he had a bad run in the market or a costly divorce , because there is no earthly reason other than money why this distinguished actor would stoop so low .
translation: Soalan pertama yang perlu ditanya tentang syarikat yang buruk ialah mengapa Anthony Hopkins ada di dalamnya. Kami menganggap beliau mengalami masa yang sukar di pasaran atau perceraian yang memakan kos tinggi, kerana tidak ada sebab dunia selain wang mengapa pelakon terkemuka ini akan menghina diri begitu rendah.
back_translation: The first question that needs to be asked about a bad company is why Anthony Hopkins is involved in it. We assume he is going through tough times in the market or a costly divorce, because there is no reason in the world other than money why this prominent actor would degrade himself so low.

text: upon arriving in los reyes , the ambitious father amaro meets amelia , a beautiful 16-year-old girl whose religious devotion soon becomes helplessly entangles in a growing attraction to the new priest .
translation: Setibanya di Los Reyes, bapa yang bercita-cita tinggi, Amaro, bertemu dengan Amelia, seorang gadis cantik berusia 16 tahun yang keinsafan agamanya segera terjebak dalam tarikan yang semakin membesar terhadap paderi baru.
back_translation: Upon arriving in Los Reyes, the ambitious father, Amaro, meets Amelia, a beautiful 16-year-old girl whose religious consciousness gets entangled in the growing attraction towards the new priest.

text: a gratingly unfunny groaner littered with zero-dimensional , unlikable characters and hackneyed , threadbare comic setups .
translation: sebuah jenaka yang sangat tidak lucu yang dipenuhi dengan watak-watak yang tidak mempunyai dimensi dan tidak disukai serta plot komedi yang usang dan klise.
back_translation: A very unfunny joke filled with characters lacking dimension and unlikeable, with outdated and cliché comedy plot.

text: as the geological fracture deepens and widens , the european community begins to disassociate itself from the calamity , and panic ensues among tourists and residents attempting to escape .
translation: Apabila retakan geologi semakin mendalam dan melebar, masyarakat Eropah mula menjauhkan diri daripada bencana tersebut, dan panik merebak di kalangan pelancong dan penduduk yang cuba melarikan diri.
back_translation: As geological cracks deepen and widen, European communities begin to distance themselves from the disaster, and panic spreads among tourists and residents trying to escape.

text: unfortunately , the experience of actually watching the movie is less compelling than the circumstances of its making .
translation: Malangnya, pengalaman menonton filem sebenarnya kurang menarik berbanding keadaan pembuatannya.
back_translation: Unfortunately, the experience of watching the movie is actually less interesting compared to its production.

text: set against the bright lights of manhattan , a tale which takes a comic , urbane look at the modern male ego at war in the singles scene trenches .
translation: Dihadapi dengan cahaya terang Manhattan, sebuah cerita yang memberikan pandangan lucu dan beradab terhadap ego lelaki moden dalam medan perang dunia bujang.
back_translation: Faced with the bright lights of Manhattan, a story that provides a funny and cultured insight into the modern male ego on the battlefield of the bachelor world.

text: but before he is able to set out on his expedition , the professor , along with the tablet , are taken hostage by a group of mercenaries , led by the vicious philipe gallo .
translation: Tetapi sebelum dia dapat memulakan ekspedisinya, profesor, bersama dengan tablet, dijadikan tebusan oleh kumpulan tentera bayaran, yang dipimpin oleh lelaki kejam Philipe Gallo.
back_translation: But before he could start his expedition, the professor, along with the tablet, was captured by a group of mercenaries led by the cruel man, Philipe Gallo.

text: the movie mixes the personal life of the ancestors of this man as well as historical moments for m & # 233 ; xico such as the reform war , the mexican revolution , etc . arc & # 225 ; ngel ca n't sleep .
translation: Filem ini menggabungkan kehidupan peribadi leluhur lelaki ini serta peristiwa sejarah penting bagi Mexico seperti Peperangan Reformasi, Revolusi Mexico, dan lain-lain. Arcángel tidak boleh tidur.
back_translation: This film combines the personal life of this male ancestor and important historical events for Mexico such as the Reform Wars, the Mexican Revolution, and others. Arcángel cannot sleep.

text: pronounced cured , she became a psychoanalyst herself and , within eight years , was practising alongside the founding fathers .
translation: Setelah sembuh sepenuhnya, dia menjadi seorang psikoanalis sendiri dan, dalam tempoh lapan tahun, dia sudah praktik bersebelahan dengan bapa-bapa pengasas.
back_translation: After fully recovering, he became a psychoanalyst himself and, within a period of eight years, he was already practicing alongside the founding fathers.

text: this causes duncan 's father ( jenkins ) further grief , who does n't understand his son 's unusual mourning rituals .
translation: Ini menyebabkan bapa Duncan (Jenkins) lebih bersedih, yang tidak memahami ritual berkabung anaknya yang tidak lazim.
back_translation: This makes father Duncan (Jenkins) even sadder, who doesn't understand the unusual mourning ritual of his child.

text: the ill-conceived modern-day ending falls flat where it should deliver a moral punch .
translation: Akhir moden yang terfikir dengan tidak baik gagal memberi kesan yang memberi kesan moral.
back_translation: Modern endings that are poorly thought out fail to give moral effects.

text: the tenement is a four story anthology that in which each of its characters live within the same building and walk a fine line between good and evil .
translation: Pangsapuri itu merupakan suatu antologi empat tingkat di mana setiap wataknya tinggal dalam bangunan yang sama dan berjalan di atas sempadan antara kebaikan dan kejahatan.
back_translation: The apartment is an anthology of four levels where each character lives in the same building and walks on the border between good and evil.

text: dr . singh ( amitabh bachchan ) a senior doctor raise funds to fulfil his dream of having a state-of-the-art hospital .
translation: Dr. Singh (Amitabh Bachchan), seorang doktor kanan mengumpulkan dana untuk memenuhi impian beliau untuk memiliki sebuah hospital bertaraf dunia.
back_translation: Dr. Singh (Amitabh Bachchan), a senior doctor, gathers funds to fulfill his dream of owning a world-class hospital.

text: henry bean 's thoughtful screenplay provides no easy answers , but offers a compelling investigation of faith versus intellect
translation: Naskah skrin yang berwawasan oleh Henry Bean tidak menyediakan jawapan yang mudah, tetapi menawarkan penyiasatan yang memikat mengenai iman berbanding akal.
back_translation: Henry Bean's insightful screenplay does not offer easy answers, but instead provides a fascinating exploration of faith versus reason.

text: it 's not that kung pow is n't funny some of the time -- it just is n't any funnier than bad martial arts movies are all by themselves , without all oedekerk 's impish augmentation .
translation: Ini bukan bermakna bahawa kung pow tidak lucu pada sesetengah masa - tetapi ia sama sekali tidak lebih lucu daripada filem-filem seni bela diri yang buruk itu sendiri, tanpa semua pertambahan licik Oedekerk.
back_translation: This does not mean that Kung Pow is not funny at times - but it is certainly no funnier than the bad martial arts films themselves, without all of Oedekerk's cunning additions.

text: has the kitsch appeal of a farm implement on a restaurant wall , or an andy warhol mao poster : interesting , but not for its original purpose .
translation: Mempunyai daya tarikan kitsch seperti alat pertanian di dinding restoran, atau poster Andy Warhol Mao: menarik, tetapi bukan untuk tujuan asalnya.
back_translation: Having a kitschy allure like farming tools on the wall of a restaurant, or an Andy Warhol Mao poster: intriguing, but not for its original purpose.

text: without getting grand or preachy , the sprechers use an unconventional approach to coax us into asking ourselves fundamental questions .
translation: Tanpa menjadi besar mulut atau berprestij, pembicara menggunakan pendekatan yang tidak lazim untuk membujuk kita supaya bertanya kepada diri sendiri soalan-soalan asas.
back_translation: Without being boastful or prestigious, the speaker uses an unconventional approach to persuade us to ask ourselves basic questions.

text: battling his own demons he realizes he is just like the rest of us : good and evil .
translation: Apabila berhadapan dengan iblisnya sendiri, dia sedar bahawa dia sama seperti kita yang lain: baik dan jahat.
back_translation: When faced with his own demons, he realizes that he is just like the rest of us: good and evil.

text: ben is a perfectionist and overachiever whose tunnel vision leads to nothing less than graduating at the top of his class .
translation: Ben adalah seorang perfeksionis dan pencapai cemerlang yang pandangan sempitnya tidak akan menghasilkan apa-apa selain daripada lulus dengan keputusan terbaik di kelasnya.
back_translation: Ben is a perfectionist and an outstanding achiever whose narrow vision will only result in nothing but getting the best grades in his class.

text: the movie fails to portray its literarily talented and notorious subject as anything much more than a dirty old man .
translation: Filem tersebut gagal untuk menggambarkan subjek yang berbakat secara sastra dan terkenal sebagai sesuatu yang lebih daripada sekadar seorang lelaki tua kotor.
back_translation: The film failed to portray the talented and renowned literary subject as something more than just a filthy old man.

text: while gertie is able to manipulate ollie with the finesse of an adult , she is ultimately daddy 's little girl .
translation: Sementara Gertie mampu untuk memanipulasi Ollie dengan kehalusan orang dewasa, pada akhirnya dia tetap menjadi gadis kecil ayah.
back_translation: While Gertie is able to manipulate Ollie with the finesse of an adult, in the end, she remains her father's little girl.

text: it makes me feel weird / thinking about all the bad things in the world / like puppies with broken legs / and butterflies that die / and movies starring pop queens
translation: Ia membuat saya berasa aneh / memikirkan semua perkara buruk di dunia / seperti anak anjing dengan kaki patah / dan kupu-kupu yang mati / serta filem yang dibintangi ratu pop
back_translation: It makes me feel strange / thinking about all the bad things in the world / like a puppy with a broken leg / and dead butterflies / and movies starring pop queens

text: [ a ] superbly controlled , passionate adaptation of graham greene 's 1955 novel .
translation: Adaptasi yang sangat terkawal dan penuh gairah dari novel tahun 1955 karya Graham Greene.
back_translation: A very controlled and full of passion adaptation of the 1955 novel by Graham Greene.

text: his attempt at becoming a lefty leads to an interesting turn of events which suggest that he may be at the start of a never-ending cycle .
translation: Percubaannya untuk menjadi kiri menghasilkan peristiwa menarik yang menunjukkan bahawa beliau mungkin berada di permulaan kitaran yang tidak berkesudahan.
back_translation: His attempt to lean left generated interesting events indicating that he may be at the beginning of an endless cycle.

text: marisa ventura ( lopez ) is a single mother born and bred in the boroughs of new york city , who works as a maid in a first-class manhattan hotel .
translation: Marisa Ventura (Lopez) adalah seorang ibu tunggal yang lahir dan dibesarkan di kawasan boroughs New York City, yang bekerja sebagai pembantu di hotel bertaraf pertama di Manhattan.
back_translation: Marisa Ventura (Lopez) is a single mother born and raised in the boroughs of New York City, who works as a maid at a first-class hotel in Manhattan.

text: meanwhile , on a distant planet , alien authorities have captured the most dangerous of all criminals and are sending him via rocket to a prison planet .
translation: Sementara itu, di sebuah planet yang jauh, pihak berkuasa makhluk asing telah menangkap penjenayah yang paling berbahaya dan sedang menghantar dia melalui roket ke planet tahanan.
back_translation: Meanwhile, on a distant planet, the authorities of alien creatures have captured the most dangerous criminal and are sending him via a rocket to a prison planet.

text: for escape he paints the visions that haunt him , while eleanor sends all of his hard earned money to a seedy tele-evangelist .
translation: Untuk melarikan diri, dia melukis visual yang menghantuinya, sementara Eleanor menghantar semua wang yang dia peroleh dengan susah payah kepada seorang pendakwah televisyen yang kurang jujur.
back_translation: To escape, she painted haunting visuals, while Eleanor sent all her hard-earned money to a less honest television preacher.

text: in harlem , martin blaze , a writer for vibe , thinks he 's a loser since his fianc & # 233 ; e cheated on him .
translation: Di Harlem, Martin Blaze, seorang penulis untuk Vibe, merasa dia seorang pecundang kerana tunangannya telah menipunya.
back_translation: In Harlem, Martin Blaze, a writer for Vibe, feels like a loser because his fiancée has deceived him.

text: no movement , no yuks , not much of anything .
translation: Tiada pergerakan, tiada keseronokan, tidak banyak perkara.
back_translation: No movement, no fun, not much going on.

text: a by-the-numbers effort that wo n't do much to enhance the franchise .
translation: Satu usaha yang mengikut prosedur tetapi tidak memberi banyak peningkatan kepada francais tersebut.
back_translation: An effort that follows the procedures but does not bring much improvement to the franchise.

text: an enchanting spectacular for potter fans anxious to ride the hogwarts express toward a new year of magic and mischief .
translation: satu pemandangan yang memukau bagi peminat pengilang yang tak sabar untuk menaiki ekspres hogwarts ke arah tahun baru ajaib dan kacau-bilau.
back_translation: a breathtaking sight for manufacturing enthusiasts who cannot wait to board the Hogwarts Express towards a magical and chaotic New Year's.

text: new arrival alden pyle ( brendan fraser ) , an idealistic american aid worker , befriends london times correspondent thomas fowler ( michael caine ) .
translation: Kedatangan baru Alden Pyle (Brendan Fraser), seorang pekerja bantuan Amerika yang idealis, menjadi kawan rapat dengan wartawan Times London, Thomas Fowler (Michael Caine).
back_translation: The arrival of newcomer Alden Pyle (Brendan Fraser), an idealistic American aid worker, becomes close friends with London Times journalist, Thomas Fowler (Michael Caine).

text: there are things to like about murder by numbers -- but , in the end , the disparate elements do n't gel .
translation: Terdapat hal yang boleh disukai tentang pembunuhan berdasarkan nombor - tetapi, pada akhirnya, elemen yang berbeza tidak sepadan.
back_translation: There are things that can be liked about murder based on numbers - but, in the end, the different elements do not match.

text: lando , after knowing the situation , attempted to kill roman .
translation: Lando, setelah mengetahui situasi, cuba membunuh Roman.
back_translation: Lando, after knowing the situation, tried to kill Roman.

text: it 's rare to find a film to which the adjective 'gentle ' applies , but the word perfectly describes pauline & paulette .
translation: Sukar untuk menemui filem yang sesuai dengan kata sifat 'lembut', tetapi perkataan itu sempurna menggambarkan Pauline & Paulette.
back_translation: It is difficult to find a movie that fits the adjective 'gentle', but that word perfectly describes Pauline & Paulette.

text: seeking a mental escape , simone begins to tune into what 's happening with the other couples around her .
translation: Mencari pelarian mental, Simone mula memperhatikan apa yang berlaku dengan pasangan lain di sekelilingnya.
back_translation: Seeking mental escape, Simone began to observe what was happening with the other couples around her.

text: vera 's technical prowess ends up selling his film short ; he smoothes over hard truths even as he uncovers them .
translation: Kebolehan teknikal Vera akhirnya menghalang kejayaan filemnya; beliau menyamarkan hakikat yang sukar walaupun dia mendedahkannya.
back_translation: Vera's technical ability ultimately hindered the success of her film; she masked the difficult truth even though she exposed it.

text: filmmaker rick mckay documents actor/illusionist james beaman 's transformation from an attractive young actor to the legendary icon marlene dietrich .
translation: Pengarah filem Rick McKay mendokumentasikan transformasi pelakon/ilusionis James Beaman dari seorang pelakon muda yang menarik menjadi ikon legenda Marlene Dietrich.
back_translation: Film director Rick McKay documented the transformation of actor/illusionist James Beaman from a young actor with charisma to the legendary icon Marlene Dietrich.

text: a take on the classic tale 'the boy who cried wolf ' , 'big fat liar ' is about a 14-year-old boy named jason shephard ( frankie muniz ) who lies for the fun of it .
translation: Sebuah adaptasi kisah klasik 'budak yang menangis serigala', 'Si Penipu Besar' mengisahkan tentang seorang budak lelaki berumur 14 tahun bernama Jason Shepard (Frankie Muniz) yang suka berbohong kerana keseronokan.
back_translation: An adaptation of the classic tale 'The Boy Who Cried Wolf,' 'Big Fat Liar' tells the story of a 14-year-old boy named Jason Shepard (Frankie Muniz) who enjoys lying for fun.

text: with the prospect of films like kangaroo jack about to burst across america 's winter movie screens it 's a pleasure to have a film like the hours as an alternative .
translation: Dengan prospek filem-filem seperti Kangaroo Jack yang akan meletup di layar perak Amerika musim sejuk, adalah suatu keseronokan untuk mempunyai filem seperti The Hours sebagai alternatif.
back_translation: With prospects of films like Kangaroo Jack set to explode on the silver screen in America's winter season, it is a delight to have films like The Hours as an alternative.

text: shot on wide screen digibeta , sendak with his night kitchen theater partner , arthur yorinks and pilobolus artistic directors robby barnett , michael tracy , and jonathan wolken shows us the tenacity and wit that drive the creative process when serious artists work together .
translation: Gambar diambil dengan wide screen digibeta, Sendak bersama rakan teater malamnya, Arthur Yorinks dan pengarah seni Pilobolus, Robby Barnett, Michael Tracy, dan Jonathan Wolken menunjukkan kecekalan dan kebijaksanaan yang mendorong proses kreatif apabila artis-serius bekerja bersama.
back_translation: The picture was taken with a wide-screen digibeta, showing Sendak with his theater colleagues in the evening, Arthur Yorinks and the artistic directors of Pilobolus, Robby Barnett, Michael Tracy, and Jonathan Wolken, demonstrating the resilience and wisdom that drives the creative process when serious artists work together.

text: uneven but ultimately appealing satire of the dreck we call white man 's rap music . some good performances and an often goofy script make for a generally good time .
translation: Satire yang tidak sekata tetapi pada akhirnya menarik tentang tiruan yang kita sebut sebagai muzik rap orang kulit putih. Beberapa persembahan yang bagus dan skrip yang kadang-kadang kocak menjadikan ia satu pengalaman yang secara umumnya baik.
back_translation: Uneven satire, but ultimately intriguing about the imitation we call white rap music. Some good performances and occasionally amusing scripts make it a generally good experience.

text: wes craven 's presence is felt ; not the craven of 'a nightmare on elm street ' or 'the hills have eyes , ' but the sad schlock merchant of 'deadly friend . '
translation: Kehadiran Wes Craven dirasai; bukan lagi dibayangkan sebagai pengarah 'A Nightmare on Elm Street' atau 'The Hills Have Eyes', tetapi sebagai pedagang filem yang suram dalam 'Deadly Friend'.
back_translation: Wes Craven's presence is felt; no longer just imagined as the director of 'A Nightmare on Elm Street' or 'The Hills Have Eyes', but as a grim filmmaker in 'Deadly Friend'.

text: a splendid entertainment , young in spirit but accomplished in all aspects with the fullness of spirit and sense of ease that comes only with experience .
translation: hiburan yang sangat baik, muda dalam semangat tetapi berjaya dalam semua aspek dengan penuh semangat dan rasa senang yang hanya datang dengan pengalaman.
back_translation: Great entertainment, youthful in spirit but successful in all aspects with enthusiasm and joy that only comes with experience.

text: evil czar and his no-less-evil sidekick general with the help of the local witch yaga try to eliminate fedot by giving him more and more complex quests and to take marusya to tsar 's palace .
translation: Czar jahat dan pembantunya yang tidak kalah jahat, jeneral, bersama dengan bantuan penyihir tempatan Yaga cuba untuk menyingkirkan Fedot dengan memberikannya tugas-tugas yang lebih kompleks dan untuk membawa Marusya ke istana tsar.
back_translation: The evil tsar and his equally wicked assistant, the general, along with the help of the local witch Yaga, try to get rid of Fedot by giving him more complex tasks and to bring Marusya to the tsar's palace.

text: before they can begin repairing and towing the ghost ship towards harbor , the crew encounters a series of bizarre ocurrences , and the group becomes trapped inside the ship .
translation: Sebelum mereka boleh memulakan kerja membaiki dan menunda kapal hantu ke pelabuhan, krew mengalami beberapa kejadian aneh, dan kumpulan itu terperangkap di dalam kapal.
back_translation: Before they could start working on fixing and towing the ghost ship to the harbor, the crew experienced several strange incidents, and the group was trapped inside the ship.

text: kimberly corman , 19 , was just taking a trip with her friends . .
translation: Kimberly Corman, 19, baru sahaja pergi bercuti bersama rakan-rakannya.
back_translation: Kimberly Corman, 19, has just gone on vacation with her friends.

text: her harrowing story ends in victory , but she has not forgotten the thousands of asylum seekers who remain in detention today .
translation: Kisah mengerikannya berakhir dengan kemenangan, tetapi dia tidak melupakan ribuan pencari suaka yang masih ditahan hari ini.
back_translation: The horrifying tale ended with a victory, but he didn't forget the thousands of asylum seekers still detained today.

text: the best way to describe it is as a cross between paul thomas anderson 's magnolia and david lynch 's mulholland dr .
translation: Cara terbaik untuk menggambarkannya adalah sebagai perpaduan antara filem Magnolia karya Paul Thomas Anderson dan Mulholland Dr. karya David Lynch.
back_translation: The best way to describe it is as a combination of Paul Thomas Anderson's film Magnolia and David Lynch's Mulholland Dr.

text: in 1959 , berry gordy jr . gathered the best musicians from detroit 's thriving jazz and blues scene to begin cutting songs for his new record company .
translation: Pada tahun 1959, Berry Gordy Jr. berkumpul dengan ahli muzik terbaik dari Detroit yang sedang berkembang di sana untuk memulakan rakaman lagu-lagu untuk syarikat rakaman baru beliau.
back_translation: In 1959, Berry Gordy Jr. gathered the best musicians from the thriving Detroit music scene to start recording songs for his new record company.

text: maggie is a young cuban-american freelance writer who takes an eye opening trip back to her roots and meets a young enchanting native , mateo .
translation: Maggie adalah seorang penulis bebas muda berketurunan Cuba-Amerika yang mengambil perjalanan yang memperluas wawasannya kembali ke akar budayanya dan bertemu dengan seorang pemuda pribumi yang memikat, Mateo.
back_translation: Maggie is a young freelance writer of Cuban-American descent who takes a journey that expands her horizons back to her cultural roots and meets a charming native youth, Mateo.

text: haneke keeps us at arm 's length . guided more by intellect than heart , his story flattens instead of sharpens .
translation: haneke menjaga jarak dengan kami. dipandu lebih oleh intelek daripada hati, ceritanya meratakan daripada mempertajam.
back_translation: Haneke keeps his distance from us. Guided more by intellect than by heart, his story flattens rather than sharpens.

text: so vivid a portrait of a woman consumed by lust and love and crushed by betrayal that it conjures up the intoxicating fumes and emotional ghosts of a freshly painted rembrandt .
translation: begitu jelas lukisan seorang wanita yang dilanda nafsu dan cinta serta hancur oleh pengkhianatan sehingga ia menciptakan asap memabukkan dan hantuan emosi dari lukisan rembrandt yang baru dipadatkan.
back_translation: So clear the painting of a woman plagued by lust and love and destroyed by betrayal that she creates intoxicating fumes and emotional anguish from the freshly crushed Rembrandt painting.

text: in singapore , that means that at the age of 12 , the government has decided that they are not as academically inclined as their peers .
translation: Di Singapura, ini bermaksud bahawa pada usia 12 tahun, kerajaan telah memutuskan bahawa mereka tidak sec
back_translation: In Singapore, this means that at the age of 12, the government has decided that they are not sect

text: all while jolynn is persued by a masculine , toothpick chewing sheriff .
translation: Semuanya sementara Jolynn diperangi oleh seorang sheriff maskulin yang mengunyah lidi.
back_translation: Everything is temporary as Jolynn is confronted by a masculine sheriff chewing on a stick.

text: [ the film ] tackles the topic of relationships in such a straightforward , emotionally honest manner that by the end , it 's impossible to ascertain whether the film is , at its core , deeply pessimistic or quietly hopeful .
translation: Filem itu mengendalikan topik hubungan dengan cara yang begitu langsung, jujur secara emosi bahawa pada akhirnya, adalah mustahil untuk menentukan sama ada filem itu, pada intinya, sangat pesimis atau penuh dengan harapan secara senyap.
back_translation: The film addresses the topic of relationships in such a direct manner, honestly emotive that in the end, it is impossible to determine whether the film, at its core, is very pessimistic or quietly hopeful.

text: krueger is able to disguise himself as pamela voorhees , and instructs jason to start murdering on elm street upon his resurrection , therefore restoring freddy 's power as well .
translation: Krueger mampu menyamar sebagai Pamela Voorhees, dan mengarahkan Jason untuk memulai pembunuhan di Elm Street setelah dia bangkit semula, dengan itu mengembalikan kuasa Freddy juga.
back_translation: Krueger is able to disguise as Pamela Voorhees, and directs Jason to start killing on Elm Street after he is resurrected, thereby restoring Freddy's power as well.

text: unfortunately , the evil tall man ( angus scrimm ) controls that area .
translation: Malangnya, lelaki tinggi jahat (Angus Scrimm) mengawal kawasan tersebut.
back_translation: Unfortunately, the tall evil man (Angus Scrimm) controls the area.

text: takes a simple premise and carries it to unexpected heights .
translation: Mengambil premis yang mudah dan membawanya ke tahap yang tidak dijangka.
back_translation: Taking a simple premise and bringing it to unexpected levels.

text: ruby acts out these scenes in real life with the men and shares her spoils with her sisters .
translation: Ruby menghidupkan semula adegan-adegan tersebut dalam kehidupan nyata dengan lelaki dan berkongsi rampasan itu dengan adik-adik perempuannya.
back_translation: Ruby reenacts those scenes in real life with men and shares the loot with her younger sisters.

text: we get some truly unique character studies and a cross-section of americana that hollywood could n't possibly fictionalize and be believed .
translation: Kita mendapat kajian watak yang benar-benar unik dan potret pelbagai aspek kehidupan di Amerika yang tidak mungkin difiksikan oleh Hollywood dan dipercayai.
back_translation: We received a study on characters that are truly unique and portray various aspects of life in America that cannot be fictionalized by Hollywood and are believed.

text: in this refreshingly shameless celebration of money and expensive stuff , director kevin bray grabs every retro action-film clichM-i .
translation: Dalam perayaan uang dan barang mahal yang jujur ini, pengarah Kevin Bray menggabungkan setiap klise filem aksi retro.
back_translation: In this honest celebration of money and luxury goods, director Kevin Bray combines every cliché of retro action films.

text: the result is a chronicle of the shift from a world organized by the principles of nature to one dominated by technology , the synthetic and the virtual .
translation: Hasilnya adalah kronik peralihan dari dunia yang diatur oleh prinsip-prinsip alam kepada dunia yang dikuasai oleh teknologi, bahan sintetis, dan virtual.
back_translation: The result is a chronic transition from a world governed by natural principles to a world dominated by technology, synthetic materials, and the virtual realm.

text: as they each play out their own con , the line between rescuer and executioner , betrayer and martyr become blurred and they must learn to trust each other in order to survive .
translation: Apabila mereka masing-masing menjalankan penipuan mereka sendiri, garis antara penyelamat dan algojo, pengkhianat dan martir menjadi kabur dan mereka harus belajar untuk saling percaya agar dapat bertahan hidup.
back_translation: When they each carry out their own deception, the line between savior and executioner, traitor and martyr becomes blurred and they must learn to trust each other in order to survive.

text: over a fourteen year period they were the heartbeat on every hit from motown 's detroit era .
translation: Selama tempoh empat belas tahun, mereka menjadi pemain kunci dalam setiap hit dari era Detroit Motown.
back_translation: For fourteen years, they were key players in every hit from the Detroit Motown era.

text: leoncio 's son robert and daughter marites disapprove of their father 's single-handed decision , leading to a conflict that causes the old man 's fatal heart attack .
translation: Anak lelaki Leoncio, Robert, dan anak perempuan, Marites, tidak bersetuju dengan keputusan bapanya yang diambil sendirian, menyebabkan konflik yang menyebabkan serangan jantung yang membawa maut kepada lelaki tua itu.
back_translation: Leoncio's son, Robert, and daughter, Marites, disagreed with their father's decision made unilaterally, causing a conflict that led to a fatal heart attack for the old man.

text: this epic film , eschewing dialogue and conventional narrative logic , tells a gripping tale of biological drama through a highly improbable series of evocative images , superb acting and editing , and haunting music .
translation: Filem epik ini, meninggalkan dialog dan logik naratif konvensional, menceritakan kisah dramatik biologi melalui siri imej yang evokatif, lakonan dan penyuntingan yang cemerlang, serta muzik yang menghantui.
back_translation: This epic film, departing from conventional dialogue and narrative logic, tells a dramatic biological story through a series of evocative images, brilliant acting and editing, and haunting music.

text: if you sometimes like to go to the movies to have fun , wasabi is a good place to start .
translation: Jika anda suka pergi menonton wayang untuk berseronok kadang-kadang, wasabi adalah tempat yang baik untuk bermula.
back_translation: If you like going to the movies for fun, sometimes, Wasabi is a good place to start.

text: when she fails to find the `` perfect man `` that will make her happy , she decides to construct him herself , using parts from different people .
translation: Apabila dia gagal untuk menemui "lelaki sempurna" yang akan membuatnya bahagia, dia memutuskan untuk membina sendiri, dengan menggunakan bahagian dari pelbagai orang.
back_translation: When she fails to find the "perfect man" who will make her happy, she decides to build one herself, using parts from various people.

text: but sue , angry and feeling abandoned by lynn , decides to carry out the killing herself .
translation: Tetapi Sue, marah dan berasa ditinggalkan oleh Lynn, memutuskan untuk melaksanakan pembunuhan tersebut sendiri.
back_translation: But Sue, feeling angry and abandoned by Lynn, decided to carry out the murder herself.

text: emma 's a succesful sale agent for a home security company , due in part to being the police chief 's daughter .
translation: Emma merupakan seorang ejen jualan yang berjaya untuk sebuah syarikat keselamatan rumah, sebahagian disebabkan kerana dia anak kepada ketua polis.
back_translation: Emma is a successful sales agent for a home security company, partly because she is the daughter of the police chief.

text: culkin , who 's in virtually every scene , shines as a young man who uses sarcastic lies like a shield .
translation: Culkin, yang muncul dalam hampir setiap adegan, bersinar sebagai seorang pemuda yang menggunakan bohong sarkastik sebagai perisai.
back_translation: Culkin, who appears in almost every scene, shines as a young man who uses sarcastic lies as a shield.

text: not only better than its predecessor , it may rate as the most magical and most fun family fare of this or any recent holiday season .
translation: Tidak hanya lebih baik daripada pendahulunya, tetapi ia mungkin dinilai sebagai tontonan keluarga yang paling magis dan paling menyeronokkan pada musim percutian yang terkini atau mana-mana musim percutian baru-baru ini.
back_translation: Not only better than its predecessor, but it may be considered as the most magical and enjoyable family entertainment in the current holiday season or any recent holiday season.

text: just one more collection of penis , breast and flatulence gags in search of a story . or a profit . or some damn thing .
translation: Hanya satu lagi koleksi lelucon tentang zakar, payudara, dan kentut dalam mencari sebuah cerita. Atau keuntungan. Atau sesuatu yang penting.
back_translation: Just one more collection of jokes about penises, breasts, and farting in search of a story. Or benefits. Or something important.

text: this odd , poetic road movie , spiked by jolts of pop music , pretty much takes place in morton 's ever-watchful gaze -- and it 's a tribute to the actress , and to her inventive director , that the journey is such a mesmerizing one .
translation: Filem jalan raya yang aneh dan puitis ini, diselingi oleh dentuman muzik pop, sebagian besar berlangsung di bawah pandangan penuh perhatian Morton - dan ini adalah penghormatan kepada pelakonnya, dan kepada pengarah inovatifnya, bahawa perjalanan ini begitu memukau.
back_translation: This strange and poetic highway film, interspersed with the strains of pop music, largely unfolds under Morton's attentive gaze - and it is a testament to its actors and its innovative director that this journey is so captivating.

text: if you 're a crocodile hunter fan , you 'll enjoy at least the `` real `` portions of the film . if you 're looking for a story , do n't bother .
translation: Jika anda penggemar pemburu buaya, anda akan menikmati setidaknya bahagian "sebenar" filem tersebut. Jika anda mencari cerita, jangan risau.
back_translation: If you are a fan of alligator hunters, you will enjoy at least the "real" parts of the movie. If you are looking for a story, don't worry.

text: true love is right around the corner as long as he does n't lose sight of what he 's looking for .
translation: Cinta sejati berada di tikar sebelah, selagi dia tidak kehilangan pandangan terhadap apa yang dicarinya.
back_translation: True love is found on the neighboring mat, as long as it does not lose sight of what it is looking for.

text: after several fruitless attempts to sell the car , shirley dumps johnny , who has hopelessly fallen in love with her .
translation: Selepas beberapa percubaan yang sia-sia untuk menjual kereta itu, Shirley memutuskan hubungan dengan Johnny, yang telah putus asa jatuh cinta padanya.
back_translation: After several futile attempts to sell the car, Shirley decided to end her relationship with Johnny, who had become desperate in falling in love with her.

text: dr . kanna & # 38 ; rupi are childhood lovers and made for each other .
translation: Dr. Kanna dan Rupi adalah kekasih semasa kanak-kanak dan ditakdirkan untuk bersama.
back_translation: Dr. Kanna and Rupi were childhood sweethearts and destined to be together.

text: there is something in full frontal , i guess , about artifice and acting and how it distorts reality for people who make movies and watch them , but like most movie riddles , it works only if you have an interest in the characters you see .
translation: Terdapat sesuatu yang membincangkan tentang kepura-puraan dan lakonan serta bagaimana ia mengubah realiti bagi orang yang membuat filem dan menontonnya, tetapi seperti kebanyakan teka-teki filem, ia hanya berfungsi jika anda mempunyai minat pada watak yang anda lihat.
back_translation: There is something discussing about pretense and acting and how it alters reality for those who make films and watch them, but like most film puzzles, it only works if you have an interest in the character you're watching.

text: armed with a game supporting cast , from the pitch-perfect forster to the always hilarious meara and levy , like mike shoots and scores , doing its namesake proud .
translation: Bersenjata dengan barisan pelakon yang menyokong permainan, dari karakter Forster yang sempurna hingga Meara dan Levy yang sentiasa lucu, filem Like Mike menjaringkan gol dan mencapai kejayaan sejati.
back_translation: Armed with a lineup of supporting actors, from the perfect character of Forster to the consistently funny Meara and Levy, the movie Like Mike scores goals and achieves true success.

text: forced to move back to his old job at a pizza parlor and into a rundown tenement where a number of oddballs wander the hall including a lonely middle aged woman ( mary coleston ) who makes spam casseroles for all the bachelors , a daffy prostitute ( krystina carson ) , and a spanish don juan ( manual cabra ) who wanders the halls in his bathrobe .
translation: Terpaksa kembali ke pekerjaan lamanya di sebuah kedai pizza dan tinggal di sebuah rumah flat yang usang di mana ramai orang aneh berkeliaran, termasuk seorang wanita sederhana (Mary Coleston) yang membuat kaserol spam untuk semua bujangan, seorang pelacur gila (Krystina Carson), dan seorang Don Juan Sepanyol (Manuel Cabra) yang berjalan-jalan di lorong dengan jubah mandinya.
back_translation: Had to return to my old job at a pizza shop and live in a rundown flat where many strange people roam, including a simple woman (Mary Coleston) who makes spam casserole for all the bachelors, a crazy prostitute (Krystina Carson), and a Spanish Don Juan (Manuel Cabra) who strolls down the hallway in his bathrobe.

text: we ca n't accuse kung pow for misfiring , since it is exactly what it wants to be : an atrociously , mind-numbingly , indescribably bad movie . unfortunately , we 'd prefer a simple misfire .
translation: Kita tidak boleh menuduh Kung Pow atas kesilapan berpencaran, kerana itulah sebenarnya yang diinginkannya: sebuah filem yang sangat buruk, membosankan, dan sukar dideskripsikan. Malangnya, kita lebih suka ia hanya berlaku kesilapan ringan.
back_translation: We cannot blame Kung Pow for its scattered errors, because that is actually what it aims for: a film that is incredibly bad, boring, and difficult to describe. Unfortunately, we would prefer it to be just a small mistake.

text: hardly an objective documentary , but it 's great cinematic polemic . . . love moore or loathe him , you 've got to admire . . . the intensity with which he 's willing to express his convictions .
translation: Hampir tidak objektif sebagai dokumentari, tetapi ini adalah polemik sinematik yang hebat. Suka atau benci Moore, anda harus mengaguminya, intensiti dengan yang dia bersedia mengekspresikan keyakinannya.
back_translation: It's almost not objective as a documentary, but it's a great cinematic polemic. Love or hate Moore, you have to admire the intensity with which he's willing to express his beliefs.

text: lauren ambrose comes alive under the attention from two strangers in town - with honest performances and realistic interaction between the characters , this is a coming-of-age story with a twist .

text: ben stiller and jack black star as tim and nick , best friends , neighbors and co-workers , whose equal footing is suddenly tripped up when one of nick 's harebrained get-rich-quick schemes actually succeeds : vapoorizer , a spray that literally makes dog poop , or any other kind for that matter , evaporate into thin air -- to where exactly is anyone 's guess .
translation: Ben Stiller dan Jack Black membintangi sebagai Tim dan Nick, sahabat karib, jiran, dan rakan sekerja, yang keseimbangan mereka tiba-tiba tergugat apabila salah satu rancangan cepat kaya yang gila milik Nick benar-benar berjaya: Vapoorizer, semburan yang secara harfiah membuat taik anjing, atau mana-mana jenis taik pun, menguap menjadi udara - ke mana persisnya adalah teka-teki untuk sesiapa sahaja.
back_translation: Ben Stiller and Jack Black star as Tim and Nick, close friends, neighbors, and co-workers, whose balance is suddenly disrupted when one of Nick's crazy get-rich-quick schemes actually succeeds: the Vapoorizer, a spray that literally turns dog poop, or any kind of poop, into thin air - where exactly it goes is a mystery to anyone.

text: after a really wild night jim and the gang wake up in an abandoned warehouse in a small town in the middle of no where , of which they have never heard of .

text: although their friendship raises some eyebrows at first , radio 's growth under the coach 's guidance ultimately inspires the local townsfolk , from 1964 when he first starts helping the hanna yellow jackets football team , through a 38+ career with the school that continues today ( 2002 ) , including tenures as the head cheerleader , assistant coach and team manager .

text: an uncluttered , resonant gem that relays its universal points without lectures or confrontations .

text: when a male friend commits suicide , he leaves all of his belongings to his friends .

text: renM-ie zellweger , catherine zeta-jones , richard gere , queen latifah and even sad-faced ol ' john c . reilly will have you singin ' and dancin ' in the aisles .

text: this movie attempts to reconstruct the bankruptcy of the banco ambrosiano bank and its liaisons with the vatican and the masonry through the story of its president roberto calvi , notoriously found dead under the blackfriars bridge in london in june 1982 .
translation: Filem ini cuba untuk mengulangi kebankrapan bank banco ambrosiano dan hubungannya dengan vatican dan masonry melalui kisah presidennya, Roberto Calvi, yang terkenal ditemui mati di bawah jambatan Blackfriars di London pada Jun 1982.
back_translation: This film attempts to explore the bankruptcy of Banco Ambrosiano and its connections to the Vatican and Freemasonry through the story of its president, Roberto Calvi, who was famously found dead beneath the Blackfriars Bridge in London in June 1982.

text: . . . although this idea is `` new `` the results are tired .
translation: . . . walaupun idea ini adalah `` baru `` hasilnya sudah jemu .

text: a retired boston pd detective is n't buying the news report of a local girl accidentally drowning . . .

text: it is dawn on the morning of the vernal equinox .

text: what was once original has been co-opted so frequently that it now seems pedestrian .

text: although mainstream american movies tend to exploit the familiar , every once in a while a film arrives from the margin that gives viewers a chance to learn , to grow , to travel .
translation: Walaupun filem utama Amerika cenderung untuk mengambil kesempatan dari yang lazim, kadang-kadang sebuah filem datang dari tepi yang memberi penonton peluang untuk belajar, untuk berkembang, untuk melancong.

text: not only a reminder of how they used to make movies , but also how they sometimes still can be made .

text: no amount of nostalgia for carvey 's glory days can disguise the fact that the new film is a lame kiddie flick and that carvey 's considerable talents are wasted in it .

text: when boys fly pulls no punches in exposing this world - men are shown overdosing and engaging in risky behavior - but at the same time , it also shows the sense of community and vitality the parties bring to the men who attend .

back_translation: When boys fly, it does not confine in exposing this world - men are shown to have excessive vices and engage in risky behaviors - but at the same time, it also shows the sense of community and vitality that the party brings to the men attending it.

text: a gang of robbers , lead by career criminal charlie croker , create the largest traffic jam in los angeles history , giving them time to pull off a theft of gold bullion .

text: the film documents the band responding to the twists and turns of the recording industry , rehearsing for their tour , preparing for their debut concert at the grand ole opry , charting the course for their career with their managers , and living every-day life on the farm where they reside in rural tennessee .
translation: Filem ini mendokumentasikan kumpulan tersebut merespons putaran industri rakaman, berlatih untuk lawatan mereka, bersedia untuk konsert sulung mereka di Grand Ole Opry, menjalankan haluan kerjaya mereka dengan pengurus-pengurus mereka, dan menjalani kehidupan seharian di ladang tempat mereka tinggal di Tennessee luar bandar.
back_translation: This film documents the group responding to the music industry's whirlwind, rehearsing for their tour, preparing for their debut concert at the Grand Ole Opry, navigating their career path with their managers, and experiencing everyday life on the farm where they reside in rural Tennessee.

text: once again , director chris columbus takes a hat-in-hand approach to rowling that stifles creativity and allows the film to drag on for nearly three hours .

text: embracing the afghan women 's cause as a primary commitment , iara lee 's short film not only spotlights the despair on both sides of the afghan-pakistan border , but also captures the hope and dignity that still define afghan men , women and children .
translation: Mengambil pendirian utama untuk menyokong kepentingan wanita Afghanistan, filem pendek Iara Lee tidak hanya menyorot keputusasaan di kedua belah sempadan Afghanistan-Pakistan, tetapi juga menangkap harapan dan martabat yang masih menggambarkan lelaki, wanita, dan kanak-kanak Afghanistan.
back_translation: Taking a strong stance to support the interests of women in Afghanistan, Iara Lee's short film not only highlights the despair on both sides of the Afghanistan-Pakistan border but also captures the hope and dignity that still characterize men, women, and children in Afghanistan.

text: too many improbabilities and rose-colored situations temper what could 've been an impacting film .

text: painful , horrifying and oppressively tragic , this film should not be missed .

text: the delicious trimmingsM-^Earrive early and stay late , filling nearly every minuteM-^Ewith a lighthearted glow , some impudent snickers , and a glorious dose of humankind 's liberating ability to triumph over a scrooge or two .

text: the drama is played out with such aching beauty and truth that it brings tears to your eyes .

text: there are many definitions of 'time waster ' but this movie must surely be one of them .

text: in its combination of religion , love story and exotic locales , `` heaven `` is a bit reminiscent of james michener 's `` hawaii , `` although this is a somewhat simpler , more personal tale .
translation: Dalam gabungannya dengan agama, kisah cinta, dan tempat-tempat eksotis, "surga" sedikit mengingatkan pada "Hawaii" karya James Michener, meskipun ini adalah cerita yang agak lebih sederhana dan lebih personal.

text: with exquisite craftsmanship . . . olivier assayas has fashioned an absorbing look at provincial bourgeois french society .
translation: Dengan keahlian yang sangat baik . . . Olivier Assayas telah membentuk pandangan yang menarik terhadap masyarakat borjuis provinsi Perancis.

text: there starts a dangerous game where the two teenagers that graham is protecting will be implied .

text: part contemporary investigation and part historical inquiry , documentary follows the quest of one journalist in search of justice .

text: the film tells the parallel , conflicting trajectory of five women : anita , isabel , adela , leire , and maricarmen .
translation: Filem tersebut mengisahkan tentang perjalanan hidup berseloroh dan bertentangan lima wanita: Anita, Isabel, Adela, Leire, dan Maricarmen.
back_translation: The film tells the story of the humorous and conflicting life journey of five women: Anita, Isabel, Adela, Leire, and Maricarmen.

text: fragmented , elliptical and overplotted to the point of being hard to track . still , it 's worth hanging in for the finish . . . [ when ] soderbergh pulls off a delicious trick , a gesture of pure , tender , unabashed movie love that makes up for everything .
translation: Terputus, bersifat eliptikal dan terlalu terurus hingga sukar untuk diikuti. Walau bagaimanapun, ia berbaloi untuk disaksikan hingga habis... [apabila] Soderbergh melakukan satu trik yang lazat, satu gerakan cinta filem yang murni, lembut, dan tidak malu yang mengatasi segala-galanya.
back_translation: Fragmented, elliptical, and too well-manicured to follow easily. However, it's worth watching until the end... [as] Soderbergh delivers a delicious trick, a pure, gentle, and unashamed film gesture that overcomes everything.

text: often shocking but ultimately worthwhile exploration of motherhood and desperate mothers .
translation: Penjelajahan ibu dan ibu yang putus asa yang sering mengejutkan tetapi akhirnya bermanfaat.
back_translation: The exploration of desperate mother and father often surprising but ultimately beneficial.

text: two brothers choose the opposite sides in a civil war of a small country .
translation: Dua beradik memilih pihak yang bertentangan dalam peperangan saudara di sebuah negara kecil.
back_translation: Two siblings chose opposing sides in a civil war in a small country.

text: no amount of good intentions is able to overcome the triviality of the story .
translation: Tiada jumlah niat baik yang mampu mengatasi kelalaian cerita.
back_translation: No amount of good intentions can overcome the negligence of a story.

text: kok pin , boon hock and terry are classmates in `` em3 `` stream .
translation: Kok Pin, Boon Hock, dan Terry adalah rakan sekelas dalam aliran "em3".
back_translation: Kok Pin, Boon Hock, and Terry are classmates in the "em3" stream.

text: unaware she is the object of his affection , frankie is in for a big surprise when she shows up after work with mervin ( keith david ) on her arm .
translation: Tanpa menyedarinya, Frankie adalah objek kasih sayangnya, dia akan terkejut besar ketika dia muncul setelah bekerja bersama Mervin (Keith David) di sisinya.
back_translation: Unbeknownst to him, Frankie is the apple of his affection, he will be greatly surprised when he appears after working alongside Mervin (Keith David) by his side.

text: lead by billy clemens , the gang includes maggie and virginia caulder , two beautiful sisters who have a penchant for disguise as well as gun handling .
translation: Digerakkan oleh Billy Clemens, kumpulan ini juga termasuk Maggie dan Virginia Caulder, dua adik-beradik cantik yang mempunyai minat pada penyamaran serta mengendalikan senjata dengan baik.
back_translation: Led by Billy Clemens, this group also includes Maggie and Virginia Caulder, two beautiful siblings who are interested in disguises and proficient in handling weapons.

text: alenka indulges in the belief that her lover is dead in order to account for his absence .
translation: Alenka terjerumus dalam kepercayaan bahawa kekasihnya sudah mati untuk menerangkan ketiadaannya.
back_translation: Alenka fell into the belief that her lover had died to explain his absence.

text: complicating matters further is the fact that commitment-shy dex unexpectedly meets marcia , the girl of his dreams .
translation: Mengkomplikasikan keadaan lebih jauh adalah hakikat bahawa dex yang takut akan komitmen secara tidak terduga bertemu dengan Marica, gadis impiannya.
back_translation: Further complicating the situation is the fact that the commitment-phobic Dex unexpectedly meets Marica, his dream girl.

text: so when a jamaican family move in next door and build a cricket net in the back garden , david is in seventh heaven .
translation: Jadi apabila sebuah keluarga Jamaika berpindah ke sebelah rumah dan membina gelanggang kriket di halaman belakang, David sangat gembira.
back_translation: So when a Jamaican family moved next door and built a cricket pitch in the backyard, David was very happy.

text: he forgets most things after only a few minutes .
translation: Dia lupa kebanyakan perkara selepas hanya beberapa minit.
back_translation: He forgets most things after just a few minutes.
